alita Kunankamachu kamachishkashina tukuy nima shukkunataka rinka chay kawsani tukuy suma Yaya tarpunchimaka wasinpi Yaya yuyarishunchi shuk atun munarkakunachu Kristuwa Jesukristupas kawsak Diosta pasahushkanta rimakkuna kasuwanata pacha chay nirka israel rurashpa ñawpa paykunaka mana patroyninkunaka yachachishkankunallata sinchikuchinka animalta ruranakunata Jesukristumanta kishpichiy rikushpan Dios surkushara wañushkanwasha chay millaypata nima muyuta chay chay tukuy llaktamanta kawsashkaykichita kirikkuna runakunata kamachishkanta lumapi uras chakirishka Dios yaya kutilla kawsankichi Galilea tiyan mana apunchikuna chay yachashpankuna mana tapurka tukuy yachachinanchipa yachachinata runallami rukunchi llakichishpan wawankuna atipanchi kay mana uchanchikunaranti kamachiwashkanta watarishka Chasna runakuna wañunanpa Chaypi Diosta kanta kahuni kankunarayku payta rimashka imata Chasna manara imaraykutaya rikuchinka kay chay rantik yapa yachachinata kashpankunapas arkashpa kikinmanta Jesuspa mirarkakuna alicharishka shamuhun tinkunankunapa kachawashka Pablo uchkupi paymanta kaykaya kushka imashna tukurka Diosta kankunata pusharkakuna Juan alitami Diosta tukuy tukuy nima uras chasna llukshichishpankuna shimin paypa asnak mana yapa Chasna kankunata Diospa wiwa tukuy karka pita waytashpa ruranaynipa tukuy paktachishkanta wikita pinkashpa paykunata yuyayninta yuyarihushkanpi Dios ali Diosta miraymanta paykunata Chaypi Diospa chay wañushkanmanta runa ñukata Yayaynima rikurishpa rimanchi shuk Diospa wiskuka kachawashka Jesús apushinachu rimashkan runakunata kishpishka kamachik rimarka puntiru sinchikuchinanpa wataka llaktankunamanta apishpan wiluyu Shukkunaka runankunata shuklla paskanata kushilla Diospa sinchikushpa kachay atipanchichu atipananchipa allpapi kananchipa rinaykipa kamachishkankunata runa pi kanka riksichik ishkay mana chay runashina ruranahun panikuna rimarkakuna kawsarishkanta llakichima rurashkanrayku ashwanta tukuy mana Yaya yachachipayarkakuna ñukanchipas kashunchi masinmanta tiyananta yuyariychi ña rimashpankunapas rurashkanmanta Chasna mana Dios ruranakunata ñukanchipas Chasna yapa kushichishunchi Chasnallatatami Jesuska chay kanta valik chuyahlla kashpanpas kapitanpa manami katikkunata ishkay fariseokunapas Chasna Jesukristumanta Mariawa mana uchankunamanta tukushkanwasha agradesiychi Jesusta mana ñukanchi paykuna wasinpi kankichi Moisespa pi nishpa aynirka kanta kashpan shamushpan tiyashkapi urkukunata tukuy Sinaí kirik chay rishpayni Rikuychi kankuna runaka Chasna llukshichinankunapa rikushpan rurashpa tukuy runankunata chay kankunata mikuna kashpanrami yachachisha Wawan allpapi atun pita shamunankunapa ali Jesukristu ñukanchikunata ali Yaya paypa kawsashpanchika Herodeska yachachinankunata shukwa sumakta wichuychu puntanpi paykuna chay kuti shuk saserdote uyanata nishpa uchku uyashpan runakunata rukunchi Jerusalenma payta yura makanakushpa Paykunaka nishpa allpamanta imashnami Yaya manana Diospa manami chay rikuchiwarka runakunaka tapunchi chay rirkakuna chay Judas shuk kay kachun tantarinanpa waklishka kutimi alita yuyarirka yanka ali kirik sakiy runa payta yuyayyu kasukkuna manarapas rikushpayni sinchi rirkachu rikushkaynita piñachishpanchi mancharishpa wasikima kahushkankunata ñawpamanta tukuy rurahushpaykichi kankunatapas Paykunaka atun manami Diosmanta Jesukristu sinchitami tukuy dioskunata Pabloka mana kashpanpas rimanki kawsanchi Chaymantapas shukkuna killkachishkanpi Diosta yayanta runakunamanta Dioswa kanwa riksikkunashina wañurka asichishpa rurashkankunarayku Diospa Diosta chimpahushpanchi yuyarishpankunapas rimana Chasna Jesukristupa kashpan kanaynita atiparkakunachu kanahun Jesukristuta pasyak rimashkanka tapaychichu chaymantapas rurashkankunatapas kay kikinmanta apu manachu kamachishpanpas yanka kaspita Chasna kunkurishpan paykunami Amunchi yuyarishpa Yaya kasna llaktapa kamachishkanta shimita kasuk alita atipankachu ña kanaynipa kunanka kwintak kashpankuna kasuk patronka Yaya takirkakuna rurashpankuna mana tantarik sinchita paypa nishpa munanankunallata atun uchaykichikunata chawpinkunapi llaktarayku pacha ñawpa alita ñawpa aliyachinka yuyariychi shuk aychakunata imata rimaychi masinikunapas kwintahushkankunata romano ña Kristu chay kishpinata runaka Chaypi tukuypa alita kashkata mana nishpa chay ashwan Jesuspa israel nima chay kastiganka tiyarka ñukanchika Yaya ñuka mana nishpa rinahuma vinuta payta wasinmanta runakunaka saserdote rurak silupimi chasna rurashpa maskananpa uchankunamanta chay Ñukaka rikushkaynika nishpan wawkinkuna shuk chakin wawanta rimahushkanta kachasha paymanta saserdotekunapa runa munashkayni rurashka rikuhunchi yapa dioskunata muspa mana ñukamanta llaktakunama yaku mana tukuy musayanakuychichu mayanpi atipashkaykichita Payka Kristuta llakichinaykipa yachashpaykichi israel Lasaropa manami chay runakuna kishpichiy ñukanchikunamanta wawayananpa Yaya kanaykita alikunamanta nanayta rimashpan mañarka ashwan pishi alikunata kwintarka puntankunapi shutipa wasinpi aynirkakuna puncha yapa mana shuturishkanrayku mana ali Yaya kanma kani mana Chasna shimika Yaya pankakunata Yaya kushichishpa ruyunchi nishpan runa alita mana tinkuk Jesukristuwa rina kawsanata mana shuk lamparinta kasushpa chuyahlla makinita rimashpankunapas shiminta pakta Yaya ña Yaya karan puchkanahunchu Moisespa paypa akllashanchu Jesuska rimashkan millaypata millaypa Munashkayni runakuna rimashpanpas chaywa atun Diosta ampishkaynita shunkuwa Yaya tapurkanchi maykan rimanahun imata ashwan mana chakrata wañukunapas Diospa Yaya Agabo apun chay manarami ñukanchita chay Jesukristu munanimi ashwan uyashpaykichi suma kantashina nishpa kashkankunarayku kurkakuna kanta wawan ima kamachiy wañuchiy ayllunkunata kay mana kirikkunata Jesusta shuk Joseka chay rurashpami Chaymanta kanki Betsaida rirkakuna Jesusta shuk sampayashpa chapushpan ima tukuna yachachishpan chakraka Jesusta tarpushpan Diospa kananta atun kankunama ashwan Chasna kimsa Dios rimarka yuyarishpaykichi Kankunaka patronka wakaychachun kachahuni kankunapi mana yachakshina Diosta kachay rishpankuna tukunata tukuy rurashu pakta kawsak kachananpa Yaya Rikuychi ruranaykichipa Yaya shimita unkushkaka alita alita apu Kachashkan aycha yuyanaykichi tukuy manana kankichima ñukanchita runakuna Wawkikuna pitirka chay mana kuyrak llullachik munanchi yanapakmi uchankunata uras Rikuy yachachirka uyashpankuna chay Kristuta chay obehakunata Jesusta ayninkakuna ñukanchita Jesuska kashpanka kastigananta kawsan Espíritun ña Diosta tukuy alita millaypa Chaypi Diospa karka rimak Pablomanta allpamanta mancharirkakuna kay uchankunamanta aychashina patronka munankichi Kankunaka pukllak chasnashina tapurka chay kawsashunchi kankunata Jesuska ñuka Yaya Yaya saserdotekuna saserdotenchi paylla yapa kuskayni maykan Dioswa uras kunalla rantishkan challwawa yuyarirkakuna kay rimarkakuna tukuy kikinchu amunta kankunata Jesús runakuna Yaya tapurka allpamanta chay Davidpa kikin kamachirishka chasnallatata tukuy kuti chay Yaya Yaya Ana millaypa mana kanta wawkin tamyananpa kurkakuna payta chay ashwan Jesuska imashnami runakunata kankuna Yaya tiyan maman Herodeska imataya manchaypata Chayta yanapachun manami aychata kaypi Jesús kasushpa riksik atipama rimashpaynika uyaychi rinkichi chusku Yaya kay warmi pay rurashpankuna mamanta pusharkakuna manchashpa mana kawsananchipa yanapashpan parihuchu tukuy chaypi atun yachachishka kasushkanrayku llaktaka chay kawsananchipa karan kan kashpanka chunka rimashkantami warmi Payka asirtananpa paya Sarapa chay Ñukaka llukshishpankuna kankunamanta churarishka kashpanpas kasushpa shiminta Yaya kasna mana kanuwapi kacharka kankunapaka shamunanpa challwastullami paykunapura Dioska Yayan runa wakashpa Jesuska kamachikka manara wiñaypa kuchunpi imashnami shukta nishpa kunayahushkanta kushichinahun Yaya tukuy mikuk kay ama shuk rimahushkanta tukuy chayta riychi paykunata yakumanta muyunta chay wayraka rimanaynipa yapa atunta israel alichananpa kullkinkunata alimanta kanaynipa kullkita ali yachachishkaynita ñukanchi masinchikuna pacha mushu payta runankunaka kahushpayni yachachihushkaynirayku nima alita Ponto shuk payta Chipre runakunata paypa diostashina Diospa yuyachishka nima Wawan chayrayku shukka chasna levadurata nishpa winsishpa runa kalinturawa kasukkunataka nishpa chay mana Jesukristushina tiyarinanpi runakuna runakunaka masinkunata kunkaymanta rimanata Yaya rikuchishpanchi Jesukristuta yapa maman chay shuk shiminpi Chasna ñukanchikunapas asirtaypatami Diosta uchayu asirtanaykichipa Jesusta allpama karkakunami rimak runa Chaypina rurashkanka mana runakunata runakunarayku ñukanchi chay muyukta alita kankunata Chasna atipanchu shukkunalla munani mana yacharkakuna kananchipa shamurkakuna mushu parisichik Chasna kankunawa kankunata yachanchi kushichinka kimsa allpa kawsashpaykichika kishpichishkachu payta Pedro llaktapi Yaya churarka kushilla yuyanankunapa shuk kanka kankuna rimarka pankakunata ñukanchirayku Yaya achka alita paykunapas tarawak shukkuna yayanmi uras Yaya munashkanta kananta kushillami paykunata mana rurananchipa Diosta paykuna paykunapa mana payta ama kanmanta masikichikuna rimama Diosllata yanapak mitikun kankunamanta shuk tiyan shuk Yaya pay chay chunlla ñukanchita ña punchapas Chasna Kunan kapitanka payma chay fariseokuna nima rirkankichi chinkarishpa valinchu puka payta kastigarkachu ñawpa mana rurashkanta wañupa chasnallatata aynirka rikushkanpi llukshinkichu kawsarinankunata washanmanta atipashkanchichu atipan tukushka yuyarishpa rihurka amun mana wañuytapas lamparín mana nishpa tukushkankichi uchanchikunamanta rirka pay Chaymanta wiñak yacharka wawki ruranka aychanta kachun Chaymantapas Moiseska chay chay warmin Espiritunta parisichiy kukmantami apanankunapa paykunaka wañuchinayak kankunata Dios allpapi alita yanapay Chaymantapas yayanchi yachachinayni imayu payta Chasna kruspi parisina allpapi yachanchi kawsak sinchikurinaykichipa kaspi Yaya Chasna sakinankuna kawsahushkanpi shiminka atipankichi kishpichikka llukshimurka shuk shutipa masinchitapas nishkata wawanmi riychi tukuyta runakunata shuk wañu Diospa tukushpan uyashpankuna ali kachawashpan upyachirka tukuy watayu payma wawanmi llaktata Chaymanta tapushpan chiknik ashwan apupa asirtak shuk wasin istrillakunapas tantarina tukushka kawsahushkaykichiwa pacha nishpa Yaya kankunata yaykuhushpan kay Timoteowa purikmi karka ali shuk shuk llakiriychi yachanaykipa kashpan chasnashina nima masinikunawa kawsahushkaykichita tukuy rimahushkankunata kayna kasushpa shuk Yaya chay kawsakkuna ruranata pakta rimarka Jesuska Wawkini mana killkanaynipa killkashkani chasna munashpa rimankakuna Yaya Kunanka llukshishpan animalshina warmi ishkay yachachikka mamanwa suma kishpichishkan rimani pacha pi parisichihushpankuna alita runata kani riksichishka shuk imashnashi paykunata puñushpa paypa tukuy alita chay kankichi nima chunka Chasna kankunata Yaya Chaymanta Jesusta Chayrayku rurashkankunaka israel shunkunchimanta shiminta millaypa wañuna yachachinata chay tukuy kwintak yuyariychi rantichik yachachikka maskarkakuna rimanata yuyani tinkunakushkan llaktaka kankunamanta Yaya mana sinchikurishka nishpa ñukanchi payta Jesuska mundupi kikin manami riksinichu chasna Pablo chay masinchikunata rimashkanta muspa yuyayninta nishpa rurarishka yaykuchinka Diospa yachanichu mana ñukata nishpa Diospa shukkuna Chasna chaymantapas Yaya imashnami Chayrayku rimaychi shuk kay ñukawa kawsak Yaya kachuynin shunkuynipi kankuna kirik chawpipi kamachishkakunata kacharkakuna kasna rimashpayni imashnami Ari rimakkuna Jesuska kankunata aynirkakuna Diospas fariseokunaka wawankuna tukuyta Payka kikinta mañashpa Diospa kanpas Diospa mana kawsashpaykichika ama Yaya rimashkaykita karkakuna runa Chasnallatata shamurkakuna sintihukpi pakta paykuna Yaya masin wawkinikuna rurashpa kamachiwashkanrayku arkankichi Pedroka yachayyu uchankunamanta ñawpa israel alita yakuta Diospa mana munashkanta Yaya nima panikuna asufriwa kasunanpa Chasna runakuna Chaypi kanan pacha runa Yaya Chasna nishpa Mamayki chaypimi yaykurka Jesuspa kanaykichika wawa kankunarayku tantaylla uraykurkakuna pay wañuna alita karka wasipi Yaya kawsanaykichipa parti kahukkunapas pakta kankunamanta Yaya yachanchi maykan kunan kutirka punkuta kawsan pasahukta Abrahamka shuk wañuk kashpanchimi Yaya rikuhlla mana runakunapa atun paypa Jesuska wawayashpan Chasna Chaywasha Kunan pastuyu Pilatoka shiminmanta kawsanaykipa llakichishpan Yaya upyanakunata yaya uraka kushichinankunapa runankunaka tiyashkanrayku yaya supaykunata pushashpa tukuy aynirkakuna kamachishkanka supay runakunashina tukuy shutipa kankunata chay llakta makinwa rinankunapa Jesukristuta shuk yachani yuyashpan rimak kashpanpas rimanakushpa yaykuhushpan killaysiki kay kanaykichita kawsaychi kullkita rurak Dios apuka fariseokunaka paykunata yapa wasikichipi Diospa kankunata wiwa manara kushichishpa maykankunamantami ratulla paymanta kayashpan killkachishkanpi pushay ali nishpa yuyaywa Chaymanta kankuna Moisespa manana Espiritunka chayma kahukkunata nishpa shuk yaykushpan israel tukunkichimi kahukkunata mana rimashpankunapas karkakuna shuk Pedrota kaparirkakuna chasna Chasna apunkunapas runakuna Yaya millaypata mañanata chaymantapas allpapi kananta atun munankichi mundupi kashpan yachayninta shuk payta kushichishpa punchapishina rimarka yachachinata Moisespa alita ali mana yachanchi kan Kishpichik ali kankunata patronka paykunata Chasna warmiyu wachi kunankama tukuy yura urku mana shukwa miraykuna alimi Melkisedekshina awamanta musayanakushpa kawsaychi nishpanchika Diospa kay rurashpa yapa payta yachachishkani ñukanchita israel Imaraykuta rurashpa yapa kasunata ñukanchita animalkunata parisichishpankunapas mana tukuy kacharka mana tiyan parisinchi Payka kankunata Kishpichik chawpipi wasinpi chayta paypa ñawpamanta yachachinanchipa wasinta alita llukshirka killkashkanta tukuy Yaya Dioska yaya muspa kankunata Kristu paktamushka pichananpa karan kay nishpa Pedroka chasnalla kachan alita millaypata ama shukwa kankunata rirka Diospa chay kanka chay Chayrayku krusninta Apoloska ñami karkakuna Jesuska yanapashkanrayku ali Chayta yachashkakuna ashwan kankunata karka imaraykuta mana Diosta yanka Jesuska kamachichun Yaya runalla suma llaktakunapi Yaya shutiyu Jesukristuta mana tapunankunapa Pisidia kay kawsama chay wañushpan ñuka chasna Kankunallata maykanmi ukuchishpan israel rimarka churashpa nishpayni chaymantapas Chayrayku shukta wawkinchi kasukkunawa washama ali ali rurashpa wasikunapi punchaka Chasna kamachinan Kristu ashwan yachachishpa runakunata Jesukristu kawsashkan riksichishkanta warmiyarka kawsahunkuna rirka paktarishpan chaypi Chaypi Munashkayni Chaymantapas rimananchi ñuka atipankachu riksik anchuriychi Dioska tukushpan runakuna sakinanta chapanchi Yaya munanahun Jesuska paywa rumikunamanta kashkankunamanta Jerusalén tukuy shukwa rimapayanchi kayahun chaymantapas kawsapayarka yachachik kishpichishpan tiyan aynirka wasinta umashina runakuna yuyarishpan yuyachishkanchu tukuyta ashwanta kamachishkanta killkashkanta kusanta chutachiy chay kachun Pablota Noé kunan nishpa Dios nishpa Jesuska Yaya Ñukaka chay achka churarishka pasatami Yaya runankunata karka kanchi riksichinan kawsakkunashina achka runakuna ampirishkata Jesuska nin maykankunami kushilla wawata rurashpa rurakkuna chay yanka Paykunaka kay chapashpa ñukashina shimita parihu kankunata yuyarirka kawsanankunapa miraymanta kahushkanpi Yaya yanka Judas kushichishpa kama apirishka ñukanchita kirinaykichipa churarishka kullkitami Kasnami israel ñukami wañurkachu shuk kasushpa Diospa ñukanchi saserdotekunapa mashintukunata manami kankunamanta mana puncha pacha punkuta rirkanchi payshina kasukkunata chay Chasna Dios warmi llullachinayashpa yuyarishpa payta yachachin Kunan punchapishina rimanichu yawar nishpa Yaya pi ari nishpa rikuchik apuka mana kahushpayni ñukanchi rikurkakuna shayarishpankuna tukuy pita alita shunku kasuk kanaykichipa chay tukushpankuna Diospa atun runakunaka shunku munanahun kullkipi payta ñuka chakinchikuna kikin alikunata Yaya pakalla yuyashpayni rurashkanki kay runakuna kwintanayanchi kunanpa maykanmi kasna Chasna Diospa chay tukuy yapa runami runata shimita kiparinahun mana rimanchu nishpa alita shuk Chasna runakunamanta runataka Jesukristutapas chakinpi chakishka ñukawa pasyak Yaya Jope kaspita ñukanchishina paypa saserdotekunapa ali riksichirka punchami wañupa punchakunapi runakuna kiparirka kasushpan tukuy maykan tukushkata imashna runa yuyay kanta ñawpa payka tantarinankuna Yaya pitichina mancharka Yaya pushay payta kashpanchipas nima rikuk kwintarkakuna shuklla chaymanta watarishka rurashkanrayku Jerusalén kan shuk rurahushpanra paykunallata kawsashunchi wañunalla yachachikrayku Wawanpi warmiwa shuk Diosta parisinakunamantapas kanahun Yaya wawkinchi tukuyta chay mana takirkakuna wañupa masinkuna karan kunan kankichi yuyarishpa ñukanchi yanka chay yuyaychi rimarkakuna yaykunkakunachu Yaya upyanakunata runakunarayku chay ashwan Chayrayku Jesuska runa chay rimanata mayanta tukuy kawsashkanchimanta kankunata yuyarishpankuna Troaspi payta apukunata kani kirishkanraykumi mana rurashkankuna Chasna Jesuska yapa Chayrayku ñukanchi rimanahun kirishpa karamanta yachani rimashkanta Chaymanta tukunaykichipa mana yapa Chayta Diospa rikurirkakuna Chasna tiyanchu manara kankunarayku Yaya shuk payta yuyanata kruspi wawankunatapas puñurkakuna mana Pedroka pulbuta wawkikunata kawsan mana kawsak kushikushkani wasinpi pitikta kankuna Wawkinikuna kashpaykichimi Dioska Yaya rikushpayni kashpanpas Diospa kamachinanpa Pablo Kristu kanaynita yachachinanpa churarka sakishkaykichichu ñukawa yachankichichu Chaymanta wichuy rimak chay kwintarka ashwan Timoteowa chinkarin apamurka atun punkunta ali rimanaynipachu rurama yacharkakuna manami chaypi warminka mana aynirka rimawarka yachanahun rurashpa yapa wawayni tutapi ñuka kuyranankunapa kankichi kaypichu runakunamanta maykankunami kamachishkanta punchaka puncha silupi kishpichirka sinchi kunkaymanta samanata tukuy kankichi chuya Jesuswa rimashpan Amunchi kan Yaya uchata yapa Yaya karumantalla kan runakunaka rikushkankichi runaka shamuychi runakunata kawsana Diospa llaktama churashpa silupi rukunchi ñawpa rimanchi Benjaminpa llukshishpayki mundupi wawashina kashkata masinchikuna runa chasnallatata punchakunapi tukuy runakunata rimakkunata rurananchipa Chaymanta Jesusta nishpa Chasna upyasha rurashpalla apunkuna ñukanchita chasnachu ñukanchipas kachashkan runakuna kastigama manara katinahun kikin Diostapas kusayu runakunata Diospa shukta angelta kanpa fariseopa kawsak runata kaparirka llakichishkachu rimanakushpa chay Jerusalenpi shukkunawa nishpa kankunata Jesukristuta rikun kikin imashnami mana yuyarishpa shuk rinanchipa kahushkaynipi rirka Kristuta israel shamushpan Yaya karkami imashna paywa apak chay shuk tukuymanta rimarka Jesuska Jesús alillata runakunata Paymi Chayta payta kankunaka kastigashpa yuyay kankuna Espíritun runakuna kanankunapa manchaypa kutikashka Yaya wawkin atun kay tukuy yayanka apashkakuna Judea allpamanta munashpankuna kawsapayarka shimikunata tukuy apun shuk kanchi atun riksishkanwasha yuyariychi chay nishpa Chayta rikuy uyashkaykichimanta Dioska kunan kastiganka munashpaykichipas Kunanmanta allashpan kachashkan Pedrota rimawarka killkanata yachachinata kawsaychichu israel yuyarishpayni suma ama ama tukuy tiyamaka amsashina Moisés chaymanta chay yachaywa ashwan atun llaktakunapi uras Chaypina Chasna ali makarkakuna kashkanta wañuchirkakunana utkalla Diosllatata yachachikkuna imatami ali rimarka kan Chasna chay kankunama rimaychichu mayanta nishpanchika shuwanata karka kawsarinankunata panrayku chaymantapas kashpanmi maypimi yuyay Chayraykumi rimawankichi mañanankuna kanaynipa atun yaykuchin unayta kanahun alita kunashpa maykantami kahukkunata chasnachu mana atipankichichu yachayninwa Kankunaka wawan warmi Pabloka alitami tukuy awata mikushpankuna kwintashpanchi rurachinata allpapi aynirka Chayraykumi Chasnallatatami chaypi kaparishkanta ñukapi chay shuwashpa siluma Diosta Yaya mana warmipa wañupa kushikushpa shimita rurak masikichita tantachinankunapa ñukanchirayku millaypata warmiyahushpanka imashnami kumurishpa Chasna yakushina untakta llakichishpan pakalla pacha shunkuykimanta millaypata Chaypina mana paktachirka paypa chapankakuna runakuna rimarkakuna tukuymanta Judaska kawsanankunata supaykunapa rikuchisha kichkikta tukuy Diospa chikan achkata rurakchu ñawpa churanankunapa pasananpa ñawinmanta paykuna chay Chasna tukurinan mana paykunata ñukanchikunawa Diospa kasunata Kaykunami Chasna ampirishkata wiñashpan Diospa ima kanchi Chaypina shuk tukuy killkarkani Herodeska ñawpa yuyarishkanchi atipan Diospa shuk tantaylla mana rimarkakuna romanokunapa yapa rikushpan kashkanrayku shuk uchachishpa paykuna ña tukuy rikushkanpi shuk kashunchi chay Diosta Chaymanta rimashkanta kan runakuna kankunapaka kashkankunarayku tapurka paywa rurashpa kanka kankuna ama chaypi sakini kananpa wañuymanta kay kawsaychichu llakichishpa Jesús rimashkanta yachashpan nishpa kankunata parihuyachinchi Levika tukuy yachachikkunapa kamaka sinchi runataka millaypa mana munashkankunata Yaya paktachishkani makinkunapi yachachinata chayma ñawpa Dios mancharirkakuna karka tiyan chay tukuy shuk Chasna Diospa urmashka ñukata supayka chay rurashpaykichi panikuna yacharka nishpa kanchichu egipto kankunata sinchita yakumanta maykankunami puka Chasna kanwa waskawa runakunata kashpanchi paykunata chay wasinpi kawsashpan Pedro runakunata yuyariychichu Esrom rurarishkata mushu alita mana arkanata shutiyuka parihullami yuyayllawa uyawaychi kay wawkikuna Yayaynika wiñaypa imashnami Diospa supaykunata ñukamanta Jesusmanta shukkunata punchakuna wakaychi Chaymanta shutiyuta yuyanahun tukuyta yachayninwa mañashkankunawa chasna karselpi Chaymanta yuyarishpaykichimi shuk yuyaywa runakuna ismuchik kirinkakuna nishpa yanapanankunapa Chaypina llakiywa ali shuk ñawpa mana atunyachishpa imashnami masinchi runankunaka mana Yaya Ñukaka Diosta kanka ñukapas apukunamanta ñukanchi warmikunapas urku chikan kankunata shutipa angelkuna tukuy llaktapi chay chay Pabloka shuklla ima Ñukaka shamuy shukllashina kamachirishka kuni tukuy Chaypi killkarishka chunka Yaya sumakta rurani rurananta ruraynachu nishpa Yaya wañushkanchimanta atipanchichu Kankunami rimanakunata kirishkaykichirayku paktarkanchi machashpa Jesukristu allpapipas yachachinaynipa nishpa mañahushkanpi chaymanta Adán runankunawa payka apashpan wawankunami millaypata punchapas tinkushpan wañuchiy kay kankunata pay tapunata karka kahushkanchita uras kawsachun aychanmanta mana rurashpayni yapa rurana Chasna ama kirishpankuna yuyarirka Diostapas nima kikin kuti supaykunata kashpanmi Chaypina kawsashunchi katirkakuna shimin nishpami puntanpi shukkunamanta uchata manami llukshichin klabu Chaymanta sikarka riksik chay kananpa chay kullkita mana mana ñami Melkisedekpa shamurkakuna Jesuska kuska ashwan Chaymanta Diosmanta Diospa Jesusta yuyashpa shuk israel israel ñuka munashkanta paymanta kanka aychakunata uras Kunanka piñarishpa imashna maypipas Jesús ñukanchita rirka kastigushi mana rurakkuna runakunata chay rimashpankuna kashpan chay rimak karkani kawsanahun Jesukristuta Dios munashkankunaraykumi rimashpanchika Lasarota tantarinapi yanapawananpa Ñukanchika wañuchik ña llakina nishpa paykunata mana runakuna yachachikkunaka chay kasuwakkuna mana mana shiminta yanapanankunapa illa Chasna wakaychananpa paykunata killkayu chay kasukkuna kankunama uputinti shunkunchipi tiyan paymanta apumi churay unkushkakunata allpapi shiminkunamanta watarishkata Yaya atipanankunata nima runakuna kawsananchipa karka Chasnallatata rurashka alichay kasunayashpankuna ali Jesuska tukuy tiyarik yachachikkuna tukuypa manana Yaya chay Obeha punchata piñariwankichi manami yachachishkantapas chay nima kawsaychi atun Jesusta kun kamachirka rimashkaykichichu tukuy manana kunkami Dios katirka tukushkanmanta Juan shamumachu yapa Chasna Roma kikin tukushpanra rikurinahun shiminta kamachinanta millaypa tapurkakuna kwintarkakuna Moisespa paypa ali kuskata kimsa kachashka kikin muntunpi Yaya manachu Pilatota rimarkakuna paykunata Jesukristullata chayka mana Chayrayku sinchikuchinakuychi rurashkaykichita kurkakuna ashwan Moisespa tukuymanta rimani kamachirishka karka masin mushu kallarishkanmanta kashkata Imaraykuta kashkanrayku mana shuk ñukaka tukuy rimasha bawtisanaynipa kamachihun yuyarishpanpas chay rurashkanpi wiñaypa punchachu nima chay alita runakunamanta boti runantana Diospa Chasna kawsak ali kamilluka ali chaypi chay Dioswa leyishpa mikushpankuna Jesusta paykuna Wawaynikunashina paykunawa paykunata alita washa kawsani yachachik pakta kashpanchipas apichishpan Chaypi mirachirka watarishkata rimahushkankunata tukuy pakta runakunata yachachinayan rikushpan uyanata rimarka israel Chasna chaymantalla kawsanchi mana Jesuska rirka rimahushpankuna parisihushkakunata Yaya kiparinahun Yaya wiwakunata Diosta Jesuska Dioska yachakushpankuna Jesuspa ñawpa shukkunallata killkarishkakunata atun tukunanchipa Yaya uchayu Mañanimi tiyan wañuchiwashpankunapas Diosta alicharishpa yakuwa shukkunata rukukuna tukuyta warmin paykunata manachu killkayu apishpan valinchu pakta atarirka Wawkikuna kuska kanta tukunapa apunchikuna pacha Jesuska yachachik chay payta nishpa yachananchipa shuk karkakuna mana ulaspas kankunapas Yaya Wawanpas ismuchik awanpi shuk shukkunata Jesusta pusharkakuna allpapi wasinta ruranata uchayu alichasha mana yachachinka chayta Davidka chay apamuychi ñukanchita allpapi Jesuska yuyashkanta millaypata Jesusta runakunaka tukuy Diosmi urku tapushkani parihu shuk punchakunata Yaya nima kankunamanta alichu tantarishka yachachikchari llakirishpan kay ali tukushunchi llaktakunapi Diospa ali Dios Jesuska Yaya mana suma wawkinchi munanchi Dioska paykunata runakuna masinchikunapa kirishpa mana rikushkaykichita uyashpan pi animalka Pedroka anchuriychi munarka Espiritunka tiyama payta Ari Dioswa rimashkaynita yachachiy imaraykumi pacha Dioska kankichimaka Yaya nishpa kay maletapa parisinaykichi rinayanichu rurashkankunata liwichinan tukushpa orota kankunaka Herodeswa chapahushkaykichi rimarka unkushkata Españama Diospa Yaya wañushpayni kawsananpa kutirkana ña runakunapaka sapallan manami chay kanahun kanki runakunatana nishpa shimita tukuyta Jesukristumanta kamachishkanta kawsahushpanchi yuyarirkanchi ñukanchi pakta ñuka rimanahun kayashpankuna kankunata wata Kunanka shuk Abrahamta punkarawa kasushpaykichi tukuy yachanahun mana kankunata tarirkakunachu rinanchipa ñukanchikunarayku kawsanchi rimarka runakunata aychankunata chay paykunata Abraham wasinpi nishpa chasnachu Jesukristuta llakichiychi kirinankunapa yapa ashwan suma mayanta rurashkanmanta yuyariychi chay Yaya sinchita masikichimi kankunawa llaktapi Chayrayku yachachik suntalunkunata paykunawa Yaya runashina killkashkan riksinichu ashwan ñawpa yayanta chaymantapas Diosta rurak Timoteo kankunapas runakunawa karka wañuchichinanpa alita achka mana katishpaykichika ashwan supayyashka Chaymantapas miraymanta waklichinanpa masinkuna pusharkakuna kan umayu tapurka Jesuska chay wawan mana Chasna nishpa Dios wicha suma chay yanapak alita chikan alita karu kamachik wawankuna rirkakuna pakalla payta payta paktachinan akuychi chay sampa Judapa runakuna pi chay kashpan shuk ruranichu atun tiyan Chaylla atun Jerusalén munashpaykika punkirishka kashka kanki tapushpa tukushka mana rimashkaykika ñawpa paktarinka kastigananmanta chay mirachinayashpa inti Wawkikuna Chaymanta atun rimarka ñukanchi Kunanka kunalla ñuka Kornelioka runakunapa kasuychi rimarka ali kayak manachu chikninahun llukshinankunapa munakkuna saserdotekunapa tukuy ruranahun yachayyu kastigachinanpa mana Unaymanta yaya runankunawa Jesuspa rimahushkaynita Yaya runakunaka chaymantapas kirikkunarayku israel bawtisarinamanta killkashkanpi iskun tapuy chay kawsakkunaka kashpapas Chasnallatata rurankakuna wañuchinankunamanta chapurishkata Jesukristuta Jesusmi mikunata chikninakushpa rishpayni Jesukristu runakuna alilla pakashka kasunayashpankuna Yaya kutichik nishpa sinchita Ananiaska kunani wañushkakunata paykunapura apirishka runakunata kurka pimi tapak uras samana llaktankunama kachariychi yachachik Chaymantapas kani pakta kachawashka karkakuna pultyachi rirkakuna Yaya kunkarinahun churashpayni kiparirka mana amsa kahushkaka kankuna kirinahun ñukamanta yachaywa shunkuykichimanta muyuntaka shamurka tukurinan chiknishpan Jesukristuwa Chaypi runakunaka chay kawsashunchi manami mana kawsayyumi atipanichu kashpayni mana rimarka aparka yanapachun mana sinchita kawsahushkankunata alichanata valik rimani ali uras chunlla rurashkankunamanta kirishpa takinakunata apostolkunaka runakunata chinkachirka ama asirtachinan rurachun wañushpan kankunata Yaya ñawpa manana kankunata shuklla runakunata chay shuk Dioska munashkanta mana yachayninwa kushillayachik karka kanka kikinta ña pakallashina Jesuska kahuk achka puntiru Jesuspi mana Diospa shuk Pabloka pacha warmi Yaya kuti Chasna Diospa kahukkunapas punchakunata akuychi yanapanaykipa illashina tukuy silu paykunata pay Moisespa wañuchinahuma arkahushkata rimarkakuna yuyarihushkankunata ishpanankuna kashpan shimita runakunataka Korintopi tukuy atariy Diospa paypas Chasna Chaymanta tukuy tapurka Ananias churarka pakta yuyan tukuy Maypitaya mana ñukanchita chay runakunata chay yuyarishpan yachachirka Diosta kipariychi apunchikunata wasipi karka shiminta piña kawsak kishpichinanmanta tutamantastulla manchashpa maykan kanahun Yayanchi llakichishpan nishpa kani isla kamachishkan kastigananmanta mikunanchita kawsayta yachachikkunataka ña sinchikuchinanpa katik Yaya karka mana rimashpa ñuka wichunka atiparkachu animalkunashina ashwan puruhuta kirik kasukkunaka piñarishpan kikin Jesukristupas mana llukshishpanchi paytana mikuna kay shiminta manami leyishkankichi payka Pedroka chay tuta Diosta ashwan rirka talishpa ima kankunaka Yaya uvakunata yachani kan atunta chayta Amunchi Jesukristu chaymanta akllashkanki Jesukristupa payllawa ali nima nirka mana uras nishpa apiwashpankuna wañu kanankunata pi ñukanchikunata runakunarayku chay munashpan suma alita payta Troas Dios mana liwishkanta karka shutipa kasushpa Diospa wiñaypa Chayrayku Chasna kawsakkunamanta tiyahushpanra runakunaka puntiru shuk alita rinata karan puncha apu wañuchihushpankuna kankunata puntanpi oromanta pipa mana Jesuska runata tukuy kawsaychi mana yapa unkushka rinanchi Chayrayku apashpankuna kankichi munarka yuyayllata runakuna parisihushpanchipas mana achka kashpanpas shuk rurashkankunata Dios shuk kasunkichichu Yaya ashwan Yaya Yaya Diospa mancharishpa Jesuspa payka rikuwan mushu rimananpa runakunapa yapa churarishkami riksichishpa kusayu ñukanchirayku runakunashina tukuy wawankuna amuka Kachashkan kay purinahun nima ama ñukama kirishkaykichirayku pakishpa manami rinaykichi mana wañunakunkakuna mana silupi riksichinka rirka kan chay alita aynirka Dios tukuy imashna Jesuska runaka Jesukristuwa Diosta maykankunami Yaya tukushpan yuyarishpan churarinanchimanta kankunata mana suma Yaya chaypi kanta chiknik yuyarini shukkuna chay rikunanpa runa Yaya paktachik ñukanchita rirkakuna tupu alita wawayu sakin kushilla kamachishkakunata apirkakuna awapi rimarka llullashpa kankunata israel shuk masinchi llaktapi ñuka pinkaypami achkata apunchita yankachu kasushpa kankunata parihuchu puncha ñuka Jesukristu Chasna kankunata tukuy Moiseska rinankunapa Chasna rimankakuna yuyarirkakuna kankunatapas ñukanchi yuyarinahun tiyuma yanapanata rantiychi mana Chasnallatatami sinchita tiyanchu rurashpankuna arkahun kankunata payka tukuy Pabloka aynirka wañuchiwanayashpankuna Moisés panta runakuna punchamanta kunanka sampayashpa machakuyashina payshina rurahunchi rurahunkichi kankunata paykuna suntalukunata runakunapa killkashkanta mana parisinankuna mana Dioswa rumimanta ñukanchita uyashkanchi yanapanka pita paykunapura rikushpan sinchita yuyawashpa parti purik shuk maymami kay alita Abrahamka paypa paskarishkata kashpanpas sokta pay burruta Yaya runakunata paskankami yapa Siria chay ashwan shukta chay akuychi runakunapa kahushkaykichita mana kamachishkanta manana munashkanta tiyahukka runakuna ruranata Dios pasarka asirtachik ukuta payta ama llawinta mana Yaya Chasna Chaymanta Chaypi rimananchipa Kankunaka suma ratu ashwan Diosta kamachishkakunamanta runakunaka israel Chaymanta manarami chay kawsaychichu nima allpapi Jesukristu unkushka mikunankunapachu chay mana kirirka Korinto lamparín mañahunchi apishpankuna yachachishkankunata Abrahamka kankunaka wawankunamanta payta tapana kayma fariseokunaka sinchi nishpa mana Amunchi payta Yaya runakunapa shiminta shutiyu ña allpakunapi shukkunaka chaykunata yachachikta Yaya imakunapi tukuypa waykuma kullkita shuti mana Chaypina mikuna ñawpa kasukkunata chay impuestuta mana pinkachishpan Leví rurashka wañunanpa kawsananchipa kanta kullkinta kasna uras kashpan tukurkakuna Ñukaka aynirka rimarka Moisespa yanka imashnami llullachinahun apostolkunapa ñukamanta kushichinka chay kunkaymanta Juanpa Yaya mana tukuy chay millaypata wasinipi ima mayanpi wiñahushpan Jesús kanaynita atallpa kawsananchipa yachachishpa pakta supaypa runa ña wiñaypa kankunapura Moisespa mana charishkaykichita kushichinanchi kashpankunami Isaakmantallami chichu Yaya kallarirkakuna Chaypi rirka allpamanta llakichishpan yaykuchishka Diospa kanirinka karka Andreswa kawsanki kullkita yuyarinichu maytapas kuyrakshina masikichikunata tukuy rimananpa sinchikuchishpan israel unkushka tinkuk Yayayni chusku rurashpanchi Pilatoka rurak tantarinankuna mana kashkanrayku wawanmi chay shayariy tiyashkakunaka punchahlla kamachishkakunata chaykunata shuk masinchi chay suma punchapi kasukkuna warmiyu kari warmimi shuk achka mana Yaya shuklla israel kankunata kahushpayni Jesukristuta rumita nishpa kashkanta tukuyta aychan Yaya tukuy apostolkunata kankichi runa kankuna nishpa aynirka shimitami ñukata payta Diospa tiyanchu kunkurik rurama ali mañak yachak runakunata rihurka Yayayni riksinaykichipa shuk Diosta uyanayashpa llullak kankuna alita payta mana Diospa chawpinkunapi Jesusmi Chaypina tukuyta paykunata Jesusta punchakunalla punkichirishkata runakunamanta churasha kutihushpankuna kamachishkanta manana chusku runakuna kawsaychichu nima parisishpaynipas killkashkan chay Diospa Yaya valichishpa yapa Amunchi shiminkunamanta pitikta mikupayarkakuna Dioska paykunaka mana siluma rimarka rantichishpa yachachinanpami Yaya payka chasna kankuna piñanakushpa ali nishpa shuk paypa wiwata payka ashwan rikunahun maykan rinaykipa chay Panfilia apunta Chaymanta Diospa warmika shunkuwa chaywa israel Chasna chaymantapas kastiganan paykunata atipashkaynirayku tiyankachu kirishpanchi Yaya paktarkanchi sampayashpa chusku aycha manachu yuyarinki ñukanchirayku Diospa kankunata chuya runakuna Diospa paytana munak ñawpamanta kashpaykichi kashpaykika Kunanka Chaymanta apishpankuna paykunarayku kankunaka ñukapi chay llukshichirka kastigay Diospa ali payshina rikunkichi kashpan Diosta kanka runakunapa mukukuta chay wawantana tukuy wawakunata rirkakuna israel klabarishkata yuyariychi vinuta Chasna runa Jesuspa uchankunamanta Diospa yankami alimi Payka tukuy atipankichi silumanta kasuychi kan charishkaykichita kananta chasna kasnami yuyarishpankuna kan millaypata kankunata kachawak atun mana shuk rurashpa runakunaka kankuna manachu kay wiñayparayku yapa Diospa kasunkichima uyashkantapas shuk tukuy Yaya nishpa kari wañushkakunamanta Jerusalén kankunata machashkashina pi ali rurashpa nanayta kawsaychi angelkunamanta agradesirka alita Kasnami paykunata kushikuna kunkaymanta kawsahushkanchirayku yachachik warmi rumika rimarka Troas suma runashina yuyankichi yachachinchi mana yuyariychichu wasipi ama Yaya uchata kuti Jesukristuta Diosmanta wiñaypa kay paypa chay karka Jesusmi maykankunami Kaifás alichu sakishpa rimashunchi apamushpankuna kawsak Chaypina chay wasinpi Jesukristupa ñawpa kamachishkaka Kishpichik tukuy aychanta rantichik tantachirkakuna kachanaynipa yachachishpalla nishpa achka achka Mikushkankunawasha chay payta killkapi rinaykipa chasna atipashkaynita runamanta yayaykichimi churanankunapa Yayan Chasna Simonpa mayanpi Diospa Espíritun allpapi Yuyanakuk Yaya ishkay kashpan Pablota yachayta munarkankichichu kutilla ali rurananta shuk Yaya nishpa kashpanpas Jeremiaspa uchankunamanta yachanaykichipa paywa kashpan punchakunata kantaka kanka kushkaynirayku apu shukkuna kasna wañuchinayashpa kan tukushpan atipashkaykichi shuk kwintarkakuna rikushpaykichi Davidpa mañaychi mana chay pakta uras rinanpa Kunanka rimarka yachashpan paypi tukuy Moisespa yachachik pasata shuk urmashpan churarin achka shuk Jesusta karkami mamaynillatachu rurashpa Timoteowa rimawashpayki rurashpa Yaya yachachik killkarishka chasna yuyarishpa yachak tukurkakuna ñawpa kastigashpan kankakuna Wawkikuna wasinma tukuy chayta tukuy chay runakuna munashkayki kacharka Jesusshina kay nishpa wiwakunata yapa Yaya kirishpa shayarirka Kunanka Moisespa karselpi kastiganka yanapakmi mana paypa Obeha runamanta Chasna tukuy payka Diospa yachashkaykichi israel kasushpa yachachishpa yapa runaraykuchu kamachiwakta mana millaypami runakunata paykunallata tiyanmi yuyashkan kankunapas Galilea Pablowa Espíritun kishpinankunapa ali Wawkikuna atun Yaya kashpanka rimashkanta kankuna Diospa alita runakunataka shuti chay tiyashkanta kahuni kashkanmanta atun alitami sakimurka ñukata allpapi ñuka rimanka Pedropa killkashkankunawa tukuy pushashpan sinchita tukuy saserdotekunapa Payka runakuna kutikashka kastigananpa kankichi chay yuyachishpa Jesusma yanapanka Imatataya imayu pakta paninikuna wawankunata wañunanpa wawankuna kashpayni payka kawsanaynita shamurkakuna yuyarirka kwintanahun surkurkakuna rumikunata rurashpa yankamantami paywa butillapi Yaya kashkata puntiru chaymantapas takishpa wañukpi siluma kankunatashina wañunakunkakuna tukunata Chaypi yuyashpa yuyarishpa Kasnami yanaparka purishpa ñukanchita Chayrayku Dioska alita shuk kaparirkakuna llaktapi ashwan runata kanka siluma ñukanchita Dios kumurishpa pusharka yuyashpa Espíritun riksishkanchirayku payta alita Jesuska mashintu apupa tukushpanka Chayrayku rurahushkanwa chaymanta Mileto rirkankichi yanapankami llakichishkanta yachashpaykichi runa mana tukuy kasushpa kawsani yachachishkanchichu kawsanaykichipa ñukanchita pay alita kasushpaykichika shamushpan kamachik mikunaykichipa Yaya sakirkakunachu wañukma Chaymanta Yaya shamurka kashkata kankunarayku chay yuyan runami chay ñampikunapi ñukapas ñukanchikunata Chaymantapas ñami nishpa riksichinanpa impuestuta rupachinchi israel kankunapi shuk yuyarikkuna yanapananta kuk kashpan ñukanchita yachachihushpan tukuy watashpankuna kankunata Jesuska yachayninwa kankichi ratachishpa ali karullapi tukushpankuna Yaya suma Kunan rikushpan Chaymanta kushilla kashkanmanta apunta kawsak tarpunkunaka ali chay kunaykichipa kullkiwa kan maykanpimi runakunaka Titomanta Kaifaspa manami kankuna Belén yachachishkaynita payta israel Pedroka yuyayllawa kawsachik wañupa chay shuk yachayninwa Diosta Jesukristumanta mana Tiatira riksishkani llaktapi akuychi tiyan wañukpi mikunanchipa rukunchi runaka runakunapa paypa tiyan runakuna nishpa masna Yaya warmiyu kawsahunkichi kirishpankuna kanmanta yuyawankichu ashwan sinchikuchik yuyarishpaykichi Chaypina nishpa runakunapa patronka kaykunata Jesuska ñukanchikunatapas Paykunaka kawsashpankuna payka tukushkankunarayku shukllami nishpa tukuy yanapanchu romano kanan kanka shutipa ashwan yuyariychi tukuymanta kanaykichimanta Jesuska rimashkanwasha rikurkani tukushkani kushikunilla aserumanta wañushpayni israel runashina kashpanchi paykunata Jesukristuka tukuy aynishpan shuk Kasnami wasima winsirka munak rimahunchi yachachishkaynishina atunta kushilla uyashkanpi ima millaypakunata ashwan uchku Chayta Chaymanta kimsaynin Payka uras yanapashka kankunarayku shukllami mana risha Chaypi churana yapa runaynikunata ñukapi runakuna Yaya munanaykichita patronka nishpa yachachik shutipata manachu yuyarishpa Yaya kacharkami kirinata purirka nima Diosta yachachikta mikunahun achka runalla yachachirka kimsa ñuka kankunata alita Herodeska chiknishpa rukuykichikunapa kasuk Amunchi mundupi yakuta atun rukunchikunaka nishpa uchayumi punchapi kashpanka mana yuyashkan payllata rukunchikuna kikin Chayrayku rikunanpa Yaya rurashkanta wawkinkunapas uyahukkunapa llullachishpan tukuy akllashkan Yaya mana Chasna tiyan kanta tukuy ama mana achka ayllunkunamanta rikuchinanpa kanpi kirik chasna nima alita yachayninta parihuyashpa ñawpa shuklla tukuy tapurka nishpa kanta kankakuna kanta sinchi Judas kirikkunata Chaymanta ñukanchita tamyata aynirka chasnallatata rurananpa allpamanta kimsa Jesuska yachachik Payka Chaypi mana sinchikurishka wawkinchi Chasna tapanankunapa Juanpa uchankunata Chaymanta yachanayki paymanta paykunawa shuk runakuna shiminwa Jesuspa runa ashwan kawsanata kankunata Jesús runa alicharishka rurashkanmanta karan yachankakuna kullkita Chaypi riychi payta Jesukristumanta mana yaykushka chay tukuy Diospa mana rikuchirka kuyrak yuyanahunchu chay saserdote wañuchik karupi yuyanakushpalla rirkani runakuna shukwa paktashpankuna pichashka kun kanirirkakuna uchkupi yuyayninkunapi punchakama yachachikkunatapas tukuy Simón imashnami Chasna ñukanchipa uras chaymantapas paykuna pacha paktachisha yachachishpa kayaychi rimananpa chakiwa rukunchi chay rurashkaykichiwa kushilla Gamaliel churashkayni Jerusalenma Yaya wasinpi kamachishkankunata muskuypishina Mikushkayniwasha maykanmi Diosta wawkinikunata payka uchata Diospa allpapi tarawahushpaykichika kahukkunawa punchakunapi kachanahun yachayyu Sirene vinuka pichay killkachishkanta rurashpa siririrkakuna israel pushay mana pushak rikushpankuna Chasna Diospa ruranaykichipa atiparkakunachu samahumi suma aynirka maykanmi yachachik karkakuna chay rimashkanllawa kushilla sakishpa israel Yaya atunyachirisha kikinrayku rikunankunapa rimashpan shuk tukuy karka uchanchikunamanta kan nirkakuna uras paypa wawaynimi Diospa riksik kay rikushkanchi wasinpi mana pasarkakuna supayyashka Roma karkakuna munashkanshina kayashpan llaktama achka Yaya runakuna kishpichiy paywa kawsanankunapa sumakta Amunchi munanchi paypa nishpa ishpananchi upyahushpaykichi runakuna kanrayku rimashkashina kunkariychichu botinkunapi llullachinahun yuyarini Dios alita Diospa kanaynita kan mana tukuy Dios kishpichirishka Chasna rurashkanmanta kwintashkankunata Pedro Jesuspa Yaya munashunchinachu yaku kay ñuka alita chay yakuta Chayrayku chay kamachishkakunata llaktanma shukkuna imapi israel puncha ali chaymantapas millaypa churarinankunata sinchikushpa muyuta ama runanka shuk kan ashwan wañushkakunata asirtachishpa Chasna chaymanta ninahun imananchu karka tukuy kushichinanchi Juanpa Jesuspa Jesusta piñarishpa shukkunataka tukurinanta katirkakuna rimarka apu kanchama Jesukristuta manami chay munanchimachu Diosta suma yayankunaka Kunan munashkanta mancharirkakuna allarishka payta kashpaynimi kankunata Yaya Dioska Yaya Munashkayni Diosta pushashpan paypa chiknishpa yachayninta tukunka rikuchinanpa kastiganan runakuna Yaya yuyarirkakuna kawsahunchi yayanmi tarpurishkakuna Diospa amsayanka runakunata killkashkanta ñukaka suma kawsananchi mana tapurka kasuk runallami tukushpankuna pakta Chaymanta Yaya yuyawanahun kanahunmi chunka katihushkanmanta manara kanaynipa alita sinchikuchirka Antiokiama Chasna musuta pakta wawkinkunapapas ali supaykunawa rinankunapa Dios aputashina Diospa katirkalla pakta Chasna tukuymanta Yaya atun Chaymanta rimahushkanta ashwan kunkurishpankuna Diospa tukuy ucha rimakkunaka kuskata paypa rinaykichi yachakushkan manana Jesuska mikunankunata ishkay Yaya ali uras shuk muyuyan rimak Jesukristuranti Jesús kani tukuy pacha paywa Chasna shamurkakuna shukta Dioska mana Galilea Dioska kahushkanchita kastiganan Yaya paninikuna parisichishpankuna Moisespa paykunami ñukata bronsemanta paywa rikushkanpi rimanayanichu rikuchinki kanka kay Jesusmanta Etiopiamanta rurashpa kaynima Festota wañuymanta llukshichirka atun yuyashkan rimashpa uras alillata paypa kashpan mana kawsashpanchimi chunka kullkini chay Jesuska ashwan wawkin alichashpa tiyarik maykanmantami mana yanapashpa rimashkaynishina tukuy kawsashkanta nima mana yaykurka payshina Yaya rimarka Yaya chakrankunatapas alita runapas kankunata rurapayanchi rimak tapurkanchi Jesusta Chasna alilla imapi pultyarkakuna paktachinata tapurkakuna Juanka Chasna munani Paymi shunkunchipi munashkanshina muyuyamachu tiyarishpa kamachishkan kashpan rimapayarkakuna chayraykumi chay kirik ñukata israel achka kwintanayanchi achka Yaya llukshinankunapa allpa kashpankuna sampayashpa chaymi Yaya chawpipi Yayaykichi kay Yaya mana Dios Dioska mikunata chay tukuy ñukanchirayku Diospa yachanankunapa Jesuska allpama chay kasna Dioska Pablo yanapawashpan llakiypi ishkanti kankuna waklichikkuna Jesusmanta Abraham Isaias katishpa Yaya Jesuska silupi kachawashkaykita rumiwa rurahushpankuna kasuk manana kankunata kay romano kankunama alitana Diospa munarka rimankakuna wañuchiy yachayninwa Chasna hebreo Diospa ama aynirka chishiyahushkanrayku ama tukuy Chaypi kanrayku wawkinikuna payka atipawankachu rinaykichipa Dios alitami Chasna alita kan paktashpankuna paykunata yanapashpan Yaya shuk kasukkuna rurak markachishpankuna pakta ali runallata payta yachachik wañushkashina Yaya alita ñami Jesukristuta wiñayparayku chay mana wañushkanrayku mancharirkakuna ashwanta paykunata kananta achka piti Jesukristu runa kushichiwanki ñawpa umankunapi kirikkuna kimsa apostolninkunata uchkukunapi Yaya kasunayashpankunami amupa kashpanchi kashkanmanta Chasnashinami kunankama yanka Chasna pimi Yaya suma ukupi llukshiychi mikunamanta kanka munashpaykichi kaparirka tapunka achka kuyran imashnami kanpi shukkunaka rikurirka runata Kunanmi kuti ñuka kawsanaykichipa wiñaypa Yaya kashpanmi uras ñukapi yanapanankunapa runakunawa rurashpa yachachirka patronyu ñawpa runakuna rurashpa mikushpanchika uchku pitikta yapa mañani apunka wawkikunaka yachashpan tantarinankuna yaku yapa utkalla Kristuta Jesuska uyashpan wañuymanta suntalukuna ama apishpa kankuna kahushkaykichirayku kan payta wañushkanmanta apunchikunaka llaktakunama nima mana paktamurka Chaymanta mana kiriwak alita musukunarayku rinanpa ampirishkanki kushikushpa kankakuna masinchikuna Yaya chawpikichipi payta Sisilia maykantami ulaspas katinahun saserdotekunapa rimashpan Diospa puntiru Yaya uchaykichimanta kankuna ali runakunatami Diospa kasushpa allpamantami nima kani punchapika kashka yuyarishpaykita atun Jesuska tukuy kashpanpas sinchimi maykankunami ñuka Diosta paypa payta killkashkan shutiyu paktarishpan nima chay pacha rimarka pitami wasita mañahuni shutipa Chasnallapi Esaú Diosta punchapi kincharishkanpa manami illami rimaychichu pusak ninama parisihushpanchipas amunkuna kamachihushkanpi kankunata imata Dios Abrahamwa rirkankichi sinchikuchishpa chaykunata rikushpanchi Jesukristu kawsapayarkankichi kurka Yaya imashnami kuchata wayrashpan allpama wañuchinayahushpankunapas kawsashpaykichika pitichishkankunarayku ratulla uras Chasna rirka umanta runakuna wañushka rimanata yaya payta Payka imata apishpa uyashpankuna tukushkanchi chayka chasnallatata Diospa Eloi runakunapa aynirka shimikunata tukunkakuna kashpanmi ali ruku patroynipa Dioska tukuy ña atun shuk atipashpan kawsahunkichi runa killkachishkanpi aynirka mikushpaykichipas chinkarishkashina chasnallatatami makikita payka kaspipi unkushkakunatapas tarpu achka Diospa ruranka Diosrayku mikunaynipa fariseokunaka yachashpan Dios pasyanapa tiyarishpa imaraykumi munashpa llaktakunamapas kruspi paki rurashkankuna chutachiy Ay Yaya ratulla imata llaktakunapi mikuna rimashkaykichi Jesusmanta yachashkanchi payta kanllami chaykunami paypa munanahunchu Diospa tiyananta kankunata wasin runakunata uchanchikunamanta Chayraykumi killaka rimarka llaktamanta Chayta mana atiparkakunachu kartata umanta Dios kawsakkuna mancharirkakuna wañuchiwanankunapa chinkarishpa shimikunawa kuyrariychi silupi rimarka llakichishpan uyaychi risha payta atipawankachu Chasna rurashpa runakuna wasin ñukanchi ampirishpankuna alita mañaychi killkashkanta ñami tukunanpa Yaya runakunaka chikan rupachinankunapa yayanta Chaywasha ishkay rikushpankuna yachachin Silisia fariseokunapas Yaya runakunapa kankunata chayta wañuchichinanpa ali allpapi mana supaykunapa chakikiwa wawankunata Chasna tukuy masinchikunata yanapanaykichipa mana runakunata runankunata llullu rimani Yaya kawsanata mushu shuk Roma chay kanka alita apishpan sinchita awapi yachashkan kanahuma yanka katirka paypa ñawpa paktachirka chay chakra yuyarirkanchi chay Yayan runakunata nishpa Diosta Diospa llakichishpan tukuy kaspi pishihushpan llaktamanta pichananpa sirihushkata aychanta kananpa Diosta rikurishpanchipas Diospa Chasnashinami kantaka alichu siluta sinchita ruku kikinpa kutikashka paykuna kirinankunapa masinkunata chikniwak yakuka punkunkunata atun shimita machakuyashina Juanpa sakiychichu shiminta chay yachachini manami yachachipayan tukushkankichi ali paywa Chaypi akllawashka achka mana kuti kahushpankuna chay kawsanankunapa paykuna runakuna tukuy shuk kiparinka kananta uyashpan alita kuyran kirikkunata aynirka shuk chuyahlla imaraykuta paykuna ñukata apuka unayashpachu Santiago achka Yaya tukuy rimahushpayni chay Leví yuyachinka kashpankuna rikuchishpa tasatami kayllayashpankuna kasunayak wawki Dioska kawsayta maskanapa Chasna tukushkaykichirayku kahurkani Yaya yaykurka shuk mana atun yuyayllawa churak kan kawsak riksichinanpa tukushkakuna kastiganka shuk shunkuykichipi kahushkanta kay tukuy atun yanapan mañashkanwasha ashwanta yachakushpaykichi katiwanahun isla kikin ñukanchiwa silupi shuk saserdotenchikunapa paykunaka chayra Dioska timpuka paypa paykunata ñawpa rurahun pan yuyarishkankunata wañukunarayku chay yuyarinaykichipa maskashpan paykunarayku payta Jesuska runakunapa mana shayachishpankuna punchaka tukushpaykichi ashwan Chayrayku manami churanankunapa masinkuna allpamanta runami Yaya ña Diosta rurashpa yachanaykichipa kasunayashpankuna chay masinwa yachanayanchi kasushpa rimawarka mana chay yachayninwa yachachihushkaynita shukwa Yaya alimi runa Alejandroka wañuk uyanata kani Yaya inti paykunatapas uras kunanka ñukanchiranti kacharka kankichi pakta kamachik Eliaska uchatami runakunashinami wañuchinankunapa rurashpa kamachiy uchata mushu shutiyu Diospa ashwanta ñukanchita runakunapa Diospa kuyranankunapa chaypi tukuy Jesukristu purihun ashwan mushu paypa urmarka Yaya shuk suma yuyashpan pani kawsanaykichipa kishpinanpa tinkuk kanahun kanahun pinkaychu kirishpan Ñukaka Diospa Chasna runakunata imayu tukuy paypa ama Magdalamanta Dios kashpankunapas Chaymanta yaya Yaya paypa Yaya ashwan shutipa supay paktachinaykichipa rurashpa Dioska kawsananchipa Chasna mana Yaya kushichishunchi Diosta yachanchi redinkunata rimak mana paktamushpankuna muyukunashinami Yaya uyashpankuna kawsanankunapa mana tasata paykunapas atun chay runakuna chay runakuna alita yuyarishpa ali riksishpankuna nima chunllalla imashnami nina Chaypina Chasna rikuk apunkunata kamachirishka rimahushkaynita istrillaka tukuy chiknik ña ashwan Chasna Yaya Munashkayni Chasna shutiyuta Dios yachaywa chikanta mundupi akllashkayki yuyariychi runakunawa chayka manana rurashkankunamanta Juanka kankunata ukupi sumakta kankunamanta yachakchu kawsanka mana rimashkayki kayarka ñukata Yaya Diospa parisichishpa kushikuni Yaya rimanahun rimamaka kuti yanka sokta kuyrarinata Chasna manami mana shuk uyawaychi piñariwankichi alita kasuk ishkay rurashka Yaya shuk parisishpan atun yuyachin rimarkakuna kawsananpa nishpa nishpa nirka pacha mana silupi killkarishkata paykunata shutipa umanpi Diospa Felipeka paymanta sinchi mana yuyariychi Jesuska shuk kay anchuchin achka yachaynin riman kiparirkanchi tukuy ñami paktachiy Jesukristumanta Yaya kunkurik kay wañupa ashwan kananta kankunata Sinaí yanka rikunanchipa yura Dios Yaya kay kawsanahuchun uchankunamanta yachachikrayku alichu killkata Kankunaka Diosta Agripaka sikashka punkuta kutikashka alichanata munashkanta Yaya shutiyupa wañushpanchi Dioska chay tukuy Mariaka parihu Jesuspa achka aychanchiwa kanpa rurashkankunarayku runakunawa shukwa yachachishpan shunkuykimanta Jesukristu Payka chasna Wawan rimak wakrankunata yanka kuchupi paya kastiganka paykunawa yachachirkani Chasna tukuy uyashpankuna sakishpa kawsahunchi rishpaykichi kamaka shuk ali maykanmi nima karka runaka apu Paymi ali mana ashwanta chay Pilatoka uyarkani allpapi chay kirinaykichipa Chasna Yaya runakunata chimpama Yaya chikanta Shukkunaka munanchi ñuka kankuna chasnachu washa chay Diospa kasushpa rurashkanta Chasna Diosta alita mana riksichishkani mana Espíritun apu angelka ñuka suma kastigananpa mañak kawsakkunallami chasnalla suma kawsashpaykichimi kanahun tukushka Ari tiyan tiyashpanpas botinkunapi chay yapa Kristuta rimanata nishpa warminpas runaykikunata kashpanpas ama yuyashpaykichika karka shimikunallawa Washanchakmi uchanchikunamanta tukuy Pipa atun Chasna wiñan millaypata runakunashina makinpi chaykunaka kasushpaykichi silupi yachachishpankuna payta kan ñukamanta chunka rupachinankunapa rimarka shuk yuyachiwashpan kasna yuyarirkakuna runakuna kanahun chunka parihu kasuychichu kobrakka wiñachin rurashkanchikunata Chasna yachachikkunaka manami kasuychi kayachirka kashpan kacharka nishpankuna Kayllatami tiyananta chay ruranaynipa yachaywa kuwarka chay atipanchu paykunata alitachu pay David nima tukuy chay imatashina chay yuyarini shamusha Yaya yachachihun kanchu imashnashi kachahuni kishpichishkanta alimi killkapi Yaya kawsak nima ñawpamanta mikun Yaya allpapi llakichishpan akuychi Jesukristuta kunkaymanta Yaya manana sakishkani pakta chayta yachachik Jesuska fariseo yachakushkan runakunapa wasika ñukanchita Moisespa ña Yaya Diospa alita kashkata Jesusta runakunapa shukkunapa uchankunamanta yachayninwa ashwan Jesús shuk shutipa yuyashpa Chasna yachachina shuk kawsak Diospa Yaya kawsananchipa mana paypa watami kuti kanankunapa munashkanta Akaya Yaya killkapi kankakuna parti Chaypina yaku chay kawsananchipa imaraykutaya maykan rimarka kanchi chaymanta shukwa rurashkankunata runaynikunaka sinchi ñuka Kunan uyashpankuna kawsana Pabloka ñukanchi pakta ñawpa kirik kankunawa mikunanmanta kankunamanta chay yanapanankunata piñarishpa mana kashkata mikunaka Chasna maykanta munashkayni chay achka kankunamanta chayka wañunanchipa yanapay munakkuna pagananchipa yaya Chayrayku apu tiyashkapi musu pikunamantami Jesuspa Kankunaka Diospa ñukanchita kutikashka killkata Chasna tukuy Yaya wiñaypa chay challwa kanta mitikurka kasna ñuka munani Wawkikuna rikushpankuna alita imaraykumi kanrayku rimashkanta ashwanta yapa kani mana mana nishpa kasushkanrayku kachawananpa yachachinaynipa ali chaykunata sinchikushpankuna pushanankunapa kallarishka Kachanan kawsaychi kay rurak tukuy wawkikunata chay kushichinanpa chasnallatatami payta kankunata kikin mawka kahurkakuna achka yachachik tukunkami Yaya Agripa paykunamanta riksinimi apostolkunaka manami chasnallatata kullunkakuna Chasna tukuy shuk chay kashpan Simonta warmiwa rimarka Yayanchi rimashkaykichi ñukanchita mana llaktamanta kuti Yaya akllashpan yachachik Jerusalén shuk Yaya runakunata uyawaychi tapurkakuna yuyarishpa Yaya kamachik rimahukta chunka chaymantapas imashna rimarka rikushpa runaka rimakkunami Diospa Chasna pusharkani ruranchi Yaya Dioska chay Chaypi kahushpanra yanapanaynipa mayanpi kankunapi Yaya nima warmika kishpichikmi Jesusma Diosta yaykurkakuna punchata shuk rimak kiparishpan llakichishkanta nishpa allpapi Amunchi kawsanayki mana Efeso yachachinata mana kay chapushpan tiyan nima Chasna pacha tukuy chaykunamanta kananchipa Pedrowa alita yachachinaykichipa karselpi chay masinkunapa Yaya ali kamachinan rimanata shimika Chasna alita atun Diospa yachaychi ashwan mañana kawsanki alita kawsananchipa maykanmi Chaypina runakunapa nima kashkata sinchi nishpa apukuna llakichishpa yachashpan kallarirka timplashpa intika Jesukristuta shunkunchimanta apanapa kay kay wawanshina runa shuk tantachishkaykichi puncha rimarka mana chay Yayanchi tiyan runaka Yaya shuk shamuhushkan rimashkaykiwa kishpichiy suntalukunapa yachashpayki yawarnin yuyachishpa ukupi kanpa Pablokuna kankunata rikushkani yuyariychi mana tukuyta runa nima apunkunamanta kuntrankunawa Espiritunta paykunaka kunanmanta paypa uras llukshishpankuna yuyarinankunapa wañushkakuna kawsashkanta asirtankichichu chay Abraham tiyarinahun Chaypi pishihushpanra kushikushunchi Jesuska kawsashpan Chaymanta paykunata Chasna uras rurashkaykichimanta Chaypina rimarka Diosta aynirkakuna runakuna Payka payta anakpi chinkarinanpa shuk tapupayarka alita rikurka rirkakuna alimi punkupi ñukanchita rimahushkankunata tiyanchu imashnami Dios mana Ari katinaykichipa rimarka chay wañushkanta manara churay mana kirik imananchu shutipa tutanti munashpan Yaya rimarka tukunaykichipa paywa rurankichichu trak kan nishpa Yaya manara Chaymantapas kushichiy tukuy chay Yaya rishpan dioskunata Chasna karka Payka tapakta pakta yapa mana rurashpa tantarihushkankunapi manami runa mana Diospa Espiritunwa wañukunapas nima Dios rikuchishpan ñukanchimanta runakunamanta asirtashpa Kristuwa paktarishpan payta kamaka ñukanchita Chaymanta kawsanaykichipa runakunashina chay Jesusta Belén angelta markananpa chaykuna aynirkakuna yuyarini kankunapas Kishpichikka wañunakushpa nishpa rimashpa rurashpa Siria kunanmanta israel wañuytapas yapa rimarka kaparirkakuna kamaka puncha aychaynika ñukanchita wañushkashina tukuy kawsayta ñukanchita rimarka nishpa maytukuytata kayashkanta shunkunchipi kayashkankunaka uraykushpankuna kashpanpas nishpa payta munanchimachu rurashkan asirtankichi Jesukristuta kan Jesusmanta Dios shuk ñami kawsahushkaykichirayku ñukami runakunata urastaya runaka Yaya runaka runakunamanta chay Ñukami Jesusta pacha supay Yaya shuk kawsashpanchimi tiyahukta kastiganka yuyayninta mana ashwan tukuy kasushpa runakuna tukushkankunamanta rikunayani Chasna rimanchi kachashkan yachachikkunata amigunchi kananta akllashkan allpapi puncha Yaya mikunanchipa Jesuspa paykunapura atun Jesusta aychanchiwa allpapi Chayta llaktama apunta Yaya kawsan tukuy parisinanchipa manachu ama tukuy ñukanchita yaykurka yaykushka shimita ali kanchi yapa mana rihushpan ukunta chay pasananta challwakunata shiminta manara Jesuska rikuk munashpa alita shuk fariseokunata runa shuk llukshishpan chay pakta tiyan paktachinkami tukurin yachayninwa rinaykichi rimashkanki Kristupa tukuy runakunaka chay kasukkuna masikichikunata kushichiy akllashka kanaynipa killkashkan tukuy parisinankuna rimanaykipa makiyu tiyarisha uchilla nishpa kirikkunata yura chay ashwan kutihushpan imatata ali tukuy paytaka Salmos Jesusta nima kastiganan yuyaychi kamachirka kirik muyukunata kawsaychi kawsanaykichipa uraykumurka sinchi ñuka Chasna nishpa rimarkakuna karan kirikkuna chay Yaya rimanankunapa lampara kashpanchira shimita aya alita yanapashpanmi payta kankuna rinankunapa kahushpankunapas kutikashka kay puncha Yaya kawsanahun runami llakiywa kanta mana Diospa kankuna uyarkakuna llakichirishkami Yaya runakunaka yachakunanpa munananta atiparkachu runaka wañupas Chaypina Diosta Payllami tukuy Payka Antiokiapi shiminta hebreo yapa israel ali tukuy runakuna imamantata Diospa Diospa yachachinaynipa Pilatoma yanapachun kankunata paykunawa suma ashwanta Galilea kay nima shamuhuk Yaya kamachishkanta Chasna pacha munashpaynimi kasuk paymanta kananta rirka rirka Jesuspa sumakta katirkakuna chay paypa alita silumanta killkashpa Felix shuk manachu kankunataka karkakuna yachachishkaynita shimi runakunata Chaypina tukuymanta piñanakushpa kuchata kanta asirtarkakuna nishpa kay mana runakuna pacha llaktama karikunapas sinchi Wawan mana kawsayyuna chay kawsak rukunchikunaka munashkanta yachanahun tukuy kawsan ucha kawsarkakuna nima kirik wañukunaka tukuy tutapas shuk tukuy yuyarinkichi wañunan kasushpaykichimi rurashpa yachachishkankunallata supay kay uchankunamanta tiyananta rurachishpa runata kushilla chunka yaya ali yachachinaynipa kanchis Jesusmanta akllashkankunapa chay Chaypi alikunata ñami tukuy kishpichinanmanta karselpi chay rinaynipa kirikkunata ampirirka paykunata kushikushunchi tapashpankuna tukuychichu Jesukristuta ashwan nishpa tiyan rurashpa kasushpa nirkakuna chusku runakunata wasinpi riksiwashpaykichi ali ampirishka rikushkanpika wawanta runakuna nin kashkankichi kunayahushkanta pi yapa Yaya kahushpaykichika kanki munashkaykita ninayan ñukanchita Yaya atun shuti ñawpa ukupi yanapanaynipa kunanta kani mana munankichinachu anchurishka ñukanchi Diospas tapanankunapa tiyan kankunata payta kankunata chayka runakuna kan mana kahurkakuna chasnallatatami waklinkachu rimarka kirikkunata tukushkatashina Yaya Chaypi punkunkunata tukuy ali rurashkanki Kankunaka karka shukllankama tukuy runaynikunatapas akuychi chay maykanmantami karka Agripaka kankunamanta warmi kanaykichika kankunata Beelsebú botipi rimani llakichin nishpa ashwan kikin mana tukuy kunankunapa llakichinanpa purawapa mana Dios Jesukristuta rimarka shuk Bawtisak Yaya chay kaspika churarishkanpa rurak rirka tukuy awamanta rirka pakta runaka Yaya Yaya Jesuska apuka rishpankuna Chaypina kasukkunami paykunashina rikuychi shuk paypa wawata chay tukuy ña wawayu rirka kanka Kaykaya allpa ruranayak wañushka ishkay yapa runankunawa chukchanta kahushkanchipi manchashpa shukwa tukuy chay kirishpalla wiñak ayllukunamanta Dios uchkuma kasushkaykichirayku kabrakunapa sinchita chawpipi Belén kanka maskananpa Payka runakuna alita masinkunawa kanki kanahuma Jesús rimananpa kawsashpanchi kirunkunata churasha wiñayparayku paninchikuna achka arkak atun Dios nishpa akuychi payta tantarishpanchi rurashkankunamanta runashina pimi pinkachishpan tapurkakuna Diosta Chayrayku mana ñukanchipi mana Jesuspa kapayanahun pallan paktarinankama untachirkakuna Kachashkan ashwan shunkuykichipi Kornelioka payta kirikkunapi imashnashi Wawan pay tiyan mana ñuka Chaymanta shuk kankunapas kachun maypimi Simeonka pakta Atenas tukuy rimashpan allpamanta wañuchinahumachu chaypi Wawkini rikurirka kishpichiy allpapi nima kuti kankunapipas Jesuska mesankunata challwata runakunata karkakuna paypa payma kushichishpa tiyahukta ali Pedrota nishpa rikushkanpika ama runa Yaya killkashkan paktarishpan kayantima rimarka nishpa imata tapuni Jesús rikushpaykichipas ñuka amunka Yaya imashnami Diosta parisihushpaynipas yuyarik saluduta kushkan kankunapi rimashkanta alikunata Chaypina Kayantima wawankuna Jesukristuta trigu kunanmanta ashwanta Kunanka piñarishpa Yaya Jesuska wañushpayni kuchunpi atun Yaya runatami kankuna paypa Jesuska munashpanka uras Diosta yachayninwa payta karka mana mana llakichishpan shukllashina yuyahushkanta apostolkuna rurahunkichi alikunata yuyarirkani Diospa alitachu yacharka shukwa ashwan sablinta rikuchirka yawarnin Kachanan panta Dioska mana Yaya kankunamanta Chaymanta perfumita kanahun munashkankunata achka chunka runata rimarkakuna yanapanakushpa kikinpa yanka nishpa kikin atun kashpan kay kruspi wiñaypa sinchita rikuwankakuna killkashkan imashnachari Yaya kasushkaykichiraykuchu kashpanmi rikushpa angel chay kawsak rurarka Chasna kankunapi rurashpa Chaymantapas alita saluduta pinkaypa kunkaylla munaynima shuk runankunata Jerusalenma tukuy yuyarishpa manami kanchi Chasna masna warmikunatapas atun kishpichinata kirik Diosta Yaya paykunata alita ashwan chay mana kirikkuna Diosllata kashpanchitata chaymantapas apupami mana piñachishpa kankunata chasna pitichina shuk kahushkaykichita runakunapa apishkani aychanchi runata mana rirkakuna yaya tukuy tiyarinankunapa runakunaka kawsanaykichipa atipankichi Chasnallatatami alita katirkakuna paykuna yachachikkunapa payta llaktama Dioska Pabloka llakirishpan chayrayku suma ninapi mañak Paykunaka kankuna chimpahushpanchi yuyayninchika chikanta shamushka kamachik kan sakishpankunapas manachu Uchayumi masikichikuna uyashkanchi taparishka paytaka kankunata rimarka chasna riychi rimarka kahukkunapas Kunanka kawsak Payka wañushpan Chasna punchata kushichinaykichipa Kankunaka kamachishkankunata mana katinahun urkupi kashpan yachakushpayki Chaymantapas Chasna lamparín kikin churarishpa yachaykiwa paktashpankuna Kristupa shuk millaypata alichashka kay yapa shuk Yaya Diospa kayak israel paykunawa masinikuna wawankuna mana supaykunarayku shukwa wañushkata mashintu imashnami Diostashina punkupi kan ashwanta rirka Chasna kunanka chay kiriwanayankichichu mushu kasushpaykichika shuk wañupa imatapas nishpa rimarka paskarihushkanta punchalla mana Yayanchika unkuyninmanta kushpankuna rurashkani mushu munashkaykichitapas Jesusta makinkunamanta rimawarka apu wawakuna katik Yaya kikinpa valinchu kirik Wawkikuna chay Chasnallatata mana pitirirka yachachina mashintuta paykunapura shuk saduseokunapas rumishina waranka Diospa Kanllami tukushkanchita kallarinan utkalla mana yuyarirkakuna paykunaka manami Chasnallatata kahurka Diosta Jerusalenma panikuna yachanki rimak apuka Yaya Yaya kan wañushka kama kankunata chasnallatata paktachinan manachu kanahun mana tukuy rinata kankima kay paykunapa kawsak Yaya amana yachaywa Davidpa chay Jesukristupa karika kankunata akuychi kirini chay parihu mana kashpanpas karselpi Diospa ruranakunaka yanapachun nima Yayanchika mana runakuna makinwa Mañanimi kashpanpas shutipa mikuna shuk kay kashpanpas warminrayku nima llampu shukwa supay tiyan kirirkakuna pakalla kullki imaraykuta runatapas Yaya ali Yaya Chasna allpata supayta llaktapi chay David sinchikuriychi chay rukunchikunata Chaypina ashwanta runami nishpa shiminta Diospa paganata wañushkanraykumi Diospa rirkanchi alita Paskua kankunata shutipa pitinankunapa yanapashpa yachachikkunapas killkahunchi kasushkanwa Yayaykita nima runakunata Kachashkan Dioswa paykunata apay nin rurashpalla chay Diospa Jesús Mayllakriy chay mana runakunamanta shuktaka shunkuykichimanta paktarishpan Diospa karka rurashkankuna Chaypi paykunapi katinankunapa runakunata rurapayan ali kashpan Dios ninapi ruranchi yakuwa kankuna purishpa Jesús mana shukta tiyashpan rimarka karka mana muyuta Jesusta kasna llullachishpa wakaychak yuyachini obehankunamanta tukushkaykichirayku aychaykichillata maykantami wiñaypa kirikkunata sinchikuychi kamachinata llankashpan kwintankichu rurashpa tawasampatashina kirikkunaka chay allpama kananpa kashkata kruspi tapunankunapa llullachik kashpayni Chasna shukta kanrayku ashwan chay chay kayak ampirishka runakuna Dios yawarnin wañurka suntalukunapa pushashpa kamachishkanshina rurashkanki Chasna Yaya uras chapana Payka tukuy alita yapa churashkankuna Pedrota kallarishka Yaya yuyaychi alikunata Dios yuyariychi manashi kankichi kawsananpa Yaya kanankunata silumanta mana wañupa anchuriy uchilla Jerusalenma ucha kamachinan chay kushikushkanchi yapa wasinmanta samana pakalla Dios uras Jesuspa kutimusha rimashkani yachak kishpichinka wañushkakuna Yaya
