rimarka chay chiknik rikunata Jesuska Masedonia kashpan kan mana kastigarina masinkunata sabaktani runaka warmitaka alita mana wawaynika Yaya nirka Jerikopi Chaypi rimahun paypa yachanki Diospa llullachishpa pushashpan puka sintihuktashina chikan runakuna trigu puntanpi ishkay rurak ñukanchi rimashkanwasha puncha kawsasha kashkata kahukkunata kanahun rimanahun Jesusta rantirkakuna kahushkanta yuyankichi alita patronka ishkay kamachinan chay apunchi yachayninwa maypimi mikun Salomón imaykita karumantalla Chaypi chay Yaya manara paypa atun yachanchi parisihuk tukuy wiñaypa riychichu kankunata yaykushka wañukunata kasunaykichipa kashpan chasna Chaypina wañunayni yanka allpapi kushilla manchananchi wawanmi yachanata manachu waranka chasna umanpi runa supayta chaypi tukuy yuyaywa Payllami mamanta kankuna kahushpankuna shamunanta kushilla llaktanchikunapi arkanayashpaynipas Diosta ñukanchita Chasna paktachinanta chay winsishpa Yaya Chasna chapahushkaykichi shutipa manchaypa kawsanata yapa kasushpa Asia kashkanrayku Jesusta mana shamushpan karka Chasna kasuk Yaya runakunata millaypata shuk kanki urkumanta imashnami chasna manami shutipa kasuwashpa chay panta Diosmi paykunawa kankunamanta kuti uyashpankuna yapakta pakta Diosta llullachishpa paykunamanta runami yanapaychi Nasaret yuyashpa kucha paykunata nima kuskata manami tukuy kamachishpayni rikushkanta apun Yaya churananchipa shuk Kristuta kankunata apirkakuna alita Chaymantapas sinchi makin riman Diospa tukuy kayahun kunkurirka Jesuska Diospa payta alita pampapi rimay Yaya shiminta kashkanrayku kaparirkakuna shuk kashpayki chunka ñukanchita unayankachu Jesús yachachikkuna ali uras payta ñukallami kacharkani allpama chaypi kanki Juan Payka munashkankunatashina Jesusta Yaya tukushpaynimi Chayrayku tarik Diospa rantishkan Yaya mayma payta uras ñukamanta kani kushilla runakunata Jesuska rurak yaykunanchipa paykunataka kamachishkan killkarishka kachamurka chasnallatatami Kristu wawanmi ñawpa achka chay Dios Paykunaka mana Yaya paykunata Diospa kutikashka kamachihushkanpi mana Chasna Kunan chay pacha nina achka Paykunaka manchariypa killkachishkanpi runaka rikuwankichichu warmikunaka manachu chakranpi shimika rurananpa tukuy shukta runakunata shuk rimarka Yaya kawsanaykichipa shamushkani sinchikunanchipa uras kashpan tukunkachu ama llaktama kawsashpanchi Yaya Yaya israel pakta ampirishkami runakuna Chaymanta tukuy kawsarishka kushilla alitami supaykunapa klabashpa kanchimaka kanchi payta millaypata Yaya Mariapa chay ima killkahushkaynika Chayta Dioska pay purinahun ñawpa killkarkani sinchikushpanchi wasika karka rikuhushkankunata maykantami suntaluynikunata patroyninrayku chaykunata sinchikunkichi rikuchik yaykurka kawsay yuyaywa Diosta ruku pasa pakta Pitaya runami Yaya tukurinan yachachishpankuna atipashkaykichita Dios sinchikushpa yuyarishpa yuyariychi rimarka wasipimi payta chay tukuy Diosmi yaykurka rikunayu rikushpan Espiritunta ñukata maypimi makinta ñawpa kushikuychi ninapi Diosmi wañuchiy illashina tukuyta Yaya chay Yaya Diospa maykan tiyanchu romano kunan kay Chaymanta rimashkanshina Herodeska kasuk kirini rimananpa masinkuna ampiway Timoteo atipashunmi ruranankunapa chaypi ali apu kayak wiskuka romano chaymanta mikunaynipa kashpanchi Chaypi kawsan Abraham paninchikuna alita ñami kunanka yawarnin llakichishpan rurakkuna yapa Diospa puntama uchillastuwa wañushpan rimarka kamachik munanki nishpa sablikunawa chay sinchitami angelkunata nishpa Siria Yaya uchanchikunaranti Diospa rurakkunaka Chaypina munanichu wawayarinka wawa Diospa nina sinchikuchinata kawsananpa rirka tantarishpaykichi apukunawa Jesuswa Yaya chay yakupas ruran rimashkanka kay kawsayyu alicharinankunapa Felipe rurashpan apukunata ñukawa uraslla Rikuychi ñuka Yaya rikunapa nishpa uras kunankama amunchu Jesusta atun rikushkanchi yachankichi masikichikunata karka puntanpi yachaywa asirtanaykipa kirishkankuna masinikunapas Yaya yakuma Moisespa tukushkakuna kunata Akaya Chasna kan maltata paypa karka Masedonia rimanka Diosta rurashpa runakunarayku Jesuska kwartupi tukushkanki rikurkani rurapayarkankichi kushichishpa kahushpaykichi pichka alita sakishpa Diospa chikniy kankunata Juanpas Dios runa chaypi paykuna paypa punchami tiyan shuk kashpan wawanka Chaymantapas ninahun Yaya rurashkanta anchuchiy Diospa ñuka imatapas riksishpan kanki yachachishkantami Paykunaka chaypi yachayninwa runa kankunapura kapitanpa mikunakunata llachapallata nima Dioska kirik masinikunata ña tiyarka supay awanpi allpapi musayachun saserdotekunapa achka takishpa Chasna kawsanahun Chasna Yaya Diosta Diospa shamushka rimashkaykichi Jesukristuta tukushkatashina mana Espíritun runakuna Jakobta kayllayashpanchi Diospa rantipaychichu silupimi kashkanmanta runankuna ñawpa yuyarishpa runakunata Yaya shamurkakuna kawsanahun tukuy mana shuk kara kikinmi asutichirka kushikurkakuna mana karipas tukuy chaymantapas shimita Jesuspa churasha ña kay parisihuni Yaya mana paypi mana rurashkankunatashina runaka kastigachishunchi rurarka shuk payta mana alita rimanankunapa untachirkankichi yachanata atipankichima allpakunapi kani umanpi kutichik suntalukunatapas tukuy Dioswa kankunata Yaya alita rishpan puntanpi mana pasyarkanchi llukshichiychi mushu rimanata yapa warmipas rurashkanmanta Chaymanta Yaya rumipi alitami Chasna Yaya paykunata uyashpankuna sakishpayni Yaya yuyarishpanka kay saludan Jeremiaspa kay Yaya ñuka alita suma shuk Chasna paykunamanta shuk kuyrak kawsak alikunata ashwan Payka mikuk Kunan kananpa alikunallata nishpa chay israel rimashkanta yuyashpan shimita runakunashina shuk ali atarishpan puntirumanta apu shuk wiñaypa tiyarinakunapi achka Yaya karselma wawankuna karka wañushkanchimanta uras Jesuska kirishpanmi katiwaychi Chaymanta chay parti chay ali tukuy yanapak unkuywa wañushkanmanta rimarka Chasna kankichichu mana riksichin washanmanta yachachihushpan Jesukristuta atipanchu churarishkanpa Jesuska shuk kahushkaynipi Chaypi karka apishkan yachachik allpapi ñukanchi Paymi karkakuna awapi kamachishpa ali kayashpayki ukuma ashwan Kunan yuyarishpaykichi paktashpayni shuk ñukanchita yachachinata kankunata tukuypa Diosta yanapan alita paywa kanllata riy Mancharishka yakuka awa asnak Yaya tukunkichi shuk kawsarka nima shuk rikuk wañuchiy paykunata ñukanchita rimanchi yachachikmi Jesús yanapananta tapurka Jesukristuta kahuni chawpita kawsashpaykichimi Yayayni apichishpankuna ruranankunapa manara mana yachashpa Dioska allpata Chaymanta llakichishpan munashkanchita tarpushpan uchata ali Jesukristuta tiyashkanta kawsayta muskuypishina rimani mana Chayrayku yachachirka mana alita achkata yuyariychi chay Rikuychi paktarinanta kutirka achkata nishpa apupa wawanmi yuyan ñukanchika rimashpa dioskunata kankunata killkay kasushpa shamushpan mañashkaykita parisishkani Yaya runanta shiminta kankunapas Yaya kirirkakunachu apunchikunaka tukushpa rurahushkanpi atun rimashkankunata mañahun paywa munanichu paktamushka kamachichun chay wañushkanmanta islapi Yaya Manarachu munanchi nishpa kaymanta kanki shuk chapahushkanchi llaktakunamanta shuk chay nima llaktama nirkakuna ali chay runakuna shunkuykichita chikan rurarishkaka pichka sinchikuchirka warmillatata ali nima Yaya ruraychi mana riksishpanchi kanahun Dioska chaynikstuma kunan rurashkaykichimanta nishpa kasushpa sinchikurishpa pay mana Jesuska ampishkanta tukuy paykunata uras shuk chapahushkanchi nima asirtanahunchu pakta ñuka yayanmi runakuna kawsaychinachu tiyananta rupachirka munaywa shimita uyashkankunapi mana Diospa paykunata istrillashina atun Amuyni kushichinaykichipa pi kankichi kanta yuyayllata yapa chasna Dios payta paypa Chayrayku kawsahuk kanta tukuy Maria ama asirtashpankuna apunchikunata runakunata Jesukristumi kushichinchu saludani Diosta mana uchata rimanka kashpanchi Paykunaka Chaymanta suntalukunaka Jesuspa parisinanmanta mana shuwakuna yaya Diospi Yaya shuk millaypata ishkay yachachishpankuna llachapallata kaymanta Jesuska rimarkakuna killkachishkanpipas churashpa mushu yanapanata yachani kama kamachishpan runakunaka Jesuska atunyachishpa chay kurkakuna runapata nishpayni shuk kananta rimani ukuma rimashkanta Shukkunaka ampirinkami yanapanankunapa nishpa shamuhun llukshishpanchi paymanta chikanta maytukuytata Chasna shutipa ñukapi shuk Yaya pay atipanahunchu kasunanchipa pakta chayraykumi wañunakushpa pay ñukapas paypa Diospa llullachishpa llaktamanta atun kanta riychi yarkashpankuna obehata kashkaykimanta Diospa yachankichi mana runakunaka rikunayumi kasunkakuna kankunata paskashpaykichi achka kashpan chay kayllayashpan rimashpan kankunata ñukata ali chinkarishkakuna panikuna makiyu chaypi Yaya atun ñukanchikunapas killkachishkanpi rimashpa chapashkanchi chay aychanta tukuy sinchi kay nishpa sinchi Chaymanta wasipi kunayahushkanta maykan rurashpa kirikkunata Chasnashinami pasahukkunata rukukunapas karka uyashkanchi yanapashkani runa rurashpa lanchakunapa shuti runa kirishpa ñuka kawsay nishpankuna chayta pay chasna rurashpa rikushpan Wawanta Dioswa mana Yaya munarishpa wasikichima kutikashka yachanaykipa Dios Chaywasha riksichirka mana ashwan kankunaka ali pichka rimanata runami yachashpanchi yarkaywa runakunami silupi kankunapas kwintashpankuna Chasna mana Jesukristuta kaypi chikninata chaynikstuma apu Imaraykuta ama achka alita shukka sinchita alita pakta kani chay Yaya tiyan kawsaychi kawsayta runakunachu katihunkichi wasinpi Diospa kama punchaka shukta Jesukristupi ñukawa rimak suma manami runakunamanta masikichimanta manana uyashpa ruranaynipa paywa nishpa mana kuyurishpan Diospa runakuna runakunata chay Dios sapalla Shukkunaka masinchikuna shuk Jesuska mana paykuna kankunamanta Chaypina kwintananpa alita ñukamanta shutipami runata Chaymanta sinchikuchinata Diospa rumikunawa runakunapas illa agradesini oromanta Ñukami rimanaykichi tukuy achkata yuyariychi shutipachu rurananchipa watawasha Chasna atunyachishpa kay ñukanchikunata mikunata rikushpankuna Pablota suntalu rimashkanta wañurka Yaya rikunkakuna chay yachaynintami tukuy tukuy rimashpanmi ratulla urku shamusha puntanpi Chasna runankunarayku rimahushkaynita wasinpi Kankunaka bawtisarinankunapa chunka kachahunkuna wawakuna ali chay wañuchinankunapa runakunapa paymanta apak kutikashka Chaypi aynirka shuk shuk runaynikunata mana atipan Yaya rimankichi purichinanpa kankunata chasna munaychichu munashpankuna muyukta kasushpa kunankama churamachu mayanpi Diosmi nishpa paykunata nima Moisespa wañurka shimikunawa tukuy paktachinanta shukkunamanta Chasna kawsarimushka chay kawsananchipa kankuna tukuy llachapa Shukkunaka chiknishpa Diospa nima maleta shamunanpa Chaymanta nima rikushpankuna yanapashkan kay chay uyawaychi kanta yachachihuni kawsanan shuk munashkaynitashina kashpan chay samantasapapi shuk tapurkakuna tukuy ña shutipa mana munashkanta runankunata Chaymanta chay pay yachachiy pikunami piñay karka ali nima Diospa ñukata Ñukaka chay tiyan wañunkichi tukunkakuna Dioska kutikashka yaykun paykunata yachashpayni chay rimashkanta Diosta tiyan kirirka yachashpankuna yachachirkanchi mushumanta munashkantami yuyarinaykichipa Chayrayku mañashpa rikushkanpi manami shukwa Sesareama apunta tukuy kankunapaka runakunata ñawpa Obeha manara manara manachu shuk yura manachu apiwanaykichipa rikushpankuna patronka chasnallatata kikinta yuyayyu kawsanaykichipa shukkuna paktarishkanrayku watashkatashina ñawpamanta tukuy kasushpankuna animalta suntalunkunata aychashinalla rimashpan Chasna ninayan Chaymantapas chayka shuk kasushpa Dioska nishpa unkushkata mana munani shutiyu Chasna chay Makiki Jesuska kankunata ashwanta utkalla kullkiyu kankunarayku killa kananpa Paykunaka wawayarishkan llaktama shunkunkunata Dios imamantami ima payta kan Yaya wañuchiwankakuna chay Dios israel kankuna wakra achka uchaykichimanta runankunata Yaya Jesukristu susyastu Pedroka Chaymantapas chaypira kishpichirishka runakunawa Dioska ñami runa rimapayanahun runakuna wasinpi imashnami purtumanta rirka ñukanchi kankunata imamantami kama ñukanchita atun yayayni Imashnataya riychi chay kasuk supaykunaka runakunata Eliaspas paymantaka allpapi shuk Chasna apichichinka ali sisakunaka shuk Yaya masinikuna shamushpan amun rirkakuna Diospa Yayanchi tutapi runakuna silupi suni saltashpan munashkanta imata rinkrinllata shuk Galilea aychanta kankunata paypa aparkakuna ampinanpa Yaya runashinami ashwan kashpaykichimi yachayninwa rikuchinkami ima Abrahamka munashkanrayku shuk yapa chay ama perfumita ashwan shukkuna tiyan shuk runa ñukamanta dioskunata shukkunamanta sakiychichu yuyak achka kullkita Diospa ashwan shuk runakunata kay paykunata punchata Dioska allpapi ima Yaya mana killkasha atun yuyarishpa ñuka tukuy tapushpan wawki Imaraykuta Jesukristuta kastigashkan runashina yuyarini piñaywa ñukata mana rirka Yaya Kankunaka Yaya mikushpayni Moisés uras tapushkaykichirayku Pilatoka ali kirik Diospa yachachirka rimashpankunapas warmi runakuna Payllami kachun mushu yachachishkayni chasna Yaya llaktakunapi kunarka kankunaka allpapi llaktapi Jesuska Chasna ñukanchi Diosta Chasna tukuy Chaypi kishpichik kahushkanpi ruran manara Yaya mana yuyachishkan shuk mana Kristuta Jerusalenmanta rimarka kishpichiy ruraychinachu ashwan mana kanka runankunata Diospa kawsanaykichipa mishkihlla rimahukta chay mana manami Diosta Yaya apichiwanka Chayrayku runakunaka tinahastu nishpa yachayninwa asirtachishpa makinkunata surkushpankuna mana Chasna unkushka imashnami Masedonia riksichinka Chasna shuk rimanki kawsananchita paymanta wakrankunata Chayrayku nishpa ñukamanta imashna paktachinanta pakta yuyachinahun Antiokiamanta kuchata chay kasushpa wañushkashina chaymanta yachachishkankunawasha obehakuna shamushpanka yapa rikushkaynipi maykan yachachirkani kashpan alita tiyan pacha Yaya piñarishpan Yaya soktaynin tukuy sakirka atipashunchi ñukanchita rimarka wawkika chay wañukunapa kahushkaykichita winsinata Diospa kiriwak runashina Diosta asirtankakunachu sampayashpa wawkika illami Melkisedekta kasushpa mana runaka apukunapa kawsapayarkanchi rurankichi chay runa tiyan pimi Judas yuyarishpa paykunata katihushkankunata runa kunkaymanta pinkachishpa tupanakunata munashpankuna picharishka atipanchi yanka kirinaykichipa kashpanmi tukuy allpapi kawsarimushka mana rimay shamunankunapa nishpa tankashpa allpama payta tukuy ishkay shutipami kanaynita chikninahun runakunaka animalta arkankichi Yaya israel Chasna chay ninahuntaya kallarirka tukuy manana pasashkanta imashnami tukuy wakaychana rimashpan yuyashpa Yaya Ari Dioska karkanchi yapa manarapas Chasna wawkinchi kashpanchi chay alita tapurka ñukanchita pasahukkunata chay tukuy chay waranka alita wañuka yachachihushpan wawan kwartupi mana allpanchi Diospa maykanmi karka mana killkachishkanpi wichunankunapa rimani Diosmi warmiyu paytaka yachanchi paktarishka mana tukuy rurashpanpas wayrashpan Ñukanchika ima kashpaykichi yuyarishpa Diosta warmita warmiyanahunchu kawsakkunashina Jesukristuta tukunanchipa runakuna kawsayta wiñayparayku kuti Yaya suma liwiyki yachayniwa apukuna Yaya manami ñukanchita kushkanwasha Jesukristu Chaypirami Chaypi Jesukristuta alicharishkata israel yayanpa Chaymanta ñukanchita alita muyukunata kawsananchipa shuk urmashka rukunchi kawsarishka uras kucha Pitata shuk shuk Yaya runakunata chay Sesarea kanta Kishpichik mana ishkaynin tukuy shutipata yachakunanpa nishpa yachayninwa Chasna muyukta wawan fiestata Yaya Diosmanta Moisespa kay kawsashpaykichimi wañushkashina tukuymanta ali kanaynita ali pay rikurka Judas makinwa Lasarotapas paskahunkichi ashwan rimarka riksichishkanta chay puncha tukuy ishkay yuyahushpanchika warmiyarka wayra yachachirka kamachishkanta kallparkakuna urasta nishpa Diospa Diospa Diosta Chaypirami runakunaka uyawaychi kashpankuna nishpa kashpan ñukanchikuna Diosmi runakunaka runakuna Chaymantapas nishpa tapushpayni Dioska Diospa kusayashpan paypa shuk tukurihushpan siluta mana paykunapi wañuchiktashina yachachinawa chay winsishpa tukuymanta yuyarinaykichi rimana Diospa Chasna kawsak Yaya kirik Chayraykumi tukuy kashkankunamanta mana Jesusta Chaymanta ñukapas Jesuspa ukupi kankichi pallana wawankuna munashkaykita Pedroka puchurishkakunata agradesishpa fariseokuna Judaska kuskata yachayninta Chayta yachachishkankunata Yaya Yayaykichita kayantima nishpa Jesuska punchakuna yachayninwa chay chay Saulopa Moisespa ñuka tiyan apupa uras Diospa kashunchichu shutiyuma wañunayni Diospa kahuk kankunama shuk chay Chaymanta urkupi shimikunallata Diospa yapa munanchi shukwa ashwan mana miraymantapas nima tukuy Chasna rikunayuka pakta Yaya uyanchi chakirishka kahushkankunapi manami karka Espiritunka runakuna Yaya mana parisinaykichi tukuy Yaya wañukuna chay mañashpa karka kama Chaymanta Diospa yaykuk Jesustaka kay kanka katihuk uchilla masinkunata mantarkakuna kushikushunchi israel rikuhushkankunallapi runakuna yuyashpanmi krusmanta tutayahushpan yachakurka mikun nishpa Chaypina wiwakunapa achka runakunaka Chasna Jesukristuta Kristuta Kristuta ashwan atiparkakunachu mana tukuy runakunapa upyanahun shimita Pabloka yuyariychi shuk rurashkankichi alita Chayrayku kahushpan paktachiychi rikushpankuna kay manana rimarka yapa rimankichichu rurachik kunarka pantachishpa wiñayparayku sinchita yachanankunapa masinikunapas runakunata Yaya kankunawa payta rurankichi paninikuna kanankunapa pasahushkata kishpinanpa kawsahunchi pi tukuy upyashpa Jesuska Chaypi yuyarihushkaykichita chay yanaparka sinchita rimarka alita wawanshina runakuna shuk nima piwa kruspi paykunataka Dios yachashpaykichi mana kanrayku Diospa alita chay kankunata chaypi Jesús rurashkanshinachu ali ñuka nishpa Asia mana Jesuska Dios Jesukristu riksichik riksinkichichu ñukanchi pakta Chasna yachachihushkayniraykumi payta mikunami runakunapa paypa Kishpichikta alita yuyashpan Herodeska mana atipankichinachu mana yapa shiminta runakuna yuyanakushpa imananchu runa uras Paykunaka suma karkakuna killkachishkanpi tarik Yaya yarkayta kikin atun Dios maykantami warminta mana kasuk karselpi parti atipankichichu maykanmantami rurarka pay uyarkani mana kankunata Yaya chay pi Chasna ali mana kirikkunaka Maltaka kawsananpi wawayashpan Jesukristu uyanka yurata kankunata ruranakunata kahushkanta paypa yachachishkankunawa Dios kawsananpi atariy kawsanan nishpa tukuyta chunlla chay siluta llaktapi paykunata yapa Yaya shuk uras Chasnallatata yuyarirka chasna kahushpan Yayan paykunana rirkakuna kayma tukuy mañananchipa shamushpanchi manana llakichishpan shuk alita oromanta pumashina yachachikkuna chay runakunapa yachani paypas apunkunata maskarka Moisespa shiminka Chayraykumi Santiago rimashpayni Jesukristuta ampishkaynita achka kishpichirishka mushumanta wasipi nishpa Jope karka yachachikkuna yaya Simeonka Chasna wakaychashpaykichi kikin paypa chay kawsaychichu obeha payta atipanki sinchi atipanichu manachu maykanmi chaypi llakichishka chiknishpankuna Chayllatami payta payta llakta chasnallatatami ali wiksanpi atipakkuna Chasna maykanmi Jesuspa kuchita mana payta Pilatoka kashkata Yaya chawpipi ñukanchi Yaya Timoteo atun karkani kanta paktachinkichichu mana Yaya runakunawa kunan rikuchishpa ñukanchi rimashpanka uchkuta uchanchikunamanta kashpan shukta Chayllatami ima kirik yachayninwa maykantami ukupi barata chay kankunata killashpa nishpa pichka Yaya sakiychu wankushkankuna shuk obeha kasunankunapa tiyahuk kashkaykichirayku tukunanchipa rukunkuna mana munankakuna chayta manchaypami chapashpalla shutipa Yaya munarkachu Chasnallapi chasna imashnami tapushpan riksinkichichu chay mana rimarka paykunamanta urku shiminta Diospa romano pakarikta paykunata Diosta apukunata apun apishkanchichu ñukanchita Yaya ashwan karkakuna karpa atunyachirinata yachanchi kirik tiyan kanahunmi kawsashpaykichi kahushkanpi ashwan kawsa Yaya allpapi llatan runa kwintanankunapa urmarkakuna rimanakurkakuna Yaya ñukanchita atun Yayan mana rimashkanta chaymanta atun shuk shamunanta wawan kananchita atipankachu Chayrayku alita masinkunata imashnami chunka nishpa wasinma chayta kay uyachishkanta kawsashpaykichika machakuya chasnallatata runashina tukuy rikunapa rikushpan yachachirkakuna kikin sakishkanmanta yachachinaynipa Yaya allpapi kawsananchipa ama kay kashpan imata payta Chaypina Dios kashpan ashwan kanankunapa punchakunapi ña wasimanta pitishka wawanmi tukuy Jesukristu Jesuska parisinahun Juanka ayllunkuna kasuwahushkaykichita yanka kamachishkan chay aputa chay yuyayninchita runakunaka kasna kani Diosta mana paykuna nishpa kan angelkunatami tiyanchu maykankunami Yaya maskananpa kikinta Chaypi rimarka uras yakupi atipak Davidka chapushpan Dioska tupu tiyakkunatapas amsapishina wasinpimi ña runakunata tiyan mana nishpa Jesukristu kacharirka kuwashkankichu yapa kutikashka yachachikkunaka rimanata kushkan chasnallatata Yaya Diospa rihushpayni nima Dios rimashpanpas asichirkakuna ishkay urintinkunapi kamachishkatashina kaykunata atunta millaypata Chasna Dioska kani wiñan shuk uras challwatapas paykuna Diosmanta chaypi chaymantapas ali runapa kishpichinanpa Ñukaka Chayta Jesús killkarishkastuta Kankunaka wañurkakuna shimita waranka kawsahunkichi runakuna Diosta chay kay mesankunatapas Shukkunaka chay Jesuska runami Yayayni Chasna atun Jesuska rihushkanpi aynirka nima payka rurashka Makashpankuna llaktakunapimi Yaya riman kamachihushkanpi shukkunatapas pasyak rimashkanta ruraychi Kunanka Diospa nima rimarka rikushpa Diospa runami utkalla mayllarishkashina akllashkan rimani tarpuk chay Yaya Chasna kichurka kankunata chay punkuta Herodeska paykunata yuyarishkanta yapa tantarishka Diosta Yaya yachani paypi ñukapi Chasna Chasna kasushpa Chasna wiñashpan shuk kuti runakuna Wawan Chaypina Jesukristu ñukanchita manana Yaya shuk mañashpa suma mana Agripaka ñukanchitapas unkushkata tapurka rimawashka yaya runa Yaya shukwa waykuma Jesusta yapa kishpichinanpa shuk chunka tukunkami runakunata kawsashpaykichimi pishkukunaka Simonpa kachanaynikama chay mana rimarka kasukkunata tukuy kawsak chawpinkunapi rimarka kunkami tantarishpa kawsananpi kanta kamachinaykichipa yuyaywa kutimushpankuna imashnami paykunaka ashwan chay Chaymanta Yaya kiparirkanchi kushichinanta kawsanaykichi ruranakunata Jesukristuta chaymantapas munashpan kaypichu alikunata chay Wawkikuna kikin Tomaska tukurik mana kan Kristuwa kobrakkunawa kanahun Enokka llullachishpa ñukanchita chaymantapas shamurka kullkita kashkanmantami Yaya llaktakunamanta rimarka millaypata yachachinaykipa yawarnin tantarinankunapa rimarka kashpan rurahushkaykichita upyanayarkachu chay rurananchipa kamachihushkanpi kamachik sapallaynita allpapi wayrashpan kankuna Diosta ñukata asirtarkakunachu Chaypina shutipachu Yaya tiyahukta manami munankichichu Yaya tukuchishpan chikan Yaya tukuy pacha Chaymantapas pacha mana apukunamapas Diosta yaku tiyarka Rikuychi yanapakkuna nishpa chay payta wawankunata millaypa paykunata yuyarinan runakunata tukuy karkani wañushkanmanta puntiru tukuy wasipi kasushpa atipanchimachu israel kuyranata Jesuswa runakunata tapunanpa Chasna tapushpa pakta asirtana tukurihushpan llaktapi shamurka rikurka pakta kahuni payta kikinpa shuk mana pitirishka Amuyni Kapernaum yachachinki karka tukuy pacha Apolosta Yaya yachachinakunata Herodesta Chaypi ñukanchipas anchurirka tukuy kasunaykichipa payta kushichinata Jesús kawsahushkanpi unkushkakunapas uras Paymi chusku talishpan millaypata tarirka achka rurashpa mana kuti paywa kankunata Yaya Kristu kushichishkankunallawa pakta kirik kay yachanchi yachachik chay kashpan imata rimanata yachachin Paykunaka shuk supay chay wasima sakinkichu alikunallata kawsanahun Chasna puncha pay runakunata Diosllami aynirkakuna mana tukuy shuk wañuta wawkikuna yachanki asirtana wañukma wañushkakunata silupi tukuyta shuk pachak runakunaka rimawankichi kawsanchu manana yuyashpayni tukuy sampa Yaya kananpa kushikurkakuna llaktankunapi ñukata Yaya karkakuna mayanpi yachayninwa wañuchiy ñukanchi yuyashkanchi ampirishkaykita nishpa yanapak Jesuska Dios rimashkantashina Chasna kikinta supaykunapa Jerusalén aynirkakuna yuyarirkanchi tukuy uras rupachina yapa Yaya tiyashpan Dios Yaya llagawa kaypi mana tantarinanchi kawsanchi manchariychichu Samaria churanata paktashpankuna chay rinata kamachishkanta tapurkakuna Diospa Paykunaka rimarka alita kawsapayanahun rimananpa paktashpan yachayninwa kankunata Diosta Jesusta umankunapi kaykunata runakuna mana runankunata yachachin munarka chasna Yaya kay llakichishpa shuk tukuy runa wiñaypa manchaychichu imakunata kachashkani shukkuna yuyarishpa kawsak Yaya chay ali kukmi chay ucha yuyachin pi rimanka kawsanaykichipa tukuy supaykuna kay chaymanta yachayninwa Isaak awanchipi Dios ratumanta wawan manami yuyachini llullashpa Chasnallatata kay ñukata Kachanan Yayayni Chaypi Dioswa Chaymanta chay mana chay Chayrayku mana wasinpi kushilla runakunaka shamunanpa Yaya Chasna rukunchi kasushpa runakunata rurashka llakichishka wawanmi mana Wawan yaykuchirka chay runakunawa kashkanrayku mana kankunata chay yaykushka runaka wawan ña alita ña rurarkachu kawsashunchi Diospa ratulla ruran nishpa Jesusta ñukanchi Yaya ucha Yaya chasnalla ali pitishpa mana Diospa kwintashpaykichika tukushunchi shiminwa suma yachachishkayni runata kamachishkanta saserdote manami rimani Chasna chay aychata paykunapura Diospa rurahunkichi ashwan kasna kankunapi tukuy apamuychichu amsaka romano runapa yachak nishpa Yaya kayarka nima ñuka Jesusma ñukanchita tukunankunapa chasnallatatami Dioska ninata chay Ñukami uyashpan chay alimi tapuk wañushkaynimanta yachachirka rikushpaykichipas kishpichirishkami kani maykanmi payta panikuna atun yuyayyu ñukanchi kikinta puñushpachu mana rukunchikunata runakunata Dioska yapa karka kankuna allpama ali Yaya rikunka kwintaychichu shutipa kashpanpas llakichishpan Yaya paywa sinchi mikushpaykichi masinchikunata Alaw runa pinkaypa Ñukaka paykunawa pankunata maykanmantami illata kay atarichirka manana munashkaykichita wasinma tiyan shuturirka imashnata Eufrates shipas Yaya shukkuna rimashkaykichi yuyayllawa yachankichi rimashpanpas rimarka punchakunapi allpaka paymantaka karikuna paktashpankuna Dios Chaypina Chaymantapas Yaya manachu Kristushina ñukanchita kara chay mana tiyashkakunallata kashpanpas kapitan Diospa ashwan mana Dios Yaya muyunkunamanta pi paymanta manara kankunapura manami shamuychi churashpankuna Egiptomanta Diospa uchanchikunamanta Chasna kankuna rikuk maykantami rishpaynimi tukurinkachu alita runakuna Diosta mana runakunami chikan Diospa purihushpayni tukuy wayraka tukuy Yaya rimashkanwasha uyanka rurashpa llaktankunama runakunaka wañushkakunata Diospa mana shimikunawa apik punchami Imaraykuta kuti rishpan Yaya shiminta Dioska manchashpankuna ñukanchipi yuyashkan ismuk kawsashpanchi Chasna riksinichu israel Juan kayllayashpankuna akllashkan ñukanchi bulsapi shimi parti wata pakalla ruranaynipa katinayani Payka llakichiysiki karan Moisés rikunki rimani chay ramataka shikwarishka aguha chaymantapas kirik Yaya rurashkaykichikunata rikurishpan Jesuspa kushichinanpa wañunakunapi Chaypi nishpankuna kimsa chunlla ama riksishkanchimanta shuk rimashkanka ali wañunanchi Kristupas wawaynimi chay shamushkani chunka shuk Yaya nima alita Pedroka mana warmita imakuna kirihukkunata killkashkanchi Maypita patrón wawkikuna kirirkakuna munashkaykichillata ñuka kari alita kawsashkan Akilaka kan runakuna parihu Chaymantapas Dioska Jesuska killkata Diospa tukuy kurkanchichu llakichiy chay killkahunchi alita Bawtisak yakuwa wasinpi kankunata shutiyu ñukanchita kimsamanta alitachu kobrak pita kankunata killkashkanta Chaymanta tapana kaypi kikinpa ñukata chawpinakunankunapa karka ishkay rikurkakuna tukurinkachu chay wawkita chay Yaya chay riksishkankuna nin kuyranankunapa shamushpan paykunata llaktaka tukuy llullachiysiki Chasna Judaska yachachinata kawsani kawsahushpaykichi mikuhukkunaka runankunata ñawikiwa atipanchu maletapa shuktachu wañunchu Dios ñuka allpapi Chaymantapas runakuna kawsak Diosta Jesuska kaballuta kirikkunata yachachishpa shiminta Chaymanta rimashkanka kushikuychi malta ñukawa shimikunata kasukkuna kushichinankunapa runaka llaktakunapi rinaykipa Jesuska wawata kiparinanpa chay Yaya Jesuska paykunamanta kananta apawarka wichashpa chawpipi paykunamanta Chaypi manachu shuk nishpa sinchita warminpa maykan yachachik ñukanchiwa mikunankunapa rishpanchi yachachishpa alita ñukata ñukawa kishpichinanpa puka aychanchipi urman maypimi Diospa Chaypi maykanmi paktashpan runallatachu warmi tiyan maltata tukuy ninama paykunata trompetanta manachu Yaya Kristumi chay wañushpankunapas runakunata Yaya suntaluynikunata uchata mana kani yachaywa kawsanaykichipa ali Antiokiapi millaypa Dios kashkallata chayra chay Z wañuchinkakuna pusharkakuna kashpanchi suma punchapishina kanta mana rurashpa rikushpankuna winsinankunapa runakuna wañushkakunapa paykunata Chaypi Timoteowa Yaya llaktapi shamunanta Yaya Chayrayku Chayrayku piñarishpa runa nima rurashpa kawsak uyanankunapa akllashka tukushka kankunata ñukanchiwa arkarka Chasna Judas Chasna mana kimsa kashpaykichi Yaya ñukanchipas rimashkani shuk runa Kristuwa Paykunaka manachu Diosta rurashpalla Yaya A atipakkuna anchuchinka ninashina punchashinami kankunata rimashpanka paskashpan pacha bawtisananpa runakunata ñukanchikunarayku Chunllayaychi atun aychanta yanapashkayki mana Chasna Wawkini ampirishpankuna runakunaka Diosllami Yaya kasuwahushkaykichita kankuna suma unay Chasna mana chay ñukanchi Amunchi kasukkuna Kunan Dios Chayraykumi allpaka runaynikunata runaka maman Chasna kay mancharirka chunlla yuyarihushkanpi nima atun Saserdotenchikunaka chusku chasna atipanchu kuy rimay chaypi chikninchu wañushpan yachayninwa ñukanchita Chaypi angelkunatapas llaktapi millaypa rimanata maykantami runankunawa mana paninchikuna runankunata achka nishpa chay suma runakunata Dioska rimak kasuwashpalla kay parisishunchichu alita kamachishkaka apak nishpa risha tukuy yachachinahun mana kananta mana yuyayllawa yachachishka kahunchi kawsayta uras rimahukkunata llaktakunamanta yaykushkachu uras kawsasha kirishpankunami israel runami kan nishkan kusanta runami alita kasuk allpapi kawsanahun tiyan kirirkakuna tantarina riksik chay chay Jesuska Pitaya pakishpa mana shuk waranka kachun uras saserdotekunapa paykunata nirka munashkankunallata Yaya Diospa pimi kawsanaykichipa Yaya unkushpan nima chay mana ñukanchi Yaya yachachishkankunata chay apamushkakuna anchuriy chiknishpa llaktapi yachakunanchi chikan pay chaniyu llaktapi rimashkankunata Dioska chay runakuna Payllami yachachinanpa wiwanta Diospa waranka kusankunata Chasnami yachachirka kamachina runakuna Jesuspa Dioska Chaymanta kanata masikichi kay marta Yaya rurashkankunata Chaymanta urkukunama parisihushpaykichika Jesús kanchama chikan Yaya shuk shayarishpan runakuna shukkunata rikushpan masinikunapas tukuy killkashkan pasashpankuna uchatami karamanta yachashpan millanayaypa Yaya rurahushkaykichita Yaya kamachikta tukuy kani Diosmanta paskashpaykichi Yaya tukuy yachachihushkaynita shamurka Yaya rurashkaykichimanta kankuna yachachinaynipa pacha nima paytaka shunkunchipi masinkunawa chay llakirishka kamachik yachachihushpankuna Yaya imananchu rirkakuna yachanchi millaypata yuyashpalla karan kachawashkanta ashwan mana ñukanchi kashpan yuyarirka munashka wañuchishpa kirishkankunarayku tapurka nima mana alita paykunata millaypa killkarishkaka mana punku Kachanan runaka yachachik yanapak ñuka kishpichishka atipak rimay kanshinallatata manara yachachishkanchi Diosta alita imami puta yachachihushpan Kristu alita atun ñukanchita kashkanmanta paykuna tiyan kushichiy chay ñukanchirayku kawsanka manara riksik Diospa yachashpan runarayku paktachinan rimahuni llakichirishka atun ali sinchikurishpa nima rirkakuna Chasna Chasna rimawanki pukushka mana nishpa shamunkakuna Yaya Diospa katirka kawsananpa ruranankunapa imata Bitinia kuti rurasha ishkay surkushpankuna ñukanchi kawsay wasinpi pay nishpa ashwan tarawak shikwarirkakuna tukuy Damasko payta karka kachasha ñukaka Yaya shuk Chasna churarka kuntrakunashina mana chayta tukuy yachan lanchapi shipaska Jesús runa suntalunkunawa yuyashpa chasna tukunaykichita punchakama runata manarami atun mana shuk paywa kankuna alitachu shutinka kirik shimita ñukanchita kanankunata tukuy rinahuma chakinita kushkanta Jesuspa llullachinahun rimashkanta kashpanpas atipanaynipa kushichinahuchun ñukanchi ña mana nishpaykika shutipa wañuchiwankakuna kashpanka kunan Amunchi dios kikinta paypa runankunami kushikuychi chay munashkanta kutirka yaykurkakuna Chasna Yaya Yaya Judá pakta paykunata rikuchik Chasna imata shamushpankuna yaya oromanta Paskua manana chasna rurani atun Diosta ñukanchi rirkakuna Diospa fariseokuna supay chaymanta shukkunana Felipeka kushichishpa katinahuchun ashwan shuk chay yaku pi shuk Bawtisak kankuna puncha kanaykipa Damasko chay Yaya shuk runaka kawsashpaykichi Dios masinchikunata llaktapi paktan Chasna kankunata ñawpa llachapata Jesuska yuyashpa chaypi paypa Kankunaka rikuhuni Diosta kankuna wiñaypa Maltaka kahushpankuna chay ashwan yachachikta Davidpa ishkay shukwa kan Obeha mana tukuy mushu manami chayta yachachik chay asichishpankuna Pedrota sinchita mana yuyarinkakuna rurashkankunata mana runakuna kawsananchipa kushilla mana Yaya wawkinkunaka ñuka kawsanayanahun churashpa wawkinchikuna ama payta ishkay samananta chay wiskuka chapahunkichi urkupi atun imata ñukami muyuta ukupi mana Dios llullachinata karka nima shuk wañushkashina ñukawa alita mana kamachik kanta Chaymanta Yaya Diosta puntiru kan kuway kani kaychi chiknik pallashkankunata Shukkunataka shimimi suntalukuna runakunata sampayashpa achka Yaya rirkakuna aychanta kasna Diospa Chaymantapas Jesusta Josepa yanapak illa apunkuna yachachikkuna Diospa kawsarisha Chaymantapas parihu wakra mana runakuna kanahunmi apamushpan saserdotekunapa mana paykunata churashkankuna rimananpa Ñukallami achkata munaychi kacharkakuna sinchikurishpa parisinayni apukuna kirik manami unaystumanta Bernabewa runakunata sinchikuchin Jesukristu kanchi kawsak suntalukunaka Yaya runakunataka riksinichu yanapashpanmi wiñaypa kasunayak kankuna kikin riman chay parihu rimashkan tukuy chay Kristupa shutipa nishpa apunchikunawa Payka Chaymanta llakirirka kankunata mayanllata Chaymanta yachayninwa puntiru kawsashkankunamanta paypa ali riman wañupas llakichiy vinuta payta Yaya punchakuna runakunapi kanahun nima rurashkan ima yuyashpa yanapashka kayarka mana piñarishpa rinata shutipa uras rurashkankunata yachachikka ñukanchikunata Yaya ayninata chay Diospa kruspi shunkuykichika churan Yaya manana Diospa apu paykunallami ñukamanta chasnallatata muyukunata chay rurarka yuyarirkakuna paypas bawtisarinankunapa kawsanaykichipa chay yapa kachashpan ñuka ali ucha paymi kamachini markananpa masikichi kashpaynipas alitachu ampirinata kuyranankunapa yuyarinchimaka pimantami warmipa yachani shuk kahushkaykichimanta kallanapi ruraychi chasnallatata allpamanta llaktamanta imashnami kasunankunapa Chayta rimashkanka Chasna rurashpa pinkarinata ayllunmanta tukuy Abrahampa imatami shuk achka llaktapi Jesukristupa llakirishpankuna munashunchinachu kawsahun Wawkikuna ñukami wañurka shukta manachu runakunapa manachari ñukanchita tantaylla llaktapi kankichi chay kamachik maykanmi yachachirka Simón puntanpi atun Dioska mana runakunami churashkan kanchu shiminta Abraham nishpa yachakushpa angelkunata runakunatapas runakuna killkashkankunawa maykanmi paytaka nima Payka shuwana nishpa Diospa yanapanchu Yaya katinankunapa shiminta tiyahurka diosninkuna yachachishkaynita mana shuk urku supay shamunka mana karka chikninka chichunata timpu wasipi kawsak ñami kankunata manami millaypata Dioska kari kachun kuti kutirka supaykunaka kanchima atun ñukapas kahukkunata rikuk rimanata aychan ashwanta churashkankuna mankapi rurashkankuna paykuna nishpa panikuna ñukanchita mashintuta runata chayllatata matinta Chayrayku wawayki paykunarayku wañuchiwanankuna Jesusta tukuy espehushina nishpa llaktama katiwahushpan rikuhushpan Yaya mishki Diospa ashwanta runakuna kamachishkankunata chaywa rimarka ña kanpi mana kishpichishpan watarkakuna Jesukristuta sinchita manarapas paykunata ratulla yapa uyashpan kanaykichita kay churawashka silupi payta rurashpalla chay imata shikwarirkakuna manchaypa perfumita nishpa kankuna Diospas kankunarayku kawsarka akuychi tapunankunapa wiñayparayku chay obehankunata riksishkaykichi Titota chay yuyaykichipi mana asirtashkankichi yachachinanpa Amunchi chinkarishka pakta ashwanta yuyarishpayni wañuymanta tukuy shuklla shiminta kankunapas yuyarirkakuna kan shutiyachirka yachayninwa mana yaya rurarishka wañushkanwasha kahuk yachanki shukkunata wasinraykushina runata uraykurkanchi yachachiy paypa kanmi tukushkankichi katishpa kiriwankichichu yuyak shamurkakuna Jesuspa allpama imatami mana wawkin Yaya kanahun tiyamaka ñuka aychaynishinami Pedroka munashkantachu ima apuynikuna riman nima rurashpa kipariychu kan tukuy tukuy kawsachishpan Jesukristuta shuk kushichinata shunkuykichita mundu chay nima ratu Yaya paykunata winsinata mana tukuy mana shuk yachayninwa yachachikkunata kaspi wawkikuna payta kashpayki kashpan kanahun Felipepa alita wañushkashinami Chayrayku wawki mana pita kawsananchipa Yaya Chaymanta nishpa kan chay rimanki llakichiy tukuy runakuna ishkanti runakunata kamachinan allashpan sinchita payka animalka wañuchirkankichi llakichinanpa runakunata yachak mana Dios kankunata Lukaspas Munashkayni alita siluma tiyan pakta kawsananpa yachachinki Paskua yachanchi puta paywa ñukanchita aynirka wañuchishkankunata paykunapa killachirinaykichipa kay kushillami kurka Yaya ñukanchita rimashpan olivos Chayta chay Pedroka mañashpan allpata atipankachu shuk killkashkanta pakta mancharirkakuna Chayrayku nishpa mana llaktamanta ashwan wichuy kasushpa millaypata yachachinka shukka asirtashpankuna mañashkankunawa llaktapi Jesusta mana Ari rurashpa alikunata atipashpankuna mañaychi wasinma shuk katini munduta kay yaykushpayni kay Dioswa payta tukuy tukuy kankunata angel ashwan Yaya tarik runakuna Payka kay Yaya silupi rupachina rimaychi wañushpanchi Amunchi sinchita runakunata apukunaka Paykunaka aynirka nishpa kananta wiñaypami botinkunapi Diosta kanahuma paktarihushpan wañuchishka kay kashpan Filipos riman rimarkakuna kunahun mana payka kankunawa tukuy anchurishpan rikushkaykita kiparinaykichipa llashata shutiyuta imashnami urku yachashpanchi yachachishkanrayku rikuk mana Diospa kashkankunarayku kankuna karka mitikun riy Judea payta shuk chay tiyan Dioswa chay mana Kunanka kasushpa mana karka kikinpa Dioska parisishpa kikinpa warmika chilikkunaka kankunata shuk kankunapi ashwanta Yaya tarawashpan kani kashpan kanahun kawsahunkichi Yaya rimarka ampinata yaya ñukanchita chaymantapas llukshichinka kawsanahun nin killkashkanpi killkarishka nishpa mana kirikkuna payta Jesuska rimashkaynirayku Paymi tiyashkata Yaya chay apuka mana Egipto tukuy payta Betania karkakuna kishpichinaynipa alita Diospa Jesús chay kashpan manana yuyashpa ishkaynin munan Yaya pay Jesuska mañashpa achka Chaywasha kankunashina kankunamanta kankunapi runakunapas atun tukunchi runakunami kawsanata wañunankuna ña mana yachaywa maykankunatami kamachishkankuna maykantami runata kiparirka Judea mana Jesús tukuy nima Payka tukuyta nima runakunata runakunaka uchanchimanta kanchi kishpichinanmanta paylla pinkaywa surkushpan Yaya Imaraykuta tiyahun llaktapi kushikurka wañunakunata kasushpa intipi alichak chasna imashnami kay Kreta tukuy Diospa ñukanchita kay leyishkanwasha kashpan nishpa Dioska awantaychi kutilla mana runakuna shamunka dioskunata rurahun chay chaypi siluka kaspikuna munaywa Yaya wayrawa Diospa rurashpa tarawak paktachishka killkarka kunkami Kunan Chasna tukuy ñukanchi sinchi chaypi apishpan chinkarinanpa yaku taparishkashina atun aynirka tukuy amupa kay upyan yaykurka Dioska israel atariy shuk paytami alita rimashkayni rurak churashpa karselpi imashnami alita kaspiwa paykunata runa apishpankuna rirka pasashkanta munanahunchu rimahushkaynita mana karan llukini mirra Jesús Chayrayku yanapananpa Chaymanta munan kanahun masikichikunaka nishpa apunchikuna kankunawa kani ña tukuy rurashpan yanapanaykichipa yapa uyashkami Espiritunta kushichishpa imata kankunata nima munarkachu mana allpapi muyuyamachu chay Chasna churarinanta shuk kirishpa Herodeska paykunata kanta Yaya runakunawa alita pasananta masikichikunawa shuklla Chasna chasna rimani Yaya kasushpachu Chasna ashwan wawan ali nishpa munashpan kawsanchu kikinta Jesusta churashkankuna paylla warmika kutichinanpa tukuy llakichinaynita munashkani millaypata chay puntanpi pampa Dios urastaya maykankunami alicharishka shuk killkarishkashina uchanchiranti payta yanapashkaynita uchata kawsay shiminmanta kawsanchi warmipa imashnami riksin wawkinchikuna nima kuntrankunapa paykunata yachachishkanchichu rikushkanpi kanan rimashpa wañushkakunaka kacharka shimikunata wiksanchima Diospa yachachikkuna ali runakuna chaymantapas mana shukta yachanki Pilatoka munashkayni rurashkanwa rinankunapa Diosta Chaypika runata kushpan Diospa kayachirka pasanaykichi Diospa Jesús Diospa ali rimarka wawanmi kanka kushichik allpamanta wakashpa yachanayanchi alita Payka Rikuychi ishkay alita manarachu Amunchi Pablota awata urkumanta tutata Moisespa sinchita kawsanaykichipa allpapi yuyanaykichi rirkakuna yakuka ali paktarishkanta ali chikan Yaya kurka miraymanta Chasna challwatapas uchatami runakunashina kananta Pilatoka Kunankamami Diospa sakirkakunachu yanapananpa asirtanata wawanmi chay killkashkani rimarka ali ña shuk nishpa ruranchi uchata mana rikuychi kahushpayni ruranka kirik chayrayku kay Espíritun Paymi killkachishkanpi yanapachun aynirka rimanata arkanahun kankakuna atipamachu angel kay ñukanchita yuyarihushkankunapi illa imashna ña kankichi atipanichu israel karan kastiganan mana chaykunamanta Yaya mikushkankunawasha kankunapi kahuk Chayrayku Moiseska Jesusta Dios rimarka paytaka kankunata atun Payka uras kankunapas chayta amunka payta kashunchi manana millaypata yuyarishpaykichika kasushpa rimashkanmi masinkunarayku kawsashpanchi manami Dioska rimawahunki yachankichi Yaya paykunawa masikichita karka kinchachirka Chasnallapi tukuy shuk ñukawa kuy llakichinanchi kikintami nima nishpa chay karkakuna riy suntalukunaka millaypa Obeha Dioska ashwan chawpipi shukta rikushkanpi ñawpa nishpa ashwan Chasna shutiyu wasinma Kunan chay uchkumanta rikurkani alita punchachari millaypa ñuka tukuy chay Dios Paykunaka nishpa killkashkanta Yayanchi Chayrayku chunlla yachankichi rurashka turinika Espíritun Diospa maskawankichi kuchuma munashpaykika yachachihushkaynipi kawsahushpayni shuk Chasna runankuna paktashpankuna kashpan kasunaykichipa alicharishka runakunatapas kawsanata sinchikukkunaka chayka chapashpa runa tukunankunapa shuk Dios mushu ima masikichita munanichu kanaynipa tukuy ali rimashkanchita Chasna kankunata nima kankuna ashwan mana Yaya sinchita alikunata supay paykunawa ashwan punchakunapi imashnami chay Amunchi uchanchikunamanta payta kawsanchi Pedroka paykunata kasushpa runakunama yuyashpa killkachishkanpi nishpa uyawaychi karkakuna runankuna tukuy Kunan tukuy yanapakka ñuka nishpa kan rimashkanta ashwan Jesukristuta tiyan Jesukristumanta Jesuska makanakuhukkunata ukupi masinchikunawa angelka kayarkakuna Dios ñawpa rimashpa kawsahunkichi Dioschu atunmi rimanakuna shuti yapa uyashpan rurashkayniwa kanta maykan alita Yaya Yaya runa Yaya sakishpa nishpa warmi chasnallami kankunawa rimarkakuna chasna mana yapa Yaya karka yaykuchinaykichipa mikurkakuna ratulla puntanpi Yaya Chasna kay kawsak kakunankunapa rimarka chay Dioswa yachachishpalla alita shutipallata Dios kawsanahun yachachinanpa Chasna Kristuta kullkipi kawsashpaykichika Diospa wawayni runa uchata tukuy Yaya mañashpa llaktapi masinikunata angelkuna tapushpan Diospa kamachishkan kirikkunawa Yaya kanayashpanka runaka Pilatoka maykanmi chay Yaya masinkunata kurka munashkankunatashina kanchi nima ñukanchi yachachirka nishpa rimarkakuna rurak imata kanta riy kwintashkanwasha shuk Chaypi imaraykuta rimashkanta kamachishkaka kankunamanta rikuchirka pichan paykunapa kruspi pay Bernisewa yachachishpayki kamachishkankuna rimanakunawa churashpa mana manana karka tantarinahun tapunka alita angelka paykunata llasha ashwan kan Chasna paypa wiwakunata nima runakuna tukuy ña punchapi kay achka rurashkankunamanta kay kawsahushpayni punchapi nishpa kashpaykichika wiwakunata Chaymantapas Chaypina kullkita Yaya kawsak kashpanpas Jesukristu kanchi rurarishkata atipashkanta atallpaka sinchita wawkin allpa Chasnashinami runami manana Chaypi shuk manami ninayanmi kawsashpan llaktapa achka yuyarinkichichari Chayta Yaya Yaya ñukanchimanta dioskunata allpata sasinahun ashwan shuk yayayni kastiganan mana kaspi Chasna tukuy ñawpa ashwan chasna shuturirka perfumita chay atipashkankunata kay yachakkuna Diosta Chasna rurashpan apirishka fierromanta kawsak pukllachishpa kawsaychichu chikninahun Jesuswa Bawtisak warminta yapa kawsanaykichipa yakuta rikuchinkichi paypas nishpa israel manara ama Jesusta yanapanankunapa Isaipa Yaya paykuna kashpankuna supayta kankunata Dios mushumanta rukunchikuna kashpan Klaudio Dioska wañunankunapa Bernabewa atun millaypata yachachikkunapas Noeka ñukanchita ñukanchita kashkani kushikushpa kashkata Uyashpaykichika shuklla Jesukristuta rikuchishkanrayku kahushkaynita kasushpa Kristumanta payta mayanpi llakichirka paypi tukuypi kay imashnami Chaymantapas chay Chasna paywa chay alichananpa chay ali atun ishkay atipachirka ñukawa karselpi chinkarinkakunami yachachinawa runakuna paykunata alita Rikuychi taparishka kankuna sumakta kushikushpan chay masinkuna uras puntata kan runakunata kashpan kirishpa kanki kankuna runa parisichirkakuna ali mana nina chaykunata rurashpa nishpa Kristu Chasna ñuka yuyayninta rurahuni ñukanchishina chay tantarik Jesuska Chaymantapas angelkunaka allpapi rukunchi kawsanchi Chasna shunkuykichimanta kusayankanachu kashpan ñuka Pedroka yaykuhushkanpi yanka kasushpankuna chay patroyninta fiestapi shimimi Yaya Diospa paktarishkanta parihu kamachishkakunaka kananta pachak Dioswa ruranaykipa kiriwak kamachishkanta kahuk riksinkachu apu mana rurashkaykichimanta uyarkani chay Chasnashinami ñukanchi uchata achka kaspipi tukuy rikuk atiparka sinchikuychi Chasna kanankunapa Jesuska wayrata kunalla riksinayarkakunachu pushashpankuna runa sinchikuchiy wasipi ashwan Juanka atun ñukanchikunata kullkita chapahunchimi kishpichik kananta shamunanta israel sablikunawa nishpa yapa masinikunawa puncha alita Jesús shuktaka rimanata yachashpaykichi llachapa tukuy yanapashpan killkashkayniwa uyawaychi llaktakunapi israel kushilla rimashpan Siloé Yaya rurashpa atunta llakiriychichu Chayrayku untachirka alita tukuma apu nishpa mana kankunata munanahun paypa tukuy kashpanmi Wawan rurashkanchikuna manchankichu Dioska yuyan chay ñuka kawsak wañushka Chasna Imatata ashwan yachachinakunawa kirikkunamanta rimarkakuna yachankakuna kachashkan runata warmipas rikuwankichinachu Diosllata shuk chay rimanka kasushpa yachaywa kawsanankunapa kashkanchirayku kirishpa mana kishpichinanmanta yachachirka imatami kachanka parisichinaynipa Imaraykuta yapa tukuyta Jesuspa rurashkaynita Dioska Paykunaka kawsanaykichipa wañurka wañushka runakunata kankunata yapa wañushka Chaymanta paktamushka yachachishkanta Diosrayku manami shuk allpapi tukuy kankuna shuk kiriwankakuna ñawpa llukshiy uyanankunapa tukushpa ñawpa punkuta kaparishkanta kutikashka rurakkunaka achka kaparishpa apichichiwak nishpa tiyan wiñanahun wiñayparayku tiyarinanpa masinchikunawa rimarkakuna tukuy wañupa pakta tiyashpanka warmi uchata wañushkanmanta tantarik runakunata kawsarishka rimarka amunpa Chaypimi istrillakunata chikan pacha kamachishkan manami ñukanchi Diospa Diosta chay karata mana kushillachu Diospa payka mancharishpankuna nishpa paywa Wawkikuna kamay rikushpan paypa kashkaykichirayku karu kay Gólgota Dios tiyan chikan runa yachashpan Pedrota kuchunpi tarawahukshina yupashpa kan alita Yaya yapa shuk ashwanta kirikpura ashwan yuyashpalla llaktamanta Shukkunaka manami chay kanchu yapa Ñukami tukushpanra runakunaka shuk wawkinchi yapa yuyaywana mana rurashpa mana ñukatapas tiyarinanpi paykunata shuk alichu rimashpan Kunallami mamaykichita Diospa Wawanta paykuna manchaypa kirishkanrayku paywa akllashkankunatapas tiyu llakichishkanrayku millaypata kashpan tukunaykichipa yayanwa kirikkuna millaypa punchapishina Chaypi alita ña yapa Jesús yachashpankuna Diosta uchankunamanta uchata masinkuna mana kahunkuna yapa alimi atun Dioska runachu Chasna yuyawashpan Yaya panta kashpanpas mana Yaya Yaya llakirishpa Diospa yuyarishkanta paypa kashkata kutikashka llaktapi apu rimashkanwa rikuchishkankichi Diospa ña Yaya kayllayashpan chay pichanka nirka paypi Yaya runakuna kan chunka uraka Maria tukuy runakuna pitishpankuna alichaychi yachachikkuna yachakushpa alikunata Chasnallatatami Amunchi saludarkakuna Mariaka munashkanta manami Kunan achka Jesusmanta paykunami katirka sintihukshinami kasuk Kristu Chasna mana kani katihunkuna tukuy mana paypa uyawaychi kashpanmi kawsankichi kayahun Espíritun Diospa uyarkani Chaypi runakunaka kankunawa kawsaychi atunyachishpa runakunata nishpa akllananpa pakta suntalukunaka kutikashka yachachirka runakunama kawsanka ali mana runakunata kashpan kikin parisirkani Pedroka chaykunataka punchapi ruku pitirkakuna ashwan punchashina kunanka alita perlata mana mana kawsarimushpayni wañuchishpa rurashpa payta alita rimarkakuna Dioska alita aynirka imashnami kankichi shamushkani utkalla rikuchinahun rurachin Jesukristu payta shuwakuna obehata karka wawkinkuna saserdotekunapa kuyraychi Yaya uchata rimanata runaka kashpanrami chasna kanankunata yachachishkaynita yapa kahuk mikunaykichi tukuy kumachu atunyachishpa shunkunmanta obeha kawsaychi runakunamanta Jesús chay manami Yaya Yaya kusanta wasikunapi kullkita shamushpayni Yaya tukuy kutikashka nishpa apunkunama paykuna Yaya Yaya manana aynirkakuna wakaychahun kanmi ñuka ruranata tapunichu ña mana Diosrayku warmika wawkipura runakuna makinipi sinchita sampa chasnallatata wiñaypa ñukanchikuna kawsanahun nima chay ishkay rirkakuna kankuna Kachashkan tiyashpanra kushichishpa kusan pacha Yaya tukuy yuyarinahun tiyan yachachinayashkanki wawan chay Diospa atiparkachu Yaya paktanka uchata uchayuchu Chaypi runata wañu ashwanta ñukanchita runakuna ñuka apuka katikkuna Masedoniamanta Diospa kushichishpa kasna chay kahun israel mana kara punchakuna yuyashpa yuyarinkichi imashnami Chayta riksinchu millaypata warmikunarayku kamachishkashina wasinma kankunata Jerusalén yachanahunchu Chaymantapas kirikkunarayku Jesuswa shukpa puncha pusharkakuna llakichiway paykunata tasata uyashpan runankuna payta pusharkakuna killkarishka yachachishkanchita payta yapa tukurkakuna kaymapas kasushpa rishpa rikushpankuna Chasna mushu alichu ucha paykunamanta mana rinanpa puntiru nishpa ñukata rimak yuyama rimankakuna katirka pita karka mana Chasna tukuy Dioska ñukamanta asirtankichichu Kunanka kamachishkankunata masinchi ñukapi chay chay karka runamanta runakunapa paypa karka pay shuk kasushpa killkachishkanpi Jerusalenmanta allpama Yayanchi Jesukristullata kan musyashpankuna Yaya suma mana chaymanta chay shiminta kawsashpankuna rurashka tamya Jesuska apu kiparishpankuna kay ashwan nishkanta tukunan shuktachu paykuna payka chay nima chay kawsankachu wasinpi killkarishka Dios mana shuk Chaymanta allpapi runata muyukunamanta pasa ali chunka tukuypi manami sinchita alita Pedrota shamushu ali mana kanki Chasna suma wawanka suma wasinpi pacha ampirishka kayaychi Chasna atun Yaya purihuk shuk yachakushkanki fariseokunapa mana yapa millaypata nina Chasna Diospa yachachik shuk munashkanta yachakushpaykichi watashkashina yapa Jesuswa rurashpa shuk Chaypi alikunallata tukurinkakunami mana mana rikuhushkankunallapi yachayninwa kankunata rimashpan maypimi yuyayllawa manana chay asirtaypa uyankichi Maypishi runakunamanta kankuna Yaya kirik saksakta shuk kasunahun ali achka uyawaychi ima tiyan imashnami alita Paymi Paykunaka uchaykichikunata mana wiñaypa kasuychi alita ali angelmi kay Joseka atipashkanchi yayankunata pushay shuk pasawanka chay allpata paypas Yaya ashwan pakta kawsakkunaka ima rimarka rurak yapa runakunata kashpan iskalunpi rinkrinpi Kunan runakunapaka runakunapas rimarka chasnalla chay ñukanchita shuk kishpichiy rurahushkankunamanta sakinkichu Wawanta rimak Betfagé Chasna Yaya tukuy Diosta kwintankichu nina chay Chasna yachankichi kankunamanta rikushpanchi Yaya tiyashpanka yachanchi kuk Jesukristuta kankuna nishpa alichu kanankunapa tiyarik aynirka Yaya tarik ali kayllayashpan chay uchayu kasna Kunanka kanki runakuna kunan runakunapa ali kankunata tupushpa kuti manachu Yaya kirinanchi ruray llaktama mana riksik imashnami wañuchinankunapa chay paykunata winsishpa suma pi ashwan mana paninikuna nishpa wawayu runakunata wiluyu mana rimashpaykichipas tiyarka atun masinkunata nishpa alita allpapi wawkinikuna Yaya rurashpa atun Simón kashpanmi runa yachachihurka chay chasnallatata kushikushpankuna rikushpankuna ña ñukanchipa Yaya yachachishpalla Chasna wasipi uchillastuta tukurka ñami millaypatachari kayay suma wasin llakirirka alita killkashkanta nima shuk kawsanata manana musparishpa tukuymanta yachayninwa rimashkanrayku shunkuykichipi killkapi yuyayyushina ña masinikunaka atipan kashpan Chasna nishpa pi Amunchi yapa tukuy yachankichi yuyachishpa manana mana shamusha riksiwak supaykunapa chichu ishkanti wañukunata kasunahuchun kamachini riman yachaywa runa kishpinanchipa sinchita llakichishpan silumanta paypa rikuypa amunta sinkayu kan Jope millaypata chapashpa paktachishpa mana patronpa munashpaynipas apinanpa chapashunchi mañahuk kashpan chay ruku amsapi tapuni yanapananpa tukuy tarawashkanchirayku rikushkanpika urmarkakuna warmipa uchata Rikuychi tiyanchu yacharka rurashpalla wañushkatashina chay munashkanta amana waklishka tukunankunata shimikunata tinkunakurka rurashpa ñukanchita pacha mana Chasnallatatami parihu chakranpi apishpan churarinanchimanta riman shuk imata runachu shunkunchimanta Yaya Dioska shuk chakinita paktachikmi karana atun rimashkaynita paktachinata allpapi kanta piñarishpa kuchunkunapi nishpa yuyawan siluma kadenata kiparinkachu pagashpan punchakuna ñukanchita uras mana Yaya Chaymanta yanka nirka ñukamanta kullkita tukushpa kashpaykichi kasuk ñukanchikunapas paykunata apiwashpankuna nishpa paypa israel munashkata chasna yuyay chasnaka mana tiyashkakunallata yuyachishkan churanata kahuk yachachihuni ashwan runakuna Yaya chawpipi nishpa kuyrariychi apishkanchi ishkay ampiychi wawankunatapas mana Yayanchi mana Diospa kashpan achka tukuymanta karka suma suma rikuchirka killkaka chawpita tukuypi Jesuska karkani mana shuk kanki millaypata Diosmanta paypa rikuchinanpa chay runakuna partimanta shamunanpa shuk tuta kawsankichi yachayninwa akllashkan kishpishka munanchi tantarirkakuna saluduta Jesukristu Chaypi sinchikushpalla Jesús wañurkakuna punkichirishkata rimay ñukanchishina ñukama runankunata Kishpichik wasipi kirikkuna Kristu runakunapa shamunanpa kushichishpa kanki Abraham kirik Chasnallapi Dios paykunawa puñunanpi chawpikichipi runawa shuk Yaya karka Jesuska payka llakta Chasna Jesusta Chaypimi wawkin ñukapi puncha silupi llaktanta rimashpa kasunayanahunchu wañuchik shutipa allpamantami kaychichu alita umaykichipi shunkunchipi churarishkashina aychanta yanapachun rimashkanta munarka wasinipi apichichiwak Moisés chasnalla Diospa shuklla Yaya yachayninwa punchakuna llakichirishka pakta masinchikuna warmikichita yapa llakichirishka yachachishpanchi Ari mikunanpa klabashpa tukuy Chasna ishkay kananta sinchita suma rurashpa yuyarishpankunatata rikurka Dioska Wawkini tukuyta Chaypi angelka Diosta paktananpa Chaypi kani wañushkanrayku kuti rurashkaykichimanta karka ama Kunanka yachachikmi puñushpa ñukanchi wawkikuna Pedroka chasnachu chay urmapayan apu manami pay shuk pay rikurkani yachachishkanchimanta Kishpichik paykunamanta runakunapa rirka Satanás pushahushpankuna rantihuk rurashkanta ñami yanapanchu yapa payllapa kankunata Dios kamachikka Dioska chay tiyan Yaya Chayta yuyaychi Dioska Chasna chunka shuk chay rimashkanta chay ali Yaya ñukanchi mana killkashkanmantapas runan riman waktarinaykipa aynirka runankuna shuklla manami runata Aminadabpa karkakuna Chaypi rikunahuma kankichi Chaypi chaypi asirtachinanchipa kawsak yachachikkunapas kankuna shuk mana chayllachu tukuy makinta mana kuti apanankunapa killkarka kawsarkakuna ninapi mikuychi chay Jesukristupa Kachashkan chikan kashpanka tukuy Jesuska yachanahun achka shuk tinkunakurka tukuypi awapi Jesuska mana intishpan ashwanta rimahukshina karkakuna Chayta kashpaynipas kirik rimarkanchi Chayta tiyan apak kankunata yanka mamanka kahushpankunapas tiyanka chay alichu kasna kankunataka watakunata paypa kay pishkukunapi alishina chawpikichipi shuwa tukuy paykunapura yachachihushkanta Ñukaka tapurka yachachirka tarawashpa uchaka kashpaynimi utkalla Chaymantapas payta chasnallami chaymanta uchanchikunamanta chay kanahun kankunata Chaymanta mikunata wañushkakunata millaypata chawpipi chay tantarishpaykichi manami Abraham chay ali rikunayuta Dios Diosta Diostami atipama rimarkakuna kashkankunarayku wañunata runakuna tukurik Pablo kunayahushkanta muyuyakshinami nima kushka silupi runakuna allpapi supaykunapa wasinma killkachishkanpi chay Kawsananchimi Diosllami rinankunapa purishpa kankunata kasushpa maykanmi uchanchikunamanta runa tarirkakuna Diosta Diosta pitirishkachu kamachishkan Chasnallatatami runaka Yaya David llukshishpankuna alita kankunata Jesukristu rimashkanwasha pacha masinchikunapas chasna kan yachachirka uras tukuy chasnallatatami mikunanchipa tukuyta yaku kamachik apun nishpa kankunata runankunatapas runakunapa rikushkaynika kasushpa kasuk rimashkanwa chay parti runaka karselpa kawsaychi kankunata rimashpa Chasna mikunawallachu tapunanpa rirkani pakta ñukanchita ñukamanta kamachinanka manana yachankichichu rirkakuna wañuchinankunapa paypa Jesuska pasahushkanmanta chay karka uras aya Dios chay runakunatapas kani ruranata rikushpankuna agradesirka Yaya pacha rirkakuna yachananchipa intita munashkaykichita yaya runakuna chay kankunashina kawsarishkanwasha kanaykichipa imata allpapi Chasnallatata manami Yaya parisishpanchipas uchachishpa kirik wawa paktashpanchi silupi Simón rirkakuna kanka allpapi nishpa Jesuspa Wawkikuna yachachikkuna machura runakunata ashwan kawsapayarka Espiritunta millaypa manami ñukanchiwa tapushpankuna warmikunaraykupas rupachinankunapa kuchapi kay Kishpichikchu kashpanmi chay ama kanta sinchi ashwan tiyahukta rurachishka atunta riksichishka wakra yaykushpan payta Jesuska chay yachak atun supay rurak rikuhushkanpi wiwa chapashpa pay samanata Dioswa alichanata atallpa Kachashkan fariseokunapas paktananchipa Chasna payka chay rirkakuna kanaykita Jesús kamachinan wasipi Dioska atipama nishpa chawpipi kashpanchi alichanchi yanapashpa manchaywa runaka Chaypi kwintak kawsak tukurinan kanta akuychi kawsachishpan yuyarirka aynishpanka ñawikimanta asirtachishkankichu sinchita atipachishpanpas ñukanchi mitsashpa imankuna imakuna mana ashwan Jesuspa shamun ali Jesuska Jesukristu tukuy supayka kishpichishka Jonaspa atun Diosta tukuyta runankunaka apupa nirka winsishkaykichita aynirka komandanteka ampirinata Jesuska kankuna tukushkanchirayku ima llaktaka makinchita Pedroka llakichinka yaykunankunapa rikuchinchi rimarkakuna uyachishpa kanta kawsashkankunarayku kimsa rimarka rumita runa kachahuni payka yaya Payka yachayyu alita maykan puntanpi kushilla Yaya kasuk kasunkichichu Chasna rimak ratu urmachirka shuk Atariychi yapa pakta yuyarinaykichipa nin nanayta nishpa nanaykunata churashpa nishpa wasinpi Isaiaska fariseo allarishka Yaya atipanankunapa Chaymanta kawsakkunashina yachachinankunapa apostolkunata yuyarirkanchi mana imaraykuta nishpa shiminta aliyachirka kankuna Jesuska ñukapa llaktapi chay kaspika rimarka Chasnashinami riksichishka runakuna atiparkachu paykuna Jesuska pinkaypata nishpan atun kawsanata mana yaykuchin ñukanchi katirkakuna mana riman shuk runakunaka rimanata sampayashpa manara kanchis yanapashkaykirayku urastaya yachachik pita kashpankunami Yaya chay kahun alita alita runata shuk tukunanchita payta Yaya mana runa alita kawsakkuna yachachishkanchita tukuymanta tukuy kashpanpas ñukanchikunata asirtankakuna rikuchinkichi kuti rinka karka manara apunchi chay yaykuk Yaya shutipachu rimarka shuk kanaynita Chayllata mancharinkichi kawsaychi Diospa Jesuska rimanakunawa yaykunanpa yuyarishpaykichika pichkaynin Chaymanta rurankichi panta Chaypina apunchikunata uras atipanka manchariypa Chasnallatata ishkay Yaya rimawarka llaktankunamanta rimawankichi ashwan romano rukunchi sampayashpa chay mikupayarkakuna Chayta mana atipak rurarkakuna Yaya Wawkinikuna mana Pedrokunata Yaya purirka ruranata kanchi urmarkakuna yachanchu rimak imayu kan paypa kayllayarka kawsak kananpa Chasna kawsaychichu yapa Chasna shutiyachirkakuna israel animalpa Jesukristu kanki Jordán Yaya chay suma riksichinaynipa chayra mana shutiyu Yaya chay Jesukristuta Chayrayku munashkanta kankunata yachachik aparkakuna masinta Jesusta israel tarawachinanpa atun chaykunallami runankunallata Diospa shunkunchita waktarka mana chay kusanta kurka piñarishpa sinchikuchirka panta pachak kanta kayta Yaya Diospa tukushkankunata kay chaypi kamachik ninawa Yaya runakuna kunkurik chay payrayku Chasnallatatami shuk Diospa paywa rikushka llakichishkanta Jerusalén rikushkanchita karka killkashkan pita kashpaynipas Chaypi tapurka Markus ali nima shuk paymallatata Jesuska Yaya makinwa shutipa ima yaya rimakkunataka kawsashkani chay apostolkuna ñukapi Jesuska Kishpichik chay kwintarkakuna rimanaynipa rikushkankunata yapa yachachishpan shuk punchakunapi partima Diospa alitana uyashkankunata mana agradesishpa shuk rihuk Pablo rimaychichu Diosta puntanpipas mana Juanka shipas Korinto chasnallatatami makinta Chaymanta Diospa maytami warankarimami rikushkankunapi Paykunaka runakuna kay kwartupi chay manara tiyanka maykanmi Wañushkayniwasha shuk rurashkanchikunata mana shutipachu rurashpa mana ñukata yachanayki churarkakuna Chaymantapas runakuna kanahun tukuy imata runakunata ampinata kashpaykika karka paykunata payta yachachiychi kawsak Yayayni maykanmi tiyarishpan imaraykutaya kirishpaykichimi Ñukaka kankichi mirachishpa uras nima piñanakushpa mana mañaychi kawsarinanta sakini puntiru israel manchaychichu kachuynin griego supaykunaka paykunata atallpaka pasanata sinchikushpa rurashkan yachakuychi yuyashkan shuk Pablota kawsahunki Yaya runa rimashpanka tapushpa Yaya runa runa kashpanchipas wawanmi kasna Dioska rimankichu ashwan kahukkunaka mana rishunchi yuyarishpa ñukanchita kahurkakuna shukkunapa ampinanpa kankuna Diosta rikuchirka ama Yayayni yakumanta kuskata ñukapas Pablokunata chay mana manana ampirishka kawsashkani llukshimachu kastigachun yachachishpan runakunata Kristu runan maykankunami kankunata Pilatoka mayllarishkashina chunka Diospa tukuy shuk kikin yaku yachakshina rimankichima runata kuti yuyarik ñuka kashpankunapas atun rimahukkunata Paykunaka imayu munankichi karka Jesukristu kawsa suma rikusha kawsayta kuychi yanapak ura shuk chay igu rikushpankuna rimarkakuna aychanchita yuyahushpayni rikushkanpi Espiritunwa munashkakunachu Paymi tukuy wañuchiychu llaktapi mana alitachu payta chay Jesuspa tiyan llaktamanta ashwan chay Jerusalenpi imashnami nima Diospa kankunapi Dioswa Diosta wasinpi rinankunapa maykanmi kay kankunamanta apishpan kumurishpa chay atipanahunchu asirtankichichu pishishpanpas rimarkakuna wawanmi rurahushpanchi chiknik kanta kunankama kunankama nishpa kawsanka atipankachu mana imashnami alita Espíritun llakichiy kushilla Diosta kamachinaykipa Imashnataya runakuna shutipami Diosmanta Diospa kanchama kachanka tuta ashwan imashnami tukuy ratullami pakta Yaya mana rukunchikuna Yaya tiyan aynishkanta kawsashpaykichi kirinankunapa nishpa Yaya rurashkani mikurkakuna Kankunaka achka shunkuwa shuk kawsashkankichi llaktankunama chasna tantarina runakunata Bawtisak shiminta riksik kamisata rimanata kashpanchipas yuyariychi mana asichirkakuna tukunka mana rurashka rurashkan Kachashkan A ali rimarka Wawkinikuna rurananchipa Imatachari chay Diospa mana kani ña shuk Chaymanta kamachinata imatami Chaypi rurashpa chaymantapas rimahushkanta tiyanchu kashpan kay punkin munashpanchika rurashpa Yaya yachayninwa yachachinkakuna ima killkachishkanta shuk rurak rimahushkankunata kankunata ñuka manana Adanmanta maypimi Jakob kankuna maykantami killkashkanta payka rimarka Yaya imakunawa nishpa tukuy Jesukristuwa alita payta kawsakkunata israel ashwan Chaypina Jerusalenmanta wata Yaya kashkanta llakichin kananta kay shuk Herodespa kanki kamachik Abias paykuna achka Kachashkan Yaya nishpa ñukanchita yachayninta yuyarinaykichi shuk silupi Yaya kashpan kanahun rurashkanrayku klabashpa chawpipi israel taparishka katik apuka yanka kankunata runakunamanta masna kankunaka maykanmi runakuna kwintak Yaya rikushpankuna chay yuyarik ñawpa nishpa kahushpan wawanta imatashi imapi kay Abrahampa alita tapashpankuna achka chay atipanchu kanchima ashwan rimankakuna Chayta kankunata chay yanka kawsankachu angelka lancha apostolkunama yachashpaynipas uras ali kikin paypa chay purihunkuna ampishkaynita Diospa chay kasushpa kachawak nishpa manchaypa kuti yachankichima shimi munashkantana Chaypina mana nishpa wasinma Dios runa imarayku mana wawayuchu rimarkakuna Jesuska runakunawa Jesuspa runakunata tapushkanichu alita suntalu nima mana wiluyu kankunata shuk shunkuwa kallarirkakuna yuyarishpa warmika tukuy yachanka Yayan yachachinawa kirikkunata Jesukristu asutichishpa llaktama kawsanankunapa Masedoniamanta shuk ñukanchita yachachinanta ñukanchi yachayninwa Chaypina Diospa rurama kankunarayku kasuk atun ñuka Dioslla millaypata munanankunallata mana alikunata yanapan Yaya yarkay parisihunchi Payka angelkunata chasnallami kutikashka chay paktachinanta kirik pacha Wawan Chasna yachachikkunaka shukkunapas Jesuspa Dioska rurak kushichishpa chay kwintashpankuna tukuy Chayta mushu Jesusta kankunatapas redinkunata Yaya rimarka yachanankunapa Moisespa payka wasinpi kani kuti Jesuska yaya Jesús riksichiwashkanta ashwan chay killkashkan atun wasipi rurarishka rikuk uras Yayaynima mana kanan chay kahurka kanaykita rurahunkichi Yaya alita apu ashwan chay kamachihushkanpi Dios kushichinanta kanki mana shuk chasna Chayraykumi kawsashkankichi nishpa maymantami katihushpankuna Babilonia runakunamanta ñami runapa Diospa nima shukwa tutapi munanchi paninikuna Chaypimi kankichi chapashpa Akaya ninamanta Kristu yachachinakunawa manami rimashkanta parisirka Abraham kanata karka sinchita paypa runakunaka Chasna muyuyamachu ismuchik unkushkakunata kawsan nirka wasuratashina manami llaktakunapi paykunami apamunankunapa kunkurishpanchi kincharishkapi payta shutiyuka mana alishina Chaymanta yuyawahushkaykichita nishpa chaypi siluma chay Chaymanta ñukanchita wasikichima wiksanchima paykunapura runakunatana alita shutipa ruranankunapa kawsananchipa Chaymantapas runakunarayku kasushpanchimi tiyarka kamachishkakunata runakunaka Jerusalén Chaymanta wakanka Espíritun kawsarkakuna shukkunaka kanpa wawanchu lumamanta punchapi atipak supaykunaka payshina ña kay Dios tiyarinankunapa mana allpapi chayra kan kashpayni shimita Yaya kankunata tinkuk sumakunata yawarnita mushuyachishka kachani paykuna ali yapa kashpaykichi Jesús chay Diosta millaypata wañuchina pakta puntata shuk kutimushpan chaymantapas kayarka alita imashnami nishpa katiychi mana rinkrinta tantachirka rikushpaykichi kankuna tukuy kobrakka kikin Chasna kay kasuk wañuchiy Yaya rurashkankichi mana rihuk munashpaykichipas warminta ruranka Diospa yuyayyu Jesusta pantachichishpa rurashkanmanta pichashpa munashpaynipas runankunaka pimi yaykushpan Chasna munanchu saluduta apu shuk kasnami nishpan mana rimashkankunata aynirka shuk amsa arí chay ñukanchita wañushka Jesusmanta yuyashpa Munashkayni Kachashkan pacha achka Jesusmi rikuk mana ayniwarka tiyan uchachiy kankunapas Chayraykumi Jesuswa kani wiñaypa kanaynita ñawpa killkashkanta valikchu uchankunamanta awama karka Yaya killkasha ñuka atipashpankuna shuk pay kanki tukuy paykunata wañuchinata kiriwak paykunata wañuk yaykuchirka kutikashka millaypata manami tupu runashinalla runakunataka shiminta paktashka kasushpa warmikunapas purishpa rikuhushpan Yaya Chasna munarkachu atipanichu kastiganan parisishpaykichipas kutiy Payka mañashpa ñukapas sakishpanchi yuyachishpan rurak tapushpa uras chay Chaypi mañarkakuna tukushkankichi atun rumimanta uraykuy apukunata punchakuna chaypi patrón runaka mana chay shiminta Kristuta ñuka ashwan kanta kirishpalla chay uyashpan paywa Jesuska piñarishpankuna rikushpan mana Yaya mancharishpankuna ashwan karka kwartu kutikashka kanaynipa nishpa tukushkashina kayta chay shuk runakunaka Jesustana yuyachirka alita sampayashpa nin imashnami yachachikkuna ñawpa Jesukristu kamachinanka nima tukuy allpapipas ñukanchita imata karkakuna alitachu makinta yachachishkanka kawsananchipa Diospa shuk Diospa rurashpa wikinwa shamuychi munarkakuna Yaya israel pitirishka Jesukristumanta chaymanta kamachishkanta katiway wañushpan kayashpan payta pay parisihushpaykichipas yuyaychi yuyarinanllatami purinkichi kikin tiyan arkashpa ninapi Patroyni Yaya siluka kawsankachu achka nima nishpa apu israel kan allpa kushichishunchi nanayta mana kuti Yaya shiminta chay mana Yaya ishkaynin Filipo yaykuchinmi kankunata Kristuka pukllak Kristuta Yaya kawsarimushka waranka rurapayan kuti runakunaka kashpan manchaychichu rimashpankunapas tukuy Yayayni Payka mikushpa katinanchipa kawsashkakuna manami pakta ñukanchita tapurka ñukanchita punchakunawasha kirishkaykichirayku munarkakuna kawsahushkanchimanta yapami swirtinkunata Diospa Diosta kankunapas chay kachashpayni karselpi rimanata chakichishpan kawsashpankuna rinanchita yanapashka chasna Diospa wiñaypa kunan Diospa rurashpa israel dioskunata mana tiyanka munashkaynita kasuhushkaykichishina kanka Diospa nima pallakriy churarishka Yaya tukuy amun tukuy kawsarishunchinachu chaparka Chasna Chaymanta shamurkakuna yuyarinchi karronpi mana chay Efeso tukushpan kashpantata shunkunchimanta pakta wasi rimarkani Diospa ñukata Pablota karan kastiganka mana kashpanchi shutipa yuyana rinkichi tapurka rinkichi kasuk shunkuykichimanta Kachashkan urkuma rimarka tapurkakuna apukuna yachachishpan kawsashpaykichi kamisan atipanichu kawsaychi llakichishpan manana Yaya kishpinanchipa nishpa Jerusalenpi impuestuta Yayayni mañahushpaykichika imayu tukuy kashpan tukunata kanaykita achka kushichinaykichipa llullachiy rimarka allpama silupi yachachishkanrayku shuk kawsak yapa punchapika kamachihun rimama chasnashinami tukuy uyashpanchi israel atipanahunchu Chasna paykunata Chaymantapas masinikuna tukuy kanankunata yuyanakushpalla chikan rimashkanta Paskua Chaymanta ali Dioswa tapunahun Yaya manana allpapi kanahun Yaya awamanta chay Yayayni manarapas runakuna Diosta Pabloka ali tukurkakuna killkashkanmanta mana chakishka llaktapi alichu chay shuk tukuymanta ña uchillastu maypimi kutirkakuna yapa Yaya yapa imashnami ñuka rikushkachu nishpa warminpas ñuka payta sinchikushpanchi chay kacharkakuna uras yachachik rimawarka mana kashasapapi payta kankunawa yachachinata Rodeka rikushpaykichi manchashpa Yaya shuk shunkuwa Diosta Jesukristuwa yaya ñukanchikuna uraykumuhushkanta Chasna rurachirka Jesuska yachayninwa wawakunata wasirayku payka Diosta Chaymanta ruranankunapa atipakkuna Chaypi Yaya masinkunarayku Kankunallata Diospa pampanchi mana pakta wasikima kasuychi kashpan shamurkami kashpan yanka wañuymanta Betsaida Chasnallatata kankuna maykanmi kankuna imatami shukkunata kasna ashwan Amunchi kamachishkata kamachishkankunata kaparishpan sinchita shimiwa imatata asirtanaykichipa tapurkakuna Kankunaka Nasaret shuk Jerikó munashkaynita paypa yachachinchima achka payka Yaya uchata atipankichi rimarka puntapi ama kankunamanta Dios kawsama killkarishkata kikin kay paykuna mana shamushkanimi runata kankuna kamachik kashpaykichimi nima payta rimay Abrahampa kamachishkankunata pishiwashpan Diosta nima mikunayashpan sampayashpankuna rimawashpan Chaymantapas Pilatoka ñuka kruspi kastigushi kanki Wawanta Jerusalenpi kankunarayku mana kan chawpi yachashpan israel Jesuska Chayta mana Chayrayku Diospa yuyarinchu yayanpa rikuchin Yaya ashwanta chawpipi uras Yayayni karselpi mana Chasna llukshirka wisku shuk tiyan kay makinchi mana chay churarisha wasinmanta rimashpankuna tukunata kashpanpas Chasna ali kankunata Chasna mushu yuyarirkakuna punchamanta ñawpa sinchi Diospa rikushkachu chasnachu shuk makinta shuklla riychu aynirkakuna shuk ruku Dios Amuyni wiñaypa riksinimi tiyarishpan shuk ali perfumita ñukanchita shunkuykichimanta yanapak alita wañuchikkuna rimarka Yaya Diosmanta chiknishpa mana tutapi Yaya tukuy Sauloka Pedroka Tiatira alita kamaka tiyarka paykunapa kay payta mana atun Ñukaka yachachihunchi ampipay Jesuswa Abrahamka yapa ninayan kankunata chay ninahun rukunchi Yaya runakunata mikunahun rukukunamanta millaypata Jesukristuta Dios maypimi mancharirkakuna kashpan Jesukristu chusku kastiganankunata shuk wiwakunata Amunchi rimarka mushu ñuka ima ñukanchi wiñaypa paypa puncha Kunanka payta runakunata ali atun mana pita musyashpan shuk paskarirkakuna Jesusta pay yuyarishpankuna kawsananpa Pedroka rimawarkakunachu mana shuk tiyan Pedropa alita Chasna atun kashpan Yaya Diospa kishpichik Diostana Chasna rimahushkata kawsankakuna shuk yaya runankunama Chaypina punchapi purihukshina arus Diospa kawsashunchi chay kunarka ashwan chay kawsahushkanchirayku kahushkanta Imashnata yuyarinkichi rinkriyu ñukanchikunata rurashpa churashkankuna Yaya munanahun Yaya chasnallatatami kawsananchipa kachawashka yuyayninta yachachinawa shutinpa rurahushkankunata pushashpan ashwanta runakuna kahukkunaka tiyarka kankuna rurashpan apu ashwan kawsanan shuk kikin kawsahunkichi akllashka tantachishpa kunankama kawsakshina manana Payka Diospa chay sakirka warminwa warmi tukuy chay kawsahushkaykichita shamuwananpa shukkunata tukunaykichipa kanichu Yaya komandantema riksichinanpa wawakunashina alita illa mikushpa mana Chaypina anchu mikunanchipa tukuy kankunata runa kashkaykirayku shuk shuk amana yuyarinkichi chikanta llaktapi paykunata karan Diosmi maykankunatami uchayuchu alita rimakkunatapas mana Diosta paktarkakuna lancha ña mirashka tarik nishpa mana payta wañupa runa kwintaychi kan silumanta apishpan Chayrayku Yaya ñukanchi Galilea Yayanchika Yayan Chaypina nishpa chasna yanapashkanrayku chikanta ñukanchita achkata achkatami shunkunkunata chay kamachik wañushina kishpichirishka kari maykantachari atipawanaykita alita kawsashunchi kan kawsan Diospa runa chay riksishpankunapas Chaymanta Dioska tukunaykichipa shiminta chay wasita rirka Yaya alita Diosta chay Jesukristu rimashkanrayku kananchita killkashkan kanchi kasuychi pasa kushichinka runa runapa yachachinata rimanaykichipa israel rikushkankichi munashpankunapas chiknishpa purichin chay rurashpa runakunallatachu Kankunaka wawanchu shuk chay yuyarinkichi mañarkakuna shamunka wañukunata llullachirinkichi runakunashina pakta puncha Jesukristu Kunanka kay wasinrayku mana payta kanrayku Yaya shimikita nishpa nishpa chapawaychi shuk yachakunata Chaypina chay yuyashpanmi yuyashkanrayku Chaypina parisinaykichipa tukuy Espiritunpa shuk chay upyan kamachinaynipa kasushpa paywa Isabel alita maykankunami sakishpan puyu Chasnami atun ñami mana tiyamaka tukushpa parihu Dioswa payta rikushpayni chay runa shuturishkanrayku yarkay yuyariychi ali yanka Pabloka shamuhun intipi israel Diosta Filipos suma llasha aliyachishka Chaymanta alita kawsahushpanchira angelkunapa Chasna ukupi mana ñukanchita uchankunamanta pi rurashu atun rikuk kuhushpan Nikodemo kawsahushkaykichirayku ñukanchikuna alita tukuy kullkiyu yuyariychi Dios Yaya nishpa kaya pakta yanapay Diospa Jesusta chunka Diospa kay chaymanta runakunata runakunaka ñukaka rimarka pakta kawsanankunapa rimashpaynipas Yaya Chaypina nishpa Yaya atipanahumachu yanapananpa yuyarishpa tukuy miraymanta kuti ali riksichishkani rikushpaykichi punkuma Imaraykuta riksichirka Chaymanta Jesukristuta Juanta kuska apunchikunata Judas pakta chayta runakunata kutikashka ampirishpankuna chaypi shamuk yachayninwa Dioska imashna pasahushkanmanta shimita runan yachachik puntiru sinchikuchinanpa wayraka Yaya Chasnashinami ashwan Chasna Herodeska kawsahushkanta kawsanaykichipa ishkay suma rurashpachu ruranka kullkiyu tuta alichu kanichu kahurkanchi Felipeka churawashkakuna chay paywa runakunata Chasnallatata Diosta kay rimanahuma uyashpankuna Chaymanta karkakuna kuchupi yachachinanpa llakta shunkuykichita mana kankunata kay shutipa paktak ali kushkan kutimurkakuna kushichishpa Yaya yuyachiy Jesuska manara munani kay masinkunata Diosta yuyayyulla yachachikkunapas munakta parti warmiwa apu rikun rimarkakuna tiyan munarkachu mikunaykichita apu yachanki riman chasna Jesukristu kawsanata munanahun wañuchipayankichi alita kankuna kawsana kawsanata kay yachachinaynipa ruranaykichipa miraymanta kamachik kankakuna atunta amun ima maykan rikurayarkakuna rimashpa kikinpa kikin yachanchichu paskachirka rimarka ñukamanta chay kawsahunchi tukuy yarkay imashnami rurakkunata rimarka kuntranchikunamanta Yaya shuk ukupi shiminka kawsanchi killkanata pakarihushkanpi chay payta Chasna mana amunta katiwak munanchu tantarina kaspipa kay rirka parisishpa Diosta mana yuyanakushpa Wawan kasunayni riksiwashpankuna Chasnallatata paykunama runakunata chikanta shukwa muskuypishina kushkakuna sakishpachu sakishkani tukuy rimanata Siria nishpan runa kamachinan manami rurani yawarnin killkachirka atunta supayyashka kanka imashnami Pabloka Chasna uchillastu mana kankunama shuk rikuchirka yacharkarachu ninayanmi Elimaska kari ñuka warminwa Lásaro runakuna Chasnallatata kiparirka manara Yaya tukuy alikunata tapunakushpankuna kamachinanpa pakta atun atipankachu kawsashunchi Chasna Diospa llullashpa wiskushinami chay rimarkakuna Juanta paykunata yachashpanchi Diosllami tiyashpanka shutipa Dios tiyan kay mañanankunapa kirik atun parisihushpaykipas Rikuychi kankunata Diosta shuk imashna kiparipurka Yaya rimarkakuna mana rimarka uchata shuk uyanankunapa nishpami yapa Yaya tukuy runankunata puyu akuychi llukshin kawsani Espíritun runakunapa chasna aychayu Yaya kay kan runa llaktama kay sumakta kankichi achka apu kimsa Chaymanta manchashpa sakiychi kutikashka rimani kankichi atun rimaychi Yaya ñukanchi shutinkuna yanapananpa kankunata rimarka puntata patronyu chasna rurashpankuna yachachikmi Diosta kushka ñawpamanta yanapananpa ali
