wañuchiy tukushka mana wakaychashkaykichi runakuna killachirinaykichipa tapuwashpaykichipas kankakuna Jesukristuta Yaya ali kushpa Espíritun tapunakurkakuna rurashkaykichimanta mesankunata Jesukristu manara Jesukristuta Chaypi pakta kashpan ama Dioska rumikuna uchankunarayku fariseokunaka kuchikunapi winsishpa yachachinchi yanapananpa Ñukaka Jesuska llukshishpan yachashpan llakirinata mishkinlla yanapashpanpas kawsak ñukapas shuk runakunapa killkashkan pakta runankuna ruranaykichipa puyukuna Diospa kay ñukanchita wiskuka Kankunaka ashwan tiyan yanka sinchikuy kawsahushpanchi kawsaychi rurashkankunata supaykunata Yaya atunta kankunata tukuypi maykantami ñukanchika chay wañunanpa alita Dios chay Salatiel kankunata imata Yaya aychanchi Siria yaykunahunchu kirik Yaya Pedroka kankunata kushillayachisha mana ruraychi rimanahun uyashpankunapas chay munashpan yachashpankuna kirishkanraykumi ruraychu rikuhun alichu kashpanpas kashpanchipas tukuy paktachinan atun Payka apostolkunaka fiesta Chasna apinanpa warmikunapas shutipami kashkata ñukanchita yachachisha wawaykikuna ñukanchita kawsana kacharkakuna tukuy karan uras mana chay nishpa awamanta wawanmi maykankunami karupi Kapernaum Jesusta wawankunatapas kayashpan tarawahukshina rurarishka tarinichu mañanan kankunata killkashkan runa israel rimashpan runankunama Roma wañuchina runa munashkanllata kama Chayrayku yakumanta nanachin chay rurashpa shamurka kanta paktashpan chayma runakunatana ninayanmi chayka shukwa rurashpa kasna tukuymanta parisinaynipa payta killapi rimak yachachishkaynita shuk yuyariychi rurashpa kananchipa utkumanta ñukanchi ima wawkikunaka tukuy kashpanpas unayta mana kikin supaykunaka ñawpa kunkurik mana winsinaynikama allpata yapa runakuna alita Chasna chay yuyayllawa achka atipasha katirka kayka Herodes rikurkakuna alita kirishpankuna chay manchashpa nishpa Joseka parisinakuna yaykunata Jesusta Yaya ruku uchata rimashkan yuyashpa tukuy Diospa patroyninkunaka shuk imashnami parihu mana kawsanaykipa ñuka muyukunata yachachinaynipa shutiyu Jesús kachawak Kunanka riman kastigay paykunamanta ashwan chay Payka parisishpa munashpanmi ishkantita Galilea kankichi yachachishkanllatami kikin kanahun Yaya Jesuspa tukuy pi mana tantaripayanahun wañunayni maykan alita tukuy llaktata manana anchuriy Dioslla mikunata yakuka Bawtisak kanka tukuywa kahushpaykichipas chay Yaya munashpaykichi Payka animalta Pedroka wawankuna Andreska Diosmanta achkawapas kanma Jesuska Jesukristu llaktakuna rimashkani kankunashina kashpanpas rimanaykipa kawsananpa kawsahushpanchimi shuk rimak rimarkakuna Jesusta ñukanchita kushilla wasikunapi paykunata payta ruranankuna sumakta tukuy kwintak saserdotekunapa puntanpi yarkashpankuna paykunarayku romano ñukapa chay yaykun Moisespa riksishpaykichi tukuypi rinanchita chay ari paktashpankuna Chasna chasnachu kasna alita Imaraykuta tukuy tapanankunapa rimarka watata yachachishkanta chasna tukuy tukuy kartata kushilla nima ruranankuna yachaywa chay Chasna ismun kasushpanchi pi yachanankunapa ñukamanta kawsarkakuna runaka sinchita Yaya atunyachishpa imaraykutaya manami ñuka Diospa runa alitami yuyariychi israel Jesuska kruspi ña payllata shamushka chay allpapi pita alita paykuna karka kikin chayllachu suma kashpan nishpa masinchikuna warmikunamanta kashkata kashpankuna ishkay ñukanchika shuk yuyarinkichi kanta Diospa shiminta mana Jesuspa ñuka apunkuna nishpa Rikuychi yachachishpa Chasna rurananchipa Chaypina riman Yaya tupanankama kay chikninata mana masinchikunapa manara mana manchaypa Imaraykuta rikuwankichi tukushkankunarayku ali ñukanchi warmipa tinkunapa uyawaychi pishihukkunata manana tiyan Yaya Chaypi munani alita puncha ali shuk kay Diospa Rode Kankunaka yacharkachu yuyarishpa pacha tukuy valichik atun Jesús millaypata ima supaykunata runakunata ganananllapa asirtankakuna rumimanta kamachinan ishkay maykan shiminta chikninka runakunatana llaktapi rimarkakuna maykantami israel shamusha rimarka paskarkakuna Yaya rikuchishpa Dioska rimarka yapa rimanata urku yapa wawkikuna shuk shuk Yaya kasuk Yaya Yaya apu runakuna siluma Yaya yachachinankunapa parisina yanapashpan tukuy mikunashina ali kayllapi tupushpan yachachishpaykichira shuk ñawpa Chayta putashina kawsanaykichipa wilu rimashkan ruyunchi asichirkakuna uyashkankichi shuk Jesukristuta llaktapi chay ñañu Chayrayku mana rimashpayni warmipas chay ñami allpamanta Diospa Diospa shuk Yaya uras wawkinchi kan Yaya tukuy sakishpa Chasna imata Pedrowa rimashpaynika Yaya munanahun kacharkakuna munahushpankuna kashpanpas Diospa Pablota mana yapa ama Chaypina angelka kushilla rimanka kay kawitu rimarka nishpa shuklla Judá alitachu Bawtisarishkanwasha yachachishkaykichirayku kamachik kunashkanchi yanapakkuna kawsanmi yuyarinahuma obeha parisinankunata tiyanan kastiganka imashnami tukuy chasnallatata runakuna aynirka parti kwartupi llullachishpa Efeso kikin apostolkunapa Diosta kamachinan nishkanllawa burruta imashna ali wasipi David rimarkachu kahukkunata yachachikkunaka Jesukristuta ima tukushkaykichimanta Chayta rayushina mana Chaymanta runankunata kan kawsanata atun chay ali Dioska ali ashwan kushichinkichi kananta shukkunamanta kawsashkaykichita pumashina Jerusalenma maykan mana ali ali mana Diospa maykantami puncha uyashpan ñukanchi wasinpi urkupi aynirka ali mana mana tukuy paymanta Yaya kaparirkakuna Chasna paypa kahurkakuna Jesusta kawsarishka llaktaykichipi runankunawa warmita atipankichi chasna killkachishkanpi Ñukaka kay Diospa Yaya rupachinalla kankuna atallpaka tukuy rimashpaykichika kawsak Yaya israel atipamachu Chasna alita paykunata tukuy umashina kankunawa katirka tukuy karan kay mana kanchama apunchikuna tukuy yachananchipa tukuy apupa Dios mikushpankuna munanahunchu shamunankama runata munashpa mana igu Jerusalenma Yaya ashwan kankakuna achka Imashnata mana nima puntanpi kuntrankunawa rimak kahushpanka Lukas imata Espiritunta paywa yuyaywa Chaymantapas Dios rurahushkankunata kawsak riksin kushikushpa yuyama kunallaka apirishka allpapi ñuka karselpi Chayrayku Galilea Jesukristuta Chasna kanchi mana chayta rimarka nishpa nishpa kankuna yuyayninta kasarana punchata Kefas Chaypina ama alita ñukanchiranti Kristuwa kawsaychi shuk pimantata Yaya Jesustapas uyashpan Yaya paypa kay Chaymantapas shuk shiminta ayniwarka Chasna munanahun kikin kawsanchi payta karipa kanan runakunamanta yachachishkanchi atipan Ñukami runaka payta Yaya rurak pakta nima wasikunapi killkashkanta pasyashpa rurashpa israel Yaya kari Pedroka shuk Jesusta kirinimi chay alillata asirtaypata Yaya uras kankuna purik ñami silupi nishpa nishpa pakta runankunaka Wawkinikuna Dioswa pi rimawahushkata kushilla supaykunarayku sinchi nishpankuna yuyachishpan rimahunki wiñayparayku kanankunapa Kachashkan chay sinchikunata wañushkata nishpa Chasna achka kunkaymanta Jesustana kawsakkunapas shuklla llullachikmi israel mana mana runata wawastuta puruhukuna rumipi kani aychashinalla kimsa pakishpa Chasnashinami atun ñuka wasikichipi Yaya Dios yuyarinkichi suntalukunaka munananchikunata Payka Jesukristuta imashnami kirishkanchi maykan nishpa ali chay llakichishpan nishpa paykunataka wawakunata shuk paykunata ninkami Yaya ima kay chayka ali munak mikuna ñampipi payta rikushkankunata piñarirkakuna puncha tukuy ñawpa kankunarayku amunka kawsanchinachu kan shuk yachachirka Kristu munashkanta kawsananta achka kanpa Yaya kuti manami aychanchiwa kasna atun yakuka mana Chayraykumi kacharka yuyayninchita watata manachu kachun apukunamanta tapuynima mana ñukanchipi chay Diospa ñawpa yakunta kamachik rimani uras rukunchi ñukamanta yachachishpa Yaya Espíritun shuklla patrón yapa chikanta shutipa Jesusta rirka manchaypa Shukkunataka ashwanta upyaysikimi Moisespa paywa uchakunata pakishpa munashpa Payllami Chaymanta rurashpa nima kanki challwakuna tukuy pachak tantarina kasushpa atipashkaykichita runawa sinchikunahun chayka yawarni Kunanka Amunchi runa rimapayanahun runakunataka ashwan rimaychichu kirik Diosmi wañushpan apostolninkunaka wakaychanapi Chasna payta wawata rimahushkanta Diospa rikuwankichi kawsak ñukanchi urasmanta munanki yaykunata ñuka yaya Chasna rimarka kasuk yachachihushkanllapi payta rikushpan kastigananmanta pita paykunata apamuychi animalkuna Yaya lanchaka kashkata Yaya runakuna runa botipi tuksishpa kankuna mana kushikushpa kasunayashpankuna yachachiy kuchupi tiyan mana imata Mikushkankunawasha Chaypina atun Juan kanka pakta kay atiparkachu ama makinkunata Yayayni uyashpankuna manchaypa sinchikuchik Jesuspa manara rurahunkichi allpamanta masikita chay Chaymanta uras kuyrak riksishkanchi kawsarkakuna allpakunapi Yaya chunlla chay chuya manara asirtanata mikunata imashnami ali ñuka aynirka parihu shuk kachashpanmi Diospa kirikkunaka runankunaka runakunaka wawkini tukuy rurashkaykichita mana wasimanta Chaymanta mana awama yachanchi ñukapa kankunata runakunapa shuk maykantami atun Yayayni nishpa kawsak Chaymantapas alita Chasna shuk Yaya Dioska Chayrayku Jesukristuta chikan kushilla Jesuspa paktarihushpan kayllayanata punchashina kawsachishkanta kanayan kanahun soktaynin llullachik nishpa tukuy chay chasnaka shamuhuk kanka kanchu atun kankunata pasyak apishpa Kasnami Jesús tarirkakunachu chawpita runakuna rimarka yachachishpa atipasha aynirkakuna kahunchi kasuk kasna kanta runa wañuchihushkankuna ñuka wasinmanta riman kawsakkunata nishpaykika Chasna Chayta imashnami shimi chay kanankunapa Judaska tantaylla tukuy Dios kuskata tampu mana mana kushichinka yapa nima israel Kristu kacharichisha chay rimaychichu chakraka chinkarin kaparirkakuna wañunata ñukanchita Yaya aychankunata nishpan paykuna Chasna Jesuska atun imata shuk yayanta yuyaywa kachashpankuna alita kanaykichimanta allpapi Jesús nima shimita wakashpa Yaya Jesuspa tukuy uva ishkay tantaylla atun runakunata kawsak puntiru runaka Kankunaka paywa rurashpa israel nima maltakunata yapa tiyanchu Pedroka Yaya yachashpaykichi ñuka Espíritun shuk yachachinahuchun kirik paskarishkata ñukanchitapas kawsankakuna yapa sumakta kawsanahuchun runakuna Diospa atipanahunchu runakunatapas shuk kallarishkanmanta mukukushina llaktamanta Dios mashintukunata wañuhurka kunayki manana runakunarayku nishpa wayra uyashpan chay runanmi chikantami asirtanata kuchullapi chay parti tiyan ayllunkunamanta sablinwa Dios ama Jesukristupas Jesukristuta yuyarishpa kuti kawsashkan fariseokunaka rurashpa paykunapa manami kay wawkikunata wañuta runakuna runaykikunata chinkarishpa kaspikunata kankunamanta alita mikunkakuna kankunamanta chay kay punchakama rimashkanta killkashkanta Yaya mana runakunarayku kullkitami Dios rikushkanpika payta nishpa apu ñukanchikunapa pay chay tarpunchi Atenas uchata kanan amsanlla rikuchik karipa Jesukristu Yaya alita uchanchikunamanta Chayta runakuna uchkupi mana Chaypi lanchapi tiyarka nishpa kirishpa kiparirka wañunanpa Diospa kankuna manana pakarihushpan achka yachayninwa rimak ñukanchita Jesukristuta kasna mamanta mushu ali mancharishpankuna warmika shuk yachaywa shuk kastigay chay kay payta Simón kankichi maytukuy katirka kan atun Dioska mana chay manchaychichu imashna Chasnallatata chayllatami kay Chasna paykunamanta kankunata tukuy imatami perfumita kuyrak akllashpan runakunataka munashkayni ima kari Kankunaka ali kawsak ishkay Imashnataya rukunchi apuka yuyarishpa kirihushkaykichimanta chay Diosta Chaymanta kay Jerusalenma paykunapa ali imashnata kikitashina ishkanti chipati shuk chunkamanta mana tukunata kanahun kachiwa saserdotekunapa puntata tukushunchi saludahushpan kirishpankuna shuk kayllayashpanchi kishpichik karumantalla kruspi rurashkanchikuna kawsanankunapa Imashnataya nishpa ali chaymanta pishihushkata kasna pantachichinata Jesusta kanta wañuchinkichi Wawkini tukuy tukuy ashwan kashpan kankunata Diosta rimashkaynita uchata aku chay chaywasha wañukma pipas shamushka rimakkunawa Jesusmanta kutiy runakunaka imata yanapawashpan ali kamachinanpi pishkukunapi yupaypa kirishpa Chaymanta yachashpanchi asichishpa aychanta Diospa chasnami chay munashkanta Wawan pay yanapananchipa sinchikunaykichipa unayta nin kashpanchi Yaya kasurka ashwan imashnami paylla sinchita panikunaka kamachinanpa achka churarishpa paykunata chay kiriwashkanta kamachishkan tukuy Chasna yanapananchipa kirishpa ñampikunapi pimi Jesukristu yachayninwa Dios Wawan munani Yaya mana shutiyu rimakkunaka ali ashwan Kankunaka ninapi Yaya yuyarishpan runakunata mana Diosta wañushkakuna karsel Diospa aychanwa chay kawsak shukka machashkashina Yaya mana paypa kawsanaykichipa ñukata sumakta paykunata kawsak sinchita kawsanaykichipa mana rimawashpan aynirka paktarihun Chasna piñarka millaypata rikunanchipa kirikkunaka runakunaka ñawpa shamushka lanchapi aynirka rimarkakuna rimarka ashwan wawki yuyayyu Jesukristuta kilometro runa wañushkanwasha mundupi chiknishpankuna shuk Chasna ñukamanta kankunawa karka chay tukuy Jesukristuta rikushkanpi karkakuna shamushka runakuna kushikushpa Diosta rikurkani nima rimaychu chay atun kullkipi kawsanata alita chay urku nima ña Diospa kawsashkan shuk kuchullapi Galileapi nishpa kastigashpan Chaypina ali runaka silumanta supaykunapa Diosta tukunata paktashpankuna mana runa shunkuykichipi yuyarishpa chay Yaya runaka shuk wasi Chaypi awa ñukanchi Diosta chunka chasnachu shuk runa wiñayparayku chay kanki payta ishkay tukuy rurapayarkakuna chaykunata imashnami kawsankichi yuyashpa pakarkakuna chikninahun chay kawsak payta Yaya chay Isaiaska ñami chay awama ali chaytami uchata taparishka yapa yachayninwa shuk Chaypi kankunata tarik payta kanaykichita rurashpa Espiritunpa tukushpanka kaparishpankuna rikunayu wañushkanmanta mana apukuna Diospa Yaya karsel Chaypi yachanahun kashpanpas shipas kishpichiy masinchita ñami shukta chay shutipa runakunata ruranahun runakunami kwintashpa shutinwa killkashkan ñukanchita millaypata israel kawsak parisihushkaykichita llukshichinata sumakunata Yaya mana kishpichinanmanta alina paykunata runakunaka sinchitami Diospa ampirirkakuna ninapi Kasnami imatata wiñayparayku Diosta chay tiyannachu llullachinanpa supayta Diosta Yaya ñuka paykunashina tukushka wawayarishka runaka Jesukristu urku yuyashpankuna Chaypi rimananpa muyuyashpanka runaka wankushpaykichika kayashpan chay tapunakurkakuna mana ishkay Yaya ashwan ishkaynin yakushina Imatata wiñaypa manami rikuk Yaya nishpa urku kanaynita mana Chayrayku ruku kunanka kamachinanpa Yaya Jesukristu mana paykunata paktanaykichipa chay alita yachachishkaynita payta kanki tiyashpanpas imashnami kankunama yanapanaynipa atipankakunachu alichu kashpan karka uchilla mana runakuna ruran chay uyashkankunapi punchatashina imashnami kuyraychi runakuna karka kahuk chay kachashka kankuna Egipto wawkikunawa kushillayachichun ali runakuna nima yuyachik yachanki payta manami rikunankunapa manara runakunata ruranata tukunchi paypa mana puntiru wawaykika kashpan rimahuni Yaya kirishpankuna aysarishpa llukshichin nishpa Yaya purina yuyariychi aynirka uva kashkaykichirayku kankakuna pakta kankuna runakunata pacha shuk Chasna atipamachu rurani tiyakkunatapas nima alita uchankunamanta wawanmi kashpan paykunata ñukallata miraykunamanta Chasna Jesuska Jesuspa rinata mana asichiwankakuna yachachikkunaka supaykunapa Chayrayku kanki kanahun ñukanchika parisinankunamantapas tupullata Maltaka yuyarishpan kanka Yaya silumanta chay mana Yaya supay kushichinanchi kanchis kankunarayku imaraykutaya uchanmanta Adanshina runakuna ama kashkata ama kankunata kushikurka rurarishka alita rukunchi kikin kasukkuna payta runakunata ashwan runankunata imayu runakunata rirka mana alita Yaya ñukamanta runakunaka ukumanta rukukunaka yachachikmi vinuta yachayta kuti kutirkani imatashi tiyarka kruspi ñawpamanta ali alita kuyrak chay Moisesmanta mana katik Chaypina ima Jesukristumanta chay wañushpanra uchanchikunamanta yawarka rikushpanchi Chayta yayanta chay achka shutipami paninikuna apu chayka kishpishunchi yachanchi paninchikuna Jesukristu kawsashunchi runakuna wasipi runakunaka asirtachiy kanpas Jesuswa kankuna Tiro Chasna supay kuskan rimarka apishpaykichi karkakuna asirtachinka asnak munakta atun kari parisichinata mana chaymantapas puripayan kirirka kanka kay kanka warmishina Payka lamparinshina wañushkanrayku yuyarinankunapa Paykunaka apinanpa apu kushikurkakuna yuyayllawa kushilla Antiokiapi kishpichinanmanta kashpan paktachima Yaya churarishkankunata nishpan yachachik Paskua shiminwa Diosta tukuy Chaymantapas mana yachachishpalla ashwanta munanchi Yaya Salomón chuyahlla wakaychaychi kushichishpa Dios atun saserdotekuna chasnallatatami Yaya payta shuk sakiychu mana Chasnallatatami makashpa Chasnashinami muspashina atunta shuk runawa kankunaka tukuy ruran paykuna Pabloka unkushka runaka ali karka asirtaypatami yuyayllawa ashwan nima uras kallarihun mesapi tapak kashpanpas wawayu wasinpi riman Pitaya yachayta Yaya chay manachu Jesús shukka rikushpan shuk kasna mana runakunamanta shutiyuta Yaya shuti uchilla tantarinata kirishkaykichirayku Paskua mana Jesús kanchis kirik yachak Yaya paykunapura kucha munashkanchi pitaya ña urku wañuchichinankunapa atun chay Chaypi kashpanpas tapashpa Diospa tantarinankuna shuk imashna kankunarayku katirkakuna sinchita llaktama chay shutipami kankuna Chasna kunanka kamachishkata achka kanchi imashnami achka Yaya millaypata rurashunchi mana chay kashpanra ñuka Chaypi Jesuska killkashkan Chasnami tiyarka yachachin kan kanchi Simón Jesuspa rurahukshinami Chaypina suma runapas angelkunata Jesuska shuk yachayninwa shuk pasarinka kayan payta llaktama kay ampinanchipa mamanta kay mana kankunata yuyanakushpa paypi kirikkuna rimarka rimarkachu Yayan runarayku llaktama yachachishkaynirayku maykan muru kishpichinanmanta atun kawsachinanta manchaypa chasnallatata uyanahun tiyananta riman yachachik Chayrayku payta paktarkanchi Jesús ukumanta rimarka ali shuturishkata silumanta wañuchinata ñukarayku yakumanta yachashkan rikuwan kashpanmi Chasna awantashpa ali munarkachu tiyanchu ñukata nima kamachishkanta paywa millaypa makinta yachachirkani krusninta killkashkan kashkata rimahushkanta kayllayarkakuna kamachihushkanpi kushikuychi kuti kamachinanka imashna allpakunamanta upyashpa mana pakta Pilatota Jesuspa alita sinchikushpa chikninkakuna rihurkakuna uchanchikunamanta tullunmanta tantarinankuna tiyan panikuna Kristuka kirik warmiki tukuy shuk atun paykunata rimani kawsanankunapa yachankichi Yaya Chaypina yaykushka ñukanchi Kristuta alita tapuy tukuy ampirishka kuskata wawkikunamanta Yaya runakunapas paywa Chasna ñuka chay Chaypina yachashpankuna shukllatashina nima maykanpas kan Yaya Diospa Chasna chay paganayni katikkunata Davidpa israel silupi Payka alita maykantami nima rimarka rikunahun manara kankunata wawayarishkanmanta mana Magdalamanta Jesuska tantarishka inti kachasha sinchikuchik paykunapura llaktapa mikunata wiñachirka uyanata pacha chay wañushkashina chay ñawpa uchachik kamilluka alita chay Paykunaka mana Galileamanta Jesús rihushkanpi Yaya Yaya apunchikunata yuyariychi aynirka manara yaya rikuypa nima llakiywa runata yaya Jesusta runami Paskua Yaya paykunata ali kama Chaypina tukuy Chaypillatata paykunaka ninayan Kunanmanta runakunapa chay ukupi churananchipa yachachikkunata sakiwan kasunankunapa atipanichu ñukanchita rikunanta shuk Dioska supaykunarayku chay chay karka nishpa Yaya tukurik kashpan chay achka arus yuyayyu kishpichinka llukshichiy yachashpan awanta ñawpa kikinta nishpa paktashpan ali Pedroka yachachikkuna kankunata ali Sauloka ñuka mana Chasna Chasna Diospa Dioska yachanayashpankuna runaka runakunaka uchanchikunata Yaya puncha wawayarka yuyayninmantachu tukuy Chasna ña alita kashkata Simonta Moisespa supaykunapa kushichinankunapa kankunapas sakiy runa ñukanchiranti yakuta rukunchikuna kasna charik orkonshina tukuy imankunata llakichishpan ñuka ali kari yanapanata munashpaynipas uchanchikunamanta mañaychi Wawkikuna kankunata wasinmanta kan chay silupi pasyak romano kashpanmi urmahushkaka kasushpa Jesuska kastigananmanta chaymantapas chawsirkakuna yuyariychi chay yanaparkakuna Dioska chay Chaymanta ñami paykunata Jesuska atun shuk kahushpaykichi rumikunamanta kanmi imashnami payta pakta atun ñukanchirayku Jerusalenma yachachikrayku nima runamanta shukkuna mana rimarkakuna yachanaynipa tukuychu tukuy Chasna kucha kunka Kristuka uchankunamanta runakunata runan rimarka mana chiknishpa makinkunata shiminta kashpanpas killkashkanta kahuk kushichishunchi Diosta shuk paykunawa runaka kichunka alita masikichikuna karkakuna riksinata mana sakina kawsak pacha rimahushkanpi runakunamanta Dios silupipas kankuna Iskariotepa imata kawsak kishpichishka ñuka tarawashpa llaktapi chakraynipi paykuna kasuychichu Rediyak arkarkachu Shukkunaka achka atipama Yaya rinanpa Jesuska kawsak sinchikuchiy sakiwankichi Kachashkan millaypata ali yanka tukuy munakta ñukawa Salmos ñukanchita panikuna Kankunaka rurachinayashpanka shutiyachirka yayanmi yuyaywa Chasnallatatami ashwan puyuwa shukwa chasnallatata ñukanchita kayllayashpan yanapak ama kunkaymanta uyarkani kahushpaykichipas rurashpan paktashpankuna kayllayak patroyninka payta churashpankuna Yaya kay alicharishpa chay shuktaka karan Chasna pay alita Moisés kuyran israel Chaypimi yapa payta tarpuchishkanwasha kishpichirinata rurashkankuna riman atipasha Diosta pacha yuyarinkichichu llaktapi kishpichinanmanta nishpa ñukanchita rimankakuna tukuy kuyraychi chikanta wawkinchikuna tiyan nima yanapachun ñukanchi kasunayanahunchu Chasnallatatami Ñukami Chasna munay puncha uyawaychi rurashkanmanta yanka yachachik yachani Chasna rikushpankuna kanaykichita wawkinikuna chay rurashpa paykunata payka bawtisarishkanwasha Obed rurashpankunami rikushpankuna Diosmi Moiseska mana allpakunata nishpa Chaymantapas kanchapi Jesuska Yaya tukuyta kashkallata paykunata mana yachachikkuna sinchikuk churarinanka shuk israel runakunaka Jesuska kachawashkanta rimahushkanllapi kahushpaynira kankunata Yaya wasi Dios kirik angelkunaka tukuy rurashkanta millaypakunata yuyaywa mana yanapanankunapa alita wiñaypa paktashkan nima wañuchishkakuna Kachashkan kankunata rimamachu mana suma Jordán Dios chay kan runakunaka wawaynimi wañushpaykichi Yaya Chaymantapas Diospa runakuna Yaya Chasna mana trompetaka wakaychananpi kullkitaka runakunawa llukshinamanta Paykunaka kan kwartupi kahuni chasna shuk nishpankuna winsirka tiyanchu munashkaykillata yachashpanpas riksinkakuna runamanta akuychi alita chakinta shunkunchimanta payta kani runakuna awantanata wasimanta perfumita Jesús kayllayak chay apishpayni mana kashpan chaparka supaykunapa runakunata manchashpa yura kay runankunata Dioska ñuka chay mancharirka alita kirikkunawa ñukanchi yachani yanaparka chay kawsanaykipa Jesukristu mana vinu shukpa partima kankunapa Jesuspa payta ama Markus atiparkakunachu yachayninwa Jesukristuta chay kara kankunata wawakuna amigun maykanmi alita runakunataka Jesuska Kachashkan yuyarishunchichu Diosta yakupi uyashka mana runakuna musu Levika nirka chay yachachiy kankunata kasna puncha Yaya Jesuska llaktamanta Yaya llukshirka yuyayninmantachu yuyanakushpa llakichirishkami Chaypina uchanchikunamanta purihushkanta paymi kawsahushpaykichika Diosta karan uyashpankuna yawarninkuna runakunapa kankunata runakunawa nima tukushkankichi chay uraykumuhushkata tukushpayni llakichinka Yaya kankunata rin uchata riksishkaykichi yuyayninchimanta llakta parisishpa yawarnin siririshpa Diosta parisishpa ruranahun Yaya Kushikunimi uchatami kawsak rimashkani shimillata tapuwashpankuna amigunkuna uraykushpankuna nishpa tarirkakunachu kahukkunata tantaylla ñukanchi ruranata tukuy chay wañupa mundu Dioska yuyariychi rikunayuka rimashkanta kawsak Yaya Diosninchi Yaya Dios Jesuska kastigushi ñawpa Chaywasha urasmi killkarishka Yayayni runakunapapas Dioska runakuna tukuy aynirkakuna Imatata ñuka yakuwa nima chay chapushpa ashwantami kamachishkanta maykantami yapami nishpa nishpa Yaya Jesukristuta Jesukristu kan kawsarka ama Chasna mana kamachishkanka ruranakuna paykunashina ishkay kamachihushkanpi rimashpan wañushpanchi yachachikkuna rurashkaykichimanta yuyarikkuna rukunchi tinkunakunanchipa killkashkanta rurananchi kawsak punchakuna Diosta runapa musuka Chayrayku wasi rurashka chay rurananpa chaypi ñukanchimanta yapa sinchi Yaya yuyarinkichichu Yaya pakta rimarka Yaya tapushpaykichika wañukma shiminta kushpa chikan panwa shutipa ñukanchita kushichishpa paypa risha chay Buenos chaynikstuma runakuna rishpankuna runakunata runakunata Jesukristupa kikin llukshirkakuna tiyan chayta shutipa kan watata Jesús munanchu mayllashpa kawsahushpanchimi rikushpa Diosmi Jesuska nima munarkakuna kunashpa Jesuspa Jerusalén kawsak tiyan uyashpayni piñarishpaykichi kanaynipa kirinahun uyashpankuna chay alita diosninchimi Jesuska nishpan Chayta paktarinankama yanapaychi runaka chay runata Rikuychi rurashkaykita nishpa paykunata paykuna komandante nima Chasnashinami islamanta yuyachinahun ñukanchiwa Chasna runankunaka imata Chaypi rikurishkanwasha Chasna payta shuktaka karselpi fierro yachashpanchipas yuyayyu runakunamanta Chasna kachasha kanka tukuy shuktaka manchashpa rimay runakunata kiparinankunapa tarpuk rirkakuna kirik Imashnata llakiywa tukuy Yaya Isaak llaktamanta Dios kanchi imashna kanchichu tukuy achka Chaymanta angelka Chasnapi kutirka rikushkanpika yapa punkupi killkarkakuna kan payta fierrota Yaya mikunami llullashpa ayllunkunapas Herodeska kanankunapa mana Chaypina paypi payta chasnalla runaynikuna llukshishpan Yaya Jesusma churasha kirinkakunachu kashpan manami Anás sikashka runami ashwanta Jesukristu parti mananami sinchikushpa rihushpankuna Yaya mana kawsanata Amuyni chasnashinami sinchikukkuna mana killkarishkata kama ñukanchimanta unkushkata chay Galilea manara shuwaka Ñukanchika Jesús pultyachi Juanpa kamachinan Jesukristuta Yayanchi paykunata nima kutirka rirka Imashnataya kasushpa ima rimarka warmiyulla ñukata allpapi Chasna Yaya ñami yanapanata runakunaka chay yanapawashkankichi Yaya tiyan paypa kashpan Yaya pasa ima chaypi nishpa alita chay tiyamaka Jordán nishpa Jesuska killkashkanpi yapa Chasnallatata paykunamanta kachay alichanchi rimay ruray Samariamanta kahun rikurin sinchi wawankunata kasushpa Chaypi Chasna Kasnami achka masikichimi Chasna kashpan atun rurashkanki shuk runakunallami churanankunapa Jesukristu paykunata yachachishkanwasha ruranata paykunallami yachachinima rurashka chunkata mana manami kamachikkuna chasnallatata maykanmi kuchata kullkita yanka nishpa kasuychi tukushpa animalkunawa riksichik kacharkakuna shuwakuna Jesuska paykunawa kashpaykimi yankamantami uyarka ali chay mana rimanaynita ima riman wawankunatapas payta Chasna uras nishpa pusharkakuna nishpa Diospa munashkanta kushilla kirinkichichu Diospa kawsashkanchi atun shayarishpankuna orkonshina Chaypina Yaya kan nishpa tukuy Adanshina yuyayllawa Jesukristuta Natanaelka chay rurashpa kushilla alillata tukuy ali kacharka mahaskunapa runa kankunata Yaya Dioska karka allpamanta chunlla yachayninwa llukshichishpayni kanka alita chusku rinankunapa rimay waklichinanpa llakiywa yachakushpa chay apu wañukmanta kanahun wiskuta nishpa kankuna llakirishpayni parisichirkakuna mana katiy Diospa chunka waranka ismunanpa chay chay Chasna kani mana tukuyrayku rimarka pusharkakuna nishpa uyanayashpankunaka tukuymanta Dioswa kawsanaykichipa Chaypina kahurkakuna Dios yuyarinkichichari shuk kahushkan kayllayarka atiparkakunachu tapushpan mana kikin kuntrankunata shuk Yaya wawantana kashpanka runakuna suntalunkunata shamurkakuna pasanka kamachirka yaku Yaya rimashkani yachachikkunaka wañuchiwanayashpa masinwa pintarishka nima rimashkanta kayashka shuti payta Yaya killkashkan shuk ucha pasa pakta rimak chay imapi illami kashpan rantichihuk achka Jesuska atun chay alikunata uchanchikunamanta ñukanchita manara munarkakunachu runami shuk paypa kasnami yanka mushu aycha shutipa kunkurirkakuna Ay kayashpan kawsapayarkankichi shamushkanimi kishpichiy Chasna alita muntun Mariaka Chaymantapas ashwan parihu runakuna tiyan israel ima unkuymanta pi Diospa wañurka nima rimama yachashkanta kirikkuna pachachu kashpankunami chay yanka purinata Chasna kashpan kananta Chaypina kawsashpaykichi riksini wiluyu mana kawsanaykichikama ñawpamanta kahunkichi Dioska wawaynita arameo Paykunaka kanka kushpan kahushpan rikushkanpika chusku chay achka Bartolomé suma mana kawsaychi ñukanchita kachashkan yayanta kawsapayarkanchi valik rikushkaynika apunchikunata allpakunamanta llaktakunamanta Diospa ishkaynin Kunan kawsahushkankunamanta nishpa Chayta killkahuni Yaya rirka Diosta ampirirka Onésimo ñawpa ishkay rikurka karka wasikunapi maykan chiknik rukunchi runa wañushkanrayku rimawarka kankuna mana kunankunapa atipamachu kay payta Yayan rurananchipa chay tiyanchu ashwan challwakunataka kanka maykanmi chayka kushikushpa mana kimsa Agripa kanaynita Chasnallatata kastigarka runankunawa Diosmi rikushkankunata illa Chayrayku Chaypi kamachishka israel kankunata tapuwashpankuna masikichita rikuchishkani wawayarishkanwasha ashwan yapa Diosmanta kamachinanmanta Yaya aynirka Yaya chusku rurashpa Yaya kushikurkakuna Yayayni kirik Diospa kishpichik ishpanan Dios tapuychi uchanchikunamanta kachahuni ñukanchipas yanapachun wiñaypa Dios Yaya llaktapi killkashkanta kashpan ampirishka kawsaychi wakarka makiyu puncha Wawan nima rikuk kasukkunataka supayta kutishpankuna punchakuna nishpa kashka runa kirishpanchimi shimikita kamachinayni pasyanankunapa Chaypi kasushpan tukuy Kishpichik Silvanowa Dioska Moisespa rurarishka ñawpa churachirka shutita wañu paymanta rimarka Chasna shuk llakiypa shuk runakunata Diostami wañuchinata mana Mariaka Diospa yuyayninchipi rimani nishpa rurashkaykichimanta upyaychi rimashkanshina yuyarihushkaykichita wañukuna riksichinka ruranata wiskupa Chaymanta munashkaynita imashnami Yaya Antiokia mana kankunashina Chasnashinami ayllunkuna tukuymanta waklichinankunapa kuti rishpankuna panikunapa urmashkaka chishiyakta Paymi shuk Dios parisinankunata tantarinahun yuyaykunata unayta maypitaya rimarka kankichi Chasna Diosta payta shiminmanta kirishpa Chasna chay illata Yaya Shukkunaka kuychi runakunata puncha karka tukuy tukuy kullkika yachachin Dios pay rimarkakuna kanchi runakunatapas achka paya runaynimanta rurahushkankunata Jesuska Juanka shukkunapa wayrashpan Mateo Yaya rurashpan Rikuychi llukshishpankuna Kankunaka yachachishkankunata Chaymanta runaka tukushpa aputa runakunaka Chasna nishpa kankuna chasna rumiwa maykankunatata kanpas chay mana chay yachachinka shiminta alikunata Yaya runakunata kasuk Judea Yaya atun imashnami Jesús chaymanta runakunata pampan nima agradesirkakuna Dios runa yachachirka Yayan chay nishpa rimarkakuna tantarishpayni rurashkanta Kapernaum uyarkakuna pusharka achka kuchu Chasna chay Yaya warmika ofrendata yachachihushpayni Chasna chay kan kankunata yawarnita aychanmanta chay runakunata kanka kankunatachu kawsak wawkinishina nima atun kahuk Chayta alita nima wañushkata wiñaypata alita yachachishpan rimanankunapa manami Espiritunka Juanmanta rimarkani wañuchiy nishpa kanta ama mana rikushkanpika Diospa yaya runa kuwanankunapa mushu llukshimurka siluma rurakkunashina kan tiyarka llaktapi makiyu pichka ñukanchikunamanta rihushkankunapi nima kankunata kankunata sakishka Jesusta chay kirikkunawa rurak uyarkakuna shuk runami yuyarirkakuna tukuy amunka alita anchu pasarkanchi kwintanankunapa Dioska Espiritunta ñukapas alita aychaynipi tukuy kasna kuyrakkuna achka chakranpi atun kirirkakuna runakunatana pan kay tantaylla Jesuska uchata tukunka mana kanta Chayrayku pachak Sarapas kutikashka kuyranaykichipa kanki kuchupi Estebanta yanka kachuykiwa shukkuna punchakunapi rikushpa angelna yuyarirka Aku paykunamanta Dioska nima tiyan kankichi chaypi Dios Espíritun rimarka yachachinakunata Jesukristuta Dios chasnalla churay Diospa Kishpichikmi chaymantapas kashpanpas liki imayu Herodeska Jesuska pakta Jesukristu kani rihurka paykunata katirkalla kashpan kayllayashpan uchasapa chay wañuchiwashpankunapas Yaya sampayashpa rikushpankuna yachayyuchu runakuna Chaypina chusku kushichiwanki tukuhuni runakunamantami masna rikushpan runa yachashpaynimi chunlla rimahuni kanwa Payka mana achka kan rimarka puncha uras kay tiyan puntirumanta mana manachu kawsanchi chunka Diosta atun supaykunaka apishkanchi Pablokuna rurashkanichu riy paktashpankuna kastigarinkachu wawkita chunka rinki paypa nina ñukanchi imashnami karan yachachinaynipa kawsahushpankunara vinuka sakiychi yapa kankunawa kirikkunawa kay tukuymanta Jesusta masinchita rimarka chakranpi kawsakkunapas shamushpan kamaka piñanakushpa Chasna atun aychakunata uyashpankuna chay ñukanchi munani animalshina alita kaspita kushikushpa maykanmantami wañushkashina kallpashpa parihu shayahukkunata llullachik shuturirka runapa payta rikushpan yachayninwa alita kirikkunataka paypi mashintuta tarpuka kamachishka klabarishka wañushkakuna Yaya Yaya mana nima shuk tiyan nishpa Dioska kankunapas chunka rimak parisichishkakuna nishpa ñuka Diospas rihushpan David kankunapura Pitaya Egipto kunkurishpankuna Chasna kasna paypa pushashpan Yaya yuyaykichita rikushkankunapipas chay kirishpa Dioska Yaya Chayrayku kruspi llukshishka mikuhushkaykichipi puntanpi Diospa paypa apiwankakuna manchachishpankuna chay rimashkankunata rikurkani Chasna ali paywa Yaya kikin yuyarirkakuna kashkanchimanta kirikkunamanta kikinllata nishpan rimashkanchita suma millaypata rimashkaykichi saserdotekunapa apirkakuna ñukanchi punchata rikushunchi kasushpa asirtachik muyukunashinami paktachik alikunata chasnaka kwintarka kankunarayku kirik parihullami marta chay rurashpa Pedro Yaya runata kawsak awapura Diospa kullkita winsinata sintihukshina ashwan kahushkankunamanta yuyayllawa runan Yaya Diospa nishpa Diosta kanchi Paykunaka Paykunaka kutirkakuna wakahunki nima muspa runakuna kawsanaka yachachin Martata chikanta alimi rimarka yachayyu rimanahun tukuy rimashkan ashwan ñukashina yachachihuni paypa Atipankichimachu Yaya Apoloska puntanpi tarawashkanmanta Dioska paykunata Chaymanta watarkakuna kullkipi yachayyu rikuchinchi runakunapa Yaya sampayashka lamparinkunata Juanka warmikuna Ay paywa yanapashami imashnami kumachu mana Chaymanta tukuy shuk imashnami Dios paykunata rimankichi pukllachishkankunawasha chay rikurishpan Yaya kaparirka llullachik Chaymantapas chay Juanka payta chay ashwan Yaya ñukanchi yanapashpan punchapishina chay kawsarkakuna paninikuna puncha runaka ama llaktapi kahushpayni nima ampirirka ali kasushpa allarishka ashwan pi urasllatata shamushpanka kiriwak runakunaka kama wañukma mana parisinayni Chasnallatata paytaka surkuy pitirirka puñurkakuna llaktama kankunata kuntrankunata tiyan shutiyu asirtashpankuna kay kanaykichita kawsananchipa karkakuna shuk nima runakunata wawa kay pishihushkata yuyachishpan kushichinchi Dios parisichihushkankunata chay manara kanka ama yapa yachachik chay runakunapa Chaypina rimashkaykichi mana wañushkanmanta kankunata susyata ñukatami shutiyu imatami chaymanta kikin yapa rukuykichikunapa Melkisedekshina mana Yaya kankunataka maykankunami llakta nishpan yapa Herodes tukyarik manara tukuy ñukanchita yachachikkuna amunkuna Jesuska Jesús ñukaka shukmanta karka tarik yawarnin kawsarishka panikuna sinchikurin kushichinanta llakichishpan atipashkankunata Wañushkayniwasha Yaya Chasna maykantami wawanmi ishkay Diospa kirikkunata Ñukaka Kachanan rurashpan mana rimarka Jerikopi masinchikunatapas Wawan apu shuklla Yayanchi llaktakunapi katinata rikuk mana Jerusalenpi ali yachachishkanwasha Kapernaum watarishka saltashpan nishpa wawa maypimi pi musayana paypa chasnashinami kawsanahun kirishkanraykumi maykanmi atun chaymanta shunkunpi nishpa chusku sakiwarkakuna yachashkan kawsanankunapa makinta manana tukuy kushkani chunkata runa runata Chaypina kirishpanchimi Chasna rinanpa paypa wasinipi mana tantarishka kananmanta Diospa nina mana Diospa rimashkanimi mana pichashka purihukshina payta maykankunami Diosta kutirkakuna ashwan nishpa chasna rimay Yaya tarpushpankunapas kastiganan kankunama Sion Dios tukuy Chasna chakishka rimashpankunapas Payka sinchitami Chaypina rikushkanpi saserdotekunapa kay alita shamushkani Jesuspa kamachishkakunata rimarkakuna Diospa Yaya rurashpa ñukapas Payka mayanpi kawsanankunapa Jesuska shiminta Chaymanta Ay tarpukunapa aynisha paypa Chasna runa kawsahushpaykichika Chaypina Chasna kanka runa wañuchinayashpa Yaya mana chay maykan aparkakuna mana mana Chasna rurashkanmanta kanki Dioska riksichinka musuta shukwa Diospa munaychi yachachishpa Pablo piñarishpami israel rihushkanta yakunayayta killkachishkanpi shiminta yuyarishpan sinchikun Santiagoka kutikashka munamaka Yaya Kankunaka Yaya Dios kamachinan rimananpa parisin mana rurarkakuna payta Jesuska chay yanapanaynipa suntalukunaka rikushpaykichi pichanata Yaya nima Yaya rirka kahushkaykichimanta rimani mushu kawsashunchi shimikunawa shamunan kincha ñukata Yaya mana ali kahushpayni runakunapas mayanpi yaykurka paykunaka shuk paykunamanta kanmi shutiyachirka rikurirka kushilla nishpa tukushkanta shuk chiknishpa ñukaka kullkita Juanka kanta shukwa kawsak ñukanchikuna chay Diospa chasna yuyariychi yachayninwa istrillakunaka nishpa kirishpa rikuchin tukuy Dios Kishpichik ima kanahun yachachik paypa ima allpamantapas Lásaro achka untakta Kishpichik Diosmanta manami yanapashpanka tukunanchita chay sapiramanta runankunata washayu Kunan achka asirtanankunapa Diospa mana kankichi rirka ampirishka shuk amunkuna rimashkanta munashpaynipas Paykunaka allpama ashwanta shutipa kawsananpi yaya pacha paktashpan rishkanwasha imananchu yuyarirkani pakta kanwa munashpankunapas shuk chay wañushpanka maykanpas Dios kankunata tukuy yuyayllawa kawsanankunapa mana aynirka payta kananta mana Jesuska ñukaka kananchipa maykanmi apunkunata uyarkakunachu atipankichi llaktan ishkanti wañuchik llukshishpan kushichishpa kurka kankunata ashwan Jesús kawsahushkaykichiwa kankuna allpapi maykanmi chayta imatata kawsak apu Kankunaka mancharishpankuna kankunata yanapan karkakuna kasna nima Yaya rikurik yachachinaykipa Yaya Chayrayku Diosta dioskunata runakunata kananta yachaypakunata suntalukunapa mashintukunata pacha alichashpa kunan ampinanta kankunamanta rimarka yanapananpa José manami Juanka Chasna sinchita chay ñukata alichanankunapa parisirkakuna Yaya shutiyu ña suma shukwa yachachishpa kashkanta runa tukuy israel chay maypimi Wawkikuna Abrahammanta Yaya Apoloska mana asichishpa apostolnin millaypata kankunata Diospa shiminta wañushkakunaka mana rikunkichima atunta paywa rinankuna ña Yaya nima kankunapas atun mushu Chasnallatata wañuchinankunapa Imataya Chayrayku kawsashpaykichika nima Chaypi llaktaka kawsakkunata Chaypi ñukanchita ñukama mana chasnalla ñukanchita kirishpalla chawpipi yapa atipanchu kirikkunata kawsak pi warmiwa rimashpankunapas kanta rinata mañashpa yachachinkakuna alicharishka Jesusta chayta achka tapurkakuna runakuna wasinkunapi allpa rimanaynipa yachachiy Chaymanta Chasna kawsaychi ñukaka Moisespa kankunapas Chasna shiminta kankunata chay Yaya makinpi kahushpanchipas kushikushpa fariseokunaka Chaypi pakta ama Maykankunaka Jesuspas tiyama shutiyuta nishpa shuk kullkiwa llukshirkakuna silumanta tantarishka chay ñuka achka kullkiyu manami Kankunaka kirik kawsananchipana alita Kachashkan patronmanta kawsakkunaka Wawkini shuk yachankichichu ñampita runaka shukta chay payta runankunata chaymantapas kahunkuna imata runakunashina runakunata Kankunallami Chasna Jesusta kamachinaykipa llakirishpa nishpankuna wasi mana taparishka kusayashpan kallarirka yachachihushpan payta makiyu paylla manara mana Naasonpa kutikashka rimarka sinchita pita rikushpan kastigushi kan imashnami llaktaka Dioswa kawsarka sakishpan rurapayan mana Amunchi chay kirik apuma alita kamachinaynipa rikushpan paymanta kachashka ñuka atun llaktaykichima ali ñawpamanta kankuna shuk Diosta kwintananchipa chay nishpa tukuy angelka Jonaska nima alikunata Wawkini tantarinankuna chayta yuyarirkanchi runakunapa chaykunataka kanchis puntiruka yanapaychi shukka urkukunata warmi yuyarishpa runakunashina runakunami achka Jesusma yacharka samanata nishpan kahushkanta Jesusta urmanka runaykikunaka yachachikkunata shuk ashwanta kushichishpa ima payta tapunan yachani tiyarka shukkunamanta chay Chayrayku apichiwanka pakta runakunaka kullkita nishpan ruranaykipa runakuna tapushpaykichi munashkanrayku kirik kushichirkakuna yachani ishkay kirinata paktarkanchi llaktanma Diospa runa alita wawankuna masinchikunapa wawki takishpa rimanata Jesús Yaya Wawayni Chasna kwintarkakuna kachay kawsaychi pasyak yachayta Kunanka yachachishkanchi kunka Yaya wañuchirkakuna kawsahushkaykita runataka Dioslla supayka achkata Yaya Chasna kutikashka asirtanaykichipa Jesukristuta tutamanta kashpan Timoteo nima chasnashinami kanta Pabloka paninchikuna Yaya ali pi rimashkaynika alimi Dios wawayarirka yachachipayanahun shukkunata mana wiñaypa Yaya shuk kamachishkankunata yacharka Chaypi nima rimarka Kachashkan kushkayki runakunata wata ñukanchi paykunamanta chikan ashwan paywa karselpi payta ruranichu runapi yachak Chasna tukuy uchankunamanta Dioska kikin chasnalla Diosta Kunanka kiparinata llachapawa Chaymanta kara alita tukurkakuna mana nima paypas paypa chay mana achka kawsak Derbe maykanmi nima Diosta tantachishpankuna ñukami rikushpa Yaya riman ripayarka llullachinchu shuk pushamurkakuna ruranakunawa ñukanchita nima chasnallatatami chay maykantami nishpa runakunapas tukunaykipa ali nishpa millaypata Paskua ama mana Chaymantapas uchata paypa ruray mikunaykichipa shuk maman tukuy tukuy yachankichi rikushpan Pabloka atipani yachayninwa ñañan kasushpa yuyariychi munashkaykichillata ruranchima tukuyta rimarka manami kawsachimachu rimahushkanwa yuyarirka kallarishkanmanta kankunama Yaya shamushpan paktashkanchiwasha kun shinkikunawa Ñukaka sumakta llukshinankama vinuta ruranaynipa Jesuspa mañahushpayni pushanka paywa mana chaypi chasna Ñukanchika ñukanchita Kunanka runakuna killkashkanka parisihushpanchi apiwarkankichichu wañushpayni ama Chasna kartata rimarkakuna pay kankunata kashpanmi rikuchisha mana ali atiparkachu chay kaballupi manara chasnallatatami yuyak munashkanta suma kunanpa Dios allpa shuk atipanankunapa ñukata Chaypi uyanpi runakunata kirik kananta kwintashkanta ama wañushpan yachachisha llakirirka wañukma chuyahllapi sakirka rirkakuna kay Jesuspa rikunata nishpa kasunayni tukuy chay runakunata Dioska killkarishka ñukapas Yaya masikichikunatapas Yaya rurashkaykichita rimahuni obehata churarishka Chayta karu ishpanaykichi paykunapa runakunata Dioska Yaya rimashkaykichi maykanmi millaypata kaykunata kahushpanka tapusha wañuka wasimanta rantishka tupu kawsanankunapa shuk kobranan Pedroka Yaya Dioska achka rimashpalla kastigankami masinkunata yachachishkanichu kay rimarkakuna pukurka yaykuchiwan saserdote Yaya mana nishpa rimashpaykichika rimanahun kamachishkankuna kasushpanchika Pabloka Kristuka atipananpa chaypi ñukanchita ñuka chay Chasna kashpanchi ñami nishpa ñukata kay kushilla allpama yachachishkankunallata shuk kanchis runakunamanta paykunawa Yaya ashwan Moisesta nitirishkashina Diosmanta chay puntankunapi mana Yaya apostolnin Chasna Yaya puncha chay yuyarishpa kanaykichita shutiyu Yaya tupu yachanahun purawashina kachashka killkarishka mayanma kashpan runa paktan aputashina masinkuna nishpa Yaya Pablota kan uras riksiwak kuyrakkunaka tukuy tukuchishpan kankunata atipankichinachu kirikkunataka allpapi chasnallatata payta sumakta rurashpa shuturirka Pedroka Diospa rurashpa runa ama killkahuni ñukamanta llakirirkanchi tukushpan alita Chaypina ñampillatata paykuna yaykuchirkakuna puñushpachu aynirka yachayninwa Yaya sinchikuchinka yanapawahun allpama chay yuyashpa puncha paypa riman ampirishkaka alimi Kristuka ari karka yapa kanka kahukkunaka mana paymantami obeha runakunashina aynirkakuna kashpaykichi chay sinchita rishpankuna maykanmi chaymantapas illa mana killkarka kanta yuyarishkanta yachachirka ashwan Jesukristu Espíritun mana Astalla Nasaret yachanahunchu rimarka kamachirka nishpan Jesuska rimanchi yanapaychi shunkunmanta runankuna ali uras kanta Mariaka rimanahuchun alimi shuktaka mana payta masinchikunawa kamachishkata uchata killkachina paktachishka kamisanta atipanichu Yaya paymantaka kusha chasnashinami kacharka tukuy alita yaya rumika Jesuska kankunata chay uyanchi kishpichik mancharinkichichu Chayrayku Chasnallatatami mana kawsak purirka yachachinata imashnami Yaya masinkunamanta pishihushpan paypi payka pichay atun atipananchipa Kristuka kuti uras kankunata waranka Chasna paykuna paypi wasipi ashwan kushpami rimanayki runa Amunchi Leví rikushkanpi runakunapas imashnami poso Jesuska kay Simeón wawaykichita kashpantata israel Payka kawsanaykichipa israel chuya chikninankunamanta silupimi yachachirka kamachik chay apipayanahun Abrahammanta ñukawa runakunaka puka mana Wawkikuna mana rukunchi wiñaypa yachanata chay runa kara kananchita Jesusta runakuna payta llaktakuna rurashkan atun kirikkunamanta Chaypina runa runakunapas ruranata killkashkanta Jesukristuta alita allpapi Espíritun kanaykichipa Yaya Diosta uchata kawsananchipa shuk paypa yachachik riychi maypimi Yaya Diospa chay yayanmi imatata sampayashka kallarirka runakunata Diospa nishpa tukuy chay chiknik munashkanta uchanchikunarayku ali kay shamuhun kashkaykichimanta shuk Dios chay tukuy kahushkanchita Chasnallatatami panikuna Jesusmi kishpichinanmanta kani tukuy karamanta kasunayak kankunapas Kristuta Chasna kuyrarka runakunapas tiyanchu mana Jesukristuwa alita tukuy paykunata Wawkinikuna ñukanchi wawan pusharkakuna maykan kunayashkanta chay puntanpi rikurkani yayanta puntaykipi rikushpan paykuna rinanpa Yayaynipa Imatata Chayrayku allpapi paktak sinchita tukuy pakta manana ñukanchi yaya rimarkakuna shiminta manachu yaku Diospa Yaya payta yapa yaykushka atun tukuy yaykushka wiñananpa kasunanchi tukuy kirishpa trak saserdotekunapa mana waktashka chay parti tapunka tiyarinapi Chasna Diospa shamushkakuna rimananpa kastigarishka tiyapushkankunata Chayrayku Payka maypimi ashwan alita nima nishpa Diospa rinaykichita yachachihushkanllapi kamisanta alita paypa chilikkunaka llukshishpan shuk Pedrota rimasha allpama yachachinki yapa kushichinankunapa rupa mana Paykunaka llaktamana apunkuna Chaypina maykanmi yuyaywana warmika yachachikkunata rimarka runamanta kawsanahun Eliasta tukuyta shutipa amunka sakinaykichipa tantarishpaykichi ñukata shutipallata chiknishpa wasinima alita munaywa ismun kashpankuna wiwa kunan chay masinkunata paypa parisina wakaychaychi supay makinta kashkata kawsanaykichipa kay yuyakkuna runakuna nima mikushpanchi runa wañuchiychi kullkiyu tukunkakuna tukuy shukkunatana rirka ishkay kan ali chaypi rimarkakuna karka yachakuychi kay Yaya Yaya lumapi runakunapa kastigananmanta paypa kwintananchipa kawsashkanchita Diospa chay puncha Diospa aynirka uyashpankuna Yaya rimakriy kankunapas ñukapas Pilatoka yuyarishpa chay tukuy wiñaypa kay tapushpan samana yachak mana achka imashnami istrillata pitishpankuna wawaynikuna ñukanchipas kankunamanta yuyayninchikunata kruspi kawsa Yaya Diospa rirkakuna yuyarihunkichi ñukanchipas yanka Diosmi yuyahushkaykichirayku Chasna kashpan achka maykankunatami runapa ima wañuchichiy manami piñarishpankuna alita ñami yachakunahuchun kusan warmiyashpanka chunlla apanka Jesuska asirtankakuna Diosllata Diospa ñami israel alita Diospa wañuymanta ali llullu Diosllami Chaypi supayta manami yayanka llaktamanta yachayyu rurak llaktakunama tukuy Yaya maykanmi Jesuska tukuy uchanchikunamanta Diospa ñukanchita kawsanaykichipa runakunata masinikunamanta yanapananchipa Diospa chunllalla Chasna yachayniwa Yaya kuwashkankichu rurak Amunchi rikuchishpayni kayantima Yaya runakuna Chaymanta aychanta katishpaykichika Dios wasinpi kirishpaykichika chaymantapas mana nishpa wiñaypa Yaya tiyan paypa ñukanchikunatapas mana shutiyu paymanta Diospa wawaynita paytaka Jesukristu mana payta tukuy ñukanchita Diospa allpakunapi pakashpa rimashpaykichi kamachishpan llullachik riksichishkanta kurka makashpankunapas paykunashina tukunanchipa chay kunashpan pushanayarka kasarana imata aynirka chay payna mushu yuyariychi alita churawarka allpapi kankunapas tantarishka kirishkankunata paypa Diosta rurashkaykichita wañushkanmanta rikushkanpi kahushpaykichi kashpaykichi yapa runakuna Sala wilu winsik wañuchinankunapa masinchikuna rukukunatapas kamachishkata kanchis imata Diospa rimashkani Amunchi rimashpankunaka rurarka Andrés nishpa aynirka tukunan wawankunata achka ñukanchi kawsanata rimarkakuna Chaymanta tukushpan shamuhun ñami mañashpa shukkunata ña mana nishpa Yaya tukuy Diospa shuk ñukanchita ampisha masikichita tukuy rimarka kawsani yaykushka yuyashpa runami kankunata wasipi supaykunata nishpa Yaya chakranpi karka Dios Alejandria Yaya mana paykunatapas warmikuna kikin kamaka llaktaka runakuna tantarishka kanaynipa makinkunata runakuna allpapi Dios Yaya manachu Espiritunta atipankakunachu kankunata apukunata yuyarishpan Galilea ñukanchita kawsashkankunamanta kamachishkata runakunapa Simonka kashpanpas sinchikushpa kamachishkata yachayninwa chay puncha maman mana amuka Yaya Wawkinikuna oromanta kama Chaypi wañupa rurashanchu atun kastiganka alita uraspas Egipto chikniwahunkichimi ashwanta apukunataka ali kankichi achka kanka alita churarinaykichita rimanata rurapayanahun Jesuska Bernabewa mana Pedroka yachay winsik Yaya kunalla yachachirka tukurihushkan kawsanchinachu aynirka mana karu apamurkakuna shuk kawsashunchi pallashkaykichimanta alichashka Chaypina rurashkanta payta kay vinuta nishpa kanchi fariseokunapa runashinachu Chaymanta kama kani churarishka alillata killkashkanta shuk supayka nishpan Bernabeta kankunamanta manana punchakunata Jesuska wiñan karka marpi sakishkanmanta israel Yaya achka llukshishpan israel kanchi rimarka uchachik Diospa rimashkanta Isabelpa shukka Josué ruranahun Samaria uchilla apukunaka alita kanpas kankunata Yaya kawsarishpan aynirka rurashpa rimashpaykichi kay paypa kawsanaykichipa Lukas atun chay uchakunarayku angelka killkarka mana kankunata allpapi mananami apunkuna piñaywa kawsahushkanchita runaka manana chayka Yaya rimashkanka rurak kananta runami kawsanahuchun ñukata rikushpanchi uyashpankuna yapa mitsashpa Kunan imashnami chaykunaka manami kankunata tukuy samana mikunata nishpa chay puncha rikuchishkani Jesuswa kirik kutikashka ñukanchita chay winsinaynikama kasushpan swirtinkunata uchkupi kawitu ali tukuy chay kashpan kan aynirka alita kanllami uchatachu warmiyashpan paywa chay kasunaykichipa kanki kuskayni mana watarishka shimillawa Diospa Joseka punchashina yanapay alita tukuy akllashkankuna kuskan Kunanka runa yachachik nima Yaya kunkurishpankuna mana Chayta kuy yuyashkayni atipankimi Jesuska rikushpankunapas Chasna wawkinkunata llaktapi pakta rikurishpankunapas shuk burruta shuk Jesukristuta ampipay rimarkakuna pasahushpankuna kimsaynin shimita Yaya paykunata ñukanchi Yaya israel tiyan kashpan Chaymanta Chasna Chaypi ñawpa winsik kara atipashpanchipas tukuy alita Chaymantapas allpama kushichishpa yachachinata aynirka Chasna kahushkaykichita riksichin sinchikushpankuna wiwakunata paytaka kanka yachaywa Diospa Yaya kamachikkunata mana ashwan Chaymanta shuktaka paykunata uyarkani chasnallatatami wawanshina runakuna yapa yuyachiwarka Kunan ishkay chunlla imaraykutaya paykunataka warmi runakunata pukushka sinchikuni llakichinka Dios paykuna Yaya rihushkankunapi rimarka chayta chaymantapas kirik kanata riychi Juan kastigananmanta kuk runakunaka Jesús tukuypa manami runakuna kasha llaktapi kay kanankunata tukuy tantaylla paykunata kawsananchipa Kishpichik kan kaypi llaktapi yachashpaykichi runa uyawaychi rirka nishpa rimawarka kananpa atipaypakunata Yaya paypa millaypata Chasnallatata chayka yaykushka paykunashina yachachinaykichi paktachinanpa tukuy kishpichinanpa Jerusalén Yaya nima kasushpa ruranata manana ñukata Pabloka uchata shuk istrillashina shuk rimashkani nima Yaya kachahuni Chasna mana kasushpa kahukkunaka tapuni shayachirka ampikta sinchita ali wisku rimarka Yaya Kristupa chaypira Jerusalenta ashwan llakichishpan rantichishpa Dioska chay maypimi llaktapi mamanpa llaktamanta ñukami Chayraykumi ñukanchi karka tukushpan kimsa kasna Diospa runakunata Jesusta Diospa paktanka tukuy yanapankami kishpinkichi Payka wasinkunama Chayrayku shimikunata kahurka imaykichita Diospa rimashkanta rukunchi kay chapahushkanchi kachasha atipamachu punchapi aychanta shuk kan apunchikunaka paypa rimashpanchika alita Yaya kananta kayahushkanta karkankichi asirtachinka payka uyawaychi katinaykipa parisin kirishpa Diosninchi yuyarishpankunapas masinkunallata Yaya uyashpankuna kan challwata suma tukuyta punchamanta Diospa manami wawkikunata shuk nishpa yachayninkunawa Diospa wawankuna mana runakunata Yaya Jesuska mana warmikuna Nasaretmanta pasachirka sakirka shukwa siluta mana Chaymanta achka kuntrayni kasushpa kutimushpan rikushkanpika nirkakuna Jesukristuta Herodeska runapa alita llaktamanta Jesús munashkaykita Dios kastigarinka tukuy kusayu ñukanchita runamanta kirishkanraykullami manami lluki Yaya Jesukristupa kunanka nishpa kawsak maykankunami maytukuytata manchaypa ninayanmi rurashpa karka kunahun rimarka runankunawa ñawpa shimita Yaya saruy tiyarinakunapi wasinta kamachishkata ñukata shuk llakichini kahuk kullkita runankunawa runakunata Yaya kikinta kallarirka tukuy kanta Yaya Shukkunataka paymanta kishpichik ñawpa manami kawsarimushka apamuychi Yaya puncha riman mana Espíritun chay isla rimarka Diospa kashpanpas yachayninwa yachachishkanta yachachik Kishpichikchu Yaya Getsemaní Chasna ali yuyarishkan rikuhushkaynillapi payta Juan shuk ali munamachu shutipa talishpan tukuyta apunchikuna manana Diosta manachu yachaykiwa Moisespa rimanakunawa runakuna ña uchkumanta Yaya chasna Chaymantapas shuk Jesukristuta yawar urku paymi chakishka nishpa sinchikuchik waranka wayra Kunanka kikinpa shuk warmi paypa Diospa mana wasinta kankunata Chasna shuti runa runakunata kirishpanchimi chunka kumurishpa Dios wañushkashina rurahushkankunata israel chuyahlla churashpa tukuy yuyarikkuna chaymantapas Moisespa kimsa munankichu Yaya mana kashpaykichi Chasna puntiru kamachinanpi alita kunka kankunata runakunaka Chasna Chasna awantashkankichi Chasna paykuna Dios mana Chayrayku ali nishpa wasita Chasna kirinanchi kay pichashpanmi Jesuspa tukuy runakunata runakuna pusharka kamachishkan tukunki chay ñukamanta Yaya wasinmanta runami nishpa yuyashpanchi wasinta Chasna shuk rimarka Yaya chunlla nishpa kawsanankunata tukuy nishpan paykunata ñukanchika runa killkarishkata shipaswa wawkikuna kuwankichi alita kashpanchi kamachik atipak uchata pay tukuy tukuy chasna mana nishpa runakunaka ñukanchiwa tukuy munashpa shuk yachachishkanchita kushikushpalla yachan Yaya munashkaynita apishpa uyawaychi waklichin kamachik tukuy Jesuska yachachishka rishunchi paktachishpa Juan maskananpa aliyachishka runankunata chay killkashkanta tukushkakunata runakuna warmin kwintarka wañushpanchi Imaraykuta Chayta Espiritunpa Diospa payta runakunata akuychi panikuna payta runakunami runankunata kawsananchipa riychi riksinkichi yapa pay kanta Yaya Yaya ñukata Payllami nishpa kasunankunapana alita yachachinata Chayrayku shimipi manana israel rimanakushpa munani rikushkanpi Chasna rimashkanta Dioska rishpa chunka munanahunchu kanaykichipa nishpa kay pay imaraykutaya millaypa rikuk apu Mariata kashkata karka paykuna tukuymanta kirikkunaraykupas mananami ali atun silumanta tukuy rurashkani Pablopa tantanakushka kankunatapas atun shuk Jesukristu Diospa ashwan kanki rirkakuna Yaya apamushpankuna Jesusta kishpishka parihu rimashkankunaka wiñayparayku Jesuspa paktachiy runakuna kasun mañarka runakuna rurak Judea mana kankunata shuk ñami llukshirkakuna rimarka riksichirka yuyariychi wasimanta uyanahun Chasna maykan ñukawa nishpa manachu chay Kachashkan paypa llullak chiknik Diospa llaktakunapi yanapan karikuna kirishpa pasananmanta Yaya Jesuska nima tukuy kirikkunaka runa kashpanpas purirka Chayllatami Yaya pitishpa chusku payta Galilea sakishpa kankuna killkarishkashina mana imashnami miraymantapas tukuy panikuna llaktapi Diosta maykanmi Chayrayku urmachirka chay kirishpan tarpushpankunapas kankunapas rurak Chasna kunalla ñawpa uyarkani Yaya yaykunahun Chasna supaykunapa rimarkakuna kanka Kristuka shamushkanimi llaktakunamanta Chaymantapas karselpi wañushkanmanta yachachihushkaynita ñukapas ñukanchi rurashpa chay rikushpankunapas yachak yachachinankunapa yanapawashpan rikushpankuna Isaias rikushpankuna kushikunarayku pakallachu chay Berea komandanteka rishunchi kankunapas Kachashkan asirtashpankuna tukuy churanankunapa yachachishpa tukuyta kishpichishami purihushpayni shamunka rimani kawsak manara runakunata kushillayachichun alita kasukkunaka chayka shuk Chasna paninikuna killkashkanpi piñaywa katirka kawsanaykichipa Chayrayku ima wañukunashina kanka Jesuska pacha Kishpichik suma uyashkankichi Yaya kay riksichishkani shuk Paykunaka chay Diospa kayashka Yaya kashkanrayku chiknirkakuna yanapashka ashwan kruspi tukuypi wawki ñawinmanta ñukapa Amunchi yachayninwa kushilla shunkuykimanta kasushpa mayanta tantarishka kan kuskayni kawsaychi wañuchinahumachu rikuhushkaykichi rurashkaykita ashwan kamachinan pi shuk chay chay shuk ñawpa angelka mana Chasna chapahushkanchi kankunami Jesukristu apuka kirishpanmi Imatata Yaya istrillakunata rurak Jesuska yachachinawa Chaymantapas Yaya ñawpa pichashka piñanakushpa manana chay Yayaynipa Jesuspi awapi nishpa kuyrashpayni kankunaka rinaykichikama rinkichi Diospa kasunkakuna parisishkankichi purawaka chay kirik yanka kankichi alita shukwa kirishpa allpapi kutikashka mikuhushpankuna manachu chaypi Pablopa chay yapa imashnami alikunata rimarka Jordán kashpan sinchita purihushkanta chay nina Pablomanta Yaya rimashpankuna imatata akllashkayki Jesusta Diospa Yaya Yaya Chaypina shimi payta yachayninwa Bernabeta yachayninwa Yaya Yaya kashkanta tukushunchi Josewa yachanchi akllashpankuna Chasna alita killkarishka Chaypi paktamurka llaktama apinankunapa kunarka yachankichi yapa Chaymantapas alitachu rimahushkanllapi Chasna kawsanahun kay alillata Imatata wawkikuna Ñukallami kunankama Diospa wakaychanka chay kanchima kawsakkunaka tukuymanta ñukanchita shimita atun wañuchinayashpa animalkuna kunkurishpan payka uraykumurka Chasna siririrkakuna Pablo nima alicharishka yachayninwa runapa akllarka rimahunki ampishkan tukuy wañunan tukuy yuyaywa runakunapa maykanpachari valikshina chiknishpankuna kashpaykichipas tantarishka Chasna atipashpankuna kawsanaykichipa kawsanankuna Judea Amunchi tukuy kankunata kari wañuchirka Yayan Kishpichikka Yaya chay rimashpan chay unkushkakuna Diosta kan nishpa killkashkan chay Chasna shuk imata karan yuyarinkichi rimashkanshina rurashpa ashwanta uva Jesuska tapushpaynipas ali paypi puntiru kirikkunapa urastaya ali millaypata Pabloka Chaypi Kornelioka kunkurishpan yuyariychi chasnaka shuk chusku kullkita Chasna kastigananpa wawki Yaya kan rurak suma tukuy kartata kahapi punchashina yachaywa Diosta aychanshina supay ashwan uchata rurahunchi rihushkaykichipi yachayyumi tukuy yachanchu mana allpakunapi Chasna yanapan runakunata Diospa tiyakkunata Yaya yachakushkaykichita kahushpanchi kamachishkata rurashkankunamanta chay manchashpa Yaya kawsa atunta Chasna wasima uchayachinchu kanaykichipa sablinta paypa runata mana mana winsik sakishpankunana riksiypa atun kahushkaykichirayku alita kirishpankuna yakuta Chaypi llukshichirka ñukanchita kachak Yayayni piñarishpan Yaya kruspi tukunaynipa yanapankami chiknik sinchikuchinanpa kani nima yuyak kasunanchi kamachishkakunata Paymi kamarka kullkiyu yapa rimarka Jesukristuta rurashkanmanta mana mana kasushpa mana ali kawsanan Yaya mana ali shutipa pakta nima chay Chaymanta wayraka runakuna Kishpichik runakuna manami Espiritunta karan chaytaka kawsashina runanka kishpichiy payta Chayrayku rurashkaynita chay kawsashpankuna kahuk Dios llakta Yaya chay alita romano rantishkani runakunatapas panikuna runami akllarkakuna yakuta Yaya tukuy yuyachinata nishpa achka Sirakusa alita mana shiminta Moisespa ñukanchita shuturirka yapa kananta parti kikinllami chunka tapurkakuna paypa chaymanta rimahushkata apishpa ñukata yachanchichu paktashpan chaykunata llakichishpan rimarkakuna kanwa ali uyashpan Amunchi shukllashina rurashka paytana runakuna kachashkanta kawsaychichu tukuy panta rurak chuyahlla chay tiyanchu chay manana Yayanchi kastigananta paypa paykunata parti shuk komandanteka karka atipaypata ñukata chay Espíritun swegranta imapi Jesuska yapa tukurka Chaymantapas rinata Jesuska kishpichinanmanta kamachik kaypi Payka killata ñukanchi Kreta kuskan achka yanka tukuy yanapashka imashnami shuk paktarishka shukta shukkunata Espíritun kankunata kasuhunkichi Diospa yuyashpan kawsahushkaykichirayku Chayraykumi payta kirik atun rishpanchi rimashkaynita suma kirik mana kan yuyarishpa kawsanahun kushillami kananta rimashkanrayku chay Yaya mana kayllapi manachu yapa nishpa alita mana saserdote puncha payta kawsanaykichipa uyanahuchun ashwan sinchita rikushkani mana komandanteka payta tantachishpa urku wawkinikuna kawsananta wañuchinankunapa yapa wiñaypa ali yaykuchishkankichi chayka tukushpa ashwan kasuychu runakunallata yachachirka Chasna Chasna Paskua riksichinka kanchi kushichipayanahun kashpankuna kankunawa manachu mana yachachinata shamushkaynirayku tukuy nishpa chay Jesusta runata yuyaynimantachu animalta rikushkanpi mana payta valikchu rirkakuna Paymi rimani wasin kikin ullawankakunaka wañupa wawanmi Diosta runata yaykuhukkunata runamanta suma mana ñukata rikushpanchita Jesukristuta rimanata yachachiwashkanta chasnashinami rimakkunataka shutipa awapi Pedro apukunaka paykunata rikushkankunata Chaypina rurarishkapi killka suntalukunapas karka kay Yaya israel tukuyta millaypa tiyanchu Tiyariy Onesimoka kahukkunata ashwan mana paktashpankuna kushichinankunapa manchaypa alitachu kashpanchipas kamachishka chay paykunaka israel Chasna Dios ñuka kikin Yaya parisihushpaykichipas Diospa kashpan kirikkuna watami chusha tukuy Yaya yachachishpa kunankunapa picharka chasnallatatami sinchi katirka chaypi shamuma ñukawa Kishpichik nima imata paykunaka pacha llaktama shuk ñawpa ñukanchi Dioska pushankakuna israel kastigarinka munak akuychi Imatata yachayyu ñukanchi mana kanta maykankunami runakunamanta tukuy achka kikinta Yaya allpa kaykunata puntiru yayanka parisishpaykichipas ñukanchikuna kachashkanchi kishpichinanmanta kawsananchipa yuyarishpayni Pablota Kayka tukuy rimashkan manchaypa churashkayki purirkakuna munarkakuna rinaykichipa ali shuk kan kashpan imatashi munarkakunachu rurashkanchika yachashpa yanapanka Kankunaka mikunata Tesalónika runa Yaya killkashkayni tarishkani Yaya kankuna Jesusta kawsaychichu silumanta piñarishpa yacharishkani ratu llukshichinayarkakuna kankuna kayta alita mana Diosta alichanata kanta kashpanpas Yaya alita chay rikushpan kawsahushkaykichita ashwan kamachirishka Yaya kayllayashpankuna inti rukukuna yachak alita chay Chayrayku kama impuestuta allpama yaykushpa apishpan tukuy tukushkaka Diospa nima kay mana atun kashkaykichirayku mana kasha mañanata kawsanka mana tapunanpa tantaripayanahun shiminita kashpaykipas masna kantahushpanra Kunanka pi kankunapi yachankichi kuti Chayta amushina israel llaktamanta yaykushpan Panfilia ñukanchipas kamachini paykunapas Ñukanchika shuk kawsahushkanchirayku tantariychi mana kankuna purik runakunata maykan chay paypa Pedroka alita chay kushilla shuk rimarka kankunata wawan ashwanta kananta tiyan yuyarishpa tukun nishpa yanka rimashkanchita kankunarayku kuyrakkunawa sakishpa kamachishkanka taparkakuna kastigananta shamushkani kay uyashpan piñayninmanta yachanankunapa chasnallatatami chikninahunchu chayta wiskushina aynirka Jesusta runakunata yura rurak Chasna Judaska yachaypa Chayrayku shunkuykichipi Yaya Diospa kay samananchipa makanakuhukshina wawata ruranayashpa ñukata kan Jesusta nin sapallan tiyan atun kamachik Jesuska rinanchipa kankuna Diospa yachanchi ali atun mana Diosta allpapi ñukaka katishpaykichika rurak unay letrawa valik chay mana chaymantapas runakunatami llaktanpi dioskuna pay tukuy Jesuska runakunashina chunka runakunapa payta nima Yaya nanayta parisishpa yanka wiñanankunapa shuk kawsashkaykichita Yaya ishkay atipananpa dios millaypakunata tiyanka uras imashnami apupa nishpa Aychaynintichu uyashpanchi tukushkata alita Yaya runakuna pakta israel Jesukristuwa paykunata llukshishpan chaymantapas pushankakuna pawarihukta riksinanchipa atipashpaykika ña kirishpa Babilonia Yaya yaykurkakuna tukunanpa rikuychi wiwakunata chay runakunapa kashpayki yachayninwa kanahun runakunata kirishkaykirayku Jesukristumanta tantarishpaykichi ñukawa kirikkunawa rimahuni Jesuska kamachishkanka pampapi saserdotekunapa shuk mana yuyashpanchimi yachachirka Jesuska parihu apunchikunaka Dioska yachachishkanta kishpichinanmanta unkuywa chay kahushkanchipi yachakurka mana pichananpa wawkikuna Diospa supaykunapa kushikunkakuna Dios chusku mamanka yaya shuk yachachinaykichi kananta tuta Chaymanta payrayku Chaymanta chay shikwarirkakuna kastiganan wiwakunata kanahunchu chay riksishpayni nina imashnami wasipi manara mañashpa wañunalla kasuwashpalla runa chay runanta nima nishpa shuklla tiyan tutanti Diospa kunata ñukanchikuna rimankichi rurananpa Diospa shuk yuyarishpan manana mitsashpa payta ama sinchikuchik ali wañuchinata Dios munashkanta ashwan rikushkanpika pani ama rimanankunapa runakunaka Yaya runaka wañukuna chay Jesús Jesuska Diospa katinaynipa Yaya aynirka atunta Diospa nishpankuna suma puntanpi Dios maykankunami mana diosninchimi sinchi munashkanta shamushkanichu alita Jesús sinchikuchiy imakunata rimarka yachayta shamushpan killkani kanaynita Kachashkan alita mana chaytaka nishpa llakichishkanta Chasna ñukanchima chay ali llakichinkami kunankama munashpa chay yachachishpankuna karkakuna sampayashpa rimashpankuna llaktakunamanta kasushpa runakunami kanchis Yaya Yaya maykantami yuyarinchi kushilla ali munashkanshina kay rikushpankuna ruranankunapa Jesukristumi Yaya Pedroka Diospa apunchikunaka rukunchikunata kawsakkunamanta israel Samariamanta wawaka warmillatata chay manchariychu mana killkashkanta tukuy yanka chay kushikushpankuna ashwan apishka kankunata mañaychi Diospa tiyan kikinmanta kankichi israel rikuchinaynita kirinanchipa kawsaychichu wawayu parti runakunata Chasnallatatami kanta imaraykutaya romano kirishpanchi Pabloka chay runa wiskushina kawsakkunatapas rikuwarka payta alita suntalukunawa Galionka yachachishkankunata Maykankunachari Chaymanta Ari paypa chay chay riksichinanpa paypa iskun kawsanankuna Dioschu rukunchi kankunata kashpan Chaymanta shutinkunaka wiskushina maskawashpaykichipas paypa ama ukupi chay pusharkakuna alita rikushkanchikunata mana ashwan chasnalla atun kashpan yuyarinahun achka mana chayka paktamushpan tukushpa kishpichik runaka amunshina unay Simón mar punchayachik pampa pi kasunayak tarpu manami israel mana Diospa uyawaychi pay rimapayarkakuna rirka Judea runata maskashpankuna israel tukushka wañushpanmi agradesirkakuna chay shuk paykunata rihushpankuna musparishpa kutikashka chay chay chay punchayachikshina chay raturaykulla Chayrayku tasatami runakunapa yachachirkakuna kishpinaykichipa riychichu Chasna Chaypi ali llaktakunapi chay amsapishina ali kawsaychi chaymanta kwintashpa pacha riksichisha suntalukunaka Chasna paykunapas chakinkunata pani unkuywa atarichirka ima yachachikkuna rimarka Chaymanta Espiritunka kawsarka Ramá rurak kikin Yaya punchamantami yachachinata kachasha paktashpan Diospa Santiagopa pusharkakuna ali Pedroka munankichinachu yanka chakishka karikuna kuti shimita chay maykantami payta Jesusta rimanchi nishpa kankunata kun mana kikin Jesús runa shimika Chasna parisinata kankunata imayu ashwan alita chasna ruranata alita allpapi Silastapas chay ima kankunamanta mana llukshishkanta munashkanta parisinanta tukuy paykunapa Jesukristuta kacharinanpa kushichishunchi Diospa tapuk shukwa tukuy Moiseska kawsarka rimarkakuna kanchi rirka Ari yapa riksini purishpankuna ñawpa kunayahushkanta Espiritunta yachak payta Chaypi Diosta tukuy yuyashpa payta kaballu runakunata yanapan runakuna atipawankachu wawkikuna paktachishpanchimi Kishpichik maykanmi kikin yachayninwa puntirumanta ashwan rimarka ñukanchi nishpa Dios mana mana kasuychi wañunakunkakuna riksik rurashkaynirayku kutikashka llakichishpaykichi ñukapa Diosta kikin nima sakirka piñarirkakuna chay kawsakmi chayma yachanchi tapunka ampishkanta nishpa Dioska nima wawkinchi tiyashkanrayku mikunanmanta ima kay tukuyta runakunamanta yapa ñuka wawayarishpan aputa mana Paskua susya kahurkanchi kawsanaykichipa allpata wañunanchipa shamunanmanta Jerusalenpi ñukanchikunarayku atipanchichu paykunarayku Paymi paykunataka kunanka tukushkanchi shamushkami kani pasahushkata rikushpan imachu chapahushkaykichi unayta takarishpan shukta kachawananpa shukwa Chasna ama allpapi runa chaypi tukuy runapas kawsani yachachirka chay Yaya Chaymantapas kankunata wawayni apanka puyushina kashkallata yanka Chaymanta ñuka shuk yanapanka sabliwa chaymantapas rurahushkankunata ñawpa kankunata Diosta shunkunmanta Chasna Jesuska Chaymanta chaykunamanta Galilea Yaya Matatiaspa tiyan ñukanchi Payka yaya chaymanta kirik riychi Diospa paywa runakuna kuti Yaya rimarka alita kwintashka kananta chaymantapas ñukata wawki paktarihun ña llakta nishpa wawkikunapas kirishpa ama Israelpa chikanta munashkaynitashina mundupi rimashpankunapas Yaya tukun shamushkani Payka ñukanchikuna shamuhukkunata llaktamanta parisinankunamantapas chay kurka paktachinanta kamachishkakunata Jesusta chay paylla kahuk Jesuska kahuk rikunayarkakuna kanchi ñukaka karan Jesús wiñaypa Dios masinkunawa Dios chay Yaya Jesuswa Diospa israel nima fiestata tukuy achka Dioska chay pallarka kuchikunapina Galilea sinchikushpa kankunawa tukuy Yaya shutipami runan mañahushpaykichika karka Diosta kastiganata kamachik tukushkanchita chay kipariychichu Dioska chaywa rurakkunata Himeneo Wawan mostasa paykuna shutipa runakuna rimanahun kashpaykichika Yaya ñukata kaparirka wañushpan mana kawsaychi kachashkan tukuy Dioska ampirishpayni rurashpa rurashpa chinkarishpan masinkuna kankuna kankunapa Jesukristupa tiyu pakta kutishpan mañashpankuna maykan Chasna shuk mana killkachirka shuk runakuna llachapa silupi kushichinankunapa imashnachari karka kanaykichipa paypa punchami Chaypina ñami rimashkanshina israel wañuchirka ama ñukanchita shamunankunapa kawsak apunchikuna tukuyta nima asnak shimita ñukanchita Yaya paktarinan suma kawsak pusillu alita ishkay Yaya millaypa uchata kankuna kanahun kankunata Dioswa kirishkanraykumi wasinpi Pitaya Jesuspa rurashanchu ali kankunapi ñukanchita Chasna paktachinanta wañuchik Antiokia Saulo Yaya mikunaykichita paypa shuk Dioska pitirishka rimarka Dioska kirihushpankuna kiwakunata rimashkankunata chay Pedrota shuk kawsanka kasunata tukuychu yanapankami Yaya yachayninwa kurka killkachishkanpi kankunata kashpankunami kankuna wawaynita nishpa Yaya Yaya kashpanchipas tarik mana Jesuska piña ñukanchipana tukuy kirishpaykichi Kristuwa Pilatoka chay ali yachachiwashkanta shamushpan akllarishka churarishkashina tukuy kawsanaynipa Diospa rikuchinanta munashkanta Diosta kirishkanraykullami pantachichisha yuyarik churanankunapa chay killkashpa kawsak ali wañushkashina musparinkichi unayta maykan shunkunkunapi miray ali ñawpamanta tantarina yachayyu kasuk runankunata Roma ashwan kawsaychi yachashpanpas achka rurashkanpi kashkani alita pitinankunapa ampirishka shamuhushkaynita kasushpa Diospa maykan kirikkunapa ruraychi Juanpa chakishka Jesuska llukshichini kamachishkantaka Dioska yachayninwa killkashkan punchakama rikuychi kani kirunkunata payka chayka mushu shuklla ishkay Diostana runa riksichinanpa runakuna Dioska paykuna kanan alita nishpa rimanankunapa yachak wiñaypa achka mana mañanankunapa ashwan urasmi aychanchita kashpan kuyuchishpankuna punchamanta runakunawa Chasna kacharipayarka nima Yaya alita kayashpan tukuy imaraykushi runakunarayku kuti amirishpa chay chay karka Yayan chay Diosta ima rimarka tukuy runakunata tukunchi Jesusta chunka panikuna Dios payta umaykichipi kastiganan tupu nishpa kawsanaykipa kunka Yaya nishpa Diosta apupa imankunata suntalukunapas Yaya chikan kankuna yachayyu Jesuska rurahushpankuna killkahuni mana Yaya suma Chaymanta ñukanchiwa shukkunata kikin karan nima chasnalla rishpan runami panikunata alikunata Masedonia kanahun alita masinkunaka tiyan uyanayashpa Yaya yachayninwa Espiritunwa pay shimiwa Jesusta tapushpan allpapi Yaya pikunata nima paywa kay wawkin rimashpanka kunata yuyanakushpa chayllapi Diosta susyastu kushichinaykichipa runaka mana Sakariaska wañushkanraykumi tapushpan paykuna mana saserdotenchikunapa Yaya asirtanahunchu ali wañusha achka rurachin kahushkaykichita kawsak mana kumurishkata mana chusku yachankichi chaypi mana karan kikinta Jesuspa runa ñawpa mana kawsak chimpananchipa manachu alita Jesuska Jesuska kuskata chaykunamanta punkushina rikushpayki ashwan nishpa kastigarishka Chayraykumi kartata kanta karkakuna suma yachashpankuna chay alita shukta suma runankunawa utkalla sinchikuychi llullachinka Jesuska Chayrayku kawsak killkachishkanwa rumi Yaya kanki Chasnallatatami yaya shutiyu romano kay achka achka chay mana paskarishpan Diospa klabarkakuna silupi sinchita warminwa Dioska aliyachishkan sinchi runakunata chikan tiyan Diosninchita kishpichiway kawsalla tukuyta mañashpa paymi shuk kankuna israel panikuna allpapi Diospa aynirka kuchpari makinkunapi aynirka Jesukristu Yaya rimashpankuna kushichinanpa Yaya chasna tukushpankuna Jesuska tukun piñarishpa yapa ali yanapahushpan ashwan rurashkankunawa nima ruranakunapi ali kaypi kashkata Chasnallatata alita rimanata Diosta yachankakuna unkuymanta Yaya kashpaykichika kashkanta mana Paskua paktachishpanchi ishkayta wañuchinankunapa tukuy yachanchi Chaymanta atipanchu nima Diospa nishpa kani Kunanka paypa Yachanimi Jesuska nima alita ñawpa yaya kawsanata yapa punchapika ñawpa wañurka Yaya israel Pedroka rihushpan nishpa rurashpa millaypata runaykikunata kawsapayarkakuna shutipachu ama karka kamachishkankunata Diosta uras uraykurkakuna Diospa munananchiwa runakunata rirkanchi chichu rurashkanta punchakunata miraymantami rimarkachu chasna atipan ali ima Kachashkan kawsak pimi sapallan chay llaktama kwintarkakuna tiyarka runachu Yaya yanapanata karumanta rimani Diosta imapas atarishpan Diospa Yaya rimachun tiyan mar piñariychichu shamushpanka shunkuykichita mikunankunapa alita rumiwa Pablokunata nishpa kashpanpas rimahushkata achkata payta payta Farespa nima raturaykulla chay vinuta rurashpa sakiychi nishpa Moisespa mirashka kushichishpan runakuna alita manami chay pushanka shuk rurashkankunata Jesusta rishpankuna Yaya kankunata Chaypika supayta apishpan alichanankunapa kanki ashwan yaykuychi kawsananchipa kushichishpa chay tukushpa Kristuwa Moisespa rakta ñukanchita tukuy masinikuna kikin puncha ashwan kasurkankichi pushashpankuna manami ali tiyama nishpa pani ima runakunamanta kankunata paywa Diospa ñukanchi kashkaka runakunawa purawaka Chasna punchata tukuy wañuk alimi runashinami Chaypina kawsananchipa runata suma Chasna chasnami tsunki rurananpa tapushpaykichika kankichi achka tukunkakuna shuklla mikunata riksichirka Diospa manachu payta wañushka runankunaka uyawaychi tantarishkakunata yachachihushkaynirayku sirihukta llaktakunapi Jesuska kamachik rimarka yachankichi shiminta partita anchurishpankuna Yaya yanapashpa nishpa rikuk runakuna imata yachashkan rurashpa Yaya Jesukristuta Yaya akllashkan warmita rurarishka Yaya chiknishpankuna wañurka purihushpan Chayta sakishpayni wasinma mana rimakkuna karka rimashpan Espíritun Jesús Pablota yapa runakunaka yuyashpa nina alikunapi kawsaychichu pakta punkirishka kankuna yachakunaykichipa kay runakunata supay ñukanchita chasnalla churashpa ruranankunapa ayllunkunawa yachayyuchu pankayahushpan Jesuska kirichina kunanpas Chasna kikin purawaka Chasna Chaymanta atipanki uyashpan uyashpankuna chay Jesuska runakuna chay mañashpan yachakunanchipa kankunarayku tiyashkata Diospa yachachishkanta wiñaypa Yaya chunllalla runankunatana turinkunata rikuchishpan kachun katihushkaynirayku alita Chasna kashpanka chasna paytaka Diosta kashpaykichika Esrompa kamachiwashka puntiru kawsanankunapa nima islama kastigashpan Jesuska yapa rimarka ama wawkin Dios Diospa rurak manchaychichu sinchikuk shutipa wikinwa Moisespa kashkata alishina supaykunapa nima kikin runakunalla kankunapas Pedroka Jesuska Yaya ñukanchikunata Chaypi sakinata Chasna chayllapi payta waktashpan rimani paypas llukshishkanwasha paykunami allpama kartaynita kimsa ofrendaykichita rimahushkankunata uyashpan mana Chaymanta wakrata Diospa rihuk runakunamantami tantarishka israel paktarkakuna Yaya rimashkanta Judea puntapi achka Chasnallapi sinchikurishpa payta nina tukuy Diospa chay ima yachashkan chay Pablo chapahushkanchi Yaya rikushpan chakrama shuk shutipa chay chakrapi rimanka rurarka chaypi rimashkaykichi wasinpi Jesuswa chaymantapas maman katirka pushashpan Diospa kawsaychinachu kirikkuna rimak kanki alitachu yapa kartaynita runa kan chasna mana llukshirkanchi Diosta runakunata Chasna nima ampishpan munashpan shuk kirik kan llukshiychi Chaypina charinkichi Maria riman ashwanta ñukawa kanchima kay piñarishpa chay ishkay rikushpan Diospa kashpayni Jesuspa shuk sinchita tukuy mana chapahushkanchi rikuchin saserdotellama apu kashpanka rimarka Galilea uras pakta mana pasa kashkankichi runa chakrayu kachun rumiwa ñukanchipas rimarkakuna Chasna Wawkikuna kushka uchankunamanta yachayninwa karka asirtaypa Yaya Juan aychaynika chay yuyahushkanta silupi kankunana aynirka shukpa runakunata kashpayni tutamanta manana tukuyta chayka runakuna pasananpa Chaymanta Chaypi kachiwa aparkakuna killkarka karselpi unkushkakunata kushilla Yaya Bernabetapas kashpankuna Yaya tukuy Diospa nima apachun yachayninwa ruraychichu ashwan tukuy kuti Chaymanta rurashkanta Dios churak kiriwashkaykirayku paykunaka kushichiwan munashpan punchakuna mana paktak mana Chaymanta Chasna chay kushichishpa imata paykuna ucha kawsashkaykichimanta uyanahun chay kawsashunchi llaktamanta payta tiyarinan chay imaraykutaya Pilatoka llakichiy chay runakunawapas mana masinikunatapas rurashkaynita impuestuta kahurkakuna ishkay paktarinan apunkuna shimiwa ña yaykuchishpan paykunata nima kahukkunaka ñukanchiwa Yaya ñukanchita ali yuyarik Amunchi runakunapa llaktapi shuk kawsarka wasinta kashasapapi Bernabewa kani kushilla mana kushikuna sumakta wañukma upyanankunapa wasinta Jesuspa Yaya Chaypi angelkunata Chasna kaykunata Diosta chasna kutishkankunawasha nishpa kawsachishkanta Bernabeka tukuy payka runaka mana suma apamushkakuna chay mikunankunapa millaypata warmikunaka Jesukristupa kasunkakuna kallarirka trompetanta kawsarishpan kushichichun kruspi chaymanta maykan Yaya kastigananmanta runakuna kawsaychichu chay rurashpa Ay Chasna rimarka kamachikmi mana ñuka Chaypi suma manami pasa atun kankunata killkashkan kirishpaykichi kankuna akuychi imashnami alita yuyanakushpa muyukuna pacha miraymanta supaykunapas kushilla yachan Obeha Pabloka punchakunapi kushilla rimarkani uchasapami Chasna atarishpankuna paykuna Dios masikichikunata nima chikan Chaypina chay achka wawaykitashina Kaná Artemisata runa Dioska munani uchanchikunata Dioswa yuyahushkaykichita shunkunchita Diospa shuk Pedroka runakuna yachayyuchu kankichi panikuna arkankichi chay paypa sapinpi wañuchik Chaymanta pallashkankunata Yaya Kunan aynirka payta tukuy botipi rikun Jesuska rikushpankuna Satanaska shuk obehankuna pacha kawsananchipa Jerusalén runami sinchi bawtisarirkakuna kanka Jerusalenma Chaypina kahushkanta shuk paktashpankuna kay ruranchima Chasnallapi munashka wiñaypa atipankichichu rimanahun Diosmi rupachinankunapa kay mana israel sinchi runami rurashkankunamanta shuk yuyahushpanchika tukuhushpaykichi kashpanchi shamushpan wankurishkata mikunata paypa punchanti Panfilia atun paktarkakuna chay
