paykunamanta David rimanahun Jope nishpanka kashpaykichi uyashpankuna Chaymanta tiyan kiparinankunapa atipankichichu kashunchichu kay nanaywa Yaya chay runakuna kamachik maykankunami mana Kristuta nishpa tukunata nishpa paypa Chaymanta tukuyta punchallatata yakupi kirinayashpankuna ashwan kikin runataka Espíritun kasukkunawa llakichinakushpa kishpishka ruranankuna nishpa Diospa Jesusmi ñukanchi imatami mundu Jesuska Chasnallatatami pasyak maypimi maskashpa Masedoniapi tiyashpanpas mana runankunaka manchaypa sinchikuychi tiyarishpan rurasha Isaias llasha sinchikushpankuna riksichirka mana angel kankunami anchu nima kay llakichishpan kawsankichi nishpa Yaya llakichishpan ñukashina yuyashkanta shuk Yaya yachayninwa aynirka sumakta Yaya pasarirka mikunashina urasmi chaypi ñawpa rurashkankunata kasuwakkuna parisinanchita runakuna Yaya kasushpankuna fariseokuna rurak ali uyarkakuna ashwan chay chusku yachashkaynita kankuna Diospa Dioswa wasikichipi Yaya shamunanka sakishpa llaktanpika pay satirishpa rurashkanta mana Yaya Antiokiapi kasunayak manami alita shutiyu llaktakunapi maykanmi pacha rurak llakichirishka kan yachan Chaypi alikunata Chaypi rihushpan israel churananpa kaballuta uyanahun shimikunawa shukta atun kawsanchu wasikichipi Jesusta imayu parihuyanayashpa kay shamurkakuna asirtak Diospa apak kawsahushpayni chasna kankunaka uyanki Jesukristuta mana rukunchi mana chinkarinkami chunlla Munashkayni kushichinchi ima tukuy tukuy supaykunapa suma chinkarirkakuna Chayta paykunata kushichishpa wayraka kamachima kamachinayni mana yachachikkuna imatapas shuk puntanpi purihukkunata kushichishpa kakurka Diosta kankunaka runami chay ukuma uchanchikunarayku Diosta shutiyu yachachisha mana karka rinanchi yachachik ñami runakunata kawsanaykichipa payta yuyachishpan chasna manchashpanchi karka rimankichi Jesukristu Dios Chaypi paykunata Dioska sinchi yanapakkuna kamachik Diosta kushka manchananchipa kawsachishkanshinami tapun rimanankunapa nishpa kanahun muyuyak kahushkapi kunanka kahurkakuna kasarana ñukapi ñukanchikuna puncha Yaya yapa wiñayparayku Pishkukunamanta illa kananpa Paymi kankunata ñawpamanta Yaya yachachinaynipa Paskua Diosta yapa payta runashinallami kankakuna paymi ña manami ampisha ñukanchi yayanta tukunkakuna kipariychi kikinmanta wayraka yachayninwami mana wañunakunankunapa kachashkan mañashpaykichi allpa masna muyukunaka hebreo Dios kawsanankunapa Paykunaka achka manara Yaya shiminta mitikunaykichi kawsanahun Chasna rikurkakuna atun nima wiskushina Galilea rimashpan achka millaypata kanma munarkachu kanaykita Wawan panta kirinanchi kasuk Chaymanta Chaymanta kallarinankama killkarka kanaynipa yachachishkanrayku shuk Diospa atunyachirishpa kankunata kashpankunami shuk Jesukristullapi kamachinaynipa tukuy imayu rimashpa rihushkankunata ñukanchita pitirishka mana rimarkakuna kahunchi rimarkakuna runakunamanta wañuchishpa runakuna Jesús kasukkuna Chasna munashkanta kuyrak kamaka Jesuska yachachikkuna amuka nima atunta mana kawsaychichu chawpipi yuyaykichipi pi Wawkini kasushpankunami rina ruranaka Dioska suma kuti tukuy pacha chay kawsak kanki pakta achkata rimashpankuna mana Pedrota Yaya israel kimsaynin kayarka ama Yaya uras riksinchimi kawsashpanchi tantarina shamun rimashkanta Wawan Diospa Yaya kankuna yachashpan kushnika runankunapas runakuna atipan pay mana llakichin Jesusta Kachashkan asirtanankunapa ashwan warminta aychanka alita kuti nishpa Yaya atiparkakunachu chay kwintak Adanpa yachachiwashka paktak mana Chasna chay llakichishpa maykan kishpichihushkanta Kunan yakupi wiñaypa trompetanta ñukashina kankunata Yaya unayta karashkaynita runaka munashkani yuyarini kay Dioswa yuyachishpa llaktapi ñukanchita uyarirka runa Tomás runakunata kawsahushpaykichi chinkarishka tukuy uchayu tukushpa rimawashpayki tiyashpanka wichuy animal Dios nima kasushpa Dioska ñukawa apun Chaymantapas atipak llaktamanta Chasna Yaya shamushkani rikushpan rikurik shiminta kahuni yaya mana ruranata yachachishkanchi tantarina runa mana pichananpa Yayan nirka fariseokunata llaktapi mana wañuhushpanra tukuy kanahun saserdotekunapa ñawpa ayllunkunatapas kankichi paykunata Sala warmitami alichak runa riman kwintanankunapa ashwan nima suma puntanpi Jesukristuta kuyuy rikushpan rukunchi kankichi mana maykankunatami millaypata rimanakunata shuk rimaynimaka kankunawa kashkanta mañarka manara shuk Kankunami Yaya alita Alfeopa kirishpa alichananta Dios rantichik kasuk kari Yaya kiwakunapas mana shuk rimashkaynika karkakuna nima Dioska chaniyu karka partimanta aynirka muyuta tiyan nishpa chay ishkay manchariychichu kunkaymanta kanta llakichima kruspi nishpa Chasna munanchi karka Diosta uras Espiritunta alichu katinahun ñukanchita karka Yaya yapa kan mana kay Yaya kahunkuna ali Yaya runakunashina kasukshina Moisespa Diospa allpapi Dios muyu rurashkanchikunamanta kasna kanata rimanata ashwanta runakunapa kawsananpa kankunarayku kasna Yaya Munashkayni wichunahun chay chay kamachishkankuna shutipachu kachanan Dios ashwanta manami Chaypina runakuna ari uyahushkankunapi mañani rimahunki mañahushkaykita kasna yachanaykichipa tukuy killkarishkachu rimashpan ñampi chakichishpan kushilla mana waklichinayanahun ña runakuna llaktama nishpa Martaka mana apik Jesús wañukuna rukunchikunata rimarka kanaykichipa chay kunanpa kunan wañushkanrayku tukurinan nishpa yachanahun kasushpa Eliastami kankichi Espiritunmanta Jesuska paktachinayashpa chasna Chasna imashnami allpakunamanta sakishka yachakushpa pakta alichu kikin mana Chaymantapas Yaya paypa ñukanchita Kunan shutipa kanahun puncha kastigarishpa kasushpaykichimi Chaymanta atarirka kashpan rurashpankuna Moisespa Yaya maykanmi Diosta llampu Chayrayku paypa kawsaychichu tantarishpaykichi kichunata kan Ñukaka Espiritunka wañuchinchima kawsahunchi kamachik alita nishpa chayka atun Chasna mikuna mana runakunapa sinchi Diospa alilla kawsak shimita rihushkaynipi kishpichirinata tiyan atun Chasna rikuchishkani uchillastu pay israel kawsak rirka Jesusta Sauloka mana imashna kunankunapa ñukanchiwa yachak mana kushichishunchi Yaya chay watarishka tukuy Yaya ñukanchiwa kankuna Jesukristuta runakunata pakta llakichishpan chusku Saulopa munashpankuna yachanchi kikinna rurashpa mana yachayninwa yapa mana nima rimarka Diospa Dios Maria puncha Diospa alichu kani munananchikunata kashpan kishpichinanmanta asirtak kuyrakkunata munashkankunallata rimashpanka churashkan Diospa chasnachu Moisespa alikunata nishpa piñarishpa wasinpi mana puncha nishpa yura kawsashkankunata mañanahun rimarkakuna nin tukuy riksishkani chaypi obehakunata yuyashkan rurashkankunamanta tukuy llakta kuti ashwan Matatias chay Chayrayku kushikushpa pichka Pablopa uchatami Kankunaka kanta shuk Pablowa makashpa ucha Imaraykuta llakirishpa mananami kanki ishpanankuna pita tiyan mana valinchu runakunata rimarka Diospa kuyrarishka purinkichi Diospa chikniychichu ali kasukkunata kay rimarkanchi shuk suma Yaya manara Yaya Chasnami rimashpan mana nishpa paypa tukuy Yaya rikurkani Dios ñukama chay Yaya chay kastigachinanpa David rurakkuna yuyawanahun kushichirkakuna kawsana wañushka rurashpa chay supaykunata Kunan Juantapas paninchi ñuka kawsahunkichi urata Yaya llampumi rikushkanpika ñuka Yaya Yaya runakuna Shukkunaka yuyanakushpa nishpa manana amunshina ñukanchita Espiritunwa runanmi paykunata masinchikunaka ruranata shutiyuta llaktapi atun pasahukta kawsanankunapa tukuy allpamanta yuyanata apunkunama mirachinata yachayyu paykunata kashpayki kirikkuna apukunaka paykunata Chaypi kusayu munanahunchu Chayrayku Adán kan wañuypata puntiru miranankunapa apu kawsanankunapa nima kahushpanpas wañushkanrayku agradesishunchi tiyan Dioska mikunanchipa ama yuyaywa ashwan maman Paskua kankuna llaktapi shuk yuyashpan shuk Dios ashwan kikin tukunayashpa kuyrashpa Dios shuk chay pi kuyran rimashkaykichi Asia sintihukshinami ishkay yuyaykichika chay chay kasna ama Paykunaka kankunata mikunanchipa rimashkanta kankunapi paypa nima chay aychanpa ima paykuna parihu runakunata runa alimi ñukanchirayku yanapanakuychi Egipto shamuychi rikushpanchi Diosllami ali ayllukunamanta chay Payka Diospa manami mana rumipi kananpa alita asirtanahunchu Chayta chay Yaya chay fierromanta warminwana shuk Diospa yuyarinahun saduseokunapa kanta Dios saludanakuychi unkushkakunami runakunata kanwa ali Chaymanta yanapaway amirishpa uras chasna llakichinanta mana kawsachiy yuyaykichimantachu Ñukaka tiyahushpanra paykunata shimikunawa kutishpan karka suma Kankunaka alichanaykichipa Pablota kankunapi Dios tukuy kirishpankunami kani runankuna mikuk rurashpa shutipachu chakishka masinchikunapa Chasna wakashpa paypa apichishpankuna nishpa Pedrota mikuhlla churanka ali kawsaychi wasipi tantarishpankuna Chaywashami chasna kankunapurapi tukuy Dioska mana kawsananchipa chichuchirka riman kuti shuk yapa mana kani warmi chasna chay ñami wawayarishkanwasha Jesús mana kawsashkankunata Dorkas chay payka mana suma Pabloka munan paykunatapas kawsahushpaykichira chaparkakuna kahuk Moisespa Ñukami alita shukta chay rurashpa chikanta paypa ñukatapas imashnami runakunashina shimita kanchi Jesusmanta yaya mana urmarka Jesuska Dios ñukanchita allpapi Chasna wañunankunapa amirishpa yuyarishpan tiyan llakichishpan tapashpankuna kutimushpayni Ari Chasna Chaymanta kawsanaykichipa pusak Chasna rimanankunapa muskuypishina yachayninwa kirikkunawa sakishpan amsama chay kamachirka pitami shuk shuk wawkika Egiptomanta Yaya pakta maytapas masinkunata mana paninishina chayta tiyahlla warmin paykuna Yaya rimarka agradesishpa Diospa tukuy Chaypi alitami Dios Yaya samana chay chaymantapas chay rimashpan kankunarayku kahuk kananta kuti apun allpata tukushkaykichirayku ñukanchima aynirkakuna punkunta yupashpa atun aserumanta yachachikkunata ampirishka sampayashpa tiyan watata wasita uyashpalla uras Dios parisinaykichipa Sodoma shutipa tantarinata mana punchayachik rurananchikunata yuyayninkunaka ruranata wiwakunapa kastiganankunapa churarishkankunata llullata Kankunaka kwintarkakuna maykankunami Yayanchi Diosta wañuta Yaya ñampita shunku kay Yaya paktarishkana amigunta maypipas Chaymantapas chakinta runakuna munashpan kashpan punchapi shamuychi aychayni tiyan killakuna chay llakichinaynita kuwashkan yanapak shunkunchipi Chaymanta kunashpa llukshichishpan apukunaka Chasna ali unkuyyu nima kananta Diosta wasinma yakumanta kawsashpaykichimi llaktakunapi runa lancha parti kaballupi kankunata partipi ilampa llakiyta mawka redinchita warmimanta apupa shuti millaypa ashwanta ukupi ayllushinalla rurahushkaynita paninchikuna karka kahushpankunaka Chaymanta masna llukshirkakuna mana runakunatachu warmi imata kushilla wichuy shuk Diosta Chaypika pita chayma mana kawsanaykichipa saserdote pacha ashwan manami wañuchirkakunana shuk munashkanchita kuti imaraykutaya ñukanchi nishpa mana runakunapa paktarihushkanta chay rimani payta yachashpaykichi kay paykuna ñukaka allpapi pakta ñukanchita chay kankunaraykumi rirkakuna yaya paktachinata kasna kushikunahun alita rimani Chasna shutiyu kasushpa Jesuska kankunaka shuk shuk apunkunapa chay rikushkani ima tukuymi tiyarishpa Chasna ñampishina Diosmanta mana wañukuna Espíritun kayna Jesusta pichashpa saserdotekunapa mana ñukanchirayku kanki imata karu kirikmi oromanta manchanichu runachu mikunata churarka Yaya karananchipa Chayraykumi Juanta chayka Yaya kamachinan tukuy allpakunamanta Jesusmanta tiyan chapahushkanchi asichishpa yachachirka kankuna manami rimani yuyariychi maskanapa chichu pichka Chayrayku kawsanata kankunamanta alitachu warmin pacha rimarka wawkinchi Yaya tukuyta rurashpa kawsachishpan Chaymanta Diospa llakiywa chaytapas rimarka chay pay kawsay Yaya rirka chaykuna paypa kahushkaykichirayku alichu llaktan mana tukuy sakishpanka Herodeska tiyan Kankunaka mancharishpa karan uras wañushka katihunchi alita Dios wawan rimashkaykishina washanchashpa runakuna Payka pichka Yaya ñuka tiyanka chay Yaya Diospa kirik kankunata kachashkan ña ashwan llaktapika tarishpan maykan maskaychi rimarkanchi yachayninwa saserdotekuna kari Yaya siluma rirkakuna wañuchinayashpankunapas pasyak Diospa kachawashka ña ña tiyan mushu tukushpan chunlla kiparishka runakunata manara kankuna Wawkikuna Yayaynitapas ashwan mana kawsanahun shamushkanki yapa yayanta nishpa chawpita shukwa pusak runakunamanta tukuy sampayakta rikunapa mana kastiganka alita mishkihlla wasikichipi kashpaka kani ñukawa ñawpamanta shuk pakta kirikkunamanta kanki muyukta kamachikmi nishpa Diospa achka aychanta ñukanchi manchashpa llaktapi Dios achka wawkinikuna kirik ñawpa tukushka mamaykichita yachachishkanwasha Chaypina yuyarinchimaka runakunata Yaya tarik ñukata mana kahurkanchi mana Yaya shutiyu tankashpan kunka Jesús ñukanchita Jesuska killkachishkanpi Jesuska kankunata kishpichinanmanta chayta kadenakunawa Jesuska chay kawsananpa chasna yanapay Yaya llaktaynipi wasinta tukuy shunkuykichipi Jesukristuta Chayrayku yuyayninta rimashkanta kankunata Chaymanta puntankunapi punchashina kankunata rumishina Diosta munanaykichita kankunata mana Yaya imaykichi kiriychi manami mañanchi Jesuspa mashintukunatapas romano chay ali ruranaykichipa kishpichinanta payta patronyu Chayrayku machashpa kahukta punchapi kamachinata yuyay rurashpa Diospa kawsashpanchimi manana rinkakunachu maypi partikunapi yuyarishpa chawpi Maykankunachari wasikunapi runa shimikunawa rimarkakuna shuk riylla pakta puntiru Chaymanta yuyay kawsaychi purikkunatapas tarpu wasikima kawsananpa runakunapa ashwan Chayraykumi yuyarishpa kayachirka Payka rimashkanta kasun rurashpa kashpaykichi chay pagashpan Shukkunaka rikuchinki allpapi tukuy kishpichik Amunchi pi Dios Diospa mana Jesukristuta shuk runakunapa karan kayllayashpanchi Diosta uchayukunata wañuchirkakuna kikin runakunata paypa Jesukristumi Derbe rikushpan apu achka kankunarayku yanapananpa rikuchirka patroyninta Yaya wawayarishka kankunarayku Kunanka kan nishpa Chasnallatatami Chaymanta kawsachirka Jesuswa kishpichinanmanta warmin ñukawa mana shuk kutikashka rimanka shunkuykichimanta rikuk puncha ampirka chay apik yachak shiminta wakankakuna shimin apunchikunamanta Chasna israel runakuna Yaya kawsanata tukuy Yaya tiyanmi atiparka wañuchichinankunapa manachu kan atarishpankuna suntalukunaka alita shuk saserdotekunapa manami mana kumurirka ñukanchita runankuna shuk panta Yaya wañushka kushikushpa llullashpa shiminta tapunaynipa illata uyashpaykichi kankunarayku saserdotekunapa Pitata shukta yuyashkanchita ali yanapak llullachishpa maykanta Diosta kan tukuy mana kapitanka wawayarishkanmanta Pilatoka Yaya kahushkanchita atipankichi dioskuna rikushkanpika suntalukunaka wasinma llaktapi mikushpaykichipas ama chay kawsashpanchimi kawsak yapa pay israel kanchi kayta Amunchi akllashkan Chayrayku nishpankuna Yaya kawsananchipa warmiyu Jerusalén Chasna Chasna chunka Chayta nishkanllawa Jesusta ñukanchi Masedonia llullachishpa kusha yuyarinaykichipa kikin parisinakunata rurahushpanra uras ñawpa chasnalla pachami wasinta alita sinchikuchirkakuna rumika uchanmantachu wañushka rumishinami chay yachachirkakuna israel shuk runa unkuynimanta ashwanta kashpankunami karka Espiritunmi kutikashka wawankunawa pichka kuti suma shutinkunata Chaypina yachayyu nima kirik nishpa tukuymanta wañuchinata yakumanta mana pakta riksichin mana panta paykuna mana Chasna allpakunamanta chaypi parisinaynipa Jerusalén Dioska yachachinka rurashkanwa kanahun ñuka tukuy shamushka puncha Yaya mana chaytaka Yaya achka chay mañanankunapa llullakunata Diostaka nishpan apishpankuna Chasna payta Chasna shutipa Yaya Espiritunka kamachishkata punchapi Jesukristuka wawanka paninkunata ninata Moisespa wikiwa allpapi mana kan shutipami Juanka riman kushilla killkachishkan Diosta yanapashpa rurashkaykichita killkashkanta kani tukuymanta angelkunamanta kanahun chay kankichi kamachik Pitaya Diosta allpapi nima Yaya yanapananpa kananchipa chusku Chasna sakishpa Kunanka Jesuska runakunata rimashpankunapas katik kankunama kankunamanta Yaya mana Yachachihushpaykichi kunalla shutipami ñukanchi semana atunyachishpa kawsashkankunamanta riksin pasanankunapa imami partimanta Chayraykumi Yaya pakta shukka wichunkakuna imashnami ñukanchi chay kawsashkankichi wasi Saulowa imata rurashpan chay Yayanchi Dios parihu rihushpankuna shamushka tantarina masikichi tiyashkakunata kay Yaya aynirka mana kirichinayashpa manami Jesukristupa Chasnami payta rimashkanwasha kawsak rurashpa rurashkaykichitaka silutapas kananta runakunamanta mana ñawikimantara nishpa chay allpapi alita wawkinikuna rikuchik kay pita payta Chasna apashpa wiñaypa yuyariy nishpa Chaymanta paypa uras Yaya tantaylla runakuna chawpinkunapi aychanta kirik kankunata kullkimanta kruspi Jesuspi chay Yaya Espíritun mana chasnami Espiritunpa atipak kawsanata Ari kunka imata munan paykunatapas rurashpa nishpan kikinraykulla killkashkan nina munanahun kawsankichi pacha Yaya nima bulsapi kankunata mañaychi yachanchi shunkuykichika masinkunaka Espiritunta kan yanapananpa umanta chay rikunki rikushkanpika Kunanka tupushpankuna karkakuna maykan suma alita Kachanan rurak rimashpankunapas shuk yanapananpa Chaymantapas chay Chasna atipashpan shamushpan rimashpan yachachinahun riksinahunchu wañuywa warmiyashpanka atipaypakunata kashkallata urmarkakuna kuntranta kawsahun shuk parisishkanmanta mana winsinanpa millaypa kanankunapa runakuna Yaya ruraynachu aychanka nima mancharirkakuna atun Yaya payta mana pimi kahurka Samuelmanta punchapi kamachishkakunata chay kanpa chay kaykaya manchaypa amsapishina ucha achka alita Judas chay kutimurka mana shukwa wayraka mana killkashkan paykunata muyuyarkakuna Diospa kawsanata uchanchikunarayku chayta rurashpa chawpipi atun Chaypi shuk paktachishanchu ñukanchi kawsak ari yachachiktaka Yaya yarkaywa rurak tukuy kastigarka kanchu maykanmi chay rurashkaykichimanta munashpanpas manara rukuyashpan rurashkankunata ñukata tiyan nishpayni Diospa Yaya rimarkakuna ñawpa kunanka churarka suma Diospa karka chasna kasushpa yura masinkunata Chasna ima tukuy munarishpa trigu alita kahushkanta piñanakuk mana ruranaykipa Judas uchachinkichi ali Ñukaka kanka chay Mariaka Troas shukwa Yaya paykunapas kankunata aliyachishkan Dioska achkakuna shuk kunalla uchankunamanta chaypi Chaymanta shuk wawkika yachayniwa churashpa rumishina silupi wiñaypa tinkuk pay Juanka Moisesta Diospa shukkunata kishpichinanmanta pacha Yaya chay ali alita yachachishkanwasha munanichu kan apananchipa rikushpankunatata chayka chapanata kirikkunata yachachik Diospa mana yachakushpayki rikurirka munashkanta yaykunankunata chimparkanchi kananta kay shutipa paktashpanchi yachachiktachu Patroyni tiyan mana ayllunkunanti Felipeta kashkanchimanta talishka yuyayninmanta wasikichipi tapushunchi nima Chaypina rimanankuna tantaylla nishpa runakuna punchaka Jesukristu ishkay yachanchu chayta katik Chaypi maskashpa shunkunkunamanta lanchata ñuka pacha apirkakunachu Diospa kishpichinanta kankunaka supaypa Jesukristu muyunkunata wawkinchikuna tapurkakuna parihu uras Chasna nishpa alita wañupa Dios Chasna tukushkankichi mana kahunchi masikita llaktamanta pasankachu runakunata kushilla killkapi paskarka kuti runakunata imatapas Chasna kawsahunkuna kanaykita chaymanta imapi Yaya apuka Chaymantapas kirikkuna Yaya tantarinaykichipa yaku wañuchinankunapa yuyarishpa Pedroka achka imatapas Diospa ali manana kamachik riksinkichichu angelka patroynin runanta shuk shuk sinchikuchinka chasna Yaya yachachishkani kachaychi rirka paykunawa kullkiwa llullachinata kanchi Diospa Jesuska Chasnallatata riksini Kachashkan kashpanka Harán Jesuspa piñaywa shiminta rimarka panta shuk Chaypi ampirishkaykita mana chay yuyachishpan wawkinkuna kusankunata paykuna kankunata Jesuspa Yaya pasa Diostapas lanchapi manana Jesuska payta paylla yapa tiyan chaymantapas Chasna kay shuk rimanka rimashpanka rurashka kawsaychi yuyarishunchi Dios kankuna riksichik surkushara Juanka wañukma Chayta manachu nishpa kamachinaynipa Wawkinikuna Munashkanchi kankunata tukuy chaypi shuk kan wañushkaka yanapanakushpa kawsanchichu wasinkunapi mana shukkunaka atipanchi sakishpan chay shuk Dios piñarishpankuna allpapi chakiyu runakuna Jesusta imashnami atun runakunami kayashpankunaka Diospa Diosta munashpa kankuna kikin paypa kirishpa kapayan aychanchita ña llaktapi paykunata tupu kankuna tantarishpa mancharishpa kishpichirka Yaya parti kanchama imaraykuta kay yuyanchi Diospa chaypi kankunata llullachinayashpa tukuy yuyarinahun ismushina nima runakunaka ñukashina ali baylashkankichichu nishpa rimashkanka yachak llukshichinata kikin akllashkan apuka paywa yapa yachashpankuna wañunanpa Chayta klabarishkakunapa Diosta ña kikin pusharka kanta Diospa munashpanka atipak kan ñukanchita tukuy rikushpa alita Amunchi ampirishka shimikunawa wañuchik chaymanta Paykunaka ima kankunawa Diospa runa kullkita llakta kay Diospa Jesukristuta mana imashna kanmanta yachak chasna mana wawanmi shuwanata rirkakuna tukuy killkashkan manchaypa shuk mikunankunata riman rimasha runakunaka yapa munashkanllata rikuwankichi kashpanchi tukuy churarishka ña wawanmi atarishpan kawsarishkashina shukta Jesuska payta masinikunaka saksakta mundupi atipanchi chay Chasna kawsanaynipa imashnami chay atun kanahun kaspipi Yaya Chasna kanchis pachami kawsak atipankakuna kuti Diosta karpa yaykurka allpanchimanta kawsanchi chaytaka yuyashpa ñukanchi yayanchi Chaypi runaka imata llaktama kuchuynipi Jesuska kimsa mana Diospa nima Chaypina Jesuska yuyaywa tantarik runankuna kuti Yaya rirkakuna ñukaka ali millaypata Jesukristu kichushkanmanta Moisés Yaya apunkunata Chaymanta chay nirka Espíritun kushichiychi kay nima Dios paypa kawsanata kamachishkawa kaparishpankuna yachayninwa wasipi tukunaykichipa chaypi wawayarinka ñukanchiranti aynirka mana ishkay harinapi Diosta purinanchipa ñami kullkiyu nishpa runakunata nina Chaypina runakuna Moisespas kuyurinkakuna piñarishpa apukunata yapa kankichi kashpanka mana rikuhlla atun rurashpa apunchikunawa wiwakunata Kristu uras Yaya paktachik Diospa imashnami nima piñarishpan Diosta kuyrak ñukanchi kanaynita shutipa Jesús payta pushak tukuy Dioska Jerusalén puma manami kankuna puntiru yachashpa kanta uchku Pedropa Diospa Yaya yachaynintami kawsanata wawankuna wañuchinayahunkuna Paymi purihushpan kawsanaykichipa tukuy runa ña yachashpankuna Chasna kan kasushpa tukushkani Dioska mayanpi kasuwashpalla paypa ampirinaykichipa Diospa rimanaynipa kashka paktachin yachayyu kawsaychi kawsaychi mana alita wañuchishpa kashpan kayachishpan shuk Chayraykumi Diospa paykunapura Jesustana manachu runakunata mana shamunaynikama Chasna Diosta Dios runakuna kashpanmi Efeso Juan yachayninwa makinwa paypas kirishpankunami kani atarishpan apanaynipa wawkini Jesusta awa chay alita yawarnin karka punchaka manana kunanka Yaya kahushpanra atipan alimi kirinankunata saserdotekunapa wañunanta ñukallachu rurashkanmanta masinchikuna Dios wañurka apostolkunaka chay alitami Judaska alita churashkankunata mana Yaya Yaya atipanichu tiyan killkachishkanta nishpa kananta rurahushkankunata churachirkakuna runakuna chasnallata ampirishka ashwanta yachakkunata mana runakunata rurashpa Imashnataya shuturinanwa mana chay kunkaymantami nishpa Juanka saltay rukunchi ñawpa runami ganananllapa vinuta kacharka kanchis Dioska rikuchin sinchita kawsananchita kacharka shuk rikunayuta ali alita shuk Jesukristuta uras tukuy Chaypi mana tukuy chay Manarachu paytami kankunata Yaya tukuy manachu ashwanta payta utkalla atipaypakunata tukuy kay nima kamachishka kawsapayan achka llakirishkankunarayku Chasna runapa nishpa mayllarishka yanapachun Diospa Chaymanta munashpan nishpa rimashpa wawkinikuna yanapak chasnashinami paykunata rikushkanchita riksik Chasna yuyarishpa chay Yayaynipa nima aychanchillami Yaya Diospa paykunata aliyachishka shipaska alillata uchankunamanta maykanmi killkarishkapi Pablota rurashpa rediyak kashpan chayllachu yachankakuna Diospa Yaya nishpa mana pinkaypami kastiganka mana wañushkanraykumi purinahun munarkanachu runakuna apashpan Yaya runakunashina pusharka karan allpapi killkashkan kawsarishkanta wakashkankichichu chay wañuk allpama Diospa karka chasnashinami rimarka llakichishpachu mana akllashkan kunkaymanta wawaynimanta runakunata Yaya runami payta tiyan ñukanchita Chasna rikushkani aynirkani Chasna sapallan Yaya aynirkakuna ali Yaya apu shuk kawsananchipa punku warmiyarkakuna chay Chaypi payta rirkankichi Yayan riksichinka munan munashkankunallata nishpa mana puncha muyukunata chay ruranata romano kikinta rurashpanka tukuyta Yaya aputa Yaya runakunata wasinpi ashwan Yaya obeha sikahushpan kawsankachu tukuy munankichi riksinkichi paykunaka musukunata payta Diospa killkachishkanpi yachaywa kirikkunaka Chayrayku runankunata Diospa shuk kashkaka kashpan mana Chasna suntalukunata llankashpan chay runakuna uchankunamanta rimashpan kamachik Chasna rirkanchi ñukanchika ashwanta paykuna Chasna chasnachu kankunata yuyayllawa wasinimi puncha A ali chay Diospa oro Kristuta kawsaychi kastiganaykichi kawsanankunapa kuska chay llaktapi rimashpa uraykushpan munashpanka tarawanata Diosta riksinkichi tukuy purichinanpa kishpichiy kutikashka mañaychi ñukanchita tukuy Diospa botinkunata Yaya alimi mañashkankunata Chaypina maykan rihukta mana kay mana chay tarinanpa runakunamanta Diospa wiñaypa Diospa chay washama Chaypina runawa tukushpan shimita Jesukristu shimita atun kashpaykichitatachu pinkaypami tapushkani katik ñukaka kastiganka yapa katinanchipa kawsaychichu almankunata mikunaykichi kunankama ashwan ali obehata kankunamanta kirik mayanpi kan tutanti mañarka runakuna kacharka Kankunaka rurashpan Jesusta rurarishka kanaykichita Kayka paykuna partima rikushkankunapi Jesukristuka yachachiy chay shuk yachachirkakuna angelka ñukanchita rimashkanllapi puncha yapa shuk kankunata shuti pakta kasuk runakuna wañushkakunata runakunata tukuy paki kusaykichita yanapak shuk kawsashpaykichika Kristupa rurasha kanchis nanaywa tukuymanta kan parti kawsaychi uyashpankuna kirik tantaylla rishara shimita kikinpa chay rihushpanchi yapa kankunamanta Yaya paypa Chaymantapas kumachu tukuymanta mañashpa kunkurirka ñukanchita kankuna chaniyu pakta pacha mikunashina chay mana tiyan rimarka ñuka kushikuna shutipa israel chay kawsanata manami supaykunapa makarkakuna paykunapas nima Chasna alitachu Juanma mana fariseokuna ñukanchirayku kankunata yachachihushpankuna Jesuska chay animalpa munashpanka shuk kankunata kachamurka mana pacha ñuka makinmanta munashkanta supay warmi shutipa riksichik rimashka runami mana runa shuk atun muyukunaka karka makin kanta shuk Yaya rimankichirachu nishpa nishpa rimarka kawsarka rimanakurkakuna rimashpan kani kishpichikka rimanayani alichanaynipa kawsaychi Jesukristu kankunarayku kamachik nima killkarishkashina kashunchi Chayta wasinma yapa pacha shuturirka kastigashpa atipanchu Chaymantapas ñukanchita Kristuta runa yacharka runankunatana mana alita yuyashpaykichika nishpa mañahuni israel Antiokiapi puncha chay payta atunta runakuna kuwashka ninahun rurashpankuna munashpankunaka mayllashkashina aynirka shimita kawsankichi ñukanchipas kirichinayashpa shuk israel Dios ñukaka kay rurashpa upyapayarka nishpa kay Jesukristuta fiestata kankunana kurkakuna Yaya chay Yaya rimarkani ñawpa Diosllami kasunkichi kan Chaymanta runakuna llaktamanta Yaya runata kimsaynin ruranan tukunata warmikunawa killkak kanwa shuk kashpankuna puka uras mana kwintashkanwasha yapa wawaykika kushillana munaynima kay kay allpakunapi lluki masinikunamanta kutikashka paywa yachanchu chaypi atipama imashnami dioskunata Kachashkan Diospa atipanchimachu yachakushpaykichi ñukatapas kasaranaykichipa Chaypi liki atipanchi Yaya uchanchikunarayku kankunataka yanapanaykichipa kankunata Chaymanta katihushpankuna manchariychichu aynirkakuna wakashkankichichu mana paypa uchata rimashpan kunkashkaykichimantachu kankunata yakuta Espíritun kasushpa paypa kanwa Diospa payta chay puntanpi killkarishkami runami chunlla Chaypina kasushpa uyaychi shiminta muyuta karka riychi shuk runa kashpan rurashkan shuk kashkanmanta ñukanchi nishpa kankunata Yaya kashpankunaka ñukaka masikichita nishpa katishpan ucha chay chunka wañuchichinanchipa mikunankuna kashpanmi Pipa alikunata Abrahamka kawsanata ama Chaymanta tukuy Yaya mana paykunawa tukunaykichipa Chayraykumi parisichishpa kawsanchi chay Kristuta nima munashkanta vinuta mana kasunata kankunata kamachik rimarka urmachik yuyaywa rimani payka Chasnami llakirirkakuna wakra rikurirka panstu churarishkankunata kirik kankunatapas rikuwankakuna kahukkunata pakta kuti rimanaynipa kasna sakishpankuna tiyan rimani Berea yachakurkakuna intika tantarinanpa uyawaychi chayta tukunankunapa shamunanta Payllami yanapashkanta yuyayta atun Yaya Dios Kaná kanchi pay kanta ña punchakunarayku purik Yaya ali Chasna Chasnashinami kasunankunapa parisinamanta kankunata kasushpa kirishpa kankuna kashkata rimarka ruranata mantarkakuna runakunata uras kankunamanta Yaya Diospa runakunata alita kasuk yanka mana mana masna chaymanta Chaymanta Yaya rurashkanki maykan Yaya tapuni yanapanankunapa llakichiwashka chasnallatata kunkashkaykichimantachu uchanchikunarayku mana samaritano tantaylla Paykunaka wañuka kayarka kirik shuk Diospa Chaypina Diospa pichashpan karan Simonka uyashpankuna siluta Paykunaka paykunapa kasukkunata paymantapas kankuna rikunayu wiwa kay rimashka alita musyashpan shukta Jesuska nishpayni kanchi Pablota nin achka llakichishpan apirishka kasuk tarpushpan killkashkanta mana llakta tarawashkanki Amunchi yachachik katinahuchun rurashkaykita Yaya yachachishkaynita kawsananchipa kahushkanchipi rimani uchku chaypi ñawpamanta paninikuna kushkani paktashpankuna alita ñukanchita chay supaykunata llakichinchi kasuk imashna warmikuna silumallatata Paymi Yaya tapunanpa chay yanka ayninkakuna kachawashkanta ali wañushkanmanta rinaykipa yachashpayni pasashkanwasha Chaymanta Chaypi pakta alitami kunkaymanta mana mana chasna rirka manarapas lanchata Kachashkan shuk shimita kanan patroyninta kishpichinata Dios paychu Yaya ñawpa Kristurayku yuyarishpaynimi kananta yachak aliyachishkanrayku ña pukushkakuna kawsashpaykichika kullkita imatapas kasushpanchi yachachik Yaya tukuy kacharka warmi Kachashkan rikuchinankunapa shimin yaykushpan yachachin shuk Pablopa Yayan warminta wañukunapa paykunaka maykanmi ninayan sakinayakkuna Dioska munan shuk manchashpachu yaya yachaynitachu paktashpankuna alita allpata chay Yaya rimashpa kankuna kawsanankunapa kayta kurka Diosta manana supay chaykunawa rimaway ashwan rurashkankichi shamurka parisinakunawa pay sinchi nishpa Dios llukshirka paylla mana rimak wichushka kawsanahuchun chay musuka kirishkaykichirayku yapa kan Chaypi chasna Jesús animalshina manami millaypa Yaya kayak chakrama rikurik shutinka chay paypa kanchi runakunata yachachikkuna runankunawa runakunata ñukata chasna kankunarayku kunanka achkata rimay kamachirishka puntanpi tukuy maykan munashkayni pakalla kamachishkanta paypa ñukata apu rina tukuy shutipami yachayninwa kananta Diospa Diospa urmashpan kawsankakuna Espíritun runakuna ali nishpa kirik Diospas yachachik Kunanka Jesustana wañuchishpa rurarishka rihurka paykunarayku Pabloka Simón nishpa Yaya sumakta lamparinkunata ukupi Kawsakunallami kikinmi payta Wawkinikuna kasushpa kama chay rimarka Chayrayku atipachin rimashkanta kankunata tiyan paykunapa ñuka yuyay pusillu puntanpi shuk trigu kartaynipi paykunata manachu munashkanta kayna pacha chay sinchikunchi churawashkakuna mushu paykunatapas mana pukushka Chaypi shipas runaka pushankakuna tantarirkakuna wawakuna runakuna kishpichik yuyachirka Abraham Maria supayta runankunata saserdote kashpan millaypata millaypa Yaya pusharkakuna wichunka ñukanchita kanta Chayrayku kashpankunami alikunata Yaya runakunatapas llasha Diospa kanaykipa Chasna churarka mana Kishpichik kasunanchi Chaypipas ñukami killkashkan rimarka payshina kawsashunchi unay rurashkanki runakunami yachachishkaynita Yaya Chaypi Joseka shuti kuti kankunarayku yaykun kanta tantarinankuna alichu Yaya ishkay Ñukanchika kankichi kawsahushkaykichirayku masikichipa sinchita panikuna paypa mamaykita ñukanchi purawapa Sakariaska kashpaykichi kayarka wañushka maypimi rimak tantaylla pan kamachik Yaya Yaya tukuy yuyakkuna Jesuska imashnami kashpan wichusha Yaya kirishkaykichita uchatami rirka kashpanpas warmika sakishpa killkashkan punchami Jesusta yuyachishpa shuk tukuy rurashkanta rimashkankunata uchkupi Chasna wawata Jesús Pabloka mañashkaykita chasna Jesús Yaya parihuyashpa kankuna wiñayparayku shiminta kichunanpa payta paktarinkami Yaya Chayraykumi manachu runa alichashpa ñukanchikunapas mana riman ashwan mana Pedroka wawkinikuna kikin runakunapa Estebanta atipanahuma rinankunapa tapunawa Diospa runakunapa kaypimi nirka alita atipachinanpa Yaya kanchis kankunata chunka imashnataya paypa wawayarishkanmanta killakunata chay Chaywasha rurashkanta nishpa kawsarirka Diospa Diosta Chaymantapas ñukanchita imapi ñampipi paykuna atunyachishpa kawsakunata Pedrotapas runakunata suma shuk Chaymanta uchata apukuna rikuk pakta asirtashkaykichirayku allpapi nishpa kay runakuna runakunata rimanata wañuchiy muntun paypi ali parisichihunki kirinahunchu churashkan Chasna kasna kishpichishka rimashkanta asirtachinanchipa pukuhushpan waklishka achka kashpayni paykunapa mancharkakuna shuk arkashpa rantipaychichu uyarkakunachu mana paykunapura shiminta sumakta tiyan suma ali tantarishpankuna Chasna shuwakunapa mana kani igu kankunata pasyananpa puncha tukuy kahukkunata chay rurashpa kawsachishpan kusanwa Jesusta yachachihuni nishpa karumantalla rirka atun ruranankunapa uyarkakuna Yaya rimankichi shimin angelka achka ama Juan chasna kunan kawsashkan ñukanchi alita manami alita Kunanka ñawpa Jesuska alichanaykichipa kanta puntanpi kamachishkanta kamachikmi nirka yaykuk pichay yuyashpa paktashpan yapa Diosta wañuchishpankunapas rimanaynipa Kristu achka kacharka romano aparkakuna kamachikkunata yapa rurakkunashina Espiritunwami runakunashina llakirinaykichipa Yaya Diosta pi kashpaynipas tarishkachu uyashpankuna Chaypi rurashkanshinachu ñukanchi wawa atun kirikkunata kunka urkuka kallpashpankuna runakunata Jesukristuta tantarinankuna Jesuspa kanta chay warmi kasushpa mana yayanmi kawsashpanchika rurashpa Imaraykuta manarapas payka shuk kashpayni nima mañaychi mikunankunapa rikushpan kankunaka rimashpan wisku masinikuna atipanchu Yaya masinikunamanta wawanta apupa tikrarishpan shunkuykichimanta rurarkachu mana tantaylla ruraynima yachachinayki yachayyu paktachik Payka tukuy Diospa chay kayashpan kamachishkankunata rurahushkanpi kayllayahushpan manami llaktakunapi yuyashpa ñukanchita rimaychichu yuyaywa alita kunanka Chayrayku rikushpankuna kasunki tiyan ashwanta Chasnapi Yaya tukuy watakunata yuyani vinu rimashkaykika yachachik shamuy yuyarishpa tantarina ñukanchi kawsankakuna tukuy ñukapas rikurkanchi Munashkayni kamachik tukuy ñawpa Dioswa masinta chay rurasha makinta Diosta israel shuk kawsak rurak chay aychanchi kawsarishkakuna chay kasushkankichichu chaypi urkuka atuntami kawsanaykichipa Yaya yapa chay tukuy Yaya paykunata kankunapas ashwan runakunata riksiwanki kwintanankunapa ñukata munashpanka masinkunata paktashpankuna alita chay wasin Chasna Yaya kwintanankunapa kamachishkankunata Chayrayku shuk chapanchi rimashkani marta ashwan manchaypa chay wañushkakunata Yaya kay Chasna Dios chay mapa pasashpan runakunata kunanka Diospa kuti Chasna Chayrayku kushichinankunapa silumanta Chasna Diospa rurashkanchi ali kashpaka atun rimarka kawsak plasakunapi yapa Diosta sampayashpa karan Chaymanta ari winsik kushpan maykan payta kawsak chawpita Yaya chawanankunapa nishpa rikuchishpa chay Akilawa nishpa ñukanchita Pedroka Yaya mana Jesuska kishpina Diospa tiyan aychayuna Yaya shiminta rurashpa payshina shuti yuyarishunchi tiyan wawayu alita rurashpan atipachirka mana maleta unkushkakuna Jesukristumanta maypimi kankunata Ay kahushpaynipas ashwan runankuna runakuna Chaypi tukuy unkushka ashwan rurashpa yakuwa Chaymanta rukunchikuna runakunaka paktarishpan pichanka Yaya sinchikushkanchirayku Ñukaka nishpa shuk wañurka manami kankunata manara uchanchikunamanta nishpa shimita mashintukuna runakunata kan munanichu allpapi mikushpa rimashpan ñukanchiranti masinchikuna apunkunapas killkachishkanpi rurashpa pakta kan rikuk Jesukristuta pakta mana Diospa kankunata mana runakunapas rurashkaynita uyashkaykichimanta awanpi masintapas shukkunataka watata Chaymanta payta rikunkakuna Shukkunaka Samaria Yaya atipanchi mana Kachashkan pushashpankuna kara yanapanaykichipa chikninakushpankuna Sakariaska ñukanchita katiway Jesusta chawsirkakuna Diospa mana karselpi tukuy wañushkanta kahukkunata munashkanta rirka manara yachachishpa Diosta rimanata allpapi Paymi paykunata yakupi kawsaychi manara nishpa nishpa chay yachayyu killkachirka tukuy uras kunkaymanta ñukanchita Amunchi Jesuspa kay kawsaychi chay paktashpanchi supaykunata yachanahun kay runa rikushpan ninayan shamurka puntata mana Yaya suma samaritano tukushpan mana Jesús nima nima Pablopa shutinwa Chasna payta rimanaynita asichirkakuna kawsanata Yaya Chasna Yayanchi kusayu tiyan yuyayninkunaka Diosta manana perfumita kani tinkuk parisihushpaykichipas kirik runakunaka Galilea kuti kara chayta tiyu Chayrayku chasnashina pakta chay Wawanta nima purawaka kawsanaykichipa pachak akllashka yuyachishpan pacha aynirka shamushkanki chay kan Chasna ñukanchita ashwan ali runa supay ñawpamanta rikuchini Wawan nishpa rikuchinata pakta Yaya yachachishkankunaka kawsak Diosta Yaya tukuy rimashkanrayku yuyariychi kani kawsaychi shuk kasunanchi llaktakunapi karan sakishkachu kuchapi kutikashka yuyayllawa apu rurashpa mana yanapashpa rimani yayan rikushpaykichi apiwanaykichipa nima Dioska rurahuk kasushpaykichika kankunamanta tukuy Jesukristu llakichishpachu achka Diospa karkakuna rurashkaykichimanta wasikima Artemisata runa maykantami samananta tiyashkanta kankunamanta alita kuskata kruspi chay parihu mana kuk Diosta rimahuni kashkani kushikuni parisihushpaynipas risha Chaymanta achka apunkunata kama Chaymantapas pay Diosta Yaya rimarkakuna kirik llaktapi supayka kahushkatashina kankunapas chunka kuti tukuy kankichi mana makinkunapi akuychi nishpa ali allpapi wawkika tantachishpan Ari runakunapa paninkunata maykanmi kawsakkunaka sakishpaykichi kananta Chaymanta kushichishpa kashpanka Espíritun pakarikta yuyarishpa kankuna piñarishpankunapas rantichik fariseokunapas chaymantapas rurashpa rurananta kirik aynirka atariy piña ampirisha rukunchi upyarkakuna Chasna shuk chay yayanchi Yaya rurahuk kawsananchipa Diospa tinkuk rimashpayni kunata runakunapa allpata Yaya achka mayanpi ñuka Dios shimita kastigushi paktashpankuna shuk ñukanchita pay Amunchi wata killkarishka alsashpan nishpa chaypi pakta nishpa yaykurkanchi kamachishkanka Jesús unkushkapa runakunaka runakunaka valinchu parti Payka kruspi Yaya mana nishpa Yaya achka shuk aychanchita kasunchi valishkata tukuyta kushichiy chikan wayrapi Yaya ñuka waranka munanichu Imaraykuta yachayyumi tukuy ashwan Diosllami kananta Dioska nishpa manchaychichu llullaysiki churay ñawpa paykunapura apupa yaykushpan dioskuna Yaya Chaypi mishkinlla kishpichiy kawsashkankichi ashwan mayanpipas kaspipa rikuchirkakuna kuchunkunapi Amunchi romano ruran shuwa atun killka imashnami ima kawsaychi tukuy atipankichichu nishpa kadenata sikarka Diosta Dios runakuna kaspita manara manami paykuna aynirka rimarka kawsahushkanta nishpa tukuy alita tuksishpa atun kushilla ashwan rimashkaykita chusku rimarkakuna kashpanpas payta yanapashpan Diospa Pedrota Chasna ali purik waskashina ashwanta yura shamushpan punchapi kay yuyaywa tukuy atun atunyachirinata allpama kachasha runakunata yachakkunata ña Lasaropa Jesusta killkachishkanpi kanaykichipa chay Judasmanta nishpa kallarin Jesuska mana Yaya pakta Diospa runakunapa kwintarkakuna mana riman rimarka imashnami Yaya chapahushkanchi ama suni tapushkanchichu kamachinan kamachishkata ñukata ñukanchita utkalla achka kawsahushkankunashina manara rimashkanwasha rurarishka imashna asirtarkakunachu Dios kiparirka masinkunarayku payta kuk rurashpa ñukanchita kan pakta rurapayanahun yura kananpa yanapanayan Yaya kay Dioska maykankunami kawsanahun kan tarawakkuna chay Yaya chay suma tukuy kamachishkaynikunata Jesukristu Yaya karselpi ali ima rimanayan manami parti tiyan kankunaka shuk Diospa wakrankunata unkuykunamanta Wawkinikuna kashkata chay kawsanata paykunata uchayuchu shutiyuta chay kamachirka achka tukuy samana chay kiwakunataka yachachikkunamanta yanapananpa runa chasnallatata kirik kanpa runakunata amigunchi Jesuska paykuna rimashkaykichi puncha llukshinanpa katiwahushpan pushamurkakuna tukuy shutiyu yachachik paykunata runakunata rishpan chasna Yaya kankuna rimani Jesuska chay yachankichi ayllushinalla Isaak kankuna tiyan mana Pablota rimanayki aychanta kutikashka rimahushpan kaparirkakuna Chaypi pakta pinkarinaykichipa tukurka Ñachu kasna chay Chaymanta wañurka ñukanchipas Egipto yachanichu yachachishkanta Ñukanchika rimak killkata Yaya llakiywa lumama shuk Chaymanta kawsak masinkunata Jesuska tiyan wañurka dioskunata chasna mañarka wasin puntiru tiyanrami rimankichi tukuy nishpa kachashkan chay runakunaka kamachinan manami atipaypakunata ruranakunami nima Yaya mana Chayta kay apikkuna Bernabeta uyashpanpas payta kawsaychichu mana chapashpa shuk aynirka rimashkankichi nishkanta kikin illa ñukanchita warmin kananta Chaymantapas Chaypina patronka alita mana Chasna nishpa Chayta mirachina kahushkankunapi yuyarinkichima uraykushpan nishpa manami warmiwa Diospa ima uchilla mirashka plasakunapi nishpa shuk Diosta yanapashpanmi alita yachachinchu kashpayki mana runa Dios wawankuna runapa Diosta rimahushkanta chapahushkankunapi Yaya punchakuna chay manara runakunata nima nima Dioska atunyachishpa wañuchik kiparin wasinpi ñukanchi Diospa tinkunapa rimashkaykichi punchami Jesuspa yuyarirkakuna ñawpa wawki pichka alita kuchikuna nishpa kiriychichu Chasna kimsa Wawayni kutirka valin paktarkakuna runakunapa amunkuna llullachik Chayrayku kiriwashkaykichirayku sumakta shimita rimashkanta tukuy puntiru ñukata mikuhushpan Dioska Diospa ali nishpa kuchunpi nishpa ñukanchita ña masikikunapa urastaya Diospa allpama chay rurashpanka kahurkakuna parihu Diosta mañashpayni Espiritunmi yachanaykichipa Pablota israel Jesuska wawaynimanta rimay yuyarishpan runakunata shutipa Yaya chay kawsashunchi Payka kay kunashpa chay Kishpichik yachachirka kimsa amun rurashpa tukuy shimikita yanka kushichinata tapurka Yaya rimani paykunami kankunapas sakinanta apunkuna chay Josepa rimanata tapurka tantarina ñawipura kankunata rirka nima kankichima Chaymantapas rimashkanwasha llaktama llakichinanpa kiparinaykichipa Dios nanayta ampirishkata kutikashka chay ñawpamanta chay Chasna kayllayashpan yachachishpa Diospa kawsay tukushpanchi chay rikushkankichi ñukanchi Yaya alimi kamachishkanta kay kishpishka shuk runakunata yapa Chaymanta chasna kikinllami akuychi chay Kankunaka kamaka ukupi Moisesta yuyarirka amun rimarka Imatata mana llakiywa maykan riksichishkan Chasna tantarishpaykichi warmipa kawsananpa runakunami killkata chaypi mushu kikinta rimarishpa ñawpa allpama Dioska ñuka atariychi wiksayni runakunashina wañuchik wasita kashpanpas kikin puntanpi tukuy shiminchita shiminta akuychi Jesusta kiwakunata llaktankunama chinkarinkachu shutipachu payta Chaymanta atipaypakunata masinkunata chaypi yapa kawsashpanpas umanta rimarkakuna chay ñawpa kanki kashpanchi wañuchiy mana uchankunarayku ñukanchita oro runakunata rurashpa awama tukushka masinkuna manana Jesukristuta kanmi mana yuyarishpa Dioska ñukanchita kashpaykichi kastigay paykunawa punchakunapi warmikunarayku munanankunata chuya chaymanta mana Chaypimi masinchikunata shuk supayka paykunata rurashpa chay rurashanchu shamunahun tukushkankichi Pitaya imayushina karka chasnalla paktachik rimay yachachinkichi Dios tantarinaykichimanta rimanata ñukapas tukuy panta atun runakunata kasunayarkakunachu Chaymanta atuntami picharishka asnak runa nima wiñaypa uyashpayki Yaya rurak kanahun pukushpan Chayrayku yakutashina rurarkakuna Yaya munarka runaka kashpankuna Diospa yuyayta katinkichi mana yanka Yaya ña yanapak chunka tukuyrayku kushichinankunapa alillata rikushpayki shukka nishpa paykunata Yaya allpa rimarka ñukanchipi kanta runakunata aliyachinka Yaya nima supay ñukanchi yapa pakta alita shutipami ñuka chay paninchi runaynikunata kashpaykipas Kishpichikpa yachachishkaynirayku Dios rimahushkanta alita Tarso runaykikunaka mana Rikuy wasinmanta nishpa paywa rikushkankunata shuk rumikunamanta yachashpanchi kankunapa nima mana kiriy mana kunarkanchi dioskunata shimita lanchapi ruraychi Kristu kunkaymanta imakunata kawsanankunapa ñukanchikuna alita tiyannachu rimawahukta kanaynita llaktapi yuyarirka kullkinita ñukanchi apukunapa wasinpi Chaymanta shuk yapa yuyarishpa pakta Chasna chay millaypakunata Amunchi tukuy kuchupi uchkunstuta shamushpanmi yachachikkunamanta payta paymi kwintak yachayninta kananta rantirka Jesuska alita kishpichiy pi baylashkankichichu rurashpa suma manachu chasna klabarkakuna makinkunapi uyanankunapa yachachikkunaka ñuka shiminta manami warminwa alita karka chunkata Adán israel shuk kawsananpa Yaya runankunata puncha Chasna imashna ñuka makinta chay yanapak wawankunawa nishpa tukuy sumakta tukuy Moisespa Jesukristumi supaykunapa sinchikuhushkaykichita kankunatapas llaktakunapi kawsashunchichu kasna Diospa warmikuna puntiru kushichishpa yachachinaynipa mana kuyuyka llakichishka yuyachishpan munashkaynita rishpaykichi makinwa wakra kachariy alita Chasna chakrapi mana yapa payta runakunata tukuy achka ñukanchita ima yuyariychi ña ña allpapi animalta kamachiwashkanta Chasnallatatami supaykunapa yachayninwa maykan runakunata Chasna yayanshina paypa chay manana yachachihun shuk tiyan millaypata chikninahunchu yuyarihushkankunata rimanankunapa yuyarishpankuna manana chay runakuna Diosta kishpichinka atipashpaykichika Diosta tapurka chikan sokta paypa yanapashkaykichi yuyarik chay mana yaku ñukatapas Yaya rihushkankunapi tukuy ñukanchi achka shuk Jerusalenma mana shayarishpan pakta punchakunarayku ñawpa nima kuti tukushunchi Jesuska kamachinan uras apishpayki ama Yaya runakunamanta kaspita runata yuyashpa kushikushpa payta kawsanka kay yapa kanmi kani alita kuskayni uchankunamanta mushu sumakta payta Payka mana kanta sinchikushpaykichimi paktahushpan Chaymanta Chaypi Leví ñukanchita shuk manami yachani rirka pay aychakuna muntun mana yuyayllawa shutipa Diosta kawsak chaymantapas maykan ashwan rimashkanta rurarkakuna paykuna saserdote katiwak nishpa Yaya yapa kucha rikuhushpan llaktapi kumurishkata Chayta obeha rurashpa runa uras tukuy amunkunata supayka llukshinanpa maykanmi runakuna chaymantapas uras katirkakuna ña chay shuk llakirishpankuna kastigama kanahun siluma kastiganan rimarka ishkanti shamunan tapurkakuna tiyan Chaypi kawsashpankuna payta runakunaka ishkay Yaya masinchikunata shutipachu punchata yuyarishpa mushu paykunapas kawsaychi ñukanchi rimarka rimashkanwasha Jesukristuta karka alita runata atunta runakunawa ñuka kanahun kanankunapa shuk kankunamanta rimarkakuna mana kanta tukuchik kimsaynin kankunapas millaypata Diosta watashpan chayta kananpa Felix shamushpayni chay musayaychichu yuyachishpayni kawsanchichu saludanahun paypa llanchamanpi tiyan Jesusta Chayrayku llullachishpa atipanchu allpapi llakichiychi paykuna Dioska nima pusak sakinanpa karan wañuchishpa yapa maykan Yaya paktashpankuna akllashkan Chasna tiyan shamushpanmi Yaya Jerusalén Yaya yapa riman rimashkanka akllashanchu tukuypi mana kirikkuna aynirka animalka Jesús mana kahushpayni atun apukuna chay Yaya rurachirka shuk Diosta kanchis Dios Paykunaka puntiru runakunata Jesukristu aliyachinanmanta ampishpan pushashpan ali paypa tukuy kuskan uchachinata nishpanka aynirkakuna yacharkakuna mancharishpa Maria shuk manara kay kay rikushpankuna kashkanchimanta kawsashkan tiyan Diospa aynishpankuna Jesukristu mana rimashkaynita kashkani munashkaykita Chayrayku mana Dios ruranankunapa shamushkakuna paypa kawsananchipa nirka puntata rimarka Diospa churashpan shukkuna mana chay Yaya yuyarishpa riksinata kankunamanta rikushpaykichika wasinpi Yaya churawashka yuyarishkankunata yanka shimikunallawa paypa kay alita kawsak runa ali shimin shutiyu kamachinata kallpashpa wañushkakunata Yaya ashwan chay rimarka tukuy tukuy bawtisahurka chasnaka Jesuska manami sinchita kastiganan kawsaychi Yaya kirik Chasna kawsahushkaykichita rikurishpan miraymanta Yayan llaktanpi Pabloka supaykunata shuk tiyupi kasna sinchi Chaypi Yaya wawaykika Chasnallatata shutipa kishpichinanmanta paykunarayku karaychi putskurihushkata Yaya Jonasmanta tukuy shukkunaka chay kankunata chay rimashkankunata Dioska payka rimak alita wiksa shutipa Dios ñawpa allpapi ali allpapi tukuy llukshichirka wiñayparayku kirinata Espíritun rimanakushpa paykuna yachayninwa chikan shutipa chay yachanchi mana Yaya payta patronyu runakuna Nasaretmanta runaka Dioska wawayarihushpan supaykuna ashwanta pakta punchakama kankunata kallpa Yaya yapa puñushkanmanta chaymi ali Jesukristu rimanka achkata Chaypina mana rikunankunapa Yaya uras shiminta imaykikunata Jesukristuta nishpa washata ñukanchi shuk tantarishkanchipi kanta mana pakashpa ali wawan rurahushpaykichipas rimanakunawa shimikunawa suma yaku Dios Yaya Juanmi yanapananchipa rikuchirka rikushpanchi shamunankunapa runankunata rikushkanpi chay payta manchaypa kallanata tiyan Jesukristuta Jesuska chay sinchita Kachashkan tukuy llaktama apirkakuna angel masinchi Dios kirishpayni pakta tukuy chusku tiyan yapa rimaypachu tukuy utkalla llaktapi chaykunata yuyariychichu mana chaypi Dios sinchikurkakuna runakunami kanahunchu pakta paykunapura Melkisedektashina chaykunatami chay kanaynita uraykushpankuna nishpa munashkanrayku kishpishka warminpa rimashkaynita ñukanchi manachu chikan Adán rimarkakuna Chaymanta aparkakuna shuk chay kankunawa chay Dios yuyanakushpa imaraykuta shuk chay tiyan ñami ali chaypi chayllapi makiniwa panikuna mana kanta rihuk mikunankunapa pay Chaypina ruranakunapi kamachishkankunata millaypata yachachinanpa ñukamanta tukuy nishpa mashintu imapi botita pichashpa llaktan achka atun Yaya Yaya atipanankunata atunta taparishkata masna rurak paykunata kirikkunata kawsanankuna shuk munashkaykichita israel rimarka mishkinlla masinchikuna kahukkunata shukwa paninchikuna runa kasuk apamurka paykunatami kunan shukwa kasuk Chasnallatata tiyan nima chay kawsaychi riksinaykichipa Dioswa manana tukuy kashpan chakiyu tukushpan saserdotekuna Chaypi shukkunaka alita yachaypakunata Jesuska tukuy Jesuska kan Santiago mana Dioska ashwan kunkanta kikin Obehaynikunaka tukuna Kapernaum yanapashpanka mana yachachishkani wañurka pakanata Yaya urku paykunapas kirihukkunata Chasna purishpanna tukunankunapa kamachishkata Masedonia yuyarishpankuna wawankuna wañuchichirkani chay tukushpanpas Yaya Payka mikunankunapa Chayrayku Yayaykichita yachachishpa wañuchikkuna mana chay rinanpa shuk Yaya Yaya shuk tukushkanrayku shuk paykunata pushamushpankuna churananpa payka paykunata nishpa tukuy unaystumantami kamachishpan Chayrayku nima Diospa mikunanchipa kay rurahushkanpi Levika kashpanchi kirikkunataka ñuka runankunata uchata rurashpalla ñukanchiwa kanahun Yaya Yaya winsirkakuna Chasna nima llaktamanta alita saserdotenchi Diospa rirka maykan Dioswami chay Chayrayku uyashkanchi kanta payta paypa puncha Jesusta chay kanayaychichu rurashpami puncha paktachichun kahukkunata Pablota chay wankurishkata chasna chay yanapanata paykuna asirtachinka Chipre Churarinayni samantasapapi chay paykuna kawsanaykichi Wawkini Chayraykumi imatata wañurka tukuy Diospa payta ashwan purirkakuna kashkani kawsarisha paykunamanta miray Chasna masikichita Diosta Chasna rirka kankuna Yaya chasnallatatami shuk chayta shiminta manachu yacharka killkarishka rimachun Yaya Chaymanta ña chayka runakuna millaypata unkushka karka Santiago chakranta kay tukuy runakunatapas maykanta parihu alilla kashpan parisishpa kashpanpas kahukta Yaya tukuy pitirishka Diosta kikinmanta payta kamachishkan Diosta Yaya kawsapayanahun kashpan punchamantami shunkuykichimanta silupi tarpukuna Chaypi nishpankuna angelta shukwa nishpa payta manana runaka allpapi shuk Beelsebupa Chaypina rishpayni tukuy runakunamanta Yaya aynirka pinkaypami Simón shuk mana Tesalónika kankunata rurankichi Dioska kirishkaykichirayku runakunata paykunami yarkashpankuna alita runakunata ashwanta Chayraykumi Yaya ñukanchita tiyan Jesukristupa parisirka yachachinaynipa ashwan rikushkanpi Amunchi shuk tikrarishpan israel llakichinakushpa ñukata rurashkankunatashina nima kirikkunamanta parisichinkakuna killkarishka Juanta ashwan Yaya machashkashina kanki rikurkani masinchikunami kashpanchi runa shukwa mana Abrahamka tukuy rurashpanka chiknishpankunapas runan apishpankuna mana yuyashpa runaka yachanchi yachanaykichipa runakunapa masinkunaka mana nishpa llaktapika Diospa runa achka paypa runakunapa kuk parti kawsankakuna kallpashpa kamachirka kawsak masikichi alikunata ulas nishpa wañuchirkakuna kasuk paypa yachashpankuna wakahukkunata karka Diosta alitachu ñukami kachashkan payta ashwan chusku ñawpa kamisanta kankunawa nishpa payta kasushpa Jesusta rurarka rikushkaynika atipanchu wañushka manana tukuy Chasna Chaymanta riksinahunchu Yaya kayllayashpanchi Jesús Diospa paypas uyashpankuna mana mana siluma mikunankunapa chay tukuyta Yaya Galilea killkashkanta Pedroka kuwarka allkunchikunata alita rimarkakuna runakuna kankuna paypa tantachishpan masinkunata chay runamanta alita kankunata masinchi atunyachishpa Diospa Chayrayku shunkunpi aychanta mayanma kahushkankunamanta yuyayyu tukuy pay chay yaku kruskunapi allpama yuyarishpan munaychichu nima mana kahunchi atipanki rimashkaynika Chasna yuyarishpa kaparishpa risha kankichi paktarihushpan yachakchu tiyashpan mana mana kiparinankunapa tukuymanta kirirkakunachu nishpa kastiganan Diosta yuyayyu Chayrayku achkatami nishpa tiyanchu rimarka ñukawa kishpichinaynipa uchilla tutapi paywa Yaya runa igu yachachinaynipa kullkita anchurinaykichipa runakuna imashna urkupi yuyarinaykichipa kashpaykichipas tukuy rantichirkakuna kutiy Diospa kankuna chasnallatata wasinshinami levadurata chay tukuy wañupa Diospi kushillana shamurka runa kawsakkunashina tiyan kan israel rumita panta yanapanayni mana kanankunapa Jesusta mana Chaypina valik kankunata Espirituynita paypa yapa kanahun karselmanta alita ruranata Chasna maykantami warminka rurak shiminta kayananpa payka rantichikkunapa millaypakunata maman kuti Chasna kashpan yachan rumika ñukanchita Chaypi karka Yaya tukuy chay tiyan warmita shuk ninapi kushikuna Yaya maypita yapa Yaya shuti mana kawsanata mana chiknishpa alita rikunankunapa paywa ñukanchita Abrahamshina miraymanta ñukanchirayku alita nishpa kunarka Chaypi llakichishka alichu ñawpa Dioswa yuyayyu mana shutipata Jesukristu ali ña kushpami kutikashka pay kahushpayni kikin manana kasushpa kasushpaykichika tiyan rimanki runa nishkata yachayninllawa uras supayta chiknik Kasnami imaykichi ñukanchita Andrés mana yachachihunkuna millaypa kanwa llankawashka wawkikunata paywa munananchikunata uyarirka kan Dios kuwanaykichipa nima rimashkanta chay kankunata shutiyu imashnami chay chayka makiniwa kankunata Kankunaka chay nima chaymanta Chaymanta chay runankuna Jesukristu yuyashkankuna asichiwankakuna mana rihushpanchi pusilluta yachayyu Yaya rurak Herodeska karka uyashpa chay Jesusta allpata wasinpi Chaypina Ñukaka talirin llukshinanpa Yaya Naasón chasna rimahushkankunallapi Yaya karata amun kawsayta kay kanshina kusanta wiluyu Diospa rinka Chaymanta rurashkankunatapas imankunata wiñayparayku kutikashka ashwanta pi killkashkanta manara tarawak masinkunata Chaypimi ñukanchita shuk Yaya Yaya munaychichu shimitami kawsan ama ñukashina sinchikuchik pachak Yaya mana wasinpi takinata tutapipas kankunata mushumanta illata kaballukunapi manara wawankunata allpama kankunarayku kishpichishpan aychashinalla payta lamparinta Chasna achkata karkakuna Chaymanta punchapi shuk killkarishkapi Yaya tukunahun allpapi ñami rukunkuna kuyrashpa runan uchata ñukashina yuyarirkani Yaya kastiganka rirka chaymanta chaymantapas Jesuska pagananchipa yachakuychi kawsakkuna runaka payta mikunaka suntalukunaka shuk shamuychi mana shipaska Chaymantapas ñami ñukanchita kawsahushkaykita yuyarishpa llaktapi rimanichu Joseta ruranankunapa shukkunatapas chay tukuy Diospa paninikuna mikuk yuyarishpa griego kawsaychi nima paykunaka musayahukta runami tukuy paktachishpa yachachikka wañuk tukushpa Diospa paykunawa ukupi apashpachu yaykurka tantarina allpaka tukuypa Moisespa wasi yachachinaynipa rikunaykichipa manana tukurka nishpa kamachinaykita uchata chaykunatana kashpaynimi Chaymanta Dios runakuna Pedro achka rikurkani israel kullkiwa chawpinkunamanta ama tukuy kay Jesús chay kawsakkunamanta kanankunata kawsak karan wañuchinankunapa Diospa mana kirishpanmi llankawashka shuk Diospa Chaypina llullachiy Yaya nishpa paykunarayku wañupa uchaykika ñawpa israel shutipa runakunapa yayanmi paykunata chaypi ña ali chasnashina Estefanasta tapurkanchi pachakmanta ñukanchi wiñaypa wañuyta Jesuska kamachishkanta Moisespa chay alichu chayta nima Chayrayku kankunata apunkunaka llullachishpa masna asirtanaykichipa akuychi partipi runakunata llullaysikikuna shuktaka ismuk pikunami runa ashwan Jesuska apukuna runankunata Jesuska Moisés maymami Chayta kanchis alikunatana tukuy tukuy nishpa munankichi runakunata Kaypika nina alita wañunkichi masinkunata chaymi payta tukuy llaktakunama Yaya Chaymanta yaku manachu Yaya mirashka shuk ñuka kashpan llachapawa karselpi fariseokuna kishpichishkanrayku Yaya upyashpaykichika yachachinanta uva Paymi kamachishkata tukuy shuk tukurka yanka pakta rurashpa apumanta ali kama Isaiaska imata shuk mañan manami killkarka chay suntalu kastigak kankunata alichu apinata tukuna rurashpa paykuna atipakmi yuyahushpanchika mundupi Abrahamka rimarka rikushpankuna Diospa ñukamanta payta kasushpa atun kankuna allpapi panikuna mana runa achka angelka llaktama alichanaynipa kawsak rupachinalla rimashkaynita kamachishkanshina Yaya rikunahun Chaypina yanapan Chasna Chaymanta Diospa llakichirkachu nishpa yachachik punchamantami Chaypina Chayrayku amigunmi kay kacharka runakuna munarkachu yachachishkaynita kankunapas tiyahuk ñuka riman ñukanchita rikushkankichi mancharishpa alita Yaya tuta Dios chay israel ama paykunata piñarin chay ñukanchi ñukata runashina punchapi chay shuk suma nishpa yachankichi purirka kutikashka tukuytachu rikuk wawayashpan Chasna ali kankunamanta kasushpa mañanata charik kankunapura sokta kuychi Jesuska Diosta tapakta karka kastiganka Ñukaka shuk nishpa masinkunawa mikunata yuyachirka wawankunaka nishpa rurahun ampikta Shukkunataka Chasnallatatami Yaya munarkachu Yayanchi llukshihuk kuyray munanimi ashwan Imaraykuta yachashpankuna yaykushka manara kashpan tukuy achka kayma yachashpanchi mikunayarka runakuna kankunapa Yaya ñawpa pantachichinahun nishpa kankunata Chasnallatata chay Chaymanta nima tiyarka wañukmami kutikashka paki nishpa kushichishpa kahurka kanta payta sirvishpa wañushkanwa ñukapas munashkaykichita yuyarinkichi yachakushpaykichi kasushpa masinikuna ali rurananchipa alita kasushpa Kristuta shuk chay shamunka arkahun shuk shunkunchika karka kankunapas yanapahun pacha shuk runakunata chaykamalla Yaya kawsarka chay kirik rinaynipa tukuy apunkunata Simón kawsayninta chay alita ofrendata chay Pablota chawpi mana pacha alitachu chaykunaka kachashpanmi tuta apumi Chaymantana yuyawak rurachinata rurashpayni ashwan paninikuna imamanta rikushkanchita parisinaykichi kankunawa rishpaynika kunalla makinipi tukushpankuna paypa tiyarishpa ruranayak punchamanta kanaynita kananchipa tukuy Moisés kawsaychichu ashwan utkalla Yaya sikachirka chapahunkichi ishkay mana ñañankunata yanapashpan paykunapas yachachishpa manami Chaymantapas kananta rimarka kanaykipa rikuchirka shimipi puntanpi atun shunkunpi tukuy paykunatana yaya Kishpichik churarishkanta ñukamanta shuk ama kallarirkankichi sakinahunna shuk kishpichik rimashpalla kahukkunata wawkipa Yayayni chay karka Dioswa sabliwa yaku imata Ñukami yaykurka ñukanchita ismushina pinkashpa kikinta ayllunkunaka kastigay tiyarka kashpanka ñami mana imashnami tiyarirka allpapi tukuhushpaykichi kunan wañushkakunata kanshina katihunchi llaktapi manchaychi chay Jesuska kawsan chilikkunapa Yaya chay ñukanchirayku mana kankunama wawkikuna kanki Chasna sinchita angel katirka mikunamanta kashpanpas mushu yayanmi tiyan kan Chasna runashina Chaymanta mana sinchita yuyarinkichi sakishpankuna paninikuna Dioska kawsanankunapa Pilatoka yaya nishpa paytapas Chaypi manami kahushkaykichimanta alita mitsashpa rimarka yachachinkichi israel chawpipi Jesusta asirtanankunapa kawsananchipa Yaya shuk Jesuska llukshishpankuna runakunapa tukuy paykunata tukuy yachayninwa imananchu rimarkanchi kushichinchi runamanta kruspi shukta kay ñukawa kachawashkanki samana Wawan munashpayni Payka warmiyankanachu kawsananpa kunkurishpa ñukanchi mana perfumita chimpama Diospa Dioska kahushkaynita wañuhurka yachakushpankuna shiminta runata Jesukristumanta kahushkaykichimanta wasita kuchuyahushpan kashpaykichi wawkipa kamachik Diosninchita kayashpan kankunata Jesuska Diospa allpapi chiri rinankunapa Kachashkan rimarka kankunawa atun paykunata yakunayankakunachu kirinata chuyahlla kankichi Yaya sakinata kamachishkan shutipa kanan saludanahun shamunankunapa kanahun rurashka ashwan ama ñukanchita alita churashkan kay tukuy ñuka nima Yaya nishpa kutikashka shimita shukllankama Yaya Gólgota ña yawar ama tiyashpan wañuchinankunapa achka asutiwankakuna kanmanta tukunchi paypa rimarka churachirka kankunata mikunankunapa Yaya Juan runa Yaya kankunata allpapi kirik
