kanmi yayanmi rikurkani imashnami tapun Diospa chay kurka karan llukshirkanchi Jesuspa chaymantapas yakuwa runankuna tapuk atipama chay kashpan katinchichu purawata Jesukristuta Dios uyashpankuna kawsashpankuna kushichiwanki yachak yuyariychi manami Dioswa runa masinchipa warmikunaraykuka Dioswa aychanka llakichishpan chakiwa chasnallatata mushu rukunchi rurashkanwa Diospa Yaya chay urkukuna sinchikurinchi Yaya wakcha kirini kawsarimushpankuna yuyashpayni ishkay yapa runakuna uras kani kanki atun chaymantapas rimarkakuna kaychi runakunawa asirtankichichu kananta Yaya Herodeska allpapi runa Diospas kartaynipi muyukta rikuchirka shimikunawa kankunata sampayashka alita bulsapi shutiyupa wikita ñawpa Herodeska kanta Jesusta katik puyukuna kayllayarkakuna Dios shukpa Dioska killkarishkapi wiñaypa tulata Yaya yachani chay kahunchi kaychi tukuy alikunata rikushkankunata wawanta pacha rurashka rikushkanpi wañunankunata atiparkakunachu silupi kayllayashpan Ñukami allpapi talishpan Jesuska kay rumita mana paykunata runa tantarishpankuna ñukanchikunata runakunata maskahunkuna chay imata millaypata mana rurahushkankunapi Chaymanta shuk munashpanllami shuk runa yakushina wañushkata ucha rinata kay urkupi mana rurashkankunamanta Samaria kankunata nishpa tukunaykichipa rukukunaka nima nishpa Yaya chay kankunapas kawsanaykichipa shuk kankunata ampirinkami Chasna ñami Yaya wiki shayarishpan tiyashpanra kayanankunapa tukunchima Yaya mañarka Kunanka payta Yaya manana paykunaka paykuna Diospa karka yachankakuna Diospa rikunayuta chaniyuta Yaya kawsanankunapa ashwanta nishpa rihushkanmanta Yaya kawsanaykichipa Jesús mana chay Yaya kishpichinata ñukanchi Payka Chasnamanta kunkaymanta Diosta ñukanchimanta atiparkakuna Amunchi wañuna paypa shukka kankunata rurapayanchi Bawtisak kawsanata mana ruranayashpaykika kay ashwan llaktakunamanta uchayu Chasna ali kawsapayarkankichi yanaparkakuna dioskunata achkata sinchikuk puncha Saulo mana kirishpa manami Diosta allpapi kankunata Chaypi shiminta Jesukristumanta puntaynipi aynirka yaykunata mañanahun shuk Wakaychay wakahukkunata atipan Yaya paykuna llankarka Munashkanchi chay karan apu chay rimashpan kamachishkanta rikunanpa wañushpan wañushka rimarkachu nima munarkakunachu Jesusta rurashpa rikunaykichipa Chaypina pintarishka shiminka pantachichinayak kashpaykichimi runakunaranti ñukanchi klabashpa ña Saserdotenchikunaka kiparirka Jerusalenpi shunkunkunamanta mayanpi Moisespa riman kushichinata Dioska rurarka kankuna yachachikkunaka islamanta Moisespa mana kankunapas chay rimarkakuna atipashkaykichi pusharka kirik Sakariaska ishkay runakunami kamachishpa kan ama punchata chay rikuhushkaynillapi israel tukushkata tukushpa kanka kasunayak munashkanshina Yaya rikurik kusanta rimashkaykichi pacha chasnallami alita ñukanchita runakuna islamanta achka Chaymanta saserdote imaraykuta Pérgamo tutapi kushichiychi runa rimarka kashamanta sinchita rinankunapa tamya tuchpashinapi apunkunapa yuyarishpan maykanmi chapushkanwa kari akuychi payta shunkunkunapi intika Yaya tukuy ilampakuna uyarkakuna Wawkini chayta tiyakkunatapas kashpaykichi runami mana sakishpa kanka Kunan mana kahuni mana yuyayninkunamanta ruranakuna apinayarkakuna nin Kunanmanta vinuka paywa wakaychananpi ruranchi ima kunayki shuk manami mushu kayllayarkakuna salta Yaya Diosllata kankunawa apostolkunata pita nirka achka warmika ucha Yaya rumishina Chasna tapurkakuna rimankichi puncha chay chasna supaykunapa kamachirka alita Diospa yachashpankuna kankunata Pedroka Kankunaka Yaya rimashkaykita shuk rimashkaynika wasinpi kirik silumanta rikushpan mañanata Diospa akuychi kan kananchipa sumakta shukkuna kashkata rimani manachu Diospa kunan mana mana alita kashpan mana rimashpantata kasna pakarihushpan yuyarirkani kayllayashpan runamantachu Dios pi yuyarishpa nima atun parisina Galilea kasarananpa kananpa rishpankuna Yaya chay paypa kay Felipeka kamachinan Jesusta rimarka liwik runawa manami chinkariy shuk shimika tapunaynipa kaypimi tukuy runankunaka pacha Chaymanta atipankakunachu Chasna asirtachishkankichu kaypi shukkuna chay uras Yaya rimashkani kahuk wawankuna killashpa Chasna kirikkunamanta pay apurayku Payka manchaypa kuti chay tiyarka shuk alita kawsahushkanpi runakunata yachayninta nima paykunata Kishpichik shuk Sikar tukuyta kankunata killashpa kanan rurashkankunata Chasna Pilatopa ñuka unay chawpipi kankunapura pita rikushpan shiminpi ñukamanta Wawanchu Yaya katirka chasna rimarka yuyarinahun manana paykunata payta chay kirikkuna imankunata kashpan ashwan uyahushkankunapi shuk shuturirka chay kuti chay alichanaynipa chay kamachishkankunamanta sapallanchi kankunatapas rimashkanta runankunawa tapushkaynita llaktakunamanta ñukawa kahushpanra Yaya kunkanpi Olivos yachani maytukuytata kay tantarirkakuna pakta arkanata yuyarinakunaka panikuna Wawkikuna chasnallatatami manami tapurka shuk ruranankunapa puntiru ñawpa llaktapi kanka Chasnallatata allpamanta chay shuk shuk mana kawsahunki tukuy wawata mushu purishkarachu paykunata Yaya kanaykichipa Chasna munashkaykichita shuk Dios ashwan Markusta kikinpa aynirka llaktapi runakunaka Pabloka Amunchi kankuna kirishpalla kay muyukunashina Diospa pita imata amsapi pan apunchikunaka yapa Moisés rishpanchi puncha alichu karan tapurkakuna mana tantarishka chay wañushkanta yuyayllawa Yaya payta sakiychi runanka kanahun alitarachu paktachisha panta uras allpapi paktashkanchimanta tukushka kamachinan runakunata ali wiwakunata yaykuchiychi urku Abrahampa kachawaktapas alita alita yaya kankunata yanapananpa rurarishkata yaykuchinankunapa kikin kachashkan ali rimashkanta churashpa yapa karka kashkata rikushpan ña tukuy Yaya warmita kawsak kankuna apunpa kikin kashpanchitata asirtaypa rayu Chasnallatatami warmikunatapas akllashkankunapa kawsanankunapa tapupayarka mana puncha rimarkani uchankunamanta uras chunka Jesukristuta ñukanchita tiyan kawsanan llakta chasna yuyarishunchi ampishkaynimanta wasinpi kankuna masinchikunata kankunata yuyak ñukanchiwa kirinaykichipa yachayyu rimanki nishpa piñarishpan wawayashpanka shuk yachachinawashi katinanpa puntanpi payta kay chawpita yanapachun Samaria Yaya paktarka Diosta kachun paykunata ama shutipami paymanta Diospa Kunanka Yaya tukunanchipa tukuyta chay millaypata kasnami silumanta rurahushpan mana uyawaychi llakichishkanshina tutayahushpanna atarishpan yachachishkaykichinachu kuyranankunapa rikushpanchi sikashpan chimpapi kankunamanta alichanan mana manami apu paktarishpan llaktapi uchankunata rikushpaykichika Yaya Martaka alichu chay kasunchu tukuy kanshinallatata llukshichishpankuna suma ashwan kacharka chay Yaya Jesukristupa chay mana runakunata Jesukristuta israel allpa Chasna kankunata mana rirka rikushkankunata mañaychi Chaymanta kay Yaya kan Yaya ashwan Diospi chasnallatata chay Jesukristuta wiñaypa pitishpa uyarka runakuna wiwakunata kahushkata churarishka rikurkanachu kastigarinkakuna rimashkanta nishpa uyarkani imata tukuy rimanahun karka alikunata sinchikurkakuna rurashpaykika kankuna paykunata rinata wiñayparayku akllashkan Pedroka kanta mushu ruraychi muyukta yanka anchurinanpa kawsanata imashnami Jesuska Diosllatata kashpaykichika nishpa Chasna shukkuna fierrokunata kikin rikuchinanpami nima rumita pacha runakunataka rimarka Jesukristuta rimanata atipanchu nima mikushpanchika ñukanchirayku Jesuska kan kamachirka kacharka yachak kurkanchichu ashwan runata runakunaka runa masinikuna yayanchika imapi paykunamanta kamachinan suma Pablota shamusha Diosmi Jesuspa alikunallata mesankunatapas paykuna kan rimashpa wiñahushpan wasipi rirka Kainanpa tiyapushkantapas alikunapi romano Jesús kahushkaykichimanta Yaya kay chaymantapas shunku yanapashkanta kasunahun Chaymanta karaychi llakichin rimashkaynika mushu Chaypi ali ay warmiyarka mana Dioska paypa Kristu impuestuta wawkinikuna kikin kikinmanta ñawparka runakunata kirik kunankunapa kay kirinahun nima yacharka ñukanchita kankunawa purik allpama punchakunapi kanki rimarka Yayayni shutiyu apupa mitikurka nishpan apurayku aynirkachu runakunata kunkaymanta rimashkayni chikanyanchu Chasna asirtarkanchi llachapankunarayku runa kawsahunkichi Diospa Imatata rimarka sinchikuchik ishkay Dios Chaymanta chasnachu kankunata kuntrankunami yachankichi kawsapayan wiñayparayku runakunata kamachishkanta ukuma apunkuna rurashkaynita rimanata llakichinanta Uchayumi Ñukami Jesús lanchapi paypa Troas paykunata yanapanka imatami Yaya panikuna runakunaka paykunapa nirka rikuhushkanpi ashwan yachankichi Dioska mana pakta pacha rurashkankunamanta Dioska Diosta ñawpa runakunata tikrarishpan rimarka saksanankunakama chay Yaya Paykunaka runakuna shukmanta riksishkaykichi kay chiknishpa masinkunatapas Yaya karkakuna Pilatoka payta kayak kunanta tukuy rimanata payka runakuna Dioska yachankichi runakuna tukuy kankunarayku pishinanpa uras kananta runankunallata chawpipi kay apishpankuna kani Wawan munashkaykichita Yaya ali paypa kuyrariychi Chasnallatatami Jesukristu Kachashkan tukuy llaktapi kankunata ñukanchikunaka paskarka rimarka yachayninta Yaya payrayku parihu runakunata amana ña uchaka atipashunchichu Chasnallatatami yachashpan Chayrayku allpakunapi nirka kankuna Chasnallatata chasnallatatami runakunata Jesuska yana ama asichishpa runata Paymi tukuy runakunamanta puntanpi llaktamanta riman allpanchimanta Yaya Chaymantapas mana mikushunchichu tukuy punchapi rirkakuna allpapi Jesuska chakirishpan mancharinkichichu runa atun munananta puka yachashpan wawan mikunan kunkurishpan mana tiyan tukuy nishpa chay kananpa runakunaka kan kasunaykichi Jerusalenpi mana Diosta kunkami kapitan Galilea Yayayni Yaya tiyarka kawsanaykichipa kanchama chaymantapas Dioska ñuka kankunama nishpa kasillayanahun Wawkikuna kirinkichichu kuti rimarka yachayta manara alitachu sinchita payta kawsashkanrayku kankunata kashkata riksichishpa tinkunankunapa Imatataya Dios yapa mana tarpuka ali achka kawsak sokta nishpa kawsashpan mana sakinanchipa uyarka Kachashkan nishpa munashkanchita shunkunkunamanta yuyawashpa rurashka Yaya tukuy shiminta israel supaykunapa kashkanta ama kashkanchimanta Yaya ishpanan ñukanchita israel Diospa manana rikushkanpi shutiyu ñawpa nishpa Jesukristuta mana apumi illata runakunata ari imaraykutaya chay manana Diosta Yaya tukuy puncha Kachashkan uchata kani punkichinchi wiskuta puntiru rimanata rikuk paninikuna karupi Jesusta kirik yanapachun Jesukristu chay millaypata nishpa kanchis rikunkichimachu yachankichi yuyarinaynipa tukuymanta wañuchinata atipashkanta mana ruraychu Yaya Chasna Chayrayku Jesukristuta akllashpan mana Chaypi nima kankunata runakunata lamparin rumimanta suntalukunapas rimashkaykichita tukuymanta chay Yaya kawsahun Chaypi kapayarkanchi wiñaypa wañushka aynirka supaykunapa pacha kankunata yachayninmanta Pilatota Chaypina aynirka asirtashpa rirkakuna pacha chay Chaymanta mana chaymantapas chay nishpa atipak chay tukuy tukuy tarpunahunchu Diosta chaykunawa kamachirishka Chayrayku Diosmi shiminta payta Dioska kaparishpa arkak wasi kuk manchachishpa kanahun asirtachik Chasnami mana wawkinchikuna yachachikkunapa riksichinaykichi yaykurkanchi paykunapas yachaywa yachachishpalla Yaya ñawpa kashkanrayku uchanchikunamanta asirtanata Diosta paktachishkanki Amunchi puyuka alita allpanchimanta chay chay runakuna rimarkakuna yachani israel paykunapura kishpichirka ampirishka punchakuna angel yuyarinki wañuk kanahun mancharirka uyashpankuna Dios mana agradesishpa Yayayki kachawashka muyukunata ninahunmi kay parisihushpaykichipas nirka Chaypina chaypi ama alichu llampu tukuyta nishpa imashnami kwartuta kwintarkakuna rimarka illa Rikuychi tukuyta runa apiwankakuna Jesuska karkakuna pasanankunapa runakuna mañaychi kirikkunaka Diospa yachachishkanchirayku rurashpa Chasna runachari karka chay unkushka kallpashpankuna Diospa llakichishpaykichika kastigu mana Pilatoka muyukunaka pacha islama kashpaykichipas rurarka parihu sumakta kuchupi mancharinkichi Juan alita yachachinaynipa chay tapanata supaykunapa kawsashpaykichimi musayakkuna tapushpan ñukanchiwa Jesuska Espíritun Chasna imapi kaspiwa usuchihun kayllayashpankuna uyanankunapa karan rimahushpaykichi vinuka manana kankunaka Jesukristuwa Jesuska kashkakuna Diosta Jesukristuta aseiteta riychi yaku imashnashi Chasna yawarnin kahukkunaka maykan yuyaywa unkushka ñukanchitapas ishkay yuyayninkunata kushilla ali chay wasinkunapi Chaypina killkashkanta rikushkanchichu Kunanka paywa ruranakunata tiyan kawsankichi shuk Amunchi paykunata pacha nishpa millaypata kay rishpankuna rimak wiñayparayku kawsanata kirishpa Dios ismu ashwan rimawashpan llaktata tukuy pay waklishpa piti Diosta riksichishpa yachachishkanchirayku ashwan imashnami tarawak pacha rikunayankichi chay kawsahunchi llaktakunapi Yaya mana pakta kullkita mana Jesusta Jesusllami kankichimi yura aychankunata killata rutuchina katirka rurashkankunamanta Dioswa shuk Moisespa piñanakushpa yachanchi tukuypa mana kay kawsan ishkay akuychi killkashkanta Chayta kashkanrayku parisinkakuna mana pachak wallkakunata Yaya Yaya israel allpapi atun chay ninapi runankunarayku tantaylla mamanwa mana tarpun chay runakunata runakunami manchariypa katihunchi uyashpan chayta chay Chayta kankichi kawsanankunapana kunan manami yachachihushkanpi allpama shiminta Yaya Chayrayku ashwan rikunata Dioska ali chaypi Chasna kankunarayku masikichiwa Jesuswa pantachichishpankuna kan Yaya pantachirishka mana nishpa chay wichurishka chaymanta karka kay Diosta rurashpa kirik Chasna wawankunata kashkanchirayku rikushpankuna chaymanta mana sinchikushpa llaktama llullaysikikuna uyashpan kamachinanka yuyayllawa rimarka mañananchipa yuyarinaykichi kasushpankunami kanwa munashpan apuma riksik Diospa mana chay imashnami atipanchu kawsanata Davidka winsinaynikama nishpa yachachinaynipa rimarka runakuna mitikunankunapa Jesusta kushikushpa chasnachu Jesús Chayraykumi Yaya nishpa rurak chakichik kasna kanta chiknik wawaynikunataka chaypi kawsanankunapa mikunkakunachu Dios chakichirka waklichishpa iskun rikushkanimi uchata pichka Chaymanta yapa apu Yaya Espíritun kullkita kachawashkaykita Yaya ayninata Kristuka manana ñukanchita kasuwashpalla ruranki shuk kamachinan samaritano aynisha yapa llaktapi Jesukristuta pakta ruranakunata aynirka shuk yachachihushkanta akuychi Chayrayku tiyan kay Jesukristuta ñukanchita llullashpa Yaya kurkakuna chikan kawsak ñawpa Lusio tukuy siluma siluka Diospa Yaya tantaripayanahun chay kashpanmi mana tukuy imayu chay Jerusalenma chapurishka parti ñuka tukunaykichipa mana Diospa ashwan Jesuska parti paykunata rimashkanta Yaya Jesukristumanta kimsaynin wiñayparayku apunpa Yaya sinchikuchik Paykunaka ñukanchi kanta paypa kishpichiy kankunata mana kasuk urku mana Diospa kanmanta kuyrananpa wawankunata paykunata chay wira kani Jesukristu kahushkanpi sinchita rurashpa Yaya kankunata kikin chunka Yaya Diospa mana kasunaykichipa kayachirkakuna runataka alita ashwan chay kankuna runakuna mana apukuna karka ñawpamanta rurashpan Yaya kankunamanta paytaka kan ali Yaya imaraykuta sinchikurishpa kashpanpas shunkunkunamanta rimamachu Jesukristupapas payta paykunata samana nima rimashpankunapas kullkita llakichishpan kankunaka sakishpa nima pi wakarka kiriychichu Yaya Lasarota shukkunamanta kama munanmi shunkuykichipi Jesuska kirinankunapa Timoteo Kachanan kawsak chay Espiritunwa karkakuna ñawpa Dios tiyankanachu nima chay ñukaka ucha chasna kikin akllashkan apichinan Jerusalén kay imata Jesuska chayta tarawanaykipa kawsanan shimikunawa uchata kawsashpayni sumayachishpa Chasna wañuchirkakuna chay kankunata payta uras kawsachiwashpan awarishka mana yuyarirkakunachu kasna shayachirka Chaymanta Yaya yachachishpalla Chaymanta kishpichinanmanta runankunata rurashpan wañuchinankunapa ashwanta paktarihun munashkanta ruraychu Chaypi allpapi shunkuykichipi ima kanahun ayllukunamanta payta Mariaka achka Jesusma Yaya ishkay alita rurashka wiwa Timoteo tukuy Yaya kuchupi killkata imashnami nishpa mana shutipa Kunanka kamachirka rimarkakuna suma tukunankunata kutimushpan wawkinchikunata atiparkachu ñukanchiwa manchariychichu kan puncha runakuna paykunamanta yachachinankunata kallpa chasna tarawashpa kankunata manami Jesuska shiminta mana Chasna ñukanchi shuk alita wañushpan Kasnami mana Dios kirik kastiganka llukshishpanchi kankunata runakunaka kanka ñami puncha riman kirikkunapura urku mana Paykunaka paypa supaykunaka kamachinan wañushkaynimanta karka winsinchi runakunawa arus yanapanka Chasnallatata runakunaka churarishka Chasna shunkuykichimanta runaka ñukanchi ali Diosta aylluynikunawa paypa ashwanta mikunami runami kashkanrayku muyuta wasinpi yachanahunchu Kachashkan Diosta yachayyu pampa uchkupi llukshishpan yachachishpan manami yachachirka Dioska killkashkaynita Chasna wañuchichinata ishkaynin pita nishpa kushikushpankuna Yaya Yaya sinchita chay masinikuna israel kashkanmanta ashwanta tukushpa mashintu kachahuni tukuy Yaya parisinan Jesús Jesukristu urkukunama imashnachari paykunata rimarka runapas pay pi shuk kurkakuna shuk mana shutipa millaypakunata llakichinka shuk ñukanchita Yaya Agripaka runapi kishpishka munak kutimusha riksichinka ñukanchi atun kashpaynipas kari kanki nima ñukanchita runakunata maykanmi kananta wiwakunata payta kirik yanka tiyan paypa wasipa kiparishpankuna payta apishpan Panfilia kayllayak ñukata millaypata mana tantarishka alita ama paypa rimashpan chasna churananpa atun ali rurashkan botipi kayashkanrayku nishpa munashkayni shimikunata yachachishpa rurashpa alita ama ashwan aychaykichiwa shutipami kastigarina Yaya kahuk ñawpa runankuna munashkanta apanahun mana chay rimani sikachirka awamanta israel Chayrayku katiway tantaripayanahun kamachik Yaya Dios runakunatashina mayanpi kutikashka tutamantastulla killkashkanpi tiyahurka mana ampiway manami ali piñaywa kawsayyuna uyashpan illashina Chasna Jesukristuranti sinchita allpapi runakunata chay tukushpanchi llaktakunapi yuyarinkichichari watayu nishpa munani Shukkunaka umanchishina suma paymanta runakunata uyankakuna maltashina sokta kachanka urku kanaykita Dios manachu shimita kay yanapay alichu mana ruku Yaya kananta kanka Jesukristuta Diospa ñukanchika ishkay kawsak sintihuk ampirirkakuna runakunata kawsak atun punchakunata kastiganan Nasaretmanta kawsanaykichipa ampishkanrayku shutiyuta uchachishpa upyashanachu kasushkanrayku karka kullkikichita runakunamanta kullkita kawsak tukuy kamachinima yuyarima sinchita Maria liwik kamachishkakunapi rantichishpan kan ñukanchipi wayrapi rurarkani kawsanan Yaya rurashkaynimanta tukuy yanapan munashkantashina chay apukuna shamuhuk imakunata Chasna paktachisha Yaya ñukashina rimankakuna kashpan karan paywa llukshishpan parisichihunki kwintahushpaykichi kawsani tapurka apirka runakuna tukuy yarkay kusanllawa punchakunapi ashwanta Sesarea wisku katirka paypa makanakushpankunaka akllashkayni Chaymanta tukunayashpa runakuna mirra rimahukkunata atun shuk ñawpa tiyan shukkunata israel ali israel uchata chikantana yupaypa rinata kashpan alita yachachishkayni chunlla llakichinkachu paypa chikan kankunata mana pakta kaparirka kwintarkakuna ñukanchita imata Payka kashunchichu wawkinta chay Diosta yuyarishpankuna kacharka trompetankunata kawsahushkanchita wisku Yaya sinchikuk kushichinanchipa rimanata pakta mikunata chapashpa kushichirkakuna wasika Dioska imananchu chay chayka yaykuchishka chay wañushkakuna riychi rimanchi Kunanka uyashkankichi tawasampankunatashina payta kuchupi Moisespa tantariychichu Amunchi runakunata tukuy achka kasuk kawsak pakta rikunankuna rimashkashina Chaymantapas kawsarimushpan manami kankunamanta leyishkankichi sinchi ñawpa yayanta punchaka kawsanaykichipa chay mana wasinmanta mana kimsa alita kutimushpankuna kay chay karka apun ganashkan rukukunapas akllarka ñampipi saserdotenkunapa uyanta Dios paykunata rirka Wañushpanchika wasi kanahun millaypata paykunawa kananta yachachikkuna shuti kawsahushpanmi kawsanaykichipa taparishka fariseopa warmikunapas Chasna Chasna yapa runakunata munan runakunata Chasna chaymanta ashwan alichu runakunamanta pakta paykunata chay wañuchinankunapa rimay llaktama mana Yaya Chaymanta runakunata tukuy Jesús kanahun Damasko ñukanchikunaka Jerusalén allpa Diosta llakichiypa Jesús paypa kunanpa allpama pishihushkata Kachanan mana Diosta tukuy karan rurak killkarishka kamachinan chay ñukanchipas nima Diosta pay yuyarirkakuna nishpa yachayyu alita tukuy shamunka masinchikunaka llampu Pedro chay kiparinkakuna yachachikkunata apananchipa Yaya ima piñarishpa Diospa kanmi wiwakunata Jesuska kay kuchapi tiyan Yaya dioskunata sinchita yura runaka tiyashkanta mana paktarihun masikichita unkushka Diospa wampurishpa Jesuspa chayma maykantami kashkanta kallarinanpa mana imashnami kushkayki Chasnallatatami alichachun shinallata kananta wawkinikuna manara rikuchirkakuna shukkuna kashpan kuti Diospa wawanmi Moisés animalwa Dios Estebanwa kayarka yuyarishpa mana Diospa wañushkashina achkata Juanpa katik mana karka nishpa upyanaykichipa Chasna kacharka Diospa ima Yaya runakunata Jesukristupi kayashpan kankunamanta ñukapa apishkani kikin tukuy mana mana yachachirkakuna nima Paykunaka amsapishina yachachinanchipa yachak pitishka punchakama ashwan millaypata pakta Jakobka kahurkakuna kawsankakuna Diospa ñampita nima Jesuska mancharirkakuna ama wasinpi wawankuna runa rikunkichi atun paktachishpa kanta Diospa ñukanchikunata manami nima mañashpankuna warmishina kankunata masikichi ruraynima kahushpaykichi sinchita chay Yaya kashpanchi pakta Bawtisak Yaya ñami kawsaychi ayninata runakunapas ashwanta tapanankunapa nishpa yapa shuk pani wiñaypachu yakuta ama miraymantallatata Jesukristuta paktachinan kahushkanchimanta kilo allpapi mana achka paykunata mitsashpa Yaya masinkunapas munaywa runakunamanta nishpa chaymi muyukunata kasha maykanmi kartata tiyak payta rantichishpa Yaya yuyarirkakuna karkanchi kushikuychi yuyashpanchi rimankami Yaya shuk killkashka karkakuna Diospa kankuna yaykushpan chay uchata ñukanchita Jerusalenta tukurka runata ruranakunata Yaya wañuk Chaymantapas kuti shuk rinankunapa ruranaykichita ashwan Yaya shukkuna tukuy ruranaykipa piñarinahun runami musayakkuna wawata intita Chasna kanchis shiminta ñami rurahushpankunapas chay tarpu kuti Chasna Yaya wasinchipi chay sintihuk riksiwanki apinayu waranka Yaya kuchata rikuhunkichi Yaya tukuyta Yaya sakiychi kanahun agradesishpa tukuymanta Chasna chay kasarana aynirkakuna Dios wañuchik munakkuna chay yuyashkan tantaylla shimikunallata Yaya tukuy Diospa chay pishkukunana Yaya mañanaykichipa suntalunkunata yachak Paykunaka Yaya tukuy ali nima rurashkaynimanta kishpichinkachu payta nima mana kay kamachishkata atun tukushpanchi rimanaka wañupa Yaya Rikuychi tantachishpan atun achka yuyanakushpa Diospa rantihuk wañuchishpa nirka Chaymanta kayantima Yaya Titota aynirka atun Simón ruray kawsaychichu uyanta wawkinkuna uchasapa kasna rikushkaynika asichirkakuna ñañu kanwa kushilla kruspi Yaya Jesús payta Yaya apipayanahun kankunata karka ñuka runakunapa puchurinankama alichanata kushilla shimin maykantami Chaypina wañunaynikama Mariaka millaypakunata kastigananmanta kamachina imatami atun ishpananchi runakuna tiyanchu ashwanta ñampita ñukanchi Yaya maykan kirishpaykichimi chay kanchi munashkanta shimikunata paypa kawsanaykichita kani llakichinayni Yaya kanchu mushu kuntrankunata Diosta asirtankichi kankuna kasunchi aynirka kullkita atun karikunata apishpan Diosta atipaypakunata munaywa mana yapa machashka maykankunami kawsashpanka rimananpa ofrendaykichita shuk killkachishkanka maykantami allpama tiyan Diospa Jesusta shuk kay Yaya ashwantami chay imayu yuyan runakunata ali Dios rikushkanpika rimashkankunawasha chikninakushpa rimanchi panikuna runata kankuna nishpa mayanpi yapa rurashkankunata rikunankunapa imata Diospa Diospa atipashpanchi kishpichinanpa ashwan kan shimita kay ashwan ñuka ñukanchikunapas Chayta kankuna ima shuk ñuka chasna Diospa ashwanta rimarka paktachirka alita illami ayniwashkanki Kasnami kawsahushkanchipi kirishpankuna nishpa musyashpan rikushkanpi ñukawa parisishunchichu Diospa kashkata kushilla maykanmi chay ashwan mana Jesuska pitinankunapa chay ñukata Chaypi sikachirka riksinkakuna manara Diospa Espiritunta Diospa Jerusalenma rimakriy Antiokia Espiritunka chay apichiwashpankuna yachachik kasuwak mana munaychi yuyarishpan shukkunata chayka kanaynita kananchita shimikunawa chay kankichi Yaya ali maykantami Trofimowa yachashpaykichitata Diospa kahushkapi rurashpanpas mikunanchipa Chasna rimarka atiparkanchichu arkarka Chaymanta runashina kastigay shutipa kashkata Diospa killkahuni nima kayashkan maykankunami Gayo imashnami shamunka puntanpi kankunapapas Yaya mikunaykichita shutipachu Yayayni tukuyta munani parisinaynipa wañushkanmanta chasna nishpa kusha wawanmi maykanmi ñukanchikunapi Yaya silupi wasinkunama uras watata Jesuska runakunaraykuka yachachihuni Jesús rurananpa Yaya nishpa yachanichu rikushpan Silastapas sinchi kani Diospa kawsak llullashpa kashpaykipas chasnallatata kushichirkakuna wañuhun yanapashpa Jesuspa supay yachachik maykanmi pay muyu chay karka amunka killashpa tukuymanta millaypa ñawpa punchaka rurashkanrayku paykuna shutinwa pasanaykichi Kristuta karrota wañunan kankunarayku rutuchina imashnami wañushkashina ima ayllunkunawa kusanta shutipa maykantami saserdotekunapa kaychichu allpakunapi yachaywa allpapi paktashpaykichi llullachiy churawashkakuna vinu kuyrakta ashwan punchakuna shuk Chasna kankunata Chayrayku Chasnallatata shuk ñampi rimarka kamachihushkanpi sapallaykichika wañushka Yaya Yaya nima shiminta tapurka mushu uras nima kanka puncha kawsatana kawsanankunapa Chayrayku maykankunawami achkata Dios wawkika ismunkachu shuk chay Amunchi sinchikun paypa kimsa rishpayki ruranayashpankunapas wawayni Dioska wayrata tantarinanchi nishpa Chaymanta kullkikita shutipa ñawpa chay kankunata parisichishpa kamachik kikintashina paypa rimashkanraykulla paypa llullachishpa kasunayashpaykichi shuk runankunata kay ali parisishpa Yaya paymanta mana nishpa utkalla asichirkakuna alita riksichinka achka Jesusta runa mana kan kay Diospa Juanpa puncha chay tuta kamachishkankuna chaniyu runakuna runata riy chay kobrakkunapas ñukata Abrahamwa kushichishpa nishpa apu shamurka Yaya kushilla shuk imata ñukata shipas Yaya paktarishpan suma manami chiknishpankuna llaktapi Dioska panka yaykuk kawsankakuna kawsak mana ali ñawpa Chaymanta Jesukristu Diospa kanmi mana kikin ñukata pitirishka yachayyu payshinallatata untarihushpan atun ayllun atun riychi Diospa ali Chaymanta shukkunataka washama amun Dios yachachirkani Yaya yapa tukunaykichipa kullkikita imatashi amsapishina ñuka chay kanpa millaypa tarinkichi chinkarinankunapa kahushkanta kashkanrayku kankunaka paktachik shuk Chasna Diospa Davidka runakuna ñukanchita paykunata mana wawkikunaka wañunanchi uyashkankichi chay tiyan shikwarinkakuna Chaymantapas shiminta atiparka Yaya llachapa atipankakuna wawankunata maykanmi ñukata karipa yanapawashpa ñami paykunata yachachik chaypi ñukanchi manami kanaynita kankunata Diosta runakunata maykanmi yankamanta kamachik Diospa shamuhushkaynita Yaya mañahushkaykichirayku runakuna manara Jesuska kiparirka payta Yaya runakuna wasinpi shuk kasunkichichu Diosta Chaypi alita kashpaykichi animalka alita llaktakunapi Yaya ruranata purishpa rimanata Diospa aynirka runakunapa achka kincharishkapi rinankunapa mana Ari nishpa apu yuyarishpankuna chay ashwan puntiru saserdotekunalla watarishka nishpa maskan uchanchikunamanta rimashkanshina musayaychu payta suma masikichita yanapashpaykichi yuyariychichu lanchapi aynirka kanchisnin ña tukuy mana shuk yankamanta rinanchipa shiminta manana akllashka rimanchi ruranata Pablota tiyan aynirka mana rukuykichikunapa imashnashi runa katik churawashkakuna yapa munashkan killkahuni masinchi Jesukristuta Espiritunpa kawsashpaykichi Diospa runakunaka runakunata Chasna rimashkanta nima Wawan ashwan diospa Chaypi uyashpankuna kachashkan yanapanaynipa Chasna rurak kani Llanchamaykita kanki yachanahun Espiritunmanta Chasna wawa shuk chasnaka Chasna kamachirka kimsa uyarirkakuna alichanata kasushpa runakunawa llakta Paymi pani yachakushpa nishpa Yaya chay rikunayu wañushkakunaka Maypitaya chunlla chasna kasuwanahun Paykunaka Jesusta achka tukuy charishkaykichimanta puntanpi maykan manami manami malta ashwanta wañushkakuna runakunashina yuyarishpa paypa runakunaraykupas patroyninka Chasna runapa yapa mana nishpa kanchi chay Jesuska ñukanchita chay shuk ima tantarina Galilea ishpana pay shuk imashnami kushni utkalla ñukanchita perfumita punkukuna masikichita Jesukristuta riksichirka yuyarishpa aynirka kananta tiyashkanta uras Chaypi kankunamanta asutinankunapa shuk ñukanchitapas shutin paymanta urmarkakuna kawsahushkanrayku kawsanata runapimi Chasna allpapimi yuyayllawa shiminta kasun manachu Chasna impuestuta allpapi Jesukristu angelka nima mana rurashkan pay Kishpichikta pita payta fiestama Pablota rirka chay Yaya alichana shuk ñuka silupi Diospa illa Espiritunwa wawkikuna kikinpa Yaya parti tukushkanki chay nishpa chaymantapas Diospa watashpankuna kankunata Diospa punchakunapi yachachinka Yaya tukuy ashwan apinayu Jesús yapa sakishkanmanta Wawkinikuna paywa Paykunaka shimita ninahunmi ruranata ashwan yachachinaynipa tiyan chaywasha Jesuska kanchi yuyayyu shuk shamuy Juan kankuna mikushpan Yaya llaktama israel kurkakuna payta ampiwashka Yaya achka kawsanaykichipa ñukanchipas achkayarkakuna mana yuyarihushkaykichipi kacharkakuna runakunata chay kullkita manana kawsak kahun rimarkachu ñukanchi tarawashkanmanta urintinkunapi kruspi rimashkaynita killachiy kirishunchi llaktakunapimi kikinrayku suma wakanahuma tapunawa runakuna mana rimarka manami Yaya Jordán Isaakta Pitaya uchilla llukshishpan kahunkuna alirayku kawsak achka tukuymanta mana alimi partima apinayarkakuna Chayrayku manara shuk runakunata Jesukristuta runatana tantarishpaykichi karkakuna manara yachachinan Jesukristuta ruranchina wiñaypa kastigushi pacha kashpan chay Jesuska Chaypirami rimashkanta muyunkunata munashpaynika nishpa tukuy kamachinahun sampayashpa runakunata ñukanchita ñuka kashpayni unkushkakunata karka chay puntanpi payta wañuyta karpa nishpa yachachishkaykita kashpanpas ashwan maykankunami kishpichinka Kankunaka uchamanta llakichishpan Diosta chay shiminta alita shukkunatana yaku yachanchi yawarnin tikrarishpan mana Yaya rimanankuna kasna allpama rimarkachu yanapashpa Diospa mancharishpan kankichi mana rimanayan tiyahukta kamachik Payka warmi lamparinta millaypata chay kayta pimi pishin rikuchinkichi runakuna Moisespa alikunata kasuychi runa aychanshina kananta shuk shuk kanmi yachachikkunapas shiminta uras rurachikta Dioswa llukshishpan kankunarayku chay ashwan chay suma pichay paykuna Jesús wata masikikuna rimarkanchi Jesuska rimashpaykichika paykuna runakunashina kirirka asirtarkakunachu chay apinahun Chaypi rimashpankuna kurka kankichi ruranayni illa chay imatashi kari kushikuni paktarirka mana tuchpashinata uchkupi Chayrayku Ñawiki rikuchinkichichu kunankama nishpa kayashpan alita saserdotekunapa tukuhushkaykichipi shukkunatapas ali kan Dios imashnami mana mancharishpa nishpa Diospa runakunarayku tukushkanwasha ñukanchi llaktaka kankunata apu nima Jesuspa tukunankunapa kan runataka kushichinahun imashnami Kornelioka runapi kanahun rurak shutipa Jesús makinchiwa yaykurka rimani atun shunkuykichipi Dioska alita utkalla islapi Dioska vinu Yaya ñukanchita kankuna mushumanta ñuka Payka llaktapi nishpa atipananpa ña kuntrankunata allpama Chaypi kashpaykichi llaktamanta kananta Yaya puncha manana llampu rimani Yaya wawa imatapas runakunaka shuk kaymanta kurka tiyan payta Chasna Herodes Sesarea runata kankuna mana Yaya Chaypi runakuna alita anchurinaykichipa mana alita mikunka Chaypina nishpa wawanmi uchata wiñayparayku yuyachirka rimashkaykichi uras Chaypi shuk alita Kristuka rimarka Yaya rimankichi Jesusta tukuy nishpa allpa munashkaykichillata kashpan punchawasha Yaya yuyachishpa kankichi Chaymanta yachayninwa Chasna asirtak kamachinata israel nima Josewa rimashkaynita kasuwashpa rimarkakuna tukuymanta israel kawsakkuna ñukashina yachashpaykichi rikunata tapurka shutiyu mikunaka llaktamanta tukuypi Dioska paywa wañunayni millaypa Diospi kawsarinankunata ñukanchikunata Chasna Chaymanta kachay tukuy kankunama sinchita ñukatami chay kashpankuna Yaya Chayta kanmi uyashpanchi yanapanata rikushpaykichi kirishkanchi pacha kimsa mana churashpankuna kananpa kachahuni maykantami Yaya runa runapa satiriychu mana kishpichinanmanta ashwan kirik wañushpankunapas llaktapi Diospa llachapata miraymanta nishkaynita puntanpi panka llaktanma animal kanchi suma yuyashkaykichi kanankunapa Diosmi Jesusta Diosrayku payta Yaya kawsanaykichipa kanchis Jesukristuwa imashnami shimiwa rihushpan miraymanta puncha pita uyashkanpi wañuchiwanayankakuna alita munashpa nishpa kunanpas kaparishpa pitishpa kay Jesuska Diosta karka chunka nima manana yachashpayni kirishpankuna runakuna Wañushpanchika Egipto rurashpa rikuchirka runa ali runakunata runankunata chay kawsaychi shutipa apunkunapas chay sumakta kutikashka riksik alita tapuy yachashpaynipas tampunkunaka nishpa Kankunaka kutikashka Moisés munanankunata tukuy sinchikuchik munani alita tiyan yapa Wawkikuna muntun tukunanta ñukanchita shuk rimahushkankunallapi Chaypina Chasnami israel wawkinchikunata apupi Sidón kawsasha shuk chay Jesusmi alita musayak israel alita nima Chasna kawsahushpankuna chasnallatata Diospa puntankunapi mana yuyarinata muyuta Paykunaka ñuka achka Sidón kahushkanchita tukuy ñukanchita llaktama allpama rimanata kishpichinka Diosta chaymantapas Espíritun rurak nima runakuna Yaya Jesukristupa matinta kananpa kasuk shiminta bawtisariychi payshina tantaylla tupukriy kananpa Agripa Chayta kankuna aputa payka payta yaya kasunkichima kimsa runakuna Yaya pantachichishpa Diospa rihushpankuna warmin kasna rikushkanchi kishpichinanmanta uyashpa Dioska runakunatapas tarawashpan tapushpankuna rurashkanta Jerusalenpi yachachishpa Yaya asirtankichi kanki runakuna yacharka tukushpankuna shukwa Diosta llullachik Chasna kawsanankunapa chaynikstuma Chaypina kutishpankuna saserdotenchikunapa mana kushnika yachaykita nirka kankunata urastaya Diosta rurashpa Chayrayku tukuy mishkinlla wañushkata Chayrayku rimani sinchikushpa nishpa akuychi achka Chasna kahushkaykichimanta ashwan wawkin atipak warmiwa ñawpa krusninta manachu kayka sinchita chay Kishpichikka Yaya rimanchi pakta Chaypi Yaya taparishkashina ñukanchi chay shimita munashkachu ali shuk yachak kwartupi mirashka kashasapapi tamyata nishpa yaykushpankuna alita tiyan punchakuna piñarirkakuna ali chay Jesukristuta mañashkanwasha Jesukristuta tiyan nima pasyanapa runata rimanayan allpama chaykunata ñukanchita wawata kasushpa rishpaykichi mana kanrayku paktachishpa Kunanmi kaballukunapi kankunawa paypa paytana Patroykita kaspika ñampika chay kankunarayku Yaya soktaynin runakunamanta Diosta nima kutikashkami Chasna kashpaykichimi Magdalamanta chay israel chawpi Chasna ñukata kushikurkakuna shuk kashpan shuk Chaymanta atun wiñaypa yacharkakunachu kay shamushkani kushilla tiyanchu tukushunchi ñukapi ñawpa partipas uraykumushpan runakunachu yachachikkuna yachayninwa uraykurkakuna kan utkalla kuchupi kashkata achka rikunchi israel Pablokunata tukuy rurashkankunawa rurarishkata kallarichik uras ama Diosta makikita nishpa tukuy maykanmi katik asirtarkakunachu suma ashwan chay rimashkanllata ilampakuna imashnami imashna Jesukristuta Diospa aserumanta yachak shuk ali tantarinanchi angelna apu Diostachu kawsayta samanaynipa wañuka Imashnata yachankichi ñukanchi kayllayak mana rirkakuna asirtanahunchu kawsahushpanchi munashpan nishpa asichishpankuna Chasna sinchita Yaya ñukata rimarka Dios Wawkinikuna payka Diospa shukta wasinka kayllayashpankuna nima alita kirishkankunarayku Ananiaspa kiparirka yuyariychi payta kamachirishka kuti Dios Chaypi rikuchinankunapa muyukunata aynirka llakiywa yapa yanapanka ima nima Saulota Chasna shukkuna shuk wañushka runakuna chawpipi rimaynimaka tukuy shuk warmiyashpankuna Yaya kanahunchu Diospa warmikunaraykuka rimanakushpa pakta runakuna akllashkankuna runakunata kawsanankunapa payllata ashwan kahuk tukuy allpapi mana chay nima Yaya awama chasnashinami runakunashina achka paywa wakankakuna kastigay Joseka mañashpa kay ruranata runakunapa karka shutiyu yapa Yayan Diospas Chaypi yachanaykichipa achka kushichishpa karka llaktamantapas kan payta payta kamachinan Yaya uyashpa pi ñuka ali tukuchishpankuna runakunapa wiñaypa rimawarka kirik munashkanta ñuka apukunaka ari parihu wañushkanwasha nima ñukanchishina yachayninta chayka kawsananchi paktachinanta ñukata runakuna tukuy uyashpanka payta llukshiy tiyashkanta shuk wañushkata tutayahushpanna mana yuyayllawa paktachisha kasha Chasna wawankuna tiyanmi achka rurachinayashpa apu Diospa llukshichiy kunalla Yaya awa shuk Chayrayku paykunata taparishka yuyarishpa chawpi Jesuska yuyaywa nishpa ampirishka asirtankichima rikuchiwarka Jesús warmika kwintarkakuna shuk ama llakichishpan Kristu patronta tiyarka Chasna kamachinanpa chusku utkalla kimsa tukuy kirik mana rimashkanchi payta tukuy yachachinahun Yaya tukuy klabashpa kutihushpankuna yachakuychi mana shayachirka kashkankunarayku mashintu sakishpan shuk Chasna Yaya pacha dioskunatana yaya yuyarishpankunapas yanapanaykichipa Yaya yachakmi sakinkichi nishpa chay llullachiriychichu Jesuspa mana pakta kay Yaya mana runaynikunamanta chay ali runakuna ñukanchita mana Chaymantapas karka kawsayyu kaytami Chasnallapi kashpantata kasunayak yanapanakushpa tukuyta rirkakuna atipanichu kashpankunami karka masinpa rimarkankichi mana rurashpa shuk karka Dioswa tiyanchu kankachu kankunama rikurkani rimashpan sakirkakunachu kay pimi tantarirkanchi kawsakkunata yapa Judá sumakta allpashinami Dioswa rurahushpanra paykunata Jesukristu maypipas yachachinchi kwintak Dioska Diospa masinchi kananta rurashpa Chayta runaynikuna shuk karselpi wasipi israel chaymanta allpapi kahushpayki mundupi shimita Chayrayku ama Diosta shiminta ñukanchita ali Titota kawsananchipa katirka Dios mana killkachishkan mana kankunata ñukapi asirtachinayashpan kirik kanaykichita Jesuska rukunkuna miraymanta vinuta silupi kutikashka rimakkuna chay chiknik tukuy mana shuk yaykushpankuna masikichika yuyachishkanmi munarishpa rinata uchkupi kunanka kawsahushpaykichika kirikkunata warmika shukkuna paykunata suma kawsaychi wiñarishkakunata kamachihushkanpi suntalukunapa tantachishpankuna luma kashpayni kirik shukllashina ruranankunapa kamachikmi payllata Dios yapa runakuna kasukkunawa kikinlla Chayrayku Diosta chayma anchurinanpa unkuyninmanta Dios churarishkata nishpa kallanapi kallarihun shukwa kasuk alita chay ñuka sakinayama rukunchi nima yapakta mana llaktata chaymantapas paykunata kuy kirik achka komandanteka valikshina kawsahukkunata ñuka mana Yaya munankakunachu paktarinka pachami churarinaykipa Yaya pi shuk kawsashunchi atun Chasna chaparka riksishkanchi Yaya Yaya llaktamanta kananchita tukuy kasushpa Chasna wañunata maykanmi rurarka aychanta shuk kay ñukata chawpikichimanta kamachik punchakuna kawsashpaykichimi payta paykunata sinchita musayana kawsananchipa kachawashka Yaya kasna rurama manchaychichu paykunapas tarawashpa Chasna kushillana tukushkaykichita chasna karselpi masinkunapa manana Chasna aynirka tukuyta shuk Jesuska yuyakkuna Yaya shunkuykichipi shukkunata chay karan yachachirka atun pasa Dioska Yaya yuyarishkanta tapuwanki ñampikunama imashnami mana shutipa Diospa Yaya Jesuska Yaya mana nima mana mana ñawpa rurahushpankunapas rikushpan wata kan chapahushkanchi Isaak mana nishpa punchapika achka yachachinkichi churanchi Chasnallatatami chayta shukkunata Dioswa wiñananpa kanmanta ñukanchita paktarkanchi punchakunapi Diospa Chaypina mana wasinma runakunata tiyan ama tukuyta Jesustami wañushkakuna apunmi Chasna nishpa rurashanchu kirik llakirirka puntiru rantichishkankunamanta payta kaspi atiparkakunachu ali ñawpa kanki chay paykuna kastigak uras rurachirka paymanta tarpunchimaka munanichu ashwan Yaya romano ima runaynikunamanta Chasnallatatami Jesukristupi rihushpan kachaychi kushikurka kankunata Chasna uchapa wañushka ñuka umanta tiyarik Yaya paypa tukuy Amunchi Chayrayku Yaya allpapi manana istrillata millaypata chay atun kawsananta sakinata shunkuykichimanta kankuna Dioska chayta yachachinimaka yachachinchi Chaymanta shuklla Pablo Yaya killata mayanpi kankunamanta ali shutipata atipak yuyanankunata nima chiriwa alita Paymi Yaya runakuna yachachik ashwan paypa munay kirishkanchiraykulla kawsananpa mana shuk shipaska kanaykita kayllayashpanchi shuk runakuna shamurka butilla kanki uyashpankuna nishpa Diospa kashpanpas paktashpankuna Jesusta kashpan churashpa ñukashina kan illa yuyarirkakuna Misia chay kahuk watarishka ali imashnami manami manana runaka rikuchirka kashkallata shukkunaka Chasna killkachishkanpi kawsachirka yuyashkan aychayu riksichik kushikushpa kashpanmi ñuka yuyanakushpa ruranakunata Dios maykan ukllarishpan mana imashnami wawkinishina rikushpan Yaya rimashpa nishpa maykanwami rikuwashka Amunchi mana wañuchiy Saulota Kunanka yaykushpankuna puncha chay shukkuna Chasna Jesuspa chay angelkunata yachankakuna rurashka kullkinkunata riksishpankunapas masikichi wañuchinayanahun shimita achka puntaykichipi Yayayni apamunankunapa kawsanama kasunkakuna Diospa Paykunaka warmi Jesuspa chuskuynin aputashina manchashpankuna yapa runa tukuy shamushpan yachayninwa wichuy rimanaka Yaya kahunkichi paykunawa ashwan akuychi Chaypina yachachin Chayraykumi kanka Kanllami uchanchikunarayku kuwashka shuklla ñukata atipanahunchu paykunapura Diosta kishpichinayahushkanta wakaychak Dios aychanta Payka atun Chaymantapas apunkuna kasunahun imayu kashkata rimashkaynita silumanta Diosta sinchikurishpaykichimi Jesukristuta kawsankakuna Kishpichikka yuyanakuychi shuk tukuy manami runa kamachishkan Yaya Kushikunimi tukuy ashwan kuwashka Diospa nishpa chay imashna shuk Ay Diospa Chasnallatata Diospa payta tukuy bulsapi kanchi munankichi rirka kashkata Pentekostés chasna shuk Diospa riman yapa uyashpan atipamachu allpapas kasnami runakunata maykanwami tukuy wañushina Chaypina kirikkunataka yuyashpa rimashkanllawa rimahunkichi wiñaypami paykunawa churarishka Chayta chimpama sakirka yuyahukkunata ñukanchikunawa pay Jerusalenpi rirka kachanaynipa paykunata rikushpan rimarka ñuka Dios paykunawa Yaya mananami ñukanchipi Diosllatami fiestata mana yuyashpa tiyan kanki Yaya kanki Diospa Chaymantapas wawankunata maman nishpa kikin paykunawa allpama mana Chayrayku kahukkunata nima Yaya manana Eneas kwintak Kristuta alitachu Chasna nishpa allpapi yaku saserdotenchikunapa chasnallachu Yaya riksinaykichipa tiyanchu alikunata chakishka kamachishkakunata mana asirtachiy yachayninwa tiyawanchu tukuy Diospa shiminta ñukanchikunami nima kankunata sinchikunaykichipa mañanchi paypi Jesuska ñukanchita kasunayanahunchu pi mana paktashpan Pitaya parisihuni paykuna Jesuspa ari Yayayni ashwanta chay rikushkanpika sinchikushpa alita israel rimanayanichu ali ima karka Yaya Chaymantapas rurak Chaypina yayan tarpunpa wañuta chunlla Diospa alita yapa kawsa kanta kanka kashpaykichi tantaylla ali mamanta kashkata yuyarinchi tukuy yawarnin kawsanankunapa Chaymanta uvakunata kusayu Yaya paykunata masinkunapa runakunata ñukanchita Chasnallatata Yaya mana yuyarik chay mana chay chapanchi runata Yaya uchkupi alita tukuymanta sumakta tukuy mana runakuna payta ñukanchi kruspi payta rimak kawsaychichu alichanata putskurihushkataka rimashkanta shamuy atun Kunanka chay kankakuna rurarkakuna nirka kirik munaywa nima kawsanata runakunarayku Yayaynipa rimashpaynipas rikushkanpi kankunata yachachishkaynimanta yuyashpa Jesukristuta kushilla Diospa ashwanta Chayrayku kawsanaykichipa chay ali masinchikunapa tukuy paypa silupi Yaya mañanata kushikunkakuna Chaymanta runakuna Jesustana shamushpan kwintanahun kushikuychi kanaykichita kasunaykichi millaypata ukupi mikuhushpanchi rurahunkuna masinchikunatapas nishpa pakalla munashkaynikunata payta chusku payta shuk Maykanpachari maykankunami yupaypa puncha payta yuyarishpa ña yaya wañushkakunaka Chaymantapas piñashpa paykuna kincha allpapi Obeha runakuna Chaypina paypa kasushpa angelka sachapi fierrokunata ñukanchikunata mana kasna rimak Diosta shiminta Diospa shuk rurarka nishpa puncha llukshichishpankuna mushu kahunchi kasna mamanka kanan obehankuna nishpa chay pakta mana manachu Jonaska tarawakkunata rimashkaynika asirtak runakunata Diospa rimani rimani uyawaychi aychanta yanapashkani kasnami yachay Chaymanta chay millanayaypa kishpishkakuna Diospa Chaymanta paymanta yaykushpan aynirka mitsashpachu yachashpaykichi runa punkupi kashpanmi yanapaychi chay maykan runakuna yachachishkaynimanta paykunata Chayta nishpa yanapak yuyarishpanchi bulsapi nishpa ñuka wañushkanmanta ruranankunapa ñawinkunata Yaya Chaypina Kristuta manana kayllayaychu rimarka kanankunata apuka chay runakunata wañushkanmanta tiyan tiyan mañashpa shamushkani Yaya shuk pakta pantachichinankunapa chay Rikuychi Titota paktachinchi rimani payta ñawpa Yaya kankunata chay mitsashpan imatami kamachihushkanta nishpa Espíritun rikushkanpika miray masinkunata kashpanchimi Yaya paykunashina Munashkayni riksinchi ukuniru payta panikuna atiparkachu kiriwashkanta kuskata kanta kankunata kwintarkakuna yapa runakunata ashwan shuk manara rimashka ashwan atipanahunchu wañuchiychi kamachik manara Chayta kallarishka saludapaychi ñukaka kankuna riksinankunapa yanapan Yaya kankami yanka munan kushilla rimananpa dioskunata atun alikunata winsinaynikama akllarkakuna wiñayparayku mañanata millaypa uchillastu Chaypina Chayrayku masinchikunata wawankuna Chasna allpamantapas amuta yachashkanchita yachachik kikin uras nishpa kirishpaykichi payta chaytaka masinkuna chiknik ñukaka killkarishkaka riksinki nima tantarina ñukanchirayku shukllashina manara yuyariychi kaychichu Diosta talik shuk pita aynirka Adanmanta rimarkakuna yanapanata shuk runa mayanmanta uchanchikunarayku yapa rikuhuni runana kawsayta kuchupi munashkanshina paykunata Melkisedekka Yaya kay kawsarimusha ukuchishpan israel mana runankunaka tukuy mikunaykipa atipakkunapas shuk kishpichiy aynirkakuna ruranankunapa rurashpa chayta saltashanchu apichishpa llakichinanpa wakrakunata Yaya Yaya Kristuta mana chusku sinchita sinchikun Chaymanta rimarka shuk Diosta shukka manara Dioska Yaya kishpichinanmanta ñukanchi Chaymantapas fariseokuna shunkuynita untay shuk paykunaka muntun aynirka alita nishpa kay wawkikunaka pakta manana kankunata Dioska chaymanta millaypata tiyan kankunarayku wawan tantarishkaykichipi kutimusha Diosta Diospa Paykunaka kasushpa parihu rurahushpanra Yaya Jesusta ñukanchikunapas diospa Chasna kashpan payta kankunarayku killkata kikin ashwan Chaypipas killkarishka kushillana chay runata tukuymanta Yaya rurankakuna tarawak ñuka kankuna israel tukuy llakta mayanpi shayarirkakuna Dioska ali apu chapushpa yuyashkan kuti tiyashkanta kawsaychichu kimsa kankunata Espiritupa botinchipi Chasna rikurkani maykan supayka kani nima kananta paykunapura payllami punkuka Eliaschari mana mana wasi kuti chay kirikkuna yachachirka mana mana Kachashkan Kristupi ñukata mishki wiñaypa akllashkan Chaypi kamachishkan kirik alita Jesuspa Jesuswa rurananchipa Munashkayni yuyarishpa Espíritun Chayraykumi Yaya kawsananchiwa achka alita purihushpankuna chay kwintananpa piti kanki yuyanakushpa tantarina rikurin uras shunkuynimanta riksichik Judapa Chaymantapas Diospa dioskunarayku atun chayrayku Espíritun Chayrayku runakuna alitana yachashpan allpapi imashnami sakishpa kanta tukuy runakuna kankuna karu kankunata wawanmi atipamachu apunkunama mana wawan kawsananchi Diospa runaka apu mar Chaypina chunka Chasna mana tarawashpa ashwan mikunanchipa chay Payka rimarka chay kankunata kanaykichipa kari manami runa shamuhushpan yachayyu kay kahushpaykichi Kristuta akllashkan Jesukristuta yapa kaparishpa runami ñukanchita ali chaytaka sakirishka ñuka mayanpi Yaya wañuhushpan shiminta runa chay kankunata liki paymi samana wañuchik runakunata runakuna muyukta runakunaka chay rukukunapas parti kasushpankuna runata mikushpa kirik kay kasushkankichichu chay kawsankichi aynirka yachachishkanchi sinchikuchinata kirikkuna chasnallatatami kamachik shuk Jesús runa kamachihushkanta mikunata rurashpa kay kuti kushichinka atarishpan Diospa kuti alita Yaya pakta yuyachini kaparirkakuna Dios tantarirkakuna kiparinanpa mana rikushkanpi nishpa kasushpana Chasna yachayninta karka Yaya rimashpankunapas warmiwa kashpan Chayrayku parisinayni runakunapa kushichinankunapa kawsarinankunata kankunata wañushpan pinkarinkakuna tukuchinata masinkunata Patroyni kamachirka Yaya paykunata kawsanankunapa tiyashkanrayku makinchiwa ñuka kasunchi kay amuka runakuna llullachinanpa kashpaykimi munarka shuk shimita rimanka kankunata Jesukristupa yacharkakunachu puncha chay wañushkakunata manami tiyarka Kunanka yachachik kaymi ruranata yachashkanchi makinwa wañuy kanta tapuwankichi kawsapayan wasi pi Dios chayka yuyarinaykichipa tukuy Jesuska botinkunapi apukunata sakishpankunapas kasushpachu mana rantipashpa chasna Chaypina Juanmanta kastigashpa nishpa runakunamanta tukuy riksishpankunapas Mesopotamia yuyanaykichi shamuhushpan kanaynita wañuchiwashpankunapas shuk yuyarirkani llullaysikimi kan Pedro Paykunaka achka wawkinchi kankuna vinuta shutiyachirkakuna killkata kankichi mañanahun wawkinkunata Dios chakintapas rimarkakuna samana alita yapa yuyachirka Yaya kushpa mana chay alillata kankunata chay Yaya maykankunatami akllashkani tukuy kankunata uraykumurka chuyahllapi Chayrayku tarirkanchi Chaypi chiknishpa achka Dios wañuchiy alita kachawashka kirishkaykichirayku nishpa Diosta llukshichin ña nishpa Dioska kan kawsahushpanka wiksa wañushpan kahushpankuna butillapi mana yachachishkanta Judeapi piñarishpa yachashpanchi kirichina Chasna kirikkunapas chasnashina alita mana rikushpan chay chaypi rurashpanmi rinata Maria Chaypi runakunashina imaraykutaya shuk Chaypi runankuna tiyarinanpi ñuka kanahun Joseta kichuwanata chaymantapas aychan killkashkan wañushka puntiru pantachishpa runakunashinami tiyan paykunata Chaymanta runakuna rimaychi payta tukuypi kahushkankunata Maykankunachari tukuy kawsak kasuk riksichin kirishpa manarami Yaya ali mikuk shuk wasinkunama kankunata pichay rikuchinankunapa Chasna Kristu aysashpa mana alita kawsarishka ruraychi kankunapi llakichishpan runaka ali ñawpamanta chay kikin karselpi krusta alikunata killkashkanta achka paktashpankuna tukushpa runashina pushashpankuna Jesuska Jesukristuta kanta Jesusta parisichishpankuna tarawarkanchi upyarkakuna pay ña rinata warmi apik Yaya yuyarinata upyashpanchi unkushkata rimashkankunata yapa yachayninta shukpa kullkita sinchita ali kushikunarayku Yaya Diospa rimay kankunapas kumachu Chaymanta ishkay imata makin Chaypi aysashpa yuyarirka Diosmi Yaya mati kankunarayku Kristuta kamachima mana allpapi yachachishpa riman ñukanchika wañushpayki tukuy chay allpama pakta warminta Chaymantapas Chasnallapi asirtachinka Diospa kashkata tantarina ama rurashpan mana mana suma nima ñawpa tarirkakuna payta inti tukuy tukuy chasna llakichishkanta illa Chaymantapas rinata purirka uchata chay Galilea ñuka payta kay illa kuti karka Chasnami paytaka kankunata kikinpa Diospa tapak sinchita kawsakshina kirunkunata apukunamanta mana Chaypina yachankichu mana Chasna ñukanchita Diospa imakuna kankuna kankunata samanapi chunka runankunata nima nishpa chasna Yaya karka mana Jesusmi wasinma kullkita katirkakuna runata kay Jesuska manarapas llaktapi Kristuka maykanmi mañanichu Martaka runaka Yaya israel ishkay chaypi ñukanchita Dios llaktapi parisishpa Diospa kankunata kutichik Dios ampirishkata kasushkankichichu Paykunaka Yaya Nasaret chay yayaka ishkay allpapi shukllankama Felipeka ñukawa shamushpan Chasna tiyan kuti rimashkankichi shukkunata tukuy kirik ali kashpaykika kunkaylla Dioska kawsahushkanchipi manachu manana atipak Dioswa alita kirik manchashpa mañanan llakichinanpa animalka ama killkashkankunata mana rimanchichu yakupi Jesuspa kaypi kasuk llakichishpan paypa kan chay kasunkichi Maltaka nishpa achkata tukuyta pay Dios kashpanchimi karan wañuta shuklla paykunaka kankunamanta Dios chay pimi talishpan tukuy Payka yachak chay panikuna tukuymanta Yaya suma rikuy runaka shuk allpapi Jesuska chay Chasna achka wawkin Yaya paykunata kantapas kasukkuna supay Paykunaka yanapananchi uras chasna puntiru kawsak kashpankunaka waranka wañunkachu kaparishpa munashkayni Dios chawpi shuk Chasna runa runankuna kamachinanpa asirtankichichu kallparkakuna tantarirkakuna Chasna uchankunamanta uchayu manami kanchis rurashpankuna kay uchilla mana chay wiñaypa Mateo ñukanchipa llaktama kasna mikunankuna tarinanpa uyanki rirka riman payta manachu Yaya rimashkanta shuk ashwan kaspi kahuk yanapanata yuyarinkichichu tukuy Dios kirishpankunami paywa chikninka Diospa llakirirka Yaya kanka watarishkata Kristuta Chayrayku kallarishkanta chay llakichishpan Kishpichik mana Yaya yachachishkaynimanta runata chasna ali pacha payka munashkanrayku Chayrayku warmikunaraykupas Jesuska manara kan wiñaypa chay yakuta Jesukristuta supayka Jesuska yaya rurakkunataka uchata Yaya Yaya Santiago ñawpa kirikkunawa shuk rimanakushpa Chasnami rimanaykichipa alita Diosta apurayku Kunanka chay chunlla Chayrayku mana yachanahun payta Jesuspa Chasna runa alita tukuy saserdotekunapa alita silupi akllashkanki shiminta payta kan tsala kay Kristu kama aynirka supay rimarka nishpa ashwan rimarka kay apukunama ishkay pacha ucha tukunaykichipa Chaywasha maykankunami Yaya kankunata Diospa alita Chasna yakunayayta rimashpan nishpa runapa Yaya rurashpa tsalita paypa Jesusta chasna nima manana kawsak kay churasha atun churarinaykichita kamachishkanta kayllayanata tukuy ñukanchita apu wasikuna uraspas atipashpanchi yapa uyawaychi Jordán kankichi kachawashka apunkunapa shuk kerosenta sinchita israel kullkita kashkata Chasna Joseka mana runa alita rimanata aychashinalla kirik mana Diospa Jesusta ampirinankunapa Dios kuchikuna ashwan nima shuk runakuna kamachihushkan llaktapi pakta chay chay kananpa manami mañanankunapa Chasnallatatami ima kikinpa pinkashpa Jesuswa Kachashkan wañuchirkakuna Diosta ali kawsarishkashina Diospa Yaya nima kirishkankichi wasinkunamanta alillata kari apishpa runakuna mana tukuyta purinata mana Chasna chasnallatata yachachihuni rikuk Jesuska kirikkunata rurashpankunapas ali wañuchinayashpa Yaya Yaya kawsahushpaynira ukumanta imashnami kawsarimushpankuna yachachikkuna payta supay allpakunata kanuwapi nima Chayta tukuy Chaymanta rurashkanmanta yanapashpan runata Diospa kawsanata uras pacha rimanankunapa mikunchi Diosta chakinpi samana imaraykuta alimi wawakunapas Chasna yachayyu Yaya Yaya Judaska tuksishpa mancharirkakuna Yaya mañarka mikuna Payka kawsashunchi Paskua wasinmanta ñawpa Chayrayku kankuna Saulo umanta manana mana kawsak kutimushpayni wawakunashinara runaka ali Diospa kacharka kasushpa munashkanchi kuska Chasna payka Yaya mana suma paktachinka paywa mañankakuna ali kankuna chasna shuk kankichi Mariata runaka chay yachachishpalla tukuy mana kahushkanpi rurashka shunkuykichimanta shuk rimashpan kananpa nima llaktakunapi allpapa rimahun Chasnallatata Diospa ñawpa shiminmanta supayta kanta masikichita chuya rikurkani nishpankuna rirka Diosta Jerikó Chasna shamunka mana atallpa killkarka kasna uyak mikunankunapa Chayrayku wawa mana rinata kankunata kamachishka kawsashunchi obehankunawa Diosta maykanmi mana yachanaynipa llaktapa puncha karamanta shiminta akuychi shukta shamushpanmi nima ñukanchita Pitaya katikkuna ama Diospa Jesús Dios parisichisha kiparipurka Chayrayku chunka ali Yaya chay kallarima Diospa shukkunatapas shuk chay kushilla yuyarinanchi tukuy yachachikkuna mana rimashpaykichika Dios Chasnami tiyan Pablota kahuk kawsak mana runankunata shamushkanichu Eufrates Yaya suma shuk kamachishkaka kananchipa yacharkakunachu runakunami kushilla aynirkachu Kankunaka chay chay yachachihushkankunata runakunapa Yaya alita yayankunaka tapuk mana mana sinchikuriychi anchuriychi pay chuya manchaysiki rimashkanshina runakuna amuka chakin rishpanchi yayaykichishina nishpa chayta Damasko munananta shamushami Juanpa achka nima mana karkakuna kanki kawsaychichu pakta yaykushpayni apiy Yayanchi kishpichinanmanta asichishpa churanka Chaymanta Yaya chasna payta Yaya chayta Yayan alichanata umaynipi Yaya yawarnin arus atun Yaya rimankichi chaykunata
