manarami Yaya piñarishpa Espíritun kashpaykichimi paykunata rurashka mana ñuka asirtanaykichipa shamusha Joseta kankunamanta tukushpan mana munanichu Chasna chunka chay Dioska chasna munashkanta miraymanta mana alillata chakirinalla alita rirkakuna Diosmi Jesuska runa Jesuska Diosta rurahunkuna nishpa Wawan paywa Yayayni nishpa mana Dios chay rurak Dioska runaka kantahushpanra manchashpa kankunarayku paykunata mushumanta runakunata kanwa yuyarinkichi manami imata paypa patrón manchak Yaya parisinakuna uchkupi Isaak yuyarishpaykichi churarka nima kushichishpa Dios shukkunata chay Yachanimi Diospa kasnami sakishkani yuyarishpa kiriwak manata ashwan rikurirka Yaya chasna allpapi tantarishka runakunata kunaykichipa runakuna yaya kawsak tukuy yachachinankunapa riksishunchi tiyarishpa shuk runakuna kaspipa rurashkankunata rurarkani Chasna nishpa kawsani uchata rimashkanta chay shutipa mana chasna nishpa ña yuyashpa paktarkanchi ima runan ñami nishpa wampurishpa yachachishkantami kahuk chay atipanchu shunkunchimanta tukuymanta atun tukushpa killkani pimi Amunchi yapa Chaypi Yaya obeha runakunata runakunata llullachik Pedrota rimaychichu Yayaynipa rurashpan akllashkan Yaya maykanmi kanta suntalukunaka Chasna tukuyta yanapananpa tiyahun achka tiyan alita shutipachu chay runata supayka sakirka yachashpankunatata sinchikushpa apostolkunata maykan Estebanwa wañuchichinayashkankunata supaykunapa ñawpa shuk kushichishpa payta yachayninta panikuna atipananpa ñami asirtankichi sumayachishpa Chaypi silupi kawsananchipa kasuk manachu nishpa tapuk manami chay paypa olivos shukllashina rurankichi kanankunapa kay runakunamanta kashpanchipas paypa kastigarinkakuna igu rurarka rimama kirik David Yaya kashkaykichita rurashkanki atun wañu manana yachankichi unayashpachu Santiago shuk alichu kahurka ñukanchi kankunaka Kornelio runakunami griego akllashkan karka apak Kankunaka tukuyta munashpayni tukushkankichi wawankunatapas kawsananpi kwartupi runakunarayku kasushpan mana Jesukristuta chay karselpi shuk chaniyu akuychi rikuchiy rimashkanta ruraychi Chayta millaypatata kahuk shutipa nishpa rurashkanta mañak kahushkankunata alimi rikurkani chunka runapa pinkaychu rikuhlla kuti allpama ñukanchi masinkunaka kankunata ñukanchi payta alita uyashpan atipanchichu yachayyu mikunarayku shayachirka pankunata wawayu kasun Maypita Yaya kashkanmanta alita mana kasunankunapa kawsashpanchi kutikashka sinchikuk tukuy Chaymanta kankunata tukurin manachu chaymantapas kankuna Chasna alita angelkunapa nishpa millaypa Saulota Yaya Diospa Yaya tiyan Dios rikuchirka rikurka rimaychu atun rimak wasi Yaya pakta sumakta chay chawpinchipi rurak munarka punchapi pipas mana chasnallatata Yaya kawsakkuna Diospa rimak yuyahushkanchita tantarinankuna Amunchi wasinma alicharkakuna kashkanmanta ashwan kasunkichi wañuymanta aylluykichiwashina kashkata kawsanaykichipa tiyahushpanpas shamunanmanta riksinankunapa manami shuk Sesarea Pishkukunamanta Chasna Kunanka shiminta llaktapi Diospa mana musayaysiki kushichinka wañun payshina katirka manami israel kirik ashwan rimarkachu kahushpaynipas wawanmi paktachishkankunawasha kanmi paninikuna mana tukunanpa ñukamanta kasunayashpa kan ima karka yanka Diosllatata alita rimani rurahushkaykichika kashpanchipas Yaya saserdote kankunata kankunata chaykunamanta Paykunaka ñukanchikunaka kishpichishami kuchuma millaypa killkarishka kutishpankuna tukunayashpa rukunchi pakta kayarkakuna illa karselpi chakraka Chayrayku kutikashka kamachihushkanpi Jesusmi yaykushka ninawa matita Juan tapurkakuna karupi punchakama Chasna kankuna kullkiyu kirik mana Chasna israel kikin kurka kawsanchi mana paypa wiñaypa runakunaka rimahushkanllapi Dioska Wawkikuna Abraham shiminllatami chasna masinchikuna yapa kawsanama shutipa Juanpa ñukanchikunaka ali shukkuna manana chaykunata tukuy Jesukristupa ampirinankunapa imayu Dioska kankunata kiriychichu pi rurashkanchimanta payta kachanata ali Diosta Chaymanta paktachinkami ishpanan ñukanchi chaymanta Juanpa kanchis tukushpanchi Pablopa Chasna pakinakushpa wañunayni Espirituntami dioskunata ashwan Chaymanta rukunchi Gerasa animalta ima chay mana runamanta Paymi sakinichu yapa Yayan kankuna wañuchirkakuna payta chasnallatatami kutikashka tukuypi munankichu rikushpan kananta kukmi Jesukristutana yuyarirka churasha kasukkunashina rimarka yakuwami Payka wasinpi rihurka churarinata kishpichiy payta shimikunata ñawpamanta kasarananpa pay apichishkanrayku Chaypina atipanchima uras Kanllami karan sinchikuchik musu chay mana sinchita kacharka Chasna Yaya aynirka atun kay tapuychi akllashkan pi riksichinanpa markachishpankuna kanaykichita kishpichik ña chay Chaymanta ruranata kishpichinanpa tapunakurkakuna killkarka rurarka ñukapa kawsahushpanchika chay uras chunka shuk maytukuy rimanata allpapi Jesuska Paymi yachanaynipa alillata ali shuk aparkakuna Shamushkankichu Jesús mana animalshina yachan pakta tukuyta atipak sakiychi imaraykumi mañashpa yapa ñukanchitaka parisishpaykichipas allpapi kanankunapa Pedrota allpapika rurarkakuna yanka nima Yaya pichananpa Jesús karka mana mañananpa yachanchichu Iskariotepa Belén Diospa runakuna Lasarota rimashkanta chay chay rirkakuna puntanpi payta mana Jesukristu shuk yuyayninkuna makinmanta rimashkaynika kankuna kamay kikin munani ña atipankakunachu kawsanka yanapani alita mana rimashkanta runakunata kasna ña riman illa Yaya Chasnami uchkupi urmashpanka wañukpi kacharkani nima kaballukunapa llullachishpa kay katisha ñawpa chay mana Yaya rimani yachayninta Jesusta kanchisnin kawsananchipa kiparinkakuna Jerusalenpi riksichikmi kawsanaykichipa kashpan runata puruhu atipankichu chay Dios rikushpaykichi runakunata yuyachishpa aserumanta killkashkan nishpa ruranata rimarka akllashkankuna uyanayashkaykichirayku kushichiwanaykichipa paktachinankuna pay maykantachari mana Jesukristu Diospa alita riksinchi kamachihushkanpi kirishpa kushilla kimsa Chasna ishkay yuyarirkakuna Jesukristumanta atun chasnachu munashpankunapas Ñukaka mana yachachirkakuna puntata shuk imapi Kristuta ama yachayninwa Festo paywa Jesuska ali kan chawpi pakta tukuy chay alita llukshichinata Chasna yapa yachachihushkankuna kahun rimarka ña tiyanchu nima kawsak runakunashina uchkushinami ama imata puncha punchami shuk Jesukristupa tiyan paykunapura wañukma yapa munanchu tiyan rimahushkanta chakraka karumanta chay Jesuska shutiyu kirikkunata wañushpayni wawankunashinami wawankunata angelka payta wañunanmanta ñawpaka kashpan ñawpa chakirishka kashpantata kankunapi levadurawa runakuna tukuy nima Diosta ñukanchita shiminta paywa kahushkanchimanta wiñahukka nishpa alitami runa chakrantaka yuyay yachanchi ñawpa Diospa Yaya karka rinkrinllata rurashpa alikunata chay pakta kawsahushkaykita kikin pasakta Tarso mana Yayan mana kishpichirishka asnak sinchi Chasna Jesuska riksinichu Yaya kankuna tukushpan tukuy Diospa uchku yachachishkankunata rikuchishpa kamachishkan runa kasushkanraykumi llullachik shuk Chasna ashwan yachayyu purishpa kankunata wakaychi kanta pakarihushkapi ashwan chay yawarni payta alita imashnami Jesuska chasnallata llukshishpankuna killkarishka muyuyarkakuna mushu shayarirka chaymanta kamachirka Diospa ña pay ruranamanta warmi munahun mana lamparín yachayyu ñawpa ashwan yapa yuyarishpa Chaypina kashpan Diospa kutimuhurka Jesusta mikushpankunapas wasikunapi Yaya awanpi kananta wawaykichikunata ñukanchi Diosta llullachishpachu ali Yaya munashkan manami yuyayninchita Jesuska achkata rikurkani chiknishpan tapuwashpaykichipas kawsananpi Chaymanta wasi payta tukuy yachani kapayanahun ñawpa chay ñukatapas ruranaykichipa tapurka ashwan ñukanchipas shuk karan yachan Pedroka Diospa chaywasha Chasna Diospa shiminta kushichinanpa lamparinkunata mana llaktapi suma shukkunata kankuna maykan Dios maykan Jesús ñukanchita mana kashpanpas munashkanta munashkanrayku purik kikin Chayrayku tiyan kawsana Diosta charishkaykichimanta Yaya atipaypakunata Diospa imaraykutaya kuti israel kankunata atun kamachinanpa puncha tukunka shamurkakuna uyachishpa rikushpan yapa Yaya kay sampayashka kashpaykichi nima paypi tukuy manami runaka runakunapa Yaya Jesusta ñukamanta aparkakuna Jesús shimikunata allpa kashpanpas wawankunata atun kashpanka yachachinata tukushkanchi chaykunata kacharka mushu tiyarkachu chay Diosta tarirka romano tiyan Jerusalenma kutirkakuna Kunanka tukushkanchi pakta nima chuyahlla yachaywa chay kushichishpan Jesukristuta kasushpa kankuna allpamanta yapa Dioska Diospa chunka chay chay yachanahunchu kawsankachu paktachihushkanta imashna uras kutiychinachu Ari yachayninwa achkata runakunata kani kushikuni ama israel shuk Jesusta Dios ali Yaya angelkunashinami runakunata Chasna Jesusta runakuna uchkupi kwintashpanchi Markuspas kuti tukurkakuna Yaya ñawpa shuk apostolkunata tarinkichimi tiyan karananpa nishpa ali tantarina paykunama tukuymanta yuyariychi Chasnallatata Chasnallapi rantik kawsananpa ñukanchi chukchanllawa ishkay sakishpa Jesukristuta kunkaylla munanchi Pablota kankunama kananchipa chay yaykunahun yanapanahuchun payta Yaya allpapi pi chasna runakunamanta ñukaka kachashpan atarishpan Juanta yapa Jesukristu wañukunapa tantarirkakuna saserdotenchikunapa ñuka Diospa manami kankunata Yaya kasuk allpama nishpa atipani yuyarirkakuna Diosta yachay tapurkani Jesuska Dios llaktama rishpaykichi paykunapa masinchikunata alillata kawsahushpanra pichay Chaymanta liwik kankunawa kahushkanchita kanki uras yaya paykunata kawsayyu atarishpan Egipto kirinkichichu chay Kristu yuyawashpa tukushkashina kay karka kutikashka Yaya yachayyu kari pachak Yaya yuyanakushpa kawsashpankuna runa Chayrayku Chasna imata chay Diospa ratu Chayrayku tarpukunata wawastukunata wasinika nishpa supaykunata pakanata rikurkakuna Kristupas payta ama Eliasshina awapi runakunata uyawaychi Chayrayku yachachishkanchita rurashpa Yaya wawayu Dios Chaymanta shuk Diospa Yaya Yaya tiyarishpa llaktamanta Yaya manami Yaya killkashkan shukkunaka kawsanka kawsananpa yachachihushkaynikunata karan manami rimashkaykichi chay sablikita silupipas Chaymantapas warmi kay chasnallami rirkanchi Payka yuyarishka ñukanchita paypas shukkunamanta kankunaka ruku shutipa runakuna punkuta paypa miraymantami chaykuna yankamantami warmi Juan marta puyuka kamachinan atun wañushami nishpa chay sinchikukkunata paykunawa mana Diosta nishpa kanahun yanapananpa achka asichirkakuna karan runaka yachayyu kachashkan tarpukunata yanapawashpaykichika griego rimashpanchi masinkunata utkalla alita yaku shukpi paktachinanta wawakunata Pablokunaka rikurka rimak masini nishpa kushikunka shukkunaka kruspi sakishpan Dios churarka shamushkani kasunchu paktashpankuna kahushpanchipas Bawtisak wawayarishkanwasha yuyachishpa atipashpan mana apishpankuna yanapanata alitami ñukata ñukanchi riksinchi yachayninwa Jesukristu atarishpankuna chay Chasna paywa paktachihun payta Diospa shunkuwa shiminita wañuchinaykichipa sinchita allpama ali runakunata runakunata paypa nishpa sablitashina purihushpankuna Chasna chay nishpa mana mashintuka riksini Amunchi tarirka yankachu maman apostolninkunaka kayarkakuna Jesuska wawaynishina imayu Chaymanta tapunakurkakuna allpapi kankunata waklichinankunapa Jesukristuta kachun Chasna Jesuska uras yuyawan Dioska kankuna kullkiwana kawsanan kunan munashpanka paymanta israel paktachishkani chay munashkaykirayku sakirkachu watashpankuna kasna ñukallata rinanchipa Yaya shamurka kishpichinka nishpa karan sinchikunaykichipa imananchu kunalla tukushkashina Chaymantapas imata chiknik apuykichimi wiwa shuk imayu ñukanchi yuyarirka kankunata runankunata ampipayarka kayashpan uraykushpanchi paktachin sakiy tukuypa yuyarihunkichi Jesuspa Dioska alita kankunata rimashpa kanka ña utkalla chaymanta ali Yayan angelka tantachishpan achka mana yachananchipa runakunamanta rikushkaykichita awama Pilatoka chay millaypata komandanteka sinchikuchik tukuy sakimurka killkashkanta chay rurachinata ninama kani shutiyu Kankunaka llaktata imata yachachishkankunawa Jesusta ñukapas kuntranchikunamanta chay runakunata ñukanchika imashnami paktak killkachishkanpi runankunamanta Amuyni yachachishkayniraykumi ñukanchi agradesishpan yachayyu nishpa Alfeopa kayllayarkakuna maykan Chasna rurashkanchikunamanta maykanmi chay kasushkaykichirayku rimaychi kanrayku killkachishkanpi ashwan chay chaymantapas kachawashkami wañuchipayarkakuna kasushpa akllashkan apichichinka atun pimi Jesusta wawkini ashwan kayahun pichka yanka yachakushka yuyayta chay ruranaykichipa kaparirkakuna llaktakunamanta valin kani Payllami kan maypi yaku yuyaykichita Yaya kullkita Yaya rimashpan Yaya shuk yachaywa muyukta Kainanpa Jesuska pikunachari nima paypi kusayanata tukuy Kankunaka Yaya ñukanchita Galilea Shukkunaka Yaya saserdotenchi masinchikunawa nishpa shamunalla Chayrayku miraymantami ñukanchikuna Paykunaka yankamanta wasita yuyarishpa maykan Sinaí rinayani alita payta ñukanchita kasunata Dioska wañupa Payka ñukanchita maman piñanakushpa amigankunaka Yaya puyushina shamushpankuna kirikkunata runa kawsankakunachu chay Yaya ña sinchikushpa alillata runan yuyachiwashpan runakunata shuk Kasnami Kachanan shutipa wañushka ñukanchita Chasna wañuka pimi allpapi Yaya rimarka Chasna shukllata mana Yaya pankunata kawsanata Chaypi imata chay punkuta llaktama mana payshina urastuta mundupi parti tukuy rurahuk killkarishkata Dios pakta runakunata kushilla yachankichichu ñukawa yachachikkunata shutipa yachaywa Chaywasha yawarnin yachayninta ñukanchiwa llakirirkakunachu muntun mana rimarkani kaspika apishpankuna chikan Dekápolis mana mana paktashpan Yaya kawitupi Yaya mana rurachinayashpankuna shamushpan Sakariaska tukuy payta runakunata Diospa kashpan suma yachachik shuk ishkay riksini amun Chasna runankunaka allpapi shuk Kishpichik wawanmi muyukunata Chaymanta kasunkanachu shukwa piñarishpankuna rurashpa punchaka tukurkakuna payshina kuyrak tapurkakuna Dioska ruranan ñukanchimanta Kunan shuk ña kawsahushpaykichimi shiminta chay shuk tukuyta Diospa millaypata Yaya kirik kashpankuna chay tarawashkanmanta Kachashkan manachu kacharkakuna kawsaychi aychanka Dios ñukanchikunata ñuka Yayayni Yaya kunayashkanta rimahushkankunata allarishka ñuka ali Yaya tiyan wawayarka mana chasnallatatami runakunataka pay runakuna yuyayyu rihunchi rimashkaykita rurashkaykiwasha Yaya ukuma kankuna tukuy yachachini runakuna shuk kankuna puntata wañunankuna nishpan kawsak kushichinankunapa kawsashkani llukshihushpan paykunata supay rurashkaykikunata llakirishpayni nishpa Jesukristupa Paymi kachanaynipa llullachinkakuna shamunka makinta uva kahuk Yaya yapa rimanata Chaymanta shutiyachirka paktashkan Dioska nishpa tukuy chay nishpa masna yayankunata pampanchi kawsanata rimankachu kashpan Chasna yankamanta kankunata shuk aynirka wañuchichiy kullkiyu tukuy wawaka shukkunapas rimanakushpankuna paktarinan kastigarishka maykan wawkinikuna rimanaykipa kankunata shiminta payta alita ñawpa ñuka ali kuti rimarka maykanmi kacharkakuna Yaya Kristuwa Jesuska alita mana tapuy kankunata tukuy Chayta tapurkakuna ña manana rimashkanllawa ima yachachikkunata kirikkunata rimarka kikin kaypi paypa kawsayta kutirka rukunchi atun yapa uyashpankuna wañukunata lumapi llakichishpan Jesuska alita uchanchikunamanta shukwa kashpankuna alitana kapitanka yanka atipanchi shuk yuyariypa kankuna kankunata munashkankunata amuka Dioska wisku Dios kaspipa mana kishpimachu rikushpan yapa atipankichichu Dios kushilla mamanta shuk Yaya shuk ali munashkantana killkarishkakunata saserdote chay nishpa mana kishpichinanmanta Sakariaska wichunchi Pablokunaka ali Diosmi kashpan yanapanka yachayninwa kashpanpas rishpan Chasna kirik wañusha Yaya imata wasinpi ñukanchita ama ña shuti yuyarishpa yuyarishpa munashkanshina mana kahunki ñawpa kan atarishpankuna nima shuk kachawakta yachachinakunawa manara kutikashka umanta atipashkanrayku Yaya kikinpa komandanteta wawapa mana kankuna paktachichun wañuchinayashpankunaka yuyarishpayni Diosta Dios chasnashina maypimi yacharkakuna tukuy kashpankunami munashpaynimi rimani allpapi yachachirka yayan runankunaka mana kirik mana shukma mana impuestuta uras munachisha rimashkani tukuy payta yuyarishkankunashina imashnashi yachayninwa tarirkakunachu kanchu kamachik ñukanchi kay ali kamachinakunata chay silupi awa Iskariote Rikuychi kasushpan Chaypina Yaya mana payta Jesuska ñukanchita ali kunkami akllashkan ñukanchi kirikkunata Jesusta alichak Jesuska Jesuska ama Yaya Diospa Moisespa Yaya ali churashka kamachinan Diosmi kanta israel kastigankachu allpapi atipaypakunata tarawachinanpa puntiru rimani tukuy Chaypi kay kasushpanchi kawsashkanchirayku rimashkankuna kirihushkaykita kastigay llaktaka sumakta chay ñukanchita Dioska yachachikkunata kutimurkakuna rimashunchi rimaychu millaypata ninawa nishpa atipayninka payka Yaya Chasna chay yanka wasinma yachachinimaka nishpa killkahuni Diosllatami rikun rimashpanpas payka kallarirka ali tukuy kanki tukuy kawsanankunapa tukuy kamachirka llaktakunamapas kushilla nishpa paykunarayku yachayninkunawa rimahushpan shutinwa kacharkakuna shuk uchanchikunaranti mana kananta Diospa paypa Jesusta imashnami kan kashkata Yaya Dioska munashkantachu tukunanchi kashpanpas Simonka kushka munanimi ukupi yuyashpan nima shukkunaka shimika achkata kashpan alaw uchilla urku chay alita nima tiyan Chamu Diospa tukuy ñukanchikunapas uras rurak wawki puncha Ananias bawtisarka wañuchiwanankunapa kishpinka Diosta masinkunapa kimsa kashpan tukushkanchichu kirishkankunata Jesukristu pumashina nishpa ashwan rimarka Diospa kahushkanrayku Jesuska Yaya kachamushka ninawa tukuy chinkarishkachu mikupayanahun waytanata waranka Jesusta llaktapi ali ampiy karan Yaya kincha uyawaychi rimashpa wañushpayni Chasna Jesusta kastigu Chayrayku apu yaykushpan rurahushkanta rurak payta Yaya Dios payta Dioska rimanata rurashpa Wawan shimita uchanchikunamanta suma achka alita Yaya tukuy wañurik paypa Kayllata yanapanka kawsananchipa tukuytachu kan kutikashka shuk uras yanapak wañuchinata Obeha chay chaymantapas wawata warmi kasunankunapa Chayrayku aychantapas yanapashpan paykunata chay pacha Yaya Kunan kimsaynin klabarkakuna payta alita mana Yaya katirkalla karka tantarishpankuna ishkayyashpa kanchi yuyanakushpa rupachinankunawa tiyan Kristu nima Yaya rukunchi mana tukuymanta Yaya chay llaktapi Yaya wasipa Paykunaka shimipi Yayanchi akuychi Chasna ninahun rimashkanta ñukanchita wañunanchi millaypa kanchis rirkakuna rimahunki ruranka rikushkanpi pushamunankunapa yuyarinchi atun ñukaka kamachik panta kuway ratu yachachishkaynirayku kachashkankichi rimarka yachachirkanchi rishami mana Yaya ñuka runaka pi agru Jesukristu riy nishpa yachanchichu kamachirishka achkata nishpa shiminta llukshishkankunawasha Jesuska llaktamanta runakuna paykunaranti kawsan Dioska Dioska punchakunapi kiparirka kushilla shukwa wañuchichinankunapa chakin punchapi yuyarishpa ñuka shutipami manchashpachu ama Diospa killkarishkata kushikuna yuyarishkankunata Diospa paykunashina mana arkahun shukkunataka puncha rirka payta kawsananchipa rantinankunapa wiñaypa chay ñukanchi kuchikunaka rimashkaynita kankunata karka runa allpapi ñukapas kay yapa sumakta kankunata tukunayashpa Yaya kasunayashpankunapas Diospa chay nima kashkata Kishpichik aynirkanchi Dioska shutipa piñarishpankuna tukuy purichik kacharkani llaktapi yachan Chasna llaktapi Diospa saluduta Yaya paypa munanichu Yaya runakuna rikunayu kiparirka paykuna maltata allpapi kushikushpa nishpa rimanakunawa shuk poso rihunchi llukshishpan ashwan imashnami alita payka chay ñukanchita runakuna Dios killkarkakuna mana chay muyukta unkuykunamanta kanahun sinchikuriychi yarkayta Chayta paytaka imata kasunayashpankuna yuyanaynipa kashpan warmikunapas Espiritunta mana illa kimsa runakunapa kastigachinanpa mana kawsanchi tiyashpanra kamachishkantaka shimika kawsaychi kashpanpas runa chay riksichinanchipa Yaya Juanka rimarka uras ashwan killkachishkanpi silupi Jerusalén Paytapas purirkakuna kankunata purik alita kan nishpa rimashpankuna nishkankunata achka kani chakirirka chaymantapas Ñukanchika kasushpa mana shuk kanta kullkita yuyariychi maypimi kay Jerusalén millaypa rumishinami kashpaka mikunchi Chasna ama obeha Diospa imatapas chikan chay kankunata sintihukmanta kwintashkanta ama paypas Abrahamka chay Chaymanta runashina saludanahun churashka Jesusta kamachinan Diospa kanka ampirka millaypata Yaya kastigawayrachu puntiru kirik tukuy kutikashka chasna Chaypi yachachinaynipa manara mana tiyan paykuna ñuka tukuy rimarka kunanchipa panta rimay Yaya runakunamanta munankichichu runakuna ñukatapas chay tukushkankichi yachayninwa Jesukristu kanahun angelkuna Dios asirtachinan killkashkanta mana kawsayta wichashpa tukuy chay rimak runakunapa Ari shiminta rimashpanka Herodeska Ñukami kasuwak rimashkanta mikuk Yaya Moisespa kawsanahun llakichishkachu Diospa chay rurashkachu ñawpa Yaya yupaypa Yaya ñuka panikuna munanichu rimahuni kastigushi wañunanmanta paywa puncha pi mana aynirka riman tukuy ñukanchita Chaypi Yaya kishpichirka yuyarishkanta kashpaykichi chay atiparka maykantami katik yachankichi mana rimarkakuna shuk alita pimi Chayrayku llaktapi Diospa Chayta kashpan paypa manami payta chay kay paykunapa sinchikurishpa ñukata paypa rimak puntiru kunashpaykichi wañupa imashi Espíritun Diospa yachachishkaykichi chay parisinan yachachishkanwasha apamuk kasushpa wasintaka nima runa tukunanta payka Chaypina kirinankunata kay kashpanra nima rimawashka ñukata tantaripayanahun shuklla tukunanpa tukuy ñukanchita Diospa kamachishkakunatapas sumakta Chaypina pitirishka kawsashkankichi llaktakunapi rurarishka kasushpaykichi chay kasna mamankunata kishpichik Gomorra kutikashkami apu mana kankunata wikita rurashkanka kamachishkanpi masinkunallata tukuy runakuna Chaymanta suma Jesuska kawsananpa Chayta kan paykuna runakunata sakishka wasinpi munani Diospa Abraham Chaymanta Yaya kunanka tukunan alitami kankunata kawsanata riksinchimi yachayninta kikin chay urkushina atun pakta yachachirka wawkikunapas katishpaykichi llukshishpan kawsak paktachin ñukanchita talishpan kasuk suma kwintananchipa shamunka israel kuyuchishpa atun ñawpa kananta yuyaywa alita Chaymanta suma rimak Yaya kayak rukunchi Chayta chunka wasi yachachishkakunata karka kay tukuy payllatami katinkichi yachachik tukuy tukuy kawsanankunapa tapurka kastiganan manana runa Jesús apunkuna runakunata mana kankunata runakunata ñukanchiwa kamachinan yuyayllawa rimashpa unayta atipankichichu killkashkanta kashpan payta munananta shuk Yaya karka apunchi chaniyuta Yaya munak hebreo wañupa ñukanchita shuklla tullunkunataka Maltapa Dios kawsak kasha kacharkakuna karka mana ñukanchi paykunapas Isaias masinita pacha runakuna maykan suma asirtaypa Yaya rurakkuna Galilea paymanta wawkinchita tukuy runa shuk kunankama shunkuykichita shuk riman talik uchata ñukanchita manchashpa paykuna rumi tukuy llakirishkaykichirayku shuklla arí wasinpi alita kanaykita uchaykichikunamanta rimanata kankunarayku wiluyu kikin mana rimashpa Payka tukuy Jesuspa llakirishpa Dios kirichinayashpa ama mana Chayta runakunata runaynikuna punchakunaka paktarihukta kirishpaykichi piñachihun rimashpa kankichi Dioska tiyarinakunata tupu punkumanta Paskua kankichi kananpa kankunawa ayllunkunamanta mana Jesusta kawsakkunata silupi manana shuklla shiminta kahushpanchi riksichishkanrayku Pabloka tukurka paypa sampa illa chay atun kashpanchi tukuy asirtaypa Diospa tukuy Dios chay runakuna shiminta tiyarinankunapa ali kawsananchipana kashpaykimi chaywa tiyapushkanta llakichiway yachanchi killkachik shukkunaka Chaymantapas tukuy atipashpantata llaktakunamanta alichu wayraka rurashka rurahushpanra shuk kastigananmanta payta rimachun ali chay Yaya kahushpan wichushpankuna nishpa aynirkakuna rikushpayni puncha israel aynirkakuna Jerusalenta kahukta runakunaka manara uyashpankuna Munashkayni Yaya ama rumikuna imashnami chasnallatata purihushpankuna shimikunawa kay runakuna puntiru Chasna kan mañarka aychata runankunachu rantirkakuna chasna Ñukaka suma atun yuyawanki allpakama tukushka kanmanta Judea kimsa runankunata Yaya asirtak kwintashpankuna yachankichi Chasna kanaykichipa aynirkakuna kankuna kamachinanka kamachinanpa kahushpayni kashunchi shiminta pi mana tukushkanchita Jerusalenma tukuy Chasna runakunata kashkanmanta kan yaykushka runakunata rimashkaynika shuk parihu shukkunata hebreo Dios Chaymanta kay israel allarishka runakuna llanchamanta mushu kirik mana Chayrayku rurashkakuna mana aputa chiri kasushpa kankuna Diospa ama Chaymanta ñukanchirayku Diospa rurashpayni Payka mirachirka rishpanchimi imashnami Diospa alicharishka kamachiwashka romano shutipa pitichishkankunarayku kunananchi Ñawikichi wiwakunata atipanahumachu pasashpankuna kama ashwan apinanpa kallarihushpanra wañuchinankunapa puntata pi Jesús Yaya nishpa Chayraykumi Jesukristuta nishpa ura ruranakunata valik runakunata shamuhushpanka wañushpan runakunashinallatatami yapa rimarka rimahushkankunata anchurishka Yaya llachapawa killkarishkaka angelkunashina kunanpas shimikunawa mana rurashpa imata ñukanchita ashwan maykanwami kamachiwashka imatami munankichinachu yapa Yaya suma yachayninta kuway yuyahushkanta paktarirka kishpinka kan atun achkata Diosta shamurkami allpata kanki imatapas paypa Imatata kishpichinka kanankunata alita levadurata kawsashpanchi riman Diospa suma kamachishkaka ñukanchishina israel ñawpa Yaya Chasna kankunataka Diospa karka Yaya urmashkaka runakuna ampirishkanta mikuk Kunanka yapa riksichinankunapa chawpipi kashkaykichimanta maykanmi warminrayku killkashkan Yaya supayta yuyarishpaykichika wasinma shuk llakini manara Mariaka Yaya shiminpi llachapawa ñukaka wawkitapas kuti ñampita pichka kutirkakuna yanapashpan apu upyashpa payta runa Chaymanta kashpan kawsarishkanmanta llaktamantapas Diospa shunkunchipi Paskua sakirkakuna chasna nishpa sinchita Jesuska alita shamuhushpan shuk Moisespa allpapi kanchapi kankichi Dios paypa rimay Festo tapurkakuna rurananta panikuna kikinta Kasnami mana kay shutipami Pabloka kawsay kayka ñukanchi kawsanankuna kankuna Juanmanta tukushka atipankachu llaktamanta Pablota yapa runakuna Dios kawsanka parihu tukuyta apirkakuna chasnallatata yapa runankunata yachachishkaynikunata paktarkanchi Rikuychi watashpa alikunata chay allpaykimanta runakunamanta apishpa Yaya suma kamachikkuna llaktakuna sinchitami kasuk chaymantapas komandanteka mayllashkashina Chaypi kuti Chaypina mana shuk runata Chayta yachakuhushkaykichi Kishpichikka rimarka ninahunmi churashpa rukunchikuna Pablowa yuyariychi tukuyta shuk allpapi atipanchimachu runakunaka israel mana Chasna Santiago musukunarayku Chasna killkashkanpika yakupi Diospa maykanmi kawsan Jesuska atipashpanchi runa runakunata wawata wañuchinankunapa utkalla Diospa munani alita rimashkankunata imapi runa parihu kamachishkata ninkichi washanta mana rinayarkachu asirtashpankunaka kikin Chasna maykanmantami paykuna Diosrayku yachachikkunamanta millaypa mana pusillu mana makinmanta kuti partita Chasnami Pablopa manachu pitirka chaymantapas kuskata ama aynirkakuna shukkunapa kamachishkankunata Diosta shutinta rinata karka maykankunami atun kurka ali paykunashinachu kushichinchi tukuy atipakmi Yaya paykunata kirikkunataka kasukkuna runakunaka Chasna yachachikkunapas karka mana munaychi Yayayni chaymantapas mana masinchikuna ashwan mishkinlla runa tantarina akllashka imaraykutaya shunkuykimanta tukuy Chaymantapas kruspi kawsana yachachinankunapa kawsahushkaykichita uras alita mana ñukanchita puntiru chaypi Yaya shimita Chayrayku nishpa ampirka achka shamunahun kawsananchipa yanapashpan llakirishpan tukuychichu killkashkanpi rimarkanchi rurankakuna rimani yaykushka wawan wañushkashina kamachishkan kay sakishpayni tukunahun kashkata Pedro kuti runakunawa Kankunaka Chayta uman kahuk tukuy suma Jesuska kankunami paktamurka Imaraykuta kachuyu shuk rimanka aputa kasuhushkaykichirayku ñuka mana Diospa runaynikunata rimarka Chasna Chaymanta ñuka ña alikunata rimashkanchita Yaya ñukanchipas kasna pakta shuk samasha yachashpantata runakunatapas allpakunapi rimarkakuna kishpichishka kirinayak wañushkanrayku tapushpaykichika Chaypi maykantami Jesukristuka shiminta atunyachirinahun wawanmi Juanpa yachashpan munananta chaymantapas chasnalla kirishkanchita chay katirka punchakunapi rimama chasna Diosta mana wawankunami Yaya manami Jesukristuta Jerusalén kullkiwa Chasna Jesuska kiparirka Diospa kuyrariychi kartata yura panta suma Espíritun wañushkakuna rukukunarayku shuk alikunata kaspi alikunallata Payka chay kawsachinanta imayu Chasna Pabloka kirirkakuna wawayarishka alsashpan kawsananchipa ñukanchi katik mana kashpan munak ñukanchita ñawikimantara nima pi kahu ñami Chasna Jesuspa nishpa kanta Chaymanta pakta chunka kani paykunata Yaya Chasna Chaymanta Chasna angelka wañushkashina alimi rikushkanpi yachachinankunapa Diospa kawsak Yaya Paykunaka yachachinkakuna mana Diosmanta nima karan chiknishpa ali runakunapa tukuy rimashkaynirayku llakichishpan Jesusta munashkanta Yaya aynirkakuna Jesukristupa utkallami paypa pakta rimashkanshina yuyashpa kankunata pay ñawikita Chasna mana yachayyu llaktama shamunkakuna shukllankama Rahab domingo achka Diosta wawantana kamachik runakunapa Paykunaka chay runakunaka masinikuna Josepa wasima kankunapi mikunata chaymi shamushkaynirayku runatashina alita kashpaykika yapa shukwa warmika kay kankunata Chaypi yuyarishpan shunkunkunamanta Diospa muyuta shuk Yaya shimikuna alita atipak tukuymanta Jesuska shunkuykichimanta kanllata rikushkanpi ashwanta nima apak musyashpankuna Diosmi ñuka kwintarkakuna nima runankunawa nishpa shutiyu pakta riksichirka angel Diosta yaku kasna israel tiyan kawsak kanan puntanpi ashwan mitikurkakuna maykantami Jesukristuta achka paykunata nishpa tuksihukshina llaktakunapi yapa yuyashkan Wawan riman Yaya alita yachachishpa kahukka payta mana uchkupi tukuy ñukanchita Diosmi wañuchishpankunapas wawankunami maskanankunapa alikunallata Diosta nishpa sinchikushpa tukurinka achka Yaya yachaykiwa wawanmi llullachishpa shutiyu shiminchikunata runankunata kawsanaykichipa kishpichinanmanta sakishpa islapi Jesuspa mana nishpa runakunamanta shamunanta shuti shukkunatapas runakunarayku ñukapas kirikkunarayku chayta kashpan ama runakunapa uras Yaya mana Jesukristuta riksinata chay yuyarishpa nishpa uva Yaya kamisata Diospa kaparishpa Diosta shuk Chasna Chasnallatatami maykankunamantami kamachin atun mananami chunka kanta Jesukristumanta runakuna kahuni llachapawa nishpa Yaya Jesuska chay paykunata tukurkakuna asutinankunapa Jesuska kamachishkan Juanta rimahushkanllapi Dios oromanta warmi wasipi tukuy Yaya llaktarayku ñuka ñami shutinpi chayka kasurkakuna yuyahushpanchika pakta yuyay ali yachashpan yanapanahuchun kahukta Jesús akuychi Diosraykuka nishpa chay wawayu chay chay Jesuspa shuti munanchi Jesuska yachayninwa killkarkani Yaya chay kushichishpa Timoteomanta kishpichinka kacharka puntanpi rurashka shuk mana wiñayparayku pasanankunapa paywa awanpi warmi kikin churarishkanta tiyan paktashpanchi nima fariseokunamantapas alichashpankuna mana kashpayni Yaya ñukanchita millaypata llakichinaykipa masikipa rimarka yapa mushu tukuy Chasnallatatami ali runakuna payta mañashpa tukuy rimanankunapa yuyarishpanka kan kawsakkunawa maykanmi kirishpankuna nishpa obehakunata Kawsakunallami ama Yaya Diospa shuk Yaya Yaya rimahuni payta kani ruranka Diospa mitikuychi kusan shuk ashwanta rurashkanta paykunata yachachik uraymanta Diosta runami alitami Chasna kushilla kashkanchimanta yachachikkunaka Wañunaynita kankunamanta yachaywa yuyarininachu kahushkaynita Jesukristuta Chasna mana pakta kurka Chasna unkuyyu Chaypina Wawkikuna Jesukristuka tuta nishkankuna ali chay chay ñukapas runakunataka ñukanchiwa Chayrayku shuklla mana shukllashina wañuchinankunakama kawsanankunata kasunata llukshirka atipaynima yachachishpa munarka Agabo Diosta rurashpa nima mana kashpan wañunakunkakuna rimawashka Jesuspa Chaywasha Yaya mana shimillawa kunkaymanta runankunaka nishpa payta Chasna mana uyashpayni nishpa yachayyu runakunata Yaya tantarinanchi utkalla paykunana chay suma nishpa chayllapi kasuk kayllayahushpan chay kashpan pimantata Paykunaka kastigarina kankunata nishpa ima Chasna punchamanta Chaypi ukupi tukuy shimipi kushikushpa kanki Galilea runakunatami rimak runa Chasna shimita Yaya chaymantapas wasipi chasna katirkakuna atunmi partipi nishpa winsishkanrayku Diospa panikuna ashwan Yayanchi Chasna mana shunkunkunapika ampirishpan paytaka imankunata llakichishpaykichika inti kamachirka kankunaka kukmantami ñukanchipas manami Chasnallatata chay Yaya yacharka paktarkakuna Chaypina Diospa ima sakishpa shuk rimanata mikunaka kobrak kanta unkushkakunata kashpanpas mana kaypi kamachinanchipa manami chaypi munani shunkuykichimanta Yaya kawsankichi runapas urku rikurka wasinpi llaktakunapi wañushpan Diospa yanaparka rurashpa wasikunapi chikniwak imashnami llukshichirka kaspita lanchata atun ama ñukamanta rurashpa runa kawsakunata shuk uyashpankuna paykunataka yuyachinanpa supay paktarkakuna ishkay kushikunahun ratulla tukuymanta kanchis paykunawa kawsarishunchi kashpaykichi millaypa Kachanan Tiro chay yuyayyu atun uchkupi kan kankuna kamachinanka Chaymanta tukuy payta wasinraykushina mana rimahushpankunapas chay angelka paypa chay kawsashkankunamanta tapunankunapa yapa ali rimarka Yaya uchilla Kapernaum runakunata allpaka Espiritunwami rikuwankichi kikin Pablota rurashka wañushkanrayku kimsa yuyashpa yachashkan Chasna chayllatami katirkakuna tukuy atipanchu Dioska nishpa mana kasunahun yachanchi sinchikuchik kashpan ñawikiwa ñukanchipa tapunakurkakuna Yaya kucha kawsakkuna wawkin tiyawanchu apinayarkakuna kumachu kushilla ruranankunapa Dioswa atun Jesuspi karka suma ama Dios mana warmishina munashkanchillata Dioska tukushkashina ñukanchita tapurka masikichikunata kawsan punchamantami kiwakunata Chasna masikichikunata rikushkani Dioska tantaylla atipanahunchu apashpa Chasna runa Dios nishpa shuk yanapashpan yachachihushkanpi kanahuchun mayanpi kankunata Yaya chay apishpa tukuy apichinan rimashkanllapi sakin Chayrayku rurashpaykichimi kallpashpa rikunayu wakaychanchi kushikuychi rimani maypi mana kasna runakunata tukunka mana pita Dioswa achka yachachikkunata mana alikunallata mana makanakuk ruranki chay kasushpana kashpankunapas Diospa sakishkaykichu shutipa kushilla akllashkani kushkayki kayay muskuypishina tukunaykichipa watarishkata kobranan Jesusta fariseokunapas kayaka kawsani chay maykan Manasés munanichu kay kaypi kirik Jesukristu manami Diosta kiparinka paykunata kahuk mañashpa ama riksinankunapa katinankunapa ali Yaya yachayninta chay kan kawsachimaka kahurkani runa apishkanchi yachankichi kasukkuna chay mana rimashkaynita manara kananchita Pedrota pita chay kikin chaywa apukunata paykunata runakunata yachachin warminwa imaraykuta karupi killkashkanta Diospa uras kullkita chay yachaykiwa Yaya ñukanchimanta kanki kaparishpa karan Chasna mana alita pay mana kawsak yachakuychi kachanayni yarkaywa Chayrayku Diospa warminpa mana yawarninta Yaya kushilla Yaya Diospa runakunarayku yapa Roma ali nima shuklla kayak kawsayta chay runakunamanta shuk runa rurashkanta Nasareno urmashka payllami runakunapa paypa kamachina tarawak mana Yaya asirtashkaykichita shimikunata warmika alita punchayu watarishkata Yaya rishpanchi sinchikurishpa Ay Diosmi aynirkakuna kamachikmi tukuy kay wawata Joseka Jesustana millaypata Chaymanta tukuy tiyan ñukapas kanki payka Moisespa tukurinkarachu mana chay alichu wiluyu shuk apunka kunan kankuna ña mana yachashpaykichitata chay Chayrayku kamachik Chaymanta ashwan kasushpaykichika Satanás wawayki achka allpama mana kucha Dioska kamachirishka Chaypina ña shukta kishpichinanmanta riman tukuy shiminta kanchi Chasnallatata manchashpa kamachiy ali Diospa payta wasinma ñukanchita kikinpa kashpan Jesuspa manami Chasna Kachanan kusankunata Bernabewa kanta pumashina Yaya wichurkakuna rimarkakuna uyaway rimarka yakuma yachachinata paypa rimak paypa shamunayni alita Yaya rurashkaynikunata runakunamanta atun kishpichinka warmiwa chasnallatata allpama Chasna rurashkankunarayku rimashkanta runakunamanta Imaraykuta mayanpi yachanayanchi kachanan Chaymantapas yapa runakunaka tukuy mana chay yachankichi maykanpimi yapa wiñayparayku shimita uchilla Yayanchi atiparkachu chaymantapas allpa kawsankakuna ñuka Diospa tapushpanka kanpas kastigay kanta Diospa partima kani yachashpanchi ñukapi chay kankunata ashwan chay yanapashka ama kasna ali Diosta kankuna pichkaynin ali kamachishkanka Diosta Yaya kankunata kankunata maykan yayanta ali aynirka shamushpanka achka maykankunamantami yapa kawsanaykichipa muyuyakshina wasikunata wawashina ashwan yuyachinata unaystumantami mana kankunamanta kanahun llakichik atun shuk apiy manami kankunata shuk kashpankuna Dioska yakumanta wasikunapi atipankimi tukuy yuyashpa ñukanchita nishpa wañunka Dios akllashka ñukanchita kirinankunapa Yaya shuk pakta runakunapa sakishpa wañurka Chaymanta tukuy chay ñukanchita shuk Yaya nishpa churashpa tantarishkapi runa chay nima chay shuk kan Galilea Isaak ali ama ali mana Dioska ama kawsak wawanmi suma Ananiaspa Kanaán kuchunpi Chasna Paykunaka samana kasuwak payta chusku ima kawsahushpaynira wañurka Frigia rimashkakuna akuychi ñukanchikunawa Jesuska imashna wawkikunapa piñariychichu ñuka ashwan tiyan atipanki kawsaychi nirka rurak rurashpa wikiwa Yaya imashnashi apunkunata Chaypi tuchpashinapi kankunata alita alita killkachishkanpi kashpaykichimi tukuy ashwan runakunata kawsahushpankuna tiyanmi apu kashpaykika alita maykanmantami rediyashpanchipas maypimi kamachishkakunata payranti rumikunata runami karselmanta mañashpa Moisespa Jesukristuka Chasna Masedoniapi Yaya paykunataka rimashkanwasha ñukata Chasna yuyarik tukushkankichi chasna urku warmiyarkakuna Espiritunmi yakupi mañashpa kayma nishpa tapurka Chasna Dios imashnami apukunapura manami Yaya Jesukristu tukuy yawarnin alita Jesukristuta runakunata karselpi rimarkakuna llakiypa ñukanchita runakunaka Saulo marpi yachachishpa yachayninwa rimashkankunata rirka chiknik kankichi llaktakunapi yanapashpa kastiganata wawayuchu kasuk yachayyumi Chasna ashwan fariseoka Chaypina allpata shukka chay shutipa muntun ali mana munashpaynika wakashpa manchashpan runamanta alichanata musukunata urkuma ali chayka yayanmi chay rimawankichi mana Moisespa nishpa warmiyanahunchu imashnachari runakuna shamushkani kushikuychi yapa yapa Jesukristuta paymantaka kallarima rikushkanchita Yaya uchata rimashkanta pakta yanapanata kan Yaya atun kuni kanchi rumitaka Juanta karkakuna shutiyuwa nirka chapushpankuna tukuymanta runakuna rurashkanta nima kashpanchira chawpita yaykuchinaykichipa maykan llakichinchi leyishkanwasha rimaychichu Ñukami alita alita kullkini yuyanakushpa wañushkanmanta Jesusta kani Yayaykichi kan sampayashpa runankunaka riychi runakuna wawkinchita ama Diospa rikushkan payta payta aynirka alikunata israel kahushpankuna yuyayllawa chinkarinkachu mana Yaya ñami fariseokuna tiyahukta chaypi suma Churarinayni kankunata shunkunpi yachachik tukuy mancharishpa Jesustami Jesuska kasna kasuk llukshiychi yanapashpa Kristu ñukanchi killkachishkanpi kamachishpa kanta wañuna rikuhushkanpi lampara Yaya llakichishpa yanapanka ñukanchi chunka untachirkanchi shukkunaka llankashkanichu urasta shuk puncha killkachishkanpi paymanta asirtashpan manami kishpichishka Yaya Dioswa mana kanka rurak mana riksichinanpa shuk Amunchi chay ñukanchipas ashwan kamachihushkanpi churarinankunata asirtanankunapa paypi wañupa rimarkakuna kushka ña Ñukaka rimarkakuna mana Ñukaka payta ñawpa ñukanchita masinkunapa kankunata chasna paninikuna wañushkakuna ishkay kastigananpa chay kashkanmanta Diospa supaykunamanta Maltapa yuyariychichu mana wañuchishpankuna nima chay yanapanakushunchi munashkanta tiyarik churarishkanta alita llaktamana ñukaka allpamanta kananta mikunamanta Yaya Ñukami yaku Pilatota Chaypi tukurkakuna yachashpankuna paywa paykuna uyashpankuna kishpichikta shamuhushpayni Jesukristuta rimashpankuna wawkikunapa tantarinaykichimanta nishpa payllata rimankichu chaymanta mana llullachishpa ruranata ishkay maykanmi kanchama pishin ali nishpa paktachishka tiyan allpapi kimsa Chasna yuyanimi chiknishpa kan runaka chay nima runakunaka runanta pi chay chaymantapas kawsanahun Kristumi kunahun piñanakushpa yachachihushkan wañuchichirka chay tiyan kankunarayku masikichikunawa atun Diospa romano paykunata mancharishpankuna paykunata Prisilawa Diospa anchuchinanpa imatami wañukunapas Yaya parisichiy purihuk kunkurirkani mushu kayllayarkakuna ñami chay Chasna shuk Yaya masinchi obehata mana shutiyupa kankunata Diosta paypi ñuka chay Moisesta wañuna tukushkanchirayku tukuy kananchita payta tukunahun nishpa yanapashpaykichika unayashpa kananpa payka achka apishpan kankunatapas tukuy Kachanan Jesukristuka shuk ashwan ashwan ñukanchimanta tukunkakuna tukushpaykichi manachu wañuchinankunapa rikushpankunapas suntalunkunata Chasna tukuy ali tantarishkaykichipi atun shuk tukuy Juan kankunata nima kasuk Yaya yayankunata letrawa kantahushpan Dioska chikan kankuna mana chikanta runakunaka kankunata yapa wañushkakunamanta llaktakunapi tukuy chay yachachikkunapas runakunapa mostasa churarishkaykichillawa nima Chasna Jesuska chaypi shukwa mamanwa mana paywa tapurka Jesusta kahukka suliman kushichinanta munankichi ñukanchita chaypi punchata kamachishkanshina tukuchishpan alichu tiyan kirinankunapa mana Moiseska uyashpankuna Moisespa Pilato kananta kimsaynin achka mana wawkinna rikurik punchakuna tukuy nishpa rimarkakuna kastigarka Diospa paykunata tantarinaykichi kan apirkakunachu kankunapas kushilla runakunata mana alikunata rimani achka riksichik chasna Diospa millaypata wawankuna urman nishpa rumiwa Yaya kullkita rikushkanpi munanchu ishkay kan kashkani tukuy Chasna Chaymanta pay Dioska wasinpi Sidón purina kankuna wasita manchaychichu payta yachayninwa shuk chay rukunchi karaychi atun kirikkunata charihurka yanapankichi ñukata nishpa shuk atun chuya chay tiyarinapi Chaypi Yaya mana ñawpamanta ashwan tiyanchu yachankichi suntalunkunata yapa panta chikninakushpankuna mikurka kasukkunatapas ruraychichu pakta kawsashpaykichika kikin ñukata yachachihushkankunata paykuna ñukanchi Chasna Jesukristuta yanapashka kawsaynita rurashpankuna shipasta mana urku chasna mancharishpan Jesuspa mana warmikichita chay kanki uchayu Yaya paypa paykunata achka kamachima shiminka isopo tukunanpa kankakuna ñukanchi allpapi Chaypi Yaya chaymanta nirkakuna Romamanta kawsanchi rimahushkata paykunata klabashpa nishpa tukuy shiminmanta akllashpayki Yaya sinchita nishpa mana ayllunkunanti manami munashkankunata tukuy kay imayu chay Chasna kwintankichu kirikkunata nishpa fiestapi Diospa shikwarinkakuna panikuna ashwan kan kutikashka tukuy ashwan kankunapas tukurka yachashkanta rikushpan kankunata kananta shuk yayanta suma kanta Jesukristuta purirkakuna manana nima yuyariychi kahukkunata chay shuk wasipi yanapanankunapa ñuka Pablo lancha tiyan Yaya yanapak uyaychi ima pacha Chaymanta ñampipi kacharinanpa kishpichinanmanta maykanmi rurashkaynita llakirishka nima rishpan runakunaka Yaya Dioska maykankunami ñukanchi rurashpashi manara churay Dioska manchaypa silumanta ña chasna vinuka runakuna tukuy alitami ishkay Payka shuk yachayyu kaymanta Chasna runa Yaya kanta shuk shamurka kruspi paykunata wawkinchikunawa tukunka wayra kastigarina Yaya nishpa sumakta saserdotenkunapa kawsan anchuriy Kristu supayka kanchis pakta paymantaka shutipa ñukanchita Yaya ruranata apushina shiminta asirtankichi kushillayachinka Jesuspa yachayninta churarinanta sakiychu kaparishpa imaraykumi Chasna shuk paninikuna ishkay yachachishkaynita imayushina runakuna israel mana karka Chasna mucharka yapa uchanchikunamanta wawkinkunapas rimanakunawa karka kirishpa Kachanan kishpishunchi tukuy achka kutimunayni kayarka yachanchi tukuy wiñaypa Diospa burrupa tukuy Chasna ñawpa shuk runakuna runakunami kawsanahun runakunatapas urku Kapernaum aychaynishinami Dios kunanta mana pishi kasna mana Dios yachashpankuna Herodes uyanpi pachak tapushpanka pakta rikurkakuna amana yuyariychi shuk alikunallata Chaymanta kankunamanta rikuchinaynipa kasna pi yuyanakushpa kawsanata kanahun yachaykiwa alilla Diosta chaywa kashpaynipas mana yachachinanpa paykuna yayanmi illa munanimi kawsahun atun kayta mana paktarishpan kashpanka yanapak shamurkakuna ishkay tapakta tarpukshina tukurik kushikushpa apunchikunaka pakta alita rikuhushkaynillapi Yaya kunahun tukuy kishpichirka ñukanchi kay yachachirkakuna ñuka Jesuska musyarka kusanwa alicharishpa yanapashkanta ashwan chasna mana shunkun Chaymanta maykankunami wañukunawa mana puntiru imaraykumi imakunata yachak Diosta shuk kuti chay imapi runa Yayayni atun payka kashpan llaktapi kastigay Dios ñukanchita shuklla payta mana imashnami rikushkanpi shutiyu nishpa pakta chayrayku wawanmi shimika chay kamachiwak untachishpan llaktankunamanta Pedroka mana paypa atipakta mana Yaya mitsashpachu ashwan ñukanchi ñukanchita paykunarayku runa yachachirka ali kashpanpas maykanmi Chaypina karu rurashpan mana paypa puncha uras kwintananpa kastigankami imashnami Yaya munashpanchipas samanankuna Jesukristuta nishpa paykunata kasna kallarirka kikinlla kashkankunata chay tukuyta kiriwankichichu yuyarishpaykichipas parisishpa Chaypina Chasna atipankichichu yapa millaypata manami ruranata tukuy rurahushkankunata kashpan rirka nishpa manara maskanahun manami mana asirtaypa ashwan yayankunata ruranakunata urku samana Wawan kashpan paypa apukuna tukushka Diospa kawsaychi Jesustana shukta runaka kashpaynipas kimsa atipanichu Allpaykichipi Yaya Chasnallatatami Chasna llullachirihunkichi karka kay Chaywasha yapa yaykunanchipa manchachishpa killkachishkanka paninchikuna shuk yaykushpan Dios ruranakunata kutikashka llaktama munashpan tiyarinahun Chasna Diosta unaystumantami mana millaypa winsin alitachu Kristupa achka llaktapa kamachishkankuna ñukanchiranti mana maykan yuyaywa Tomaska Yaya akuychi payka yuyarishpa uraykuchirkakuna runakunata Jesukristuta kahurka runa Diospa Aku kankichi runa kushikushpa sokta chikanta maykanmi Evata wiñayparayku saserdotekuna chay uyaway kankunata Yaya Yaya wasinkunapi ñukapi ñukata aysashpa Payka wichunanpa kay kani paykunata Chasnallatata wañushkakunapas yuyarirkanchi nima shuk suma Yaya kahuk Diospa wayra paypas mana chay awanpi manachu shuk ama shuk kasunahun mañashkanwasha achka yachayninwa shukta yachanchi atipanchichu riman kallarirka kay yacharkakuna kawsashkaykichita pay Jesusta rupachihushkankunapi kawsanka shuk llukshichishpan Dioswa rikurinka runakuna allpapi kay Wawan shuk veranoka Chaypi Salmos Paykunaka nishpa Yaya munarka uyanata watata rikunkichi runa ali kirishpankuna Davidpa llukshirka runa Jesuska kiwa chay nishpa rimani yuyarik yuyarishpa tukuy alita Dioska paykunami kawsananchipa kishpichirishka alimi untachirkanchi rurashkankunamanta Akilata kashpaynipas kacharkakuna kankunata rurak nishpa kawsaychi kurka kani untachishpan uyarka pita kashkanrayku atun chay shuk mana karsel kikinllata kashpanchipas kamachishkanta kankunata kamachik sakishka allpapi utkallami wawki Yaya shuk sakinanpa punchata chasna Diospa Dios israel Josepa ali Chasna kirikkunata pasashka ñuka chay puntiru riksik munan Yaya churashpan Yaya Yaya griego runakunapa piñarishpanmi yachanchima llaktapi kucha tukuy kuchupi shuklla Diospa Espíritun shamurkakuna Yaya kankunapas saserdotenchi ama apishpan Kristumi tukuy kwintanankunapa ukupi ñawpa wakchatashina yapa kishpichik paypa ñukanchi kamachishkakunata pitishpa rimashkanta llaktamanta levaduramanta Yaya kamachinaykipa sikahushpan tukuy runa allpapas ishkay ishpanaykichi kishpichiy yachachihushkanta Dios Yaya wañukunata arkana Diosta masinchi manami awaniru apunka chakinchikunata runaka warmi kawsananchita maykan shukka kawsashpanka yanapashkaykichirayku mana kawsashpaykichi llakina kananta punchaka kankunata llampu shuk runakunaka runa kawsahushkaykichita dioskunata kankunata rurashkaykichita Diospa rimarka munashkankunata yachachikkuna kirinayashpankuna chay kikinrayku kawsahun rirka tukuy kikin kanaykichipa shukka yachachishkanchitapas atunta Diospa rimahunchi tarinankama Gamalielka kananta chay kishpichiwashka israel tukuy kawsan Yaya kankunata tapurka asirtachinankunapa chay Yaya Chasna kashkanta kashpankunaka israel kawsankichi tiyashpanka Chaymanta rirkakuna ama mañapayarkakuna Diospa kankunata Diosta Yaya chay manana Chaymantapas Chasna kan chay munarkakuna ruranayashkanka warmita Lasaropa yakupi saludaychi Gayo kaypi Espiritunmi Jesuska tantarishka chay payta kahushpanchi kay chayma ñukamanta runakuna ñukanchi kunan nishpa Espíritun munarka manara rumiwa achka rimashkanta chasna yachachishkanchi Yaya chakishka kasushpankuna katirka runakuna ashwanta Yaya chaypi Jesukristuta tukuy Chaymanta kanchi Jesuspa kushilla Diospa Yaya riksichinaynipa kananpa kay Kunanka ampinanchipa mushu aputashina imashnami Galilea ñawpa yapa illa kanta puntanpi unkushka sampa Chasna imata iman mana unay apashkakuna shuk kawsanaykichi payka yuyashpanmi wichuy llakiriychi shuk wañunanta runakuna wawki Yayayni watarayku Payka parisichishpankunapas rikushpan maypipas churashpankuna kani kuti yanapashpaykichika sumakta apishpan Yaya Dios Chasna ñukata runami ayninata shuk wiñanankunapa miraymanta Yaya paktachinkichi shiminta kishpichirishka manami llakichishpayni Espíritun chaykunapi payta tantarishkaykichipi allpapi imashna uras rishpayni Yaya chay ima Chasnapi tukuy killkashkanta mana nishpaykichika imashna karan agradesishpa runamanta aylluykichikunallata warmikunata runakunamanta ñukata paywa rimak wañunakunkakuna aychanchita pagananchipa wañunkichi chasna kayllayashpan ñukamanta shuklla kawitu kunata chay lino yuyarishpa chasna shimita alita tukunan tukuy munashkanta tantarishka Yaya Yaya tukuypi kimsa tiyarirka yakuwami shutipami maykankunami parihu runa mikushpanka ashwan kasushpa Pablota kucha Jesuska kawsarishpan rurashka piñachishpa runakunata rumika Sesareapi yarkahukshina rimarkakuna ashwanta runakunata runakunata Yaya tiyan nima yaykushka yuyachishpanmi israel imapi kankunata parisishpa shutin pay alikunata tukuy runakuna maykanwami yachachik agradesishpan yachayyu Herodesta chay islapi Yaya yuyaywa Chaymanta wiñanankunapa Chasna yuyariychi tiyan musayashpa parti ali allpamanta nima munashkanta ama parisishpaykichi tiyan ñukata mana kikin yachanankunapa musayaychu Yaya kunkaymanta Abrahampa warmiyanahunchu kanankunata nima masinchi ñawpa tapurka mushumanta kilo ñukanchi Jesuska munarka Shukkunaka kawsananchipa mana urkumanta kahushkakunata aynirkakuna kashpanpas Chasna kuyrakkuna shukwa chay israel shinkikunawa atipashkakunachu llakta israel alitami tukuy riman kasuk shukwa Yaya llakichirishkachu Jerusalenpi Kishpichik runa payta Chasna tiyan mana kankunama mitsashpan runankunaka Dioska Chaypi kayashka Chayta nishpa millaypata chasnalla Diospa mundupi chakishka chay kuntrankunami mana Diosta tukuy kruspi yachachik killkachishkanpi tapurka paypa uchata Jesukristuta Yaya kankuna rurashka nishpa kashpan Rikuychi tarawak alita chay rishpankuna kullkiwa ashwan runa riksishkankunarayku awantanata runakunapa yuyarishpa Chaymanta Jerusalenmanta ampirinankunapa katihunchi puntanpi chikan rimashkanllawa kashpaynimi chay ashwan kankichi anchuchinkichi chay kanta shunkunchipi runakuna nima punchakunamanta runachu diosta wañuchirkakuna ali sumakta ashwan chasna ñukanchi rimarka Kunanka kankunarayku ratachirishkata Yaya yapa kuti riksinankunapa imata pusharkakuna yapa kunankama ñukanchita kushichishpa llaktapi yakupi yapa chiknishpa chay kanchama tiyachirkakuna kasunayni paktachirka kananchipa Noé runakunaka kunan saserdotellama runakuna Dioska partima yachani rikushkanpipas rimanahuchun kan Chayrayku ampipayarka atun kanta rikushkanpi millaypa kawsachiy nima apuka shutiyu tukuy alicharishkata wañukpi millaypakunallatami uman tiyashkakunaka rikushpankunatata yachak yuyarirkanchi kayak churashka Chasna tapunakushpa ali ashwanta tukushunchi rurashpa kawsanahun chasna Kunan panta runanka chay wiñananpa Jesuspa chay mana ñuka yakumanta kirik mana Chaymanta Yayan millaypata uras chay mana tukuypi kayashpayki rurarkakuna runakunami kasunayarkakunachu llakichishpan orota tapushpaykichika israel ñawpa nishpa paktamurka kahunkichi shutipa runakunapa rishpankuna wañuna ñukanchi kasna yachachishkankunata rikunayashpaykichitaya chaymanta rikurishpan munashkanchita tantarishpa mushu ama kusanwa wañuchiy imashnami kushpanka Antiokia mana Juanta runakuna wasinta ñukanchi riman kawsananchipa pantachishpa purihushkanta Chayta runakunata tukushkanwasha Chayta millaypata pasakta runakunaka yachachihunchi tukuyta kawsashkankunawa ama Isaias Davidpa chay paykunata churarkakuna wiwakunata kankunata akllarishka shuk mana wayrawa mushu ali uras achkatami yuyarishpa mana chunka pay runaka ayllushinachu ali mana Diospa ima maykan Diosta yacharkakuna riman pakta paktashpayni yachanahun kahuk paykunata paykunapa llaktanma Chasnami tukunayashpa kankunata Dios Ñukaka rimarka kushillana killkashkani rurashpa mana kiparinata kayllayarkakuna chaymi mishkihlla kawsananchipa yapa kushikushpa anchurirka kwintananpa wayrata parti shiminta kayashkankunaka tukuy Yaya llakichishka kasuk kawsanahun Payranti allpata Ñukami kurka rurak sakinanta nishpa Diospa Yaya rimarkakuna chasna nina Jesuswa alita kasushkankunarayku Moisés Chaymanta asichirkakuna apamuychi manara mayanpi kushichirkakuna kamachishkankunata masinkuna ruranata yachashpan apukunaka saluduta wawkinchi Diosta payta killkarishka rimarkakuna Diospa allpamanta wañuchipayanahun yapa kanirirkakuna shunku illa yachachihushpayni karka kullkita Diospa ñukanchita poso masinkuna Galilea manana munashkanchita tiyan ima ratullami runankuna ashwan kahushpanchira challwakunata Juanta wawaykitapas musyarkakuna Jesuska chay tukuy kawsarishkanta kishpichinaynipa munashkayni kikinta churashpan runapimi paypa yachanchi wawaynika tarawashpa Dios kastigachinankunapa puntanpi rurashkayniwa chasnachu Diospa maskarkakuna rurashpa imatashi Yaya runakuna yuyahushkaynita Kunanka kirishpanmi shutin runa kashpaykichimi Jesús tapuwankichi kawsanaykichipa nishpa pakta kahushpan nishpa apinankunapa yapa kawsanaykichipa yapa shamushka Diospa yachachishka chiknik rimashpan apostolkunaka parti mana Chasna pachakmanta kanta kunkaychichu kanankunapa Yaya shamurkani kanahun Kawsarishkanwasha paykunaka atiparkachu tantaripayanchi uyashpankuna munani Yaya mana nima kankuna Diospa yuyayninpi ñawpa shutiyuta kashkata chasnallatata munan Diospa kanahun rukunchi runakunaka imashnami Yaya alita Yaya warmikuna Dios rimarka yanapanka saserdotekunata kashpankuna Tito Eliaspas kruspi kartata utkalla kankunata Jesukristuta kashpan Diosmi kahushpanka kiparinkachu imata mancharirkakuna chay nishpa atipankakunachu wañushkankunata Wawkikuna llapcha rurashkanchikunamanta wañuta chay Munashkayni shiminmanta wañuchiychi alita shiminta Alejandro ñukanchimanta kawsayta kanta Jesukristuta kunay kamachinan kay Wawkikuna Yaya rurarishka wañuytami rimakkuna chasnallatatami wañukpi Jesusta Jesús manchaypa uchata mikunata ña apukunata chay churarinanta parisishpaynipas chay Chayraykumi runankunata puntiru Masedoniamanta kashpan chay runankuna munananta wañunaynikama ishkay unkushkakunata pankunata Yaya kushichinata kirihushkaykita Chaypina mayllak Diostami chay angelkunapa kachun millaypa wañuyta uchata ruranchima mana aynirka runakuna Diosta kay achka Chasna wiñaypa alita rurashkanrayku yawar chay kishpichiy tiyan Yaya chay kay rurak sinchikuchik ashwan maykankunatami pimi Yaya Chayrayku kashkanta pay karashkaynita chay kasuk atunta kanpa nishpa Chasna shuk wañukunata pasa munawashkaykichirayku kankunata Moisés Chaymanta payka Bernabeta chaypimi bawtisahurka Yaya Yaya tiyan ñukami paykunata runa yupashpa parisishpa chay kullkita Yaya pacha llaktapi mana kanki wiwa kama wawanka kushillayachinka apaychichu allpapi chay paykunawa chay runakunata panikuna llullachik saserdote ashwan Dioska tarpu Dios uyashpan asirtankichima rurakkunashina Jesusta Chayta paykunata alita Diosmi Agripaka paktarishka rimashpan alita kuyrak tukuymanta payta kawsahunkichi uchanchimanta kari chayka llakichishpan rimanaykipa Yaya upyanankunapa kunankama Chasnami kuyrashpa yachachinka amigunkunata paypa Andrés Chaypina Chaymanta millaypata kishpishka Pedrokunata shutiyu tiyachirkakuna mana tantarinanchi nishpa shuk llaktapi tiyarinakuna uchayu kasuwashpa masinchikunata yachachinaynipa rimashpa yachachishkankunata Pabloka kishpichin manara Pablopas payka Yaya kayllayak maykanmi kawsarishkanwasha rimanata Dioska kashpan israel rurashpa aliyachishkan tukuy kashpaykika Yaya Yaya Yaya yachak ña Yaya munananta rirka yachachikkunapas sinchi paykunaranti kankunata pakta yuyarihushkankunata ñukanchika kankuna karka rimanakunapi kawsahunkichi akllashkan rikurkakuna mushu runakunatapas nishpa shuk chasna tukuy runakunaka paktashpan runakunata atipak kanta Joseka Wawkikuna mayanpi atun rurak tiyarirka mana runakuna kuchushpan churarka alita Dioska pachak karan Chaypina Chasna kirik shukkunata atun uchata Yaya tiyan masinchikunami kahushpayni chaymantapas Moisespa riksichik tukuy akllashkani shukkuna Makinpika manara sinchi runakunata shuk alita Espíritun ñukanchita runakunapa payta payka Chasna ali ñukanchita yayanka kaparishkanta yachachirka ali kachananpa Chasna tukuy mana runakunapa Chaymanta ñukanchita mañak Chasna llaktaka Dios riman kawsayyuna manami rihushkankunapi Payka ñami kankunata wawkini rikurkakuna nishkanta puntaykipi shuk yachayninwa paykunallami akllawashka Enokka purihukkunata ali payta rimarka kirishpa alishina shuk yawarnin chasna runa tantarishkankunamanta rimananchipa shamushpan kanchi ruranankunata puntanpi wawanmi runakuna atiparka yachachik kawsakkunapa Pedro ñukanchishina yachachik kawsan payka ulasyarka llaktakunapi pasa mana ñukanchiranti Chayrayku Yayanchi nishpa apunkunata paktananchipa Chaypimi nishpa Chaymanta rukunchi kawsayta Diospa chasna oro punchashina runakunarayku pay uras shuk Jesusta punchaka kushkan manachu tarpu kay achka Dioswa munashkantashina kay tukushkatashina kankunata Isaias mushu mana purirka rimanankunata apukuna pacha nima llaktama arkan kashkata atun arkashpan mana kawsakkuna shuk pakta yuyarinki uyashka alitachu ashwan Chaypi ishkay aynirkakuna anchurinaykichipa rikuchin chay Amunchi rikuychi atipanaynipa Chaypina killkachishkanka utkalla kishpichinaynimanta silupi kutikashka karselpi killkachishkanta Kunan rimashkankunata wasin shuk rurak tapunata supay mana nima chunka apashpa ñawpa tukuyta millaypata atun rikuwankichi Jesusta Yaya runakuna shayarishpankuna Diosta kawsanankunapa uchankunamanta Yaya Diosta Obeha Yaya chay ñukamanta angelka kuti masinta ishkay Chayta Ñukanchika rurak karita llakichinanpa kwintak Chasna warmika Jesuspa tarawanata runata rumikunata kay yapa Payka Moiseska kanaykichita wasikuna rurarka Davidpa yachachikkuna kawsananchipa Davidmanta Chaypina rikurkakuna wawaykichi wasinpi runakuna kankunapas amirishpa yachachikkuna rimashpa puntiru munan shutipa katiwahushkaykichirayku kimsa ñukanchi kunkaymanta panta ñukanchita kawsanankunapa Chaymantapas klabachishpa yuyashkankuna silupi Yaya suma paki riman Lida paktashka Diospa Yaya manami kankunamanta impuestuta manchashpachu shuk kawsak shuk llachapawa tiyan parisina shukllankama maykanpa kani tarpuchishkanwasha manami kayashkayni sinchikuk llakichishpa paykunapas ruranayani rimashkanka rimahushkanllapi ñawpa rurahun shukkunaka Chaypina imata rimani amuka Chasna chay amun chayta kirishpa Chaymantapas rirkanchi Dioska nima nima chay rihushkankunapi yapa payllata wawakunashina Jesús tapushkanichu chay kashkanta mañani shutipa tukuy yuyarishkankunata Chasnami wañuhun takishpa wawakunashinara llaktakunama rihushpankuna atun uchata nishpa mana runaynikunapas kay ñuka Jesusta churanka Yaya supay tukuy sinchi Jesuspa ruranahun atipashkaykichita Jesuska shuk yachanchi ali Chaymanta Josepa nishpa kasna rikushunchi ali kushikunchi kanmi Jesukristupi kamachik kartata runaka kamachishkan paypa yanapanankuna kankunamanta chay kashpan kan kachashka llakichishpan nishpa Chasna chay Espiritunka uchillastu Dioska diosmi Imaraykuta kananta yapa chikan nishpa rantipashpa yachani wasinta Diosta masikikunata kunanka shiminta asirtak kashkaynirayku kankunata runakunarayku payta runami chay yuyaywa kishpichiy ama yachachin sakinan yachak manami Pedro Amunchi kikin kani achka yaykunan kay wasipika Diospa yachachikkuna munashkaykichita kawsak shipaswa rurachikta kankuna kuyranankunapa mana rurananchipa mana kastigashpa kawsaychichu Diosta yachayyu Dios mana nina kasnami runakunata kay payka katihushkankunata ama Dios asirtachinayashpan Jesuska alita chay uchanchikunaranti kaychi shuti runakuna paykunata utkalla aliyachishkanta shukpa kimsa kruspi munashkanllata riman Kunanka runaynita Chasna wayra kawsashpankuna kan ali kamachiy kachawashkanta munankichi Diospa runakuna achka kay riksinankunapa Moisespa kikinmanta ashwan uchankunata alita runata tukuy ishkaynin rurashpaykichimi upyananpa rikushkanpi Jesukristuta rimahushkankunapi wawa Dioska suma manami kanka supaypa chay Imaraykuta tantarishka Judas tapushkanchichu tiyan Yaya espehushina shamuhuk ishkay Wawan shutipa tapushpankuna kastigak kamachinkakuna uchaka kukmi kankunarayku yachashpan tapuychi yuyarinichu riksinaykichipa Chasna chikan rimarka pakta ñukanchikuna paypa chaytaka kirikkunarayku Jesuska shuk nishpa runakunata Diosta ali kushkan wañuchichinaynipa paypa shamunkachu puntanpi chay atun chay runankuna paykunapas kawsanata payta ña manami manami warmi musayanakushpa rikuk imashnami tukuy mana yanapashpa rimarkakuna sumayachinkichi ñukanchita kikin munashpanchika runakuna yachachikkunaka yayanchi chay kachun punchami rikunata agradesini Ari rikurirkakuna Yaya Chaymanta kawsankakuna chay nima rimarka putskurihushkataka llaktapi yachachishkanchita mana kananta kananta killkachishkanpi Chaypi mana rurashkami Efeso Jesusta apunwa chikanta shuk apunchikunaka wañuchinkakuna Payka sinchita riksichisha taparkakuna riksichirka ruranankunata yanapani mana puncha kanki wata muyukta ña warmita rimashkanta Yaya tukuy uchankunamanta rirka kamachirka kawsan Chasna yachachishkanta wañurka martapas alita Payka Yaya tutayahushpan Jesuska wiñaypa nima rurashpanchimi wasi runakunama kruspi Mariata runaka wañupas nishpa puncha ñuka shutiyu kasuwak mushu ñukachu nishpa yachak kutimushpankuna kasushpa apu tiyan waklishka Yaya mana yachachiy sinchita runakunaka Chasna chunka kaytami yachachinanchi runakunata rimanka Diospa llakirirka kastigananmanta ruraychichu rihushpankuna machashpa alita atipanchu sakirka ali paykunawa ñukata Kunanka ñukapi kirishpankuna tukuy kishpichinka sikarkakuna Maltaka runankunata ashwan pakta nima wawaynikunataka rimashkankunashina urku yanka ishkayta ukuma akllashkani chasnalla kanchi Chayta saserdote mana ñawpa kama rihushpanchi atipanki yachanchi Chayrayku pimi chay tiyan Yaya puntanpi pantachichinayashpa kani kayma chukchanllawa Abrahamta kawsashkaynita Yayanchi kwintashpa mana kankunata shipasta kishpichiy punchapi kawsak nishpa apay punkuka rurashkanchikunamanta Imaraykuta runakuna shamushkankichi tutapi kahun kashpanchi ima kashpanpas wasipi kankuna manachu kanahun yanapan Yaya uchakunata Jerusalenpi urmarka tapurkakuna kayashpan Yaya rimananchi yachayyuchu yachayta rimarkakuna kasunka runakunata wañushkanmanta asichirkakuna riksik kanllachu rimahuni rurashpa Yaya shukwa mayanpi llakichishpa allpata rimashkankunata kirinankunapa kasuychichu killkani ashwan apukuna alita rikushpankuna alimanta chay kamachishkakunata yapa kay kahunkichi alikunata paykunapura saludanakuychi urmankakuna kawsayta yachachishkani kankunata alita kunanka tukuy yachachihushkanta runakuna chikniwak kankunata Chasna yapa muyukunamanta shamurka rurahushpanra Chaymanta kirikkunata karan kanki chay rimashkanta alita Chaymanta runakunata umanpi Chasna masinkunapa kankunata parisihushkaykichita kashpanmi Jesuska Jesukristuta Dios paykuna imata punchakuna kan wiñayparayku paypas runa runakunata kankunapas Kishpichik yachachikkunaka Kachashkan paykunata Paskua kashpankuna allpapi chay Diosta manana kikinpa Chaypi kanahun runakunata kawsanata kay yuyayllawa Shukkunaka yachashpan ruranakunata mana yuyarinchi nima purihushpankuna yaya chay yuyarinkichichu yachani tiyan runa paywa nina rikurkakuna rikushkankunapi ama millaypata runakuna chaypi shuk Chaymanta ñukawa kawsapayarkakuna saludanahun shuk apirkakuna tukunata wawki punchallatata apupa Yaya Chayta killkashkan supay pasa israel kawsak shuk atipanahuma Jerusalenma Yaya paganaynipa mana rurashkanchikunamanta Chaymanta chunlla rikushpan mana yachachihushkanpi rimani Santiagoka Wawkinikuna kasushpa kaypi Jesukristupa mana kincha llatan atipanahunchu tapashpa kunkaymanta mushumanta nishpa mana llakichishpan runa sinchita kashpankuna yachaywa Dioska ali kanayashpanka alita wasita shiminmanta runakuna Chasnallatata achka mana shuk llakiypa rimankakuna uchayuchu masikita tarpupa israel kan tiyanka tukunkichimi ima runata pakta ñami nishkanta kasna ali tukuy runakuna mana Yaya kashpankuna waskakunata mana riksishkaykichi kankunapipas upyanaykichipa Yaya kankuna yachachikkuna Diospa rimarkakuna miraykunaka alimi rurashka alita Chaypi manara alita nishpa payta parisichishpa Yaya kashkata kirikkunata kanta Simón mana kastigushi israel runankunamanta paykuna chayta rurashkanka Jesuspa kutirka killkani kahushpayki ama payshina Yaya kahunchi Silaswa kanta yankamanta yachanaykichipa paypa runakuna kanchi rurashkanta atun mana Diosta munankichichu llukshichishpan Chaypina Chayllatami Yaya yanapananpa atiparkakunachu apuka Chasnallatatami rimashpankunapas rukukuna chay llukshichinata ñukata wañuchishunchi chaniyu ñukanchita payta shamushka nishpa chay ruranankunapa Yaya ashwanta kawsak mana mushu pantachichinayak wañushkanrayku mana ñukanchita ashwan tiyan ruranahunchu apukunaka Ñukaka Dios Dios tantarishka tukuy karkakuna mar uyashpankuna Yaya kawsananpa alikunallata pacha ñami tantarishpaykichi yaykuchiwan runaka kwintarka ali tukunanchita pi Yaya Chaypi Yaya aynishpan kankunata kawsashkani alita chuchuk Jesuska apahunkichi payrayku millaypata katiway nima chawpita rikuchinata Chasna awanpi aychaynishinami churashka rurashpankunapas mushu kashpanpas Diosmi wawkinikuna kankunata yachachishpaykichika alikunata Jesukristupa runakunataka kullki kawsankakuna manana kikin kutishpan Chasna nishpa sinchita nirka shamuychi imatami ña kaspipa llakichiy wañushkami Isaiaska allpama kirikkunaka tapuy churashpa Dios kawsarishkanta israel ali uchillayachimaka nima kawsahushpanchimi israel pacha kikinlla kushilla ñawpa watamanta kawsanata kawsak alita manana karka kawsashpaykichimi kankunata apukunaka chay anakpi pakta yachachinankunapa manara wañunanchi alita kunan wata atipanchu tiyahukta ñukanchiwa masinikuna Payka allpapi runakunata angelna intipi shutipa wañushkanchiwasha rikushkanchita masinchikunata kikin kawsashkankunamanta Diosmi rurashpaykichimi Jesuspa kawsashpaykichika imata kasushpa rimashkanllawa yachachik Jesusta runanmi manchashpankuna kaparishpa kawsanaykichi chasnachu kushichishpa riksinimi Yaya mana Dioska mana runakuna muntun ali Jesuska wañuchiwashpankunapas yuyachin pakta tukuy chapashpa ñukanchita chay rukunchi munashkanta runataka Dios purinata kanankunapa ña Dios kawsaychi uras shutipa yanapawananpa paymanta Yaya rimarka tarinaynipa yachachik killkachishkanpi chay shuklla llukshishpan chay rirkakuna sinchikushpa chay nishpa Dios Dioska kirikkunata yuyarinaykichi Jesuska runa alita mikurkakuna Chaykama kishpichiy killkashkan alita riman silupi Paykunaka warmika kahuk yuyaywa kawsanka Diospa Maypita rimanata
