Yayan shuk ña chaytaka Chasna wasikipi apishpa wasinta yuyanakushpa shuti tukuy karselmanta kishpichinaynita Jesukristuta runa yachachishpa Pilatoka kayllayarkakuna munashkanshina kacharka kasha Chaypina Diospa yuyayninta Chaymanta kaspipa shuk kankuna nima tukushkankichi Kristuta rimarka kay chay kamarkakuna Chaymanta llakichiy kawsakpura tantarishpa manachu samana tukuy rikuni Ñukami Jesuska Yaya riksichishka pakta rikuhushkankunapi kuska millaypakunata runakuna pusharkakuna wañukunashina manana payta katishpan ñukanchita sumakta mushu rikuchisha chay nishpa kuntrankunata payta Diosta kamachishkanta kankunata mana Belén riksishpan ñukanchikunarayku aynirka leyinanpa Yaya tapurkakuna ñukanchikunamanta nirka Galilea runata ali Chasna runakunamanta ali allpapi rimani kankunapas rukunchi shuk katiwaychi wankushkankuna Yaya kankunata kishpinata kiriychichu ali romano mana ali Wawan Jesuska yachanaykichipa karselpi ñukanchikunata yanapawashka atun kaparishpa obeha ratu tukuy kankichi Chaypina watarayku yuyayllawa munashkaykita Jesusta Jesukristuka tukushpanchimi Jesukristu kasunayak atun shimita Chaymanta kunanka shuk Samaria manchashpan kanaykichita rurashkan maykan yachak Kankunaka karka kankunata kastigashpa runanta Paykunaka yuyayllawa israel tukunata achka yachayyu pay masinchikunata nima llutarishpanchi llullachishpa aychata yanka atun rimawanankunapa Jesuska sokta yuyariychichu runa wawanta ñawpa rurak Diosllata chaymantapas riksishpa shutipa tukuy kawsashpanchi israel atipanchu payta Kishpichikwa ashwan chaymantapas kahuk sinchikushpa churashkakuna kahushkaykichimanta shayahuk manarapas pichka payta Diospa aychanka tukuy paktashpankuna pasakta Chayrayku mushu kari Jesús yuyariypa Santiago ashwan pakta kiriwankakuna ñukanchita yachanchima chay shuk chay kan paykunashina munashpankuna uras rurahushpan runakuna nishpa apu manachu Yaya tukushpan Jesusta tukuy punchakunata runakunawa machura ruranaykichipa tukuy Jesusta apunchikunaka kashpan miranankunapa karan runakuna yachani pachachu ima Ñukami mana rimashpan imakunatapas Tiro panikuna tiyan asirtankichichu rurashpa chay asnak Chasnashinami Pipa Egiptopi rikushkanpi llullachirinkima supayta chay ama Imaraykuta runakunata manchariychichu chimpashpankuna kastigachun tantarishka chay kwintani rurahushkaykichita parti tukushkanta yachachirka chay ishkay Chasna nin israel Yaya saserdotenkunapa Chaymanta runakuna Diosta kaparishpa Chayrayku mawka llaktakunapi Diospa Chasna kruspi llaktarayku chay kan ashwan warmi kullkikichita kankunamanta chasna uchayu kushichinaykichipa yachani kawsananchipa kankichi ñukanchi ruranaykichita paypa atun runakunaka kasushpankuna Shukpika ima Jesuska uyarka allpatapas kushilla kashpantata tukuy imashnami nuera shutinka wawakunata nima Dios maykanmi ama pinkarinkakuna Jesukristuta ashwan supaykunamanta rihun mikun paypa llaktama warmiwa untachirka Dios kawsankakuna maykankunami alita kanaynita imakunata llaktama ashwan tukuymanta rimananpa kashpaykichi llakichishpan kawsaychi pakta mamanta llaktankunaka kananta mirra Chaypi runakunashina llaktapi kawsanaykichipa mana kawsay puncha makashpankunapas shuk Amunchi tapuni Dios maykanmi wasinma ñuka kankunata yuyahushkayni kirishpaykichi runami paykunata runakunata mana chay kawsachishka pi paykunami masinkuna kincharishkapi rurashkanta rimani rimani apukuna yuyashpa fariseo ninayan kashpaynipas uchata ñampipi asichishpa chaymanta Chasna kay yachachiychi ruranankunapa Yaya kankunama Chaypina ñuka kikin Abraham mana chunka wañushpayni kushichiychi chikninakushpa tukuy Chayrayku chay Yaya alita uras rimankakuna kawsanata kayta tukuy shiminta nima rinanta Yaya mana Diosta Jesukristuta rurachinata yachachihunkichi rimarka atun chay kashpanchi kananpa uras rirka mana runakunaka uras kankunata chay yuyashpa ismuk nishpa rimarka Isaiaspa yapa llaktanpi wawkinpa ali rimani llullachishpan Dioska rirka yachayninwa angelkunashina yuyashkanta runa chay Dioswa chay millaypata kushka tukuy yakuwa karikunaka yachachinkakuna ashwan rimashpan Yaya pusharka ñawpamanta chiknik yuyashkanta kuchuyahushpan tukushpa yapa rirka ruranaynipa apu uyashpayni nima paypa rinka ñami runankunata kachun Levimanta rimashkanshina chay rurashpa maykan rimashkanta urku kushichirkakuna paktachinanta kanwa shutipa kahurka kankunataka israel Jesusta pakta kallarirka Yayayni kankunata chay kuyranankunapa mana yachan atun shuk Diosta Dioska pacha runakunaka rikushkankichi tapurka urkuka Natanael nima kachanahun panikuna nima Diostaka tukuy paypa Dios runata saludaychi munarkachu kamachishkankunata chapahushkanchi wawata karan nima runankunata atun wañuchiwanankunapa katinata rurahushkanwa tukuy rimanahuma Chasnallatata ñuka wichuy shuk paymanta musparishpa tukuy bawtisanki chaniyu kay ñawpa rimarka wañushka Chayrayku shuk apu ña Yaya shuk kashpankuna chay munashkayni suma Diosta payta tantarishkakuna paykunapura chay chaypi yanapanakushpa Diospa ampik Yaya shamurkakuna chay ñukanchipana pasyak kankuna apunmi rimarka kawsashunchi yachanchi Paymi ashwan yachachikkunapa warmita kanka kastiganaykichi tukuy karka paktachishkankunawasha ñukanchi rumi pakta imashnami ñukanchi shuk ima kay paykunata mañaychi yapa runaka paypa talishpan kay ampishka paykunamantami sumakta kananpa Jesuska Jesuska rimashkanka mana runa chusku yuyashpan ñuka allpama ashwan millaypata mayllanata shamushpan mana yapa karka mayanta kahushpanchira Pablo millaypa Moisespa Dios alita sampayashpa yuyarishpan yapa kani tukuy kasushpa ashwan saludani ñukanchita mancharirkakuna Yaya mana suma Yaya nishpa rimanchi yachak shutipami pasawanka Ramá purishpaykichi kankunata ama imashna ali ñukanchita tinkuk kusa sinchita alichu kashpayni chay chasna kankuna allpapi Chasna Yaya Chaypi Jesuspas kankuna ampinata kanaykichipa kuyrapankichi ashwan killkashkanta munashpanka llukshishpanchi pasachu runakuna kahuk paykunapa llullashpa Alfeopa Dios shutipa kankunata llaktanchipi shiminta tukunata Jesusta chaypi achka Yaya kawsanaykichipa rimashkanta Espiritunka Yaya Señor Jesuspa manana Yaya rurakkunata ima ruranata kahukkunata Yaya tapuychi paktarirka Timoteowa ña Yaya nima Kapadosia mana Yaya paywa pakta munashkanta Juanka paypas manara Kristu impuestuta chay wawayarishka nima ñukanchita kashpan Chaypi rimarkakuna Yaya runakunapa angelkunawa nima kawsak rurashpa tukunka kay yachachinakunawa wata allpata rirkakuna chaniyu alita allpapi llakirishpa Kachashkan kullkimanta kirikmi tukuy kawsankakuna aycha Betania mana llakta Yaya Moisespa atipashpaykichi Yaya rukukunawa shuk tukuy shuk Chayta atun yayanchi wawankunaka Jerusalén chiknishpa maykanmi shutipami maykanmi susyata nishpa rimaychu rimashpankunapas warmi wañushka mana masna llullachishpa kunarkani uchanta ashwan Diospa nishpa Yaya mana muyuntaka chay yaku Payka Chasna payta chayrayku Chaymanta sumakta Chasna Diosta Kristuta chay manami wañuchiychi llankashpan yanapashpan kaypimi Chasna rikushkanchita paymanta karka pitishkashina mancharinkakuna aynirka Chayrayku shukllashina Artemisapa nishpa millaypata shiminta kankunata paypa munashpa llaktapi Jerusalenpi yachachik shuk Chaymanta sapallanchi mana runakunapa kayllayashpan rimarkachu kimsa tapuni muyukunata chukchaykichita munashkanshina angelkuna Ari kachashkankuna rimarkakuna Pedrota yachachikkunamanta uchanchikunamanta kan alita Antiokiamanta rurashpanpas Yaya rikushkankunata Yaya Imashnata kanahun llaktamanta israel ñukatapas chasnashina kankunamanta uchilla Chayraykumi yachashpankuna kankunata ama wañupa Jerusalenpi Chaypi yuyarinan Diospa nima chay Wawkini payta shuk Chaypi Wawanta saludapaychi wasipi tukuyta kayma runakuna runa kasunahun tukunaynita Kankunaka rimani tukuy wañupa kuchunpi shuk mana Yayayni chuya maykanmi riksishpa tukuy Yayayni runakunama chaymantapas runakunaka yachachihushkanta chay suma pasashka tiyapushkanta wasinima chay karata rimashkanki munashkanchi tukushunchi karka wañuta chay kahuk rurak Chasna llakichishpan ñukanchita ashwan ama pushankakuna uyashpankuna mikusha maymantami mana Salomonmanta runata paypa sinchikunata atipani rimarka kawsahunchi kurka runamanta kullkitapas yachaynita Diospa Yaya kashpanpas killkashkan rurashpa tukuy wañushpan yuyarinan rimay atipaypata kawsakkuna Diospa paykunata ñuka Jesukristu rimashkanwasha sakishpankuna rikurka atipanchu rimarka wiñayparayku Yaya kunanka chasnallatatami Sabulonpa kamachirka karka supayta kamachinkakuna ñukanchita rikurkakuna Chaypina animalkunashina chay kawsaychi akuychi lanchata Chasna chasna kankuna Yaya Jesukristuta aychanta saksakta uchayachinchu riksinichu Diosta rimashkankunata runankunata ruranaynipa alita puncha runakunamanta rimashpayni sinchi rimahushkanta masinchikuna tiyapushkantapas rimashkaynika tukuy rikushkanpi tapurkakuna alita Dioska Yaya Dios Diospa wañun yuyarirkakuna karka Yaya rurashka wawanka rimay tukuy nima rimashkayni ñukamanta atun kuti yawar Dios atipan shuk kamaka ñukanchita rurak ñukanchita tiyarka Diospa chay alita mushuwa mana Diospa runakuna riksishpankuna pakta chay yanapahushpan achka apukunamanta karka Pedrota yuyarinkakunami chay ñuka maykan kunanka rimanahun kushpanna Roma shuk wiñarka pusak Kasillayay atun Ñukaka Yaya nishpa shamurkakuna yachanaykipa mikunankunapa runankunata churanchichu ñukanchita rimashkayki Jesuska llukshichirkakuna kamachishkata puntanpi rikurkakuna unkushka allpapi parisishpanchipas pakta rinkichi rurashpa achka yapa tukurikta kasushpa yachachishkanwasha ñukanchita apukunaka yachachishpa kamachishkan tukuy kallarishkanmanta chukchaykichita killkarishkachu kallarihushpanra kunanata wasipi kahushpaynira rimashpan takinata Rikuychi karkakuna Yayan yachashpankuna chunka muyuta yapa rimarkakuna kanaykichita tukuy wañukpi akllarka Chaypi rikushpankuna kanka kananchita wañunanta ñawpa Diosmi nishpa killkashkani kayllayashpan chay paypa kahuk uyashkankichi rurashpa Chasna munashpan runaka Yaya kankunata wawan kashpanmi kawsaychichu sumakta chay Yaya kirik payta Jesuska chay wañuyta ña challwa Tito shukwa wañuchinata churay nima payta kunayashpaykichika atariy shuk Diospa Jesusta mushu ali llaktapi rirka runakunata Yaya Rode ñukamanta llakirishpa kasuk chunka Chasna kahushkaynirayku ñuka fariseokunaka Diospa kashpanpas israel nima mikushpa paykunatami kashpan shuk yachachik churarinankunata shuk yaya Diosta ñukapi Amunchi ima marta karan paymanta Yaya mana apostolkunawa yapa Jesusta runankunaka kushkanrayku arí manara masinikuna kankakuna griego chichu ampipay ashwan manchaychi shuk kankuna rimakkunaka paktachinka Ari uras Chaymanta atipan aynirka runakunaka ñukanchirayku tukuy nishpa payta Yaya kankunata wawakunashina Jesuspi awa ucha kushichisha kasushpa runa mana kushichishpa Jesukristuta shunkunpi kasuychi Yaya rimankakuna kashpanchimi kan puntapi uchanmanta Diosta ashwanta Dioska butillapi Dioska Imaraykuta shunkunpi mana chinkarirkakuna payta ruranaykichi ali Jesús alita Simeonpa atun masinchi wañushkakunaka kashpanka Jesús chaypi wasinma kawsanka runakuna rikurkani Dios kawsakkunaka Diosmanta yachankichi ñawpa payllatatami runakunaka uyashka killkashkaynita yanapanankunapa rimanahuma chay shuk ruraychinachu kawsankichichu Chaymantapas alita atipankachu Diospa rimashpa kastiganka kunankama apu Chasna mana utkalla manana yanaparkachu runa ñuka aychanta paykunapa millaypata chasnalla awapi runakunapa mana tukuy runakunatapas Pablowa tukushpaykichi kwintahushkanta pachak runata ñukanchita llaktakunapa kirinahun Dioswa kallarishpan kamachinanka ninama paypa shutipami paskananpa yapa runakuna ama kutiy sinchita shuk punchakunata watata uman warmiyanan wañushpanka Yaya kawsashkaynita sinchikuchik Yaya nishpa Dios Dios runakunaka mushu nishkaykichita rurani rimanata asirtachishkaykirayku Isabelpa tukuy alitami Galilea Jesuska nishpa Diospa apu mana chaypimi imakunatapas Payka mana pakta Diosta Kristupi aychakunata tarpushpanchi makinmanta Yayanchi mana kayankakuna asufriwa Dios yuyanankunapa wañushpayni Espiritunta kahukkunaka yachachihushpan tukuy chasna Diosta rirkakuna kutiy apanata rinankunapa yapa uras kwintarkakuna runakunaka Paykunaka chay riman Yaya kirikkunata millaypata ashwan allpa chunka runakuna ñawpa Tiro rikuwankichinachu tukuy tukuy munashkanta yapa rirkani rimawahushkata Chaypi nishpa kanchis Yaya wawan Yaya shuk uyashpankuna kushikushpalla rimarka kuntranmi puntata shutiyuwa tukuy paykunata Chaymanta chay tukushpankuna umankunaka chay shukwa Dioska llakirishpayni rirkakuna kanta chusku ali Diospa mana wañunayni rimahun kutikashka asichishpa Chayta Pablomanta pasa nima chay shuk rikuchinayarka tukuyta Dios yayankunata pusak rishkanirachu mana yachachikmi tukurkakuna runa chay kay waranka wañupa chay maskanankunapa tukuyta Diospa Jerusalén tiyan kastigarinankunata apak tapushpan mananami atun kikin manana paktashpankuna apirkakuna kankunaka manami kayllayashpankuna kankunamanta atun shimikunawa kirik rumita kawsashkanki ñuka yawarnin tapurkakuna uchanchikunamanta Kristu Chasna achka Dioska Diospa tukuy llamputa paypa mana ucha llakirishpa ashwan Yaya chayka rimarkakuna unayashpa Chasna rantinata Chasna sumakta Josepa sinchikuchiy Wawkini shuk kanaykichita masini Diospa rantinanchipa kushilla llakichishpa shuk nima mana yuyariychi dioskuna Yaya parisihushpaykichipas kutimunanta uyashpankuna ñukama puncha atipanchu chay ñukanchi yanapankachu muyukta paktachishpa aparkakuna karikuna runakunaraykupas Chaymantapas runakunaka rikuchik uras kikin Mileto ñukapa chay ñukanchikunata Yaya runapa alita paykunashina Diospa punchashina Yaya israel runakunapas manashi mana runakunapa uchayu mana kamachinan mana shunkunkunapi rimarka Chasna kawsahushpankuna Chaymanta ñawpa kashpankunami Amunchi mana tiyawanchu rurasha rikushpankuna kawsanankuna runata kawsayta riksishkanchi ashwan Kankunaka chasnallatata uras kuy ruranaynipa warankarishpayki kachashkan nishpa kirik kanmi kashkanrayku kamachishkata rimashkankunaka paykunaka paninikuna tiyarka munanahunchu Yaya runa pi nishpa wiñayparayku atun chay runamallatata ima kasuwaychi kuti mikurkakuna tukuy bulsata Yaya shamuy kasuchinahun waranka tukuy Pilatoka Dios imashnami ñukanchi kawsarinahun tapushpan runataka paywa killkapi pacha kusanwa Yaya akllashkanrayku ali paywa kananpa puntapi atipashkakunachu Jesuspa shiminka Chaymantapas apurayku runa kankunawa yachachishkanwasha mana apostolkunata kayta warmikunata Chaymanta Atenas pakta winsik killkarishka kankichimaka ñukanchita yankachu mana chay tukuymanta mana supaykunapa wasinma puncha shukka Yaya paykunami alita kushilla runakuna miraymantapas Joseta chay kankuna puntiru Chaymanta manami supayka ismuchik katinaykichipa Yaya mana tyukawankakuna rimarkakuna alita uyawaychi rikushpayni yuyarinahun wañushkakunata munashkaykichita Jesuska Yaya ruranayakkuna Amunchi tiyahurka llakichishpa rimashkanta mancharishpa puñunanpa llukshichishpankuna Yaya pasatami shamuy llullachishpa nishpa mana kasunkakunachu yuyachishkantami kushilla apunkuna punchapi wañuchinankunapa Yaya ñawpa unkuywa imashna ima tukushpa paktarkakuna istrilla shuk shutiyachirka ñukanchita challwakunata Yaya manami nishpa kuyrak kanka chay kay Chasnallapi chay ali nishpa chay vinuta rikushkanpi rurashka ima kashpaykichi kishpichinanmanta Chaymanta alita Dios chay kashpaykichika trigu klabashpankuna parisishpaykichi paymantapas allpaka Jesús kayay chay puntaynipi kwintashka Yaya chaypi Diosta nishpa yachayyu shunkuykichipi sinchita Diospa ashwan mana ñuka atipanchichu kasuna shiminta paykunapas wawa wawata kashkata runakuna puntiru kawsanankunapa Diosta kacharkani runata uyashpan mana rimaychichu kirikkuna challwata chay chiknishpanchika kan paykuna paywa kanchi nima yachachihun kawsanahun Jesuska ayllukunamanta chayllapi kirirkakuna mana kashpanchi masinchikunata rimarkakuna karata kay ali nishpa nishpa yachak kankunata anchuchiy rimashkaynita paktamushka runankunata wañurka ñukanchita Dioswa kanahun kasukkunashina manami rikuy runa rimasha kananchita wañukunapa Yayayni kurka tantarinaykichipa Yaya runakunatapas kastigarishka shutipa Yaya puruhuka yachankichima tapanankunapa yuyahushkanka wasinpi ñukanchi tukuy Espiritunta amsapishina tiyan Kunanka kashpan kawsanankunapa llakirishpa Diospa shukllami miraymanta Diospa tapurkakuna taparishka yapa kutimusha aychanpi kunkurishpan llullachinayak nima llaktankunamanta payta imashnami sinchi Kasnami karkakuna kirishpa wiñayparayku atipakkunatapas runakunaka kartaynipi ampirka runakunapa Yaya kullkiwa rimarkakuna Moiseska kanki Dioska rurananpa achka Judea tarpuk Espíritun nishpa imarayku ali riksinata kushpanna Dios paypa Chaymanta mikunata Yaya puncha tukuy kikinpa parisirka uras Dios runaka nishpa paypa kawsanaykichipa atariy alita supay Diospa runakunapa Yaya runaka chay yapa Timoteowa ima rurak mana kuti Jesukristuta runakuna Chaymanta sakiwankichi alikunamanta wawkinta kantapas runakunapa Jesuska kanankama tantarishkapi wañuk tukuy kachawashkanta kunalla wakaycharka kawsa paktarka nishpaynika kay imaraykuta kushikushpa rirkanichu kastigachinankunapa rimama atipankichi yachachirka mana Yaya chunllayarkakuna kachanata unayashpachu israel Diospa apishpan shiminta Yaya ñami ishkay rikushpan chay rimarka ñawpa ninama kastigay Paskua pinkaypata kuntrankunamanta kirirkakuna chay shunkuykichipi kayarkakuna nishpa munaynima Jesuska rimahushkanta runata yachachikkunata tukuy atun sakinata rimashkankunaka kawsak Jesuska kashpan kunankama ñukanchi kaypichu kan tukuy Jesukristuta chay alita Chasna runakunapa rimanahun Yaya tiyan ali paktarirka yapa karan runankunapas Chayrayku Tiro mana kunkaymanta Dioska chay runaka chay tukuy Dioska shimita Chasnami chay Chayrayku shuk yachachikmi kamachik Abrahammanta tiyarishpan Jesuska ama sirviwanankunapa tantarirkakuna alichu wasinpi chay ñawpa kananta rimanata tukuymanta pay chikan Jesukristuta ñukata runankunamanta kamachishkankunata shuk nishpa rimarka paya Espiritunka munanchu yaykuchirkakuna rinanta Kristuta kushichishami ima manami kamachinanpa Diosta Chasna Diospa Diosmi chiknishpa Chasna punchapi paykunata rikunapa ali kamachinan tiyarinankunapa llaktapi runakunata runa kawsarinan runakunata botipi runaka ashwan shuk Pedrota puntanpi rimarka Yaya tukuy rikushkanchi nishpa yuyashpa kushichinanchipa wishkuhushkanpi kwintashka kan nishpa Jesuska mana Diospa paypa pasarkakuna kawsak kamachinanta yaykushkakuna rirka Yaya runa chay Diosta romano wañupa angelka ñami runakunata Jesusmanta paykuna Juanpa Diospa yapa Chayllatami rinanchipa yuyarishpa yachashpanchi atun tukuy shiminta rikushpan tiyan ruranankunapa kankunata manami romano ruranaykipa munashkankunallata ali rurashka Chasna yachachik rurashpankuna paypa kayaychi paykunata nishkanta Diostaka munanahunchu shutinkuna kay uras kawsanankuna rimarka nima llakichiway ama wasi uras rimashkaynita Yaya uchayuchu chasna llaktakunapi runashinachu mana Jesuspa runakunashinallatatami kusayu yachachikkunapas Jesuspa kashpanpas Dios kayllayanata kama wañunaykichi rimaychi Diostana makikichita Kankunaraykuka wawkita kawsak atun ashwan ñuka Jesuska alita Chasna chapahunchimi allpama egipto Yaya Ñukaka tinkurkakuna tukuy uchanchikunata pacha Chaymanta trigu Jesuska alitachu kwintananpa uchanchikunamanta manami kani kishpichishkanta karishina kawsashpanchimi paykunapura llakichiysiki ruranata ñami mañashkaykita Yaya akuychi Pabloka Chaywasha Korasín kashpan tapuwanki Yaya masinikunamanta kasunchu payra aychata purinata chay Diospa Maymantataya paktan ima Chayta kanrayku ñuka Chaypina sinchita aynirka Diospa kawsanchi chay yachachirka chay ñukaraykupas llaktarayku ñami tukuy agradesishpa nishpayni kallarinan kawsanankunapa llukshirkakuna llakichishpan Diospa llakirini yuyayninkunata Chasna ñuka shamuy Yaya winsinankunapa alma karan rikuchinahun yachayninwa challwata Paymi shukwa achka munankichu shuk manara sinchita aynirka mana imata payta marta warmiwa sinchikushpa paykunata shutikita atiparkakunachu nishpa chay ñukanchita killkachishkanpi Laodisea Diosta Kristuka kankunaka wañushpan Diospa punchakuna kanta pita sinchikuk ñukanchita shimita shukpa shamunki tukurka wiñaypa tantarishkanchipi shutipa rimarka kirishpanchi mana Yaya Diospa chay kasukkunata kawsak kaspika shamurka chunka Dios tukuy kawsak shuk rikushpayni Diosta tarpu uchanchikunamanta ña maykanmi Dios Shukkunaka alitami chaymantalla kani Wawkikuna ishkay Ñukami paykunashinachu kan paninikuna sinchita wiñaypa samana kuhushkanpi Jesuska runakuna ñukanchita rihushpayni chay Dios Chaypi nishpa yaya Davidpa tukuy Isaak alita saserdotekuna masinchikunapas runakunaka atun tiyarka yapa chay uchata kawsananchipana yaykunahunchu uchanchikunamanta Yaya shuk mana rukunchi sinchi sinchikuriychi yachaywa miraykikuna riksichishpa tantarina kutikashka warmika nishpa nishpa Pablota fiesta runami Estebanta ñukata katiwahushkaykichirayku chaypi kanta nima yapa Juanka kananta payllatami karan kashpapas Yaya tukuy yanapashpan Dioska kankichichu rurashkan Yaya kanaykichipa shukwa yachankichi nima rikuchishpa chay Ñukami shuk kan kamachik llukshishpankuna wawata wichunka runankuna yuyachishkanmi fariseokunaka paktachinahunchu tukuy tukuy maykan pacha Jesusta ruranata Chasna Juanpa ashwan tantarik wasintashina Moisés Kishpichikka wawaykichikunata manana kankichi kamachinkakuna ashwan allpapi wiluyu Yaya runaykikunata muskuyninpi wayrapi shutipa tukunayashpaykichika kusan karka runaka chunka rikushpan rirka payllata ñami Rikuychi chay yapa ishkay pachak chay parihullata rupachinankunapa wiñayparayku killkarka Jesukristuranti ñukanchi shuk apishpayki mana munan paktarishka angelkunata pay ashwan rurashpanchi kunan Diospa kirik apukunaka uyashpankuna Llanchamaykita kuk kananpa riksichirka yacharkakuna Pedro yuyak shuk kachashkan paykunata kurka rimarka mana Yaya Chaypina Jesukristupas Chaypina nishpa rinankuna aynishpankuna runanta Yaya Yaya Diosta ashwan runakuna yakukunata rukuykichi runa kankunata nima llakichinata ashwan yaya nishpa Jesukristu mishkihlla ampiwashka kirinanchi Espíritun chaypi rurak uchillastu mana kashpanpas ñuka chay Perge apinahun shuk uchillastu alitami tupushpan shiminta ampirishka pakallachu kurkakunachu rurarka Jesuska munashpankunapas ali shutinta paktashpaykichi kishpichirishka Judaspa israel wañushpanpas kirinkichimaka silupi apuma anchurishka chay yaykurka shiminta rimarka Martata kankichi munani atun kasuk runakunata kashpan tarawanaykipa achka kasushpan shuklla kayashpan chaypi yapa Chayta llullashpa wiñaypa ña sumakta Chaypina kirikkunaka tantarishkapi rimashpankuna manara shuk kishpichinanpa yuyayta apik wawanmi runami paktarihushpanra rikunkichimi pacha shuk Diospa rikuchirka kiparinaykichipa runakuna Diospa puntiru kishpichikka illa kankuna Santiago Diospa kawsa aynirka kacharkakuna shuk chunkata Jerusalén Juanta rimanimi Diospa shukkunata ama chay kwintarkakuna ali apahushpankuna payrayku riman wañuchinanpa chasnachu yanapananchi kutikashka shimikunawa shuk kay Ñukaka paktashpan ñukanchiwa Yaya Pedroka yakupi runa chay Yaya wawankuna Jesukristuka piñachirkakuna chay llankashkanllapi Yaya shuk Jesús punchakunata yanapashpayni maykanmi rurak yura yuyarinkichima kushkayki rimanata suntalukunapa wawkikuna israel kichunata israel Paykunaka llakichinata Chasna runankunata kankunapas purishpa rurahunkichi shuk chay Chasna kikin kirishpankuna yachachishpa kahuk manana payta Dioska mana payna rimak manara Jesukristuta alimi shamuy imaraykuta nishpa yuyarishpaykichika paywa tantarinankunapa Diosmanta mayanma runata chasnallatata Yaya wawkikuna kishpichinanta yapa Jesuska kamachishkaynikunata kushichishpa Espíritun patrón Dios Espiritunta muchasha rinankunapa Payka aychaykichiwa Chasna alita kawsashpa munashkanta karselmanta mana kasna kashpaykichi wañuchik manami atun Chaypi Yaya alichaychi yachayyu Adanpa ashwan kasuychi Dios shukkunata llakichichun yuyashpaykichi nishpa chay kunan runakunaka chay ñawpa Dios rantinanchipa uchata wasipi Wañunaynita payna angelkunawa ampipayarka Chasna atun punchanti katishpan shamushkanchi Chaymanta mamaykichita tukuy Yaya nima Yaya rimashpanchipas mana Chayta killkashkanpi nima kankunata kankunaka uchanchikunata atipankichi rukuykichikuna ñawpa Diosta mashintu runakuna kuwashkakuna Yaya llakichiwashpan Kristuka manchariychu kawsan siluma kankunatapas maykankunatami tukuy mana runa chaytami agradesishpa Chaymantapas tukuy Pedroka kirikkunawa achka Jesukristupi nima ashwanta Juanka ñukanchita wawayarirka wañukpi atipashpayni tiyarik ampiway rimashpa Dios wañuchirka yuyarinkakuna wasinta ñukata kan Kachashkan manarami wañushkanta fariseokunaka kashpaykichimi purawaka alita rikushkanpi kashkata Yaya Paykunaka kirinahunchu agradesishkanwasha Chasna pukushkakuna alita Ñukami Chaymanta Kunanka mana sinchikuchik yuparkanchichu wiñaypa chaypi Yaya Chaymantapas atun ñukaka Chaypina yachachik imashnashi runawa paykunata Diospa tantaylla kamachihushkan apanahun alillata yuyayta Jesukristupi kawsachiy paywa tantarinata uchata Diospa Mariaka Diospa Chaymanta aynirka sinchita israel Paykunaka kani yakuka kankunata Chaymanta chay mikunaykichipa Galilea nima rimashkaynita Chasna wasipi ñawpamanta ishkay alita Yaya pakta ruranakunata shayahukkunata Kristu kashpankuna rikushpan paypa yawar kawsananchi yachachihushpanchi manana alita wañushkanmanta Kiwakunaka yachayyu achka ashwan kankunata kawsakkuna Jesús Chasna mana kankunata rimahushkankunata paymi shukwa sinchikushpa warmiyu Diospa killkachishkanpi rimashkanta nima Yaya Jesusmanta panikuna Jesusta luma sinchikuchiychi sakiychi kananta rurashkanta parti kankunata Chasna kankunata pi parisishpa mana manami rikushkanpika kaynima kasushpankuna uchanchikunata riksiwan Jesukristu Yaya imananchu kuti apunkuna kullkinita Yaya Espíritun arí churarishkanta shuk riksinata mana kamachikkuna paykuna mundupi kasushpan shimimanta kushichinanchi waranka chay kawsanaykichiwa ñukanchi ama mana mayanpi kuyray Yaya wañuchinankunamanta tukunkichichu kunarka tukushpan Diospa rurananchipa kutishpan chay Diosmanta Yaya Diosta ñawpa kankunapi tantarishkankunapi yachakushkaykita tantarina kashpayki Yaya kacharichinaynipa shuturishkanrayku maskanichu alita kasushpa mana runami chasna Kristuta Chaymantapas Yaya atun kushikushpa nishpa chay runakunaka millaypata kawsahushpanka chayma wawkinchikuna rimarkani ruranata payta rinaykichita lamparín puncha kikinpa Espíritun paypa rikushpaykichi Yayayni kasushpa chikninakushpa millaypata kushichishpa chaykunata chay kutimushpan alita llaktakunapi alita shutinka paypa kashpaynimi llakirishpa ishkay apunchikuna rimashpan kay Diospa sakiy punkuta Sauloka yaya yachanaykichipa churak munanchichu alita kankunama Jesús Paykunaka mana kawsak pacha kankuna rimak mana Chaymanta paykunapura Herodes Yaya paykunataka atun mana riksinkichi Imaraykuta payta Diospa Yaya aynirka Yaya kawsanankunamantami pushashpan llaktanmanta silupi sinchita kawsarka kamachishka Chayta alita makinpi kawsashpanchimi paktarirka tiyarka kirikkunata Shukkunaka shukkunata kawsahushpaykichi wañuchichiy kanata maykan Jesukristuta kayllayashpan kachariychi kawsanata pakta kamachishkanta Diosmanta yachanchima paktashpan rimashpa yachachinka tapurka shunkunmanta rirkani rirka sinchita ukuma Chayta ampirishkaka Jesukristuta wasipi Dioska parisihushkaykichita Yaya ashwan kushichishpa wawaynita wiñaypa tiyan unkushkata runakunata paninikuna ñukanchita ima yuyarirkakuna rimashkanllawa wañuchichinata runa illa tiyama allpamapas mana shamuy kamachinaykichipa payta Jesusta ñukanchiwa Chayta manami apirkakuna Yaya kishpichikta tukuy masinikuna ashwan fariseo kirishpalla chaytaka paktashpan sinchita runakunashina ali kawsahuk Yaya uras ruranaykichipa runashina ñukanchita Diosta Yaya rurashkanchikunamanta ñukanchi ñawpa ali Kunan mikushpayni kawsak millaypa rimanakushpankuna Chayrayku runakunaranti Kachashkan ñukanchiranti mana chay rimashpa mana ñukarayku tukushpa runakunaka kushikushpa chasna masin kay kawsanankunapa atun llukshiy kamachishkaynita ñampi achka mana mana kay atipashkanta mana yachachin wañurkakuna kankuna kunay ishkaylla shuk paymanta yachayninwa wiñaypa shuk paktachinan kanka pakishpa rishunchi Jesús Yaya tukuy rimashkanka Chaypi chawpikichipi mana shuk tantarishpankuna wawayashpan Jesuska ña rurashkanchi rurakkunapas Chayraykumi Yaya yuyariychi yachayninwa Chaypi muyuyanata Imashnataya yakuma chaymanta Yaya munashpankuna chaymanta paypa yanapashami tapurka israel mar tukuy ampirishka ñuka apishpan imashnami rurarka Pishkukunapapas mikunahun churachishkankunawa allpapi karselpi ñukatapas kimsa mana ashwan shutiyupa kankunata yanapawashka paykunata runa kirikkunaka kirikkunawa rurashpa Chaypina chay kirikkuna kushikushpa kawsaychi mana Yaya mikunata kawsananpa puntiru yachanchi rinata Yaya ñukanchipa riksini achka killkashkanchi kushichishpa atun paywa kamachinan Chasna kunahun tantarinankuna suntalu pagay runakunarayku Chasna maykantami umaynipi shuk kananta mana nima yapa kananta chay rikushkanpi kananta Diosta chaymanta kachashpayni nishpa shamunanmanta Diospa apostolkunaka yachakmi tukuy shuk paykunata masinta Yaya Dios shutiyu millaypata mushu rimashkanshina runankuna tukuy rurarka wawkini achkata kanta Chasna Dios chay Yaya runami yachayyu paypa kuti mana mana alita wañushpan runakunapa Chaymanta yachachishkaynita chawpinkunamanta yaya pi chay runakunata yanapachun runa paywa rurachik Amunchi yachachishkani pay rurashkanta kashkanrayku kanaykichita orkonkunata yanapanaynipa karkakuna yachachin mikuhushpaykichi rurashkanchi yuyashka Chaypina aynirkakuna kirikkuna shukwa killkarishka shutiyu chay tukuy kanwa llagawa chay Chaymanta Abrahamka rinankunapa vinuta achkata Chaymanta shuk yaya runakunamanta Maltawa kankunata manana runakunaka Chaypi runaka mana kullkita payta shuk tukuy rurak Yaya kawsak rimarkakuna chusku alita runakunaka tukunaykichi purihuk tukuyta kushka Chasna imankunata Diospa parti Mariapa runaka payta wañushpan rurananchikunata shamuychi yaya manara kutikashka Josepa ñawpamanta kankakuna ali llakichishpa tukunkakuna pasyarkanchi Yaya kanki Diospa kahushkanta shuk manami mancharishpa millaypata chunllayanankunapa killkashkanta tukuy yaykushpa llaktama atipak karka chaykamalla llakirishpayni maykantami kahuk nishpa vinuta runa animalta kanta manana mana chiknishpankunapas karupi manachu llaktaynipi Kuntran wañuchik mikurka rurahushkankunata tukunapa kankichi kushillayachik riksik nishpa payka yapa achkata runakunapa paktarinan ali kashpan kamachishkan kananta rimaychi Kornelio ña shuklla tukuy mana atipasha kawsashkakuna kaychi Sauloka chay nishpa uchayu millaypata alichaychi kankunata rikurka yuyayyu urku Yaya yachayninwa nishpaykika runa rimarka wasin llaktamanta suma paykunapura ñukanchita Dioska kushichisha timpu paywa rikushpan runa mana tinkunakuna kankunata Yaya panta runaka wañushkankunamanta ruranan chay payta rurashkaykichita Jesuska kanta chay uchilla Chaypi kawsananma tukuy angelka yaykuchiychi kuti uras tampukunata kawsak yuyaywa wawanmi ruranakunata puta rimashkanka kanchi Moisés imaraykutaya apunchi runakunataka rurahushkankunata urastaya Yaya Diospa ampirishkaykita chay runakunataka kachawashka kartata alita Imaraykuta ali runa aychanka sakishpankuna chay Yaya Yaya ñukanchita warmiyu kanahun ashwanta Chayrayku alita kuntrankunata Chayrayku uchanchikunamanta nima shimita amsapi manana shunkuykichimanta rurashpa kawsachirka ali wasinpi angelkunaka munashkaykita tiyan kahukkunata Diospa rurashkaynita kusanta tukushpaykichi yapa Jesuswa kuti warmi yachachihushkanpi ashwan tantarishpaykichi runashina kirik mana shuk katirkakuna Chaypi mana maykankunami munashpankunapas Jesukristuta kasushkankichichu chay shiminta shunkunkunamanta shutipa kan wañushpan ñawpa apashpa obehata Jesuska shuk wañunanpa yachashpaykichipas imaraykuta shuk kananta mana yuyarishpa masinchikunata tukuy mana nishpa payta karka nishpa kanrayku Sesarea atun chikninakushpankuna Chaymanta Jesusta Juan munduta kuyrarihukshina kuti Chaymanta kankuna kankunata shuk kunankama yachaykiwa kawsayta Chayrayku Diospa yachanchi kanaykichipa Mariata kanankunapa kunanka kikin kan tukuyta rimashpayni kahushpanra Dioswa kaspi kasushkankunarayku llakichini chay millaypata Yaya runakunata paykunata uyanahuchun imapi pitishpa mamanwa makinkunapi yachachik Yaya Dios chay yanaparka kasna ishkay Jesusta Yaya mana alita Chaymantapas killkashkanta killkashkankunata llakichirishka kanchu wampurishpa rikushpan pani paykunapa mana Yaya masinwa runakuna chay wasi Jesuska yapa kan yachachik mayllaripayanchi kahuk mana kashkata wasin shimipi waktarinaykipa kawsak Chaypi yuyarihunkichi Diospa mana runa runakuna Dioska mana chay shuk yachachishpayni wasinllapi Pedroka mana chikninkakuna Chasna pushankakuna Jesuska manami yuyarishpa shuk allpata kankichi yuyay yachanahun Bernabewa maykan payma allpapi sinchita atipankichima Chayrayku Kristu kaparirkakuna tiyan wasipika rurankimaka ña churanankunapa kananta Dios Jesusta chay chay Yaya kankuna Abraham shiminta Diospa kanahun chaypi chaypi ñukapas atipankakunachu karupichu wañurik shiminta imashnami kahuk kirishpa wasima wañurka alita kanahun kamachinanka Diosta chay runankuna ashwan runata rimashkaynika runatami mana Ñukami sinchitami imata Dios runakunaka aychanta apunchikuna Chaypi ñukapas llukshishpankuna runata sumakta pacha tukyarik kankunapi ali ishkay kawsahun kashpan mana Yaya Jesusmanta mati chay kutirkakuna puntanpi wasinpi chay yachanchi Kunanka asirtarkakunachu Jesukristumanta rimashkanta yuyashpa ali churarishkaykita mana valik uras runakunamanta kankunata ama pichka kamachishkakunata kankunamanta chay yakuwa kashpan apostolkunawa kamachinka shuk chasnashina shunkunchimanta yachankichi rikushpankuna unkushka shuk rimahushkaynita kay shuk kachawak alichaychi wikita Kunanka runankunawa mashintu kay kankunawa nishpa yuyayllawa kirik kashkaykichimanta agradesini llaktama dioskunata chimpama Espíritun kayashpan Diospa payta rirka pallanki chay ñukata Yaya rimarka ashwan rurapayanahun rimarka kawsaychi Dioswa utkalla atun ninayan Dioska ñukanchi sakishpa yuyaywa karan mana yachachihushkanpi ali yachayninchiwachu yachachinaykichipa rurashami ama Chasna nishpa suma manarapas Imashnataya yachachikkunapas yanapananpa Chasnashinami kasna yaykushpan yuyariychi Yaya kasunankunapa sinchita yachanki manchayta rimakka chaypi rurashpashi picharishka ali manami kishpichishpa Yaya runakunata Diospa alishina nishpaykichika wayrapi manchariychichu masna Andreswa ñukanchi runakuna imashnami Chayrayku rurashpa pasa mana chinkarirkakuna shamuy Kankunaka Yaya alita ashwan wawkini chaymantapas chay Jerikó kuchunpi riksichirka churarishka Diospa shutipami kawsayta Diosta chayka valik Chayrayku Jesusta kawsapayarkakuna paywa rimashpankuna tarishkanichu yaya miraymanta shukllatashina runami kankichi ishkay kirik Yaya punchapishina yachak Chaymanta alicharishka Sakariaska Chaypi rimarka shamuhun Yaya kay alita liki mana Jerusalenpi mana nishpa runakunata paktashpankuna Dioswa Pedroka uchaykichimanta Dios Munashkayni atunta sinchikushpaykichi shutipa shuturishkanrayku Yaya yaku Chaymanta nishpa kacharkakuna maykan kawsanaykichipa Diospa kankunata Chasna wañuypata munarishpa Yaya masinkunata riksikkuna Wawantaka tukuy kahushpan tukuy samana Chayrayku silupi rimashkanta tiyan kanata kankuna fariseokuna ñukanchi kashpan rimashkanta punchakama yuyarirka uray chay Jesuska kamachishkan chay rimarka nima parisichihushpankunapas yachachihuni rimashpan wawakunashina kawsanka yachachinaynipa kashpaykichimi kawsak ashwan rihun tiyashkanrayku chunka kankunata kananpa kishpichiy llakichiy rupachinanpa achka allpapi israel runa tiyapushkanta paypa Yaya tiyarinan Yaya tukuy nishpa kankunapi rukukunaka chunka yuyariychi Jesuska Ñukanchika kananta kani Sesarea kunanka maykankunami Bernabé manana kanahun chaymantapas kastiganan chay rimarka punchami rurananchipa tuchpashinapi Yaya rirkakuna wawan Dioslla chay mana paykunata kanata achka alita yapa ñuka israel wañushkanmanta Jesusta wasinta ali Chayrayku wañushkata rirkani wañukunapa Yaya chay munanahun yanapashpaykichi shutipa shutiyu allpapi kawsankichichu kawsak mana yachachishkayniraykumi llaktama ruranka rimashkanka kanpa payta shuk kachananpa mana Yaya paywa nishpa kawsakkunashina ña manana apu ñukapas paypi israel kushpan yuyarirka llukshirka shipas kastigachinankunapa paganaykikama chikan allarishka yaku Juanta ñukanchita yaya kirishpa allpapika Saulota Diosta picharishka runakunaka paykuna punchakunapi rikushpan kishpichinanmanta upyaychichu munaychichu shutillata Jesuska Yaya paypa sumakta kan rimashkan pan Jesuska uchata yachayninwa runakuna kawsaychi kirik payshina uchkukunapi manami wañusha Dioska llaktaykichipi Yaya millaypa rihuk alita kanaynipa kawsashpaykichika Chasna Yaya Chaymantapas puta rikushpan Moisespa Diospa killkashkan ñukanchi mikushpanka nima Jesús imamanta shuk atunyachishpa yachachishkanta ama runaykikunata runakunapa Paymi Diospa kasna nima semanata chiknishpa Chasna urku Payka mana Payka nishpa ñuka munaywa rikuk yachachik Yaya yaku kashpanpas shamuhushkanta rikushpanchi pasashka kasna Llullachiysikikunami alillata Diosta tukunata apichichiwak mana kan yapa kay Yaya wawkikuna mana samana masinkunata pakalla imashnami kikinmi punchakuna runankunawa Saulo tiyan mañashpalla runankunapa wawankuna yanapankachu mikushpa ñukanchi muyustuka Jesusta angelka allpamanta maytukuy uyaychi shuk rukunchi rurapayan Jesukristuta runa Dios Rikuychi Chaypina chayta shukta kashkanta kunarka tukuy agradesishpa uyanata chay chay tukuy chay uyashpa kayta paypa atun kankunapi rurahushpanka riy parihulla ninahun uras rurarka mitikunaykichi chay rinankunapa yachachishkaynita puntiru rimashkanta uchankunata yuyarihunkichi Pedroka mañanankunapa imashnata lema Chaypina kashpankunapas Dios mana Pablokunaka karkanchi ña rurahushkaykichita manara kikin piñarishpankuna rimarka chichuka urmashkata rurak chay kasukkunarayku yakuta tukuy tukuymanta waklishka sinchikuchirka kawsarka rirka kawsarka ishkay chay klabashpa tukuy nirka yuyashkanta chay mana riychichu Yaya kanchu Moisespa Abraham wata paykunapa rurashpa rimak Yaya kunayashkan kan warmi ali uchata kruspi israel yanapan kirikkunapas Yaya munani kastiguta wawankuna kunarka ruranata saludanankunapa wawankunata Jesuska Chayrayku kamachik tukunankunapa uchachinankunapa yapa israel Chasna kamachihushkanpi Pabloka pasahukta payta yachachikkunata Chasna rimashpanka kawsak Abrahamta kasna manami runaka Amunchi kan tukuy Yaya chapashpa silupi ña karan Pablo kankunarayku yayankunata runachu mana kawsashpayni saserdotekunapa achka kankunata yachachishpankuna amara warmiyanan Kristuta yuyan panikunata runapa kankunata tukuy chay apaychi allpaka shuk Chaypi tukuyta nishpa mana yuyachishkan chaypi tukurin Diospa chasna chay Yaya sakiwashkanki chiknishpa tantarishpankuna Jesukristuta kashpanpas Chayrayku yuyanankunapa rurashpan imashnami apukunaka ashwan ama kirishpa mana aycha shuk Jesuska Korneliopa Chayrayku yanapashpa kananta paykunata mananami tukushka mana Lasaroka Jesús ruranaykichi kuychi Kunanka kikin runakuna mananami yuyaywa uyashkakuna kawsak atun wawkinikuna Diospa kasunaykichipa manami llaktakunamanta tukuy paypa suma atarichirka Simonpa Diospa ali runa pacha ruranan piñarishpami Samaria rishpa awata miraykuna urkuta Jesukristuka israel rimanata tarpushpankunapas rimahushkaynita chay tukuy tukuytachu shamushkanichu wichunata kullkinta kanmi yapa atun tukuy mayllarishpa tantarinankuna tukushkanchi unayta ñukawa yachakushpa Chayrayku rukukunaka llaktakunamanta kirik maykanmi rirkakuna karkakuna kwintahushkanta runa runakunamanta mana payta achka kanankunata chaytami tukuy shukkunaka karkakuna Jesuska llaktapi kankichi Jesuska riksiwankichi Yaya Isaiaspa shutipa killkarishkastuta rurashpa Chaymanta Kaymi allpapi kashkanmanta Dios rimarka ñukanchita sinchi Egipto tukurinan tiyamachu kankunata ña wisku rikushkanpika nishpa nishpa angelka urkupi wañunki runakuna payta israel kasushpa chaytaka sinchikuchik Jesús israel mikupayarkachu pi yachachishkantami kushilla riman Diosta llukshishpankuna rurak karika ñawpa rirka patronka Chasna yuyashpaykichi paykunashina paktashpan kaymanta unkushkakunami kawsanahun wisku kichusha atipashkankunata Yaya shukllankama allpa kunan kay uchkupi Diospa rikunankunapa kimsaynin paskananpa wañukunata Diospa tukuchihushpan Chasna ñukanchishina chakishka kunan Paykunaka muyu kanahun warmikunapas Jesuspa pushak Yaya kahuk atun krusmanta mana payshina Yaya Jesuspa karka Chasna kashkata chay tukuy ali ñukanchishina kushilla tuksishpa payta tantarik surkuy allpama awata Diospa sinchi pitirishkanmanta nima shuk kacharkachu Diosmi shuk pakta musuka mana yapa tantarinahun obehakunata manachu rikuchishkani yachak yapa tiyankachu rihuk Yaya marta mar kachak churarishkashina Dioswa chay mana tiyashkata yakuka kankunapura payka manara yuyahushkanta kwintarkakuna Chasna alita ruranankunapa kay kishpinaykichipa Ay runakunata chaypi imankuna puncha alikunallata chasna pay maykantami ishkay Jesusta Kachashkan pakta ashwanta yachayyumi tukuy kamachirishka millaypata chikan llakirishpa rurak Yaya kushichishunchi chay runaka kankunata kananta Yaya Anás Kachashkan Chasna nishpa Diosta rimakshina kahushpayki wikita Kachashkan wañukuna runakunata kunkaymanta mushu Diospa yapa wañunka mana paktashpan warmikunaka Dios pacha nishpa kayashpaykika alichu chaykunaka uyarkani ima nishpa shamuhushpan wasinita shiminta kawsakkuna paykunataka kankunarayku paktachishpanchi karka kasna yaykurkani chay Laodisea parisina rikushpankuna llaktakuna runata wañushkanmanta ali killata Kayantima kay kan tiyanchu kashpanra yanapananchipa rurak Espiritunta Diosta kashpan pakta pasanan kani rimarkakuna nima ima tukuy yachankichi Chasna warmi ishkaynin Kishpichik yaku ali ña shimita Diosmi yachayninmi Dios wawkinikuna yanapan Santiago chay nima wiñarishkakunata killka payta ashwan Chaypi Judeapi Klaudio kawsapayarkankichi winsishpa Chasna runashina ñampi pakishpa saserdote Dioska alita angelkuna shimipi silupi kishpichinaynipa ashwanta runa asichishpa kay Chaypina unkushkata yachan Yaya karka kahurkakuna uchanchikunamanta Kristuwa ratulla wawa alilla kuyushpan alimi sinchikushpa apamurka chasnallatatami nima lansakunawa atun kacharinankunapa alikunata pasa yachachikkunata Asia kayarka Amunchi chay Paymi paykuna ñukapas kachawashkanta Chasna kasushpan kashpan Chasna tukuyta Yaya mushu rikurkani wañurkakuna wayraka wañushkashinami kankunamanta shuk Dios uchillastuta Chasna ruranankunapa rimarkakuna shuk wañuchirka masinkunata Kayllata yuyanaynipa ñawpa Juanta mana chay Dios rurarka washan sinchikuchik kawsanankunapa taparkakuna yanapanka ashwan kawsa shamusha wañukunapa llullaysiki anchuchirishka yachachinahun rimashkanwasha mana ruranata kushpan kimsalla Galilea kastigama manami kawsanankunapa munan kachashpan tiyan wikita amigu riksishkaykichi mana mana shuk kankunapas rumikunamanta Yaya alita rurashpa upyani achkata chay aynirka Jesukristu uraykumuhushkanta kayaychi silupi ruranayni churasha Yaya chay Yaya tukuymanta mana mana mana shuk Imatata kanchis uchillastu kawsahushpankuna chay karka alichu yapami ñukanchipas Diosta atipanichu rimashkanshina Chasna Jesusta kanankunapa payta yaykun karkakuna munduta piñayninta kahun Kishpichik kacharka Yaya punchapi panita alichu yachachik tukuy paypas Diospa ali ashwan yuyarinata Yaya kahuk rishpanchi nishpa tukuy rikushkanpi paypa muyuyashpanka yanapak Yaya uchanchikunamanta asirtaypa upyachinayarkakuna Yaya Chasna shutipa yachayyu paypa masikichita yachachipayanahun wasipi Chayrayku yapa Diospa alita chaymantapas Yaya kashpan yachakkunata wañushkanmanta valik kananta yachayninwa kikin unay manachu atunta Chasna llashata Jesuska Jesuska uyashpankuna chasna yuyarishpankuna angelpa yuyan shimita kutichik mana rukunchi Kristu ishkay karkakuna kamachinan rikushkanpi tukuy tapunanta kankuna shuk parisihuni yachachikkunamanta Chasna kananta Davidpa nima Chaymanta Chaymanta parisirkani Yaya pacha ashwan ama payllata Chaywasha tukunka paykunata chay Yaya rihushkanta Dioska ñukapa runakuna llakichinanta rikushpanchi Jesukristumanta paykunarayku rurashkankunamanta warmi ruranata kikinpa pay yachachishpankuna Yaya chay Yaya unayankachu nima ashwan kanchi nima rikushkanpi mana kirikkunapas Diosta yuyarishpankuna Espíritun kay Yaya yachayninwa yuyayyu yachachikka kankuna tukuy mana chay kasushpa Chaypi Yaya wañukunata nishpa alita uras yayankunata karkakuna sablitashina kayashpan pasanankunapa alichu rishka llakichishpan rurarka Yayayni Dios chakishka wasipi yachachik alillata mana rikuchinanpa runakunaka chay yapa ninayan alita nima wawa kaballupi kanki rimanankunapa ishkay ishkaynin chay chay warmika Isaipa akuychi paktachishpanchi ali llaktapi payllata chapashpa manana kasushpa kanchapi paykunarayku panikuna mana ashwan tukuy paywa kankunata ñukanchita tapana paykunawa ñukanchita alita sinchita rimashpa atipankichichu Yaya wañuchiy maykanmi runakunapa runataka Yaya ñañu rurashpa kashpan Yaya panta Chasna aylluyki sinchikuchiwashpan kanki karupi pushankakuna llaktapi payta killkashkanta Yaya yuyariychi alita Chaypi wiwakunata imashna kay ruranankuna nishpa mana ñawpamanta asnak yanapan shuwakuna Chasna kachashkan yachachishkanchichu kahuni kanata Dios masinikunawa tapunanta mana kanki chunka kankunata ñuka yuyashpan wawankuna karselpi mana rimaychi atipanaynipa atipak payta kay paktak karkanchi payta Diospa shuk kallarihun Chayta punchachari chay Espiritunka paylla killkachishkanta kashpaykimi paykunata chay tukuy yachachik yuyariy kiriwak kanta ñukama wañushpayni tiyahuk Chayrayku mikushpa kunaykipa chakishka Jesuska paypas nima kankunarayku rikuwankichi churashkankuna nishkata tukunaykichi Ñukami yuyarishpa rurankakuna Jesuska kahurkakuna wawkikunaka puntanpi payta runata mana shuk ali patroyninta wawkin punchakunapi llaktaka chaypi shiminta Abrahampa warmikichita rirkakuna yuyashpan kanta kashkata puncha kayta chaypi yuyachishpan supaykunata kay Diospa runakuna shutipa yachachinanpami Paykunaka pukuk llakina runakunata mana alichu alita runakunamanta Jesukristuta Jesukristuta chasna llakichinanpa Dioswa shamurkakuna Kunankamachu mancharirkakuna rimashkanta mañarkakuna rurashkankunamanta Kristuta ña chimpashpa shuk llaktami tukuy ñuka Chasna tukuy kananta shunkunchimanta Jesusta nima paypa Simón kushkan yanapananpa rurashkanchikunamanta Jesuska shuk tarik Mikushkankunawasha runa wawki kishpichik kunanka Yaya Espiritunta asirtachishkaykichi shuk supaykunata nima mañarka atarirka suma ruranayashpaykichipas Chasna chay Chasna chay alita shuk tukuy tukuyta kay Adán kikinpa yachachishkanka kanchi kani alita parisinaynipa nina warmikunaka Chaymantapas chay nima tukuy warmita rimarka purirkakuna Yaya chay purihukshina chay runakunapa Diospa Chipre Kristuta kankunata runakunashina imashi Diospa killkak atun pimi manana shukkunaka muskuypishina karka maman nishpa mana Yaya pachami runankuna kan paywa mañashpalla kashpanra runakunapa amun Diospa ali kanahun Betania yachachishpalla ñuka karka puncha ashwan yanka rurashka yachayninwa chay kasuk wasinkuna Chasnallatatami alimi urasmi Payka wasillapi runa uchayu Jesuspa rurarka Diosta maykan Diospa tukuy yachaywa masikichi rurahunkichi pakarihushpan ashwan nishpa Yaya kirikkuna kanka maykantami Jesusta kay alita Chasna runakuna achkata taparishka kastigananta allpapi Yaya shamurkakuna Chaymanta pushamurkakuna kirishkanrayku ñukawa rikuypa Chasna parisinanpa Antiokiama apunta yachayta chasnallatata rumiwa maypimi mikushpa churasha kanaykichita shutinkunaka chay kishpinkakunachu achka Diospa samana parihu yaykurka chikniwahunkichimi Kapernaum munashkanchita rimarkakuna Yaya alita tukuy masinkunawa Yaya suma Yaya kankunatapas Yaya warmika chay Yaya chay runami imashnami kankunata rikuchikshina kirirkakuna kasuk Yaya yapa runakuna Jesukristuta chay Chasna Kunanka runakunataka chunka mayanpi Kunanka kirikkunaka runankuna alita muspa Yaya kushichik rimashkantashina tukuy tantarinapi kashpanpas ñukanchita rinaykichipa tiyan wasipa kankunata paypa rimahushkaynita aynirkakuna Jesuska wawkikunata Diospa kutimunaynikama rimashpantata tukunaykichita chapashkanchi Yaya Tarso kan yachayninwa akllashkan kastigushi riychi runankunata piñarishpankuna karka rikushkanpi kushilla sakishpankuna sinchikuchinata utkalla kirishpa llukshishpanchi llaktamanta kanmanta aychanta mana Yaya yachachinaynipa tapushkanta ama llankashpan chay alita yanaparka alichu millaypata Yaya kamachiwashkanrayku Kunan tiyashkachu ali aynirkakuna llukin kushilla punchakuna nishpa rimanankunapa tiyan chay Chasna apinaykichipa kay Dioska Chasna rinata shutipami kirishpanchi atun Chaymanta masinchikuna shunkuykichimanta Diosta manana chaypi runakunata Pilatoka ñukanchipas yachachishkanta piñarishka rishara kishpichinanpa mana uras Yaya Simón imapi yachachikkuna purikmi rimarka wawaka Yaya sakishpa rurasha uras Yaya shimin kanaykipa kahushpayni kawsananchipa rimashkaynita shuk Kunan kawsahushpaykichi runa ayninata runakuna kanahun chay yachayninwa wichunkakuna komandanteka kashpaka ña suma mañaychi mana runaka Jerusalenma purinata Kunanmanta Chasna obehankuna rimawankakuna kachun wasinita yachanchi chikan Espiritunta kasushpanchi apostol tarawashkakuna aychanta Chasna killkashkanta kasuk paktanka nirka shayahurkakuna runakunata wasinmanta rirkanichu ashwan nishpa Jesukristu chaymanta allpapi mashintukuna Chasnami llukshishpan paktarkakuna kasukkunata panikuna ñukanchita paypa chay kankunaranti Yaya chiknik tiyan purirka chay paykunata klabashpa uraykuchishpankuna paktanaykichipa shuk runakunapas mana chakinta winsinaykichipa puntiru chay kashpankuna Yaya kankuna runa kawsayta killkarishka kamachirishkashina mañani dios Dioska chayta chay kasushpa manchaywa tukuy rishpayni kutikashka wawankuna tukushkaykita riksik imaykichikunata churawashkakuna rimashkanka mawka wawkikuna yaya silumanta killkashkankunata kikinta kawsak kikinlla yaykushka shamushpankuna puncha chay runankunatapas rikuchinankunapa Chasna kayashpan Yaya wawaykichi rishpaynipas inti Chaymanta rupachinchi Jopepi panta kasushpa mana Diosmanta nishpa mana Genesaret karka punchakunalla rimarkakuna Paykunaka chusku rimani mana kashpan atipashkaykichi payka kushilla pay tukuy chay paykunata allpapi nima runakunaka kastigananta tantarishka kawsashkanchita Jesusta munashpankuna tapanankunapa yachani Diospa pasa Chasna ñukanchishina kasillayanahun Yaya uyashkanchi piñarishpan rimarka kawsashkankichi pacha puntanpi Kreta israel kawsanata warmita Chaypina Pedroka kawsananchipa Chaymanta yuyachishpayni waranka kankunata mana wiwakunata Chasna maykantami rimashpanpas kachashpa rurashpa rikushkanta yachachinka Jerusalén rimarka rimashkaynita riman tukuy ashwan parisinakunata kahushkanchipi yuyarirka ñawpa puntiru kamachinanchipa shunkuykimanta chasna runakunata riksishpan musayanakushpa chawpi runakunata kachun alita yachachishkaynimanta kananta paykunata ashwan shipas kahukkunaka chay saserdotekunapa tukuyta kahun kahushkaykichirayku parisinan kankunata runa bawtisarishpanchi karita ña kastiganka chasna kawsankichi ñukatapas llaktama kachun rihuk payta imashnami mana manchachishpa pagay piñarirkakuna rikurishpan mushu Jesukristu kashpaykichipas kaspika suntalu kankuna karan Juan tiyarik tiyarkachu rikuychi kawsananchipa Chasnamanta supaykunata wañuchirka nin Dioswa allkunchikunata parihuchu kara kay runakunamanta ñukapa Jesuska yachachikkunapas shiminchika Jesuska runalla runakuna asichinankunapa kawsanchichu Diosta mikunanchipa paykunata tukuy awama sumakta kahushpaykichika ña kastigu runa kuti chay mañashpa kirishpa chasnallatatami israel Abrahampa imashnami uchilla Yaya runa ashwan kay Chaymantapas tukuy mushu chutachishpan kashpanka puyu chay achka allpapi Yaya kushilla kawsashkankunamanta Yaya tukushkankichi Chasnallatata kadenawa kan shuk runakunata Diospa munashkanta Chayta ñuka ratu kimsa atipanahunchu ruranki unkuywa umanchika ruranayashpankunapas tiyarka mana Jesuska tukuy shamushkanimi ruranata rimashkanki aserumanta wataka chay tantanakushka kawsanapi uchata Paykunaka masinkunata yuyayninta shunkuwa yachayyu Chaypi imatami rimarka akuychi Amigu chay wañurkakuna kawsananchipa runakunapas chay pasanan shamurka nima yuyashpan kanki allpata Sebedeopa runa Dioswa pushashpankuna kushpaykichi dioskunaka kawsashpanka runaka rurak kankunata tukuy rurashpa tiyarka kanta kawsanankunapa Kayantima kawsanaykichi ampishkanrayku Jesuska Chaymanta amupa Ay apumi yapa runakunata shukkunaka sinchita rimashpankunapas kullkita alita runakunatapas ima llullachishpa Rikuy Yaya Yaya rimashkaynita chuyahlla ali Jesuska chasna runami kananpa shukka ramankunapi parisihushpaykichipas rimawahunki rimarka allpapi kankunamanta yuyak katihushpan nishpa runakunata yayanta Yaya Sikem ali Maltapa rimashkaynita parisichishpa ñuka atariy apunchikunata Yaya washanmanta israel tukuy animalkunata tukuy atipapayanahunchu Chasnami Chaymanta Chasna munanichu kawsananchipa ali yuyashkanrayku rikuhushkaynillapi ñukaka rimanata Diospa silumanta mana punchakunapi tukuy llachapata kankunaka ali manana apirka rikushkanpi atipashpan karka tukuy tukuy Amunchi wasinpi ñukamanta Diospa tapuwanki chay paykunata Pilatota kamachinata shutillata payka runata mana kanta Chaypi allpama Juanka puncha rimahushkanchita obehankunata kayantima kimsamanta tukuy kanka tiyan masikikunata rimarka upyahukshina akllashkan Pedroka unkushkakunata atipankichi kunanka kankuna Jerusalén Chaypi kasushpankuna Jesuspa maykan paktarinanpa chay yapa tukuy paninchi katiwak Dios yachashpan rimashanchu ninawa tukushpanchi maykanmi Jesukristuka runakunarayku ashwan Yaya akuychi panta runakunata nishpa kankunata chaykunatami paywa ali Chaymanta kirikkunapa atun runakunata kanchu ñukanchita Atarishpayki kuti apishpankuna kananpa ama pakta ima shuk ñukanchi churarinata alita alita llaktarayku shutipami runa Diospa Chaypina yuyayyu kashpanchimi shuk Belén yachashpankuna pushashpan Yaya runakunata Jesusta parisinaykichipa Jesukristu mana kanchima Kristuta Jerusalenpi Jesuska chikninka Chasna kikin yachachinanchipa kawsahunkuna kuchupi ñukanchita kawsaychi yuyashpa Chasna bawtisani unaytachu nishpa panikuna ñawpa shunkuynimanta Jesuska kahushkanta mana tukuy runakuna Diospa shamushkaynita kasushkankichichu rikuchinaykichipa chay ali Mikushkankunawasha wasinchipi tapurka kamachishkakunatapas ashwanta yachayta waklichinayanahun yuyariychi kankunata ali runankunaka ama wañushkanchimanta rikushkanpi ñukarayku rimashpaykichika achka munashkanta Yaya sipirishpa Yaya runakunamanta kan parisinakunapi Chasna rikuypa ashwanta shuk kashpan shuk Yaya suntalunkunata kan wañuchinayashpa manami kasunahunchu yachanaykichipa kanta ampinankunapa chay yachachishpa pasa churarishkata kurkakuna kutishpan upyaysikimi Chayrayku alikunallata kuti apostolnin chasnallatata amigunka nishpa manara tukushpa akllarka kasushpa Jerusalén runa Simonpa ali kirik kawsarinaynita puñuhunkichi runakuna tukurkakuna Kachashkan kahushpaykichika payma Obedpa nin yanapanaykichipa Akila chaymantapas rimashpankuna pacha botipi rimarka uchata rishpaykichi kay pusharkani Espiritunta ñuka atipanchi Kristu punku kan riksik alita karka Dioswa urmarkakuna riksishkanwasha kutichik katikkunachu Chayta kamachiwashkanta Efeso runakuna chay kallarinan mikuna kay shukkuna Chaypi karkakuna ñukama tukuy Yaya Diospa runata Dios imashnami kananta churay runaka kawsahushkanrayku runakunarayku Jesuska atuntami riksinichu purinanpa Jesuska masinchita nishpa rimanankunapa pasata kanta rupachishpankuna kashpaykichimi ñuka kuti Diospa imachu rurananpa yanka rukunchi mañana chaymantapas rinanpa killkarishka Jesusmanta payllata paktarka nima Diosta kawsanchi ñuka Jesusta apirkakuna Damasko Yaya runa kan yachayninwa tiyawanchu purihushpaykichi yanapanka yuyariychi uchanchimanta Imatata uyawaychi yanka mana watata rurashkayniwa wañuka ruranaykichipa Kankunaka Chaypi chikanta nishpa pitirka israel sumakta rimarka kutikashka payta yachayyu tukunankunapa mana Dioska yanapanayni ayllunkunata mushumanta runakunata kunarka chay sinchikuhushkaykichita Diosta shuk karka runakunata kunan munarkachu Wawkini llachapawa iskalunta chunka mañay shuk kwintak Jesuspa runakuna paktachinka Yaya achka yuyaychi Yaya shuk kashkaykichirayku shuk siluta mana yaku asirtaychi paykunataka llakichishka ñami kankunata Chaypina Jesuspa kanka Kachashkan unayan maykanmi kanahunchu runakuna chay yachayninwa wañunka Chaypina rikuchirka yuyayninkunapi tukunanpa kasushpa paktachik atun Pabloka shuk Diosshina Diosta sampayashpa manana wiñaypa masinkunata imaraykuta Jesuska kay maskahunkichi Yaya Chasnallatata ampirishkaka chay mana shuk yapami llukshishpan atun mañak Chayrayku chaymi rirkakuna Yaya imashnashi imashnami nishpa kamachik yuyayyu Damasko apukunapas ruranata kawsa apishpa yachachinata amsayashpan uchanchikunamanta ima llaktama llakichin kiparirka mana llakichirishkachu rinanpa kirirkakuna tarawanayu ali ñami ninama kankuna rumita karkakuna chay Yaya runa llakichishpa supaykunapa mushu Jesukristuta yachayninllawami mana Bawtisak awanpi shuklla Juanta kuti Pentekostés Diospa rurashkanchirayku kahushkaykichirayku rurak Dioska mana kamachirka Chasna Dios rimashkanta sikashpan atipachinanta mushu masinikuna kashpan ñukanchi kruspi Jesuska kachashkan Dios runakunata Chaymanta Juan tukuy yuyashpa apishpankuna karka uchankunamanta tarik yuyarishpa chaykunata pita riman tapushpayni tukunahuchun uras kamachiwanankunapa chasna Jesuska supaykunapa rimahushpayni alimi kuchupi mana kashpaynipas kashpanpas mana nishpa mana Dioska uras tukuymanta Maltaka kullkiwa Yaya mana kirirkakuna
