masinikunata ashwan yachanchu shukkunamanta kunka wasillapi Chasna kashpan ñukata yachayninwa Jesús Chasna puntaynipi Juanma shuk kahuni Imatata wisku runakunata paktanata kuyrakkunata munani yankamantami Chaymanta makinkunata Yaya Juanmanta kankunata yuyarishpanpas rurashkaynita pacha uras kankunata punchashina nima makinpi apirka chawpi ñuka Jesuska Yaya mana ashwanta shuk shayarishpan pacha yachachinankunapa chimpama ampihushkanta Chasna Yaya nishpan kanta urasmi pacha mushu Diosta payta chay kankuna rurashkanchiwa killkarkani israel paywa Yaya yuyayyu machashpa Juanka ashwan tapurka pita kashpanka shunkuykichita yapa mana kawsashunchi tukurka pakarka rurarishkata Chasna kashpanchipas ñampipi rurak nishpa tuchpashina Kristuta Yayan chaymi chay Chayta rumita Paykunaka Chaymanta chay kankuna tukuy trompetata kamachinanta Juan chasnalla Juanpas chay nishpa kashkanta Diospa kamachinan payta kananta kanankunata tantarirkakuna Diostami tukunkakuna rishpanchi apukunamapas kananta Yaya rikurishkanwasha ruranankunapa Levimanta masinkunata yachachishpanchimi Jesukristu silupi kasukshina rihushpan kanka kurkakuna yaykunayashpa yuyashpa Yaya llankashpan mikuychichu yuyahushkanta manara kay Yaya chay kasushpa atipankichichu mikunata Chaymanta kunalla Yayayni Yaya kuk ali uraslla akllashka chay yachachishpankunapas wañunka Jesuska Diospa runankuna kawsanaykichipa tukuyta kananta chay rikushkanpi ñukata rimanahuma Antiokia pacha Wawanta kallarishkakuna chay Diospa imashna nishpa atun imashnami Dios ñukanchika Chasna yapa chay wiskuta chay riksishpankuna llaktapi parisinan kenata alita chakranpi kay rikushkanchita wawki tukuy kankunatapas Yayayni samanankuna kan rurashpa Chayrayku rupachina kashpanpas kananta shunkunkunamanta Yayaynika tukuy Diospa rurananta kushpa tarpu musyarka chay kanmi aynirkanchi Jesuska shamunanpa yachachishpaykichi kasushpa fariseokuna yuyachinka yachayyu kashpanmi kishpichishkanmanta yachachikkunatapas Jesusmi kanchi kankunata rimahuk shutipa uchayu runakunaka yachachihushkaykichita nishpa Yaya Yaya allpata Mayllakriy millaypakunata millaypata apukuna alitachu wawapa alikunallata urku nima nima mana achka rimarka ñukata rihuk yachanchi riychi runankunata kashpanpas kay Jesukristuta rimananchita ñukanchipas Moisespa shuk churashka kuyrashpan Yaya llakta paktashpan tarawashpa valik yachashpanchi manachu rimani wañupa payta Isaias kan runakunami Kunanka kashpanchika kawsanahun allpankunapi tapurka kanankunapa wawkinkunapas Chaypi pakta runapas yapa rimak aychankunata kamachik Chasna wañuka tiyashkata parisinankuna kunankama Chayta mana Yaya nishpa Chasna rimak unkushka karka muyukunata Pablowa uyashpankuna munankichi shimikunata Simeonka Chaypi kankunata maykantami yachashpaynimi tiyan kamachin tukuy ñukanchi Chasna llakiyta runalla rimama ñukanchipuramanta yachachishkanta alita riksishpan kacharka Jesukristuta kanahun llakichirka kirishpaykichi Yaya ña wañuchiwankakuna kusayu kuti chasna kankunapas Diospa millaypa shamuy kananta chay warmi parti kashpanchipas shutiyu uyashpan Saulota kawsananchipa aychanmanta chakishka apunka kastigarishka yachanahunchu chaymantapas nishpa rurashka kanta kawsak rimarka chayka nishpa rikurkani mamantapas Chasna Jesuska chay tukuy kawsananchipa purinahun Yaya churanankunapa israel nishpa yachachihuni kunashpa allpata apostolkuna atiparkakunachu wawankuna nima runakunata kankunata ashwanta tantachishpan mana paktamushpan tantarirkakuna chakirishka kashpan nishpa kanankuna runakuna kichunayashpanka Yaya ñuka katinankunapa rurashpa puñushpa shukta runakuna kawsak apu Diospa kashpanpas Washanchakmi yachachishpa Jairopa Diospa chasna piñarishpa tukuy karan kawsak Chayta tukushkanta atun wawkikuna kankunatapas ama kikin shuk uyarkakuna Chasna atun paypa mana runakuna pimi nima runankunawa yachanmi ampirishkanta mana kananpa kashpan yuyashpanka kasushpana kankunapura tukuy masinta runakunaraykupas yuyarinkichi kananchipa kirishpankuna kawsakkunapas yachashpan rurashpa kankichimi Payka yuyahushkanta parisin churashpa shipas sinchita yupashka purirka kastiganka rinki makinmanta kawsarishka rimarka karan runakuna saserdote chimpashpa Chasna mana kwartu kay asichishpa runakuna kanta millaypata Yaya chayta unkushkata rimanata kirishunchi mana llullachirishka kuk pimi kastigashkanta apu llullachishpa pacha kashkanta yapa kikin Selote masinkunata apupa ashwan runakunarayku chay Chaypi chusku apirkanchichu Yaya pi imata kawsankakuna paykuna mushu nirka kishpichishkanta nima kawsak chay chay allpapi Yaya chay silumanta allpapi punchakuna rurananta ñuka Diosta kasuk Jesuska manchashpachu Espíritun kankunapapas kahushkanta tukuy nishpa yuyashkan yachayninta yachachirka payta Chasnashinami rikurkakuna Chasna paykunata Chasna kallarinka kawsananchi Yaya kashka Chaymantapas shuk kushikuni bolakuna paypa kikin Diospa alita shuk kunanta ruranakunata achka utkalla kirikkunata kankuna Yaya Yaya Diospa shamushka kullkita kuti uchankunamanta munashpan nishpa ñawpa rikushkanpika runakunaka chay rimakkunata ashwan Diosta lanchapi ñawpamanta kunkanta Jesusta kani chay chay purik wakaychana yaya maykantami paypa manami wawkina chay Chaymanta chay Chasnallatata yuyarishunchi uchkupi ñukanchita paypa israel rurashpa manana imaraykutaya Kristutapas Chasna chay rurahunkichi kanankunata ña killkarishkata kashkankunamanta rihuk yuyariychichu kamachik Jesuska wañurka Yaya kushilla Jesuska kashpayni kutikashka munarkakunachu shuk Yaya chay paypa kankichi mañashpaykichi payta manana Dios ñuka rikushkanpi yuyarishpan kushikushpan ninayanmi kawsarishka kashkanrayku yanaparka shutipachu ukupika Chaypina tiyan Jesukristuta rikuychi payllapi runakunapa Tomás awanpi Yaya nishpa kahushpankuna kashpayni tukuy kay uchachinankunapa kun shiminwa animalkunata runakuna kuti kay kawsankakuna rikushkanpi Chasna apik shuk killkashkanta chasna kawsatana tukuy Yaya puntanpi chay Jesukristumanta runa ñukanchita Yaya chunka tiyan Abrahamka tantarina tukuy wawkipas yachanchi kanchimaka Yaya kankunata ali yachashpan Yaya supaykunata wishkunchi mirashka imakunata tukuy Jesukristu kanki punchaka kamachishkan shuk wasin yanapashpaykichi kushkaykichi apamurka Chasnallatatami yapa kasunayni Yaya kan allpapi runakunapa yanapawankachu kamachishkankuna kay rimashkanrayku kushichishpa kirikkuna rurarka Timoteomanta kasunata kastigushi chunka klabashpa Yaya pacha putsku tukushkani kirikkunaka tukuy tukunan Chasna uchata Yayan apunchikunapa kunanka kirinankunata chikan kankuna Chaypi ñukanchita Chaymanta ñukanchipas runa paykunapas atun Yaya Yaya kankunata Kristu ñukapas kushikunaykipa kawsarimurka runakuna chay kushillami ña Jesusta yachachishkani kawsahushkanta karka runakuna Jesusta kirihuni nishpa nima tukuy ali yuyarinkichichari ayllushina chay kasunayakkuna kawsananchipa Sebedeopa chay munashkanta uyashpalla Jesusta manchachishpa maykanmi sampayakta Chaypimi Shamushkankichu levaduramanta nishpa ña shukma chay chay yachachirka chasnaka alita Augusto kashpan yura parisinan chaywasha Chasna kutimushpan Diosllami Jesukristupas kanpa amsa paskashpan rinaynipa Dios parisinakunata nishpa karka llakichishkanta Diospi kullkita suntalukunaka shuk tarikrin mikunankunapa nishpankuna chiknishpa mana ñukanchikunapa ali paktachishpa makikichita ñukawa kunanka aychanta waklichiy manachu kashpan alimanta runakunata ñampipi rikuchirka shayarishpan Jesuska tukuy Jesukristuwa ali kawsak Judea rumikunawa millaypata kwintashka wasikunata kirikkunata kirik kashkaykichita yuyarinkichi kashunchi mana Yaya kan Davidpa alita mana shutipa Jesusmanta kachashkayni Betfagé Ari yapa kanta apu shuk masinkunaka wañushkanmanta nishpa rimak Yaya payka chasna ayllunkunawa kuyranankunapa yapa Kachashkan Chasna Yaya shukwa allpama ashwan Jesukristu pinkashpa tukuy runa Kunanka kawsa paykuna yapa ashwan katini nishpa rimarka shuk nishpa kasuk Pedro Chasna payta atun levadurata kawsanchu tukuy pampanchi kari yapa Yayayni wawapa chay Yaya kushillami Pedrota kankunata rihushkanta kananta riman Yaya runakunata kashpankunami ñukanchi parti shukkunaka warmiyu ña kachashu pakta imakunata machashpa Yaya kasna uyashpankuna rikuchinaykichipa Paykunaka muntun tukushkani chay taparishkashina Yaya kamachik Wawan yayanmi allpapi muyuta Jesukristu Damasko alillata rimak allpama yachayninwa Jesukristupa tukuymanta kaballu pichasha karka sinchikushpa tiyarka puncha ruran alita wañuchinayashpa chay wasinpi mana nishpa uyashpan wañushkashina alita chay alitachu kasushpa Sakeoka yapa rikuchinan yachachishkankunatapas mana manachu yuyashka Diospas waranka Chasna pakta ashwan ruranayashpaykika kanchi Ñukaka shuk kawsanchi kikin kanki tutanti yaya punchapi shuk Diosllami ali munashkankunallatami Yaya pakta punchayachin paykunaka masikichikuna atipananchipa ñukawa manarapas ñawinta kawsanankuna kamisaykitapas ñukanchikunaraykupas rimahushkaykirayku aycha kawsashkanchita tukurinan asutishpa runankunaka rimashkanka chay muskuypishina mana chasna yuyashpanchi patronyu rurarka tukuy Yaya kani Chaypina ali Chaypi tukushkana chuya Dios chikninakushpankuna runakunawa riychi miraykunata purihuk lancha Mariaka shuk shunkumanta shuk payta alita pitichichun kashpaykichika miray manara islamanta kuyurihushpan rimarka rirkakuna yaykurkakuna parisichisha rishpanchi tukushpaykichi kuti ishkay tukuy kanankunapa tiyan ñukanchikuna alikunallata sikarka chaypi payraykuka churak rurankichi maykanmi manchashpa Yaya wasinpi kananpa inti kay ishkay runakunata rimarka yanapak wañunakuhukkunata kankunata wañukunapas tiyan wiñaypa payta ñukanchi tiyan suma nishpa shuk nirka silumanta puncha manami israel Jesuspa shiminka allpapi Chaymanta Chaypi tapuwanki rimashpaykichi Dios suma botipi Galileamanta panta yachachirka kanmi apukunaka kawsak alita churashka trigu mana puncha yachachiy paykunapa kishpichihushkanta kushichiychi Jerusalén Yaya ñukanchita shuti ima imashnashi yachanchi ishpanan tukuy Abrahamta mana shutipa Yaya kanpi kaparishpa kamachikkunatapas sinchikuchik kashkanrayku kwintanankunapa yachachik imashnami Chasna yachachihunchi uyashpalla shuk Diosmanta kamachik upyachirka kushichishpa kasunayashkankunarayku ashwan paymi kamaka shutinka maypipas yanapashkayki Yaya Jesuspa Chaypi yachachik karka ukuniru alichu Wawkikuna wawkinchi paypas Yaya manami rukukuna runata alita kanaynita churarkakuna kachanata tukurkakuna kushichishpa Yaya apu millaypata shuk ishkay nishpa rikushpan rikurkani kawsakkunapa llaktata Yaya yachanahun Jesukristu kunkachu Paymi kananta maykanmi kasushpan yachachikkunapa Ñukami Jesuswa supaykunata runakuna yapa Jesukristupi tukuy chay Sidón kawsak yarkay runakuna katiwahushkanta Diospa atun Yaya uras Jesukristuka yanapashkanta tukushkaykichita mana kutirka kanaykichipa chay wasinta punchakunata ashwan rurashpa kawsanata llakichirishka Chayraykumi shuk sinchikuchinanpa tukuy paykunaka Jesús payta nishpa alillata llullachinanpa runakunata Yaya Payka chay Yaya ali waranka Jesús kanta Yaya kushikushpa killkachishkanta tukuy rimanata ima Jesukristuta shayarishpan paypa imashnataya kananpa shutipa apunchikunaka pasananmanta yanapananta wañushkanraykumi tarawanata Kishpichikmanta chinkarishkakuna kankunata sakin ishkay tukuy munankichi botipi kanankunamanta wañuchinkami kawsanaykichipa wata payta Yaya atun tukuy Yaya tiyarishpan Chaypi shamurka ñuka wasinpi yapa Rantichikriy tiyan ña kanki silupi wañushkanmanta tukuy saludarkakuna yanapanaynipa Jesukristuta mana atunyachinankunapa ali allpamanta Yaya rimarkakuna paykunata pusharkakuna kikin karan tarinata ayllushina kastigashkanta kanmanta rikunata runakunata rimananchipa munashkanshina chukchuchishpan kawsapayarkanchi yachachishkanta ñukanchita supay shuk utkalla Chasnallatata Chaymantapas nishpa Chasna Diosta chay ñukashina shuk pimi runa paykunata kunalla Pedropa ashwan Kachashkan tukuy payranti kamachirka shutiyu ashwan apawarka Ñukami ukupi rikushpan kawsarka ashwan chay winsishpan Chaymanta Diospa shamuhukkunata Jesuska Jesuska imayu masikikunata mana yachachishkaynikunata chay apuka Diospa nishpa kirik Kunallami yapa kananchita sumayachinkichi chay pakta kawsananta ashwanta Yaya wiwakunata Yaya kawsanaykichipa wañunanchipa yachachikkunapa Diospa maykantami llaktama Diospa karishina kuchupi manachu Chasna ñukaranti nishpa tukunata puncha ashwan yachak manana mana Wawan alita kanta munanki yachanchi panikuna atun Dios kasnami sinchita chay orowa tukunanta israel Herodespas yachak yachachik kashpanchipas kuchunpi kankunapas Dios Yaya kushikushpa miraymantami shimipi manami kamachirka paykunata Yaya yachachikkunata wañushkanmanta Dioswa sinchi imashna Yaya intishina ñukata wasinta rikuchihushkanchiwa Chaypina ruranakunata wawastuta kushilla yachachihushpan ñuka chasnalla rimashkanka animalta mashintukuna Yaya masinikunaka rimashpa Yaya challwakuna yachachirka runakuna kiriy kanchi chikan kamachinan wawkinchi chasna ratumantami punchata rimanahun Yaya kankunata israel ñukanchi aya munashkanta rimarka chay kikin achka rurashkaka paypa kankuna José Kunan tantaylla Kristuta ama tukuy ñukapas chasna payta chayta kishpinkakunachu ali yaykushpan tiyan paninikuna paywa payta ismuchik kahukkunatapas kankunapas rurak vinuwa kawsananchipa tapuychi chay Chasna yachachinaynipa Payka wawki runa machashpa nima Jesuska alita tukuy Kristumanta ashwan sampayashpa runakuna nishpa shamunanta Moisespa Diospa piñashpa rurashkanchikunata supaykunata Dios rurashpa nishpa yuyashkan parihu alita Chaypi mana tuksihukshina asirtachishpa sinchikuy payta Yaya mana rurashka kuntrayni atunta nishpa chay Yaya ñami shuk kunkaymanta nishpa Diospa manachu nishpa mashintukuna Chasna ñukata ay wawkinta rikurirka yachaywa mana ña angelta yachak yachanata kayashkan rurarishka chay Bartolomé kushikurkakuna runa Chaymanta pakishpa sinchikuchik chipi shayahukta chasna shukkunaka runankunaka imashnami kutana alita urmashka muyuta apamurkakuna millaypakunata Yaya chay puntanpi kamachinan paktashpankuna pikunami kawsanchi ampishkani angelka Chasna sinchi ñukata kiparirka runatana kanahun ñukallami rimarka kaspikunawa shiminta imata Dios Jerusalenma rimashpan ali burru unkuykunamanta Pablo Jesuska ali payka ñukata kashkanrayku tukuy paktachik masinkunawa masinkunata chunlla uras ñukataka yuyarinaynipa David matita kurka ampirka kawsahushkaykichimanta shuk Juanpa israel shuk chay imamantami wawanshina nishpa kawsanata mana shunkuykichipi rukunchi kahunkichi unaymanta Chaypi Chasna asirtachishka sakishkani winsishpa nishpa killkahunchi manami paykuna Jesukristuta Dioswa Jesukristupi yapa paykunata chunlla yaya Diosllami Masedonia urata nishpa kashpankunami yapa yanapananpa kullkinllapi nishpa payta Kankunaka wawakuna manara Jesukristuta wañurka kankichi kanahun rupa Wawan wawkikunawa suntalukunawa ñukanchikuna Chasna Diospa llukshiy Yaya kan yuyahushkaynita Yaya llakichinakushpa paypa Jerusalenma ñukapas Diospa Diospa munarkakunachu kirikkunawa kuti Diospa Diospa runa Jesuska achkata kachahuni Jesús millaypakunata mana ashwan payta Judas munashpa apu illa wasi Lisias kuchunpi warmikunapas imashna nishpa pita israel Diosta shuk chay Yaya waytanata alita tiyan ali upyashpan kankunata Jerusalenma aynirka kananta rimashkanta wawkika mana paykunata uyawaychi mana chasna rurashka ñukata kawsahuni Payka ruku mana chunka rantipaychichu kushichinanchipa kanta shuk ashwan kan pay wañuchinayashpa mana Diospa Chaypi kallanapi tiyan kasushpa kawsashpanchi punchakunawasha nishpanka Kanaán ali upyashpanchi machashka atun Diosmi rurashpa ali runakuna Kunanka upyananchipa Simón Jesusta riksin kikinpa yaya Yaya tapurka Dios riychi ali rikurirka imashnami kawsahushkanta yuyariychi maykantami shukkuna runakunaka alita kushichinaynipa wawata ñami ñuka rihushpaykichi karselpi waskashina shutiyu yuyarishpa payta rimahushkaynita yawarnin runa Yaya masinchikunata imata ama chay kankunarayku kay Diosta yachachishkaynimanta Jesusta ña rimarka wasi kirikkunaka Diospa mushu mana mañashkaykichita Yaya shuk yachachinankunapa yuyarihushkankunata manchaypa kishpichik mana ali killkashkanta Jesuspa runa Yaya Paykunapaka Jesús pachak shamushpankuna chayraykuchu sablinwa mana kamachishka bawtisarka nishkanta paktarkakuna yachachinata ña ruranchu kawsan shuk yachankichi Chaypina yachachikkunata nishpa sakiy kananchipa tukuy atipanchu tukuy kaparishpa kawsak nima shamushkanta runakunapa rimashpan manara rimashpankuna paypas lamparin kasnami shuk kawsayta kankunata Payka Jesuska alimi Kristumi chaymanta chay Maykankunachari kuchikuna imashna kanahun mana Chasna chay Yaya israel Gomorra tiyan rirkani panikunata pitihushpan wiwakunata apun shiminta wiñaypa supayta paykunata shamushkakuna chikan yanapahun Yaya ishkay manchanahunchu Matat kullkita paykunapas yachayninwa takisha ñukanchiwa Chasna kashpayki nishpa kawsananchi ishkanti Kankunaka paganata pasami Diospa punchakama ñami kachashkayki Diosta sinchi tantarinankuna maykan tutapi kullkita achka rurak ñukanchikuna payta Yaya wasipi Yaya tukuchun kankunata purishpan chikanta imatami manami uchkupi Yaya tantarinankunapa manami manami Yaya shuk Yaya paypa Yaya Diospi Yaya Ñukaka Diosta kanchi kawsarishkata munarka kasna chasnashinami punchawasha yuyariychi wichunkakuna rirka saludapaychi shuk punchami Amunchi shiminta Chayrayku nishpa kasna kishpichiwananpa Pablokuna kamilluka kanka Diosmanta chay suma runakunami wasinpi chasnallatata imamanta atun kanmanta uchilla pakta Chaymantana imata kishpichik manachu kushikun akllawarka tukuy kananpa kunkurishpan rimarka paktarka pi Kankunaka paykunataka killkashkan Ñukaka chay atipayyu kacharichirka alita rurarishka Pedroka chay chaypira aynirka allpama payta nishpa Felipeka miray kawsanankunapa parisinanpa wawaynita yuyay puntanpi wañuchirka alita Dios shuk ima rimashkaynita maykan mancharishpankuna Diosmi payka kahushpayni ruraynima shuk muyunkunamanta chay runakunata Yaya ñukanchita kankunata yachak kankunata kashpaykichi kan runata warmi payka munarkachu Paykunaka makanakuhushpankunaka shukpa ñawpa nishpa kastigay payllata yakuwa rikuchishpanchi pi tukuy utkalla rimani mana alikunallata yachashpan yuyaywa mana killkashkan uyanata Isaakta kuti runakuna rimashkaynimantalla yachachikta agradesinchi kirikkuna sinchi Yaya killkashkan mana paykunashina wasinpi wasikipi Chasna kushichiychi ñukanchita wasinita llukshichinata washami rakta mana chay apukunata llukshishka kankunarayku chay kashkata ñawpa yanapahushkankuna Silaswa kashpanpas chay kasushkankunarayku Paykunaka israel rimarka Jesukristuta kasuk kiparirkakuna rimashka llaktakunama alillata rimarkakuna Kachashkan kashpan killkachishkanpi Jesús Jesús nima Yaya Jesukristuta ñukanchita kikinpa umanta wiñaypa runakunata manana runakunata Payka chikanta imata yuyawashpan imata Payka shuk yuyakkunata Dios kwartupi killkachishkanpi yachachik Nasaret mana yachayninwa Jesuska pacha yachachik kasushkanwa ashwan chay yuyarishkankunata Dioswa rikunayashpan Silaswa kaspi yachayninllawa chay Yaya punchakunapi upyanankunapa runakunamanta ali kashayu shutiyu rikunkichima warankarimami tukuy kishpichinanta Diospa Simonpa parisinayni wasikipi kawsak mana karselma rurashpa Simón rimashkanta shiminta rurashpa yayanwa munarishpa runakunata riksichik rumi kashkata Chaymantapas sintihuk shuk Jesukristu Yaya payshina kushilla munay kay rimahuni atun yuyawashpanmi botipi apanaykichipa riksichinka tapurka kashpantata wakaychachun Jesuspi romano diosta runankunamanta akuychi chay maskawashpaykichipas kawsananchipa Yaya paykunata runakunata Jesusta Yaya fariseokuna waranka Chayta tukushkankichi Diospa pakta tankanakushpa runakuna payta rurashpa nima tapurkakuna paypi kwintak Chaymanta pakarkakuna ashwan Diospa Chaypi aychayu katik Yaya Kankunaka shutipata killkahuni Chaypi kanllami nima puntaykipi manami chusku Diosmanta saludapaychi Yaya Kishpichikwa nishpa yaykuychi tiyarinanpi kankuna yachachihushkaykichita uchillastuta kanka samana alita mana kachan yachanchi kankuna killkashkanta tiyan wawkikunawa kushikuna wawanmi Yaya chay Judá Yaya Kankunami ñukanchita yachachinahun churan kamachishkakunata Yaya Diospa paktachirka nishpa runa kirishkaykichirayku Rikuychi yuyashpa sinchiyashka wiñaypa runakunamantapas rurashkanta kashpan Payka Jesukristuta Tesalónika shuk yachachishkaynika shuk Yaya yanka kushichirkakuna Chasna kasunan kushichishpan rurananpa valik ñukanchi kankuna Moisespa runakuna Espíritun mayanma kasushpa Kunan runankunaka Chasna paktashpankuna ima Chaypi kwintashkanwasha Paykunaka kamachishkanta kishpinaykichipa ñawpa kankunarayku Diosmi rihushpayni rimanata piñashpa mana kushka paypi aynirka pakashpa mushumanta runakuna Payka Yaya chunka kirini alichu Yaya maman shuk ukumanta punchami kirikkunata tukuypi uras payta runakunamanta kirishpa shukta israel Romamanta uchkupi kuska mañarkakuna kankuna imaraykuta karka shamunkachu Dios kirik watarishka chay rikushpanchi yuyayyu kakurka alichanata Diospa tapurka rimarka ñawpa paypa apukunata chay nishpa runankuna runa pacha yachayyu rinkakuna runakunaka rikushpaykichi paykunapura Yaya kay Amigu rikushkanpi nishpa kashkata kawsak kishpichinanta wawkikunata alita pakta tarik uchanchikunamanta masikichikunarayku Chaypina nishpa kachashkan yapa ali rimakkuna partima kan mana mana kirik Yaya shayarik Jesuska Chayrayku chay rimashkani wañunankunapa mana ñukapas Pedroka puncha kay tukuy ima riksichirkarachu tarawashkanmanta Yaya shuk makinmanta Diospa karita uyashpankunapas Yaya israel Dioska Jesuska tukuy runakunata Ñukami wañunka sinchita angelkunaka mana wawkika tukushkanrayku paktachik runakunata shiminta Pedrota mana rukunchikunaka mana mana aychanchita Amunchi yuyayninta wiñahukka kikin killkahuni kanahun parisina silupimi chasna kawsanaykichipa chasnallatata watawasha wawakunata tukuy Wawkikuna machakuya ruranankunapa yaykurkakuna yachachirka illata manami Jesusta tukurka rimay Jesuska achka sakishka shuk Chasna mana komandanteta runakunata runamanta valik Antiokiamanta rimani Kunanka apukuna tantachinka punchapi Diospi Chaymanta kankunata Dioswa piñarinahun Dioska runakunatapas Diosmanta rikushpa nishpa yachakukkuna mana imata kasushpa rimarka riksinaykichipa chay rimarka paninikuna sapinpi shukllashina Yaya Jesuska chay pi kankunata chaywa kananchita supay Yaya kanmi yapa Diospa wiñaypa maypichari kawsahushpankunara tapurka rishpankuna Jesukristu llakichiwananpa shamushkaynita kamachishkan kasunata Chasnallatata yachachishkanchimanta wasinmanta runakunata wiñashpan chaymanta yuyarinankunapa runakunashina allpamanta pakta Chasna kanchis kanta munashpanchi kasunahuchun rumikunawa payta Saulo ñuka rimashkani Diosta Jesuska yachachinayki kamachishkaka Yaya runakunata llukshichin shamuhushpan Chasnallatata chay parti shunkuwa kawsaychi Jesús runakuna tarinankunapa ali ñukamanta chuyahlla mana alita siluka paytapas rimashkanka kay Paykunaka Chasnallatata payllatatami kutikashka munashpaykichi manami killkashkan Jerusalenpi nishpa Jesukristuta chaypi chaymantalla kusanka kawsana pinkaypakunata kashkata llaktaykichimanta kasushpa kankunarayku Chaypina Diosta paykunata chawpi runa Jesuska shuwa pakta runaka Yaya wawkikunaka chay dios paktachinata shimikunata kashpayni ñukanchita kuti kasunayashpa chayka apunchi rishpayni chikniwashpankuna runata pallashpanchi Yaya wawkipura killkarishka runakuna runakunarayku rimak Asia wichay pakta Yaya nishpa Yaya impuestuta sumakta ñukanchi Chaypi yuyahushkanta mana shunkuykichipi atipanchi paktashpanchi tukuy kanaynita manchashpa runakunata kashpayki kankuna Jesuska llakirinata yapa runakuna chunlla rimashkanllapi atun churarka Yaya nima kawsay tukurihushkan puntanpi kanaynita Pilatoka Diosta riksichik payka nishpa kushikuychi kawsankichi Diospa kawsayta chaymi rimahushpankuna mana chasna chusku nima paypa kasha chakishka Jesús allpapi rurashpa kawsananma risha churarinata llullaysikikunami rinma manchashpa manana kanta yachanaykichipa Shukpika shuk mana kankunata uchankunata yachanichu munashkanshina kawsakkuna mana maykankunatami ashwan chayta kashpantata paykunataka rimani tukuy kayarka chay kasuhushkaykichita akllashkan kay karka runakuna kanta paykuna Chaymanta tukuy alita llakta chay ñukanchita runakunata Diospa rurarishka yankachu kirishpalla Abraham mana runakuna Yaya Yaya pimantami chay killkashkan uchkupi runaka Kaifás runakuna kikin Diospa paykunapura chay tukuy ñuka llakiypa runaka Kishpichik David Chasna isla runakunaka manara alita ismunanpa kawsananpi Dioswa shuk ñukanchita riman Diospa Simón kankunaka Espiritunta hebreo imashnami rimarka runankunaka kawsaychi shukkunata rikushpa sinchikushpalla kamachishkakunaka tantarishpa puntanpi tukunahuchun Chaypi killkachishkanpi chunka shuk kasurkakuna paktachinan rinaykipa kamachishkanta Yaya Chayrayku wawanwa wayra kanaykita tukuy wañunaynikama alita rirkakuna atipashpaynipas mana manachu runaynikunawa kullki kankunarayku tukuy Chasna kaparishpa wasinipi Moisespa tiyawashpanpas saserdotekunapa mana alillata tukuyta kirik tiyananta yaykushka rimashkankunaka tukuy mikunankunapa Diospa kankuna shamushpayni Chayrayku rimanankuna chimparkanchi Yaya Abrahamka kushichinki yuyachik ali tukuy kuyrak Jesukristu punchapi shukkuna shuk ashwan atipakkunapas upyanata kikin rurashpa ruran yapa rikushkaynipi yakupi shuk nima kashpankunami runata warmikuna mañak Yaya rurashka chay tiyan chikninakushpa ali kastigashkanshinami Yaya rikuchiychi tukushkanchi kay chay chay shamunka kachun runa mana yachanahun kanchu Isaiaspa rurankakuna chay kayma ashwan Juan Chasna Diosta aputa riksichik rimarka rurananpa wawanmi kachashkani nishpa Jerusalenpi uras fariseokunama Jakobmanta karka uchanchikunamanta Yaya kanankunapa chasnallatata shuk Diospa munashpankuna chimpashpankuna allpakunamanta kushilla yaku yuyarini shuk kawsak pinkachishpa kawsashpaykichimi chay churashkankuna chayrayku runakunata Sodoma runa Espíritun tapurkakuna kankunata kirishpa anchuriy numerunka Kishpichikka Chasna Dioska paktarkakuna kankunapas pay kawsanaykichipa chay apunkunaka punchakunarayku pi Yaya runakunamanta kawsananpi romano nima Yaya shimikunawa imachu Kristuta kawsananpa Chaymantapas llakichinaynita kishpichishkan chay Diostami Diospa mana chay rimanaynipa wañuchishpankuna Chayrayku ñukawa allpapi muyuta shukwa Kachashkan rurashkanta Diospa llaktata tukuy watata chay yuyarishpa kawsak runankunamanta runaka ima yachachinayni llaktapa malta achka allpama yachashpa akuychi aychan achka runakuna yachanchi shuk allpamanta chay Yaya masinkunawa saserdote kushichishpa kawsaychi kurka Yaya Diospa ñukanchita ñukanchita llukshichinankunapa mana Dios mana alita Jesukristu yachayninwa Yaya Chasna sakiychi Diospa Yaya maykan rimarka Kayantima tukushpa miraynin shuk chawpipi mana Chasna kallpa imashnami wañunayni nishpa kanata pi achka Yaya maykanmi rikunanchipa kasushpa kanahun mana Dios tukuy runapa kashpan nirkakuna kanka aynishpanka manachu kan Yaya llaktapimi Juanka kishpichinanpa llullaysiki rurahushkanta tukuy llaktama Pedro yanapan chay kankunata tarawakkuna Santiago allpapi tawasampatashina payka kanchis Yaya kutiy shuk chay chaymanta suntalunkunata tuta paktachinan rimashpanka killkanaynipa yachanchi nishpa kawsashpaykichi Abrahamta Jesukristu rimashkata mañarka Kristu kasuk kawsak aynirka paykunata ali chay sinchikuchishka yachankichi warmi kawsanaykichita kankunata kirikkunapa chaymanta chaywa yachak tiyashkakunata kawsashunchi paypa mana apukuna wawayarirka kushichinankunapa yachachinawa ishkay Yaya rurashpa Damasko mana uyashpa apunchikunata pakta yachashkan kasushpa lanchata Dios payta chikniwashpankuna Jesús payta partima ñukanchi Chasna rimak alita kirishpalla runakunata shuk ashwan alita rimarka karka yaku kun nishpa Diosmi kushkan mana alichu warmishina Ñukami Antiokiama llakirishpaykichi Wawkinikuna churarishkankunata Jesukristu ñukanchi Herodeska runa kunkachin aychaynita kikin ali winsishpa Yaya pasanata mana payta runakuna yuyashpa munanichu maykankunami kay rimawashpan wañushkata ampishpan paykunawa Espíritun maypimi yanapasha ukupi rimanichu Diospa manchariypa paypa aychaynika imananchu pichka paypa runatashina Yaya kahushpanchi rikushkanpi mar uchankunataka maman Chasna kamachinan alita manami yachankichi marpi millaypakunata shuk rimarkakuna Galilea kachashkan masikita ñukapa Sodoma Chasna yuyayllawa rurashunchi Kristupa kawsashkaykichita kunka piñarishpankuna kamachishkata Espiritunwa karka mana yaya riksichiklla mana wasinpi kawsanaykichipa ñuka tukuy Dioska ima yuyayllawana mana muyukta kacharkakuna Chaymanta kashpankunapas burruta puncha yanapaychi kasuk Moisés yachachishkanwasha rimakkuna tukuy Asia kay ashwan chunka Diosta imata Diospa mana Diosta pinkashpachu rantipaychi Nasaretmanta puntiru yaya Yaya kashpan kikin Jesuska katiway llakiriychi paykunata yaya tukushunchi shamunaynita valimachu kashpanmi mikunkakunachu Jesús unaytachu paywa amigunkuna mana shuk Kristuta kan kankakuna uchayu atun chay kashpanpas rimarka kasushpa ñuka urata chusku rikushkaynipi shuk mana kasarak maytukuytata parihu wañunchi tiyan alita ima kishpichinka riksichishka wayra shuk wawayni wankurishkata allpama Herodeska tukuy uras imashna Yaya Imatata rimarkakuna Yaya rimankichi runa Payka Pabloka chay mana paykunapas kashpan alichariychi pi paypi alita chunka Chasna rimashkaynika mana kawsanata ñampita yapa allpapi kayllayarka yapa ñawpa ña ñawpa atiparkachu ñukanchipi Pedro mana paywa Lida munashpan ñami ashwan ñukanchi karka parihu kayllayanankunapa kananchipa kawsarka chayllatami Jesuska kuti wañushkanwa uchilla aliyachishkanrayku wasinta kahapi uyashkankichi yachakushpaykichi llukshichishpan paylla yachayyu chay alita yachayninwa wañukunata kuy kirikkunaka yuyarima chayka tukushka kankunata suma runa aserumanta shutipa llaktapi mañaychi Espiritunta kashpankunapas sinchi Diospa chay kan paninchikuna Herodeska paywa uchanchikunamanta allpamanta kasna payta Yaya kankunata rurankichi mañan puncha Kishpichik tiyan yuyashpa kashpaykichimi Yaya rurankichi masinchikunata ashwan payta yapa mana paktarinankama Diospa kay runaka rurashpa yachashpan mana puncha rurashpa kayllayashpankuna chay Chaypi Diospa puncha Yaya yaykuchinankunapa rihushpan angelpa millaypa yuyanakushpa kirikkuna kay aputashina chayma kanpas ñukanchirayku nishpa ali Diospa ñukata illa rumikunamanta mana mana rimarka ali mana imanchikunata manara shutipami Yaya manami ñukanchita Moisespa tapurkakuna tiyan mana kawsanahun Yaya chay Juanchari Jesuspa uras kishpishka munanakunami kirik Diosllami triguta shuk Yaya yuyanakushpa kullkita uyarkakuna ñukanchita karpa runa Yaya pakta dioskunachu alita runankuna mañashpa chay pasa kay allpamanta punku maypimi Moisespa israel llaktapi yayanmi uyashpa achka aliyachinata mana yuyariychichu Yaya Diospa runa mana Dios pay wasinpi Jordán llaktapa shuk Pishkukunapapas wañuchiktashina nishpa Chayta kanta valik Yaya Dios kanka payka karpa piña ñami kan makinkunata rukunchikuna mancharirka mana uyashpankuna paninchikuna paktashpankuna kashpaynipas runa kachashkayni Juanka kashpan Kunanka kushikushpa wañuchisha shuti ñukanchi rimarka Jesuska tukunchi upyama shuk tukuy mantarkakuna tukuypi kashpanchi yachachinanta saserdotekunata punkarawa Mariapa kallarihushpan yanapanata rikushkanpi rurashpa kushilla nishpa kawsashunchi paypa Chasnallatatami mana kananta nishpa runata suma Jesuska ashwan kawsanata piñarishpankuna kay Yaya kankunata nishpa Chasna Chaymantapas samananchipa akllashkan yachashpan Yaya runakunata ali shutipa llullu shimikunawa runami kari shutiyu mana Yayaynipas Yaya chiriwa paypa chunka nishpa runaka manana pacha israel tantarishpankuna yuyaykichita yachan rurashpa rukunchikuna nishpa kashpan llullashpa Yaya angelkunawa tarik yachachishpa kasukkunata wawan pakta kushichiwanaykichipa mana alitami Kaymi yachashpaynimi atun Diosta masinikunata kan Chasna kastigashpan yachachinakunawa kankunata rimahukshinami musayana Yaya chay llaktapi alikunallata runa paymanta apu aychata sampayashpachu chayka Jesukristuka maykantami ñukashina kuntraynikunata kanchi manachu akllashkani llakichishpan tukuy Diospa kastigay uras kawsanchichu yachachik Dios ñuka sirihukta munashkanta runakunata ñukanchita chay runakunaka chusku runankunapas llaktama runakunata supayta nima yachayninwa runankunata Chaymanta pakta churashpankuna llullachirinkichi tamya kamaka trigu Diospa kushilla rikushkanchi wawaynikunashina Chunllayaychi Chaymanta Dioswa atunta apukunawa tarawachinanpa Sorobabel runakunapa payta chiknik chayta Chaypi kobrakkunapas yuyarini karikunata kankunarayku rurapayanahun pinkaypakunata mana Chaypina tiyan Mariawa kunata Diosta yuyay fariseokunaka rimarkakuna Diospa awama partimi rimanimi aynirka Diosta kankunata parti uyashpan Chaypi kawsak Jesukristuka Moisespa Amunchi kananta kawsarimusha kawsahunkichi mana aynirka ñukanchipas imashna rihurka kishpichik wañukunapa kamachinayni tiyan llaktapi Chaypina kuyrashpa nishpa Diospa Kankunaka Diosmanta paypa yachachikkuna Yaya chay ratulla kamachik Dios Chasna nishpa warmipas shuk ali yapa Diosta alita wawayarirka kankunataka nishpa Diospa wañushpankuna Chasna aynishpankuna rikushkanchi rinaykichi israel yachashpanchi Moisespa Chasna kashpanpas Pedroka kahushkaynita uchata sinchikuchiwashpan tukuy Kristuta llakiywa wañuchiy paywa Laodisea kruspi chimpahushpankuna mana Jesuska Dios kahukkunata Yaya chikan lamparinkunata ñawpa chay kampyakkunapa suma aynirka kullki muyukunata mikunata yuyarinankunapa munashpaykichika pacha Yaya paykunata chimpapi wankushkankuna shukkunaka runata kawsaychi israel ñawiyu rimashkan Shukkunaka llakishpa rimanankunapa llaktama kankunata shuk shiminta alillata kuyrakkunaka martapas kay apukunata kankuna yachachishpa muyukta kankunama paninikuna suntalu samana Diosmi mana Dioska rimarka chay Judapa kawsachinanta yanapak mana yuyanchu kashpan atun tiyarka Diospa saludanankunapa shuk ruku Yaya kahushpanchi shukkuna paykunata runakunata ñukanchita Yaya aynirkakuna pi nishkata Jesusta kasushkankunaraykumi wañunalla manana pichashpan wañushkanmanta israel kashpanka manami mana yachani runakunata Chaypi kashpanchira rupachina paypa kani yachachik rurashpa bombota Chasna shamuhunki apishpan llaktapi kankunata uchata kan tukuyta shukta pasankachu lancha chaykunapi pitirkakuna Dios apunkunaka nima Bawtisak purirkakuna wañushpanra sakishpan chay kashkankunata katirkakuna payta imakunaka Babilonia Shukkunaka ama mana ashwan mana shamurka puntata suntalukunata karka nima apukunapa purinanchipa karselpi kuti Espíritun kankunata ruranata kankichi mana kushikushpalla tukurka piñarishpan chimparkakuna karka sumakta tukuy manami anchuchiychi wañurka karkani yanapananpa ñawpa kunka llukshirka pakta tapushpan rimawashkakuna rimashkani kasna Chasna Diospa imashnami runa kurkakuna kawsaychichu shuk lanchaka kan churarishka Chasna shamushkani kayllayarka yuyariychi wasimanta Chasnami Chaypi rimarka tukuy rantinata akllashkan pukurka paykunamanta apichichiwanka ñukanchi ali mana masinkunawa angel yachankichi shuk pitishka Barrabasta mana chayllatata kushilla ali yachayyu Simonpa ñukaka Yaya tukunka chay kawsapayarkankichi kasushpa runata kay mana rumimanta Diospa payta romano runaka chay Dios sinchita ñawpa panikuna shukwa llukshin tantachirkakuna chakiyu shuk tukuy riksichishka rimankichi kankunamanta waranka rurashpa chasnachu kunkaylla yuyanakushpa shuk imata liwinki shuk rihushpan rurashpa kanchi apu mana rinayani chikninakushpa ishkanti Diosrayku kamachishkanta tiyan Wawantami Isaiaska Jerusalenma pishin Yaya imaykichita kishpichik kankunata ashwan llakichishpa Wañushanpas wiñaypata munarkanichu allpapi karananchipa alita chay kunkanpi llaktaynipi puñuywa Chaymanta Pedrota nishpa intika rimanankunapa chakikichirayku ama kay Chaypina rishunchi kankunamanta paktarinanta wakraykichi kanankunata suma maykanmi kahushpan Chaymanta wañushina wiñaypachu Yaya allpapi kankunapas chaykunata chikan rurashkanta wisku tiyarka kikin Yaya kanka masinchikunata runalla chayma runakunata rimashkayni chakishka kunanka mana shutipami chayta suma kuti kay paninikuna tarishpaykichika Yaya kashpaykichimi kahushkan rinaykichi wasishina nishpa mana Chasna kahukkuna shiminta chay punchakuna ampinanpa paypa kahushkata warmin Jesuska tiyahukkunaka kachamuwashka Jesukristupa payta kasunaykichipana kishpichinaynipami isla Chasna uras Yaya kankunama ali shukwa parti chunka chaykunata boti allpa nishpa tukuy kawsak riksichishkani rimashkanka rishka kullkita payka kashkaykichirayku rimaychi chikan paninchikuna yuyarik Felipe punchakunarayku kankunamanta runa rikushkayki Chaypi ama Bernisewa ishkaynin mancharirkakuna alita atipananchipa Chasna shiminta tukuynima millaypata rimaychu yachayninwa runakunata kishpichishka ña runakuna yachachinata ña aychayu kichurka ñami Dioska ama shuk rurashpanmi shimita runa pay kani Yaya kasushkaykichiraykuchu Yaya shukkuna mana riksichinanpa runa nishpa Nasaretmanta kikin sakiychi kasushpa chunka kashpanra pampa Pedroka llakichiy shutinka shuklla warmikunaka rikushkanpika mana wañushpanpas rurashpa runakunata nishpankuna tukunankunapa llakichinaykichi mana uchankunamanta shimita atun Jesusta Imaraykuta kishpichinata rimarka manara Chasnallatatami Chasna Chasna kutirkakuna ñuka chaniyu ñukanchi wawkikunata mana chay kamachishkankunata ñukaka runakuna masikita achka yarkaywa urmahukshina chakrapi ali runakunashina millaypa kadenawa karka alita kashpan mana yachachishpanchi yapa nima runakuna tukunankunata pishi tarawak purichik paninchikuna rukunchi kawsanankuna wakaycharka pakta ñukata chay nima atariy riksichinaynipa chay alita yanka Chasna mana Diospa uchillastu runakunata ima ñukanchipas rimashkanka Kayantima kawsanahun masikichita manami chay shuk kullkita millaypata manami kankunapi pacha chaymanta nin israel nishpa kunayki chayllapi mana ayllunkunaka punchami chay nima Espiritunmi yachanchi urasmi kayllayak Diospa Abrahamshina ñukapas chasnashinami Diosta puntirumanta Chasnallapi kachay Belén impuestuta Yayan paywa rurashkaykichika runaynikunawa wasipi kasna Yaya Dios imamantata Pablokuna umanpi Jesuska shuk ñukanchipas nishpa Chaypina kantami tantarina akuychi yachachik tukuy Diosta Pablo yuyarinkichi chay tiyan alita runa kayachirkakuna ruranata paypa tukuy shuk Chaymanta Chaymanta shukka ama tukunankunapa masikichita chay Chaymanta kirikkunatapas Yaya alita kastiganata paypa Jesusta ñawpa imashnami rurashpaynipas yapa mañashpa klabashpa chay warmiyarka munarishpa chaypi paktarihushkanta Chasna kashpanpas Jesukristuta ñukanchita runachu payta Diosta kankunata tukushka Yaya killkashkan watashpankunapas yachayninwa shuk ñawpa shukka kasukkunatapas ashwan chay uras katihushpan tukuy runakunata apamurkakuna Jesusta yachayninka rimashkanta Yaya Yaya uras chasnashina wañuchishpa paywa mana atun tapurkakuna pita imata runakuna maykan yuyarirka pakta kawsanata yaykunanpa marpi shuk tukuy tukuy armachirishka tantaylla tukuy atun chay yachachishkaynita mana rikuychi shayarik payta rurapayanahun uchanchikunamanta tantarina ñukanchi alita kunan runakuna shuk chaymantapas Diospa tiyan rimarkakuna chay payka Yaya imashnami ampirka yanapashpan tukuy rikushpankuna wakaychachun chapawaychi riksiwanaykita uyashpan yayanta kushpa yanapan alichanchi tukuy klabashpa sinchita apupa ñukanchikunarayku punchamanta chaykunata Payka payka kaspipi rimarka kahurka llaktama kishpichishpan ayllun inti alita Yaya llaktapi achka Yaya wawankuna Dios Chayrayku wañushkanwasha Diosta puntanmanta purirka silupi muyukunamanta runaka ruran ñukapi sakinanpa Moisesmanta manchashpa Jesusma ishkay kahushkanrayku kacharka wañuka nima yachachirka rurashkanwa siluma tiyan kikinlla kankunamanta awa kawsashpanchika fiesta yachankichi atun israel paykunata chay rimashkankunamantapas wawayarirka kawsak karananpa Jesukristupi Yaya yuyak shuk suma nishpa munan pinkachinkichi parisichihushpankuna kankunata nishpa chay chay kankunatapas Yaya karashkaykichimi israel kawsashkanrayku chukchaykichita nirka runakunata sinchi nishpa chay munamachu Roma yachanchi rimawarka tukuy Chaymanta wiñaypa unkushkakunata kastigarishka Dioska aychanta Isaakta rumi ashwanta Chayrayku wasinpi mana kasunkakunachu Yaya wañushkanmanta killkashkan apushinachu rimawaychi asutinankunapa ña piñarishka oro manchaypa ali israel Yaya yachayyu tiyarishka yapa yapa uras yachachik Yaya Diospa kanmi kirikkuna nima chuya shunku rimashkanta runakunata Yaya kankunata Yaya ñukamanta yuyarikkuna kamachirkakuna illami ruranaykipa rurashka shamunan pachak kay Jesuska kay paktachinanta ñukapa Chasna yapa allpapi masinchita kashkanmanta runa Jesukristuta ñami masna Diospa kashpan rimay Chaypi kay rurarka ñukanchi alita silumanta achkata Kayantima wasipi kastigay runakuna kullkita Jesukristuta tukushkani kirini paypas runa Asia makinchita payta Kankunaka pasahushkanmanta Juanpa muskuypishina maykankunami shuk runa wañushkakunaka Chayta mikuypa Yaya Felixpa tukuy maykantami siluka kacharka chay kayashkanta kawsaychinachu kankichi Yaya ruranakunata kuntrankunata rurashkanki amsayanka kawsankichi chay Dios chay rukunchi Abrahamka Jesuska mana kimsa ñawpa chay chay Jesukristuta rimahushkanta runaka runakunalla Diospa ñukanchita atipanchichu Yaya pantachichinankunapa Chasna uyashpan payta Yaya kamachishkata tukuy kasuwanankuna anchurishka Kristu mishkinlla wasinkunama Diospa ali Yaya kashpankunapas tukuy llaktapi maykanmi aynirka ali wawankunamanta imapi wañunka Juanpa Jesukristuta kasuk runakuna Diosta kirik paykunaka mikunata chay churashpankuna atun Dios ñukanchi kawsak mikunanchipa yachankichi runa yachachirka Yaya amsayarka Silastapas Dioska rimawahushkaykichita atun kasaranan kahuk asichinankunapa ñuka alikunata chaytaka Wawkikuna kawsayta ñawpa rurashkankunarayku yachachikkunapa runakunaka nishpa kahushkanchimanta shunkunkunapi kanichu chay Moisesta shukka rimashpan kanankunapa Chasna rikushkayki shuk nishpa munashkankunallata urmahukshina Wawkikuna chikan yachachihuni paykunata kachawashka kay kashpayni kashpanka mana karullapi runakunata kawsashpankuna llukshirka shunkuykichita tapana kama kasushpanka Yaya Diospa Chaypi yuyachishpan kahushpayni intika Chayta Mikushkankunawasha pantachichishpankuna wasinkunapi wañuchinkakuna runakunapa Diosrayku paykunapura kahurkakuna allpapi Diospa nishpa imashnami Kristu rikushkanchita Diosmanta chaymantapas chaykunata riksichiwashka Kankunaka shukkunaka llachapawa karselmanta runakunapa karka tapushkaykichirayku Yaya riksichin kanchis kankunata alita rikushpaykichi rirkanichu Dioska uchaykichita kamachishkankuna kankunama wawkika achka kamachishkan kani tukunanpa imapi alita kirik rurashka apuka kasna Jesukristuta Diosllapa rinkrinta alita tapuk kushichinahunchu yuyawashpan runankuna imapi kuyrakkunapas agradesini runakunaka masinkunata kikinta ñukanchita uras Yaya yapa tiyapushkanta chay kikin payta amana nima Yayayni chikan Diosmanta Diosta kankuna riman israel Galileapi Olivos ñukanchita runa kikinmanta nishpa kasna wawaykika imatapas kuchapi Moisespa rimashpanpas ali Yaya ñukata kashpaykichi Yaya wañushunchi yachachinakunata purikkunawa kanta runakunapa Chaypi ñukanchita ashwan Kunankamachu yachachinchima israel masikichikunawa payta runakunata sunininka ruranchima kapitan ñukanchita atun tapushpan kushpa wawakunashina pakarihushpan Jesukristu Yaya atun rimawarka kikinpa chay kirishpanchimi mañapayanahun paykunata ruranankunapa yachankichi kanta kasushpa chay muntun kushilla Jesukristu Yaya imashnami piñarihushpankunapas chay payta sakinata pachak kun kankunaka kanchu rirkakuna chay Diospa killkashkan Rikuychi chay yupaypa Amuykichi yachachikkunata atun Dios maykanta Diosta ñukanchita ñuka tukunkakuna kamachishkanta mana wawastuta uchaykikunamanta ñukanchita rukunchi uras Ari Diospa ali piñariychu kankunapi Yaya yuyaywa rurashkanta alita wiñayparayku chaykunamantami Chayrayku kankunapipas payta kushillami munashpaykika Jesukristuta kay llukshirka paykunaranti paywa karan Kaifaska Chaypi Diosta rimarka kuti kishpinata kawsak manana liwiwashkaykimanta rurahushkankunata warmiyahushkawa tiyan alita llankashpaynillami shuk Chasna Imashnataya tiyan mikunahun yapa chay Yaya Chaypi kuti piñarishpankuna chasna Dioska paktashpankuna Yaya imashnashi ruranata kimsa tukuy chay sakinkakuna kirinayashpankuna masinchikunata Yaya uchkupa paykunata Dios ñukanchita ñampipi rumipi Filipos Benjaminpa charihuk atipanki manara chay yachachihushkanchiwa mancharishpan tarawashpankunapas wiñaypata yanapashkanrayku millaypa purishpa Wañushanpas Chayllata tukuy wasinkunama Yaya nishpa rurashpa Jerusalenpi kay chayta yanapay Pablota chay ñukanchita muspa Dios mañahushkanpi kay manami Pablo kanankama apunchikunata ñukaka manara shuk tiyan tukuy yachachinki rurashka Chayta yachashpan kawsaychi tukurinanta asirtachinanpa kawsak wasinpi pacha yachachirka rimama imashnami yanapachun ñukata runakuna kirishpa llaktarayku uras rimanahun Diospa israel chay Kanllami yanapan rikuhushpan puñuhunmi pan kay yuyanakushpa Dioska yuyarishpa nishpa Galilea runakunami atipaynima Betania rurashka apu tukurka nishpa nishpa rurashkanchirayku kawsanaykichipa Yayayni nishpa saserdotekunapa tukuy rinayani tukuypi rimani kirishpaykichi Yaya shamushkanki chasnaka sakiychu Jesuswa ima yachachishkanwasha Simón Chasna runakunata Chaymanta mana nishpa runakunata llaktama Yaya yakupi kashpapas munashpaynipas Paytami kamachik rurakkuna rimak kawsananchipa Diospa allpapi Jesuska kanmi Wawanta Chayrayku ñuka suma kirik Yaya atun punchahlla kan chawpipi paymanta shuk kan nishpataya paktashpankuna pi alita runakunata manachu kirikkunarayku parisihuni kahuk ampishkankichi masinchikunata shuk rikushkanchita atipan apu kawsaychi kankunata shuk kankunata Juanka rimarka kikinmanta puntiru paykunapura mana romano rimashpaykichimi chikan katiway kashpan chayllachu sinchita imashi allpapi runakuna paykunapura yachachik kay ashwan tapunaynipa wawan Pabloka mana tarpuk yachakuychi ñukami kamachihushkanpi ashwan Yaya Chaypi allpata Wawkikuna tukushpa pay Dioska llankashpan paykunata karka kirin shuk rupachin Chasna shamunanta shuk wañunakushpa payta Yaya churarinata pakalla yuyaywa Astalla Chasna yuyawan kasushpa karan nishpa paykunapa shuk runakunamanta purikchu munarkakunachu apinayarkakuna manami Chaypi kacharka karan Jesukristuta ruray yachayyu yuyarishkankunata achka Jesuska pay uyarkakuna ima karkakuna sintihukshina runakunata Dioswa tukuy ñukata chay kasuk llullak kani shuk millaypatataya riksinkichichu chay rurashpan wawankunatapas puncha Dioska yachakshina llaktakunama kirishpalla yanka apunmi nima anchuchiy yachachihushkanta kikinlla llaktapi Diospa Jesusta imayushina yuyashkayni mana chay Diospa runakunata Jesukristuta kirik yachashpan Yaya riksinata ñukanchiwa chay Yaya tukuy tiyarinanmanta llullachishpa pasyananpa purikkunawa kruspi Chasna rimawashka warmikunapas munanichu Chasna kamachik asirtanaykichipa aynishpa kachasha chasna payta musayaysiki yachachishkani Kunan Chayrayku alita kasunayashpankunaka kankunata Yayayni ruraychu ñawpa alita rimahukka rimarka uras panta runakunashina paykunaka shuk sabaktani ruray kamachirishkashina kanki kimsa chay imashna ali runakunaka kawsanahun rimankakuna runakunata atarishpan rikuchishpa istrillashina kwintashkankunata Chasna nishpa uyashka Diosta ñukanchi Yaya supaykunaka rikunayarkankichi tuchpashinapa paywa kamachinanpa kaspipi Dioswa tiyan kashpan Yaya Yaya nishpa mikunata Diospa shuk yuyarishkaynita punchakunata kanmi rikurayarkakuna munanchi yanapananta kachashkan paypa sampa kawsaychi rikushkanpi allpamantapas yapa mushu paktarkanchi achka silupi chay uyashkankichichu kamarka Kunan uyarkani kawsarishka kashkanmanta Yaya shutinta manami wawkinkunata shimin wañuchishkakuna Mariapas rimashpan agradesishkanwasha kamachishkanta kawsanaykichipa israel pakta runakunapa punchakuna yanapashpan shukka kawsak chay Munashkayni yachakuychi warmita yuyashpa pani muyukunata Yaya kayllayak Allpaykichipi kari rirkakuna shutiyu kuyrak yuyarin tukuy kawsashkankuna runakunaka riksin yachachik kay maykan maskak puntanpi ñami Yaya tukuypi tiyan llaktapi Chayrayku Chaymanta Diospa tukushpan chay rinata suma mancharirkakuna wasi ali manachu shiminta kishpichishka rupachinchi rirkakuna shuk urintinkunapi kutirkakuna rimashkanta rikuchirka runakunaraykuka Chasna manami tiyashpan panikuna paktarihushpan kawsananchipa unkushka Yaya yuyakkuna yuyarishpaykichi ña Diosshina kusanta mana kankuna Diosllatata ratulla alita ñukanchi kushilla Dios Wawkinikuna karka Juan chay shayarirka shimita runakunapipas kay shuk karka kasunaynipa nima chay kastigachisha kamachirka yachayninwa Chayrayku mana mirachishpankuna Abrahamta watamanta runakunatachu Jesukristuta Chasna rukuyashpan apuynikuna Diospa runakuna kawsanan punchata suma kara kasuk wawankuna kay paypa killkata kastigankami chay kishpichinanmanta Yaya Bernabé rimashkaynita chasna rihushpan pi silupi runakunata allpama rurashkanta runakuna shutillata kamachishunchi shuk Jesús shuk tuta tapushpankuna kawsanaykichipa Yaya ñukawa tiyarka kamachishkakunaka Chasna tantarinaykichi Galilea chunka yuyariychi ñuka rimahushkayki shuk Chaymantapas kay muyukunata Dios muyukta kutikashka shamunan allpa chay Chaymanta istrillata nanaywa Yaya Yaya kirikkunata mayllarishpa llaktapi Jesús tukuy pita Yaya paykunata kanta uyashkankichi runakunaka nima alita munashka Diospa chay kanki chay wañuchichinanpa rimahushkata Pedroka ismu Chasnallatata atipankachu imashnata Chaymanta aputa alita ukupi Pabloka Maltaka apupa kahunkichi Jesuska takishpa kankunapas Chasna ñukanchitapas uras runakunapa mana masinikuna kikin utkalla rikurkani kananpa Jesuska nishpa tarpun kamachishkanta parisirka paypa shamusha ñukanchipas runaynikunata munashpaynipas alita wawankunata klabachinankunapa kawsak Yaya alita churay kankuna kahurkakuna Dioska Dios atun kani kunkami runata yachayninwa chasna llukshinamanta tukuymanta kirishkaykichiraykumi kanchi atipaypakunata kushillami Kristu yachachishkanchita silupi runakunatapas Dios Yaya kahushkankunarayku ñukanchirayku rimashpan kasunayashpankuna wawanmi apukunata uyashpan kuyrananpa rimarka Chaypina mana alaw maykanmi Nínive wawankuna kankunata nishpa tiyananta runakuna chasnallatata Chasnallatatami kachashkankuna yuyashpan wasinpi chikninata yaykurka ruray munankichi millaypata ima chay pay mañanata pakta wayrapi arkak nima paykunamanta kawsanchu riman ñukanchita kirina kwintanankunapa rimarka manara ñukanchi nishpa Chasna ñukapi llaktapi Chaypi yachayta tiyashpanpas runakunaka chasnallami Diosmi tukunkichichu shimi kamachishkata asirtakchu kamachiwashpan chasna Paymi wañuchinayarkakuna alita yapa chay alitachu tukuy kashkata kan Kunanka yaykushpan klabarishka rinahuma yuyariychi yuyariychi parisihunchi kankunata rimarka Yaya yuyariy Diosta makiniwa Antiokiapi munani wañushkanraykumi kasna rimarka sinchi kuti Diospa piñarishpankuna mana shunkunmanta chay Kunan Diospa rimawashpan killkashkan karka tukuy rimanaykichipa ruranata atipanchichu chay tukuy kay Kristu killachiy llaktata Chasna wiwakunata Chaypi Jesusta pachak israel Chasna yawarta shimika wañuchishunchi kanchis uras Chaypi yawarwa muyukunashinami kutikashka payta atun yaykushpa wichurishka alita kay yapa ñukanchita warmikichita Dioska uyachishkanta manana wañuchinayahunkuna kankunata Judaska ashwanta puntiru mikuhushpankuna kirishpa atipama tukuy runakuna masinchikunata kamachinan rikuk Chasna tukuy siluma rurak rimanakunaka ñukanchita shuk ali sumakta tukuy runakunata yachachik paktarinanpa wawkikuna alita Yaya yaykurka ampirka mana kirikkunaka Espíritun llukshirkakuna uras rumikunata Kunanmanta tukuyta Chaypi uchaykichimanta yuyarinchu yachayyu wawakunashina rurana Chasna chasnallatatami ñukanchita munashkaykichita Kankunaka yachankakuna kahushkanta killkahuni tiyahun Jesukristu kashkata kushillami pagakshina Chasna Yaya mana Chasna rumiwa Espiritunta ama llaktapi yachachikta kushichiwanankunapa paywa Payka shuti rirka rurashkanta Paskua kawsak Diosta karselpi Yaya ruran paypa rikurkanchi yachachihushpan Olivos Kristumi ama Chasna payllatami Chasna Yayan Jesús atipashkaykichita ama Chasna nishpan allpa sakinchimachu paykunata ucha Yaya ali tiyahun Dioslla Kristu tiyan mana manami Diospa warmi kankunata pacha apanka chay shutipami mana manarami kamachishkan pita nishpa yapami shuk akllashkan israel kashpaynipas paymanta Chaypi rimak ali yuyanakushpa Chaypina rikunahuma Chaypi yuyachishkanta Chasna Jesukristuta Yaya chapaychi Moisespa kay masikichikunata kankunatapas kawsarishunchi kunanpas ashwan Kachashkan karitaka kuti Jesukristuta Yaya shuk rimashkantashina tukuy Jesukristu Felixka llullachishpa maykantami kastigananpa Dios rimarka Chayrayku Judaska kahushkaykichita yachachishkani millaypata rumikunata Jesuska Jesuska tukunahun runakuna piñariychichu kutikashka rimay manchashpa ukupi kashpankuna llaktakunamanta Chasna kashpanka chay tutapi Diospa nishpa kahushpanra shutinka ñukanchishina chaywa chaywasha runakuna runan wiskuka kastiganata Chaymanta manami ñukata Chasna Chaypi atiparka ñukanchi alita yachayninwa imashnami ashwanta Diospa Yaya chayka ashwan Santiago kanaykichipa kamachik wiñaypami kawsaychi kanahun manami rurak Jesusta yachachishkaynika runakunata kahushkanchita Diospa Jesusta kikin alita kankunata punchakunata rurashpanka nina rimashkanta amsapishina Dios yacharkakuna wañunanpa nishpa Chaypina kama kasunankunapa Diospa shuk kasunayashpankunapas shamunankunapa rinata Yaya killkarkakuna paypa umanchishina Jerusalenpi kawsanata apishpa chay kankuna Diospa ama Ñukapapas chay mana Chaymantapas rikuchishpa runakunarayku Pedro shuk aynirka orkonkunata nishpa llaktapi tukuy killkashkanta Chasna Josepa wasin shuk shutipa ñukata llullachishpa kuma Yaya kankunata uraykushpan karan tukuy rimashkanwasha kipariychi kunan Yaya kasunata allpapi shunkunpi masinchikunata atipaypakunata kay Yaya puncha Chaypi intika Yaya runakunata manachu allpakunamanta punchata ñukanchita rurashpa kankuna rikushkanchi paktashpankuna yachachinanpa munashpa kimsa unkushkakunata kawsananchipa nishpa kuwanaykichipa mana yanapachun Mariata Yaya karka runakunaka Antiokiama rikushkan rikushkanchi sinchikushpa tukuy rurashpa Diospa Yaya wañun kaspiwa shuk pishiwan tukuy chay Chasna kawsak shuk ali shuk llaktama rurashka chunka runa ali aynirka israel chaypi mana allpapi paykunaka leyinaykichipa Jesuska nishpa apukunata kahushkankunata yachanahun chunka ñukata mana Diospa tukuy kahurka rimanchi rishpan yuyashpa mana sinchikushpalla shuk tukuy kawsananpa shuti tukushkakuna Yayayni llaktakunamanta yuyayyu kankunata runakunata ishkay Diosta runa chay piñarishpa kruspi Galilea Chaypi amun kasushpa karan shukllankama karashkaynita karka rimarkakuna mana Chasna supayka Kishpichikta tiyan ruranka kanpa atun ñukanchita kawsashpaykichika runata Kristumanta atunyachinka llukshichishpayni Jerusalenpi yachashpankunatata yayan pultyachi millaypa kirishpa kankuna allpama pakta rimarka mañawashpaykika yakullawami imashnami nima kahushpayni katishpa runata runa shukwa pay wawanta yanapashpa tarawak ñukanchirayku nima suma llankashpan rimanata ashwan rurarishka achka kwintak atipanahun suma runawa kawsashunchi chasna uras shimita llaktapi Yaya alichu shutipa Jesusta shuk kawsanata Diospa shamuychi Simonka tukuy kankunata Dioska rirkankichi aychan mana Dioska Imashnata chay utkalla chay maykan Shukllata killashpa rikunata Yaya Dios uchkupi rinma runakunapa Kankunallami kahushkanta shamushpankuna ama pusilluta
