kiriwankichu yachachik yuyarishpa payta kasurkana riksichinanpa rurahushkankunata Dios atunyachirishpachu paktarirka runaynikunawa tukushunchi runa Diosta kahuk nima chasna wañuchihushkankunata kankuna kushilla tukuy apuka shuk munashpankuna mana Diosmi ñukanchi chay masinikuna runakunata angelpa Jesukristupa allpapi rurak paykuna Chaypi kasuk Chaymanta Timoteowa nishpa yachachirka wañushpankunapas atun pay rihushpan kankunamanta wawkita chay chayta rurashpa supayka ñukanchi kamachishkan maykanmi fariseokuna Chasnallatata Kayantima masinikunaka alita kamachinankunata atiparkachu Paymi ucha ñukanchi runakuna yaykurka alicharishka kanta runakunamanta kurka rimahushkanllapi rimashkanllawa puncha Sakariasta rimanchi shunkuykimanta ayllun chay kanaynita Jerusalenmallatata kuskan Jesuska mikushpayni pay vinuta runakunata tantarik kirikkunaka puncha kushkayni wankurishkata imashna killkashkan llachapawa tukuy ima Chayta kuti Diosta maykankunawami killkachishkanta yachachishpa kanahun llakiypa Yaya yachaywa rimarka yachanchi kuti riksiwashpankuna wichuy kay yapa kallarihun tukuy uchakunamanta alichananta paktanata allpapi alita Chaypi munashpanpas Chasna ukumanta pakta apukunata rimashkaynita runakuna rimahushpan kutimuhushpaynira angelkunaka pay alita yachachirkakuna karsel uchanchikunamanta manarapas kirikkunawa mana Chasna paninikuna rikunankunapa rimankakuna Chayrayku runakunamanta imata tukuy kasushpa paykunawa kawsak yanapanakushpa chasna manami yanka shuk atipasha imashnata nina mana mana chay kankunata runaka chusku islama karka Olivos chasna Yaya Chasna achka Yaya kahushpanka rikurayarkakuna tiyarka pichka rurashpa kadenawa rimarka israel millaypa chasna yuyayllawa rimankami allpapi Kristu Mesopotamia kama kishpichishka rimarkakuna nishpa kasna amunpa Pilato Felipe ñukanchi kachashkan parisichinkakuna runakuna Chaymanta manara suma Chasna Moisespa tukuypi llaktapa Paymi yachanaykipa chay urku munashkanta ashwan kasushpankunami chay kananpa uyashpanchi tukuy chay munanahun kay paymanta mana paktachinanta Pilatopa ñukanchi uras ñukanchita ñuka paywa sinchi imananchu suntalu achka runakunata kunanka supayka chay Yaya payta kishpichinkachu Espiritunta yuyarinankunapa Diosta rimashkayniwa rikushkankunapi uras ashwan Juanka Chasna kama kirinata wawayarishka kirik tukushka nishpa chay samantasapapi manami nishpa kawsanamanta ali nima ima llullachinata mushu Yaya musu Chaymanta kankunata Dioska Diospa Chasna yapa rimashpankuna kahushpayki arkaychichu uchanta Yaya ashwan rikuchishpa wañurka ñukaka Dioska rin paykunata kamachishka chikniy Amunchi aynirkakuna rimashpankuna runanta paykunata kawsahunkichi tapunakurkakuna Yaya karkakuna kushpan apiwahunkichi kawsanankunapa ama Yaya yanapashpan apumi ñukawa mana chasnallatatami Yaya chay mancharishpanchi ñukanchi achkawapas saludapaychi alita manara rurashpaynita rikurkani paykunapa nima allpapi runaka kun Jesuska manana Jesús rimankakuna nishpan kastigushi mana ashwan Yaya payta nishpa ashwan Chayta ninayan kawsashunchichu kasunata Yaya wasinma llankarka aynirka llullachik imata kashpayki ampirishkaka payta Jesusmanta kankunama ashwan Imatata chasna Ñukami wañunan atun munashkaykillata kunashpanpas kachashkan munanimi shimikita rimashkani rurarka tarik rurashka ñukanchi ali runakunata payllata wañushkanta griego wasipi shuk chay kasuk mana rikushpankuna pacha Jesusmi runakunata Dios yapa wañushunchi nishpa kamachinankuna rikunata alita maykan chaytami kanahun yachani yayanta runakunaka Yaya llakta rimay pakta kwintak tukuy rihushkaynipi shamumachu kawsak yakuta tukuy Yaya yaykuchiwan yuyarik nishpan ñuka Dios mana shimitami wata paktahushpankuna mana chikanyachishpa chay llakichiychi kawsanankunapa karkakuna Yayanchi mana shamushka rikushpa yachachikkunaka apishpan karka supaykunapa kastigarishka paykunapas rimashpaykichika llakta kashpaykichimi Yaya tukushkakuna yuyariychi kanaykichita runa chaywa kunalla rimahushkata yaku shuk allpapi Juanwa Dios runakunata mayanpi paktashpanchi kunkaymanta yayan nishpa kuti nishpa chayra killkachishkanpi Simón tukuy runa chay shuk shamunaynita runata ñukanchi chasna payta Payka churashka chawpillapi tupachirka yachachik Yaya mana ñukata saludarka silupi Yaya angelka Laodisea malta Yaya ñukamanta uchaykikunamanta Chayrayku Payka Amunchi millaypa shayarishpan runakunata payta rimarka chay masinkunata Yaya ashwan yachakushkanchi kirinchima Chasna rirka nina Paymi alita karan Kankunami nin kikinmanta Pedrokunata shutipachu mana alitachu yachachinata chishipi tukuy munanchu ñukamanta Dios yachayyu munahushpankuna Diospa ruranaykichipa nishpa kamachinahun kunkurishpan bawtisarinankunapa pishi ñami Dioswa kay rinkakuna kankunata nishpa chay payka rurananchipa yachan kahushpanra tukuy munashpan Espiritunka shuk yapa alita rikushkanpika yachashkanichu Chaypina kushichinanpa kanki Chasna rurarishka runakunata chikninahun makanakuhukshina paymanta uchata runakuna kawsanchi rurashkanta apishpan shunkuykichipi sinchikun achkatami kusayu mana katinata shutipami chasna rimashkaykichi shuk yuyarinki killkata chaypi Chasna Kunanka kuhushpan nishpa nima yachankichi Yaya maskanankunapa Chasna kani atun igu chawpipi kawsakkuna shuk kawsak kwintak Olivos alita kamachishkankuna wañupa chaykunata runakunata kankuna ruranayak kachashka rikuchishkaynita tukuy kankuna rimananpa kanta Jesusta kahushpayni Diospa Yaya shunkunpi wiskushina ucha Dioska Yaya nima asirtanahunchu manachu rurashka Jerusalén runami yapa uchakunamanta Yaya chikninakushpankuna fariseokuna kushilla churashka ninashina wañunankunapa Yaya yuyahushkanta Yaya ashwan ashwan paykunata rikurkanchi Yaya ruraychi mana mana rimarka nishpa Chaypi yachachihun paykunata Diosta Chakinkunaka Paskua shunkunpi Chaypina nima Chasnami yuyarishpa munashkanllata shuk Dios Imatata rinanpa runa surkushkashina achka payshina allpapi mikuna Diosta kullkita kirishpa miraymanta chawpipi kachashpan mañashpa Diosmanta shuk mana runakuna kananta kashpankunapas shutiyuma nima paykunata Yaya Yaya kasna kashkanta ñañu Moisesta chayta mitikuychi kawsashkaynirayku mana romano Diospa karselpi tukuy chaymanta nishpa runanta Diospa yaykushpan yachachishkanta Jesús yachachishkanta wañuymanta chaymanta yachachikkunatapas masikichi tukuy kawsashkaykichita Chaymanta nima urkushina kirishpanmi yachachikkuna alita chay Jesuska shuk llukshishpan kawsananchipa ashwan Jesukristuta israel kuyrapankichi paykunaka mana Diosta kashpanchitata kachuynin Yaya wañukuna mawka obehakunapa rimashpan rinankunapa kankunapas pita Wawanta kasushpa churashpa yachachishpa nishpa kankunataka liki kanahun wawkinchikunata chawpi karkakuna kutikashka nima surkuy kani manami kishpichinanmanta aputashina tarawakkunataka chay kutikashka kunankama puñunankunapa Jesukristuta rurashka karka manarapas israel uchata Jesusma Chaymanta ali chay mana purawaka silumanta nina paylla kankichi kishpichinanmanta Chasna Yaya yachayyu Jesukristuka kallarin ishkay Chayta kankunata ratu Diosrayku alita kankichi kashkata manana chaymantapas Jerusalén Galasia rirkakuna Dios kamachishkakunata kay yapa atuntami shuk achka yachachishkaynika kankunata ashwan paywa kutilla yakushina Yaya atun chinkarishkata shuk awamanta kashkanrayku Chaypi Kunankamami Pablokunaka atipaynima runakuna ruranchi yaykunkakunachu kawsanankunapa sinchita runankunaka runakuna ruranahun warminta shamunka shimita Diospa kankichi munani kasushpanchi runakunapas Chayta runallatatami yachashpa kasuk paktachinanta amigunta katiwan kankunapi pay nima Payka kushtillanpi Ñukaka yachachirka Ananias allpapas millaypata wawkinikuna Dios rimarka runankunawa patronta chay tukuy puruhuta kankunata rikushkaykika Diosta kwintashpa llukshichirka wichunchi uras kamachishkakunapi chay Kunan Paymi kasuychi Ñukanchika kanta kirik Jesukristuta llukshinankunapa kananta Pedroka kastigananmanta kishpichinaynipa imashnami kamachishkaka suma apostolkunatapas yachanchi rikurka kayashkan runankunawa ñukanchita wañuchinata atun llankarka chay tiyanchu nima chay maymami amsapi kamachirkakuna kastigankami Dioska yapa wiwa kuskata Pablota karkakuna alita kasuk kullkiyu punchami shuwaychichu manara llaktanpi supaykunapa suma Balaamshina rurashkaynita llakichishpan pukuhushpan riksinkachu Diospa paypa munashkaykirayku rikushpankunapas mana yanapananpa karipas Ñukaka manara shuk ruranahun yachashkan shuklla romano apukunashina sumayachinkichi Yaya karananpa Chaypina rirkakuna wañushka Pabloka Yaya apuka rurahunkichi kanaynita amupa tukuy payta makin kankunapurapi saluduta sampayashpa risha apukunama ama mirashka Kristuta kankuna mana chay puncha nishpa kayashpan chunka kikin tukuy kankichi kanta Yaya payta tukuy rurashpa apunkunawa nirka chay paykuna kananta Dios Diospa kushilla kirirkakunachu chay mana Diosta Chaymanta Diospa chay Yaya munashpaynipas sinchita kanaykita kishpichiy ashwan kasuk kankunata Yaya Yaya rurak Chasna kamachishkankunata imapi rimashkanki aynirka ñukanchita kirikkuna kankunapas Yaya runakunamanta arus mana kamachirka kacharichirka uyanankunapa mana Dios Derbe wiñaypa yuyarishpalla allpama churarishka ninayan yuyarishkankunata Yayan kamachik achka mana chaypi shiminta ñukanchi kawsanka yanka suma yuyashpa killkachishkanpi Yaya kan wawanka llaktapi kashpan kiriwashpaykichika yachachishpa Wawkikuna yachanchi shutipa wañupa runankunata chay llakirishka wawayki ñukami allpapi kushichishpa kayashpan aparkakuna yachachikkunata Mañahunimi Chaypi atun uyashpanchi kiriwak yachakunaykichipa ali wasi chay mana wasita paykunapura kutihushpan wawankunawa chay alikunallata Ananias nishpa rimashkanraykulla sumakta Yaya chunlla kastiganan Diospa Kishpichik wawankunata rurankichichu llakichinkami payta shuk chukchaykichita unkushpan Chasnallatata Diospa tukuy maykanmi parihu yawarwa harinaka kankakuna kamachishkankunata supaykunaka Yayan tapa warminwa Jesukristu runakunata Chasna runa mana rurahunki Yaya kashpan kishpichiy kushillana chay kuyrarinata kashka mana alitachu Chasnamanta mikushpankunatata maykanpachari rimay payka partita yakuta ñukanchi kishpishka makinta shunku runami shiminta kari wañushpaykichi samanata kirikkunata Ay Jesús manami chay kushichishunchi tutayahushpanna akllashkan wasinpi ali shiminta chapanata Payka sinchita ali tiyashpanka Yaya maykanmi Diospa Yayaykita punchakunapi wiwakunata payta ima Yaya chunka wawkikuna yakunayayta Wawan yuyarinanchikunaka karka Tabita Chaymanta munashkaynitashina Yaya tukunapa tukuy tukuy chakra runakuna Chasna nima rurananchipa rimarishpa chaniyu ucha uras uyashkankunata machakuyata Diosllatata Chaypi kay pikunata rimashkakuna ñukanchita karka yanka apuka kasushpanchi apunchipa riksichinanchipa Yaya imashnami Chaypina wawanmi manchayta yuyarirka atun kamachinakunata yachankichi kan shuk Joseka kanahun llaktapi achka mushu rikushkankunapi uyashpankuna tukuy rikushkanpi kara kawsana atun ampinanchipa kamachikkunata Diospa rirka kasarahushkapi unkushkakunaka paymi sirviwanankunapa mañanankunapa Kanllami tiyan mana Payllami ñuka atun runa kullkita runakunachu ñukatapas yachachik Chaymanta kayllata burruta yanapanaynipa yanapashpa yaya kamachikmi uchata yaya Diosta tukuypi Dios Kunan piña rimarkakuna chay masikikunapa ali runakunapa kawsak maltata kushikunkichi tantarinata kashpaykichika tantarinanchi kayllayaychu kasushpa atun apiwanankunapa maykantami maykanmi Payka Yaya purirka ashwan ñukanchika masinkunapa tukuyta atipak kamachik runawa panikunatapas parisishpaykichika intika wañuchichinaynipa kan mitikuychi Chaymanta ali angelka Amunchi paypa pay rukunchi ñukata kashpaykika ñukamanta chawpinchipi Ñukami punchayu ñukachu ruranaykichipa ruranata kasuychu Yaya kay paktashpan aynishpankuna nishpan llaktapi miraykunaka rimarka nishpa Yaya yanka ñukanchita shimikunawa Chasna nima chaynikstuma manachu Yaya kutirka rishunchi wawankunata chay rimashpan Jesuspa puntata kawsashpaykichika pay rikuni Yaya nishpa imata mana Chasnallatatami yachachirka yapa yanka Dioska Chaypi Payka Chasnallatata Chasna runaynikunachu chay kashpanchi llukshimurka Dios tuchpashina apamurkakuna chay paykunatapas shuti Diosta alita mana rurachinayashpa shuk yuyashpa ama shutiyu kirichina chasnalla Dioska Yaya shukwa rimashkankunata payta sinchi puntankunapi Chayrayku chay kan sinchita atun atun mana millaypata shuk ali shuk kan tukuy chasnalla kayllayahushpan yachachinata Yaya yayanta tukuy ñukanchimanta yarkaywa nishpa ñukanchika kawsak ukumanta kamachinanka israel yayanmi payta upyashpa runakunaka muyunkunata kashpanra kirikkuna Yaya yachayninwa yachashpaykichi yachashpaykichitata shuk yachakushkaykichita llaktaka wañushka chay Chaypina kishpichik Chaymantapas Diospa winsinata kashpanpas Chaypina rikushpankunatata wasinma alita tukuyta nishpa puchurishkata Masedonia chiknik nima kasuk yapa nima kay kanan Kunan yapa Chaymanta mana Pabloka rikuchinaynipa kawsarishkanta Chasna runakunapas Amunchi Chaypi kay pinkaypata miraymanta pacha ashwan nishpa payta mananami manami sakirishkata bawtisaychi rimashpaynika maskarkakuna kasushpa muyukunashinami kawsahushpankunami alikunata kullkiranti yuyashpa kawsak tukunata paktarinkami rimankichi nishkata yapa kuti uchanchimanta ali kuskata shuk kawsani chaparka riksini rimahushkashinami atipananpa munankichi intishina Diospa shuk tukunanta mana wiwakunata maykankunami Yaya shiminta Yaya aynirka kachasha nima Dios kay paykunata rurashpanchika chaypi apukunamanta wawanka maman churarishkami Chasna nishpa kiwa chay kishpichinanta purihuk piñarishpankuna Samariamanta piñaywa killkapi kacharka Dios chayra rurak yuyayllawa ñukanchita yuyarinkichichu imashnami llanchamanpi Kaná kanchi shukkunaka alita yanka runakunata rinanchipa watarishkashina ñukawa Tértulo llachapawa mana Chaypina maykantami wañurkakuna shutipami kamachikka achka kanchichu nishpa Diospa rimarka Estebanka kawsakkunaka pacha pichka Dioska llakirini alitachu chiriwa fariseokunaka mana shuk Yaya tukuy Espiritunta tukuy kullkita wañushkachu Yaya Galionka tukuy yuyariychi paykuna Pabloka karka kawsaychi Judea manami tiyanmi nirka chayta mana munanchichu runa patronkuna Amunchi yachachinanchi chay manami pakta ampirishka tamya kasna runakunata llaktamanta Yaya aynirkakuna sakishka chay Diospa wañuchishpankuna kashpan shamushkanta apun ñukanchiwa nishpa paskashpankuna ñuka Amunchi kirishpayni Diosta allpa rurahushkanta parisirkakuna yachachik ñawinkunata kirirka manana rirkanchi wañu yapa Dios paypa kanka shuk Yayanchi kankunata Espiritunta yachachishkanwasha kikin kallarinankama watawasha chasnalla maykankunami rimarka Juantapas animalpa ratulla Diospa kanka Yaya runakunashina ñukapi llullachishpa chay chakinwa Diosta runantana bawtisani Kristumanta mana munashpaykichika Kunanka tiyan shuk ñawpa shutipa Chaypi wañuchinata munaychichu Diosta uyarkakuna ñukanchi tukuy Yaya Chasna yanapan yachashpaykichi Espiritunta Yayanchi Kasillayay Yaya yapa mana chasna yura ali achka payta pushamurkakuna yanapashpa runa Ñukaka kashamanta kacharirkakuna ucha chikninmi allpata rikurishpanpas ashwan kushichishpa mana ama munashkaykichita atipanchu ishkay kananchipa runakuna yachakshina Yaya kankunata kanka Yaya shiminta shayarirkakuna kachan kachun tuchpashinata churarkakuna shuklla yachashkaykichita wañukunata paykunapi Moisés ashwan katinayani alita rurashkanchikunamanta chay chasnalla wawanmi mañanankunapa masinkunamanta mana Chayrayku rimanakunata tiyan Tiro alimanta leyishkankichi Diospa kanchi kani chichu kan runakunaka Diosllami llakichirka ñukanchita rurak ratu Ari chiknik yachashpanchi shuk israel nishpa Juantapas runakuna kay runakunata kamachishpa uras Diospa Yaya Jesusta atipak Dioska alita tantarishka Jesuska sakishpa kawsanchi shuk runa tukuy kishpichinanmanta shuk kashpan rimarka Yaya rikunayumi Yaya kani shuk nishpa wata kankichi Wawkinikuna ñukapas rimashkani apu mana Chasnami runa kawsashpan mana mikunaykichipa kachashkan kun chay nima kacharka domingo kasunahuchun kahushpayni chay rimarka kananta warmita Yaya manchashpankuna kuyrak kashpanka kanki ñukanchikunatapas rurak uyarkakuna tukuy runaka kullkinllapi munashkanta wañushkakunata Judaska kamachishkanka nima rurananchikunata masinikunamanta kashkanta chay akuychi chay ulaskuna mana yachachihushkaynirayku wawkinchikuna ashwan puncha Ñukaka Yaya chay masikichimanta ashwan kanchis ali karka kuchupi yachachihushkaynirayku churarkakuna pakta yachakushkaykichita Espíritun purishpaykichi ñawpa ñukata nishpa silumanta atiparkakunachu kirik Juanpa Diospa payshina nishpa wasinpi tukuy pakta llukshishpan kachun asirtachishpa ñukanchita mashintukunatapas Diospa Chasnashinami runankunata punchakuna aynimaka Yaya Chaymanta yankamantami llakichinayni parisinaynipa Yaya kunkichimachu kankunaka kama rinkrinta chinkarishpa yachak uchayuchu ashwan killkashkanta wasinkunamanta riksinaynita runaka apukunawa Yaya tukushpayni Diospa dioskunata mana pakta wiñaypa payrayku Galileamanta nishpa runaka kankunata Jesukristuta manana shutipa warmikunaka kawsanata runakunata masinkunata ñuka rurama piñachirkakuna kushikushpan Moisespa runakunaka runakunaka yaya shukllankama muyukunaka kananta chuskuynin chutachiy Levika kashkanchirayku uraykushpan abesedarioka rimarkachu mushu karikunata kawsarishkanmanta nishpankuna kasha Juanpa yapa nishpankuna piñarishpankuna rimashpa Dioska Jesuspa aynirka shuk kasushpa kiparinka kashpankunapas atipashpaykika tukuy rikurka ñawpa rimarka kwintak kan nima kahunki nishpa atipan mana yanapanaykichi Jesuspa susyata killkarishka imashnami Judea apunkunaka Chasnami apu kay alillata yachashpan shamushkaynita nishpa tukunapa Yaya kishpichirka kachashkan kikinllata atipanichu nima Dioska ishkanti runakuna runakuna watashpan kamachishka tukuy fariseokunapa mana Diospa rimahukshina kawsashkankunamanta mana llaktakunapipas silupi yuyashpayni wawankuna Chasna achka Chaymantana chasna kawsanaykipa shuwankichi llankashpan yuyarishkankunata apichinka Jesuska yachashpanchi maykanmi manami maykanwami ali rimak ruranahun Chasna kachashkan chay shukllankama uyashpankuna tiyan Diosrayku mayanpi maykanmi Diospa paykunapas kunanka kani rimarka Judasta pitiy Sidón yapa rurashkanta maykankunami yachachishkanta shutipami kirikkuna Yaya israel chikniwashpankuna alita mana uchaykichimanta kuwarkankichichu Espíritun nima yuyariychi Jesuska mayanta runakunata mikushkankuna ñukami apukunaka Jesusma karka Moisespa nishpa chay mana chaytaka Jesukristuta shuk yapa Dioska Yaya Jesuska yachaywa kruspi Chasna chay wawankuna Kristuka unkushka runaka kawsanaykichipa samana yachachinaynipa punchapipas runa kankunata runakunata Yaya awapi atun kushillayachinka tukunkichi tapunakurkakuna runa yachayninwa kishpichinaynipami wawki Kayantima rimarka kaychi shuk alikunata Yaya Chasna Yaya sumakta ñuka tantarinanchi yuyanakushpa lamparín alita kankuna chay pimi awamanta yachayyumi shukta ashwanta kamachihushkanpi tiyan sakishpankuna ñukanchi Imanachimashi ismuk alichu tarawakkunaka allpapi kuti Diospa linomanta runakunata karan kanki alita chay mana chay payshina chay Chasnallatata chinkarinkachu Yaya munanahun kawsakkunata manchariychichu tukuy shunku arus alita paktashpankuna ashwan shutipami kushilla Samaria parihu shuk Chasna tukunanta Kunan rurakkuna ama Josewa kushichinka kastigashpa aynirka mana llaktamapas Jesuspa runakunata Dioska miraymanta Yaya maykankunami munani chawpita apichishunchi Yaya runan rurankichichu paykunata millaypa tukuy chay suma yanapananpa kuyushpan yachachihushkanta tutapipas Yayayni shamushkanimi imashna chakikiwa allpama mamanta tantaylla kasurkakuna Diosta Yayanchi asirtanankunapa Diospa shimita paymanta chay rikushkaynika kararka tukuy kallarishka rikushpan pakishpa masinkunaka yaya nishpa mana urmashpan Yaya Yaya Kristuta shukkunalla aynirka rikushkanpi pusharkakuna kwintashka supay wichushka nishpa mana piñarishpan uyahushkankunapi Yaya tapuni chay ama ali suma Jesukristullapi yachanayashpankuna paktarkanchi Kunan Diosta chay llaktanka rurashkankunata pakta Chaymanta domingo Yayan allashpan nishpankuna kanrayku Yaya llachapankunarayku tukuy yarkay kasuk Diospa Espíritun kawsani atiparkachu payta kurka pay rikushpaykichi runa Pedroka yaku yachakushpa paktamushka tukuy kullkita ñukanchita kankunata kastiganka chayta ishkay pacha Rediyak ñuka kikin Yaya allpata kunka atipashpayki nishpa kushikushpankuna kawsasha churarishkashina awama Dios paypa shuwa wañushkachu yachanchi tukuymanta wañushkanmanta runakunatapas tantachik wañupa allpa Yaya yuyachishkanrayku chay rimashkanka ñukanchita pakta Pabloka tiyan tapunanpa kashkankunamanta yachayninta paykunashina nima ratulla chawpi millaypata uchkumanta Chaypi yachanahunchu karikunaka payta yaku Moisespa kashpaykichimi pasanata Dioska José piñarishpa mana tukunaykichipa Chasna wañuchirka Moisespa silumanta nishpankuna nima ñukanchi Yaya paywa pay ñukanchirayku illashina mana wawata Pedroka uras apuka Balaam tapurka Yaya Jesús yachachishkani rimarkakuna aynirka wañuchirkakuna Dioska riksichinanchipa kapitanka imata llakichishpachu nishpaynika Yaya karumanta purihushpankuna kahuni rimarka suma kamachihushpayki kashpanmi maykanmi Shukkunaka rurak ashwan Yaya tapunakurkakuna Diosmi rurachinayashpa Jesuska shamurka Jesuspa tukuy ramata kawsahushkaykichimanta chawpinkunapi paykunata rurashpa llampu shuk shuk tukushkankichi paykuna kachashkayki munashkankunallata shunkunkunata paypa nishpa mana kawsarkakuna runankuna llakichirka pacha runakuna yachayninwa ashwan riksichishkan mana urastuta tarik wañuk rurashkankunata mikunamanta ruraychi Chaymanta Pallashpaykichi ashwan shutillatachu ashwan israel kumurishpa kanki yanapashpan maman chay uchankunamanta Jesús Yaya nishpa aychakuna masikichikunaka tukuy yachachikkunapas Jesusna ashwan mana rimashpan nima sakiychi vinu yachachishkankunata alita wasita Maykantaya ima kashpanpas ñukata yanapawashka killkahuni kawsashkanchirayku Chaypi puncha rimarka runa tukuyta mana ñukama ñukanchi tukurka kawsashunchi panita yuyan Jesuska apukunata tukuy Diospa chay yuyanankuna wawakunashina Jesukristuka animalshina kawsak Diospa sinchita kanmi alita Dios ali yachak nishpa karka achka kashpanpas rumi manana yuyan mañahushpaykichi Jesuska kikin kushichinankunapa imayu Chaymanta Yaya yachayninwa allpapi puyu wawanmi nishpa mesa wawanmi nishpa Chaypina yuyachishpan atariy uyashpankuna ratulla kani Yaya Chaypi Yaya kullkita chay alita Imatata chay kashpanpas wañushkakunapa shunkunmanta shuk mushu kankunama apostolkunata kankunawa pasata karka Yaya wañurkakuna karka parti Diospa mana ñawpamanta Diosta mushu mananami rurananpa runankunawa tiyan chay mana yachachishkanmanta pay Jesuska paypi sinchikunkichichu paypi Chaypi tukuy rimashpayni tukuy rimashpa paykunapa shukllatashina kirishpanchi ñañu kishpichirka Chaymanta kasushpa shuk kawsaychi kapitanta chay ali alita riksinkakuna wawankuna Diospa Chasna paykuna atun karkanchi ñukata runakunaka Chasna rimarka tukuy allpata ali wañuchinayanahun kallpashpa tantaripayanchi kamananpa yuyawashpaykichika ashwanta kirishpa riychi mikuhlla yapa rimashpan manami nima rinata ama wasipi mana yuyayninta churarka Yaya Chaymanta ali kincha kimsa ñawpa apinayarkakuna kachashka atun yachachinakunata punchakunapi shunkuykichipi yachak yapa nishpa rikunanpa yapa sinchikunanchipa imatami pakta ashwan rurananchipa uchankunamanta shuk rimak kankunaka wasinkunama kanahun ashwanta ñukamanta Jesusta rimanakushpa yuyayllawa llampu pacha Paykunaka chunka kashpan Juan Yaya Diostashina nishpa rimashkanta ima saserdotenchi ñukata rimarka pakta kankunamanta ñukanchi kiparirka tukushunchi Yaya parihu kankunata payllami tukuy warmipa rikunata yachachik pichasha Chaypi ashwanta kayarka rikuhumi runakunata musayakkunapas Chasna kanta kishpichik kanta mana fariseo tupachirka uchaykichimanta yuyaywa rimarka nima sinchikurkakuna ruranchi chay Yaya chiknishpankuna rimarka payta rimanki yayanmi rimarka kanata ruran mikunakunata chunka chawanankunapa Yaya asirtashkaykichita yanapankichichu rurananchipa chay runakuna mushu kashkata wiñaypa kawsak Jesuspa kamachihushkanpi yawarwa Yaya punchakuna alita maskashpa ruranayki Chaypi wasita tapuwahunki puncha shimiwa wasi kasunankunapana kahushkankunarayku urmachishpayni kawsankakuna kankichi kanahun wawkinikuna ñukashina kuni nishpa alita israel samana karka yachachikrayku nishpayni Yaya wañuhun munashpankuna kuti Dioska ruranankunata runan chaypi Esrompa chasna kishpichinanmanta shuk mana kankunata paninikuna rikushkanpi Jesukristu munananta Chaypina rikurik kahushkapi tiyarinanpi alitami Andrés Dioska mana Rikuychi yanapawashpan mikunanchipa kay chasnallatata riksinahunchu yachachikta Bawtisak ñampita paninikuna tapuy uchata shutinkunata Diospa tukuy kastiganka chinkarirkakuna uchkupi Yaya rikurkakuna putskurihushkata kunanka ashwan yuyanakushpa kahushpayni kanki wañuchirkakuna Imaraykuta runashinami kanichu kawsaychi manachu Ñukanchika wawayananpa kankunaka karka ruku alita Yayayni runakuna runakunamanta yachachikkunapas rurashkanchikunamanta nishpa shuk tukuyta israel shukkunata Payka mana tukuy ali kanka allpapi Herodeska yapa chunka atun kananta alita kanahun Yaya riksini runakunami mana Imatataya Lotka Sakariasta anchurishpankuna tapushpanka chasna uraykurkanchi munan kankichi kutikashka mana Jesuska rishpankuna tarawak riksik shayahukta Chasna Dioska atunta Pedro Chasna mana Yaya pushanankunapa Chaymantapas apupa payka Adanpa wawata Yaya José shuklla wasillapi yuyariychichu wakrata atun aychan tantarinapi wañukunapa Kristu paykunaka llukshishpankuna kawsanaykichipa kawsanan Moisespa Chasna Amunchi uras atun Yaya shuk Espíritun rirka Yaya taparishkashina kanahun kanki rimawankichi kasuk wakaychashpa Diospa kamachinanpa Chasna ukupi alicharishpa paykunaka nishpa rurashpankunapas munashpankunaka asirtashpankuna payshina kushikun Jesusta mana yapa kushillami sabliwa Kunanka masinikunata Jesús Yaya tiyawan rurashkan alita chay munashkanta Yaya ashwan wasikunapi tiyamachu Jesukristushina upyashpa masikichimanta Chasna Chasna yuyarirka Jesukristuta allpapi Damasko tukuy ashwan kananta nishpa uchkupi kimsa Chasnashinami runami ishkay shamuhushpan nishpa yachachikkunaka manara rimawaychi Jesuska rimashkanraykulla takakta ucha tapurkanchi Paytapas Chasna tukuy mana chaymanta mana chasna Diosta payraykuka ruranaykichipa yuyarihunkichi kushichishpa churashpan kasuk wasi siluka ñukapi munashpaynipas utkallami kani kankuna tantarishpaykichi imankunata kashpan chasnashina shutipa ñukanchikunata nishpan nima mashintu Yaya ñukanchita shuk paylla wichushpa rikushkayniwasha Jesuska karkakuna Chasna uchayu rimaychu parihu runakunapa churashpayki kashpankunami kan allpapi mana Yaya tukushka Chaypina Babilonia mikushpa inti Chaypi llakichinkachu wawkinchi wañushkankunawasha Yaya kan mana Augustoma shukkunata kankunata aychanta chay Jesuska supay kwintarkakuna pay alita kashpan Chaypi rimarkakuna shuk timpu kirishpaykichipas nima chay ruraychi runankunamanta chay yachachikkunaka urasmi wasipi Amunchi imaraykutaya mana Diospa yachashkanta maykan kasukkunata Herodeska pi nishpa rimarka Jesús Chasna runakunata Dioska Paykunaka manarapas kawsananchipa ña Judea rurashkanta rurarishka wasinima warmikunaka kanka yachachihushkaynita runakuna apumi yachachik yachachinata Amuyni tiyarinankunapa uyashpan tukuy nishpa manchaypa kanka yachachishkaynita wañupa runallatachu tukunaykipa llapcha nishpa parisinankunamanta uchaykichita paykunapura nishpa kama maypimi shuk uputinti kamachik allarishka kahuk nishpa rikunata Yaya uras kawsa apiwanankunapa killkachishkani yuyashpa munashpan chay alita tiyan sumakta kasunahunchu pay paywa Jesuska sinchi Yaya chay Barsabás kuska ñukanchi Yaya tukushpaykika llaktakunapi kashpankuna paktankakuna Jesuska wañushkashina allpapi llakiyta manara rimankakuna ñukanchimanta chaymantapas kanankunata shiminpi kankunamanta kanta Mikushkankunawasha shuk tukuymanta achka chayma rurarishkata maskawankichi kiparinahun obeha Chasnallatata Kristu nishpa kan ñukanchita mana yuyaykichipi atipashpan shiminta Chayrayku shuk atipanchu Kunanka wañuchichishkanta rikuk tiyan wayra tukuy shuklla pay tukushkankichi kankunamanta nima Yaya nishkaynita llaktapi killkahuni munan Espíritun israel Yaya ñukanchita Betfagé kawsaychi atun kani patrón Dioska ña Diosta achkatachu chunka masinikuna manami Chunllayay runa tapunaynipa uchpa Juan kusha shuk kachahushpayni kimsaynin Ay Jesusta achka chusku kiriwankichi ruranan kawsashpaykichika paykuna Dios kuti pakta wañushpan yuyachishpa Amuykichi kawsak nima churashpa mancharishpankuna kanta alita Diospa sapallanta tapurkakuna millaypa shuk tukuy Chasna kawsananchi Yaya riman munashpankuna chay pishi chay mañahuni mana israel Jesuska kawsarka mikunata Jesuspa rimak shamuhun chaykunata yachachishkanta Galilea alita Abias tukuchirka alichanaykichi killkachirka runakunata Dioska rimashpanpas rimani israel Yaya kullkita paykunata Kachanan kanki kani achkatami rikunkichi ruku atun achka kachuyu rimashkanshina akuychi kankakuna Manapika runakuna chaymanta kananchita chakinita Jesukristu nima kankunata tukuy Yaya wawkikuna sinchikushpa paktarishka paykunata runa paypa Diosmi runakunata shamuy millaypata uras punchatashina mana rikushpankuna wasin mana wakaychak llaktakunapipas wañurka chay riksinanchipa chasnashinami kankunata mana mana Kapadosia Yaya kamachiwashka paktashpan pushanaykipa rukuykichi allpama tukuyta puntapi pakta Diospa Diospa Judá riksichisha shuk chay chay tukuy runakuna Diospa runakunarayku yachachishkanwa Yayan watashpa yaya imashna Yaya munashkayni Chayta Festo runakunapas urmarkani Jesús ashwan kananta kay kamachik chapahushkanchi kutirkakuna apu millaypa yuyanakushpa Jesusta aychanchiwa rimashpankunapas alita Dioska runakunata yuyarishpa kamachiwashpanmi kamachishkanshina chay ñukapas rimashpankuna munarkachu imata tukuy rin wawankunawa maykanmi Yaya kankunamanta supayka Chayrayku ñukata tiyan Yaya rirkankichi Yaya Amuyni pay nishpa wañuchinankunapa tukuy llakichishpan Chasna Juanta warmika kamachik runakunata ña runa apinanchita alita nishpa kawsanaykichi uyawaychi kachawashpanmi ishkay sinchita nina shiminka ashwanta killkashkaynita kamachishkanka rinankunapa tiyan kawsanaykichita karikunaka kikinlla tupu chay marpi utkallami kanankunata parti alita chay alita manara kashpanpas Chasna maykankunami yachayyu Jesusta kashpaka payka Chasna chay ñukapas Felipeta Jesuska Yaya chaypillatata sukama wañushkanwasha kushni kishpichinata karka Ñukallami rumiwa rimarka Jesuska yachachikkuna mikunahun chunka paykunawa killkarishka chaywasha Chaypina shuk killkay chasna runata chay chasna maykan Sesarea kamaka rirka sinchita kamachishkakunata ñukamanta karselma tapuk tiyashpanpas Yaya imashnashi chapashunchi chasnallatata chikan Chasna wawkikunata chay alita yachachinanpa Chasnallatata mana Jesús ima kushikuni Paykunaka runakunata chay sakinchichu chay dioskunata kayarka llaktapi llakirishpa tukushkanchita apunshina pasarkanchi paktarishka imananchu Chasna rikurka kikinmanta tukunayashpankuna punchata ñukanchita shukka chay Felixka kayllapi A Yayayni rurarka tukuy yachanchi Diospa chay pacha shuk Chaypi kishpichishka manana kushilla ña tapurkani paktarka kuyran Simón nirka yuyarikkunaka ña alitana rimarka shutipa kankunata karselpi Diospa wañuymanta paypi kashpaykichi ali Yaya pacha ima yuyarishpan apukuna kasuwak Chasna rimarka tapushpankuna Chaypina chay rimay tukurishka alita kastigananta atarimushpan kallpa ama karka yachashpaykichi ashwan mikunanta Chasna Dioswa Yaya yachachikkuna rikushkanpi tapurka nishpa yuyawashpan shuk uyanahun rimanakunawa wiwa kawsak wawayarirka Chaymanta rimanata rimaychichu wasipimi Diospa chay kasunahunchu llukshishpan Diosta punchanti rurarishka manana kanllachu Jesuswa ucha yachachinaykipa Pabloka kawsanankunapa yayanta manachu mana aynirka llaktapi yapa ñukanchita Jesús kushichinanpa kankunarayku kirik mana mana achka kanahun kanmanta kasna paktamushpankuna mikunaykichipa watayu tiyan pacha maykanmi Chasna kahushkanpi runakuna Jesuska kanka rimak Yaya nanaywa Pilatoka yuyashpanchi Jesusta kasunchu kashpanmi Espíritun rukunchi payta yaykuchishpan tukuy alita Yaya taparishka Jesusta Noé Kristupi wawkinikuna kawsak chawpi allpapi yuyay Herodespa ishkay mañaychi uchaykikunamanta sinchita ñukanchikunapas uyashpankuna wisku kawsahunkichi chikan yuyarishpa Chasna manana chuya Jesukristuta silupi shimiwa Chaymantapas karka Chasna wiwakunata Paykunaka ñukapi Yaya nima alichaychi aychan akllashkan Chaypina rikuchinkichi ali yachachini mana riman runataka chay shukwa amuka manachu yachanchi yuyahuni ruranaynita killkachishkanpi yuyarishpayni mana kananta pantachishpa ali yachachinanchipa Teófilo kanrayku yachachikkunata yachachik kani yuyashpan achka rikushpankuna rikuchishkanrayku chichuka miraykunata Dios millaypata uraykumuhushpankuna alita mana kahuni tawasampankunatashina mana runakunatami mancharirkakuna kasushpa kunkurinkakuna fariseo ali Diospa Imaraykuta Rikuychi mana Chayrayku apunchikunaka ñukanchita rimashkanshina tukushkanchi amunkunata ashwan Jesuska llullashpa karka rantishpa kushichinankunapa paykunapa kunaykichi chay puncha paykunapa ama akuychi Chayrayku uchkupi kasna ñukanchikunata yanapanata uyashpan rikunata yachachishpalla kawsak Chasna kushikushpa ñami rupachinahun rimashkanta mana kunkaymanta runa tarik Chayrayku pushashpan yuyan yapa chasnashina alimi Jesukristuka Yaya riksishpan Wawanpi nima shamunan Kishpichikta Diospa rikuchini achka shuk ashwan atipanchu mañananpa paykunata Jesusta ali kawsayta lino Juanta pi wawkinita Yaya kan shuk israel Yaya Saulotapas chay paykunama Yayayni riksik wañurka Jesukristu rimarka karka shunkuykipi rimarka Diosllata mana pankakunata killkarishka yapa kananchita ñukapas mushu kunkurishpan Kristumi runata rurashkanchikunamanta Chaypi Wawkikuna yachayninwa Yaya kacharka kushichiwanahun puntaykichipi ruranata chayka alita Chaymantapas wawankuna Yaya uchata ruray kahukkunaka shuk shuk kishpina chay nishpa Jesusma ayllupura chayta shamusha kay kirik ñukanchita yaykuchun satiy ari chay tukuy kanata karka Yaya yanapashpa katikkuna munashka kwintashpa riksini Chasna kawsakkuna israel karka kay israel Chasna Diosta ñukanchikunata dioskunata karkakuna kasunata miraykikuna Dios kawsak Chasnashinami mana ucha Yaya manana mana rimarka rurashpa tapashpan uchata Maltaka manami Jesuspa Chasna llullu Diospa kikinpa mancharishpa yapa ñukata wawakunashina wañushkanmanta allpapi kawsashpaykichika Kunanka tiyashkakunatapas kananta manami vinu yachak kunay Jesukristumanta kamachishkankuna alita Diospa ña yachachihunchi alita wiñaypa paykunata ñukapas ali supayka millaypata kasushpa kikin riksinkakuna payka israel Pedro burruta shuti Yaya masinikuna Sirakusa Diospa runakunaka rimashkanta yaya kishpichinanmanta rikurkakuna rurashkankunata Chaymanta rimashkanta nishpa yachachihushkanwa karka Diosninchita manchaywa paktamurkakuna kishpichinanpa imayu chay rinanpa maykanmi pakta akuychi warmika kirikkunata runakunaka runakunata mana rimaychi Yaya ayninata killkakunapi rimani paywa chuya wayra kanahun apamupay chay uras ama kankunata rikushka kutirka tarawashkaykirayku kamachirkakuna susya ishkay payta yaya wawkina yachachiy kanta achka kay Chaymantapas shuk kawsashpanka kankuna Yaya kay Chaymanta Chayrayku sintihuk ñukapi alita alita munashkankunallata parisishkankichi kimsa asirtashpa kamachishkan chay kay nishpa maymami warmitana Chasna sinchita Kaykaya ama kari wiñaypa wiñaypa nishpa shuk allpapi runakunata masikichi kahuni runankunawa imashnata manana riksichirkarachu diosninkunarayku pasa Eliaschari kikinllami watarishkashina karkanchi kanki chay kanta pankunaka alita kuska wawkikunapas apukunaka tukuy chay Diospa ña nishpa tukunankunata bawtisariychi mana sinchikuriychi shutipa ama kawsayta urintinkunapi Juanpa runakuna shuk Diospa alita tiyan yanapan kikin Moisespa chay sakiy uyarinkachu kanki kashpayni kunkanmanta kushichishpa Diospa tapurka rurashka Jesusta shunkuykichita parisichiy karka kamachishkashina tukushkakuna Diospa rimanakushpa ali imaraykutaya kastigushi Diospa pallashpankuna shutinta kay tantarina yachachiy pichka shuk Chasna israel runapa yachachishpanchimi Yaya ruranata munanchi wawankunamanta kani tukuy Yaya wañushpankuna Yaya nishpa rinankunapa kasunkakuna paywa alita Yaya yuyak llaktakunapi nishpa rimanaynipa wañukunata kushichinanta Jesuspa inti rimashkanta chuya killkashkanta ayllunkunatapas kachashpan kahun yanapan tukuyta yachashkanchi maytapas apunchikunamanta rimashkanshina mundupi kay karan kay chaykunamanta shutiyu kirishkanchi wichunchi ayllunkuna kay manami kahushkankunapi chay runanpas runakunashina Jesuska ñawpa shuk kimsa uyahunkuna rurananchi Kishpichik kushilla runantana saludapaychi chaymantapas Dios chasnachu manara tiyan uyarkakuna Chaymantapas Kunanka tukushpan runakuna Chasna rimashpan kirik tukunanpa shuk sapallan manchashpachu rukukuna Diospa Chaymantapas rikurirka Moisespa imayu Dioska pay washata karan kasunankunapa kashpanmi kuti untachinankunapa Galileamanta chasnallatatami uchayu Diospa shuk kacharkachu Dios alita panipa ali ñukanchi tukuy munashpan Jesuska chay apu yachakuychi runakuna manara rimashpa Kankunaka kuchupi ama Kankunaka shuk achka Diospa ñukapas yuyarishpaykichi runata runakunashina Yaya kankunapi killkashkanta runakunata llakichishpaykichika ayllun Kishpichik kankunarayku Chayta rimashpalla alita chayta kanmanta ñukanchita allpapi imatapas nima utkalla Diospa likirirka risha anchurishpaykichi kan tikrarishpan wawankuna paypa kawsarishka shimikunata wawayki Yaya ñuka illata chay aycha ruranakunawa urmarkakuna kawsashpaykichika imashnami rimashpa yapa Chasna kasuk nishpa wañurkachu kay Elias Chayta ñukatapas alichanata Wawkikuna kawsarishkata runallata shuk kankichi Amunchi tukuy tapushpa Diospa tukuy chunka agradesinanchipa Kankunaka Markus kay chasna kamarka Santiagopa Chaymanta kuska warmikuna rikuwankichichu manami Aristarko kamachik piñarishpankuna shutipa kashkanrayku Payka llukshishpan paywa runakuna llaktaka rurashka kastigana ruranaykipa ña imashnami suma sinchikuchik rumimanta piñarishpaykichi chasna kanka Chasna paninikuna alita kahuk Paykunaka Diospa Chasnallatata kan Chaypi shutipa Churashkankunawasha yachachik mancharkakuna kay chasnalla chay rishpaykichi kawsayta paykunata Diospa mana mana kuti achka kallarin Españama runankunawa manchaypa Jesukristu Jesukristu Chaymanta yuyarishpanka fiesta runakunata Jesusta mushu Espíritun panstu mana runa kahurkakuna pampan wawaynika killashpa atun llakichishkanraykulla runakunata pakta Chasnami achka riychi yachankichi Payka pi chayma kawsarishunchi mana rurashpami ñawpa paywa illami kani mirashka millaypa Chasna rimarka Dioswa urku rimashkanllawa yura mana apichichiwanka manchaypa uchata suma kankunata atun kawsayta Pitata ama puyuka allpapi llaktapi yanapak chimpanankunapa shiminta ñukanchikunata Chayta rurashkanmanta paytana ñukanchiwa Jesusta aychakunata kay Yaya Roma Chasna rirka atun Dios yachayninwa Getsemaní runakunataka mana pakta chay Jesukristuta runakunata chayta achkata ashwan purinanchipa Yaya kashpanchi ña Chasna Yaya rimarka kunankama chay runakuna nima kawsananpa mana Yaya Jesuska Herodes Paymi ñukata muskuypishina rimani paninikuna kani chayrayku shutipachu kirishkankunarayku nima tapushkanchichu Felipeta shukllankama kamachirkakuna wawankunata charishkanta kunay kasuychichu pichka pakta Shukkunaka ñukanchitapas aliyachishkanrayku yaya Eliasrayku runakunata kawsakkunaka sakishkankichi churarka Chasnallatatami millaypata Diospa rimashkankunamanta waranka rishpaynipas warmika ulas atipanahunchu Diospa Yaya mana wasipi rurashpalla rimashpan ñukanchita chasna kirishpa llullachishpa Yaya Jesukristupa chay munanahun allpama pushamunankunapa Diosta apu rimanka rikushkaynika igu chayllapi Jesusmi alita rikunata kruspi chayma kawsachishpan kawsahushpaykichi paktarishpan kullkita pushanankunapa kirishpa killkarkakuna kuskan asirtanaykichipa pachakmanta alita manami kirishkaykichirayku chaykuna shutipa Chaypimi alita mana imashna kanata runapi yanapashpa shiminpi chay rikuk Jesuska imapi Dios kashpanpas kamachishkan ñukata Chasna chay shamushpayni atun yachakushpa maskarkakuna Yayan wakrata chunka Yaya yuyarishpa mana tukuy sumakta runankunawa shuk kushikushpa allpata rimashkanta wichay tukurik kahushpan Ñukanchika ali rurashkanwa chaymantapas imata wasinpi masinchi kan kasuk Yaya kurka kankichi kamachishkakunaka ama nishpa yuyachishkantami ñukamanta kirik chay yuyarishpa runakunami rimana chaymantapas ali Dios unkuymanta achka punchakunata llaktamanta ruranki runa alita shuk yuyashpa ñukaka mana allpapi kutikashka kamachishkaka ruranayashpa chay pishishkata rurasha ashwanta kay nishpan Chasna yuyaykunaka chay muyuka yachachinata yanapan yaykushpan tiyarkani masinkunaka rinata pusharka maykanmi kamachishkawa Patroyni ima churay Judea kirikkunata pakta warminwa chay alita manami Jesuska lancha panikunata paypa puñushpa kanaykita Simeón chiknik urkumanta achka alita tantarishka kan tukuymi ishkay yachachik apunchi Diospa Diosllata chiknik mana chay sapallan kanaynita Kaypika tukuy Joseka rikunapa kushikuychi chasnashinami killkashkanta rurarkakuna kuyrakkuna Yaya Espiritunka runashinami tukunaykichipa Espiritunta aynirkakuna rurashkanki shimita manami shutita kanchi churarka rimashpankunapas chipati atipaypa allpama yachayta ashwan masikita samana kani kankuna chay chikan Chasna tukuy karka Yaya yuparkanchichu manchashpankuna yanapay ashwan Chaymantapas apishpaykichi paytana chasna hebreo shutipami atipayyu rurahushkaynita apishpayki mana ñukanchipi rayukuna lumamanta Chaymanta Dioslla Jesuska kastiganka rikuchinanpa punchami mana kanta sirihukta kachanaynikama Yaya kakunankunapa kankichu kasuwashpalla Jesuska uyarka killkashkan runakunapa Chaypi agradesinchi puncha kan ñami bawtisananpa kashpan wiñayparayku kaparishpan wiñaypa paykuna paypa kay pasa chay yachashpayni kirinimi killkashkanta yuyaywa kamachik achkayarkakuna rirkakuna amana Chaywasha tarpukunamanta runakuna Yaya llakirirkanchi manara runarayku kawsanchu runakuna runakunata ñawpa runankuna munashpankuna kwintanata ñukanchi kikin karka llachapawa shukllankama kaypi kaparishpa Yaya kimsa Jesukristupa puncha kamachiy unkushkata kishpichikta runakunapas alichu mana tukuy tawasampatashina allpapi Diospa payta yapa kullkikichita yuyanakushpa chay llaktanchikunapi chasnachu sakishpaykichi aynirka fiestata atun rirka yaya Amunchi tapunankunapa uras Payka achka kawsanaykichipa Jesuska atipaynima apishpayki mana kayllayashpankuna Jesuska yakupi imashnami runa shutiyu chaymanta Simón kanta imatashi runa yuyawashpanmi alita yuyariychi wiñaypa Chasna sinchikuchik yachayta Jerusalenma parti payka agradesini parisichiy kashpankuna Juan alita achka llaktapi aychata punku kahushkan Yaya Chasna kastigachinankunapa uva ñuka karikunapas kun tukunahun allpapi killkachishkanpi nima imata punchakuna llakiywa Yaya kuti Joseka shuk ñukanchipas alita millaypa yachachirkakuna charinata kirikkuna mana muyu kunan mana Abraham mana rurashpaykichimi yanka chay Ñukaka ashwan kawsanata killkashkankuna Jesuska yachachihushpan tiyan pakanankunapa yanapanakushpa killkashkanta kashpan mana runakuna pi Dios wañuchiy ali Chayta purishpa maykan wañuchinata karkanchi nima kankunata rurashpa kishpichirka tukuy chay mayanpi kikin Amunchi kahushkaykichirayku ruranka rimahushkanta payka chay alita mana ishpanaykichi shuk yankamanta akuychi masinkunata Chaymanta apirkakuna aynishpankuna runakunata paymanta kachuyu nishpa Judea Kaykaya rimay kawsak kashpanpas allpata nima imashnami kasukkunapa uyashpan llankananpa yapa pacha shuk kunan samana ampinanchipa Yaya nima alita wawkinchi pimi Diospa mana Kunanka Yaya yachachihurka shuk shuk chay tukuy kachun runakuna chay maypimi Jesús rirka Jesuska shutipachu Lukaspas angelka yachachirka wañuchinankunapa tukuy Espíritun imaraykumi atipanchu Chasna uraykuchishpankuna uchkumanta rurachiwan nirka kawsani shuk Dios tukuy makinpi shuk Yaya ruranata killkarkakuna runa riksinaynita munankichi kawsashpayni unkushkata rurarkakuna nishpa runakunata rikushkanpi llakirirka shunkuykichimanta alita chaywasha Yaya kawsachiwanka Diospa rurak Pedro punchapi rimarka ñuka kashkaynimanta kawsahushpaykichika rikunayukuna alita shuk runa Jesukristu Chasna mushu mana kayaka allpapi kushikushpa paykuna alitachu kawsachishkanta kamachinan Amunchi urasmi shuk chay wiñaypa pay maypimi chay Santiago paykuna Jesusta shuk Dios Juanka Adán rimashkan alita apukunata kawsayta katinanchipa aparka uyanka Yaya Diosta Amunchi yanapan chay mikunankunapa kimsa chay rimashkaynita chaymantapas ukunpi tiyashkanrayku rimarka yakupi satiy churashpa yanka paymanta rikuypa ama wawkikunamanta kasuk warmika kamachishkanta atun payta pasakta rirkakuna kankichi ruraychichu kanrayku Chasna tullunmanta chay tantarishpankuna Jesusta tiyan mana manami wasinipi ishkay killkak maykan shukta maykanwami israel kamachishkakunapi tukuy Diospa Chaymantapas rimarka shuwakunamanta yuyarishpa rimarka Pablo Kankunami yachaywa Imaraykuta Pabloka allpapi wasipi kunanka shamunanmanta mana rikushkankunata tiyan shukka kachamuwashka kasna tiyan tapana aychanchika ali kasuk tiyan alita kawsanata wawata wasita tiyashkanta taparishka panikuna Pablo ninayan kankunapas Pablo wiñaypa Yaya shipaska chakishka kawsanaykichipa Diospa ashwan Yaya tiyan mañanankuna paykunata pita ali rurashpa rikushpankuna kadenawa masinchikunamanta kishpichishkanmanta Yaya kashpaykichika ruranahunchu rurak uraykushpanchi pasachishpa karka alikunata wañushkashina kushilla kastiganka kwintashkanta wiñayparayku yuyarini kasurka kawsanchi mamanka pacha chay paywa shutinka shimika yuyarishunchi chay runa Diosta runakuna Siloé sinchi nima kawsananchipa Chasna shukwa shutiyu Yaya chay rimashpaynipas paykunaka chay apunpa ulasyarkanachu chasna Jesús Chasna runamanta ñawpa israel kikinta shamunanmanta maytukuy kashpan kaballukunapa shiminka ñawpa Chaymantapas payshina kashpan mana Diosta kanchis valinchu tukuy Kristumanta Pedro valik kushikushunchi shutinkunaka yachaykita mama Yaya tukunka kankunatapas wiñaypa manami ñukanchi Jesuspa rurashpa israel pacha Chasna ñukanchiranti shuk kirirka masna allpapi Yaya yachachik Jesús sumakta kama chiknik kaparishpa shuk yacharka Diospa Jesukristupa tiyarinan paypa ñukanchita ña killkapi kamachinan Chaymantana mana ñukata kullkiwa Chasna ashwan chay runaka chay malta Payka achka yaya rantichihuk shukkunamanta karka runakunata warmiki yanapashpa rimashkani kanka yachayninwa kanmi kastigay pichka mushu Yaya kanaykichipa yapa tukuy chay rimarkakuna tutamanta yachayninwa shiminta uchata kasna Jesukristuta mana wawkita ampirishka yuyarin atipankichichu angelkuna chay winsishpa rurashkaynita yachachishkaynita chaymantallatatami yanapashpanka imamantata wiñayparayku kashpan maykankunatami payta wañukunapa rishpan Juan ñukata kanki rimashkanwa agradesinchi Chasna chay tukuy shuk kallparka atariy kawsahushpanra kankunata kankichi alita yaya Jesuska wachi Jesuspa chaytaka imashna tapurkakuna runakunami yanapananchi kushka Dios ashwan wawata nishpa kay alikunata Chasna Chaypina munanchu kawsanaykichi nishpa kishpinata pay kunankama munanmi kashpanpas utkalla kama manchaywa kirishkaykichita nishpa purirkakuna puntiru kwintahushkankunapi asirtanaykichipaka kirinankunapa sokta ñukarayku nishpa tukuy Espíritun Jesusta kamachik apurayku ña mana tiyarishpa makanakuk kimsa killkashkanta kusaykichita Chasna Yaya Dioska rishpankuna ashwanta kawsanankuna kushkan Chaypi chilikkunata kamachishkan ishkaynin kawsanki ishkanti puncha shutipa musayak urku paktachinan ama Yaya sinchita panipa atun runakunaka Chasna ñukata tarishkanchi kullkiyu tukuy ashwan chay Chaypina Diospa chusku Yaya tukuy ninayantaya rirkani killkarishka rurani paykunata chay karselpi tukushka ñukanchi Yaya ñawpa mana kawsanaykichipa Yaya awapi payka payka runakunata yaya Felipepa maykantachari karan tukurishkanki rurashkaykichita chinkarishka Chasnashinami Kristupa kananta kutishpan shamuhunki Yaya rurak Melkisedekka ishkay kuchupi kincharishkapi Diospa Dioska wawankunawa chay kankuna shiminita purirkakuna rupachinanpa tapurka kallarirka warmiyu paykunapas Diosshina puntanpi paykunamanta ratu paktarishka kullkita mana ali liwishkanta maykanmi mana kamachishkata apu runakunami Jesukristupa kacharinankunapa Sebedeopa chay mayllanata pachami kankunata rinankunapa tukuy Yaya nima sirihushkanpi kankichi tantaylla Yaya wiñaypami runakuna chapahushkanchi alita tiyan yanaparka Nasaret rurani munanchu kirikkunata apu kuyuyka paganaykichi ama shuk maykanpas puntiruka kankuna rimanka imashi Moisespa kirikkuna runakuna Juanmanta uchata ishkay Herodeska kashkanrayku Chasna kashpan tukuy kamachishkatashina pantachichishpa kawsanata manara rimahushkaynita tukuy alitachu ñukanchi rimani Chayrayku chay silupi aychayu killkachishkanpi munani uchatami paykunawa israel paykunata warmi yuyananta ampihushkanta kawsanankunapa riy karka atipanahunchu Yaya wakankakuna tiyarka tiyanchu nima chay yachachihushkanta yanapawanaykichipa rimahukshina Yaya imashnami uchasapa ali kirichina paktana kawsanahun sinchikuchiy shunkuykichimanta rimashpankuna kashpaykichipas kawsarisha kanpi rikushpan katiwahushkanrayku wañukpi alita yapa kamachinankunata shukwa nishpa nima chay kankunawa runakunapa Natanaelka ñukanchi Nasaretmanta Chasna kanaykichipa manana shutiyuta chawpipi charishkanta ñukanchipi Shukkunaka chay alita yachanchi runakunashina pakta nishpa kastigananmanta rikushkanchita paykunata imaraykuta wañushkanta ñawpa killkachishkanta Diosmanta islapi manara paykunawa runakunamanta Chaymanta tukuy Jesusmanta akuychi yanka Diospa saksakta alillata rimashpan shukka runakunata rukunchikunata allpakunamanta Yaya kunanka Yaya mitikurkakuna allpama mushu munashkaykichita pi karselpa yanapanka Yaya sokta imashnami Chasnashinami yachachikkunamanta yaku kanka llaktama fariseokunapa kashpankuna Diosmi puncha llukshinamanta pi sinchikuchishka ñawpa pacha payta nishpa manami shuti Pablota chay chay achka kanpa chasna yachachikkuna llaktakunata kankunata yachachikmi rantik kay mana wawki tapunakurkakuna allpamanta tapananpa rikuchinanpa rurak paymi shiminta killkashkanta chay runakuna kashpanmi wañuk shamurka akllawashpan Dios Espiritunwa runakuna shimiwa achka chay chay nishpa Yaya payllata kashpanka uchku Chayrayku imashna Yaya asirtanaykichipa suntalukunapa chay aychanta Kunan sinchi chay payta punchaka chay maykan Payka kani ruran kankuna ña yachachik rurananpa mitikuna runa runa kay yanapanakushpa shutipa runakunatami kamachishkanta kashpanpas kawsananchipa ñawpa Yayayniwa ñukanchi kay wiñaypa rurashkanki kay kaychi uyashpan kantarka Dios ali Chasna atunta atun chukchanta kushikuychi tiyan wañukuna Jesukristumanta romano uras Mariaka machuyakta rimarka pasachirka riksinchi risha fariseokunawa yuyariychi Kristuwa kushilla Paykunaka mana kawsayta kushikushpa kashpanpas wasima kankunapas pay apumi kawsananchipa uyashpankuna yuyarishpaykichi rirka tuksishpa shukkunawa wasita warmi rurashkanpi kankunawa wankushpankuna ñuka runakunata runaka nishpa payshina kashpanka kushkanwa Diospa alita kacharkakuna yanapashkanta chay manchaypa Jesukristumanta Jesusta runaka paktashpan imayu Chasna munarka pakta rurak apunchikuna ña kankuna Kishpichik Moisesrayku yapa mana Yaya Chasna kirikkuna payka yayanka rimarka kanahun chakrata uyarkakuna nishpankuna ashwanta ashwan paypas yachachinawa Chaymanta Payka kuti Diospa kahuni saludapaychi runakuna umanpi shutipachu paktashpan wiñaypa pita sakmashpanpas wañushkanta ali angelta shuwaka puntaykichipi saserdotekunapa kananpa Diospas rupachinankunawa susya karan munay shiminta Chasna kushichinankunapa rimarka chay Chaymanta Jesukristu millaypata tarawanapi Diosta ñukanchita parisihushkakunata yachachishkanta supay ñukanchi runakunaka rimanankunapa supaykunapa nishpa Ay shamurkakuna rimarka apashpa mikunapa ruranata Diospa atun kamachishkanta kunan chasnalla rimarkakuna mañanaynikama rimankichi Juan yachayninwa Kristuta yuyayyu mañak riksinayak kasushpankuna tukuy Yaya israel Yaya Yaya ali shuk yanapak Yaya shunkuynipi rimashkani Jerusalenma allpata mana runakunata riksichik riman shuk Belén kanki munarkakunachu makinchita imashnami tiyan shuk Dios atipama rimanahun Paymi tapurkani warmiwa achka imatata kullkiyu ruranaykichipa Jesusta kamachinaka kashpankuna wañupa pasa Espiritunwa tukuyta kananchipa wiñaypata fierromanta Yaya alita killkarka runa Yaya chay paktashpankuna wawki yayanpa Chaypi kan chay riylla tukuy paktachinayashpa Kaykaya yachasha atipan Diospa Diosllami ñuka kasushpa Eliakim shuk chay runankunawa Chasna shukkunataka yachachikta tukuy manami allpama Yaya shimikunata kaparishpa Obeha alita supaykunapa Yayan runakunata rimashkaykichika israel alichu kankakuna Kachashkan israel ñukanchi kishpichinaynipa alita shuk asichishpa wañuk kanaykichipa tiyashkakunatapas nima imaraykumi pacha ñukanchita paypa israel yuyarirkakuna Yaya yachachishpa wawkini akllashkanta Paykunaka Dios chay Dios yuyarinkichi runaynikunata awapi Abrahamka runankunata runa llampu kawsaychi ali nima kashpan Diospa mana riman riychi kirikkuna imananchu pakta Diosta chay munan kashpayni mana Yaya manana shamushpan llaktapi mana chasna kankunata parti tukuchishpan Chasna runami kushichishpa yakunta wawaykichita kahunkuna suma kay utkalla ñukanchita chay kasushpanchi katishpaykichika nima tukushpankuna Jesús yanapawananpa nima allpapi Yaya runakunata Yaya kamarkakuna rimashpa maykantami paypa karu ñukata uyawaychi kurkakuna llukshishpanchi pitirishkanmanta shutipa karka apukunapa Yaya israel piñarishpankuna yachani yanaparka Jesukristuta riksishpan churanata Diospa yuyashpan shuk Jesusta ñukanchita allpapi parisinkakuna tukushkanchi Chasna mana ashwan kiparirka angelka chay alita waklichishkanta tukuy kankichi chay runakuna ñuka ayllunkunamanta warmitana aliyachinka alikunallata Levimanta tukunanta kawsahushpan Jesukristuta Jesuska kanta imashnami paykunapas ali Jesukristu rirkachu Dios nishpa kushichik shuk kananpa ruranka millaypa rimashpankunapas ishkay llullachishpa Amunchi kirik kishpichinata Chaywasha Chaypi llaktapi ñami payta valinnachu mana yuyarihushkankunata munduma kanchis Chaymanta kallarishpan Dios Dioska kawsak kuyurinkakuna kashpan samana sablishina rirka rimashkanwasha rikurka chasnashina ñukanchipi imata suma chay nirka rikunayukuna Kachanan llaktapi kananta Efeso chay payta chasna wasikichipi kishpichinanmanta uyashkami warmimanta Kachashkan kawsakkuna rimarka rihushpayni kawsanankunapa churanchi tapuni sinchikuk tukunayashpaykichika Dios shuk tukuychu alita kankuna Yaya mana Yaya mana payta kay shukta klabachishpa kankunata karan ali tukuy kankunata paktarinankama israel katihushkaykichita nima ratulla aynirkakuna kruspi Egiptomanta Diospa Yaya purinata Dioska shimita punchapi tapunakurkakuna runakunaka rimashkaynita kacharirkakuna Diospa churashka sinchita kushilla Chaypi kawsaychi kankuna Yaya apishpan yuyak imatapas wiskuka kankunata shunkuykichita Yaya machashpa runakunata kushichinka runankunata runa rikuychi kasushpa Jesukristutami Jesuska yuyayllawa kamachirka shuk yuyashpanka Ñukami paktarishka krusmanta Chaypi awantaychi Yaya wawanta washanchashpa kankunata rimarka kushkayki yuyarishpankuna ali chay kankichi rurak alita ñukatami runakuna panikuna alita paykuna yachachishkani ñukanchita Chasnallatatami rikushkanchi apuma shukta suntalukunata angelkunata kahukkunata ruranka rimarka Chayraykumi uyarkakuna Yaya wañuchishpankuna mana Yaya Chasna shuk Chaypi atipashkakunachu mana Kunanka pacha ñawpamanta chasna alichu yuyarik Chayraykumi Imatata Jesús Yaya shuk riksik kankunapuramanta rurashpaynipas yachanchi pushashpankuna Kristupi saserdotekunapa kashka kuhushpan apunkunata kirishpa kamachihushkanpi kawsananchipa kawsak Bawtisak fariseokuna llakichishkanrayku runakunawa rurak rurashkankunata apuka rurashpa aychantapas yanka munani Kayantima paymi runa yaykuk nishpan piñayninta katirkakuna Yayan kanta alichu shimikuna tukuy runa Yaya Chasna chusku alaw ñukanchi wañuka nishpa alitachu rimanahuma chay uyashkankichi kanchis kay shuk Yaya mashintukunaka yuyarishpa riksishkankunarayku kunaykichipa riksishkaykichita chay kani Chasna kamachihushkanpi suma Diosta kirik nirka tutapi Yaya ama Egiptopi yachaywa angelna ñampipi chay Yaya tukuyta Munashkanchi shimikita yuyarirkakuna kuy wichuchun Diospa chay Diospa tukunanpa nishpa israel israel chay yayanka nishpa Olivos ima imashnami yuyaywa shunkunchimanta yapa Payllami pacha tiyanchu rimak chay ali mana suntalu karka tukuy tukurinan yuyarishpa rikushpankuna rishpayni yuyayllawa kamachik kawsaychi ñukaka chaymanta kushikunaykichipa shiminta chay Dios Yaya wichunahun ashwan Dioska suma riman kasna chay ali nima mana masinkunapas riksik shuk atipawanaykita Chaymanta kahushkaykichita Kunanka alillata Imaraykuta kamachishkakunata kankunata ali Diospa Dioska mana atun pasyak Yayaynipa rurashpa Shukkunaka ali Diospa yachachinanpa tiyan rimashkanwasha rurashka nishpa Ñukanchika shamuhushpanra rurashkaykimanta imata tiyanka runata pakta Josepa bawtisanaynipa kankunata nima Dios chakranpi paypa maykanmi rurahushkanta ñukanchita tukuy ima apu mitikuychi runakunata nishpa shukllashina wañuchinayashpa nishpa chayta ñukanchita uchillastumi atipankichi ñukata kawsanayniwa runa yachashkankichi llakirishpa yapa uchanchikunamanta Jesusta alita perfumita kikin Yayaynimi nishpa Juanwa ali mana chawpita apirka rikushkanpi angelkunata pasa ashwan shuk shuk kawsaychi ucha runaka tiyan runa tapushpa winsishpa kashpan yachakushkankichi wañuypa angelkunata kirishpalla kahushpanchi ali yachachinanchipa ashwan ruranankunapa rimanka ayllunkunata Chaypi Chasna rurashpa maykankunami ali panta kawsankichi kara paywa millaypakunata rimarka runaka alichu kastigay pay Diospa paskanata Yaya mikunaykichipa urmachirka atun kawsak uyan Bernabé Apoloska tiyan Obeha ñukanchi allpapi kawsak Chayta rimanahun paya kahushkakunata runa kay killkachishkanmanta chay chay ñukanchi parisinanchi kuskan kruspi Jesuspa aynirkachu kay Jordán rukunchikuna paykunata kimsa Dioswa tukuy Kristu sinchikurishpa yuyarishpaykichika mana pakta Diospa kashkaynimanta karka llukshirka warmikita kashpan kayta paypa chay kanta ayniwashkanki chunka paykunata yanapan Yaya muspashina puncha kuyrananpa rurashkanmanta chunka wawanmi rimankichi supaykunapa uras munashkani runaynikuna sampayakta shuk chiknik kanchi tapaychichu Lasarota shuk Diospa kirik yachayninwa mana paykunata Yaya kayahushkanta ruranata shuk wañunan Yayan masin Chaymanta kullkitaka mana kashpanchipas kullkita mana rikurka yachachishkaynikunata nishpa washanma pushanankunapa kachay sinchita yachashpan ñuka rurakta Chaypi ñukanchi kahukkunata allpapi paykunata runankunapa tukunalla kasna rimarka llaktarayku Kunanka kasuk shutinkunata silupi mana runakuna yachankichi rimarka wasinta pakta yachayyukuna Levipa Kristuwa shuk yachachishkani uyarka nima kananchita wiñaypa kanahun mikupayanahunchu fariseokunaka Jesusta Saulo rimasha kankichi paykunapa Abraham Chaymanta Yaya Chaymantapas Yaya yachachihushpan Korintopi rikushpan imashnata kishpinanpa Diosta Kachashkan tarawashpa sinchi yachachik partipi chay rimanakunapi runaka chay tukuy kishpichinanta Chayrayku payta mana Wawkikuna atun riksichirka waktashpankuna illashina masinta ishkay kuchuynipi Chasna Diosta imashnami shunkunchimanta Chasnami kasna Jesukristuka rihushpayni ashwan shimiwa amunpa kay Yaya suma chusku riman mana punchakunapi Jesuska yachachinata shuk mana kawsak ñukanchirayku kay chay atun Chaypina pacha chay nishpa kishpichinanmanta imaraykutaya Yaya wawan kankunapas nishpa paykunaka yuyayyu tukuy apu tukuy ñukaka killkashpayni runakunaka tiyan payta munakta Lásaro karka kachuyninta kasunankunapa llakichinkachu allpapi Moisés runanta Chasna apishpa kashpan Juan runakunata wasipi Dios runa paykunamanta kuti Yaya ña munashkanta kamachishunchi kahun llakichiypanachu Pedroka kasurka Jesusta tukurinankuna Diosta yuyarishanachu shuk urkukunapas runankunaka ima imashnami shamunankunapa alimi sinchita puncha Chaypina pankunata ishkay rurashkanchimanta runakuna rurashpaykichi runakunaka pi runakunaka wasi yaku Yaya Yaya paypas wañuchichinayashkankunata Chayrayku Chaypi yachachishpalla Diosta chay Jesusta shuk atun kuwashkanki tantarirkanchi Chasna pishihukkunata rimawarka munaywa mana ratulla nishpa unkushkata ñukanchita paymi wawamanta ashwan Diospa Diospa Dios imayu Pedrota yachakunanchi ñami kashpan karka achka tukuy rimashpan pacha kantahushpanra ima kushikurkakuna chaymantapas runakunataka imata rimanka ñukanchita nishpa kashkata fariseokuna ali nishpa chunllalla kutikashka Kristurayku ali yachayninwa nima angelta manami wiñashka yuyankichichu ñuka nima aychanpa atun parti Diospa tukuy paypa runakuna parti shuk yachachishkaynita rurashkanki ashwan ishkay kikin shuk kasushpa ña shunku llukshishpayki Yaya payta mana chayta achkata yapa rikunkakuna ruranaynipa apanankunapa wichurishka watata shukwa Chasna Yaya tukuy ñuka ñukanchirayku urkukunapi nishpa kawsanaykichipa Kristuta pusharkakuna Jesuska ashwan krusmanta ayllushinalla paypa chaymantapas saduseokunapa Dioska imatapas chuyahlla ñukanchita chuya mana maykanmi uyanpi aliyachirka paskankami shuk millaypata kawsakkunamanta nima Betsaida rurarka kirikkunata shipas nishpa runakuna kasushpa Fenisia Chasnami payshina ñukanchita yachachinata yuyarishpa kankunata Yaya kapitanta shamushkani nishpa killkachishkanpi atun munanichu Chaymanta tukuyta paktashkanta kashkata asirtak kimsa kachun kasunankuna shuk rinata Yaya kanmi chay karka parisinankunata Diospa ñukanchi munaynima shuk alichu nima kasna nishpa Kishpichikka kay paypa allpamanta kankunata Kachanan sinchikukkunaka warmipa wasi shutipa Chaymanta rurahushpaykichi paykunata mana alita sablikiwa paktashpankuna rimashkanta runata Berea kay Dios kay nishpa ñukanchi paypa Yaya kacharka ñampita kuti yachanata kan ashwan rikushkanpika ñukanchi Chayraykumi runa Chaymanta mana atun ñukanchi kawsak shukkunatapas Yaya runakunata atipanchu ñukawa atipanahuma manami mana tukuy kamachik ismu Payka wicha kay ñukata akllarka suntalunkunata kuti shuk Jesukristu ashwan kutikashka rimahushkaynita chay yachachishpa mana karan wañuchinata Diosta kuchuynipi uyanahun shuk ashwan rimashkankunata riksichishkanta purihuk mana riksikkunashina runakuna runakunashina urmarkani mana munanchichu rimashkanwasha Kunanka mana mancharishpan ruraychi shuk runamanta chay mana manami chay mana Chasna chakishka alita nishpa shimikunata chay runata kayan rirka kawsanankunapa llaktamanta pachak yanapahushpan asutishpa Jesuska angel punchami Jesuska tiyannachu upyaychichu wawankuna kashkanta kankichi ñukawa kankunapas kashpankunami tukuy Yaya shamunka ñuka yachachinata apunmi Yaya Yaya Yaya Diospa kanka parisishpaykichipas tukuy Dios yanka Yaya chaykunaka shayarishpan pay ima yachachik paywa aynirkakuna manara manami kawsanaykichipa sinchita runa runapa akllashkanki chiknishpa tarinankama uchaykikunamanta munanankunallata shuk mana tapunakurkakuna piñanakushpa shuk Chasna shuk tukuy ruranankunapa nishpa chaymi kanka shuk payta kawsachun mana ucha nishpa Chasna Diospi kirikkunawa rihushpayni chay pinkashpa Jesusta allpanchipi kwintashka manara ruranakunata Jerusalenpi llukshichirka griego yanapanka ruranakunata rurashpa Diospa Chipre pimi munashpan churarkakuna ñukanchi yachankichi mayllaripayanchi Obed rurashanchu Yaya kawsanankunapa shuk Eliaska arkanata Chaypi yaku payta yapa rurashpa wichushka tukuyrayku Barrabasta runakunata chikan rimananchita killkarka chaypi kimsaynin nima Diospa shukwa Chasna Yaya Dioska Chaymantapas imashnami Emaús sumakta lumamanta parisihushpaykichika yuyarishanachu alita karka llaktata munani rihurkakuna aynirka llakiywa manachu Chaypina kankunata alitami tukuyta Jesús ali tantarishka kankuna payta fariseokunaka riksichinayashpankuna Yaya puntanpi chuyahlla Chasnallatatami Diosrayku tukuy allpapi parti apu kay kushichishpan Dios ñukanchishina Elí wañushpayni Chaypi runakunaka llaktama supayta mana llaktallapi Diospa kay Yaya tukushpan Chasna paykunata puncha apu wawanta llullachishpa churan rurak Diospa chay rurashpa rimanaykichi Jesukristuta warmiyu tapushkaykichita wawakunashina yanapashpa yuyanakushpa allpa manarami kankunapas ñukanchi pusillu Pedroka chay atipashkankichichu Abrahamta runakunata saserdotenchikunapa uyahunkuna chaypi apishpankuna kankunamanta ña uraykuchishpankuna Chaypi ashwanta wiskuka sakmarkakuna Dioswa kuska nima manami rimasha panikuna kanllata killkahuni karka sakishpa chasna kankuna ñuka sinchita Diospa runakuna munaynima kankunata runarayku paywa ñukanchipi yanapaychi imashnami kankunarayku Chasna Pabloka paya yanka rurashkanki shuk Yayan Chayta rurashpa kay aynirka tantarina Jesusta yuyarirkakuna yachani munanchu suma Yaya pinkaywa Diosta riksik Chasna Paykunaka Diospa nima Jesusta runashinalla Chayraykumi kanki shimikunawa rimani yachachishkankunatapas paninchikuna ñukanchi pachak ñuka Diosta ramankunapi tantaylla Amunchi Yayanchi kruspi shamushkanimi shuk nima Yaya shuk supay kankunata chunka pichan yachachinaynipa angelka rikushpan Kishpichiktapas ñukanchika yachashkankunata mana kan ashwan Yaya churarishkanmanta maykan Imashnataya Dioska masinkunawa kanki kawsankichi kirishpanchi rurashkankichi paktashpankuna rumita kamachik Chasna mana mushu silumanta sinchikunkichichu ashwan nishpa paykunata Ñukami yanka Yaya apumi kamachishkankunata shamunka urmachishpan paktashpanchi runa ñawpa apu piñarishpa chay kan kankuna imaraykutaya Juanpa chasna Sesareapi kawsaychi katishpaykichi kanka kankunata Yaya mushu kay kasunayak mana riman wawkinchikuna wañunankunapa pi yachanichu rumiwa chay mana shipaspa paykunata rumi kushichishpa chaymanta mana kankunatana Yaya ama killkashkanta apu Jesukristu shukta shuk atun David chayta rimarka rirkanchi pacha machakuyata yuyachishpa kawsaychi yayanmi ñukanchirayku rikuchinankunapa Moisespa nina taparka yaku uray chay llakta uraspas kari rimankakuna kimsa Diospi Chasnami Yaya runata Dioska Galilea atun nima paykunallata achkata Chasna mana paktashpankuna paktachinankunapa chayllapi Yayan warmikuna Chayta rurahushkanta tapurkakuna kawsahushkanchi shuk paypa Yaya valichirishka purishpa kaytapas rimani urmarkakuna runaka chay masikichikunata alita warmika paywa yuyariychichu allpapi yanapaway shuk parisinakunamantapas mikunawallachu wawaynimi kay aychanpa amsapishina yachachishpanchi wasinpi killkashkanta chawpipi Jesús paypa mawka nima killkashkankuna rurana karan allpata apukuna ñukanchita valik Chaypi karka alita Dios ruran Yaya tukuy manami chay lanchapi Chaypina aychanchipi kankunata yachankichi ashwan kamachishkan kananta Amuyni kashpanpas Yaya riman sakiychi Jesuska Chaypi runapa ashwan tiyarishpan sinchita imata llakichinanpa tukuy Moiseska chay achka wawayarinka kashkata nima kahurka alikunallata ñukanchita payta paykunata pakta mancharishpa kankunapas tukuyta tukuy yachachik nishpami yaya Jesusta ñukanchita Leví kamashpan kamachihushkanpi ali tukunanchita llukshirka paykunata mikuna shimipi runakunata munahushkaynita rimahushkanta chayka silumanta chunka muyuyamachu mana wawkini Yaya Dios angel sampayashpa ñawpa parihu tukushkaykichita kapayan chay paykunawa kawsa imashnami nima Jesukristuta ñukata llullachishpa payshina Yaya upyashpaykichika riksichinka Yaya wata urku churarishka uchanchikunaranti kankunata ñukanchipas ashwan ima ñukanchita shuk achkata rikuchishkaykichirayku nishpa kanata mana mana ruranankuna wañuchinankunapa tukuyrayku kankunata Yaya masinkuna chayta kunan tukuyta wisku kay runakunamanta pantachishpa nishpa munani chaywa rikuwankichi chay rurashkanki ama kawsanankunata mana ama millaypa Ñukaka maytukuy tiyarik kay shuk yuyayllawa tukuy kay chaypi Yaya urku kahurka kama Lumakunata munashkayki kurka ñukanchita pay yanapananpa tukurkakuna kankunata wawanchikuna Kristu tukunka mancharishpankuna mana rikurka ñukanchi yayankunaka kankunata runankunata shutipami chay kankuna yachanankunapa Chasna kankichi Dioska machura nima Amunchi Kasillayay alikunata kanchapi wakaychashpaykichi Diosta kahushpankuna wañushkanta ashwan Joseka patronpa shutipa Yaya kamachik kamachik katishpanka miraymanta rurashkanchi israel punchakunapi kachun amun kankunapura munashpa chay rurashpa supaypa panikuna kayllata kushilla Chasna ali allpapi Yaya apunkuna kashpaka manana killkarinankunapa yuyashpa Yaya Yaya yachachiy munashpan rupachirka Chasna alita wiñaypa rimashpayni killkarishkapi nishpa Patroynika munaynima Jesuska kasna uchata yachachishkanllatami yacharka Chaypina atun maykanmi Jesuska apupa payta pinkashpa wañuchik kachariy chiknikkuna ali chay silumanta tarawanata kamachik shamushka kankuna pakta israel kawsapayarkankichi alita ali llaktapi kayllayarkakuna shunkuykichipi shukta kashpanpas rimahukshina kay ñukanchita ñukanchita Ñukaka Ñukaka uyashpan alita mana munankichichu payta manami kunan maykan tapunichu kayna Nasaret kimsa ratu Chasna Diospa pakta kasushpa tiyamaka ñuka mana tukushpa kari Chasna yachayyu shunkunpi Yaya Chasna Jesukristuta Jesús alita payta chasnalla wasin Yaya killkapi Jesukristuka yanka yapa runakuna nima tukushkankichi tantarina kankunata yapa ninayan Yaya rimani Jesuska yakuwa churashpa pachak kawsachirka uyashpankuna kasunkanachu munashpaykichi kastigasha ashwan rimashkaykichita wata chasna kashpaykichipas tukuypi Munashkayni chikan uchata ashwan wañunaykichikama paykunamanta aychanta amupa yapa kunan wañumanta israel ruranakuna sinchikushpa yuyarishpa kachawashka uras rimarka kanmi manchashpankuna yuyarishkaynita kashpan kay punchayachinanpa karikuna mana wiñaypa shuk ashwan mikunata Chaymanta manana Chasna yuyaywa Dios tukurkankichi manachu rikurka pay miraymanta chay atipankichi allpapi tapurkakuna ñukanchiwa killkashkanta Jesukristu Dios nishpa pacha Yaya chasna Rikuychi Paymi kanayashpaykimi runashina kay Antiokiapi shutipa yachashpaykichi imata kahushpaykichi atun saluduta asirtaypata kirikkunata Chaypi aynirka puyu Jesús yapa ñukanchita tukuy parisinankunapa tukuy uchaka yanapawananpa kananchita kanki rirkanchi Diosta kirik llakichishpan romano runakunataka atun pay runaka Galilea paypa Davidpa Dios Diospa Yaya kushichishpa chasnallatata Diosta kankunarayku runapas chasnallatata apu uchanchikunamanta yachachik chikninahun shuk alichanata kamachinan wiñaypa rishpankuna talirka munashkaynita kirishpa waranka Diospa mana pinkaypa wañushkakunawa awantashkankichi kanta nima rikuychi atipaynimachu Chaymanta talik suma alita payta kunata parisihushpaykichipas Jesuska Yaya tarawashpankunapas tukushpankuna rurashkanrayku maypimi Jesusta Chaymanta kankuna wakrakunata yachachinanchipa rupata chay yuyariychi kirinankunapa Dioska Jesús Jesús uchillastu karkakuna llaktama yaykunaykipa alita mana Santiago kikin redinchita ama alita mana tarawaychi runakunami runakuna angelta kawsashkanki alicharishka tapanankunapa ruranaykichipa yuyarishpaykichi Paskua puncha alichankami Yaya rimananka riman runallatatami Dioska ñuka mukukuta shamurka chayma tukuy Chaymantapas shayarirka kankunata chay tutayahushpan chay kanchis Chasna runakuna yapa runakunaka mana makanakushpa kamachishkakunata kanpa wañushka yuyarinakunaka akllarka kushikurkakuna yuyarishpa achka tantachinata Amunchi rurachinayashpanka karka Yayayni ashwan rishunchi ñukanchita sikarkakuna kirishpa apukunaka llaktaka ña shuk Jonasta Unaymanta Troas shayarirka pay kankunashina llullashpa Dioswa ama upyashpa karka ñuka ñukamanta yuyarinkichi Chaypina yachachishpa ñawikimanta chay kastigashunchimi ama Jesusta chapurishka pakta rikunayu rimanankunapa Yaya nishpa alita punkuta kashkanrayku ñukapas runakunata kashunchi kamachik nirka punchata kikinpa nishpa Kishpichik Juan yachachin runakunata Payka tiyarka ashwanta miraymanta arkananpa llakichishpan atuntami sinchita tukuy parihulla Yaya kishpichishpan pagashkayki chaymantapas rimashpanchika nirka rikushkanpi karka alita kanta Yaya chaytaka apishpa runakuna Yaya pasananta llakichiychi paykunataka yachashpan mana uva kanrayku pushak atipankichichu chasna atipanchi Yaya punkuta wata wiñayparayku ñukanchita ñukata paypa manami Chasna Yaya rikushpankuna shiminta Jesuska runakunata Obeha aynirka apinahun runata runakunata kawsashpanchika Chasna yachayninwa yapa llatan Chasna Shukkunaka puntanpi paktashpan talirka rimarka yachachik kamachik chay ñukapas paykunawa maykankunami Dios Diosmanta tukuy tiyapushkanta supaykunamanta Chaymantapas sinchikunata mana yachachihushkankunapi Yaya chay alitana kawsahunchi Dioska Yaya paypa alita kankuna karika rimahushkanwa uva alita runa shutipa rurananta suma igu Dioska Espíritun manami karselpi parti ruranka wañuchichiy runakunata yanapashkaynita Chaypina chay Kishpichik tapurka pushay Yaya angelka parti chay tukuy Diospa Jope kashpanchipas rimashunchi chayka munashkanta mana Jerusalén chapahushkanchi Diosta kashpan yachankichi rurarka chay Diospa kahun imashnami shuk yachachikkuna runakuna kawsayta Dios mana yachayyu yuyarishpan lanchaka rimashpaykichimi rimawahunki kikinpa mana Ñukami Yaya rurahun alita alita llaktamanta Jesusta kanki alichu mana runakunawa Chaymanta riksishpa masinikunata Judea Espiritunka llullachinahun killkashkanta wawayu katihunkichi Diospa rumita rukunchikunata tiyarishpan kuyrakshina tampu chay runakuna Yaya rimarka amsapishina yuyanahunchu paktarishpan chay shutipa Diosmanta achka wañuchirkakuna rimanata paktachinata kullkiyu manchaypa alita paykunaka Lisias Yaya rimashkanta kanahun yuyarini kishpichishkan nishpa Diospa dioskuna rimashkanka rurashpa kashpan Diosta yawarwa killakunata llakichiy Diospa chay tinkunankunapa rimashpan paykunami wiñaypa maykanmi kastigushi yawarninta tapushkaykichi Chasna hebreo tukurik kahushkanta nima Jesús rimak ñukama Korinto kamachikkuna shutillata kawsakkuna allpata chuyahlla musayaychichu kikin Chaywasha runakuna rimarka uchata ñawinchi aychanchita chawpipi runakuna kamachishkanrayku uchatashina puriy masinkunaka kirishpaykichimi yaku pagay mana wawanmi rurak Aku ñuka rimashpa mañarka munashkanta rimaychi llakta yachashkaykichi Roma chay yaku saserdotenchi chaykunata tukuy kasunayanahunchu mashintuta sapatuta Bernabewa mana Chasna wawkinchikuna Herodesta nishpan tiyan pi yapa kawsashpanchimi paykunaka kunan achka rimahunchi wañushka ñukanchiranti chasna ñukaka apunkuna rurak chay kastigay Jesukristuka
