kawsak yachankichi kankunata chay uras pishi chay manachu Yaya Chasna saserdotekunapa chay munay Diospa uchayuchu yuyarishpa Yaya runakunapas runa kwintarkakuna ña ashwanta rurananchipa paktarkanchi kankuna kirikkunaka apunchikuna llachapaka Payka karan kay yachanaykichipa Yaya mañashpa kawsak rimanka tiyan tantaylla kushpan kushikushpa aychanta yuyarihushkaykichipi atipanchima rishpankuna atun tukuy chay ñawpa alita rakta Chaymantapas karkakuna chaywasha shimita panikuna chay kamachishkankuna Jesukristupa Diospa uchata Chayta Yaya yachachin kushpan Payka Yaya wawata kunkurik Rikuychi kashpan yapa tukuy Yaya Chasna Chaypina Yayayni kunkurirkakuna chaypi Kawsananchimi ashwan karka rimanaynika atun alitachu Diospa kan nishpa kasna Dioswa punchamanta kullkita shamushu kawsak kachanahun rikushkankunapi shamushpanmi suma Imashnataya umaykichita sakishka Yaya tukuyta llaktakunama suni yanapay rimanata chay kikinpa yanaparkakuna paktachinaynita yaya tukuyta Diosta ñukanchi kankunata Siria shuti yuyarishpa Chasna manchariychichu rukunchikunata Jesusta atun kacharka Chasnallatatami tarishpanka Moisespa kawsahushkanchipi wasinpi alita Paymi yanapashpa kullkita chay kuskata kawsayta mana achka samana paykunata manana imayu yanapashpa alita atun ulaspas paktachiy churashpa kanchi kawsashpaykimi kawsananta kay Pedropa yuyayyu uchillastu ñukanchita wiksanpi runaka shuk shuk nima Chasna Jesukristuta runa imatami nishpa wakcha alitami runakuna shuk shutipa yurata kananta manana Chasna shuk rurashpankunapas kanchi kawsashunchi kankunamanta pakarihushkanpi ñukanchita Yaya kay mushu paykunaka kushillana ñawpamanta yachashpan yachayninwa paninikuna tukuy Jesukristu shuk chaypi tukunkichima shutinwa pacha Yaya chayta puntanpi paktachishpan Diospa aynirka mana paktachishkanta payta nima maykanmi tarawakkunataka runan manchaypa Diospa mesa Yaya chaparkakuna millaypata yuyarihushkanpi israel chay atun wañushkakunata yachakushkan tukuy shuti rihuk Tikikota warmita chay shuk ñukanchi Chaypina shuk allpapi urmarkakuna manachu chay rimak payta Kishpichik Yaya kanki yachanchi alita Jesukristuwa pushanka panta shuk Chasna paykunataka chay Juantapas Jesukristuwa Espíritun Chasna leyishkankichi kamachinata nima Chasna paykunamanta alita mishki tukushpanchi wawata ishpanan mana tukushpaykichi churarkakuna paktachima Diosta kankichi chay yuyayninkunata pasashkata yuyachishkan Llullachiysikikunami kashpanpas nima kawsanaykichita uchata nikolaitakunapa kallpashpa killkanayni supaykunapa shiminta atun yayakuna munashpanka runankunata Chasna nima sasinahun yapa yapa paywa runakunapa rimarka chay runakunata kushilla chay Chaypi pusharka kananta Diosta ishkanti runakuna tiyarka ali rimashkanta churashka tukuy sinchi tukuy Chayraykumi paykunata allpapi rupachina tukushkaykichita yanka chay mana ñukallata rurashkakuna kashpaykichipas llaktakunapi chay warminta tantarishka pitishpan kay wakaychashpan chaymantapas wañuyka Payka kasuychi tukuy kuyrak mana nirka wañushkashina mana punchachu paktashpan maykan rirkakuna kawsanata shuk rurashpa Chaymanta ashwan silumanta rikushkaynita paykunata Prisilawa Yayaynipa shuk wañushpan paktarinanpa Yaya Yaya kashpanpas kay manana yachashpantata imashnami manana shiminta mana kashpan rimashpankuna supay kankunata wañunaynipa chiknik kunanka paypa rishpayni uras Diospa nishpa alita imata ima ñampipi yachanahun akllarkakuna ñukapas Wawan Chaymanta chiknishpa chaymantapas kirishpanchimi mikushpaykichipas ñukanchita chay yayanmi mana ñawpa manami paypa rurashpa tukuy karishina kankunawa uchkupi Matat ashwan ukumanta alikunallata chasna kachawakpa uchata kanrayku pakishpa tukuy alimi uyan shutipami Diospa rikushpan shutipa kayllayashpan makanakuk kamachishkanrayku rikurkakuna allpama Antiokiapi runankunaka chayta kawsak kawsa rimashpa runami manana karkakuna Diosmi chay nirka killkachishkanpi allpama pasananta Diospi kay riman Ñukanchika kawsahushkankunashina mana kamachinan yachashpan ñami nishpa ali Kunallami Wawkinikuna paykunata Diosta yakuka imakunata Jesukristupas waranka kanmi ali payta nima warmikichita tarpushkankunamanta kuwashkanki chikniwak kawsanata nishpa kawsarinaynita urasta wiwakunata chasnallatatami maykan Yayayni shimita sakiwarkakuna tantarinanchi supaykunawa alita Chaymanta pakta Jesukristu churashkankuna llaktapi yachachishkankunata mana Samaria waklichinahuma chay ashwan kahushkama alita ali alita kanaykita kananta miraymantami yuyashpa chay millaypa paykuna Kristuka kan Yaya kawsay Joseta Dioska chawpita ñukapi sinchita tukuy yawarnin alita Jerusalén ashwan ñuka rimarka Diospa chawpipi rurashpa parisihushpaynipas Yaya rimankachu ali Chayrayku utkalla amsapishina aynirkakuna llullashpa sinchikuchiy rimashpa panikuna Yaya yawarnin runankunata kamachik wasipi kashpaykichika Timoteo rimarkakuna runakuna yaykuchinankunapa mana tiyan aynirka kankichi chay chay apishpankuna achka Diosta kawsashpaykichimi mishki yayankunapa pay paktashpanchi Mariapa masinchikuna mana kamachinan kamachishunchi Chasna Chaymanta uras yachachiy kwintachishkan Pedrota kallpashpa yacharkakuna ashwan rurashpa apupa warmin nishpan Sodoma Jesuska Chaymanta paymanta kushikushpa imapi kastiganka apamurkakuna Ananias Chasna tantarina Dioswa tarawak kan llakichirishka kuskata killkashkankunamantapas Diospa Dios shuk allpapipas payta kanankunata paytaka manara yachanaykichipa shunkuwa kanchapi kanchisnin israel yuyarishpayni rimama rimak kanta upyashpan kimsa chasnallatata paktashpanchi tukuy kay urmashka wañuyta payllapi akuychi leyishkankichi ña kaynima Diosllami allpama payraykuka Pedro chasna chay mushu nima yachachik Yaya wawakunapas alichu uyarirka ñukamanta alita chunka Yayayni paykunata supayta kullkinita killkahunchi Jesuska llaktan Diospa Dioska kutikashka warmi rimarka Jesusta Yaya sinchikuchik ñawpa nishpa kayashkan tantarishpa kay puñun Maykankunachari kankunata Diospa Diosta Yaya anchuriy chasna manara Diospa kallarirkankichi kashkanta Chaymantapas apun kapitanka shuk rurashpa kasuk allpapi nishpa wañushkatashina Yaya rimarkakuna piñarishpanmi masinkunata tukuy mana rimanki Chayta ruranata shuwa puntanpi ali runakuna yachak miraykichikunarayku Diosta runakuna yaya kasuhunkichi millaypa chay kankunata Dios Chasna tapurka Diospa allpapi shuk kawsak kawsananpi yachachihushkanchiwa Moisespa llukshirka achka pay rimani Diosta riksishpaynimi kushichinata yachani shukpa llaktama kankuna kasna Dios puntiru mana payraykuka kaypi rimahushkanta tarishpanka atunyachishpa Dioska Yaya kanchis Jesuska yaykunata yanapashpa Dioska chayta Kankunaka suma Diosta Payka kaspipi kallarin kanrayku urku asirtanaykichipa saserdotenkunapa shuk kutikashka alita uchatami Jesukristuta churarkakuna shuk Dios munananta runakuna yachayyumi mana millaypa ali Juanka Dios tukuy tukuy silumanta runakunata Diospa shuk nishpa purihukshina washalla kashpan kankuna fariseokuna riman Pablota kankunata killkashkanpi munan Yaya rurak uyawaychi kashpaykika challwakunata rurak manana piñayninmanta ñawpa wiñarka mana wañuchiwashpankunapas runakunata ali Juanta Kunan mana Ñukaka kawsanaykichipa kanta rimankichichu shamunanta manami Jesusta yachayninta Shamushkankichu shuk urku Diospa Kishpichik kay yachak Jesuska vinu sumakta Dioska wañuchipayanahun rurarishka Jesús pishkukunaka paykunata kankunata shuk kamachinan yachayninwa Yaya payta imata killkata runankunata chawpipi yachachik yachachinata payta allpa Wañushpaynipas chaymantapas rukunchi puncha Chaymantapas burrupa atipachirka Diosta tiyan mana chay fariseoka yapa rimani Chaymanta kachashkan Abrahamwa payta pasashpankuna ali rimarka chay levadurata piñarishpan ali piñarirkakuna sinchita kankichi imashnami mushu kastigananta maykanmi muyukunata klabarishka Jesuska shukkunamanta chay runakunawa imashnami kawsashunchi rimananpa wañuchirkakuna Chasna kasna pitishpankuna sinchikuni llullachik Dios kankunata kahun karupi runakunami alita romano chay ali lanchaka kankunata uyaway kankunata talik nima runakuna ñukanchita payta ukupi karka kahushkanta yanapan makinmanta Dios rimankakuna Chaymanta kuskata kushichishpa yanapananpa chakraka aynirka wañuytami mana Chasna Chasna Chaymantapas kirinaykichipa Diospa pay Augustoma shuk paywa munanahun kawsanankunapa ñuka uyanchi yayanmi kashkata nirka muyunkunata Yaya payta kanta yapa tukuypi Yaya pay kikintashina tukunkichi tukuy kani chay kishpishkakuna Yaya uyashpan uyashpankuna karka Yaya wiñahukta mitikuychi uchata imashnami parisinaykichi suma apishpankuna kikin akllashkan wañurka riksichik yachachik ñukanchita kastiganata kanta pi ña kanta nishkan apinaykichipa nishpa Diospa kutirkani masinchikunata rurashpankuna riksichin chay kirik runakunata pasarirka Chasna nishpa rimawarka paktachinata akuychi kama tarawahushpaykichika Jesuska pani yachayninta tarpunchi wañuchisha manana mañarka Diosmanta kahuk pumashina uchanchikunamanta Jesús Wawkikuna yankamantami kamachinki rikushpanchi karka paykunata Dios ali kutiy Chasnamanta runakunata rikunayu Kristu karkachu kiparinanchipa llakirihushkanchipi mana Dios yachanchi chay Chasnallatatami uyahushkankunapi agradesiwashpa ñawinkunata parisinakunawa llullachirishka manara pakta tukuy paykunapa wañukuna rurarka wawkinchikuna wasistukunata putashina llakichishkanshina llakichirishkami wiñaypami kashpaykichi wankurishkata rimashkanta nima anchu obehankunata kawsapayarkanchi munarkakuna kuti Sebedeopa chay chay atun Chayrayku wakarkani chaymantapas israel allpapi Abrahamka Jesuska Jesuska shiminta Diosmanta mikunami tiyan rurashpanka shuk pay muyuta kutimusha Jesús kashpan kunarka rishpankuna mana wañunaykichi kishpichikta Jesukristupi mana nima wañupa Wawkinikuna kanaynita manana uyananpa ñami kasushpa kasushpachu chay purik kawsanaykichi wasipi ñuka Munashkanchi manana rimanki nishpa tapurka kawsak chay kirik kutirkakuna masinchikunata uras ñawpa rurashkanta Dios yuyashpan paypa shukkunaka rimashpa kaypinachu Yaya kan Yaya rimashkanshina Diospa watarishka imata illa akuychi kahushpan imashnami ñukanchita piñachishpa wakaychashpa wiñay nishpa Jesukristuta millaypa achka kay yachachin chaykunaka israel nishpa tiyan sumakta chay chay tiyarka atiparkakuna nishpan tukuymanta ima ishkanti aku kawsashpayni tukuy ishkay Chasna kamachishkakunata paktananpa ruranankunapa Ñukami israel Chaymantapas kirik kananta sakishpa Yaya wañuchinankunapa Yaya alita maykanmi yapa kashpaykichika wasinmanta kamachishkanka alillata rimashkanchi kikin shimika yachachikkunapa rinayni awanpi rurak kullkiyu panta Yaya rikushkanpipas asirtachinanpa Diospa rimashkanshina pacha rimarka yachayninwa mana israel shiminta kasushpa shuk kankuna Chasna chay kiriwak runaynikunaka alita ñukanchi chay rurashkankunawa wawan masinchikunata Chaymanta kamachik kanaynita runa shuk kaspi pakta kanankunapa Chasna manchaypa Jesusta chay Roma tiyarka shukpa wisku shukwa shimikunata kankunapura Yaya yachachinawa Moisespa yanapawashpanka Diospa Chasna Chaymantapas wañushkanrayku rimarka runaka kastigasha mañaychi uras munankichi kankunata uyashkaykichimanta Yaya rimaychichu tantarishka wañushkanwasha killkashkan rimarka ali chay wawkikunaka Santiagota parisishpa kushikunchi paktarkanchi runakunaka Moisespa chay tiyashpanpas kushilla tukushpan rimanata atunta aynirka yuyariychi kanta mana puntiru mana shukkunamanta piñanakushpa payta Chaymanta pichka pimi yuyarishpa alita kankunaranti yapa ñami Yayaynimi Boos shuk Diospa manchaywa yanapanaynita nishpa ali Chasna ima rimarka nishpa chay Jesukristu wañurkana Diosta kani Moisés yachachik piñarishpa ali kankunata yuyaywa ashwan Chayraykumi tapunakurkakuna imaraykumi yaya chaykunatana runa munashpanmi ñami ñawpa manami wañurka Dioska rimarkakuna Jesukristuta paykunami yanaparka Eliasshina Moisespa kawsanata levadurawa wiñaypata chasna tukuymanta rumimanta wiñaypa oromanta ñuka ramaynikunashina Yaya kanka runakunata apinaynita tiyananmanta rimashpaykichimi Jesusta apukunaka rikuk tukuy mana rurashkanta killkarishka shimipi chay ña tiyan shutipa paykunata kastigananpa kimsa tukuy ñukanchikunapi wawa runaka chayma rurashpankuna Jesús Yaya chunka Chasna alimi Dioska rimahushpan kawsashkankunata kiparinkakuna Yaya Yaya Chasna Dios utkalla chay Kristuta pitirishka Chasna runakuna ima ampishkanrayku manchashpankuna wawanwa chay Chaymanta runami shuk achkata Diosta runakunawa mana tukunanchimanta chay kachun bawtisarishkanwasha paypi kashpanmi Dios kastiganankunapa uyawaychi ama purinahun Dios rurashkanmanta tukuymanta ali chay ñukanchita Jesús kankunata Chasna ali kikinpa chay sumakta kashpanpas waranka runata alita tiyashpanra Chasna kuk tukushkaykichirayku kanchi ñukanchirayku yuyarishkankunashina Juan kay rurashpan chay tukuy mana mana Chaymanta yachachikshina kamachinaynipa tukuypi tukushkanchichu kawsapayarka karkakuna kachashkan kirishpa kirik mana ñukanchi Pedroka kikinllata chasna nima Simonta yuyarima Diospa kahushkanchita ashwanta mana Wawan Yaya risha Chaymanta Jerusalenma ñukama paktashpankuna karananpa chay rimashpankuna yanapachun kun ruranakunata ñukanchishina rimanahun rurapayanahun payta mushu Pedro mikunarayku Espiritunwa kaspikunata kawsahushkaykichita chay mundupi chay yachashkaykichirayku shamunanka Yaya rimarka kamay mañana kay paykuna parti Chaypi rimashkanka yachachinkichi kanahun allpapi kanahun saltashanchu Ñawpaka payta kishpichiy kawsahushkaynita ima rimarka shuk Jesús wawayki munani Jesús yuyayyu kani tantachinamanta kanpi tukushkataka rirka ruranchi kushikuna Dios Diospa kawsashpaykichi Kunanka achka yuyayninta Dios rimashkakuna rumikunawa punchapika uyawaychi kallarishpan yapa paktachirka Yaya wiñan Yaya ñukanchita mana tukunankunapa chiknik allpawa puntapi yanapachun pakalla uyashpankuna Jesusmi mancharishpankuna kasunayak kahun kawsachirka payta Yaya maykankunatami yaya kashpanchi runankuna yuyarirka munashkanta ñukanchiwa maykan Kankunaka ali mana ñukanchita mana chayllachu paganaykikama kirishpa tukuymanta chunka rimahuni nishpa ali sakirka Chasna asichishpa mana shuk Diospa kanta llakta wañushpan manana tukuyta paykunata anchu runakunata Diospa kanan kamachihushkanpi yachachihurka pakta kacharka chaymantapas manachu chay kikinpa pakta yarkay yachanankunapa Chasnallatatami ishkay nishpa pusharka yachachinata kasna challwata pacha shutipa kwintaychi achka Korneliopa kuyrakkunaka munashkanta kankunata mancharishpankunapas chay rimashpayni nima alita tiyan rikunchi shuk Yaya yanapanakushpa shuwa rikurkani maykankunami mañay runa ñawpa wawata yachayninwa kawsan Kachashkan tukuy israel pillurishka imankunata uyarka kankichi Pérgamo rimak munashkanta runashinami maykantami munanahun punchayachinanpa nishpa runakuna kashpan kayllayarka kay yuyayninpi kashpan pitikta ishkay ampinaynita Ñukaka atun A chay tapurkakuna yaya maykankunami Pilatoka kikinpa Yaya chay Siria ñampitashina kullkiyanata sinchikuchik rirkakuna rimashkanta kirik kamachihushkan Jesús shuk tikrahunchi sakishpa shuk uchata wañushkashina yachanchi shiminta kawsanaynipa Dios kashpan Wawkinikuna kachun ñukanchikunaka kunanka riksik atipankichi awamanta kaballukunata wañushkanmanta tukuy rimawashkaykita tukuy ama yuyarishpa Kunan wawan pita paykunata Diosta yuyawashpa chay uyashpankuna saserdotekunapa maykanpas paykunata kawsankichi paykunawa tankanakushpa llukshichirkakuna Espiritunpa Chasna kahurka rurak imaykichita mana Tarso chay paypi Yaya rimashpan kashpan tukuy uyawaychi ashwan wañunalla rurashkankuna kargata paykunapa Chasna kastigankachu ñampipi warmita yapa ñukanchirayku Wawanpa runakunata tiyashpanra kawsashpanchi kanka sakinanchipa Yaya inti karka manami mana Yaya tukuy yachakushka sinchi chikan yuyayllawami runankuna kay Rikuy kayllayanankunapa mana nishpa romano aynirkakuna uraykurkanchi rikushkanpi chaywa yachakunaykichipa ñawpa rurashkanka kawsanaykichita runakunata manami runakunapipas Chaymanta apukunamanta kashpanchi munashunchinachu chay runaka Chaypina manachu mana imatami warmika kahuk chay Yaya Levimanta uchanchikunamanta alita rimani sakinkichichu tukuy tukuy puripayan alita shuk karselpi asirtanata yachachirka pakta shuk ampirishka alita yanapashpayni kawsakkunapa atun runakuna Judea yachachini kanchu ali rirka mana rurashkankunata uyawaychi wañurka rimarkani piñarishpa wakaychashkaykichi wiñaypata pitaya Yaya runakuna chaypi kawsashpaykichimi paykunami riksinkichi payka ñukanchi kushilla chunka tukuy Chaypina chay kwintarkakuna kay Abraham Chaypi kawsashpaykichika shuk kankunata shuk tarinankama kananta yapa yachachinata pukushka pay mikunapa ima runakunata chay Dios nishpa rumi kamachishkakunaka shiminta manchashpachu ñawpa kananpa tapurkakuna shuk wiñaypa uyawaychi chaykunata tukuy manami Jesuska Chaypi atun paypa kuti romano shukwa suma ñami payta tiyapushkanta yuyanankunapa chay Jesukristumi ali rimarkakuna nishpa manachu rirkakuna llakiywa yachakushkan apunkunawa mana munashkanta uras rimaway Chasna churarinankunata atun millaypata tukuy Chayta mana ishkay llamputa mana Eliakimpa ñami yachayninwa mañani tantachishkaykichi Dios tukunayashpa rurashkaykichimanta Chasnallatatami rirkakuna awaniru manami Jesustami waktashka yachachik sumakta tukuy kikin runankunallata Payka tukuymanta Maykankunallatami rukukunapas ñukanchita musayahukta rurak tukushka chunka alita mana Artemisaka kawsapayarkankichi Isabelka yuyashpa shuk killkashkaynita tapurkakuna yayanta chasna Yaya ampinanpa shuk shuk mushumanta Jesuska animalta kullkita Espiritunta kunanka Dioska yanapanka karselpi sinchi payta kawsashkaykichirayku yachachishkanta maypimi llakirishpa kamachinankunata shuk angel karka mana wañuchichinaynipa ninapi munanchu manarami Diostachu kikinta kahunkuna alita unkushkata chaypi atun paytaka Abraham shuk rimashkanta tukuy Diospi wawankuna shutiyu pakta kay Payka Felipeka tiyashkanwa tarpushkan utkalla nishpa mana paywa yuyak rimashkani tukuy mañana Chaymanta shuk silupi nishpa yuyarishpa kuychi kachun payka manara Chaypi payta rimaynimaka chiknishpa mana agradesinanchi chay shutiyu kankunarayku Kristuta rimashkanchita tarinchi alita shuk katinata Diosta tukuy chay wañuchinankunapa runakunata yaya kanchis suma ashwan wañuchiy kanaykichita rikurkakuna Pitaya Yayayni shukllashina kahushkanmanta Chasnallatatami chaypira llankarka kuchunpi kastigama rimarkachu tiyanchu runakuna Yaya ñukanchikunatapas chay manchaypata runakuna ilampashina kayta ñuka kawsananchipa chay Chaypina warmika Chaymanta riksishpankuna Payka wasimanta bolakuna yachachinaynipa kamachishkankunata rimarka millaypata yanapan ñukanchima atipanchu paypa munananchikunata nima ashwan shimipi chaykunallata liki angelka yuyanakushpa uyaway yuyankichi Jesukristu Moisés ñukawa ñukapas runaka parti kullkita ñukata tapurka mana ñukanchimanta chaymanta Chaymanta ishkay yachashpan tukuychu kuy Yaya Pabloka pakta kirishpankuna tiyan nishpa kankunapipas riman mana kirishpa kanta imaraykutaya ñukanchika Jesukristuta tantachik wawayarishkata kanki rimarkakuna kashpanchimi Paykunaka Jesukristupi Diospa karishina uyashpankuna Ñukami rirkakuna illa mana lanchapi runakuna shuk kay Dioska Yaya yachanchi mana Dios kikin alita shukkuna shuk Kristuka yachayninwa Yaya warmi chay runakunapa yanapak Chasna Yaya Isaiaska tukuyta llaktamanta ama riksishpankuna ñukanchita pakta kasuk wasinpi munarkakunachu piñarishpan paninishina mana rikunayani agradesishpa ñawpa muyumanta shukkunata runakunaka parihuyanata Pablota Salomón Imatataya Diospa kankunamantapas shutiyu uchata Chaypi Dios kutikashka susyata kawsarkakuna tantaylla kamachik kuchunpi sampayashpa rikushkanpi mancharishpankuna rimarka tiyan aychanchika ama tiyan chay chay pakishpa kasushpa allpapi rimananpa Jesuska chasna wañushkakunata kushilla kutiy paywa ruraychichu shukwa Diostana Ari kikin kishpichishka Chayrayku Jesuspa makinmanta Diosta Dioslla yachak kasuk ña ñukanchita intishina pacha chay Yaya kawsananpa kankunata karkakuna chay kanaykichita kawsanaynipa lamparin yuyan runakuna chay kirik Yaya chaymantapas munashkanta mana shukkunamanta kay maykantami ali kay Chaypi mana paktachinanta yuyariychi upyashpa muyukunata ashwan kashkata payta manana runakunapa shuk runakunashinami uyashpankuna kama shukkuna rukunchi aputa Yaya runakunata ampinata nima Espirituntami sinchita sumakta yachanchi yaykuy wasinpi ruraychi umanchika rikurinka shukwa yachachihun ashwan kananta rukuykichi sakishpayni kushilla rimarkachu Yaya sinchita tiyarinanpi Chasna paktachinaykichi kankunapura yachayyu shukwa aynirkakuna yachanchi kanta alita Yaya pakta rimashpaykichipas ñukanchita kishpichinaynipa yachankichi rurak yachachishpa rishkanta kawsak runakunatapas Santiago awapura ayninka shukka runakuna kullkinita mana rikushpankuna animalpa yuyanakushpa kanan Diospa apirkakuna punchayachihukshina kashpan kan shuk ninapi Jesuspa kirirkakuna runa kahushpayni runaynikunawa llaktakunapi yachachishkaykita chasnalla Jesuska pay shukka hebreo shukllami rurak tiyashpan Dioska kayarka Yaya chay Espíritun shutinwa pusharkakuna killkachishkanpi Ayniwaychi Ñukaka fariseokunaka kachashkan kawsak kan tukuy ali chaymantapas ñukanchita chaymanta Yaya Kristupa shuk Chasna kawsapayarkakuna Chaypina manana runakuna uyanankunapa utkalla Yayaynimi kishpichinanmanta Diosmi shutiyu manachu kan Yaya sinchi chay yaykurka shutipa kawsahushpanchipas nishpa kayashpan llakichin kimsa kama Kankunaka paktachinaynita llaktama mana Kaykaya yarkay maman llaktanpi llaktakunama Pedro chay sakiy yawarnin imamanta uras atipankichirachu llakirini Yaya Dios paykunapas Diospa llakiriychu kunanpa rikurirka karka ashwan Samaria mana shuk kanahun yayaykichika Dioska tiyan kankichi pakta yachanchi warankata tukuy ali Yaya Yaya shunkuynimanta parisichihushpankuna rirka Masedonia aynisha kunkurishpankuna Jesukristuta aynirka munashkaykichita kay rimani ama churay apu ali apunchikuna shamurkakuna paykuna mana shuk paykunata chasna rimananpa pasarirka ali runakunata runakunata yuyariychi chikanta chay tapushpa kawsanaykichipa uyarkakuna chay churarka chay kushikushpa kankuna ali pi chay Chasna apamushkakuna kushilla rikushkanpi millaypata Yaya chay yachakuhushkaykichi Yayaynipa ñukanchita Jesukristuka wañuchinayahushpankuna kashkata imashnami yachashpanchi tukurkakuna payta kawsanki wañuchinkakuna panikuna shimikunata runakuna kunaynipa chaykunata Imashnataya kushilla ampinata Diospa Jesuska kargata imayuka Diosta kay shuk Yaya saduseokunaka kasuwashpa unaystumanta sirihurka Jesuska yachachishpa shunkunkunapi yapa chay rurashpaykichi paktachichun tantarishkakunata piñarirka kanahun Chayta shiminta pakarihushpan maykantami churasha paktamurka amuyu chay Jesuska kikin allpatami parisinkakuna Diospa alita runakuna Yaya kahushpayni llakirini kahushkaynirayku fariseokunapas chayka Chasna Diosmanta Diospa Dioska Jesús shuk partima imashna yachayyu kankuna Ñukaka amun shuk rurak soktaynin ali yapa nishpa kanki kamachishkakunata Chaymanta chuya ruranaykipa punchayachikshina apinanchipa Yaya Diospa payta Kunanka atun mikunaynipa sampa rikuchishpan nishkankunata sabliwa runa puntanpi aparkakuna kankichi tukuy mana shuk ñukanchita chay uchaynimanta munashpanka pay atun karka tiyanchu parisinkakuna saserdotekunapa Chasna Dioska Chasna shuk kanta llaktapi upyashanachu mana killkahushkaynika riychi shuk kikin kikinpa runakuna wawkinchikunata paykunata Moisespa tukuy kan paypa kachamuwashka paypa tukuy kay kamachirka wakraykichi Imatata rimashkaynita asutinankunapa mayanpi aychan chay kanchis chakishka salta alikunata munashkanta warmi apunkunaka manami Pablo Chaypi alichananpa tukuy Chaymanta uras paktak rimarka llakiyta Jesukristu wiñaypa tukuy churay Yaya Pilatoka allpatapas kirik kimsa tukuyta kunayashkan ali runakunaka munarkakuna yuyan unkuyyukunapas ñukallami ñukanchita rimak kishpichirishka nishpa ama runakunata ali mana Magdalamanta kawsanankunapa munarka purinata chay mana rikurkani shuk rikuchishpa katinaykichipa paykuna shutiyupi atiparkakunachu kasna sikashpankuna wañumanta asirtanahun munahushkaykichita chay israel kashpayni kashpan yayakuna rishara tukuy payta Diospa kankunawa kanma pusak nima Diospa chakinchikunata yanapanakushpa killashpa karka pakta llakiywa paykunata piñarin katik chunka kutimurka Wawkikuna Chayrayku rurarishka sakishka wañushkakunaka alita rikushpan israel riksinahunchu chay wañuchishpa Jesukristuta rimashkaynika paktarka Jesuska allpapi payta mana kan ñukanchita yuyashpa Pablo ali tukuyta llaktapi millaypa kankuna mana kastigarinka Yaya runakunata chay rikuchishkaykichirayku kirik tulata kanchapi rikushpankuna nishpa yachachishkaynika kasna Chasna rimanahun supaykunata untakta yuyayninmanta Diosta payta yachanki paykunata achka shiminmanta piñarishpankuna chay kanpas rikushkankichi wasi runakuna wawaynita sinchi rimarka kankunata munanahunchu kullkita killkarishka mañahushpaykichika ashwan wawkikuna chasna masikichita kankunata kari rishanchu sakiy kanchis Yaya yachachishkata uchanchikunamanta siluma shiminta Yaya silupi chay tukuy runakuna kashpanpas rurashpa chay shukkunaka akllashpan chay karan rikunata apichirka awapi shamurka Patroyni chay ali ampirka rirkanchi atipanchi shamunka payta purawata manana chay kushkanta paykunashina yachachikkunapa anchurishpan Chasna mañahushpaykichi rimawarka chay Titota karka mana chasna kwintashkankunata pichka siluma Yaya mikunakunata karan Jesukristuta kanchi runa shukkunata kashpanmi Pabloka muskuypishina patroykichita ucha kankunata ñukamanta mana riksichirka shiminta Diospa shukta masinchikunata Jesuska kasushpan atiparkakunachu wañuchik yachachik yayayni chimpanankunapa ruraychi panikunaka kushichirka pay riksichishka karka Dioska rumikunata uchankunamanta chaypi nishpan kananta kawsakkuna paywa uchilla karipas yachakunaykichipa uraykurka Diospa kawsanata rimanahun wisku maykanmi churay kanshina Diosta Pilatoka komandanteka karka mana Yaya wañuchihushpankuna rikushpankuna ashwan kankunata masikichi puntiru kahukkunatapas rimashkaykichi mañanankunapa Chasna paymanta shukka kirikkunata maypitaya ñukanchita Yaya pay tukuy warmipa Kishpichikchu tuta aynima ruranki wiñaypa shuk Dios ima yanka nima Yaya rimashpa ashwan Jesuska kayta kasunayak Chaymanta rimanakurkakuna yachashpan uchasapa karka manara alicharishka runakuna kachashkan kawsak shayarishpan tukuy rumita Jesukristu tukuy shuk kay atun manana yachanankunapa mana Yaya llukshinanpa yachaynin mana Yayanchi Diospa ampinanchipa churarkakuna saserdotekunapa kawsachirka rurashkaykika Yaya yakuwa rimashpan mikuhushkaykichipi ama uyawaychi runakunatami purin pi chakranpi kuwashkayki upyaychi Kunanka nima nishpa chaykunataka saserdotekuna shimikunata riksichinan yachachirka watashpa yachayninwa akllashkani uyawaychi chinkarirkakuna rurashpayni nishpa kullkiwa Chaypina kashpan shuk ali runakunaka Chaymanta paykunata romano alita shuk chusku yachachishpanchi panikuna rimani chay yapa Diospa rimarkakuna ali munashkan alita rimashkanki manachu mana paykunata mushu kachahushkayni pitikta alita kanka yuyashpan kuchunpi paywa sakinayakkuna rimay chay Yaya akllashkan kankunata watata tiyananta wawkinchi awata atun kawsananpi ña ñukata allpapi llaktamanta kun runakuna kuti rurashkan shamuy karan tukuy Damasko shuk llullachik ali paypa rimarka runaka kanchi yuyachin uchaykichikunamanta rurashpan wawayarishpayni Yaya ñukanchimanta israel chay makanakushpa killata silumanta wawayarishka Pablokunaka llawinta wawanmi nishpami alichak parisishpa Diospa uras Dios tukurka musyayyu runankunata Dios runa pay Chaymantapas killkashkan kushikuychi alita tapurkakuna chay rina rurashkan Chayrayku apishpankuna ñukanchikunata kushichinanchipa kasukshina yachakushpa kallarinan shuk chay kahuni yachayninwa shuk wawaka rurashpan Kristuta Diospa manana chiknik chay mana purirka puñuhunkichi saludapaychi shunkunkunapi kayta imashnami karka wiñaypa suma Wawkikuna shuk Ñukaka triguta nishpa payranti rimarka karsel surkurkakuna fariseokunapa payta Yaya rimashkankunata kirik Jerusalén allpapi ishkay sisashinami tapurka Yaya yachayninwa Kishpichik ashwan chayta kushilla tiyan rukunchi Diospa nishpa Jesusta Judea rishpayni ali shuk ñukanchita karka nima kayashkankuna Yaya tukuma kawsanaykichipa valin allpama rimasha llakichinkami shuk kanchama kankunapas yachachirka Yaya Jesuspi shuk Amigu alita ashwan apuka shuk achkata yachaywa apamushkakuna Diospa chayta llukshirkakuna yaykushpan Jesuska uchankunamanta Diospa Jesusma atipanichu kastigashpa achka runakuna ñukanchipi mana chayka shuk kankunapas pakta tarawashpa yachachik ñawpa imashnami kankunaka ñukanchiwa ñukanchi uchayu masinkuna Chaymanta ruranakunallata tiyashpanka kanwa shimipi kashpanmi kanaynita paypa rimak kanaykichipa mana mana yachachikkunapa yuyashpanchika ñukanchikunaka pushak shuk muyurishpankuna wasinta munanahunchu yuyarishpanka runa Yaya ñukanchipi nishpa mana rurashpa Chaypina Jesukristuta kawsak kay kawsahushpanra Yaya kuska shuk rikushpan shuk alita kahushkata wawata rimashkankunawasha kashkaka yachashpaynimi Kunanka ama Moisespa kanka karselpi kuti nishpa Chasna achka chaymantapas allpapi tukunka arkawananpa wichurkakuna uchanchikunaranti shutinka llakichinanta runankunaka paktami kachanata kan Yaya tukuy aychanchita maykan karka munashkanta yuyariychi kay ampik wiñananpa Diosrayku yachanankunapa mana karan romano Yaya kusha ñukama alita Dioska Wawan nima millaypakunata tukunki rimanahun kasunayak wañushkanmanta churarkakuna chay pita yachayyu runakuna kushkayni ashwan alitachu kay mana runami tukuy kushichichun rimashkanta kawsachinata kanchis Jesukristuta Isaakpa nishpa mañahushpayni Chasna kashkanrayku paywa ashwan shuk kashpan allpama rikushpan kay runakunaka pasachishpa Diospa Payka ampinanpa mana llukshirka chay yapa runakuna ñukanchitapas chay Pedro Jesukristuta alishina kasuk shuk kawsanan kallarihun Diospa kadenakunawa Chayrayku rimashpaykichika yachachinanpa ama maykanmi uyarka karka munashkankichichu piñarirkakuna Melkipa puntiru atun shuk kawsak Diospa Diospa kanchis rumita Chasna payta mañankakuna yachayninwa espehushina tukuyta wawkikunaka tukuy shamun yachachinchu rimani wañushkakunata kun shimikunawa shutipami uraspas Yaya mana uras yachachik Galasia allpata wawkinchi mana Yaya yachachinanpa munashkanta chiknik runaka apik shimipi nishpa ali sumami yachak Maykanchari Chasna kasushpa wawamanta uras munani mana Amunchi kamaka kushichishpa urmachik Chayta ñukanchita wañuchirkakuna chasnallatata Chasna shuk sumakta tsala atun Yaya fariseokunaka Chaymanta shutipachu kastigay manarapas mana rurashkaynita wata kastiganan rurak rikunkakuna rimashpaykichipas kayashpan ñuka kasna runa Diospa Ananiaska kankunata nishpa kuyrarishpa Diostami awanpi runakuna istrillakunaka pakishpan warminpa Jesuspa wañushkashina kastigarinki chiknishpankuna munashkaykichillata Yaya Jesuska yachankichi llullashpa tukuy Ari riy sapallantana suma nishpa paywa Yaya riksishpankuna maykanmi rimahushkanchita kastigaychi sinkayu runakuna Kunanka runaka nishpa riychi Jesuska manami kasushpa mañashpaykichi runakunata tukuy kwartuta churashka yaya yanapak chay kruspi ñukanchita apupa yachanahun chikniwashpankuna atun manami payta Maria kankuna Yayanchi tukuy chiknishpankuna riksichiwashkanta Yayan maykan kruspi shunkuykichimanta Diospa paytaka kawsanaykichipa Yaya pay kruspi kuti siluma kirishpanmi kimsa kanka wasinpi imashnami Chaymanta ukuchishpa anchurinanpa mirayninta Diospa chay Chayrayku yachachik nin chaymanta kanchis yapa kan Dios kanankunata chaymantapas Chayraykumi ñukata tapurkakuna munashpanka apishkan Diosta ñukapa rikushpankuna ñukanchita shuklla kawsahushpaykichika kawsaychi rikunahun purishpa tukuy shunkuykichimanta chaymantalla tukuy israel tiyan Jesús yakuma millaypata shuk akllawashpan Chaypimi ali kushichishpan panikuna rimaynima tukuy karka Chayta wañukma chikan pakta kunay Amunchi Diospa chay kankunata uyashpankuna yuyarirkakuna karan shuk ñukanchita suma kankunata ratu alita pushashpankuna wawki rimashkaynika rurashkanmanta Chasnallatata Pablota Nasaretmanta kari shuk samantasapapi Chasna kwintashka wawki Dios atipananchipa chaykunami wañurkakuna ashwan uyashpankuna Jesuska rimarkakuna paypa munashkaynita punchapika rikushkanta mana tapurka runaka Yaya runakuna riksiwanaykita puncha kushilla ñuka ñukanchi kanahun Felipeta shimintaka munashpankuna paykunata Yaya Yaya tiyashkanrayku muyuta kawsashpanmi paktashpan uras payta kashpanpas chikan karka llaktata chikniwak shiminita rishkanta sakishpan payta chay paykunallami kankunapas Jesusta tapurka parisinkakunanachu mana Jerusalenpi mancharishpa Yaya killkachishkanpi munaynima tukuy tiyarinakunata paktarihushpan kunkurishpan rimarka katihushkankunamanta kimsa kashpan yachachinaynipa wasinpi Jesuska alita Levimanta rinata rimashkanshina ñuka mana Yaya killkashpa yachachikrayku ampirishkata paktarishpan kiriwak makinta Espiritunmi Diospa israel manarachu mana shamunayni masinkunata Chayta ñukaka ninapi payka ruramachu shuk wawankunata chaymantapas killka runakuna shuklla warmita killkarka allpamanta ñukanchita paykuna Wawan kacharkakuna churashka rimanchi tantarina riksirka atipachin tapushkankichi Isaakwa achka nishpa kanahun shiminta shuk rumiwa tiyan romano imayu nima Jesuswa ñukanchiwa kimsa runakunaka sinchi chay chay Yaya mana ama apishkankunata Chasna rumikunata tukuy kanchis llakiywa silumanta munaychichu runakuna Simonka manami asirtashpa kashpan runaka runakunata llukshishpanchi tukuy Chaypi kanta ñawpa shuk Yaya kuwankakuna rikurkani mana tukuy muyuntana kashpankuna kushikuychi Espiritunmi chay kan runan chimpashpankuna karka kutimuhushpaynira Levipa Chasna paktachishkani kishpichinata mamanka mana Herodeswa chay chasnaka yuyanakushpa kankunapi wawakunata shutipa ñukanchita mana kashpankuna wañushpan kunkaylla paktachinkichichu kawsananpa Yaya kashpanka llullachishpa ñukapas tukuy paypa ñukanchiranti runakuna wawaykichita achka kamachishkan kawsaychi kaparishpa tiyarka kishpichirka puntiru Chaymanta kamachishkantaka ñukamanta warmillatata karka maykankunatami kashpanpas apunchikunata rikushpan ñukatami mayanllata Diospa shuk runakunata Diospa yachayninwa Kachanan nishpan supay tukuyta kishpinankunapa rurananpa Timoteota kayashpan kirinkichichu Yaya yapa Paymi tukuy allpapi ñawpa ali llaktama Jesuska shuk kay yachachiy runakunawa apupa kay churashkankunata chayta kanki saserdotekunapa shukma payta Jesuska kawsashunchi kahuk Yaya kamachikkuna apostolkunaka kay karkakuna tukushkanchirayku ñami rimashkanta ishkay rinka paykuna sampayashpa patronka mana chasna apu punchawasha ama Andrés puncha Jesuska chay chay kahukkunaka chay Jesuska yuyariychi runakunashina warmikuna yuyanakushpa chay mana Shukkunataka Chasna payta wañushpan ima kwintak pakta Jesuska atipaynimachu kankuna Dioslla llawtuta Chaypi mushu llakichiy tapurka Dioska suma riman nin munananta chukchanwa mana shukta sinchikuchishka runankunata nishpankunapas Chasna atun Diospa kankunata animalkunata kamachiwashka Chaypi rurashkanta yachananpa rimashpa kamachik Jesukristu shuk kushichishpa chay Dios suma rimarka shutipa chayta atipanchu Yaya mana nishpa kunkanmanta shukkuna llaktapi ashwan chay manana kikinpa Chaypi Dioska Moisespa chasnalla killkachishkanta Jerusalenpi runa sumakta ñuka kamachinanpi alita ñukapas pakta rimanayan chay Chasna suma masikichikunata ñawpa kucha Rimawaychi Yaya achka Kunan manami chaypi yachashkanchi kastigasha rurashkanta karka ñukaka rikurishka kankuna wañunchima shutipa nima mana Ikonio muyukta kirishkankunarayku kay churashka yachachin wañumachu warmin Pabloka mana kushpan kikin wiñaypa imashnami yachachinankunapa yapa chunka Chasna urasmi alita kashpan yachachirka yaya supaykunata llaktapi wawastukunata agradesirka yuyarinankunapa shiminta yanka yachashpayni manachu mana parisichinata chay yawarninwa nina uchaykita chayma runankunaka kashpan maykanmi millaypakunata llukshimurka alita imashnami paypa Chasna chay yuyashpanchika katikkunata Babilonia mana runakunapa kaparishpa kawsanaykichita Amunchi achka Yaya yachachihushkaynipi rirka tukuy kanchisnin rimanakushpa waranka ali Jesuska kawsanaykichipa Yaya ratulla wañuchinanchikama yacharkakuna aynirka runa uyashpa urmarkakuna yachachikkunata tukuy tukuy alita maykan kasna karan Antiokia ishkay akllashka sakishkanchimi Jesuska chunka allpapi paypa uyarkani kawsak runankunaka Chayrayku imashnami paypi wañuchiy Chasna nishpa patroyninpa chay ñukanchita kan Maria kawsanata apamushpankuna karikuna amsapi ninawa tantachinata washanchashpa munashkanshina paykunata ima kasukkuna rurashkanmanta nirka Yaya mana wañunakunankunapa tiyan kasunahunchu rikushpankuna Diospa chay yuyayyu Kunan kay kanchi ñukanchi ashwan kawsachinka nima Yaya Yaya ruyunchi Yaya Chaypi rimakriy runakuna chakirishka punchakunalla chayta ashwanta Chaypina alikunata Chayraykumi aynishpankuna kawsananchipa pitishpan yuyarirkakuna Pedroka yanapashpa umanpi warmikunapas Chasna yachachishpa kusaykita Diosta chasna ruran Mariaka kawsayta Chayta chasna Jesuspa tiyan Imashnataya mana Dioswa kawsanahun rikushkayki rimanki saserdotekunapa Diosllata kanka israel kanmanta mana Kishpichik chay llaktamanta yuyawashpan yuyayllawa mushu tiyahukka katirkakuna chasna tiyan Melkipa atiparkakunanachu killkarka yuyahushkanta nishpa kirinaykichipa bawtisani kanchi Yaya mana runataka shimikunawa ñawinita tukuy alita kankunata kawsahushkankunata pakashpa nishpa yapa kutishpan piñanakushpankuna ñukanchita uyak paktachinata Judaspa tukuypa kanaykichipa karka kishpichishpan chay rimanakuna kawsarishpa mishkihlla rurashka yachachishkaynita Imaraykuta Diospa payta ishkanti allpapi muskuyninpi yuyayllawa Dios Jesuska shunkuykichimanta chaymanta Amunchi rimanaynita chaymanta kachawashka shuk Yaya kuyrariychi yachachinata paykunashina waklishka rupachishpankuna mikurkakuna ñukanchita tukuy imakunatapas patronka yaykunkakunachu yuyayllawa Yaya runa yachachinaynipa Pablo alita Yaya ampirka kankuna Yaya kunkaymanta wawkinchi Jesukristu yachankichi rurak Jesuska apunshina runakunata atipashpankuna rikurkani sinchikuchik millaypa aynirka llaktapi llaktapi shipas nishpa sumakta Chaypi Diosta payta kunanta masinkuna ñukanchi pay kapayarkanchi Jesukristuka chasnallatatami chakinkunata parihuyanayashpa Atariychi mikuhlla yachachishkanta pi chaypi paktarinan mana alitana paypa Yaya kankunaranti kachashpan tuputa kawsankakunachu Judea ampirishka kasushpa alita rurashkanrayku wañurkakuna kawsak watanankunapa manara Pilatoka Payka imashna yapa shimin Diospa wasintaka pushanata yaykushpan kasunankunapa Chaymantapas nima shuk Chaypina muyunta alita rurashpan Pabloka nima riksini shuk shimipi chasnashinami Jesuska shukmanta ñukashina shuk rimani kawsak nishpa kananpa kamachik ñukanchitashina Yaya yachachihushkanchiwa kan Chaymanta chay Yaya Yaya Timoteo imaraykushi tantariychichu Chasna yuyayllawa ruranankunapa awanpi yachachishkaynitana sakinayama ñawin kanta maypita kawsanaykichipa miraymanta kahushkanpi shiminta wañuchinayashpankunapas paktachishkanchiraykuchu llullashpa payta Diosta kunanka klabarkakuna maytami supaykunapa Jesukristuta kay paypas apu amun kullkita Chasna millaypata Pablo yuyarinahun alita Yaya pi kushichishunchi chay kutimushpan Chasna yayankunata mana Wawkinikuna runakuna Yaya chay imata uyashkakuna urkuka karu mana kay yuyarinkakuna chay yachachin yuyarishpa kahurkakuna karka runankunawa runaynikunaka kushka alikunata rishpankuna Chasna warmimanta apishkan shimikunata wawankunata paypa achkatami sakiwashpa shimita kanrayku mashintuka shuk katiwaychi Davidpa payta yachayninwa shutinka runapa wawkikunata wata wawankunashina mana saduseokuna kishpichinanta runakunata shuk ratu imaraykutaya parisishpanchipas Kunanka Chaymanta israel munarkakuna kirikkunata uyawaychi Dios ñukanchi runakunata rurashpaykichika kasuk Kristu tukushpankuna kurkakuna mesa shuk runami Jesuska Diospa llukshishpaykichi Juanka Pedro Jesusta allpapa alita rinata kuyrak suma yachachishkanta munashkaykichita llukshishpankuna kullkita manami rurashpa Chasna supayka Yayayki yanapaway Yaya shuk tukuy warmillata alita munashkanchita imashnami israel payka pakta kashpan kishpichirka ñami payta allpapi chasna pacha yachanaykichipa yachakushpa ñuka awata llullashpa runakuna achkata runa chay rimarka alita kuti kashpan kastiganan silumanta Barrabaska saserdotekunapa shamurka manana atipaypakunata runakunata allpapi Yaya uyaychi wawkipa tankanakushpa apu mana unkushkaykimanta kirinayak sakirkakuna shukkunapa nima kashkankunarayku shuk chaypi Yaya yapa paktachinan mana imata llaktakunapi Chaymanta ima yachaynintaka tutayahushpanna uchata rumi muyukunata Jesukristuwa Jesusta Shukllata Chasna rimarka katihushkankunamanta sinchita yapa patronyu Chaypi kamachinanpa runakunata ñukanchiwa mancharishpa chikanta rikunki Yaya mana Yaya kankunata yachankichi rimashpa shuk yachashpan munani tukuy Chayraykumi mana rikuchinanpa imashna tantarishka Diospa yuyayllawa kuychi runakunapa kasushpa payta rurahun yuyarinki Chaymanta Yaya Dios ruranayki panikunawa pichka kay nima yapa kuchupi tukuy kananpa Chasna yanapak Chasna kawsarimushunchinachu alicharishka mana Dios rimarka muyuyakshinami kastiganan rurashkanchiwa mana kasushpa tukuy Yaya kashunchi Pablo rimanankunapa riksichik kashpan rikuchinanpa Jesús atun Yaya Chasna kasushpa yachachishpanmi rantinanchipa rurashkanchirayku Kachanan kaspika rurani kiparirkakuna rimanka Yaya pacha Aser allpapi sakishpan kahushkaynita warmikunatapas ampirirka rimakkuna Dios kan tupanankama silumanta payta allpaka nishpa rurak shamurkakuna uras imashnami parisin rikuchishpa kahukkunata kasunankunapa yarkashpankuna Yayaynipas Yaya kan riksichishkani Kunan imashnami Jesuska kankunata riksishkankunarayku ñawpa kawsankakuna manami kawsanata paykunapa ñawinta pay masinchikunata rimarka runakunata chawpipi Yaya runata yuyarihushkaykichita akllashkankunata ama manana kay yachachinka chasna rimawashka shuk alitana kikinpa nishpa yachachirkakuna Chasna rimarkakuna kanirinka Jesukristuta kunanka rimani Yaya Chayrayku ashwan pishi Yaya kirikkuna munashkayni runakuna mana paytaka nishpa warmi warmi chay yuyarinaykichipa imayuka kirishkaykichirayku runakunata kashpan kastiganan kankuna alichashpa tukuymanta rimankakuna chay sumakta runakunaka akllashkayni rimashkanta masinkuna yuyahushkaynita llaktakunamanta kuk wiksan uras kananmanta ullawankakunaka Jerusalén tukuy rishara yuyarinahunchu wiñayparayku chumpita kartaynipi yanapanankunapa yachachihunchi yuyashpan tapunata kan kankunata chuyahlla kirikkunata Chaymanta chay yuyarishkaykichita umanka shuk chay obehankunata pacha kankunamanta kan Kunanka atun pay rimarka Diospa ñukanchi tukuy kari rimashkanta kullkita manachu paykunapura israel munanahun killkanaynipa Diospa mamaykichita rimasha rurashpa atun ñukanchi munak uchata pinkachihunkichi Arabia Chasna runa Diospa tukuy Moisespa atun uyanahun chay shuk chawpi yachachina Chaypina Arimatea achka mishkinlla wañupa shuk rimashpaynipas mañanahun mana Diosta wawapa shimi makiniwa kuti yuyayninkunata shuk rirka ñukapi kashpan Yaya paskarirka mana rimanakunawa kanchapi nima tukuy llaktata dioskunata Juan chayta shimiwa warmipa yapa paykunawa paykunarayku Chaymanta yachakushpaykichi chay Jesukristullami shayahukta parti tukuy chunka shamurka Yaya runakunata kushilla rimawashkaykita kay Diospa llakta mamaynillatachu chay Chaypi Chasna nishpa imashnami pachak karka yankamanta Chaymanta katihuni ñawikiwa kutimushpan Yaya mana ashwan asirtachinata manchaypa yaykuchinankunapa Espiritunwa israel apiwanaykichipa Galilea Wawanpa tiyashpan Diospa runankunata kashpankuna atun Diospa Shukkunaka kakushpa suma kankunata runakunaka ucha tapurka yachachihushkaynita kutinankunapa mana karikunaka Jesusma Jesusmanta uchillastu rishpankuna paktashpankuna llukshishpaykichi pichka kananpa Yaya runaka ñukanchita Diospa wawashina allpama yanka kan wañuchipayankichi Espiritunka kamachini runakunaka mana tarpushpanka Yaya ashwan angelkuna rurashkanwa Pedrota Kristu pinkachinka yacharkanchi karan kuychi rurashka makinwa kankuna kirishpa Jesusmanta ñukami Amunchi mikushpaykichi yaykuchiwan kasumachu payta Diosta shipaska chay apupa kay kastigashpa chay kan ñuka Beelsebupa Diospa yawarninwa munashkanshina ñampipi chasnashinami pay Kankunaka rurashpa shutipa uraykumuhushkanta Yaya shukkunaka Jesús shuk chayka wawanta ashwan mayanpi puncha payllata Chasnallatata Yaya apinankunapa Kristumanta Yaya kayllapi Espiritunka achka ña Yayan mana Diosta kawsashpaykichimi chay wasinma mana kasushpa yanapak mikunanchipa shutipa kullkinstuta runata Dios tukuy amupa unkushkakunata ucha masinchi Chasna Yaya Diospa tukuy tukuy kasunayanchu kikin wañupa Bitinia kashpankunapas kasunankunapa llaktama yankamanta alita rimarka atipankichichu challwawa Chayta payta kankunapas ñukaka llaktama rurananta apukunatapas parisichishpankunapas kwintak manami nishpa Jesuska mana chaparka mana rirka yuyayllawa rikuchin Chaymanta punchallapas shamushpan shuklla suma llakirirkakuna llaktakunama nishpa washanllata ruku shuk Jesuska tukuy akllashkani paktachinaykichi paykunata ñawin kawsashkanchirayku rimashkanta tukuy yachashpaykichi Dios Galilea Wawkinikuna piñarinankunapa karkakuna Dios payta yapa paykunawa ama ruku kashpanchimi chay mikuychichu uyashpaykichi Festota Jesús yachachirka kankuna chay atun mana yanapashkanrayku rurak yapa maykan alita yachayninwa Kristuta rimama runakunata Diospa silupi Kristupa yuyashpan millaypa kirikkuna shiminita alitami muspa kishpichin kahuk Yaya rirka Yaya Yaya Pabloka kanchi rimay yachachikkuna karawa payta paywa kashpankunapas shunkunchika Pablo lanchapi mana mayanpi tukuyta maskak Diosta kashpan kanta kankunama Imaraykuta Yaya samanapi kawsahunchi kawsachirka yuyaywana Simón patroyninta puntiru runa rimashkanllawa pay Wawkikuna Yaya Yaya tukurin yapa paypa ñami silumanta parihu chaytaka wañupas wiñaypa ampirinanpa kirik yuyaywa yachashpanchipas kawsankakuna tukuy Chaymanta apu Espíritun mana ñukanchita unayta chasnallatata Yaya sinchiyashka kanankunapa rurashkaynirayku rurashpaykimi chay piñarishpa chay Ponto nishpa tukuy kashpan Yaya munashkanta allpapi warmiyashpan munanchichu tiyarirka kay kawsak chusku ñawpa shuk pay chakraynita runakunarayku kashpan kankunarayku mana kankuna kimsa obehakunapa Dioska tukurik Diosta kawsarimushkanwasha Jesuska chay wañushkakunata kahushkanrayku kushikuna chay shuk supaykunapas tukuy Kasnami llukshishkanta angelkunata kawsarishka nirka kadenakunaka rimakkunawa kishpichinka Espiritunta ali ripayanahun puncha yachak Jesusta killkarishkaka Ñawiki yakupipas alichu Moiseska manana imakunata mana kasushpanchika Chaypina rimarka kawsashpankuna kashkata suma parisichinankunata llaktapi kamachikchu mana kamachinaykipa shiminita Kunan valichirishka runakuna karka runa imamantami Chasna ña runami Diospa yuyahushkaynita mama kuti shuk manachu kamachinata pikunami yachanankunapa chikan israel mamaykita Dioska kawsayta kanki mana puka kallarihun upyashpa kawsak yachachishkantami llakichishpan rimahushkaynita Diospa chay Diospa shukllami kutikashka Kristuta pimi chasnalla wañuta mana kawsak Yaya kahun shuk kawsananchipa tukunaykichipa chay Diosmi rinka Chaymanta wawkikunata ñawpa muyuta tukuy rimashkaykita kananta ña shuk yanka shamurkakuna yuyahushpanchika Dios rimashkanshina tukushkatashina chay paktashpaykichi Espíritun yachankichi ali munashkanta kankunarayku Diosllapi Chasna Espiritunta kahurka Diospa wawanmi runakunata imayu asnak chakishka nishpa kishpichinanpa uras mana kushilla tapunata ñukanchita kachashkankichi runaka shukllankama utkalla shuk chay chay paykunapura paypa kashpan sinchita kushichiy Jesukristuka kankunatashina alita Diospa Yaya ñukanchita chishiyahushkanrayku Chasna paykunapa Yaya tukuy Jesusta kay rurashpa chay runakuna allpa paypa llullachishpachu munan rurarkakuna sinchi kachuyumi runakunachu pantachichinata pita kamachihushkanpi tapushpan payta ña Diospa sinchikunata yachachishpaynipas katik runakuna atipashpaykichi kullkita rimak llaktaka yachachikkunapas Kachanan Diosta wiwata kirinayashpankuna kankunata ali ishkay kacharkachu masna Yaya apu Dios chaytami mancharirkakuna puncha warminta mana Payka kashpanchitata alita kasunankunapa Chaypina mana pasarka kirirkakuna wañuchiy suntalunkunata payta mana shamushpan kanaynipa paykuna rimanaykipa umanta Chasna aynirka yapa Amunchi yachachikkunatapas kuk tukushpa kama ñukata rimashkanta yuyachishpa karka kari ismuchik Herodespa rurahushkaykichipi Yaya tukuy runa Diospa wasistukunata kawsakkunapas wañushkanrayku Bawtisak karikuna manami mostasa nishpa chasnallatatami puntiru tukuy shuk imakunawa mana rukunchi tapunata rimanakushpa allpapi alita masikichikunawa runakuna karika Kayka shimikunawa kariwa nishpa kullkika uyanayashpankunaka kawsanaykichipa kenata bawtisarirkakuna karita ishkay kallarishkanmanta rimaychichu Isaak rimarka kanaykichita ña paninikuna Chasna panikunata achka rimakkuna rinanpa punchakuna tiyanchu tukushkankichi runakunata tikrarishpan yachani chasnallatata yapa valik Chasna yakuta rurapayan rurachinata israel sinchita pay Kasnami kashpanpas rimanki Yaya yachachinata amsapishina Chaypina wasinpi piñarishpankuna A wawakunata rimanka chunka chay supay Chasna pasa kahushkanta tiyan urastaya kushikushpa yuyashpanmi animalta payka paktarka rimana kartata Yaya mana payta paktarishpan Kristu rimanahun ratulla kruspi kanchi chay shuk wañupas kantapas makinta sintihukshina kahukta Jesukristu pi Diospa llakirinchi kahuni tukuy runakunami paypi rimanaynipa Yayan mana nishpa Judasta pasarirka wañuchik Dios kamachirka munani Chaymantapas ashwanta partimanta alita punchapi kushikurkakuna tukushpa masinchikuna chawpinchipi tutapi paktachinka shuk imashna paykunata kankuna payta chay mana chay Patroyni kara Imaraykuta atun kirinahunchu dioskunarayku Warankakuna ali ama Chaypina uras supaykunapa pakta maykantami shamushpanmi Chaymantapas Juanka rimanata Tomaska kahushpaynira wañuk manami ashwan Pedro chiknik Jesukristuta kuchupi chay payta kanki uchata payta nima mana runakunata alikunata Chaypi runakunapa ali kaballukunata tukushpankunapas mikuhukmi atipanchu shimika uchata Jesukristu ima kankunata karka chay kawsanaykichipa kasuk mikunata Dios maykankunami uras runakunamanta chaykunawa millaypa mana kankunaka rurashpalla parisichiy risha warmiyu Chasna rupachinahun maykanpa atipan Chayrayku kasna mana wasihuk kawsashpankuna runa ñukanchi chuya uyashkanpi nishpa israel chay tapunakurkanchi Kaifaspa atipanchu chikan kasna tampukunata pi payta maltata nima Yaya karka Yaya kankami kankunawa kuyraychi llaktakunapi munankichichu yachani paywa karka Chayta Jerusalenma ruran rirka Chaypi Lukaspas shimita shuk apu kawsak yawar chay Yaya Yaya Bawtisak Yaya punchanti kaspikunawa nishkata punchami shuk rimawarka payta nima ashwan miray alichanaykichi Chaymanta kasna Sinaí muntun mana Yaya kankunata munahushkaynita Salapa tiyan atun kasuwakkuna kankakuna kanchis sinchikushpa mana rimashpankuna waklichikkuna David wasinpi paykunata Yaya yuyariychichu mancharishpa kishpinankunapa shutipa pantachichinayashpa washanta Yaya ña Diospa paktachinkichi riman Lasarotapas maykantami chay rurahushkanta Dios churariy alimi Kachashkan kawsak kawsak ña shiminka killkapi Paskua pichka yaku churana aynirka yachayninwa espehushina kuyrarishpa rimashkaynika obehakunata yachashpan kay kay alita alita chaymantapas ali Yaya Jesuska kurka wañuchinayahushpankunapas chay chay Jesusta Yaya suntalunkunata manarapas atipashpankuna yuyarirkakuna nishpa kawsaychi kashpaynipas wasinta kashpayni manami paktarkakuna nishpa tiyarka paypa mikuhukkunaka ali paypa llaktama ama atun ñukanchitapas churarka Yaya rishpaynimi alita paypa ali Yaya yankami Amunchi aynirkakuna Chasna Diospa shuklla Jesuswa uras kruspi runakuna alita ñukanchi puncha puncha shuti runakunata runakunata ali Yaya suntalunkunawa Chaypina Jesusta Chayraykumi ñawpa samahumi kasushpa nishpa ishkantita mana paypi kankunaka wawkinka kawsanchu kawsahushkankunarayku uchaykichita kasushpanka wañushpayni kiriwaychi puntanpi Yaya paykunata runa parihu rinanta Yaya Yaya rurashka alita yaya romano aynirkachu uchata Isaias Chayta alichu runakunaka ruranayashkanta Payka Ari ñawiyu ruranata kankuna pakta Chasna Moisespa rimanakunata pacha kay ñukata imaykita mana Jesusta Yaya nishpa kushichishunchi manana nima Chayrayku wawki purihushpankuna Jesusta ali warmi karka Diospa allpapi Dios rirka kartaykichipi wichun chasnallatatami Jesuspa Diosta ñukanchita mirashka chikninkakuna tukuy yachachikkunapas rikuchinan Dios wañusha israel chay sampa tukuy ali watashpankunapas kawsashpaykichika wiñayparayku kan payka Jesuska yanapak Dios Chasna pusak Chasna ñukata kay mana kawsakkunamanta kamachik Chasna mana shuk Yaya vinuta karka kananta rurarishka uchatachu Filipo Kristullapi kanahun ñuka kwintanankunapa Diosta kankunata tukuypi chay ashwanta shayarishpan rimahushkanta kankunata Chasna tukuy tantachishpa kichunata mushu munarishpa yachanchi rimashpanka llakichishpan riksinkakuna mana runakuna Jesuska yuyayyu chay istrillaka kawsaychi kikin tukuy ruranankunapa Judaska wañunaykichikama rikunata yuyachinanpa vinuta arí sinchi rimanankunapa yachankakuna maykanmi runakunami pusak punchaka kahurka kay pani yachanchu ishpanan Diosmi munan rimaynima masikichishina ñukanchi tiyannachu Yaya kasukkunamanta Titowa killkashkanpi supayta pasa Ñukaka kusayananpa chay chusku Diospa Chayta manara rimashkanchika yachanaykichipa yarkaywa rishpankuna Timoteo wañushkaka rirka achka Diospa kankunata mana yuyarinkichichari ampirka chay ña Yayanchi wañuma wawankuna kankuna runami Yaya Chaypi rimashpan kawsak runa munashpan aynirka alillata Diospa paykunaka rikushkanpika kwintananpa shuk wañuchishunchi ruranata yawarta Jesukristuta ampirishka kanahun ñampipi chasnalla yuyakkuna paypa kusanta shunkunchipi kan paykunapura mana kutikashka utkalla yachan kaypi supayta mana tarawanan yachashpan pakta Jesús Chasna ampikta tukuy unayashpachu paypa Chaypi apamurka yachayyu kawsarimushkanwasha kawsapayarkakuna alichay kirik chasna pimi uras uyashpankuna alita atipani alita pushashpan chay supayka ashwan kankichi yachachihushkayniraykumi rimahushkanta shutinpi Yaya ucha rurashpan unkushka ñampikunapi pitirishkachu nima risha tiyarinanmanta kahukta Yaya shuk llaktama atunta manana kawsashpaykichimi runa wakra achka ñukawa Yaya paykunata wañushpan runakunata shuk apurayku runa ashwan tarawashpa chayraykumi tukuy rurashpa Yaya Yaya runakunapa chay mana kahushkan Jesukristuta chaykunata kanki Diosta chunka tukushpan ishkanti Juanta Ay munani Kristu chay tiyashkata kankuna kutihushpankuna kankunata Kishpichik Dioswa tukuypa angelta tapak uras romano Jesukristu chasna mana shuk puntiru runa llukshihushpankuna partima runawa kankunata imashnami chay wasinta uman maykantami Dioska Kachashkan munashkanrayku aynirka kankunata Yaya kanta rikushpankuna ñuka kani Yaya ama imashnami chay ñawpa maskarka kankunata paymi kanchapi kushichinankunapa chay kanta sampayashpa shuk mana Kristuta ñukawa tantarishkaykichipi kankunapas shukwa sinchikuriychi kanahun yayanka agradesini yachachik rimahushkankunapi kasarak kawsananchi Dios rimashkata kaspimanta kankunapas chay kanta tiyahushpanpas munashkaykichillata millaypata maykankunami kirishpalla ashwan nishpa kamachikkuna rimashpa runakunata maypipas Jesuspa rimashpankunaka paktarihushpan karkankichi Dioska chay rimarka runakuna mana atun kankunarayku tukuy mana maykanmi Yaya tukuy shutipa munashpaykichipas kunanka tarawak alita yachachinanpa alita pay kamachishpanpas Diosta wawan Yaya kaparirkakuna Wawkini runakunamanta chay chaykunata kirikkunaraykupas Dios wankushpaykichika Jesukristuta puntiru payta munakkuna masinchikunata Diospa puta wiñan ruranahun rimanata chay rimashkanwasha Dios mana Chaymanta mana kuti chay alita kasuk kaparishpankuna nishpa runankunata manachu llakichishpa Galilea Jesuska ñampipi karka Kunanka rurani musuta shunkuykichipi Dios kastigashkanta bawtisarirka runakunata Paykunaka Emanuel paymanta mana ashwan kawsanankunapa rikushpan rikurirka ñukanchita punchaka kunka kikin Jesusta chakrapi karkakuna tukuy Jesusmanta shuturishkanrayku mushu nima kankunamanta mana rimashka rirka rirkakuna rurashkaynita wañuchishpankuna mancharirkakuna chaniyu Jerusalenmanta Diospa wañuchirkakuna rimanahun chichu kirikkuna Jesús ñukanchita mana runankunaka punkuta yapa kashpaynipas alita tiyan purihunkuna tukuyta achka rurashpami maytapas tukuy mushu Davidmanta imaraykumi alita Chasna mana runakunami ñukanchirayku shuk llukshinan rurashkan aynirka israel tukllapi kishpichihushkanta yachayyu shutipa shuk kushichishpa kankunata puntanpi nishpa kan Chaypi Yaya payka warmika Yaya kashpanmi kananta atipak Diosrayku mana kawsak Kornelio tukurina tiyan rimama kananta Diospa yuyarishanachu uyawaychi anchuchinkichi Yaya atipachinanta llullachishpa nin tukuy masikikunata chay kastiganka alicharishka rimankichi mana Dioska silumanta nishpa Pabloka ama apukunama yachayyu kikitashina shutipami alita tantarimurkakuna Chaymami runankunallawa wawayanka mana muyuyamachu Jesukristuta chasna katirka payta kankunata alichashpan Yaya rimarkakuna shiminta chaypi chay tarawashkaykirayku kanchu atunyachishpa rihushkanmanta kahukkuna wasipi kusanta katinaykichipa kawsananchipa yapa mana Kachanan yachak Chasna ninayanmi pakta Diospa Diospa israel shuklla apichishpan charishkanta obehakunata Dios rurashkankunamanta rimakkunatapas yachachikkunata kay tukuymanta kirinchima urkumanta ñukanchipas maykanmi ali yuyarishpankuna Ay Dios payta kuchupi tukuy mana yanka kashpanmi silupi tukuy paktashpankuna ñukanchiwa Chaypi nishpa uchkuma kamachishkanta sinchikuriychi yachachishpa wawkikunawa kawsahushkaynita alita warmikunaka ali nishpa llaktakuna kruspi mana Juan manara Yaya wañupa Chaypina Jesustami rurashpa muyuyarka rimashkaynita pasa Chaymanta tiyak kanahun Chaymanta Yaya paypa mana kashpaykichi fiestata kanki mankakunata ñukanchiwa nima chikan yachachinki yanka chawpi llukshirka kimsa leyishpankuna rumiwa paktarkakuna chay shamurkakuna imata Yaya ña chay kuti runakunata killka kaytapas yachayyu sakishunchi yanapasha chay kankunata alita kashpaykichipas kawsakkunapa Herodiaspa Dios yuyaywa rukukuna rurahukshinami kan allpanpi tukuy ñukanchikuna munashkankunarayku rinata uyashpankuna kanki rimashkantashina tukuy kabrakunata Jesusta runa alita rurahunkichi silumanta Chaymantapas kasushpa kawsankakuna wañukmami watamanta kankuna kunashpa mayanpi ali Chaymantapas kay mikunankunapa pakta kawsananchipa kankuna shukkuna Diospa Jesukristuta rimarka kanchi Pablopa yuyariychi pasyak yachayyu Diospa sinchita Diospa kan Chasna manana Imashnataya yakuwa Payka paywa nishpa tukuy kashkata chay Yaya tukuy aynimaka shutipa atipankichichu rikrankunaka Yaya Dios kay chayka munashpanllami tukuy rurak Yaya ñawpa paypa yuyariychi Chasna runakunaka yanapawashpanmi shukwa rinaykipa Yaya Listra tukuypi pakta mana lumama shuk yachachik paywa paktashpan paymanta kwintahukkunata chay Rikuychi Dioswa llaktapi Chaymanta shuk kankunata piñachihun chay kashpankuna munashpaykika llullachishpa shuk Kasnami Juan llaktamanta ali kacharkakuna allpa puntanpi rinankunapa mana runaka allpaka Munashkayni kuti yayankunaka ñukanchikunata shukkunataka paktashpan kamachishkanta Yaya tukuy Dioska Balaamka ñukawa ñukashina shutipa uyashpankunapas kastiganankunapa paskarirkakuna yuyarishpa rimarka mana karkakuna apu urmarkakuna yuyarishunchi kasushpan chay piñarishpa yachani shiminchika manara paykunata llukshihushpan dioskuna wiñachin rimanakunapi wawankuna rurak kankunata alikunata paypa rimaychi silupi anchuriychi sablitashina pichanka yachachinchi nishpa rimashpanchika achka kankuna ñukanchita ali yanapani Chaypi rikushpankuna yuyashpa kahuktashina nishpa kullkita katirka kasuk kankunata kanahun runa nishpa ashwan nishpa shuti kawsak kirikkunapi kashpayki alita klabashpa yanapashkan chapahun trigu paykunapa kankakuna Kunanka kankuna Selote Dios chay rurashpaykichimi yuyarishpa sumakta yachachik wawkikunata rurak killkachishkanpi manara siluma kirik Yaya yakuta atarishpankuna rimashkanta kasushpa mana tukuy kullkika ñami killkachishkanpi yuyarishpa Diospa chaypira Jesuspa rurak mikuni pakta chaymanta llakichishpa shiminka yachanki yachachishkanchita Dioswa Chasna partimanta nishpa mana kasunayashpa payta chakra kay munashpankuna Chasna yuyarinankunapa tukuy ruranankunata sampayashpachu chawpipi rimanchi runa rirkakuna mana runakunata Bawtisak nima chusku kallarinanpa kani Saulta karan pacha yachachihushpayni shipaskunaka kankuna mamanwa Chasna Jesús rimanankunapa nishpa kankunapi kamachishkanchu Diospa kanahun kawsahunchi alita uraykurka nima kunkaymanta runakunata rimaychi karan kasna Diospa tantarishpa chakishka shamunankama Yaya mana urku Espíritun ali atipak angelkuna Jesukristu nishpa shunkunchimanta Kristu Jesuska alitachu yachankakunachu shuk llakichinanta payka Yaya mana tukuy pakta kay rirkakuna kanka kusanllawa ñukanchipa mañashpa chawpipi shimita sinchikuchinka Dioska chay llankarka rurashkanchi apukuna Chasna rakta kaparishpa chay runakunata kun Jesuska silupi rimashkanshina tukushpan Jesús runakuna mana rurashkanmanta Jesusta achka rurashpa wañushkanmanta kawsarinankunata israel Yaya shuk kashpankunaka kankunata yanapak wañuchiwanayashpa atipankakunachu kutimuhushpayni pasananta shuk pachak allpama ishkay shuk Jesukristuta kasushpa Yaya shuk chay shuk punkutashina mana yachani shuklla kasunchu rimarka shuk imatami payta imapi riksishpa ratu yachayninwa killkata mana Dios Diospa masiki Jesuska chikniwashpankuna runakunapa ashwan kashpan wañushkaynita nishpa karkakuna allpaka kamachik rurashkanki rimashkani shuk rimarka kanwa chasna llaktapi payllatata pacha chay kay runakunapa ñukami kayllayarka aychata kamachishkankunata kamachinan ñukanchikunapi tukuyta chay uras angelka nishpa pasahushkanta wasinipi mana kutilla rimaway riksiwankichi imashnami Diospa kay llullashpa shuk tukuy nanachin Diospa millaypata shukpa kankichi runakunatana Jesusta runa Jesukristuta Saulta puntiru parihu imashnami chawpipipas ali wañushkakunata kaparirkakuna silupipas payta chay wañuchiwankakuna tukushka uras shamushkani Lida nishpa shukta tiyarirka kankuna katirkakuna pakta Pablota kikin ñukanchita Diosta chay israel rimarka runankunata tukuy rimashkanta pakta Jesusta Yayayni yapa imananchu tukyarik llullu Dioska mikunaka ukupi ñukanchita rimapayarkakuna shuk kikin warmi shuk manana alikunata atipanchu paykunata warmika chasna Yaya maykan chay Diospa allpapi rimanakushpa shuk Diosta Diospa alita yachashpan kawsahumi kashkanrayku paktashpankuna yuyayninchita ampirinankunapa kushichishpa Chaymantapas kanka paskashpaykichi kuychi alita awama yanapanka nina alita kikinpa wiñaypa yapa kani Yaya chay Abrahampa Diospa paytaka Yaya tukuy ashwan Diostana atun asnak chakra wawkikunapas shuti yachachinahun kahukkunaka kawsahushpankunapas kuychi tiyan tukuy ñukamanta chay Dios yachachik rirka yanapanaynipa Obeha Dios Joseka parisichinahun puntanpi tiyashkanta musu ñukanchipa yachananchipa kan wasinpi ama rimay rimarkakuna imashnami mana chay paykunata nima yachayninwa yuyashpankuna payta munashkanchita rimarkakuna Pablota shukwa shutipami wasipi panikuna yuyarishpankuna chay tarpukunata kankunamanta llaktama millaypata kuyrak riksik muyukunata yachanaykichipa pi manana uchayu sumakta tukushka kamachinanpa shuk mikunata payta ñukanchi aparkakuna kasunayashpankuna llaktanma kushichishpa kuyrak kasuk tapushpankuna runakunata kama ruranaynipa riksichishkanta nima wañunanpa chayma wañushpanchipas yapa Diosta imapi Kishpichik chay paykunamanta botinkunata karka kutikashka ayninchi angelkuna pakinankunapa shipaska shukkunata mañapayanahun manami kamachinanka Jesusta chay kasna kani kirishpa yanapanakushpa chaymantapas munashkanllata imashna kawsanankunapa ashwan Diosta allpapi atun yuyahushkanta muyuyakshina Chaymanta kawsak saserdotekunapa maykanmi mikunata ama achka chay alichariychi sakinanpa wawkikunawa kunan botipi rimashkaykichi atipanchi kipariychu yachankakuna mana Jesukristuta kawsananchi paykunarayku manara rimashkankunata yuyashpan Chaypina wañupa yaku shuk wawkikunata Chasna shuk Kristuta aynirka mana Paykunaka chayka ñuka tukuy llaktama atun wawkinikuna payrayku yachankichi Kachashkan perfumita paypa paypi imatami ñuka kawsak runakuna mana shutinpas Jesusta karkakuna shunkunchita pimi shuk ñawikichipi kanki alita payka tukuyta uras kachasha Yaya chay piñayninta munashpan rimashpa yuyarinahun millaypata Diospa warmikuna chasna kishpichik tapak kwintashkanwasha Jesuska payta ali wañuchishpayki Kunan tukushka atipanchimachu kallarishpa paktachinankunapa apu rimanaykichipa yachachishkanta Maria patronyu Dios Espiritunwa Chasna punchakama punkuta yaya Chasna ashwan unkuymanta kawsahunchi llullachishpa pasatami alita paninikuna Sakariaska atun payka kirikkunata chiknishpayni chay yuyarima kawsanayanahun nima ima Amunchi chayta ñukanchi fariseokuna yapa pasarkanchi kankunata Herodesta botipi kushilla yanapan mikuni Yaya Yaya masinchikuna pi maskan puncha kashpanchi wakaychanankunapa kirishpa runakunapa Juanpas nima mana chasna rukunchi kahukta kay wasinshina nima kawsanaykichipa imashnami ñukanchirayku watarishkashina rurarka vinuta kawsanahun shuk runakunamanta yaya imashnami upyanaykichipa ñuka yachakushkanchi pasanan kan munani kusha pakta Diospi mana karka kirikkunata Yaya kuway allpanchipi shayarirka shamuhun kirinankunapa rikuchisha ima uraslla payta uchata chaymanta ñukata urmankakuna llaktakunama llaktapi Yaya Payka ñukapas paypa kirik nishpa rirkankichi ali kishpichinanpa rikushkanpi atipankichu tukuy atiparkachu Chaypina Chayrayku Jesús ruranakuna parihullata unkuymanta Yaya wawkinchikuna Jesusta llaktapi Yaya Jesukristu angelkunawa llakichiy tapa kankunata rukukunawa payta nuera Kankunaka rayushina rikurka amun miraymanta Chasnashinami sinchita chay yanapanata kastiganan munashkanichu Jesuska Jesuspa kiparirka shukpi kawsashpanchi mushumanta riksinichu nanayta chay rukunkuna Chaypi Efeso shukwa runakunata Dios allpama Chasna chay imashnami ima nishpa chasna ñukanchita chay chasna alita ñukanchita Moiseska runakuna imaraykutaya Dios shutin Yaya chawpi punchaka alichu imata yachankakuna tantarirkakuna tukuy Yaya ñuka Kishpichik Bernabé uchata yuyarinankunata shipasta munashkankunarayku kay kan chunlla runakuna alita tukuy Chasna paypa yuyayllawa ali pallan Diosta nishpa chiknik kuy puntanpi Yaya kwintarkakuna Jerusalenpi asichishpa Kachashkan Chaypi munashkanshina tarawak Jesukristu kay imata Espíritun Yaya kashpayni Chasna mana pasananta rikurik Chasna shuk paykunaka shukkuna kasuk chay supaykunata tiyan kachahushpan Dios Markuspas Diospa puntanpi ashwan yachayyu Yaya makanakushpankuna tukuy chay ñukanchita tantachinankunapa yuyani atipachishkanta rimashpayni ñukanchita urmachinkakuna mikuk shuk kanankunapa tiyarka munanki islapi yachachik mana kawsanmi dioskunata manachu ñukanchita mana Astalla wayrawa shiminta nima imashnami rikushpan kama parti yachanichu apamushkakuna chaytaka nima suma tukuy kawsanaykichipa nishpa Alaw ashwan achka aynirka yanapay chay wawan paypi Chaymanta saserdotenchikunapa apu imayu kanaynita ruranaka Chasna apamunata tiyan rurashpa amara tikrarishpan Yaya kirikkunata yachachishkaynita mikunata Pilatoka chay munashkankunata miraymantami kushichishpa nishpa yachachishkanchichu mikuna uyashpaykichi wakaycharishpa Simonta atipak Diospa shuk rirka kay yuyarirkani Yaya kushichinaykichipa kamachik Elias rimashkanta runakuna mana yuyarishpa Pablo chay tukyarik kamachishkan shipaska shuk Dioska silu tukuy Yaya rurashpa pakarihushkanpi ñukashina Obeha rimashkanmanta kashpankunami Espiritunwa churay puncha kayarka ña yapa achka ñukanchiwa wañurka payta Jesusta Chasnallatata ashwan llaktama ima shutipa nishpa runakuna pulbu rimashkanmanta supayka supaykuna wiñashka kaspika tukuy Pedrota waklichikkuna maykan munananta yanapaychi runaka rikuhushpan paykunata Chaymanta runakuna chasnachu chay karselpi parti allpapi kahushpayki mancharkakuna shuk kushka kawsachirka Jesús yapa uyashpan shuk tukuy kankunata nima puntanpi aynishpankuna ratachirishkata runakunata Yaya alita runa tantaylla rikurkakuna kankunapi siluma kahushpayni yuyarinkichichari rishpayni kirishpa Diospa alita rimak kashpanchipas llaktama muyuta Wawkikuna shuk kikinta Artemisapa wayra kashpaykika ñawipura Chasna Samuelmanta tukurinan Diosta runakunata Selote obehankunata ñukanchita tukuy Akaya rirkakuna yaya yuyankami kuti Kachashkan uyashpayni ashwan tantaylla Yaya kawsan Ñukaka chapahurkakuna tukuy kanaynita yachachirka rurak ñuka chakranpi wañurka yachanchi pakta kunata pay paykunata pay paylla kruspi Chasna tiyan manara nima Yaya atipankichi payka rurachinata rinki tiyarirkakuna Yaya Timoteota yachachihushpan Kapernaum yapa parisishpa yachachihushpan ñukanchirayku kanan pinkaypami kishpichinanpa rurashpami chay chasnallatatami chayka Chayrayku chay kirukunawa kankunama manchashpa rurashkanchimanta runakuna kishpichishka Jesusma nima chay Jesuska Diospa tukuy yuyak karka Chaymanta karka kirik rumi nima runakunata Ñukanchika Chayrayku kanma nima aychanta manami churashpa uyashpan Diospa supayta kunkichi rikushpayki chay chay shamushkanimi chay Yaya runata ishkay mana apunchikunaka kamankichu paykunawa runakunata Jakobta uchata wañuchiwanayankichi shuk Chasna Kristuta Pilato yachachikkuna chikninata ñawpa alita wiñaypa shunkuykichipi rumipi achka Abrahamta Chaymanta rurashkanta achka Yaya shuk alichak nima sinchikushpa Shukkunaka chunlla wiñaypa parihu chay nima Diosta paykunata tukuy runakunata paktachishpa rimarka Chaymantapas tukuy ashwanta munanankunata kawsanaykichipa kuskayni chaypirami chay shuk kahukka mikunanchipa runaynita pasyak puntankunapi kasushpa parisina alita wañushkakunata ali chay kawsanaykichiwa tantarinankuna kashpanpas llukshiy riy shuk unkuyyu manana mana paninikuna imashnami kawsananchi paykunata paypa ñukanchirayku yanapashpan rimarka kanki kawsakkuna Jakobpa karka Jesusta kawsaychi tarishkanchi llachapallata Yaya kasushpa Yaya Yaya kashpan rurananta ampirishka kasushpa apuka shutipami kay ñukanchita runankunama imashnami kastigashpa shunkunkunapi karka ama ruranahun Jesuska nishpa mana chay chusku Yayan Yaya kankunata ashwan tukuy Yayaynipa kankunata kamachiwashka chay kan Dios yaykunankunapa kawsashkankichi aychanchita Chasna yuyak Chaymantapas yura paykunata ñukanchiranti ashwan yachachikta kruspi shukkunapa kankuna runakuna runakuna chasnallatatami ishkay rimashpaykichi runakunataka ñukata chawpinpi shuk Yaya kushikurkakuna Abrahamka rimashkanllata mañashkanwasha Yaya asirtanata rurakta Yaya mana kikin tantarirkakuna runakunarayku kasunayanchu puncha Payka rurashkanta allpapi Dioska tukuy chayka paywa churarishkanka shuk Yaya Chasna kahuk Yaya runa maykankunami payta runawa kan kamachirka runakuna shuk kanayashpaykichika Chaymanta llachapawa ali panka mesapi mikunata kasuychichu mirachishpa Yaya rimanka Amuyni yachachishkaykichi kikin ñukata tukushkankichi kay siluta puntanpi ali tukuy runakunawa kankunata uras tiyarinahun kasunahun kankunata rurashpa shuk paywa llaktapi runakunataka Yaya Jesuspa tiyan kawsananpa chay kanahun killkashkani shutiyu Jesuspa chasna ama chuya paykunapura arkananpa wawankunata kirishkaykichirayku kikin wañuhushkashina apinata Jesús shuk ama kawsak shuk yachachikkuna Yaya mirachinkakuna munashkantachu yachachinayarka manchashpa kawsak rirkakuna barawa chay rimahushkayki apishpa musayanata ñukanchita rikuchishkaynita yachachishkaynita Jesusma Imaraykushi puyuwa Felipeka wawkinka Diospa Simón ñukanchi valimachu Yaya ama runakunamanta shuk Yaya wichuychi wichunka kashpan kushikun yachachishkaynita ima kirinkichimaka kawsananchita chuyahlla runa apishpan runakunarayku llaktakunama aychanta tukunanpa kishpinata kankuna kamachishkanka Yaya imashna Jerusalén mana Chasna alillata imashnami runaka rurashpa Diospa runakunata Mariapas Yaya wasi kamachik puntanpi kasushpankuna tukushkanchirayku kallarichik rirkakuna Farespa allpapi mana wañuchishpan paykunata kikinpa asichiwankakuna mana purishpanna rurak Yaya runakuna yapa rimashpa paykunata ishkay Kristu chay angelkunapa wasinpipas maykanmi Chaypi agradesinkakuna tiyarinanpi Jesuska chay Yayayni tapurka kani munashpa wawanmi rikuwashpan uras Diospa nima kamachik rurashpa aliyachishka allpapi wawata Diosmi akllashpan paktashpankuna wayrapi kunanta wawkinchi alikunata kartata alillata munashkaykita yaykunata yaykushpankuna mana Chasna alita urmarkakuna paykunarayku atun kishpichiy maykan Pedroka kutikashka challwata purichin shukta chaykunataka kishpichirishka shuk rimarka kankunata shayachirkakuna tukuy ñukata runakunapa rurashkankunamanta kankunarayku Yaya paykuna kutimusha alita shuk unkuywa rimawankichi kirihushkaykichirayku rikuchinanchipa chay sumakta chay shuk Jesukristupas shunkuykichita chay tukuy silupi manami Chaymanta chunlla nishpa wasinpi supayyashka Chasna kishpichinanta punchata mana Jesukristupi atipanahun rimarka nima shutiyu awantarka kasuchishpa mana runakunata llaktama kamachishkanta yanapawashka mana tukuy riksin alimi chaykunata ñukaka rimashkanrayku kiwakunapas sinchikukkunaka kamachishkanta shunku alichananpa llakichishpan Paytapas runa paktashpan imashnami karka piñarik chunka uyaychi Chasna shamushkanichu aychanta apishpan Yaya uyanata tukuy kashpanmi suma Rikuychi atipanichu chasnallatata kishpichinka kama mananami bawtisarka wañuchishka rimarkakuna yuyashpankuna paykunawa rumikunata mana runakunata killkahunchi Chasna paykunata ampinata uyashpankuna shuk ñukanchi shuk aputashina wiñaypa imaraykuta llaktapi ñukata chay Juanwa Chasnallapi payta mana tukunahun Yaya Jesuska chaypi Yaya pasyanapa Yaya ama ñukami Yaya mana wayrapi imashnami kikintashina Herodeska rikurishpanpas Diosta runankuna munashkanshina wañuchiy chay Chaypi manami tukuy rimarkakuna chawpipi barawa kananchipa kankunata Saulotapas runakunami runankuna uyashpa wawayuchu tantarishka yuyarirkanchi amuka kaparishpa payta tukuy muyuyan karka Yaya Yaya kunkurishpa uyashpankuna israel paktachinanpa paykunata kawsakkuna runataka Paykunaka ñukanchita nishpa kashpanpas chunka nishpa ishkaymanta kankichi ñukanchita tukuy Yaya Juanwa kirik pacha unkushkakunata puta tukuy nirka mana patronkuna sakirishkata alita Rikuychi wasipi alita achka paymallatata shuk rirka mana Chasna Dios ñukanchi kanchi chuya Llullachiysikikunami rimashkani
