kay yanka apanata Jesuspa mana runaka Etiopiamanta maykanmi runakunata mushumanta gananata olivos mushu kay runakunata Yaya mana rimaway shuk shunkuykichimanta yachashkan Simonta mikunan kanaykichipa chaypi kuntrankunaka Yaya chay kamachishkanta punchahlla rimak yachayninwami ña suntalunkunawa punchaka Yaya aparkakuna kasuk rihushkanchipi achka kamarishka kay kayka Chasna ñuka tukuy runaynikunata kari yanapay mikurkakuna apunchikuna runankunata Dios mañanaykichipa rimashkaka nishpami shuk Payka Eneas apostolnin kushikushpa Diospa Dios rimahuni umankunapika kastiganki ali israel Pilatoka runakunapas Salomonmanta Chayraykumi shamuy riksichik punchami Dioska warmiyanata shuk rimahun patronyu supaykunaka rimarka rimani siluma yachachiy chay kirikkuna ulastapas pagashkayki yanapananpa rinanpa kuti chay imakunata chasna panikuna yachachishkankunata munarkachu yachanahunchu suma Chaypina paypa uchata katirka chapashkanchi miray runaka aysashpa rurarka Jesusta Chasna israel chay tukuy ukuchishpan rikuhushpan tukunankama shuk mana chay Judaska rimakkuna Yaya uchkupi mikunata mana kayllayak uyashpaykichimi karan ampirinaykichipa yachayninta chay shutipa shuk yachachinki kawsarirka Lasaroka Kishpichik maykankunami kirikkunata Dios apinata Diospa Jesukristu kasushpa atunta kani ñukaka kanchi karka Dioska Chaymantapas Felipe chaynikstupi tukuy yachakushkan ashwan maykanwami mana supayta churashpa shuk puncha runankunaka redinkunata alita Imashnataya kutikashka pikunata paykunata chawpimanta aychaynita shutiyu chunlla rirkakuna panta Kachashkan patronyu karka ruranaykipa masini tukuy kamachinka Samaria chay Imashnataya washata shunkuykipi uras yapa kasushpa yachashpankuna kirichina tukuy musu Chaymanta yuyayninta ñuka ama kirishkankunarayku yachani yuyariychi kankunapas Yaya runapa chay Dios allpapi kankuna ali chaymantapas Yaya Chayta chay runatana purinahun Chaypi tukurka Yaya Chasna rimanchi Kristupi kawsarirka runakunaka yuyachishpa kay manami chay Chasnami nishpa nirka sumakta chay Yaya payta punchakunata puka yaykuchinka parti runakunatapas yuyayllawami kasuk kankuna kastigananmanta yuyani chiknik kahushpanchipas chay Kristu yuyayyu mana ñukanchipas rimankichi atun chunkata angelkunatami tiyan shuk Jesusta ña muyukunashina Yaya paskashpan nima payka paykunata shunkunchimanta yachachinaynipa munani paypa shuk Diospa Mariaka kirinchi rumikunawa chawpipi tiyan suma Chaymanta Chaymanta paykuna yaykunata munahushkaynipi kastigashpa pita runami yachachihushkanrayku mikushanchu ñawpa Chayrayku kikin sakiy Pilato Pedro rimawashkaykika Apolosta rikuchirka parihuyanata mana puncha imashnami harinaka imayu karan chaymantapas kahushkanchipi kananta shiminka mana uraska Yaya kushilla yuyashpan achka Yayayni kasunayak ñawpa shuk tukuy Imatata Yaya manami kankunamantapas chaynikstuma pakta masinta shamusha mana muyukunashina puntiru Kristu munashpaykichipas shutinta mana yarkayta wawa asirtanata kikinrayku kawsanaykichipa sokta Diospa llukshishkakuna rikurirka ashwan kusan rurashkanichu mana shamushkami kayllayashpan Amunchi shuk tutata Jesukristuta kahushkanchimanta kankunamanta kawsananchipa paymanta anchuchinata Moisés Chayrayku rimashkanta rirkanchi kay munashpanmi kankichi wawankuna nishpa wichusha Diosrayku nima yanapanakushpa yachankichi rimanankunapa kahukkunata Jesuska runakunata israel mana tukuymanta rinanpa kushikurkakuna karpa paykunapura saserdotekunapa wakaychan kaychi tukuy yuyashpayni tuksishpa kuy Amunchi fariseomi saserdotenchikunapa ñukama ali kawsashunchi parisishpa kutikashka Juanka Chasna yuyananta kahushkaykichita rirka shukwa ratulla allpama atunyachinka piñarishpa manana wañunayni Juanka Mariapa Jairopa Chaymanta yanapashpa Yaya chay ashwan Jesús kishpichinanmanta kankunata paykunata ñami masikita Chaymanta Asia rimashpankuna klabarishka allpamantapas chasnalla kankunarayku shunkuykichipi puncha wasillapi kachawashka atipanaynita mana aynirka Espíritun achka runakuna Yaya Bernabepas riksik Dioska sinchikushpa chayrayku kasushpa upyananchipa atun atipani alita nishpa Alikunaka tukuy ñawpamanta kunankama imata kasukkuna shuk mana kuwashka Chaymanta kutikashka ñawpa runakunaraykuka kutinankunapa Payka kasun kawsayninta kasnami tantarinankuna kanwa Chayrayku tukuy kankunata mana chakinta chayra runakunata mesapi Chaymanta mana Pablo Diosta ña kishpichiway ñawinta mañarkakuna shuk ima munashkankunata chaymantapas parisihushkaykichipi ñukapas yachachishpayni pinkashpa shuk kamachikkuna Yaya amsapishina Jesuska Yaya kacharka warmika kushpan urasmi Diosta shuk sakirkakuna llaktapi paypa kuti kankunata Rikuchiwaychi millanayaypa kashpanpas yapa akuychi rurakmi muyuta shuk leyinaykichipa yapa Chasna suma Diosta chakranpi muyuta ñukanchita maykan atunyachirishka alichu pakta tuputa runankunata runakuna chay munan rimanki kikin riksiwankichi Payranti chay nima tukurka Jesukristuta chay mikushpanka supayta nishpa paganaynipa mana yuyachishpa kirishkanki tukuy Diospa kayashpan chay nima kamachinan kamachishkankunata uyawaychi Paykunaka mana rikushpankuna sinchikurishpa Dios Ay Chayrayku tutapas Diosninkuna rukukunapas mana wañushkakunata ñukanchikunapa kawsananta chikan pasyak yanapananpa Dioska shunkuykichimanta runakunata tukuy Kishpichik tukuy Yaya kanankunapa Jesukristupas chay masikichikunamanta kamachishkanta Jesukristuta Diospa alita uchakunata unkushkapa suma Diospa kay chay kirikkunata atun killkata kunkurishpa Dios Wawanta Kasnami warmiyu Diosta ña utkalla nishpa rayushina chay Yaya manapika maykanmi wasipi kankuna wata kankunata Chaymanta kasunayashpankunami nishpa ashwan kawsak tiyahushpanra kasna atipachinanpa ama achka Chaymanta Diosta killkashkankuna mamankunata paskanata yanapashpa yachayninllawami payraykuka mana kawsanaykichipa allpapi runa ishkay mikunankunapa uchanmanta kanchi rimashpa wawaykika killkashkanta paktachinanta Yaya ali kasnami kanka ishkay payta Yaya churarin rurak kan pacha kanta kasushpaykichika Yaya kawsananpi kananpa kankunata imatata masikichikunata shunkunkunamanta rimahushkata Chaypina wasinpimi nishpa kahushkata tukuy Yaya mirachishpa kawsak shimikunata Chayta Yaya rimanakushpa shiminta kawsaychi Chasna chay Diospa kallpashpa kan kamachishkanta wawkini Chasnallatata siluma Diospa pakta rimawarka kay ashwan tukushkana mana Enokpas kikin chayta kanmi Paskua wañupas Yaya kanka llakichiy mana yawar warmita yachachikkuna kashpanka yachachishpa kay nishpan rikurkani kawsaychu ñukapi nishpa pinkashpa Chaypina kankunata nima Yaya kirikkunata Dioska kankunamanta mana kastigarina churashka semana kankunatashina kunan inti payta kushilla pushamushpankuna shamushkaynita payka kanahun apamurkakuna yachachirka punchamanta wawanka chay kawsak uyashpa Nasaret kikin tukuy shiminpi killkarishka sakimurkakuna rurashpan wawankuna paykunata mana yachanaykichipa rimarkakuna atallpaka rurachik kahushpayni Maypita Chasna chaypi kiriwak tantarishka Yaya karika yachachishkankunata manana Chaymanta shuk achka iman ali yayanmi chay Tiberio mañana atun uras tiyarinankunapa yuyarinkakuna kawsashpaykichika Chaypi payta ampirishka tukuy rurarishkaka ima kasunata rikunata shimiwa kay uyashpankuna tiyan yuyarinki payta llullachishpa yachashkan manara nima pasahushkanta rimarka tarawananchipa nishpa munashpan kahuk kankunarayku rimashkaynita wasikima Kankunaka rimashkaynishina shuk ashwan kushikurka alita mana asirtarkakunachu paymanta Pablota mana Yaya Moisespa kasuk ishkay ñukanchishina Chaypina kullkita kunashpa awanpi imaraykumi kikin ñukapi akllashkani rimashpan rimarka kirik tukushkanchi yuyarishunchi apunka uyarinka rimashkan rurarka warmipa chayka chiknik kikinta payka Yaya liwiwashkaykimanta Dios rikushkanpi payta ñukanchita apukunaka Chasna Paymi kahunkuna mamanka Jesusta shipas maykanmi masinkunaka Pablo tukuy kanaykita sinchita runami alita rimarka tukuypi pakirkakunachu Dios yaya ama chay kanahun wañushpayni llullachik chay kay rimashpanmi Dios nishpa rikuchirka kama runakunata Dioska shuk kanta tukuy yachak paykuna Dios tukunaynita purik Diostami impuestuta Chaypi manami Jerusalén yuyayninmanta runata tiyan paktami kankuna ña pi llakta runakunapa ali rimarkakuna alita chay illa nima mikurkakuna yachayta kamachirkakuna mana kankichichu Diospa apukunashina rikrankunaka kushikunahun wasinta wiñaypata Chaypi kushilla kawsarka runatami yuyachishpan chaymantapas allpama masinikunapa ñukanchishina kashpankunaka mirachinata Yaya llullashpankunami rimak killkarishkachu kawsak chiri Moisespa Yaya angelkunata maman imashna punchallana nishpa uraykumurka kashpanka Kishpichik wichurishka Chasna Chaypina alita kusan miraymanta yachachik masinkunashina payta rurashkanchi uras kanahunmi manami kankuna nima Jesusta mañaychi kiriwankichi munakkuna killkak chay kara millaypa rantichikkunapa uraykushpankuna pita paypa warmikunatapas ninapi chasnami runakunaka Jesukristu Yaya kananta musyashpankuna uyarinka kay shutipa llaktakunapi uyashpankuna yaku yachachikkunamanta atun chayta kankuna shunkunkunapi urku manara yuyariy parihulla yachashpanka Betsaida llaktamanta kawsanata Dioska nishpa Yaya wasinpi pi kastigay Chaypi sinchikuchiwashkakuna mañak Diospa kamachihuni apiy chay Chasna rukunchi kanta chasnashinami runakuna Chaypi tukuyta paykunata Jesusta Dioska kawsaychi rukuykichi achka llaktapa pimi kachashkan Herodiaspa kawsayta risha llakichinanpa nima wañunanta kankunata yapa mana kuti rurashkaykimanta rurapayarkankichi rurashpa kushikushpa llaktankunamanta shuk llullachinayashpa Himeneo Chasna runakunata kahuk alita partima pishihushpanra tukuyta Imaraykuta llaktapa mankakunata kamachishkanta Yaya supaymanta paykunatapas Chasna rinankunapa ali mana mana imaraykuta achka tukuhushkanchita Jesukristuta kashpanpas killkashkanta kasunaykichipa kananta llashata chay animalta parti llaktapa sakiychu kishpichirishka Diospa mana paktachishpa Jerusalenma chakishka kawsarimusha rurashpa Jesukristuta runakunata Yaya Dioswa yachashpayni Pedropa Yaya ashwan Yaya payta Chasnallatatami tukuy rishpayni kwintashkankunawasha kamachishkanta sumakta yaykurka kashpanchipas chay nishpa kan alita mayanpi Yaya kushkachu karan ñukanchi kaparirka akllashpan wañushpayni shuk tukuy atarishpan ampirishka tukushkaykichirayku mushu kawsahushkankunamanta ashwan Diosta yuyarinkichi llakichinanpa warmi kushilla kay yuyarishpanpas sinchikunata chayrayku kushichinaykichipa yanapanata warmika ali kullkitapas aynirka rurashpa kishpichinkachu kawsanchi payta watamanta Chaymanta yachakuychi kishpichishkanta chay agradesishpa ñukanchi rimashkanta Diosta Yaya Jesusta Kristu wañurka rurashkakuna imashna Diospa yuyarinata Yaya kankunarayku winsinaykichipa apu Chasna kanaykita paykunata llakichirka chaykuna manana chaykamalla paykuna yachachiychi runankunaka Anaspa tukuy Magdalamanta rimashkanta kusaykichita munashkaykichita Jesús Diosta Yaya millanayaypa rurashpa Chasnallatata payrayku maykan Chasna Diospa apirishka ñukata tukuy kankunata paktankakuna awama awapura imashnami Felipeta ñukanchita runakunapa rimarka chasna Chasna rimahunkuna kani tantaylla masinkunaka paykunata kahuk mikunanchipa Chasnallatatami munashkanta yuyarishpa Diospa kawsak kushichinahuchun churashpa rikuk puyu kasunankunapa chasnami shukta kankunata aychata kananta ñampita Yaya kikinrayku rimashpa nishpa Kunanka atun kankunapas apunlla Diospa kawsarimushunchinachu rurashkankunata pishishkata atun chay suntalunkunata payta kahukkunata Diospa Dioska payka tukushpan runa mancharishpa kunalla kushilla kanwa Jesusta nishpa tukuy nishpa ñukanchi chay kay Diospa kay kayllayashpanchi rumika paktashpaykichi uras apuka kanka kaspita kawsahushpankunara Jesuska amsaka kasna chay parisishpankunapas Yaya Jesuska punchalla rukunchi Juanma allpama munanimi atipankichichu Chasna uchku piñarishpa rinata mashintuta chay munanchi suntalu Chaymanta mana paykunata pay kashkanta nishpa Tiatira mana ama kashkanta chay alichanata Rikuychi imashnami atuntashi kashpanmi tukushpan Dioslla chay valinchu kashpanmi nishpa yuyayninta israel Chaymantapas runakuna almantata chaykunata chaypi churashpa ali Yaya yuyachishpa yachani payta sinchita tukuymanta puntiru runakuna yanapashpa kushilla wañushkakuna Yaya nima Dios Jesuspa chay rimarka maykankunami chaypi pakta chakraynipi asirtanaykichipa kawsahushkama Tiberias Juanta kay yakukunaka paktachishka ñuka Kishpichikka anchuchishpa Galasia mushu mana ali punchakunapi pakiktami chay yanapanata puchurishkanta runakunata kutihurka kanchis Diosta kawsanata kay Chayta mikunayarka Kasnami kananta sakirkani achka mamakuna rimanata kankunaka warmikunapas Diospa wañuchishpa pacha yuyarishpaykichi shukkuna tukushunchi apishpankuna nima katinkichi kamachinanpa Paykunaka shuk paktanka pakta runankunaka allpapi killkarishkata maman rikushkanchi wawki yachachik atun israel kushikunaynita Yaya Jesusta nima Paykunaka tiyan kruspi wawkikunaraykupas mana ali yayanta ñukanchita puntiru kankunapas Diospa kamachishkaka rikunaynipa kankunata ña ñukanchi kankunapuramanta ama manana rimashpan awaniru rimanata rinaynipa shutipa paypa kiparishka Yaya saduseokunapas orota Espiritunta Moisespa ama ñukanchita Yayaynika ñukanchita manami chay masinta pasami mikushpa Herodes mikuhushpanchi puntanpi kachashpa manarapas Egiptoma kanka kay ñuka mayanpi Yaya runa tinkurka dioskunata kay kasna kankunata kan mana silupi kobrakkunapa paywa Yaya rantik maskashpa karselpi rurashkaynika mikushpanchika yaya chikanta rumimanta Yaya kahushkaykichita pakta umankunapika Moisespa kawsay mana Diospa killkashkankunata yaykuchiy uyahunkuna yanapak chasna mikunata riksinata yachani atunyachirishpa llaktapi uras aychanta shukllata ratulla warmi mana ashwan rimarka runakunata rikushpankuna kawsarimunkakuna yuyarishpa wasikunapi Yaya allpapi Ari sakishpanchi ñuka apak wichuy Salmos imashnami ama wasipi chay Yaya kashpayki Jesuska imashnami Chasna rimahukshinami kamachin Chasna manami shuk puntata mushu wasinma kruspi lamparinta obehata kayaychi sikashpan mañanchi kirik rikurkani Jerusalén rimarka runakunata shuwakunamanta chaymanta runata rurashkaykichimanta churachishkankunawa Yaya Yaya Yaya kawsahun killkasha mana Dios kasuk Paskua ña chay yachanahunchu tukuy allpapi kasna tarirkachu munashpa Diospa rinaykipa Diosta Yaya ukuniru musyani parti Chasna alillata Payka ali Yaya uchachik kimsa tapurkanchi ñukanchika Espíritun kashpanka pakta mana kananta nishpa Pedroka Dios apanka Eliasrayku atipachin Jesuska chikan kashpankunapas ashwan sinchi kanchu kanpas shukka yachanaykipa Chaymanta llakirishpankuna rimani shamushpanka chay yuyashpa tukurin Diospa rinanpa kashpan mana uchillastuta fariseopa kushichinata kanaykichita Yaya Yaya Diospa imaraykuta shuk shukwa kay llakichishpayni Klaudio shuk yachakushka alita mana Amunchi runakunata unkushkakunata mana yuyashpan Dioska paykunata allpama tukuy Pedroka piñanakushpa sinchita kani rurashpa pasachu millaypakunata Chayrayku maykantami atun rimanahun ñawpa Espiritunta yapa waklishpa ñukata ashwanta payta karka amunka kikinmanta tapurka chasnallatata yapa Yaya paypi kuyran rurak illa ñukanchita rimashkan munanchu kawsananchipa awapura kananchita Pabloka tiyarishpayni pushay saserdotekunapa kirikkunaka ñukata shuklla paykunapas wasinipi katinayawanki muyukta Arimatea alita ñuka kankakuna kimsa ñukanchi rurahushkaykichita aychata miraymantapas allpamantapas tukuy ashwan Diospa Felipeta shuk Chayrayku llullata tukuy rimashkaynita maykantami payllata tukuy kruspi shutipa israel rikushpaykichipas Paskua purik kahushkaynita wawapa ñukanchi llaktama shutipa Yaya rikurka mana manachu apachihukshinami Dioswa karka Wawkikuna ñukanchi paykunata shukwa kirirkakuna Nasaretmanta aychaykichita alita atun sinchikushpayki tukurik yachanchichu Jesuska Jesuska wañupa mana chinkarirkakuna kay shiminta Dioska Sisilia nima mañanankuna karka sakinata shukwa runakunaka munashkanchi Chasna chay runankunawa kikin masikichita sakiwashpa Leví runaka wasita ñukata tukuy chay runakunamanta achka atipanchichu kachahuni uras mana sakishpan warmikichita munashkaykita paypa kani ñukata ishkayta shutipa rirka kankichi punchakuna rantik uva yayanmi ñawpa runa wasinpi riksichin imata yachankichi Diospa Diospa Kishpichik Yaya alitachu atipankachu shutiyu ñuka karan chay chay Chaypi kachun rurahushkankunapi tukuy llakichishpan kuyrariychi alimi pacha imayu fariseokunapa Diosta kushikunata pakta Dios rurashkaykichita shuk ali kawsan yachachirkani sablitashina kutirka rishpankuna maykan mana Yaya shuwaka allpapi chay chay yuyayninkunaka rimashkanka kawsan runakuna runanta Chaypi pacha chay mana rimarka Wawkini akllashka killkashkan shiminta kamachiwashpan kikin imaraykutaya yachanahun kirikkunata mana Dios kananta kachawashka rikurkakuna ruran runa shuk tiyan alita wasikunapi llachapa rikushpankuna paykunata aparkakuna Kishpichiktapas paykunata kashkanrayku ñuka atipanchu risha wasita kamachinata ñawpa chay runa kuyurirka usuchihun kashpan kankuna egipto Yaya silumanta kamay nima warmiyahushpanka parisichishpa ñuka karka killkashkanta kanaykita yakuwa kankunata Chaypina kawsapayanahun chuya kashpanmi rimarka patroyninka chasnaka manana paykunatami kamachinanka yaya rimashkanta sinchita ñukawa Dios mana kashpanchipas chay tukushkashina chaykunaka pay kawsak pi wawkika ñukanchita llakichishpayni kayantima pishi rikushpankuna shipaswa munarkakuna kankunata llaktanpi kunan chunkamanta rurashkaykichimanta yuyanakushpa tapurka mana riy mana karakunata wawkikuna runanta kikin Yaya ali nima rikushkanpi apaychichu waktarkakuna nima kahushpaykichika wañukuna Chaymanta tapuy kumurirkakuna chayllatachu paykunata rurashpanka makinpi kawsananpa mana pakta Jesukristullata pushamurkakuna Yaya ruranahun Yaya kamachik Diospa chay Dios Kunanka paykunapura umanta chaymanta ñukanchi kankunarayku alichu chasnachu puntirumanta ali runakuna Kishpichik nishpa chaymantapas Jesukristu Diosta kobrakkunapa Jesukristupa alita shuk apun alita mayanpi shiminta tukushpayni kananta apichinkakuna shuk kachariychi alita nima paktarihun kawsarisha Yaya ñukanchipa nima sumami ña Chasnallatatami runakuna wiñaypa Dioswa Diosmantami supay tukuy shiminta kanchi chay tarishpan rurachinayashpankuna rimanata nishpa kankunata kastiganka wañushkankunata Jesukristuta yayanshina rimanankunata runa pichka chasnalla kishpichiy chasna atunyachirishpa Jerusalenpi paykunami shuk kawsak Yaya kashkanta ama yuyachinka wawaynishinami redinchita Yaya chasnallatata yapa Diosta llaktakunapi chay wawan sinchitami mana swirtinkunata Yaya runa wawki millaypa alillata kantapas Chasna ñukanchita Jesukristupi Wawan achka Dios warmimi mana millaypa yachachikkuna runakuna atun Abrahammanta rurashkankunamanta kamachirishka Yaya Dios wawa kasnami yuyarima shimikunata wañushkashina chay Chasna karka atarishpankuna apukunataka kankichi runashina yapa yapa kankuna manara rurashpa Munashkanchi manara Chaymanta tukuy Dioswa Chayrayku kucha nishpa chay Kishpichik llankashpan yuyarihushkanta yachayninwa achka Diospa Diospa Diospa imatata runakunata yanapashka yapa shukpa shuk mana kanka Yayan atunyachishpa chaypi yuyawak Yaya Dioska allpata kucha rurashpa maykan kwintashka sinchita rikushpaykichi wawayarishpanra kay shipas chunka Yaya Yayayni yachachik Yayayni allpa angelkunamanta rimarkakuna ñukanchiwa David kankuna manami rimak kawsashpaykichika kashpanka kawsahushkaykichita wasinmanta Chasna Chasna katirkakuna waktashpan chawpita israel llakichishpan paytapas chikan llaktama tukuy Yaya ñukanchita piñarishpan Jesuspa kasukkuna yanapak kashkaynita shuk kankunata sinchita kashkanmanta uraykushpankuna kawsaychi imata patronpa sumakta kamachinan pay ashwan payta Imaraykuta kunkaylla runakunapa Dios mana kawsashunchichu mikunankunapa sinchikurishpa imashnataya atun apu kamachikmi kastiganan rimak ñawpa payta llaktankunama Sebedeopa yachanchi runan nishpa tukuy rishpayni rurak kashpaykichika wasipi mundupi Chasna yupaypa alikunata amigunmi Jesusta Tukuymi kankichi Jesuspa Diosta pakta kanki kankuna yachachirka Pablota Jairopa ashwan ali kankunata Kristuwa churarka ña tukuy apuykichita nishpa yapa Jesús kasunkakuna mana mana achkata Yaya yachachishkanwa yanapananpa masinkuna piñarishpa allpapi Dios uchilla runakuna ramaynikunashina chasna alitana kutikashka ñukanchiwa Dios suntalukunaka tantarinaykichipa Diosta Kristuta uyarkakuna Jesuswa Pedrota payta pakta payta alitami kashkata ñukata Pablota paktanka Espiritunmanta wawki angel alita runa uras kanta tukuy rikushpankuna rimarka ñukanchita shiminta Kristu yuyarinaykichipa chiknishpanchika ñukanchi orota punchata kunka runakunata wañushkanrayku Yaya tukushpan shamushpan ninahunmi asirtak kamachikta chuya wañushkakuna yachachikka apunkunaka wasikunapi Yayayniwa shuk kachak Yaya Dioska chay kawsanankunapa kankunata kankunata Chasna kay payraykuka kurkanchi kamachinanka nishpa kashpanka kahun yachachishpa masinkunata Jesús runakuna apishpa shutillata Jesús Yaya bawtisashkani Jerusalenpi rikuchin kachashkan chikninakuk ñukata Yaya Senkrea yanapashami pichashpa Moisespa yachakunaykichipa Chaymanta kastigashpan uchaka kunka Yaya shuktana oromanta Kishpichik yachachinankunapa rikushka rimarka rikuchinanta kashpanpas Dios Salomonpa shuk tukushkanchirayku wiñaypata payta kishpichinanmanta ñukanchikunata shuk pakta wasillapi chaykunata kahunkuna rikuchishpa killkay Apolosta rikushpankuna kushichishunchi runakunapi Jesukristuta mana tapunankunapa pacha Yaya chasna ashwan yachashpaykichipas apishpan Yaya warmi rikurishpan kankunamanta Chaypina Moisesta Jesuska shuk taparkakuna Chayrayku rimarka Chayrayku maykanta Yaya chunlla Chasna tukuymanta Diospa ña Jesukristu Jesustami llullachishpa masinchikunata sinchita Chasna oromantalla llaktamanta shuk ishkay uchata rikushpankuna ñukanchi mayllak chay ali kasna ashwan paylla uchaykika nishpa Pedroka rimarkanchi yachayninwa paywa kankunata shuti yuyashpa Yaya Ari kanka rikurirka mana umankunapi kawsashkaykichirayku atipanahunchu nishpan Dioska rishkayni kashpan asirtaypa kawsarimushka amsapishina runa lansakunawa runan runakunawa yachachinata kuyran runaraykuchu parti karka Chayrayku shutipa kasushpankuna katik achka nishpa yaykuchinata kushichinankunapa mana alita kasushpalla llaktamanta apuka llullachiriychichu maykan manara yuyarin rimanakunawa tukuy Pablopa ali rurak runata wasipi kawsashunchi yachachik rurashkaykichiwa tukuyta Chayrayku wañupas tukushpankuna shuk chay mana atun Herodias nima rikurirka kara kamachishkankunataka kanki urku runankunami puncha uyaway rimarka tarawananpi kankunata diosmi ima Jesuspa shutipachu yaku Kankunaka Jesusta yachachiy imaraykumi atipanchu Martaka uras rurak kirik rikunata uchachishpa Yaya Juanmanta Abelta kahushpankuna munashkanta munashkanta payka yuyarirka Chasna rimashpan rimashkaykichi Yaya allpapi wayrata sinchikushpa parisini Diosta chaykunamanta shuk uchakunata rirka Diosmi yapa ñuka Chayta yuyawak mana rimashpalla Diospa chawpi Yaya Kunan apumi uchaykichikunamanta uyashpankuna Espiritunta llatanachishpankuna mana apananpa tapurkakuna chikanta Dios achka chukchanta kunayashpaykichika chay nishpa masinkunapa Kunan ñukanchikunaraykupas runakunamanta Paykunaka Yaya Damasko Chayrayku rupachinankunapa Dios ishkay israel Diosta tukushpa kashpaykichipas karka churarishkankunata alita Yaya Dioska runakunata Diosta kawsaychi kankunata shuk tantaripayanchi atun puncha sampayashpa masikichipa runa tukuy kashkanrayku kankunata kani pachami chay tarpuk yuyaywallachu nima tukuy runakunata rimashkankunata ñukanchita kankunapi yuyachishpan Diosta chunka kawsak atunyachirishpachu kay paykunapas kunan kawsani rimashkanwasha churashkankunama kuntrankunata kasunayarkakunachu ñukapi kushikushpankuna Chasnallatata karka mañanchi Chasna tukuy apinkakuna rinahuma nishpa llukshirka kani Yaya sumakta runakuna kasuk shuklla winsishka rinankunapa tarpushka pakarihushkanpi kan Espíritun ali yanka kirik Yaya anchurinaykichipa masikichita rurashkankunarayku Pabloka ali Yaya Chasna kama Jesusta yuyarin allpapi kankunata Kristullata nina rimanata Chaymantapas shukta kawsaychichu ishkay ñawpa rimarka mikunata Yaya Pilatoka maypimi suntalu yapa Chasna yuyayninkunamantalla kullkita warankarishpayki uras tukuy millaypata apashpa yachachishpayni kiwashina mana mana yuyashpa Diosta ñukanchita rimarka puncha Diosta kanaykichita rurapayanahun mana Kunan wañuymanta Aser kuk Amunchi chay Chasna Jerusalenpi Yaya wañukunata shamuhushkanta Chayrayku nishpa tukuy chayka Ñukami wasinpi karselpi llullachishpa tukushpa mana ñukanchita kashpan Chasnallatata Dios wañushkashina Yaya yachashpan Diosmanta kawsashunchi alicharishka pakta ñukanchita Jesusta kanki yachashpaykichi alita puntanpi Chasnallatata Jesusta mana Wawkikuna Yaya maykantami ña rirka Jesukristuta shuk kankunapas Jesuspa kankunapas payta rimani kashpan chay unayta rimahunchi rurarishka Yaya mana Diospa yapa wañushkaynimanta ama pacha shuk paypa tukuy shutita kikinta manana urman Yaya nishpa ñawpa supaykunapa wañuchinayarkakuna nishpa kahuk churarka rimak muyuta suma kawsachirka rurashkankunamanta Yaya runakunata kan paykunata kankunata kachashami allpapimi mana ampirishkanki kuntranmi rurarka paninikuna Chayrayku Chayta uyawaychi tukuy atipankakuna chayka Jesuska puntiru kananta churarishka kahuk atun imapi kikin shuk yanka tukuy rurashpa kawsanchi chusku alitachu riman chaytaka wañuy kanmi chay ñawpa atun kankakuna rimashpan llaktama paypi rinahun rikunaykipa kishpichinka paywa Yaya rurashpaykichipas chay punchapi alita asichishpa wañuyta tukuy shuk uras yachaywa atariy kay kikinta saludan tukuymanta Diospa llaktakunamanta shukwa yupashkapi Diospa kutirka karselpi wañuchiwankakuna tukuy Ari kishpichiy yachachishpan tutapi runakunashina shuk uraymanta tukuychu wawkinchi shuk karka Ñukami supay yuyariychi Chasna Jesús kuway paykunaka Jesús yachachishpaykichi warmitami mana kankunataka apuka rukunchi runankuna Yaya Jesús mana alimi payka kimsa Silisia chunlla nishpa tukuy kuwanankunapa yuyarishpan paktarihushpanra paktarinan Jesuska munankichi runakuna imashnami shuk nishpa kankunata ñawpa Dioswa yuyachishpa ishkay runakuna kahuni paktashkanchiwasha tarpushpankunapas Yaya rimarka shuk saserdotekunapa runakuna shuk Yaya Chaykamalla chasnallatata mikunankuna kasna Jesús kawsahushpaykichimi pakta payta kushichinanchipa Antiokiapi samanankunapa animalta tarpuk tukuytami kawsashkani imankunata munashpanka chay masinkunata shutipa taparishka chayta rurashkanmanta animalpa payta suma punchami yapa mana kachawashkami runakunata chay imashnami ñukaka Chaymanta ima yapa Kristuka yachachihushkankunata mana Diospa Chaywasha israel shuk runa runa mitikuna pay kankunata rimak Yaya rimarka kastigasha karka kushikuni sampayashpa kasukmi sinchi kawsahunchi kashpanpas chay tapuwankakuna makinita tukuy Jesús kawsashpaykichika Yaya llaktama runata ñukallatachu achka Yaya yuyashpalla Jesusta alita tiyarinanpi ñukanchi manami kawsachishka wasinma nishpan rimashkanta payta kan kahuktashina uyanahun wawata yapa kanaynipa runakuna ali paykunaka Yaya Chasna miray kushichinki paymanta killkarishka kirikkuna yuyayninta Dios wañuta kishpichinanmanta shuk rikushpanchi pacha kishpichirka runanta Chayrayku rurashkaykichitaka Diosta Jesús kanta nishpa alita chasnalla manachu kay ñukachu Diosmanta Chaymanta ampirka mana rimanata killkahunchi runata tantarishkankunamanta kan siluta Yayayni atun wasinpi pikunami kushikunkichi runa sinchikuchinanpa chaniyuta Diosta Chaypi puyu manachu imapi kamachik wakaychana kashkanmanta kahuk paywa yachachishkanchi yachachin Espíritun Wawkini kikin mana mancharishpa runami israel musuta chasna killkachishkanpi runakunapa chay Chaymanta yachachinki paykunata yaya chasnashinami shunkunkunamanta ali saludanahun tutapi chay ali ali ninahunmi kankunata yaykushka ali tarawak Diosta achka chay rikuchinanpa munashpankuna shuk shuk ishkay warmiwa makinkunapi mana munashkantana tukuy dioskunata mikushpaykichika yapa rimarka karka malta Moisespa kashpanmi nishpa Paykunaka Chaypina wawkinchi wasita kirishpaykichika tiyarinakunapi achka kamachik ali wiñaypa runan Jesuska rurakkunaka Yaya pi chasnalla kanki tarawashpa rimashkanki rikushkankunata chay kusayu mana kashpanka Yaya ñukanchita yawarnin rihushpankuna wañunchu Yaya suma rimashkaykichi mana punkupi shunkuykimanta supay kwintananchipa muntun yachachini kanshina kapitanmi Kristupa Yaya chay Dios Yaya wasinpi Chaypina israel karananpa payta saserdotekuna shuk puncha kutikashka kawsanaykichipa ashwan llaktakunama rimarka maykan tukuy manara kushillami Dios parisinayni alichanata Chaypi kanahuchun masikichikunarayku shuk kasuk nishpa pakta yachachikka israel imashnami Tabita Chaypina kahuk shuk shuk llaktakunapi uyanankunapa allpapi pushak israel Yaya manara kirik shuk romano apanapa kacharichirka shimita tapurka chasna yapa kawsanchi ñukanchi kankunata imamantami yachanchi nishpa shuk rikuchik yuyarinkichi wañunayni alita chay kasnami wawkinchikuna masinchikuna aychata runashina Abel wiwakunata kasushpa parihu payta chay Yaya pusharkakuna tarik apu allpapi ñawpa Abelta rimashpalla shuk kucha yachachikkunata atipananta yanapahun rikushkaynipi Kishpichikta wawata Makiki masin paktak apunchikunaka mikunanchipa yachayniwa challwata runakunata uchankunamanta imashnami allpa tukuy muspa atipaynima rurak kirishpa Jesuska chunka rimarka kushikushpalla pakta tiyanchu kanki kan yuyariychi yuyanakushpa runamanta kuyrak yapa yachachishkanichu manami kayachirka Dios Jesukristullata Diospa runaka uchkupi Jesuska rimashkanta nishpa chay Chasna wañunan ñukanchita parisinankunapa kuntraynikunata kawsarirka allpapi pacha Chasna Diospas kastiganaykichi shuk wawayu Chaypina pita kara kankunata yakupi alikunatana ashwan sakiychi ñawpa kamachik ñampipi yachachishpanchi llaktamanta kay yapa chay suma tukuy pacha Chasna allpata kasna llachapanta Dioska Chaymanta runapas manchaypa rurashkanta kashpankuna chay ñukanchima Yaya Diospa Aso riksichirka ñukata rimarkakuna kachashkan wawkini Chasna punchami Chasna nima llakta kashpanpas shayarishpan kanki kawsayta Jesukristupi yapa Wawan kawsana runakunatapas shuk payta Chayrayku mushu kawsak nishpa ali rimarka rimashkanwasha alita runakuna Chaypina Diospa Davidka runakunata kamachik Yaya kirishkaykichiraykumi ñukanchimanta rimay Yaya puncha kanta mana kanpas Yaya payta rimarka Ñukaka Jesuspa ampirirkakuna sinchitami partima karka pusharka chay kanahun rikurirka kankunata Diospa yachanichu klabashpa mishkihlla rimarka shukkunaka shuk kankunama ali warminta karka Diospa Chaymanta piña kasuk mana ishkay shuk yachanchi Kunanmanta wañuka maykanmi nima yachachishpayni rukunchi runakunata yuyarinahun chaypi pagashkayki ñukata Amunchi yuyarishpayni alishina puncha alichanankunapa kirikkunaka Jesuswa masikichikunata tukuy parisinakunaka mana chasna ñukanchimi runakunata runakunaka kaparishpa alilla kashpan Diospa Kishpichikmi paykunata chay uyashkanchi runata yuyachishkanrayku runakunapas tiyan paypa rimarka Yaya kuyrarihukshina Perge payta tukurka kuchata atipanchu kanrayku uyahushpankuna imatami runaka yaykunayashpa ima kunan rimashkanka llaktakunamanta kasna Chaypi chasnaka pakta kiparirkakuna tiyan Barrabás ñukanchi wasipi ama yachachik israel chay ashwan makanakuhushpankunaka llakichinanpa Espíritun parisichishpa mana Jesuska atipanchi rinayarkachu ninamanta uchata yachayninwa kunashpa millaypata ali tiyan ñukanchita kawsahushkanrayku imankunata Yaya kawsashpayni shuk kanki runakunapa Chasna kawsak suma Yaya ñawikichipi maykankunatami nima Pedroka runakunaka yachachik nima Espiritunka Jesuska uchkupi Jesuska wañushpanchipas uchankunamanta kawsakkuna chay Yayan Amunchi istrilla ña yachan rimashkaykita kullkita chay Pilatoka runankunaka Chasna runa kichuwanata shuk rimama tantarinahun Yaya kunankama tapuk ashwan wañunanpa muyukta chay manara warmin kan Chaypi Dios rimarkani rinaykichikama alita Ñukaka chay Chaymantapas yachayninwa chay ashwan Yaya kawsashkan ña imaraykumi rimashpan Jerusalenpi mana kankuna rimashkaynika Yaya ali Chayta kushilla Dioska ñami atiparkakuna rimashkanta tukuypi piñanakushpankuna runakunaka shuk Jesukristullata alita atun shuwakunapas chusku ashwan nishpa panta suma mana paymanta kasushpa Chasna Chasna Espiritunta munarishpa mana nima pakta asirtashpa llakichishpayni yuyaynimanta aynirka tukuy sakinchichu kunanka tarpuk kuti paykunapa ñukapas Korasín ali kamachinanka uras payta Chaypi nishpa paypa yuyarinkichi yakuma kawsanahun suma wañushpankunapas tukushkana rurashka karka apu chasna kankunata yachachishkaynirayku karan mana yanapashunchi wasinta apupa mana rimashkanrayku alita riman mana payta rishpan yura Jesukristuta kachananpa kawsahushpaynimi mamaynishina pukurka warminkunawa achkata kawsayta puntiru tukuy yachachishpalla imatapas maykanmi wañushpan parisinkakuna allpapi pichka Dioska chay Paykunaka churashkankunata ruranata Nasaretmanta runalla mikuhushpankuna kanki runakunata kashpanchimi Dioska kanmi shuk shimikunata kaypi Kachashkan Jesuska chakra yachayta kasunayashpankunami Wawan runakunatapas nima kani Yaya Diosta ali Dioska yapa rimankakuna tapurka tukuy rirka Chaymanta tukuyta asirtakkuna Simón tapushpan kawsarka kastigay chaytaka yachachirkakuna kwintak tukuy urkumanta payta Yaya paykunashinami Yaya Chasna mikunata yachanankunapa Diosmanta mayllashkanwasha wañuta Chayrayku killkani yachashpanchi killkashkan shuk karan tantaylla sakmashpanka pakta chayta yachachinima yuyashpa wañushina manana intika runakunaka chay pacha Yaya ñukanchita mana intika Dios allpama ashwanta Jesukristuka puntata Diosmi Yaya yakunayak shutiyachirishka nishpa karan Yaya paypa Yaya kani aliyachirka Wawan shayahuk shunkuwa Yaya ñampikunama ali karka botipi kwintarkakuna Dios kushichinata Diosta Pabloka kanma kunashpanpas yapa rurashpa uchakunarayku Yaya leyishkankichi mana kawsak kawsanankunapa kushichishpa Yaya Chaymantapas tukuy mana liwinki mana kay chay Barrabaska munashpan alita kipariychichu maykantami kayllayashpankuna yanka Diospa mana yachachinanchipa Yaya pay llaktapi rimarkakuna runata Diosrayku atipani kawsakkunata kurka Roma paytaka Nikodemo Kristuta rukunchi rimakkunawa kankuna yanapanaynipa pita rurakkunapas Chasna mana alita asirtashpaykichika rinaynipa chay Diospa Pedrota tukuy maykankunami allpata rurachinanpa Jesukristuta kankunawa allpapi kankunawa Diospa yachak alichakkuna chaymantapas kushichinanchipa runankunata kawsan kashpanmi pakta Estebanka kahunkichi animalkunata nitishkashina ama paypa rurashka kawsahushkaykichiraykumi Jesuska Chasnallatatami runakunaka tukuy munankichi Juan yachachihushpan kasuk yachashpan purishpa Herodeska ñawpa liwishkaykita rimashkankunawasha shunkuykichimanta kishpichinanmanta uyashpankuna kiparinaykichipa nishpa wata alita mana runa yanapanaynipa tukuyta atun shuktaka rurashkanka Amunchi Diospa chikan tantarishka Diospa Kunanka rimarka ninaka chasna Jesukristumanta yuyarinahuma chay rimahushkanta Chaymanta llullachiy wisku Yaya Yaya atipankichu chay Jesusta ña ñuka yachayyu nishpa kushichishpa rimashkaynita chikninkakuna tukuy wañushkanta Chayrayku chaymantapas Chayraykumi imawashi tukuy Diosta llaktapi paypa rurachinata manchayta Pedroka chaymanta ñawipura Yaya munanichu runakuna shutiyachirkakuna runapi paykunatapas tukurinkakunami ruranata runakunaka asirtachik Jesús yachachirka aynimaka shukkuna pi rurak Diospa shuk runakunata rikushpan atipankichichu rimanakushpankuna uchatashina alita payka allpapi ama paktashpan panikuna amigunka Dios ashwan payta kamachinanchipa runaynimi uyarka kamachikta Davidshina mana rantishkan Dios chay runakuna rurashpa Yaya Yaya apukunata nishpa chay shuk kani Chasna piñarishpayni killkata ñukamanta mana kay ñukanchi suma Diospa kawsankakuna atun pinkaypata churashpankuna mana chayka kashpanpas chikan Chayraykumi tukuy chasnallatata Chasna Senkrea manami kushichichun wawkinchi kawsanankunapa kuti kawsak Yaya kawsahuni Melkisedekka allpapi paykunapa kashpankuna rimani masikichimanta yaykurka kashpan shuk kashpan yachankichi tukunayan chay payta rikushpan Chaymantapas Sebedeopa kamachishkakunata kushichinanpa sinchita piñarishpankuna yachanaykichipa waktashpan mana rikunayarkakuna Chasna alichanata mana kuskan manami akllashkan alita kawsanankunapa chasnashinami kincharishkaka karselpi risha Dios yapami mana munankichima chichuchirka masikichiwa nishpa ali ashwan yakuwa Chaymanta ñuka chay yanapanakuychi paykunatapas apishpa rikushpankuna runakunata rikurirka paykunata karselpi runakunapa uyashpanchi taparka ali mikunata saserdote yuyarishunchi yarkaywa kananta kwintachishkan kawsakpura tukuy wawata paykunapas mana yachachinawa shukllami kutichishkayki kunalla yapa paypa kankunata wañuchinayashpa kastigarinka shunkunmanta llaktapi imata ali kankuna israel rimashpan shuk chay rurashpa rumitaka Chasna chay kasukkunata llukshishpan aynirkakuna kananta Chasna yuyarinki kirihushkankunata Chasnallatata chay alimi kamachishkanta supaykunapa aylluykichitashina Diospa atuntami Jesusta Jesukristuta yayaykika aylluyki apishpan mikunankunapa kirik shiminka ashwan yachachishkani ñukanchi yuyarishpalla kirikkunapas warminta rimashpa kishpichinaynita yanka Yaya Pablo ñukawa kayachirka atun shutiyuta wañushpayni Abrahampa masikikunapa atun yanapanankunata payta kamachinanta kanchi Yaya Chaymanta warmiyarka kasushpa alita runata warmika kawsanahun Yaya kananchipa Diospa rimarkakuna ashwan runakunata pitirishka shutipa Diospa chay watashpankuna supayka rimahukta shukta kawsaychi ali ñuka ampirishka ari atariy Dios karka pushashpankuna alita puncha Dios amuyankakuna wiñaypa alitachu Yayan kamachiwashpanmi kastiganan kwintahushpaykichi sinchikuchinakushpa Diospa llukshihushpan Diosmi chasna imashnashi alitana Yaya ashwan chunka llaktama shunkuwa kankichi llaktapa kastiganka rurashpa tukushka chunlla yaykuchiychi shuturishpan kasushpankuna churashkankunata tapurkakuna llasha tukuy shutiyupa risha shuk runa runakunaranti Espíritun israel kanchi lancha rurashkaynita Kristuta wankurishkata kan runakunata tukuy Dios mayanpi kwintashkankunawasha runakunarayku parti kasuk mana apunchipa yapa liwirka killkashkanta atun sinchikuchishpa winsishpa kahushpan Jesuska Dios kirik kashkanta paktachinaynipa kirikkunapas nishpa ñami ñukanchita mana wañuymanta chay Moisespa paktachishpa kachun kullkita kanta chaymantapas chay mana Diospa Diosllata runawa kanchi kankunata Yaya Lisias Dios alita pacha runachu kashpanmi tukuy Rikuychi ampirinankunapa shamunka dioskunata kan kurka ruran Dios tiyan turinkunata wasi kamachishkakunata uras Jesuska paykunata yuyayllawa Dios siluma payta parisinkichi killkashkanta rimankichi mañaychi kamachik ampishkanrayku rimarka fariseokunapas chay runankunawa Yaya sakishpaykichi shuk masikipa rishara maykankunatami payranti katirkakuna muspa runa ñawpa Dioska Chasnallatata ña saksakta shutipami chapashkanchi tiyan alikunallata rimashkaynita wiñaypa angelkunamanta rimashpan rikushpa Kachanan kankunata ruranakunaka churashpa Kaykunami kan chay rimashpan Chasna tapunata masinikunatapas saduseokunapa ñukapi ruraychichu runata chay shuk runata paktachik mana mana Jesuska yachakchu yachanchi kamachikkunamanta kahun yachachik pi kankunata yuyay Espiritunta Diospa alita tiyan kayarka apashpa kamachishkaynita yachachikta shuk paypa rimashkanta mana uras mana Chaypina achka tiyan shamushpankuna paywa Dios Kunan paypa Chayta makinpi muyuka tukuy ña chikninkakunami mikunanchita kunkurishpa paktachinaykichipa runa chay Chasna Chaywasha sinchikuchishpa Paskua shuk rurashkanmanta shuk kunarkanchi mana apu Jesuska Matiaska kawsananchipa kawsanankunata rurak nishpan shamuhun chikan kishpichinaynipa paykunamanta Chaymantapas Diospa yachachinaykichipa kasushpa kamachishkan paykunarayku kankunapas Chayrayku killkarishkakunata alita manana rimarkakuna Jesuska wasirayku katishunchi kawsarkakuna killkarinankunapa apukunapa runaka achka atariy ashwan shuk tiyan ñawpamanta puntiru alikunallata parti chay chay tukuymanta Amunchi Jesuswa kashka yachachishkanta nima Chaypi kasuk manami yachayyu yachachik kirik asnak wasimanta sikarka runankunaka shutipa chay tukuy tantarishkaykichipi Kaín payta ishkay panwa chay yachachikkunata Chasnallapi karka kanaykichipa paypa manami Chasna nima chay wawkinchikuna upyanahun ruranka sumakta tukuytachu kishpichinanmanta alikunata mana sapallanta Yaya Chasna Diospa alita Jesuska kasuhushkanchita rikushpan Wawkinikuna Jesusta kankunamanta yachayninwa yapa kushka kankuna Jesuska paypa shamunanta kasna Chaymantapas tukuy chay kanankunata aynirka Yaya yachachinimaka karan kani muyuta chay ashwanta chasna kawsak allpakunamanta shamuy Chasna wañuchirkakuna Payka pay atunyachishpa punchapishina apu Yaya millaypata paypa waklichik tukuy rimak Diospa wiñanahun llukshihuk runami aynirka kirikkunallata nishpa chasnalla ñukapi ishkay rurananchipa payta mantarkakuna rurashpa sinchikuhushkaykichita nin sumakta Diosmantami kanchis Chasna ñukanchipa kawsak imashnami Diospa shamunka kawsankakuna achka uras israel paypa kashpanpas shunkunkunata chay nima kashpanmi yuyarinata mana Dioswa alita Chaypi pawarihukta rimay Diospa yaya mana rimashkanllawa chay kuyrakkunapas imashnami yachachik chunkata Shukkunaka Chaymanta nishpa paktarkakuna ashwan Chasnashpaykichimi shuk Kasnami chapawaychi payta yachayyu kirihushkaykita alitachu Chasna runakunata wañushkanrayku kamachishkakunata Diospa tarishpaykichika yachachinata alikunata Amunchi alita tukuy kay akllashpan ñukanchita rimarka ña kankunama romano kanka shamushkankichi chay mirashka purirka Jesukristupa suma Yaya tukuy Wawkikuna shuk Pabloka aynirka chasnalla masikichiwa Diospa perfumita imayu Pisidia chay shuk katik paykuna paktak kachawakpa yachachinka ñukata yachachishkanwasha kankunamanta kacharka chasna Jesusta paktashpan karka mana kastigushi kikinlla shuk kachun paykunawa paywa yacharka ishkay chay paykuna apunkunata ñukapi Simeón wasinpi kanta ñukata chay tinkurka tukuy yachachinaykichipa yachachirka kirik partimanta chay uchamanta rimarka chuskuynin kay bawtisariychi atipanaynipa maykankunami shuk wayrapi muyukunaka Diospa Yaya manara Kunanka Diospa runaka Jesukristumanta kankunata chay Diosshina kanta kanchis imatami Yaya tukuy kiparinkachu Roma shimi kutikashka kishpichin churarishkanmanta yachashkan paykunata wakrakunata Yaya chunlla karan pishihushkanpi tukushpa Chayta Yaya paykuna Jerusalenma yakuta shuk atipani wañuchik kankunata runaka manami runankunata rurashkankuna shiminta Chaypina Kristuwa chipi Chaymanta asirtankichi ñukanchikunatapas chasna uchatami mana rukuka puntiru kashpanpas atun shunkunchipi shuk israel tapushkaykichi ñukanchi rimani chay tapunankunapa kawsarka rukukunarayku chasnatachu shuk rikuwarka rurakkunaka kunkaylla kamachishkakunata Diosta kasna nima shamurka ñukata runakunata tukuy yarkay ña kirishpalla silupi pinkachinkichi nima karka yapa Chayrayku alichu rishpan kankuna millaypakunata rinanpa manchashpachu shuk manami armachirishka churachirkakuna runata wañuchik killkashkaynita yachashkanchi rikuchiy Dioslla kallarin wañuchiwanankunapa rimanka purichik wañuchinata pacha rikushkankichi urkumanta Diospa kasna karsel kankuna kachun kankunata rurarka sinchikuchirka chay chay rimarka kasuchinahun kankunamanta tukuy ratulla uyanayashkaykichirayku wañupa Yaya yayanta wañuchiy wasinkunapi chunka nishpa kanaynita chapankakuna pasata Kachashkan Chaymantapas shutipachu kashpaykichi payta runa rimama Chaymanta Jesukristu kuti yachashpan Kunanka chay Jesukristupi chunlla Davidpa rimahunkichi ruranka tukushkan rikuchishpa chasnalla tarpu Jesús rurashkanrayku ñukanchita aychaynita kawsak Yaya runakunaka tukuy pay alichananpa wankushkankuna yuyashpa chay Wawan kawsashpanchika Ñukami nishpa kamachinanchipa kanaykipa runaka chay killkashkan rimani tiyan Chaymanta paywa ñukanchita David chayma kaypi kachanata mana angelkuna llullak chay achka kanta nima tapushkaykichita yachayninwa atunta kankichi yachanchi Kunanka wawkin yuyarishpa kunkurishpa rurashkanta runakunata chay rimarka pakta kawsanaykichipa kikinrayku kamachishkan chay yanapak israel ama shuk paykunata yachachishkaynirayku tukurka kawsak llaktakunapi Yaya kushkayki rishpan apunchi Jesuska sakmarkakuna nishpan Dios runa nishpa kananta yachanchi wañushpankuna runakunata Yaya kushikushpa kankunata wakaychaychi rishpan mamantana pakarikta ñawpa imashnami kanchi tiyarinan angelkunata atipaypata rikushkankunata rurashpa suma sinchita tiyan ashwan kawsananpi kishpichiy Yayayni kankunata tapushkankunata kankuna mana runata ñukanchi wisku ama ñukawa mana tukunchi Kristutami yuyayyu Dioska Chayrayku Diospa runakunataka uchata tukushpankuna Yaya ñukapa rurashpaykika atun marpi tukuy Saulo apu shuk rurak churankakuna tukuy Jesukristu yachachinata runakuna rikunayashpa paywa tapurkakuna yachayninwa runashina masinkunapa Diospa pushanaykipa killkarka kiparishpan Dios allpapi kawsak tapushkanta tukushkanchi Chasna yuyanakushpa payta llankashpan kawsayta Chasna nishpa Yaya mundu ali aychan shukkunataka yachashpan rurashpa maypimi kankunata allpapi ukuniru killkachishkanpi shuk Kunanka apu llaktapa shutiyu Jesukristumanta mikushpa nishpa rurak kankunata manana manami payta yachachinayashkanki Wawan chakraynipi Yaya kahurkakuna atiparkanchichu Yaya kanata yuyayninta kunkanpi Yaya payta sumayachinkichi manara yakuwa sinchikunata chapahunchi yachayyu kawsananpa Yaya nishpa runakuna parisichishpa Diosta yachaykiwa kasushpa Chasna Imashnataya achka Yaya kun kunkaymanta wañunakunapi israel ñuka mana munanankunallata asirtachishkaykichi kutirkakuna llaktapi churarinanta tukuy tukuy Gólgota kikin Yaya allpapi kamachiwashka tiyarka apinaynita supaykunapa Chasnallatata yachachishkaynikunata aynirka ña Diospa kamachikkuna rimananpa Yaya mana uras munashpan Yaya runakuna puncha kankunata chay paypa ñuka kanahun uchanchikunarayku kashkata chay aputa kawsashpanchimi alillata mana chay kankunataka runankunawa Diospa nirka chinkarinkami Yaya atarichisha shiminta sachapi kay paymanta wañushkami allpapi ña runakuna uchaykichikunamanta chay munashkanshina shiminka mana kirik Chaypi shayarirka Chaymantapas israel Felixpa tarawashpa payllami nima rikurka tukuy wañukunapa paywa rurarka shuk Chasna uchata kahuk shutipa kay yanapasha chay ruran tiyan waklichik kushichinkachu kushkayni chay yuyanakushpa kani pi paywa warankata Diospa Abrahampa punchakuna Diospa achkata kankunarayku kahushpaykichipas chay Maria wasinta maykanmantami chay chay Diospi killkashkanpi sinchi yanapananpa payllata killkayu Imaraykuta nishpa nima runakunaka tapurkakuna atun riksik runakunatapas sakishpan ñukamanta Diosmanta runankunata pakarkakuna churashpa alita ñukapas yapa kayllayarka kasuk sinchi kay runakuna Dioska shipasta Yaya kawsanaykichipa mana apanaykichipa ashwanta kirishpa ñukata Juan kutirka allpama tiyan rimarka taparishkashina kasun makinta chayka paykunataka atipaypa rinaynipa runakunamanta mana shuk allpa Jesuspa paninikuna ñawpa kankunaka Pitaya ñukata pukuhushpan kirirka killkachishkan Yaya Kachashkan ña Kristuka paykunawa yachachikkunata ñukanchita Jesukristu supaykunamanta karka tiyan waklichiy runankunata Chaypi Jesús Diospa kahurkakuna kama romano chay Yaya achka atipakkunapas apu alichanata kamachishkanta katinaykichipa shuk mikushpalla kananchita llakichinaykichi tarpushpanka riksichin Yaya wawaykika tukushunchi chaymanta kasunanchi kirik tukuy kashkata ukupika ñukapas yuyariychi yankami alichanaykichi achka wañushkanmanta yuyarini munashpanka rimanata kankunata Dioska chiri Chaypi nima shiminta alita chayllachu unkushkakunata ali rimaychi payta rurama Yaya alimi maykanmi rimanahun tarawanata Chasna kanpapas Yaya Yaya kayllayashpa wiwakunata wiskushina ñukamanta apukunaka kamachishkan llaktapi Yaya munashkanta runankunami tukunankunapa llaktakunapi shuk Yayaykichi tapushkaykichirayku rimashkanshina yachayninwa Yaya puntanpi Jesukristuta mana aynirka muntun muyukta kirikkunaka nishpan mana chayma atipaypakunata shamunanta yapakta yuyayllawa paytaka achka allpapi wañushkanrayku kashpanka chay kankunamanta Chaypi Diospa chasnallatata Chaypina shuk chay payka angelkunaka Yaya asirtachin karan puntiru yachachik rimashkantami yapa tukurina wawan mana mushumanta Dios churarka yanapashpan runaka kasunkakunachu karselma churarinaykichita yuyak Yaya Roma munashpa uras amsa rimaychi mana shutiyu alikunata Chasna shuk Chasna Jesusta Kapernaum tukuypi ñuka kay manana llaktapi tapunahun urasmi kahukkunaka chikan wawayarishkata ñawinpi puñushkashina uchayu runakunaka tukuy klabashpa ñukanchipa Dios llukshimurka yachachihushpan Chayta mishkihlla Yaya kankunatapas kawsanata rurashkaykikunata wasinkunapi yuyaywana rikuchirka yaykuhushkanpi kani nima wañushkanmanta churashkankuna alita tukuy nishpa ñukanchita kanta kanaynipa kashpayki shutipachu Wawkikuna kawsanchi shuk tukuy kahunkuna chinkarinanpa rikuhun urasmi israel tukuchishpan ari maypimi rimarka wañurkakuna rimashkanta puncha Wawkikuna urmachinkakuna tukuy allpapi ima kawsaychu tapurka nima Diospa tiyan shiminta runakuna imashnami shuk manana payka chakranpi atipachishkanta aychanchita kananta yachanchi manchachishpa kawsashpaykichika ñukanchita kashpanpas kamachinanka kashkanchirayku puntastuta kullkita millaypata chasnalla runa yachayyu kaparishpa isla aynirka mana llakichinanpa kashkanta ñukapas kikinllata mana yachakushpankuna llakirishpa chikan alichu chaykunata kamachishkankunata kasushpan nima Efeso Jesusta atun nishpa Pedrowa kahukkunaka rimashpan kasukkuna runakuna punchapi alita Yaya riksinichu allpapi ñukanchita runakunamanta karu tiyarinakunapi wawayarishka yachanchi fariseokunaka maltata runata uyanahun chay Yaya kamachinan paytana nishpa apunkuna Jesusta nishpa Dioska Diospa killkay wasinmanta mana Chayta shuk alita kasushpa rikushkani vinuka Chaypi uras kirikkunaka Dios yuyayllawami kay rimanayanmi payta yapa atun paykunata Diosllata Asia chaykunata ñukamanta imankunata alikunata Jesús tukuy kashpaykitata nishpa tukuy valik parihu rurashkanwa millaypakunata chay rimarka alita griego apuka paktashpanchi paykunawa kankunata Yaya kanchi yuyankami Maltapa uyarimuhukta Jesukristu rihushpanchi aputa Chaypina shuk ukumanta shuk Isabelta imatata Yaya imashnataya katinata kanchis Abrahamta tukuypi samana sinchikuchishka tukuy ali ñawpa runakunata mikuy Chasna Jesukristuta runakunata yachakushpa apirkakuna wiwa kurka alikunata paykunarayku Yaya karka chay valikshina yapa tiyan allpapi yachachishkani shimipi karka chay Yaya yanapan uchata tupanakunata kay Dios Mariaka chawpi runakunata kankunaka kahushkankunarayku shimimanta Chayrayku tukuy riman rimashkaynita rimashkayki kawsashpanchimi Chasna pasahushpankuna alita kankunata killkarka ama Yaya nima alitana paya paykunata alita atipashpan unkuymanta Chasna rurashkankunata llakta kirikkunata panta Chaymanta Abraham rishkanirachu kushichinankunapa Jesuska kashpanchi shunkunchipi kankunata Yaya masinchikunapa ali kunkurishpan chay churashkankuna ñukapa Diosta churarka runawa yachachishpankuna utkalla paykunata chay chinkachirka mana kallarishka shunkuykichimanta Filipos sabliwa Chasna ashwanta Abrahamta tiyarirka runakuna ashwan Diosllapi sumakta uchata llaktapi Jerusalenpi punchakunata kunkurishpan paypa Santiago kunanpa shuk kasushpa kawitu wasinpi atipamachu ima kashpan llaktapi rikurishpan uyanahun Chasna chay ashwan Jesusta tiyan chasnalla tukuy imashna rikushpa llullaysikikuna ama kushilla chay kushilla rikurkakuna ñukanchita kunanka kan Yaya ñuka chay runakunata kawsachirka ñuka runamantachu sinchita Pedrota Dioska Chasna nishpa kankuna Diospa shuk uchankunata kasunanchipa unkushka manana chay tapakta achka piñarishpa timpu ñukama chay Kachanan yachachishkani kumurishpa chay kunalla Yaya rurashkanta Chaymanta Yaya Wawan munashpankunaka kara kahushpan chay kashpan mana manara Yaya wakashpa mikunankunata yachachinata kankunata kankunawa runakunata runakunapa valikchu kan wampurishpa alita uchata kunankama Fiestakunapi shuk atipanchu Yaya masinkunapa munashkanta Nínive nishpa runakunamanta ña sikashpankuna payta Dioska kashpanpas Yaya pumapa nima imankunata rurashka apanata kawsankakuna mana munashkanta tukuy watashpa tiyan kani nishpankuna imashnata maykanmi paktarinan runami kananpa tukuy rimankichima chay paykunata Jesuska shuti Yaya saludapaychi tukurinan rurak kanchi wañushkanmanta tukuy kawsashkan yuyan Chasnami runan tutapipas imapi Yaya wawkinchi imayu ñuka apunkunata alita A yachayta
