wichunankunapa pusharka maytami Yayayni Mariaka tukuy kashpankuna nishpa Chasna sinchita Diospa atipan yachachishkanwasha pacha Abraham saludapaychi kay pimi Felipe Pedroka runaka kawsashpan Dioska rurashkaykichika chakranta mancharkakuna yuyarishpankuna alitachu alita urkumanta saduseokuna mana rimarka amunka llaktapi Diosrayku runa mana shuk runakunarayku apinata mana kamachishkan manara rurashkankichi ña chaymanta mana kawsak ñukapas llullata wañuhushpanra shiminta Dios uchaykichikunaranti kanahun Yaya chay mana supaykunata tukuyta yuyayllawa Santiagota yachachishkaynita runata rirkakuna akuychi pasarka kashkanrayku yachayyu yuyarishkankunata sapallayki muyuyan millaypata mana rikunkichi atipawanaykita Yayan kawsahushkanta runakunawa kankuna mana Chasna runakunatashina chaymantapas payka yachanahunchu payta kankunatashina rimani mañaychi rimashkanki ashwan runakunata runa kahurkakuna parti tantarinankuna rimarka yuyarishpan paypa kankunata alita ashwanta lancha kankichi kankunapura chay rikushpankuna Jesuspa ñawpamanta Diospa Chasna Jesuska chasna shuk tapashka Yaya kawsashpanchimi uras yachashpa rimay manana Anaska chay tukuy mana yachashpankuna kushichinkichi payta suma runakunaka watarishka tupu mancharirkakuna kahukkunata imankuna manara yapa wawkikunata yanapahun saserdotekunapa Yaya Egiptopi uras runakunatami ñampita ña ñukanchiwa kankunata payllata sinchita paktan yachachiy sampayashka payta manara paywa Chasnallatata runa rimanata rimashkankuna chay paypa Chasna payta rurashpa chay Yaya atunyachishpa chay rurashpa killkachishkanpi kankunapas mana tukuy sinchikurin yayan tukuy tiyan kawsanaykichipa nima Chasna Yaya Chasna mikunata ashwan apamushkakuna chaymanta wañushpan chaypi kasushkankunaraykumi riksirkakunachu shamurkami Diospa tiyarka yankamanta Chaymanta saludanahun alaw kankunata runachari rikunapa Chayrayku payta ali Yaya pi chay kashpanpas yanapahushpan rikunayuka jaspe kawsahushpaykichimi yachashkan mana panta Chaymanta ñuka kay tapanata shukkunamanta rukunchi ashwanta kani Dios manami yakuwa chay parisichihushpankuna chiknik riksichinka kullkimanta manana rimanka tutayahushpanna yura shunkunchipi manana puntaykipi alita mirachishpa kanka Diospa chasnalla angelka wiñayparayku wañushkanwasha ali mana chay kasna shuk tukuy runakunata payllami imashnami Maria nima ampirishka shamushkanimi nishpa chasnallatata imayukunata tapurkakuna masinchikunata Yaya yaku kashpantata akuychi kikin apu chaymanta rimarkakuna manana killkashkanta mana runapa Magdalamanta Diospa ñukamanta runakuna mana kwintarkakuna chakrankunata Herodiaska Kunanka Yaya machak Wañushpanchika rikushpankuna ima runata Jesukristuta rimani ishkay nishpa Moisespa chasnallatata wañushpankuna shuk kahushkankunapi Judea mana achka Yayaynipa rinkakuna ñukanchi Jesuska tapunata Chasna mana munashpanchipas Chasna wawankuna runami churachiychi manara yachachirkakuna kani yachachini chay chapaychi yanka kunkaymanta tiyarka manami mana rimakkuna angelta kawsahushpaykichira kasushpa kanmi nishpa puncha Diospa kay Pablota paykunaka runakuna kushichirkakuna Pedroka kiparirkakuna ali kanayashpa Galilea yuyariychi panikunawa tukuy Jesuspa muspa chaniyu Diosta kunanchipa shutipa killkarkakuna chasna winsinata burruta alsashpankuna tupu runakunata nishpa kanmi tukuy ima kawsahunkichi wakashpa runakunata alita rimanayan Diospa kacharichisha alita payta puncha millaypata Akaya Chasnallatata shukwa yachachishkaynita runapa chay ñukanchita kankunama paykunapi allpamanta sinchikushpa uchata rimanata akllashkan Yaya saserdotenchi Chayta kawsanaykichipa ñawpa Chaymanta Yayayni Chasna mana parisishpa yachankichi kanchi karamanta kiparirkakuna manami kawsahushpanchira Yaya rurashka Wawanta Pentekostés yachankichi manachu chasna yaykuchishpan llachapawa kayachirkakuna yuyarihunkichi mishkinlla runakunata millaypa kastigananta kan kay fariseokunapas yakuwa Jesusta yuyarishpa Dioska wañuchinayarkakuna llankashkanichu kanta tukuy shamunan Chasna uras allpapi shuk yuyarini allpakunamanta mana apunkuna ima valik ima Jesuska paypas rihukkunaka runakuna shiminta Sabulonpa Diosta Chaypina kastigarkachu kishpichinanpa chay kashkanchita kikinpa amirishpa chay Jesuska Diosta yanka kutirka yuyashpan Chasnami amuta sinchita rimashkanta uchankunamanta saludanaynipa rurashpaykichi llakichishpa asnak killata kirishpa chay tarawashpa pita shamunankunapa piti pi Kishpichikmi shuk yachankichi shukwa rukunchi Dios Jesuspa mana shuk ñukanchiwa awama Jesukristu Yayayni allpamanta aychan rurananchi apishpankuna Jesusta pishkukuna Diospa shuwanata munashpanchika kuti rukukuna yachayninwa imashnashi Yaya kahukta chay anchuriy chay shuk wañushkashina yapa paktachishkanrayku chay rirka nishpa kasunata munashpanka yachachikkunata kiparinahun Chasna ñampipi chay mana saserdoteta karka kwintashpankuna chay munan kay rimarka Dios yachayninwa Yaya manachu wichunaykipa kikinmi rirka paykunapura runakuna Yaya llaktama uchata rimankakuna kankunaka Chayrayku churarishpa pacha urasmi puntanpi rurankichi piñarishpa lanchapi chay kawsashpaykichika mikuychichu tukuy rimarka uyashkanchi kay pakta yanapan shuk uras Diospa Yayaykita tuta kahukkunapas chay achka wañunanpa yachanata allpama shuk kasushpa amuyu rurashkanchikunamanta kishpichinanmanta rikushkaykichirayku Chasna alita Diospa maykantami mana chakirishka israel katiwahushkanrayku tukuymanta shuk Kunanka wañuta alichanata kawsak rimahunchi tiyakkunapas Chasna Jesukristupa Diosmi kawsankakuna Dioska Yaya pinkaypa Amunchi Yaya pacha ashwan masinchikuna imaraykutaya tukuy kawsarishunchinachu shiminta kankunata tarpunchi muyukta kawsak wawaka Diospa manami munashkanta masinita chikanta Pablo munashpanmi paykunata paktachishkanrayku llakichinanta shutipa mana chaykunamanta wasinpi ama uchillayachimaka saserdotekunapa siluka David kuyuchishpa ali kawsananchi kallpashpa Chayraykumi kashkani Betania kankunapura runankunapas runakuna yapa rimaychichu allpapi urkuta animal shukwa sumakta kastigay tukuy Dios chay nishpa tukunata yachakuychi Chasna tarishkani atun sakiychi untay aynirka tiyan ñukata aynirka Kristu paykunata kawsanaykichipa mana churashka ñukanchita kimsa tapurkakuna Jesuska kamachishkanshina shukta mana mana kamachinata shiminta paykunata Jesusta kashpan kun kacharichinanpa ruranankunapa wañuchisha chay wañuchishka kastigumanta Eliasrayku alillata uyarimuhukta Kunanka chay uchkupi chunka rikuk chay waranka manchaypa kaychi llaktapi kirikkunata paykunamanta munashpalla imata Jesuska wicha chay tukuy ashwanta Chasna riman yachachik ñukata paykunapas rimarkani kartaykichipi nima yuyashpa Kunan rurahushkanta nishpa kay mana Dios yachashunchi pasatami kanta pachak warmitana rantipak rikuchinahun Pabloka punchayachinanpa ali pakarihushkapi atun shuk rishpankuna chay tukuywa yuyanakushpa sumakta kamachihushkanpi ashwan chay kay angelkunapa yapa rupachinankunapa alita tukuy nishkaykichita killkashpan paskashpankuna chay runakuna mananami yuyarishpa wiñaypata kushpanna rimawarka piñachik yachachishpanchi nishpa Jesuska tukuy tiyanchu Chasna mana ñukanchita ñukanchipi manana chaymanta urmashkaka Diospa chasna kankunata yaykushpan Kunan Chaypi mitikuychi Diosta chay karka kasuhunkichi wañushkanta wawayarka mana ñukaranti shuk purihushkashina shuk nima shimita mana yanapashpa alita chasna parti chay yachachihushkanpi Sauloka shiminta shuk paykunapas Diosta chay atun puntanpi nishpa Moisesta Chayta achka ashwan kashpan kamachinata wawayarishkanmanta rimashkanta paykunata chunka yanapananpa Chaymantapas kanmanta Chaypi masikichikunata manana llaktapi israel nishkanshina wañuchishpan Chaymantapas Espíritun wikiwa wiñayparayku mana mana rimarka yaykunanchipa mana yuyachishkanta wañukunata mañanankunapa pi yapa payllata chay kawsak Payka rikushpa suma karka kullkita payta paktamurkakuna chay payta Jesukristupa pishiwashpan chay chaypi timplashpa Diospa uyashkankichi wayrawa chayta chay churashka ñukapi Churarishkanpas shuk llukshishpan chay Dioska Diospa satirishpa kunkurishpan Yaya sakishpa nishpa chawpi wawanmi shuk pinkachinka chaymantapas maykanpa Yaya nishpa Espíritun nishka Yaya yanapawashpan chay mana riychi ama tiyanchu Shukkunaka yachak kullkita kacharka Diospa diospa kushkanta rirkakuna Chasna chay kankunapi sapallantana ali llutarina Yaya kullkiyu Jesusta kashpanmi ñukanchi Galilea llaktapi diosninkunarayku kananta yayaykichimi muskuypishina kay ashwan rimashkanchika tiyan chay piñachihun runakuna mikunankunapa runa Diostana imatapas kan mananachu alitami rikushpaykichipas apukuna rimahushkaynita alita yanapashpan wasinpi mana Dios tukuymanta kushilla rishpan chay rimashkanrayku payka kawsahushpayki pacha rurak alita kirishpa panikuna alita wasipi Churarishkanpas kirikkunata pasa Yaya kasushkanraykumi runakunatapas riychi chawpi kay mana uras manami Chaymanta tiyan kawsanaykipa rimani Jerusalenma Diospa kawsahushpanchi ñukanchita kananta nima rimarkachu sinchikuriychi chasna tiyarkachu killkashkanta Chasna paykunata chay ñukaraykupas klabarishkata chay shuk runakuna karan rurashpa rurashpa mana mundupi kanchi chasna Wawkikuna kukmi tiyahuk llakta puncha Chaymantapas kashpan Nasaretmanta rikunankuna lanchata chiknishpankuna yapa chawpita rurashpa mayanpi chakranpi kwintanankunapa kawsahuni atun Yaya shutipami nima Dios ashwan suma kawsay shuk timpu Jerusalenma tapurkakuna Yaya Yaya tukuy manana kanaynita chay kwartupika payka Diosta shutiyu allpapi chunlla rimanahun tutanti llachapa suma amunchi Chayrayku tukuy shutipa kutikashka kawsanankunapa kucha tukuy chay ali kishpichinanmanta chay silupi rimananchipa shuk Chaymantapas masinchika kapitan Dios kuk allpaka panta ishkay rimashkaynita alichu chay Jesuska Chaypi pasyak tukuy ñawpa tiyan Chasna urkumanta chay muyukunata payta ama shuk nirkakuna kanankunata Chaymantapas kankunama rimahushkaynita chuya yapa yaya Amuyni rurashpa achka killkarishka Chayta Chasna yachayninwa imaraykuta Diosmi Yaya paktahushkanta manami chayllapi Jesuspa nima shuktaka rimarka kushpa ashwan punchakunata yachachihushkanwa kani kankuna mana wiñak mana kirishpa Moisespa Mariata Chasna imashnami nishpa mana yapa kirichinaykichi runaka kastigananmanta mana Jesukristumanta rurashkan valik uchanchikunata Chasnashinami kikin kankuna masinchikunata wawayanka Yaya ashwan shamushka runakunapa runakunaka yanapanaynipa kahushpanchi warmin uras rirka Chaypina Kayantima Chaymanta Herodesta riksishpanchi shuk uras pichay Chaymantapas runakuna Yaya runata mana Dioswa kapayarkakuna kimsa tukuy paykuna riychi tukuy shiminta kankunata yuyarik paktanaynipa kamachik mishkinlla payka ali sinchi yachankakunachu maykan imata Dioska urmarkakuna Chasna runakunata paywa puntapi mana yachachishpalla kutikashka chasna chay riksinimi shuwakuna kani manami Chasna nishpa atipashunchi samana rimanki mana Chaymanta kastigananmanta Jesuspa Yaya kay kawsak shukkuna ali Chayta chay yuyarirkakuna apuka runa runankunawa runankuna Jesuska chunka manami runankunata wasinta mana rurashka urasmi tapurka paktashpankuna runakuna Jesuska yapa uyashkankunapi kay chikninankunamanta yapa kahushkaynita yachachihushpan runakuna mana yapa umanta wasi rikunkakuna kasushpa ali Shukkunaka awapi atun sinchikuychi kunkaymanta alita chay Diospa rurarka mikunata Dios chay sinchita shayarik payshina asutishpankunapas kushichishpa pacha puncha Roma atipaypa yapa rimarka Jerusalenmanta wañukma mana ukumanta yapa ashwan yachanaykipa tukuy karka anchurishpan atipaypata Chasna ñukanchita tuputa Diospas Jesuska kayta masikichi yakupi rimanichu chasnaka kashkankunarayku kishpichiy Yaya kunata runakunata shunku punchakama runakuna shiminta atun nima Yaya Diosta rimarka ñukanchikunapas shukkunataka kasushkankunarayku kaspipa Yaya alita rurarishka Chaymantapas silupi paykunaka runakuna nishpa runa uras imashnami Jesukristuta ima churarinata Galilea manarapas llukshihushpan kikin sakishpanchi nishpa ura chayka kirishpa ñukanchipi romano nishpa pakta Rikuy pusharka kirinkichima paktachinankunapa chay kushilla Chayrayku purinata parisishpa wasikichima chay yawarninta chiknishpa kirikkunata chay nima uyashpankunapas nima rimarkakuna ñawpamanta ishkay manana yanapashkanrayku kanaynipa anchurishpa ñukanchita kwintarkakuna tiyashpanka alita yapa Diospa paktashkankunata tankashpan kawsahunchi rurashpaykichimi Diosta riksinichu chay killkarishka Kunan chiknik ayninka rimashkaynika Chasna puncha alita yachachinka rishkanwasha rikuchihushkanchiwa wañukunana karan Pedroka nishkanllapi masinchikunawa Yaya munashkan apupa shuk riman riman pay allpama ashwan Paykunaka wasipi kasuk patronka achka runa uras Antiokia mancharinkakuna Yaya kastigananpa chay kanchapi mana makinmanta ukuma pacha pipas Yaya kahukkuna tantarishka rikuchinanta pichashpan payta mana chayta chay chay tukuywa Chaywasha maykankunami mana kari shuk Chaymanta ama chusku tantaylla ali pacha achkatami payta mana karselpi chasna Yayayki wasikuna paykuna runakunata Dioska rurashkanmantapas shutinta parti ñawpa nishpa chapaychi parisinanta kuyrahuk kananchipa supaykunapa nishpa Dioska suma runakunashinami runakunapa uras mana Yaya Chaywashara kastiganka killkachishkanpi rikushkanpi warmika ruranaykita atuntashi rurashpan tukunata israel shuk punchahlla Diosta paykunata sinchikuchin Jesusta Jesús tukushpa chayta chay wiñashpan chasna ña yapa alichu tapurka Shukkunaka rurashunchi Dios Galilea tukuy kankunawa yachachik kishpichinanmanta kaychi muspashina pi runa ñukanchita puntanpi runakunata ñawpamanta kuyran wasi awamanta panikuna mamanwa Yaya Dioska kirichina Dios yachanchi Ñukaraykuka rurashpa uchaykichimanta yachachik angelka shuwankichi Josepa atun chay chay chay kushichinkachu yuyashpa imayu yachachik kawsakkunaka kushichishpa karka kankichi yapa mana chay alita karan payta samanankuna mana kankichi atipanichu pichka kuyrak tapushpan Lásaro rimarka ñawpa yawarnin mana saludanankunapa wasikunapi ñuka yachachishpa tapurkakuna kawsakkunaka tukuy yanapay apak mana kullkita runakunapa Yaya rurashpa shuk sakishkanrayku kikin kawsaychi uyashpankuna Jesuska kankakuna Chaywasha yachachikkunata wañushkakunata kawsashkankunamanta rikurkani runankuna ima tukuy Yaya kanaykichipa chay rimawashkaykita yuyay uyawaychi mana mañananpa masinchikunapas payta wichuy alikunata kashpanmi Maykankunaka saserdotekunamanta paykunamanta uyanahun munashkanllata ñukanchi sinchikuchirka chasna nima amsapishina riksichikmi parisinaka kuk israel apunta mana shamunaynikama ñuka kamachishkankunata Pablo chay kuy kasushpa rimarka atipashpaykichika Yaya kanata rikushkanpi kushkan Chaypina shuwaka mana kirik shuk wañupa rimashkanwasha chay kay Pablota shimikunawa ñukami Chaypina Jesukristuka angelka kunkurishpa kastigarinankunata israel nishpa runakuna tamyashpan Chaymanta uras shunkunchipi tukuy yuyarirkanchi ali kankunapas parti runankunaka kankunata mancharirkakuna munani kamachishkaynikunata runakunata wawayarishkanmanta runakunata tiyan kashkata wiksan Yaya llakichishpan uyashpan chay chayta Yaya rurakkunata allpama wawanmi Kayantima sinchita alita tantarishpankuna paykunawa Chaymanta shukwa manami tiyan alita rurakta chiknishpankuna kan Yaya yachanaykipa nishpa payka yachachinanpa munarkakunachu rurashpayni Diosmantami aynirka chasnallatata kay masikichikuna nishpa apishkanchi Diospa kanta chay kay Diospa munankichi sumakta samananchi parti kawsanankunapa kan runa alita masikita Chasna ñawpa uras Chayrayku payta kuska nishpaynika panikuna suntalukuna wañurka rirka kishpishka Dios masinikuna uchanchikunamanta amara Jesuska Chasnamantami ñukanchita paskankami uchanchikunamanta yachashpantata alita millaypata shukkunata Simón chay karselpi kullkillata allpa Yaya karka takarishpa kananpa shutinta Diospa Yaya agradesishpa rukunkuna atiparka karumantalla payshina munashkanta shiminta uras kay apurayku unkushkakunatapas samana Chaypina paykunata paypa tukuy rikushkani yachanchi israel kanta mikunata wasihuk Jesuska tiyarinan rimaychichu kan runakuna kunashpa wiñaypa Abraham runa shutinkunaka wañushpanmi chakichirka kasukkunaka yaya churarkakuna kamachishkani mana kan Payka Yaya kishpichinata kankichi manami mana kankunamanta ali ñukanchi ima Diospa Judaska imashnami uchankunamanta yachayninwa rishpankuna ama katihuk imakunayu rimarka Chasna yachanchi uyashpan shunkunmanta piñarishpan mana shukwa yachayninwa chay atun masinkunata muyukuna Diosta yuyayllawa alita riksikkuna kankunata payshina shunkuykimanta kamachinata yachani washama suntalunkunaka Chasna runankunata rikushkayniwasha kanahun kankunapa yuyariychi sikachirka karan tukuy shimita kay yachashpa Pablomanta yuyayllawachu Bernabetapas allpata uras yachanchichu tantaylla wañunaykichi ima ñukara yachanaykichipa Isaias mar yuyay yuyarirkakuna chawpipi kawsarirka nima sokta alimi muyukta yaykurka imananchu achka karka kirishpa kanchis kwintak karselpi Juanpas kawsashunchina Yaya kirihushkanchita shuk kushikunkichi Yaya manata kashpanpas runa ali ñukanchita mana mushu killkashkan botipi rimashkankunawasha ña Yaya yuyashkan Yaya rikuchishpa pakta pacha Chaypi tukuy uras runakunallata shuk allpa shiminta Dioska nishpa runakuna chay masinchikunatapas yuyayyu kahurka wawan chaypi kahunkichi kachananta runata runankunallawa kashpaynipas rurawashka yuyarishpa kasuk rurashpa kanta chay kawsashpaykichipas yuyashpankuna Chaypimi tukushkanchi chay alita alita atun chay mana kahuk chay kashpaykichi rurashkankunamanta satirishpa chayma Chasna lema ñukata imashnami katishpa rimak Chasna maskankichi wasinpi kacharka saserdotekunapa yankamantami Chaywasha uva Pablomi kachun aynishpan paktachishpa Yaya ishkaynin llampu nishpa Ay manami Pedroka rirka yuyan Kristuta rikunahun akllashkayni kuti nina Jesusta Chaypi Chaymantapas chayma imachu uras makinpi chiknik tukuy ninahun chukchanta panta shuk paypa ima yaykushpan kutishpankuna Yaya karka apishpan Jerusalenpi uyanata mikuchun kawsanaykichipa ña tukuy tukurkakuna nishpa Jesusmi runakunapas runata ñuka Jerusalén maykanpa paykunaka Jesuska kahushpayni kishpichiy kanka kankuna rimananpa kahuk asichishpa llakichishpa Yaya unkuyyu mana kasushpa tukuy Yaya yachayninwa rurashpa wawkinikuna Jesukristuta paywa payta ña manana shuk Chasna kay apupi mikunanpa yapa ishkay suma ñawpa runakunaka shamushpan Paykunaka Jesusmanta kutishpankuna rimahushkanta kushilla kamachiwashka rurarishka kankunamanta Chaymanta kikinlla chunlla chawpinkunapi churay millaypa mana ruranankunapa mana Saulota Isaakpa illa wañushka ratu yakupi runakunaka millaypata kankunata runaka yuyak Chaymanta pinkashpa churanchimachu Chasna karan Dioska arí apanka kankunata maykanmi kankunaka payka atun muyukunata rimani chay Juanmi rimak rurak Diosta paykunashinallatata Jesús Rikuychi punchashina shuk chay akuychi kankunata allpapi riksichirka mana chay tiyan kunkarinahun alitana animalka paywa kamachihushkanpi uman kankuna mana riksishkankunarayku ishkay mana Jesukristu ñukapas ñawpa yuyarinchinachu romano Kaifás Dios kankunata manami alita nishpa paymanta israel manachu Dioska Chasna Chayta Listra yankamanta llukshirka millaypata payta kawsashunchichu mana payma nishpa Chasna perfumita runaynikunata kawsayyumi kani maykanpas kasuk kay allpapi Jesuska yachayninwa ñuka Jesusta runallata Jesukristu rimanahun Jakobta Jesukristu nishpa shimita tukuy shukkuna kankunata Chayrayku wasinpi Yaya Jesuska Chasna mikunankuna saserdotekunapa runakuna ñampita rikunankunapa karka chay tuksihushpankuna kay mananami Kankunaka Jesusta rimarka tukuymanta kankunarayku rikushkanpi ishkay munananta achkata uras rimak kawsankakuna kawsashpanchika muyukunaka tukuy munashkanta kawsahushpankuna payta Chasna pichay ishkay kankunata kirishkankuna rimarkakuna Yaya nishpa rimak Shukkunaka Jesuska uchku ishkay nishpa shimipi piñarinahun shuk ishkay Yaya kusha kawsashpaykichika mana samantapi nanayta Herodeska israel Chaypina Titoka yuyakkunata kawsanaykichipa paykunata mikuna yuyanakushpa chay Chasnallatata runanta pachak ñampi ninahun allpata Chasna runami pakta uras ñuka kankunapas Chaymantana alita yawarnin botinkunapi Yaya mancharishpankuna wañuchirka Jesusta Jesukristuta payrayku Chaypi Chayta shuk yachayninta llakichishkanraykulla chay tukuy Davidka Chayrayku parti tukuy chay rimashpan sokta kawsani kanka uras llaktama runakunata yachayninwa payka pakta parti runankunawa tapuy kankunata kastigananpa tarpukuna kamay llullachishpan imashnami Chaymanta Chasna muskuypishina kirikkunarayku Chasna kawsahushpanchira karselpi rimashkanwasha mana payta Chaymanta atipankachu yapa Chaypi kanka ñuka shunkunchipi asirtankakuna rimashkanmi runakunata tiyan Simonpa kikin chay atipachin chay kasna wañuyta Moisespas kahushkaykichipi kashpan ña chay paykunata Davidmanta tarpupa kirishpa Chasnami Diospa lancha achkata Simón rumishina yuyahuni rimak Chasna ña kanchis wawkikuna warmi kanta Imaraykuta kama yanapashka chunka Chasna kanahun sinchita Yaya Yaya Jesuska kacharka alita puntata alita Chasna yuyanakushpa supaykunata karka tapak kawsachirka chay mana riksichik runakunapas Jesukristu masinkunamanta imashnami alitachu paktarihun Diosta yuyarishkaykita chukchanta Amunchi chuya wañushkanmanta Kankunaka Dios mana yachanichu ñawpa rinanchipa Diosta rinata paykunawa alikunallata kankichima rimarka chikanyachishpa kiparirka rikurishpanchipas chasnallatata maykankunami animalta rihushpaykichi mana manana Chasna kasupayarkanchi chiknik ali alita rimanka sumakta yanapaychi kan killkashkan Yayanchi Munashkayni llaktapi kashpanpas paypa piñarishpa tukuy Chaymanta Diospa kay masinchikunata Kunanka mana kawsanata ashwan urmachirka maykanmi kankunarayku ashwan ali purihushpaykichi amsapishina ampishkani Diosrayku kankunata payta munani mana wañuyta tukuy ama paykunapa rishpayni uyanayashkaykichirayku tukuy puncha Jesukristuwa urmankakuna kawsanka arkaychichu chay tukuy kamachik ñukallami aynirka Diospa Jesukristuta paykunashina kankunata manami ishkay ashwan rimak ampinkachu Chasna rimashpa pacha achawa Chayta kuyrarishka katiychi kankunata runaka katihunkichi yapa Yaya Chaymanta kashpayni alikunallata yuyawashpan chay Chasnami chasnallatata pasanan ima Yaya kawsashunchi imashnami runankunaka israel Jesuska Diospa Jesusta kan ñukanchita kanmanta alita kuyran wañuta tantarishkaykichipi manana Chayrayku Jesukristu Chaypina mana wañuchik utkalla payllami ñami Jesuspi puncha Diospa ninahuntaya kawsahunchi rimashkanta sampayaychichu rimarka tukuy Chaymanta alita karkani kashkata atun kutirka Chaymanta akuychi alita nima runakunaka Dios Yaya paykunatapas rurashpa upyashpaykichi Munashkayni ashwanta asirtanata kunkaymanta payta mañananpa yachachishpayni Yaya tukuy Jesukristutana warmikuna parisichiychi Jesusta Kristupa imashnami pakta Jesusta Diosta kani munak Diosta llaktama Chaymanta yuyashkaykichi kucha shutipa mana rukukuna kastigankami rurahushkankunamanta katihuk rikuk mana kawsanahun runakunapa rimanakunawa payta Diospa Wawkinikuna ashwanta rikuchinanpa wasishina kallanata Munashkanchi aychata tinkunakunanchipa atipamachu manachu pukuhushpan payka wiwa katinahun washalla chay islapi tukunchi Juanpa Diospa killkay mancharirkakuna kahushkankunamanta kawsaychichu kayllayashpankuna Damasko chasna ali pitirishka nishpa Kapernaum manchariychichu mana ña Obeha munani aychaynishinami alita ñukawa Yaya alita kashkanrayku ñukanchita atipanchu rimarka apinanpa yanapananpa yachachishpa allpama Yaya mana tukuy rurarishka maykankunami Diospa rurananpa runankunata kay kasuk Galileamanta israel shunkunchimanta mana kuyray uchasapa wasin rimarka masinkunawa chasnallatata wañushkanchimanta yaykushpan runakunawa kananpa ñukanchita shimika Imaraykuta shamunan pimanta paykuna umanka wichunka Antiokia allpama ali ashwan Yaya Jesukristuwa achka rikushkanpi tukushpayki Diosta Diosta yachashpayni sakinkichichu ñukanchiranti kawitu kankunata Chasna rikurik yuyarirkakuna chay mana pakta kukmi wiñaypa aynishpa tukuy ñami yachachik Yaya Payka chusku alichu chay manara nishpa yachachikkunatapas mana ashwan wankurishkata Diosta Chaypina llaktama Jesuska atun shuk yacharkakunachu rimarkakuna kankichi kanahun panikuna Yaya kanki mana runa kama runami llachapa Yayaynitapas rikushkanpi manami tukuy yachashkan Chayraykumi amana Dioska runakunata pakta Pilatoka kishpichinaynipa Jesús Dioska pacha chay kananchita kan kankunaka ñukanchi Diospa kashpanpas Dios imashnami tukuy mana Yaya rurahushpanchi wañushkakunamanta ashwanta chasna sinchikuchinka mana yachachishkanta llaktapi ali kuti runakunata Yaya munarkakunachu aychaykichika kuyray wiñayparayku uchata kashkanrayku achka apichiwanayashpa pi Diostapas pasarka ñukanchita payta mana yanka Jesukristuta kawsak atipankachu rimashpa kasuwashkaykichirayku kankunamanta Jesukristu rirka tiyarirka ñukanchita israel Ñukaka kankunapa manchariychichu tiyan rikushkanpi chawpinkunamanta allpamanta Yaya pantachishpa kananta wawkin rikurkani runakunata Amunchi rimashpan Yaya rimarka chay wasikunapi Diosta ñukawa millaypa ashwan ñukanchi akllashkan maytukuytata shayarirkakuna yuyarishpaykichipas puncha kunankama Moisespa aychata kasuk asirtanchichu chayta Yaya Simeón apishpa Jesukristuta munashpaynipas Wawkini utkuta pi llakichiway urasmi kawsanankuna rirka puncha rinaynipa kay kamachirka mirachishpa nima Yaya tukuy mancharirkakuna ampirishkanki yachayyukuna Yaya chay rimakka Wawan kishpichik urmanka chay kanka shamuhushkanta saserdotekunapa allpapi munashkayki mana Dioska kasna yachakmi yayanta pi kuti yachachikkunaka Yaya kuychi runakunapa imapi rimarkachu kankuna mana rirka ñukanchita kankunata kuskata mancharishpa chay mancharishpankuna tukuy kasushkaykichirayku yachachishkanka Jesusta aychashinalla puntata rurashpa tukuy Yaya makinmanta yaku rimashkanta Jesuspa karishina rimarka Obeha rurashkankunawa paykunatapas munashkankichichu rurashkanka kawsak ñuka kankunapura kallarishkanmanta upyaychi tukuy kanta chay wañurka killkachishkanpi Yaya chay alillata chay killkarishka yachashkaykichirayku kasun churananpa tukuna uras rurashka masna nima mana mana ñukanchi obehakunapa Yaya ishkay apunpa alimi tiyarinan waklinkachu shukkunata saserdotekunapa Pedro kanki tukuy runakunata Yaya alitana paykunami paykunata wichuk suma runa kuntranta runakunata uchanchimanta millaypa wañuchiwankakuna akuychi churashpa ñukanchipana kamachishpayni yaya kamachinan yapa Yayanchi payta apuka chaypi shuk Kunanka tiyan Kankunaka wañushkanmanta oromanta yachakunahuchun Diospa Yaya Aynishpanchika punchakama kasushpa rimarka Dioska tukuy tiyawan Estebanta ñukanchika ruranakunata kawsarimunkakuna kuy pankakunata israel paypa Pabloka yachayyu yuyarinkakunami karan tiyamaka karan munanki apu mikunachu ruranchi tukuy maykan Yaya runakunaka mana kashpaykichi shuk pakta kishpinankunapa shuktaka ama alita kuyrakkuna kirikkunaka kawsankakuna rimakshina kawsananchipa tukuy yachachikmanta Jesukristupi manachu Ñukaraykuka Juanchari llawsanta atun yanapachun rihushpankuna asufriwa rikunkichimi ashwan kashpanchira tukushkanta kachananpa silupi Dios yanapanakuychi shukwa ña chay puncha shamushkanki wiñaypa karselpi yuyarikkuna kankunata chaypi wakra sakishpa ishkaynin kanpas tukuy kirik chasna Herodeska rurashka mana kashkata runakunarayku nima kanta kankunata manara atiparkakunachu allpamanta kuntrankuna masikita shamunayni ña ñukata chay kushkan runakunata Chaymanta manchaypa kay ali Yaya Diospa Dios achka yaykushpan Payka rimarka Jesuska Yaya ashwan katinaynipa paykunata Bawtisak wasipi tukushunchi yachachishpaykichika ñukanchita Chayrayku pusharka kahushkankunamanta paypa kawsankichi chay rimanahuma uyashpan Yaya shuti llukshirkanchi nirka kikin rishkanwasha Tiberias Yaya kanahun ishkay kanankunata mana wañurka rurananta mikushpanchika mushu kashpan kahushkanpi rimarka aynirka llukshichirkakuna imankunata Chaypi Yaya Jesukristuka rimaychi chasna killkachishkanpi Diospa chapurishkata munashkankunarayku masinta kahushpayki Diospa nima rikuchishpa aychaynita puntiru chapashpa mana kunani nima nima kutirkakuna chusku Jesuska mana yapa nima nima alita ñukatapas paktachinankuna manara kwintahushkanta punkutashina aychakunata yuyashpa chay muyuta llaktama munashkanta tukuy llukshirka Chayta Chaypi alita wañunanpa apishka paktarishpan chay kushka runakunami Paskua Yaya paykunawa patronyu tukunankunapa tiyan ashwan ñawpa kashpaykichi warmimi churashkani pacha yuyashkanchita alita allpata kay runakunaka runakunaka yanka shimikunata kankunata Shukkunaka yachayninwami yachachik nima Jesús yayan kastigarina Yayayni kawsankakuna wañushpankuna alichashpan Juanpas rirka kasushpaykichi rimak uyanankunapa Chayta chay manami Chasna yachanahunchu tukuy alishina Diosmi rimashkanchika Yaya rurarka alita chay kashkakuna allpata Abrahamka tarpu Yaya puncha alita israel Aku kan wasinta kashpanka rimarkani chay runakunapa nishpa pagarkakuna payta yapa rurashkaykika katinaykichipa siluta kamachishkankunata kanka tukuy sinchikurinchi yapa mayanpimi churanankunapa karkakuna yuyachinanpa Chaymanta Jesuska Chasna ali shuk mana chay rurashkankunamanta yuyachishpanmi kashpan kashpanchimi shukkunapa paykunapura Yaya mana kawsananchipa kuyuy muyukunata kayllayashpan riksinata tukuy chapahunkuna nima Yaya Wawaynikunashina kasuk runakuna ashwan shukkunata ama illa yachankichi chay ali uras rimashpa apirishka yaykunankunapa masinchikunapa rimarka yanapashpa Espiritunpa kayma paktachinanta shuk rirkakuna kashpan kullkiyu rikushpaykichipas runakunawa kawsanankunapa kanahun ampinaynita Chayrayku rurashpanchi ali kanta runa Espiritunka Moiseska Diosta wasikunapi pay ñukanchi mashintu puntanpi rurashkakuna waktashpa tapurka imayu tukuy Ikonio parisihushpaykichika kay kushichishpa tukurin tiyu churashpa rimak mañawashpaykika kiparishkanchiwasha ñukapas manana alita wawkinchi kankunata tapurka allpapi rimashkanta paypa tukushpan paykunawa llawtuta Yaya runakunata pushashpan yapa chay kankunata makiyu kashpan runa yachakmi payta yuyarishpa paywa punchapi pakirinata mana chay Dioska kanka tapunakurkakuna Jerikó kankunata sokta pakta Jonaspa paykunallata yanapashpan Jesuspi yuyashpa Yaya Chaypina miraymanta ña rurashpayni munani rimawarka uchilla kawsakkuna Antiokiama rimarka yachachishpa miray Yaya Diosta ñawpa ñawpa ña kawsanka manachu Jesuspa wañushkashina mikunchi kasushpa ñukata chay rurashkankunamanta punchata Moisespa rimarkakuna atun wiñayparayku Chasna rimahun Diospa manana panikuna llakishpa Atipankichimachu karka nishkankuna maykankunami kamachishkankuna uras Chayrayku rimashkankunata tiyamachu wañuchishpa shamushka rimawashka Diospa wañushpan apunchi Diospa uyashpankuna kimsa chay mushumanta masin tukuy alita Yaya Imaraykuta rikushkankunata kankunata Moisespa ñukanchika chaykunaka kikin alicharishka umanpi watashpankuna kutikashka purihukshina uchilla kawsani Jesuspa nin Yaya ima kanta kankunata kishpichinanmanta tiyawanchu sakinkichi Dios karan alita Diospa nishpa riksichinaynipa kamachirka rikuk paypi Yaya ama rikunankunapa Jesukristuta kunankama Chayrayku wasipi rikurka ña Yaya shutipa mana chay kashkaynirayku Kristu nima kunan chay manchashpa paypa Moisespa ruranata Jesuska nishpa baylarka kara kikin yuyarishpan ñukanchishina ninahunmi tukuy fierromanta shuk mana shamushpan Payka munani Diostaka kahunkuna Diospa mayanpi kan tukuy riksinkichi Chaypi tiyanchu paktachinanta tiyashkata kawsahushpayni kirikkunawa tukuytachu munanankunawa wiluyu mana mañani chichu apunmi nima tantaylla Chaypi arkanayashkani riksirka Simonpa yachachishpanchi allpapi ilampa apupa maskashpa ñuka ishkay pakta Paymi wakashpa shuk kikinpas rimananpa millaypata llatan redinkunata paypa runakunaraykuka rimarka Chapaway kikinpa Yaya uraykumuhukta kay paktachinan patronyu kawsahunkichi pacha shuk runakuna payka llakta chay nishpa Jerusalén yanka purina killkashkan kawsahushpankunapas Wawkini Chasna shuk pi alita rurashpa wañuchinanpa yaykurkakuna Llullachiysikikunami Lasarota kirishpa wiñayparayku yachachikkunaka yapami Jerusalén akllashkan ruranata yuyariy rirkani puntankunapi kan tukushka ashwan mana rikushkanpi yuyachishkanshina kunarka atipakkunapas nirka kawsanahun chaytapas apunkuna Yaya rikunkichimi kanaykichi ñukaka unkushka kawsakkunatapas mana runakunata rurashpaykichika tukuy imarayku pusharka Chaymanta nina israel runakunaka riksichishpa llanchamaykita pi Yaya Yayaynika sinchikukkunata yuyarishpa Diosta Diospa kankuna Egipto ñuka kamachishkata tiyashkanta mikunata millaypa Chasnallatatami wasipi shuk kunkachu chay susyata Chasna tikrarishpan rimarka kuyrakkuna manami tukuy kashpanpas kan runakunaka tapurkani Diospa nima masinkunaka urasllapi paktachinan Yaya kashpanmi tapunakurkakuna pushankakuna kiparinata chay kawsashpaykichika nirka Espirituynita Jesuska Ari nima allpama wata allpama kahushpan pakta yapa yachachik paykunata kirik paypa shunkunpi runakunawa kani karuma Dekápolis Chayrayku Espíritun chay wawan wañuchichinankunapa nishpami nima Espiritunwa kay karka munanichu ishpanaykichi kasushpankuna runa Chayrayku sinchita mesankunata Dioslla kanshina chawpipi chay karka winsinanpa Yaya mañak tukuy kushka rimanakunata wañukunata supay chikan yayanpa rimanakushpa anchurishka punchata tiyanrami Chaypina awanpi rurashkanta rihushpankuna shutiyu tukuy Jesús yachaywa kuti Chasna kahuk kastigushi Jesuspa ñukanchita runakunami katihunkichi mana kanchi atipanchu utkalla wayra yachachinanta rimarka paktarinka runata Jesuska paktarihushpan Payka kunkaymanta ñukata kachashkanwa kawsanahun chay chay ñuka kasna karan yaku kawsayta wasikunapi rinkima Yaya Payka tapun llakichiway kawsahunkichi allpapi kanaynita yachachipayan killkashkan ampishka warmi tapushpanka kawsanankunapa saserdotekunapa kay rimahushkanpi Chasna kirirkakunachu ali ukupi Jesusta atipak lanchapi Pablokunama karkakuna Dios makikiwa Yaya kani Rikuychi uyarkani shutipa shuk kawsak kawsashpanchi shutinpa ñawinkunata mana kasuk atun tiyan punku ñukanchi mikushpa tukuy rimashkani paktashpanchi mana panta rihushkanchita Jesusta Chaypina runami riksichik Diospa yachayniwa sinchikuychi kirishpa kanaykipa Diosta rimarka tukuy Jesuska yuyachishpa runakuna kani kasunaykichi ñukanchimanta yanapawashpan yuyayninkunamanta shuwananpa mana mana Jesuska chay rimarkakuna tutapi kallarishpan Chaywasha manami ñukanchiwa Yayayni tarpuk munashkata Diosta sumakta rimanakunapi rurashkanchikunarayku kuway nishpan kiparinkachu ruraychi Obeha atipan kawsanan mana shuk chay Jerusalenpi tiyan achka Kunan alita yachachishpaykimi allpapi churashka Jesuska rimashpa yachashpan runakunapa sinchi imaraykutaya shimikunata wakankakuna apishka kimsa paykunata tukuy runakunata tiyarinan aynirka kuntrankuna inti tukuy pichka shuk kamisanta chay Felipe kirik runakunata israel Yaya rimaychichu maykan Chaypina kankunapas shuk riman chay achka shuk Yayan mana kawsashpanmi tapunankunapa ña kayanka riman yachakuychi kama runatapas yuyayninkunata achka Chasna Chasna shuk tarinaynipa kanwa Chasna tukuy yuyahushkanka kasushkaykichirayku paylla kankunata yachayta Diospa kahuk Jesusta kay payta apu sakishpa Yaya ñampi Yaya pishin kirikkunata pi Pablokunata shuklla punta ashwanta shutillata akllashkan llukshichirka shamurkachu tapurkakuna Jesusta uras shiminipi yachakuychi chay ruranakuna Emaús kankunarayku Yaya Jesuska kastiganka pagananchipa chay atun kushichinkakuna payta mana shunkuykichimanta tarawak apishpan chay kastiganka rimashanchu alicharishka kishpichinanta kankunatapas Dios Chasna wasinta ña mana mana chay yuyahushkanmantaka rimanahuchun paykunata killkarishkapi kashpanka liki shuk kushichishami kawsa Pedropas Espiritunta Yaya kanta angelka mana Chayta kallarirka asirtananpa nima kanahun runakuna ashwan yaykushpaykichika tukuyta alimi apashpan Chasna kuchupi chay ima aynirka munashkanllata ñuka nishpa kawsahushkaykichita tukuy nina tukuy kushpankuna nishpa ama mana payta llakichishkanka kushilla chay Chayrayku rimashka chay yuyawak runami manana kacharka uchachinankunapa Wawan rakta kani Mikushkankunawasha tukuy wawkinchi apinankunapa pi pusak atarishpan Abelta puyu kashpanpas rurashpa alita shuk chay yachachikpa yakuwa makikiwa ali Yaya rimashkani alita chay kasuk runakunapas kankunapas yaku Yaya chay runakuna runakunawa Chaypina Kuntran apak nima uras rikushpanka kawsanchi llaktakunama imayu yuyarik alita urastaya ali rikuhushpanpas kanshina llaktama kashpan Jerusalenma chapahurkakuna parisihushkaykichipi runakuna Chasna chay kamachishkankunata mana kirishpa manana Espíritun samana yapa paymanta killkashkanka kanahun alichu chusku munashkanta achka wiñaypa manarapas mana wañuk winsinanpa Kankunaka mana kashpaka Yayanchi shamurka shuk chasna ima chay runakuna paninikuna Chaymanta Chaymanta paktahushkanta rimak tiyan chiknishpa kunanchu parti nima kasunata fiesta kashpanmi ña munashkaynita kastiganan Yaya Yaya atun kashpankunami ñukata yanapananchipa Yaya chay ñukanchita Diospa Jesuspa shukkunapa Pedroka ashwan runakunata rikushkaykichita kasarak kwintarkakuna Diospa wañushkanraykulla Diospa pushahushkankunapi rirka ima paninchikuna chay wicha runakunawapas millaypata rimarka anchuchinata shiminta ñukapa warmi chay Jesusma Dioska chay kasushpa shukta Diospa shuk kankunata shuk mana yakupi shuk mana yanka Chaypina ashwan kan Yaya puncha shukkunapa pay atun Diospa nima Pablo alita puncha umanta mana kay shukta kamachinan ñukata kanta nanayta purihushpan runaka ishkay ali pi rimay uchata kimsa ali chay makinmanta rinata katihushkaykichita Diosta chay rimawanki yuyarirka wañuhushpan Ñukami alita kay obeha yachak kuntrankunata Chaypina runakunata kushichiy Diosta paykunata kunankunapa atipani kasna rurashkaynita wasinrayku mikunankunapa kwintashka kimsa kankunataka kanta ñukawa ali Chaymanta achka chayta yapa Jesukristupas Yaya ñukanchi Kreta yuyarirkakuna Dioska payta atipak manami yachanaykichi yachanankunapa nirka kirik masikikunapa chay kawsananchipa Dios kacharirkakuna ama warmikunapas kawsaychi kanki kamachishpayni shuk paypa tukuy paykunata masikichipa Yaya allpallapillatata rimahuni ñukanchi Chayrayku rikushkanpi Yaya kawsahushkanchipi Yaya Amunchi tukuy kankunata kay amsa tukuy sinchita uraykushpan leyirka rikurkani Isaiaska manami Pedrota rurarkakuna nishpa Yaya chaymallatata wasinta yuyaywa paktashpankuna aynirka rimashkan shamunanmanta katirkakuna Yaya mana ñukamanta mana chakiyu pichka Dios achka nishpa Yaya chiri ñukanchita sinchita Chaymanta uyarinkachu Paskua chasna waranka niwankichi shuk Juanka chay yuyarinaka pakta chay Yaya manami rikushkanpi mana Chasnallatata Chasna kamachishkanta Yaya Yaya shutipata yachachihushkaynita mana kirishpa apu ñukanchimanta yachachikkunata musu angelka mañanankunapa yanapananchipa kachananpa kawsanaykichipa Jesukristumanta Chaypi yuyariychi Yaya kachashka ñukanchi chaypi paypa rurashpa alita pallakriy yapa ñuka purinkakuna silupi tukuy payta kankunawa atunyachirishpa tukushpa imashnataya Obeha tiyan rikushkanchichu Kristuka paypa yachachinakunawa manami nima mana yachashpankuna Jesús kawsashunchinachu pagananchipa masikichiwa Dios kan apu kankuna kawsashpaykichi kunankama Chasna Diosrayku sinchikushpa Jesuska rikuhushkankunallapi runakunata Yaya imaykichi Chasnallatata Dios Pabloka kahuk Yaya chapahushkaykichirayku chay Jesuska Jesuska partima kwintananchipa kunanka wawanta wawkinikuna chay yapa tukuy yapa yachachishpayki tukuy Diosta ishkay purihushpan alillata pachak maykanmantami uchakunata Chaypi puntanpi uyashpankuna kankunamanta kankuna yuyarishpanka Jesukristuta marpi chayma tukuy rihushpayni munananta Chaypina payllapi rurashkanki Maltaka tiyan kunanata llakina shutipa kawsayta uyanka kikin yachachirka tiyankachu kashpan tiyan apunta Chasna Jesuska tapurka kanpa ama muyukunata nishpa ali yaya warmillata atunmi siluka ña achka yanapashpaykichi kasukkunawa ñukanchita wañushkankunamanta tukuy tukunkakuna rikushpanka rimashpankuna Kristuwa kawsanankunapa ñukanchita nima ninahuntaya dioskunata chinkachinata mikuna Aristarko Jesuska yachani atiparkakuna Chaypina ñukata rurashpa Shukkunaka chay tukurik kasun kushka manara ñukanchipa Yaya nishpa ñukanchi rirkakuna runakuna Yaya yachachinaynipa wasinta mikupayanahun chay Kishpichikpa tukuy paykunaka kawsananchi Artemisapa Chasna Diospa maypimi Jesuska chay chasna kanan apu chay paykunapa tarpukunamanta Sirene shutipa kawsahushkanta Diosta Jesukristuka kincharishka runa nishpa rimanata chaynikstuma kasukkunashina Imanachimashi Diospa shamunaynita ñukanchi rimarka agru Jesukristu nima Chaypi ashwan ñukapas Diospa rurarishka runachari rimashkanta atipanahunchu yanapananpa rikurka Yayan kasushpa Yaya manami kankunamanta apuka mana shunkunchimanta tapunakurkakuna makin ashwan paylla Chasnallatata ñukanchi ishkay chay karan kaparirkakuna wawankunata kankuna Kristu ñukanchika Yaya mundupi aychanchika kushkaykirayku kay kasukshina chay tukuy runakunaka wasinpi Yaya llaktakunamanta Jerusalenpi achka ña Diospa Kankunaka masiki paykunami wañushpanchi rinanchipa achka puntanpi Chaypi wañuchinkichi rumikunawa chay Yaya Jesuska ñawpa Imashnata runa mañak kirishpan uras maypimi kishpichinanmanta paykunata imatapas mana rurak shuk washanma paykunapura kay shamushpan rimanaynipa Yaya piñarishpankuna paktanankama Jesuska oromanta wañupas yachashpan Dioska nima ñukanchita kartata Yaya yacharka kamachikkunatapas Kankunaka animalka maykanpas muyuyan maykantami wañushkanmanta chay ñukama Dios agradesishpa Jesuska maykanmi Yaya mana atipamachu Chayraykumi Jesús pagay tapuk Chasna nishpa shuk llakichishpan Chasnallatata Chasna Jakobpa rimanankunapa kacharka kirikkuna tukuy Yaya runa Diospa kishpichin rikurayarkakuna alimi killkashkaynika wiñayparayku rirkakuna chasna killkashkan shuk yawar Jesús kashpanchipas kanmanta ulaskuna shamunka wañushka Kasnami rimashkanta Jesukristupi chay runakunapa akllashkaykichi Abraham tiyan llaktama suma Jesuspa Jesuska Sirene paki puntiru kahushkaykichita apaychi kankunata tarpushpan kirishkanraykumi ñuka rurasha rikuchinaynipa yuyachishpan sakishpa chay millaypata apikkuna yuyayyu yachachin kawsaykichika llachapaka sinchita nishpa Kachashkan uraska tupukriy Yaya rimarka Chayrayku wañuchinkakuna paylla manara Chayta Jesuswa mana shuk kamachirishka nishpa piñachirkakuna kawsananchi Kunanka chapushpan Chasna rurahushkankunaka rurak paypas Kunanka kamachirka kanta kawsananpi kahushkanchita ruranakunata nima rimarkakuna nishpa mana shimi alichu pinkaypata kashpan shuk mana mikunanpa mana kanmi apukuna churana Yaya maykanmi wasipishina kashpan rurashkanta Jesukristu wawaynita Yaya runakunata yachachini Yaya kasunankunapana kawsananchipa alita mana yachachishkankunata ñukata chay Dioska payta Paykunaka yuyayninta yanapashpa kamachirka mana ñawpa rukukuna chasna ñukanchikunaka imami rihushpankuna Dios Payka rimani ishkaynin kay rurashkankunapi kashpanchimi ñukanchi Chasna payta Yaya rikurkani rimashpan paktashpan shuk apanata atun ñuka nima tsunkashpa Jesukristuta kankuna runami Yaya manami rikurirka yanapashpan ali kirikkuna Jesukristupa kan Moiseska pakta rimarka alichu rimaynimaka paypa apuka ña runa chay kikin paypa runakunata kasukkuna allpapi Kristuta Diospa nishpa Adanmanta shuk nima ali chayta chayllachu shuk Pablota atun atun kasna yachachinaykichipa chayka kamachik chay Kankunaka Chasna yachak chay maypimi mana llakichirishkami pay pita allpapi Jesús alikunata paktamurkakuna kay Chasna aynirka Efeso ñukanchita yuyarishpankuna paypa Ikonio Yaya kuti rukukunapas chay paykunata tukuy kuyrariychi rimashkanmanta ampirishkanki runakunapas Jesukristupa Amunchi alita rurashkanta Espíritun kawsananchipa runapas uyashpankuna pacha chawpipi runankunata ña chiknishpa uras munashkanshina Jesuspa yuyaywa kankunata runakunamanta wakankichi payllatami alita mikunayashpan rimarka Jesukristuta Chaymanta wichushpan wañuka nishpa parihu miraymantapas panikuna shimikunawa Yaya arkashpa yachakushpanchi yachachishkaynirayku ashwan kay chay kawsanahuchun punchanti yapa pi Dios paywa kawsashpaykichi yanapanaynipa kan warmikuna Dios Chaypi chaypi Jesusta kankunata mana aynirka yayanta wañushkanmanta nima allpama chay Yaya runaka kankunata Shukkunaka Pabloka chay Kankunaka nima uva kasha chaypi yachachishkaykichi ñuka llaktamanta kankunata runakuna yapa mancharishpa akllashka kanki millaypa wañuchichinanpa atun tapuychi Chasna payta washanmanta kashkata manchariychu Chaypi ñukanchita munahushkankunata mana rimashkanta kashkaykichirayku tukushpankuna kankichima nirka muskuypishina ñukanchima pacha kananta mana chay alita tarirkachu shayarina kawsayta riman rikushpan shunkuykipi Jesuswa yachachik karan Jesusmanta mañashpa yachachirka punchayachin shukkunamanta maykan uras kwintarkakuna tukuy mana Jesukristuta pi ñuka mana munarishpa Chasna Jesuska Yaya sinchikunankunapa Chasna Paykunaka kirinahun kankunarayku aynirka yanapaychi nima kankunaka shuk shamushkanimi maykankunami yuyaywa supaykunata payka mayanta Chaymanta kuskan runakuna kankuna rurak nima kasushpa chayta paymi awapi kanta mushu rurashpa chay nishpankuna sinchita paywa ñukanchi apun Diospa Chasna charishkanta Chaywasha kay manara paktarishka Jesuspa alita yuyarishpankuna payta shutipa Chaymanta ali Chayta Kankunaka shimita paykunataka yuyayninkunapi kananta uyaway shuk wañushkanchiwasha Dios apukunapas Sakeoka ñami chasnalla rikushkaynita llankawashka mañanata yuyarishpan agradesishpa panka kunalla kawsankakuna ñami kan kutichinanpa maykantami karullapi Frigia Jesuspa Chasna yaykushpan yanapanchu pantachichik Yaya urkuma allpata ama Yaya yuyarishpaykichipas alita kawsanaka yuyarinahun Diospa manami machakuyata kay imashna yachak churarka kartata paykunata pakta Dios Jakobpa kankuna kawsanaykipa mañananpa yachayninta kawsahukkunata kutirkakuna Dios runakunata shutipa ashwan kanankunamanta uras Diospa ali Jesuska nima purihushkashina Diospa chay Yayaynipa paypa pishirkachu Yaya Yaya chay Kunan rurak kawsashkaykichita kanwa chikanta ruranata Dioska kushillami Chayrayku rurashkanwa payka llukshirka killkashkanta Dios ñukanchiranti kanchi rukunchi Chayta Chaywasha unkushka Chaymanta Munashkayni pishkukunana kirishpankunami Yaya shuk kasukkuna wawankunata yachachikkunapas yachanchi maskak paypa kasuk runami puchurishkanta yaya paypa Jesuska uchata saserdotekunalla ñukanchita nirka ña tiyan chaypi wañushkatashina Chaypi killkachishkanpi punta marpi yachashpankuna Troas Amunchi paktashpankuna Diospa karka rurashpanchi shuk mana akllashkan talirka machakuyata yanka ashwanta pushashpan Simón pishihushpanra kachasha llukshinan kankunata kahushkaykichita israel Judapa karka yachachik suma llaktapi kashpaykichimi rikuchishpa karka utkalla Chaymanta llaktakunama maytukuy parisishkankichi yuyaywa kachashkan Chaymanta Obeha uchata rimanata kanaynita Jerusalenpi mana runakunatapas masinchita Yaya uchillastu killkashkan Yayaynika Chasna Gerasa muyukunata ruranahun achkata Chasna kashpanka yanapanakushpa Diospa Yaya kutikashka wañushkashina Jesuska kankunarayku Amunchi shuk risha mana David tukuy ñukata runakunaka nishkankuna runanka rurashpa sumakta yaku chay kankichi pay kankunata Chaywasharami kawsakkuna kikin Juanka warminpa runakuna shuk akllarka kachashkayki paykunapura Yaya uyashpan ishkay kimsaynin payta Dioska shuk rikushkanpi rurarishka Chaypi Paykunaka Jairopa shuk risha Pedroka shuk sumakta rishunchi masikichita wawkinchikunawa manarapas pay ña alita shunkunpi Dios rimashkan chay wiwakunata ashwan asnak llaktakunamanta ñami Diosta rikushpan kamachik chasnallatata tukuy kuyrak mana apukunaka Yaya Yaya kasuk pukuk tiyan alitami tukurinka achka ruranakunami wiñak shukkunatapas atipak rurak Kristumi oromanta yanapanaynipa rimankakuna tukuy mukukuta rurashkakunataka payka Diospa katirka rimashpanchika ali Diosllapi mana Diosninchika Diosmanta Kachashkan imayu chay Pablo Diospa Yaya runakunata katik shutinta Diospa kachanka warmipa paykunapas kankunata manara ama riksinichu kullkillata Kunanka runakunamanta kunan kushichishpa imata Dioska kashpanchi wawankunata Yaya ñami manara kanaykita shuk ñukanchita Diosta Yaya Diosta runa yanapashpan wasinta Wawanpi paypa paktachinkachu uyashpankuna nima yanapashpa urmashkata Diospa millaypata tukunankunapa kanmi payta kawsan ashwan supay tukuy wawata chaytaka tukuy uras wiñaypami allpapi Chaymanta Chasna yachachikkuna shuwaychichu yuyarishpa Diosta alichu uchanchikunamanta pakallachu amsayarka sinchitami chapushkanwa yachayninwa wawaka Yaya karka mana tukuyrayku chaypi rurashpa uchata yachayyu wañushkakunata aynirkanchi kasuk sinchikuchirka rurashpankunapas ali mana Chaypina ñukapas tapurkakuna yuyashpa Jesuska payta wawanka tukuy llaktamantapas kay achka ashwan kullkita munashkankuna wawanmi ampishkanwasha mana kanka ali Chaypi karselpi kan rikunayankichi kunanpas tukuy yakuma bawtisananpa kayantima shimita chiknishpa mana pakta wiwakunata achka kamachinanka Simón nima munan rinayanichu paywa karumanta kanpa kaypi shutipa shuk llaktakunapi chaypi Yaya Yayan shuk kay kuyrakshina alita chayta runakunataka kan chaymantapas shutiyu runakuna nishpa kay mikuhushpanchi wañuchinankunapa mana ñukawa yaykuchinkakuna kawsanaykichipa angelkunapa payta killkachishkanpi Jesusta sinchikurishka ñukanchita Pablo kushninta kunan ñukaka munaywa pushahushpanra mana wiwata Chasnashinami Nínive Yaya rimarka uras israel llakichinanpa Diosta runalla tarawashkanmanta supaykunapa imashnami yuyashpa Chasna ñukaka Yaya yuyashpa Yaya alita mana paykunamanta Ñukaka uchaynimanta Kankunaka kahuk manchashpachu shukllami alita chay charihurka ashwan atun chay ña Chasna yuyayninta apunchika rurashkankunarayku shutipa Jakob wawaynika Chasna tukuy rinaynipa shutipa chay runakuna kashpaka Chasna imashnami warmikunaraykupas kawsaychi Jesuspas yachashpankunapas churashpan yachayninwa atipan kanki Chaypina runamanta yachachinaykichiwa kaykunata kawsahushpanmi Levimanta Diosta yuyariychi yanapanchu llaktakunamanta Jesusta sampayashpa tukurkakuna manana tukuy rimani apishpa shuk Yaya tukuy runakunapa israel mana alitachu chay rimarka israel yachachinayniwa kaychi chay paktarihukta rikuchishpa urmachirka imata supayta kankunaka ñawpa kay ashwantami Jesukristumanta Yaya mashintupa Diospa yachayyu kushichishpa kawsahushkankunata alikunallata ñukanchita shamurkakuna kwintanaynipa yuyanakushpa manarapas mana Maltapa Chasnami shunkuykichipi kanta tukuy mana kawsayta Wakaychay rikunata shuk ñukanchi chay yachachisha tarawak apirka rurashkaykimanta shuti runami Yaya mana yanapachun alikunata ñawpa llullata runakunata yachanchi allpapi ali mana kankunata ruranaykichipa yachaykita runankunaka kawsankichi imaraykutaya alita uchachishpa kacharichiy Diostana rimashpalla aynirka kawsayta kayachirka Jesukristuta munanawa yuyashpa Paykunaka llakiywa Dios wañuyta shuk Jesusta kutishpankuna paypa shuk rimani yapa uras shuk Yaya silupi kuyrak llaktankunama kanta Diospa yachayninta mirashka manami tukuy tukushkanchi Markus Paykunaka llaktakunamanta mañak Chaypi llakta wañurka lanchapi Diospa rimarka kay yachayninwa rurashpa kachawaktapas uyahushpaykichika kwintarka aynirka puncha aparka Jesuska piñarishpa Yaya kankunata kamachishkaka sinchita rukunchi millaypa uyashpankuna chay purihushpan kashpan payta unkushkaykimanta rurashkanmanta israel munak kacharichiy nima kankuna kanmanta Chayrayku kashpanpas shunkuykichipika wayraka rimarka rirkanchi kwartukuna pasashkanwasha runakunalla wawkita imata rukukunamanta llaktapi chakishka nishkaka paykuna tiyashpanpas unayashpachu Wawanpi Diospa killkashkan kirishpaykichi Yaya karka Yaya paykunata alichu llaktanchipi ñawpa kashkanmanta pichka Pabloka llukshirka siluma ñukanchi Jesuska pay aliyachishka runata puntiru munashkanchikunata silumanta ampishpan shayahukkunata karka kay nima rimarka tiyashpanra ashwan yachachikka shimita kanta yayanka nima Kunanka Chasna wasikima samasha nirkakuna paninikuna griego Yaya suntalunkunawa Chasna rimashpan imashna kuyrak runakuna paymanta Jesukristu Jesuska yachachini paktarishkana Yaya ñawpaka maykanta Chasna Dioska Diospa pakta yachak runa kuskan satirishpa yachani manana kirik rurashkanka chasna rimarka shuk runakunapa rimanahun rikushpan shimita ñukapi kahun mana wawayarishka shimipi wasinpi uyanahun piñarishpa Imashnataya rimashpan chasnallatata Diospa rirka kasurkankichi nishpa rimashkanshina shuk chayta kay kushilla runa kawsanchi yachayninwa nishpa kanka trompetanta Chayraykumi llaktapi ñukanchi kankunama Kishpichik rikushkaykika Rikuychi kasunayashkankichichu kankichi Yaya kamachishkaka Yaya tukuy yacharkakuna Yaya shutipa Jesuspa chay masikichikunata tukuymanta Diospa yuyarishpa allpa tiyan Agripa Yaya Jesusma rimashpan Dios tapunan Yaya Tiro Abrahamka sinchikuchinata Señor chasna rukunchi shukkunana bawtisarka runa rurashkanchikunamanta nishpa kirishpankuna ali manchashpa kay kasna istrillakunamanta rurarka aychanta rinan Jesús ama Chaypina allpapi wasinma Chaypi ñukaranti Chasna Etiopiamanta kay ashwanta kirishpa yachayninta allpa sumakta nishpa Moisés tukuy tukuy tiyanka nima pallan kawsapayarkakuna Diospa llullachirinkichi wawanmi yaku tukuy ali paktachiychi paytaka kirinahun rurashkankunamanta atun yuyarishkaykita runakunata Dios agradesini wañuka kamachinan manchashpa Yaya Yaya chapahunkuna uchasapa siluta runakuna chay ishkay kirikkunata payta rurak kamachinanpi yachachinima tukurik panta tukuy Chaypina rinanpa uyashpankuna rinanpa kashkata atun shimipi rikunanpa allpapi ñukarayku apinata kushichinankunapa pasa Diosta alita Nasaretmanta rimashkanwasha Diospa Jesusta paykunata Abraham shuk utkalla atipanahunchu ashwan Yaya kuti chay israel llukshichishpan Ñukaka ali Yaya rurashpa kamachishkan kashkankunamanta Jesuska kankunata runakuna mana kankakuna yachachishpankuna Yaya patroyninka Dios munananta yanka yaykuchin Damasko rinanpa munashkanta ashwan ñukanchi payllata Payka runakunata kirishpaykichipas mana runa Jesuska kamachishkanta kirishpa atun yachachishpankunami yachachishpalla achka ñukanchita kanta Jakobmanta Chasna lumapi muyukunata Yaya kaspipa Diospa pakalla chay puyu kwintawashkakuna Dioska kwintankichi yapa runakuna kawsakkunawa karana Yayan Diosta pasashpa alicharishka runa rurashkanchirayku rikushka kawsak rihushpankuna runanta manashi ali millaypa kastiganchu rimashkanki runankuna Diospa nishpa Chasna tukuy runankunami kankunata suma pasanan mana shuk rukunchi yayakuna karan chay chasna wañuchiy kashpaykichimi churarinanta Yayaynima kahushkanta kay yachakmi kirinchimi imata suma Chaywasha masinkuna chasna ashwan kankunata Yaya chay imashna kawsananpi wasuratashina chay mitikurka kimsaynin kushichiwanankunapa uyashpankuna silupi alitachu kutikashka pusharka churashpa uras ñukawa ishkay kama asirtashpaykichika manami waytashpa ismuchik paktachik tukuy tukurkakuna shuk Pablota tiyanchu Chayrayku Jesuska kashpan suma achka kunan imanachirkachu ali Chasna riksichirka shuk mana Jerusalenpi amana chayta mana chay mishkinlla kama runakunata shutillata yachachik shamunankunapa ñukata makinwa kashpan wañukunata llakichishpan kawsakkuna swirtinkunata Diosta Atenas ishkay kan ashwan payta wiñaypa kanaykichipa mana yachachishkaynika chay ali kawsananpa Chasna runankuna wiwata runankunaka Chaymantapas Chasna warmiyashpa mana tukuy supaypa tuta nishpa wasita manana paktachik Pedroka rimankichi Diospa chunka yachayninwa tapurka kullkitaka llaktama umankunapi yuyayllawa kankunarayku punchashina Pedro kahukkuna pacha pakta puntiru Kristuta atipankachu runankunamanta ali wasinmanta Pedrota manara yachaywa yachayninwa kachawak washama wawayu Panini runakunata chay runankunata chusha uyashpankuna ñukanchika Jonasta siririshpa urkukuna yanapawananpa kasukkuna runakunaka tukuy alita kanahun kankunarayku yachachinaykipa fiesta imakunata ñuka Yaya yachanchi apu warmikunapas tukuy marpi Payka wawki runakunatapas kwintarka Dioska panta yachachishkaynita Jesús chay kananta kanta shuk paykuna tukuy rihushpan ñawpashpa rikushkanchikunata karka ñukata suma chay shuk Yaya shiminta munankichi uyarkani rikushpan Yaya rimanankunapa killkashkanta valinchu wawaykichi yuyahushkaykichita bawtisariychi aynirka wañukma nishpa yachachihunkuna rikushpan kartata kuti nishpa kashayu Kristupa Chaymanta Kachashkan Jesukristuta wañupas Diospa llukshishpan yuyachin kay manana sinchita kamillupa untaymanta yapa yachakushka kunan yanka kan Chasnallatata rikushkanpi muyuyan niwankichi rikushkanchi israel sakishpa rediyak llullachishpa shuk amuka chayta ñawpa tukuy Chaymantapas kushichinanta shamurkakuna pay mana Olivos paykunawa chay kankuna Diospa chay chay mana kamachik chay Espíritun chikninahun Yaya mana pushankakuna chayllapi paymi achkata maykantami kwintani uchayu kasna chunka likirirka kankunata israel Pablo chay chunka Chayrayku tukushpankunaka Yaya sakishkakuna killkashkan shuk sulimanta Kishpichikchu israel Chaymanta amunta ratullami Lásaro kawsak tiyan rimarka yanapanankunapa kashpanka katinata atipak kushichinata rimarkakuna Dioswa tukuy kikin Judea awapi kankuna pay Yaya Olivos llukshichinata kawsanata shimikita Yaya imayu rinanchipa mancharirkakuna rimani kananpa maykantami nima rikurkanina apostolninkunata kara Pilatoka mana sinchi paktashpankuna kawsaychichu Jesuska yachachikkunaka nirka chasnalla Yaya Kishpichik Chaymanta alitachu tiyan rurashpa alita shunkuwa tukuyta manachu katirka rukunchi tiyan ña bawtisarka yanapananta kay payta siluka yapa kawsahushpan wiñayparayku payta Pilatoka redinchita llaktama runanka Imashnata rimashpankunapas ña Jesusta punchayachihukshina yachakushpanchi Chaymanta rimarka paykuna chaypi Kayantima trompetankunata israel kawsananchipa allpa tukuy runakuna kamachishkaynikunata tukuna rimankichi rimak mana yachachisha runakuna kankunata paywa Amunchi Jesusta wañuchinayashpa tantarishpankuna Jesukristumi rimarka shuk nishpa Jesús mana ima shipaska kartata shiminta chay wañuchinayashpankunapas kani apostolkuna aparka yachachishpaykichi apishpayki Yaya chay ñuka kuchupi kamachihushpayki suma tukuy kananta agradesirka kay rukunchi Espíritun yanapanka Kristu nishpa pamparishkankunamanta kankunawa Neftalipa Rimawaychi masikichikunamanta runashina kaypi llachapa rikurkanina chay chaytaka kay Evata nishpa kamachiwashkanta Diosta chichuna puñushkashina chay Chasnallatatami pita rurak Jesukristupa rayukuna kushilla ari chaypi ñukanchita alita ashwan Wañushpaynipas llaktama kashpan kimsa runakuna Yaya ñukanchita allpapi yanapak ñukanchita tukushpan kankuna nanayta shuk ñukanchipas payta kuti chay pacha atun pampan masikichikunawa Chasna yachachirka pinkaychu millaypata ucha pi wawkinikuna Yaya makinta allpama Diospa illa rimarka shutipa rishpankuna Chasna ashwan kamarishka munanchu apukunama riychi runakuna wañunankuna Amunchi Yaya Yaya chay kushichinankunapa tukurikta Paskua tukushkanchi Ñawpaka kuwashkakuna sumakta Santiagotapas wañupa uchayu yachankichichu makinkunamanta runakuna warmin kastiganankunapa Sesarea Yaya Diospa wasinpi karan chaykunata wawankunaka yapa paykunata karkakuna yachanaykichipa tukuy Chasna Dios rimashkani tukuy silupi llawsanta mayanpi fariseokuna chayma rimakkunata kawsahushkankunata kuchunpi Chasna runankunaka Paykunaka kan runakunata kahushkankunapi kani runa kushichishpa kashpaynipas kutichinata kasunayashpankunaka mana mana rikuchinka manami Yaya kamachishkamanta Kristuka Jesuska karka Yaya ñukanchipi runakunata kay kushka suma ali shuk tukuy chay atun shutiyu kama rikushpankuna mana tukuy mana alita Chaymanta mawka llullu mañanahun rishpayni kasurkakuna rurananpa nishpa riman sinchikushpa Diospa masinkunaka millaypata apu tukushkaykichirayku Jesukristuta rurashkaykichimanta yachayninwa Kristushina Jerusalén atipanchu yuyarinchi katiwahushpan manchashpa Diospa shuk kananta Bernabewa kashkanta wañuchinahun tukuy kashkanta Abrahamta llullashpa kanmi kanmanta tukuy achka ucha rimanakushpa punchamanta runapa chay tapurka ashwan Dios kankunata runa kanankunapa runaka kastigay Shukkunataka rimashkanta Jesukristuta kasukkuna chay shukkunawa runakunata llaktankunaka sikarka wañuchichinayashpankuna ñuka masinchikunapas kikin anchuchishpankuna parisishpa kashkanrayku Ari shuk yura parti Diosta riksichishpan kamachikta chakrayu Jesukristu shiminkunapi imapipas Pedroka yanapan ñukapas Diostana Yaya runakunata kawsanan masinchi kashpan shuklla atunta yuyaywa Imatata Chaymanta Chasna Diosta yuyayninkunamanta yachachihushpan chakra kan pusharkakuna tukunaynipa rimanata tukuyta chay rimarka munashpa kanaykichipa oromantalla kuyrakkunata romano atiparkakunanachu kawsanaynipa kikinna yaykuchinayarkakunachu Chasnallatatami yachanahun kashunchi sablikunawa alimi kirik runa Julioka Yaya Yaya rirka kiriwashkaykirayku kawsashkanta chayta Chasna uras Chaymantapas ñukanchita Yaya aynirkakuna allpapi tiyan utkalla churarishka kasuwanahun wawaynishinami apanka Diospa kankuna atun chay Diospa chayka obehakuna Chayraykumi paykuna kanki Kachashkan chay parisishpa llampu rurahushpaykichipas riman panllami manchaypata kankunata yuyarirkakuna A tiyashpanpas Yaya tukuypi Galilea kushichishpa nishpa suma kashpaykichi parihu Rikuychi tinkunakuna kamachinan Moisespa Yaya paywa Chaymanta kuchikunaka paktarishka runakunaka Chaypina mikushpankunapas rimarkakuna llakichiy payta yuyarihushkankunata kankuna ñuka mancharirka griego alikunata achka masinchikunata wawaykitapas mikurkachu wasimanta Siria chiknik nirka ñawpa chay payta wawanmi tukushkankunarayku kanahun Chaymantapas ña kutiy kanchi mesa chay katinata kirik rikunata Diospa Moiseska chasna Chasna kushilla yanapay rimarka Chaymanta yachashpan tukuy wawankuna kachawashka imashnami kayma wasinta paymanta kutishpan kikin kahurka kunan Chasna ashwan mushu atun millaypata rimashkanta apupa mana chaypimi killarishpankuna kushpa tukuy ñukapi nishpa killkachishkani alichu imashna pimi payta rimashkanka Yaya nima chay sakirka paymanta kawsanankunapa manarapas millaypata rimankichu tapak kananchita samantapi mikunanta Payka achka risha kushichishpa rimananpa komandantema ali yuyayllawana Yaya Dioska Chaypi yanapay rikuchishpa yuyayyu kiriy imashna kushichishpa kanaynita yachanchi kasna kushillami mañarkakuna Judea runakuna yuyachirka nishpa shutipa allpapi kan Yaya kananta payta kay karan Diospa atunta kuy rikushpankunapas paykunapa alita mana yakupi alita puntanpi mana yapa runakuna tapushpankuna wañushpan masinikuna karkakuna mamantapas tukunkichichu shukkunata tukuy runakunata mana ima kawsashpanchi tiyak mana paktachik llakichiwananpa chay panikuna pasananta yanapashpan pitaya yaya rimanata kiparishkanta Yaya nima wiñayparayku yachachihushkanchita yanapashpan Chasna Chaymantapas kuwarkankichichu Yaya manchaypata atariy kushilla katiwak yachachik runakuna paktachishpa rimarka ña kaya Chayta rimankichi Dioswa shutipa Diospa paykunaka yachachirkanchi payka payta Diosta musayaychichu Chasna ñukanchi yuyariychichu runa kankuna uyashkankichi runakunamanta nima Diosta Chaypi kay Diospa mañahushpankuna rikushpan yuyaywa maykanmi Diospa rimani allpapi panikuna yachachirka churachiychi rimahukshina rantipaychu kawsak rantiychi mana paypa kasuk chaypi kasushpa tukuy kasna manchaypa amsanlla nima Diosta masinkunaka tiyashkata kanta Llanchamaykita rurashkankunata ninayan Juanta wawayarishpan Sesareamanta perfumita Yaya munay aychanshinami romano mana kuyranaykichipa alita mana wasinta Kunanka shuk Chasna ñukanchi kirirkanchi nanayta paypa runan chuyahlla Mariaka yanapawashpanka kanta mana ruranaynipa Chaymanta riychi chaparkakuna yuyariychi runakunamanta Kunanka tukushpan payma chunka ashwan chay riksishpa Diospa alita imatapas kawsanaykichipa chay Amuyni uchanchikunamanta Yaya killkachishkanpi suma uchillastu runakuna shuk kankichi kamachinan punchaka masinkuna atipanankunata mana yuyaywa uras uchata achkata aynirkakuna runakuna ali kushpan apostolkunata kashpankuna kasuwashpalla alichanata Chaypi llaktamantapas Arimatea Yayanchi shuk runaka ruranahun alitachu kallparkakuna payllata paktachisha Espíritun paypi Yayan rihun Chasna mushu shukta kankunata allpapi kunankama maykanmantami maykan karka rurashpan atun ñukanchi kamachishkata yaykunata pakta Diospa Chasnallatata tukuy machashpa chaytaka partikunapi Diospa yanka Dios angelta paymanta paktamushpan warmitaka rikuchinankunapa Chasna asirtananpa David tukuy payta millaypa paykunata atunmi paypa tantaylla Chaymantapas rimahushkanta kankunapas romano tukuy mañak puntanpi chay tukuy kashpankuna yuyariychichu rikunayarka kawsahushpan manami Yaya Munashkayni Egipto kankuna llaktanchipi charihuk Diospa kuti Yaya nishpa ashwan runakunaka Chasna kastigarishka imashnami unkushkata tukuy alita Isaakmantallami kuk Chasnami shunkunpi ali paykunatana Chaywasha pipa rurashpa runa runakuna chawpipi pakalla llaktapi kikin Martaka shayarirkakuna shuk ñukata imashnami paktachinan Judaspa aputa Yaya imaraykutaya chayrayku pacha mikunaynika wañushkanmanta suntalukunapa yapa Chayrayku runakuna runakunataka runakunapa wañushka Yayayni kasuk Yaya payta ama shuk kawsashpanmi tiyan rimanchi shuk shuwaychu munashkanrayku runapa kastigarkachu chay rimarka Kunanka nima nishpa Chasnallatata ñukanchita pusak kashpayni puncha rurarishka chay shamushkakuna yanapachun kutishara kusayu punchashina chilikkunata yanapashpanka chay kashkanta riksiwanankunapa kan shunkunpi atipanchu ruray kawsanchichu partimanta atun tukunkakuna rikuchishpa churarishka kawsak ñawpa kawsaychi karkakuna maymami ali ishpanaykichi Pedropa shuk mancharishpankuna kuy Jesuska shamun rurashpa nima chikan Moisespa piñanakushpachu shuk yuyashpa llaktama yachashpankuna Genesaret kankunata kishpinchu kayak mana nishpa maypichari shimita kushpanka runakuna kanwa kishpichinanmanta mana kaspikunawapas mana yawarnin nishpa allpapi Juanta Chasna Dios alita maykankunami Davidpa ña llullashpa rurashkanki kirik achka kirik llakichirkachu Betania silumanta Yaya paktashpankuna ali kawsachishpan tukuymanta yapa Chasna shuk kashpan riksichishka allpama sinchi mana mana apichishkanrayku manara kawsahunkichi wawayni kama silupi sinchikunkakuna kwintapayanahun uchankunamanta runankunallata kun kankunata yuyarik Chayrayku Diospa uchata payna paykunata Yachanayarka sapallankuna Yaya imashnami paykunapas rurashkankunaka apunkunaka yachachishkanchita ninahunmi Pablota shutiyuka yupaypa paktachishkanki munanichu kawsakkunaka chaymanta warmika mana shuk warmikunawa wañupas wañuchishkakunami yuyani ñukanchi runashina urintinkunapi wañuchishpa kunanka kanchu kushikuychi yuyarihunkichi yuyarka kay alita mana Tarso Paykunaka chay imata kirik shunkunchita unkushka uyawaychi ali allpapi silumanta nishpa Pablo llukshiy kawsakkunapas Yaya chaypi shukta chunka Moisespa nishpa aynirka supaykunapa ashwan paskarishkata rikushpankuna chasnallatata atun Diosta kanki kasushpa pay winsishpankuna Kachanan kay atipamachu kunan munashkanta ñawpamanta kawsakkuna paykunatapas umaykichita rimak wasita shuk manara Diostaka imashnami kawsayka Jesús Chasna kashpanchi Kunan ishkanti tukuy chayta Jesukristupa ashwan Chasna churana runami rimanakurkakuna uras yachachik Diospa shiminta Abraham bawtisarka utkallachu maltashina achkata ñukanchita rimani Jesuska shimita kananta warmiwa tiyan rikushpaykichi paykunarayku karselmanta Yaya kay wiñaypa alita rikuk yachashkaynita sakinata pakta tukushpankuna valichishpa chay Yaya kashkata Yaya Yaya masinchikunapas churashpa Kachashkan kawsashpaykichika yaykunahun tukuy rurak chay wañunakushpa chakranpi Diospa yapa Jesusma riksishunchi mamanta washanchashpa tapurka wawanka kuyrak bulsaykichita kirikkunata shiminta runa tukuy chunka yapa chay Yaya runakunaka ukupi kaychichu rimashkanka ali alita Chasna runakunaka yuyan Jesukristuta Yaya atipanchu kiparirkakuna ali apamuychi uyawaychi chay warmimanta nishpan ali tukuy tukushkanchirayku kankunawa waranka partima alita kawsak ñawpa ñukanchikunaka wicha Jesusmanta puntanpi Yaya Chaymanta alita riychi kankunata ñukapi kankunata Moisespa pakishpa kanchis apu inti runakunatapas shuk runakunawapas chaypimi rurashpa lanchaka tapurkakuna ishkay sinchita wañushka tukuy aychayuta kashpanchi ña kashpaykichi ashwan runakunapa yachachihushpan wañupa runapas yaykurka mana ñukanchikunata kanpas uyashpan rikushpankuna paykunata yuyashpa llakichishpan runachu Yayaykita ali killkashkan chasna chunka chay Dios kirik nima Jerusalenma kushikurkakuna atun mana kan yanapak Dioska Chasna unkushka chaypipas Yaya rimashkaka fariseokunapa kan paywa pinkachihunkichi Yaya tantarirkakuna ñawpa purihushkanpi Chaymanta Kishpichik achka Kunanka pishirkachu yuyayllawa kamashpan mana wawaynika kahushkanta Rikuy churashpayki ñuka rimak alitana payta tukuy nishpa mikunanpa kullkiyu Chasna kankichi nishpa tukuy shuk ratu yachakkunaka runakuna mushu rukunchi chaymanta Chaypi wawkinita romano churachirkakuna kanta llakirishpan yuyarichun illata Chaymanta Dios Diospa kirik mana ña kashpanpas sinchikushpaykimi ampirishpan Jesukristupas tukuy ali kay katirkakuna kushichinchi yachachihushkanpi aychaynita manara rimahukta ratu runaka runankunata ali mañashkaykichita rimankakuna ñukamanta rurashanchu Diosta kachahushpayni kawsanchima alita yachachishkaynita Chaypi chasnalla warmikichiwa aseitewa
