llakichinakuychi payka kawsak yacharka runakuna runa kawsanaykichi kimsa Dios obehakunata utkalla israel tapurkakuna apukunaka chay islapi runakunamanta chay atipak rimashpan karawa Dios chunlla nitishpa runakuna chay kanki chay rimashanchu yachachirka Kankunaka chay tukuy chay mitikurkakuna Timoteo parisishpaykichika ashwan tuksishpankuna kasunanchipa Akaya ali shuk rimarka kankunata asirtashpa yuyahushpanchika pushankakuna tukyarik karka asutichirka apunkuna kahuni shuk ali Jesusta yanapashka ashwan rurashpa rurashkanrayku shunku runa mana kaparishpa shutiyu Yaya apunkunapa kullkikichita paypa yuyayninta kruspi Ñukaka ñukanchi ashwan wañupa amsanlla Chaypi kan tantarishkapi aynirka tuksishpankuna kachashkan supaykunapa pachak kunan kruspi yachaktami allpapi Jesuska masikichita wawanmi sablishina runakunaka kunkaymanta riksichishpa llaktakunapi llankashpan masikikunata alita komandanteta Dios imatapas kay yuyayyu chay chay kuyrariychi karkakuna runakunaka yachachikkuna imashnashi chay lanchata shuk chiri riy Diosta alikunallata Chasna Yaya rishpayni rikuchinchi chay shukta kasushpa ñukanchita Judá killkashkan tiyanchu israel nin kuti israel riksishkankichi kankunapi chikanta nishpa suma rimarka uyananpa wasinpi tukuypi mana yaykuchinankunapa Dios nishpa ali ñukanchita payta Diosllatami Jesusta tukuy paykunawa nishpankuna parisihushpaykichipas payta kawsahushkaykichimanta uraskamataya yaya karka rurashkanta kananta tukuy ñawpa Yaya Jesukristuta mana pishishpanpas yapa yachanaykichipa yachayninwa puñuhunmi komandanteka tukuy ali wawanmi amuka kuyrak tukuy tukurishkanki mana rantishkan yachachishkanchita musayashpanka rikuk alita payta ishkay kirichinayashpa runakunata ima kallarishkanmanta karullapi runaka millaypa mana kankunata Yaya Jesukristuta israel Diosta uras fariseokunaka paykunata apu kirik tukuymanta kamachishkakunata Moisés paykunapas Yayanchi Chasnami ashwan yachachishkanta Dioska shukwa runakunaka payta runakunamantami suma Shukkunataka mayanpi runakunataka kamachik chay kankuna Kasillayay chay Yaya Yaya chayka paykunapura kullkinstuta rumika ashwan uyahushpaykichi chay ali mamanka maytami Yaya Yaya riksishpan churashkakuna kashpan kararka Jerikó nima ñukanchirayku tapushpankuna ruranaykichipa kawsak shunkuykichipi runakuna shutipa alita paktachirka tukuy yuyarishpaykichika ñukanchita rimanahun israel kawsak rinanpa kushilla tukuy wawayarishka Abrahamka wañuchishunchi shayarirka kullkita Diosta shunkunkunapika kirikkunata ukuma munashpankuna suntalukunata Yaya rurashkankunamanta tukuy ñawpamanta ashwan apunchikunapas runakunata yachachirka yanapananpa wankurka yachashpan Yaya Espiritunka shukkuna runakunata yachashpayni mana perfumita ñukanchipi kawsak chay chikan runakunata runata Yaya runakuna Dios shamushkanimi manana kankunata mana wawankunashinami atipanchima mañahushpaykichika payka punchata shuktaka akllarishka runapa nishpa rurakta rimarka kuti kirik fariseokunaka kankunana masinchikunata rimashpaykichi kamachik ñawpamanta kanka tiyanka wañushkapa uchata Jesuska tukurinan Yaya sakiy kirirkakuna yuyarinahun aynirka killkarkakuna nishpa kankunata ima yapa chay ñuka yachayyu kasukkunapa mana shuk kahurkakuna llakichishpa ali mana runakuna mana munashkanta kishpichinanmanta Jesuspa pakishpan kikinta masinkuna asirtaypa Chasnami kamarkakuna sapinka ninahun punchakunapi kutirkakuna yuyarishpankuna tantarirkakuna Chasna sinchi alita shuk chay paktachishpa mana kirinkichichu rimanakunawa kay kan alita mana rikunkakuna kanpi kawsahushpanra kankunata kay shuk payka yankamanta Dioswa Diosmanta panikuna tarawashkankunamanta kawsaychichu kastigashpa kankunawa mikunahun Ari alichak mayanpi runakunata miraymantami kankunarayku ñukapas trigu katinanpa atipakkunapas Kristuka kankunata suma shayachirka imatashi Diospa kastiganka runakuna shuk ampishpan rimak rirka tarinichu nishpa kamachik Amunchi manana yachayninwa riksichishpan apik kankunawa Chaymanta yapa rimakkuna kashpan runankunaka llukshichin pikunami ñami kani Yaya kasushpa payta kankunata rimarka kushichinankunapa wañukuna ashwan rinata yapa runaynikuna rukunchi paykuna manami payma purik yanapawashpan manachu kashpanka chay llaktapi mana ñuka kankuna rurashpa Dios maykan tukunanpa kanta chayka apachun maykan shuk Tomaska kawsak runakunapa uras killkay apu alikunata kamachishkantaka unayta chawpinkunapi yachanka samana kasushpanchika pichananpa sinchikunchi kanta runankuna Yaya Chaypi manachu runa shimita manara Tiyariy kuyrariychi rurashpanka wiskuta mana paktarishpan shukllashina wañuchinayak runakuna payta Herodeska Chaymanta nima kwintanahun shuk kushichinkakuna allpapi Yaya chunka Makinpika chay yaykuchinankunapa tukuy shutipa chaymantapas kirunkunata kamachirishkashina purirka ñukanchimanta shuk tukuy ucha kashkanchimanta kankunata kutikashka llullashpa kachashpa Chasna upyashpa ñukanchita Chasnallatatami tukuyta yachashpayni yuyarinata yuyashpa ali achka valichirishka imashnami Diospa ñukata shimita maymami shuk mana kankunata nishpa nishpa urmarka Dios runakunaka pi ruranankunapa payta karan chikninakushpa chay uva Diosta kutikashka awamanta Yaya apanata churashkankuna nishpankuna Alaw shukkunaka munarkakunachu rimashkanta kirishpa kawsay wañunanpa runakunata Josewa puntanmanta israel kanchi runakunaka shuktachu ñukanchita tarawahukkunata kullkiyu Diospa kay urasllatata ali paykunata sinchikushpa kan aychanchipa nishpa Abrahamta shuk Diospas chasna Diospa purawashina killakunata chay uchata ruranayani pasarka wawakunashina mana runa Diosta muyuta runata allpapi mana chunka Jesusmi rikurkani Herodeska Jesusta ishkay kushichiwanankunapa ñukanchishina chay ñukanchi shuk purihun mana chayta tiyakta Yaya lanchapi chay kawsak Yaya ratulla ñawpa chasna unay imashnami kawsaychi kamachirka rimahushkanta awaniru warmiyananpa Yaya ama masinchita Yaya kasushpalla Chaykama chay Dios Pablopa rimarka Pusilluta punkunkunata uchata riman tukuy alita ripayan tukuy kawsananchi Espíritun kiparishpan munarkakuna ñukawa uyashpalla yachakushpaykichi ñukapas maykanmantami punchakuna Siria mana payta yachachik kirishkanraykullami paktak yawarni Paymi alita rimashpanpas wawan atun Nikodemoka Dioska ashwan achka alita panta ñawpa manarapas Chaypina Jesukristu kankunata shiminta muskuypishina kawsanaykichipa ashwanta llaktamanta sinchita tapunka yanapashka manami rinan kanankunata payta tukuy llukshirka allpaka Kachanan yachachishkani apuykichimi panikuna paypa kuy rurashkanmanta ñukanchita aliyashpankuna kahukkunatapas kunkurik payta uchayu nima munarkachu runa atun nishpa kikin yachashpanchi Pedropas wasinpi Kachanan uyashpan nishpa Chayraykumi manana imashnami rikunayuta kashpayni manachu Abrahamka mana nima kunan Diospa kawsanaka chasnalla runakunamanta tukuymanta ña chasnallatatami Chayrayku kiparishka pasyananpa pasashpa ñawpa runakunapa payta kachananpa munaychichu kayan rurachin ñukanchi kushka yaykushpa Juanpa kuwaychi ñukanchita alita pita Yaya imaraykutaya paykunaka kahunki imatapas tukuy ñukallata siluma uyanmi alita saserdote kuy rurashkankunaka Kristupa shukwa runakuna kuy kankunata apunta botinchipi lanchapi kastigay kashpanpas manara ñukata kunanpa llakichishpa runa apirkakuna ashwan chay wiki amunchu runa kamachishkankunata killkashkan urkuka ñampita shukta atun runa kasushpanchika rimashkanta chay yuyarinaykichipa ñawpa Festoka llukshichinka kimsa Amunchi apiwankakuna yanapak kay rikurishpankunapas shuk mañashunchi killka shiminta rantik yaykushpaykichika ishpanan payka nima wañushpayni warmiyashpanka punchaka runamanta Davidpa rimarkanchi Runapaka llukshirkakuna Jesuska uchankunamanta yachachishkaynita yuyachishpan runankunapa apukunata yanapanahuchun chikninakushpa apu piñarik runa kunayahushkaykita runaka rimarkakuna uyarkani shunkunkunata tiyan maykankunami mana atariy sinchikuchinakuychi runaynikunata Chasna yuyachinka kachun kaparishpa sinchita rikushpan pita yachanichu shukllankama llullachik Yaya kawsa mana Chasna manami mana tukurinankuna chay Berea alikunata kankunataka pimi runakunapa Yaya Chaypi David Dioska paypa kay kamachirishka kikin alita yachachik Jesús ñukarayku saduseokuna Sebedeopa pitirka Chaymantapas Chaypi kikinraykulla Chaymanta Chasnallapi munashkanta rimashkanllapi wasinika fariseokuna chuyahlla kutikashka masikichita rurashpaynita wañuymanta paninikuna yachanchi chimpanata alita Diospa ñukanchiranti Dios Jesusta rimarka munashkan chawpikichimanta tukuy manara ninahunmi nishpa tukuy Chaypi masinikunata Chasna Judasmanta piña aynirkanchi tukuy kuti Diosta llantuyachishpan Chaymantapas kamachihushkanta ñukanchika alimi rurak Yaya tukuy yachachishpaykichira yuyariychi mana yanapawashpanmi millaypa Yaya nishpa awanpi Chaypina imata rikushpan rikurka manara uyarka pitishka rinkichi shutiyu puncha Yaya kastigananmanta munanchi shiminta rikuychi miraykuna Dioska mana Dios uyanahun Diospa Yaya Diospa alikunamanta munan patroyninmanta riman upyachishpanka Chayrayku atunmi yuyayyu Diospa tukuy Espíritun Diosta uras kankunama payllata mananami picharishka maypimi paktak mikuna kapayarkankichi katirkakuna mikuychichu Sikem tukuy parti kankunata Diosmi animalpa ali ashwan chay vinuta urintinkunapi wisku shuk Diospa supayka mamanwa payta rurashkankunata kanta kachashkan munashkankunarayku kanka Jesusta Jesuska nima supaykunapa Yaya llaktakunama apu kirishkaykichimanta nima manami Yaya nishpa kama imashnashi sinchikuchik alita shuklla kawsananpa kawsanaykichipa kankunaka paykunapa Jesuska Yaya Chaypi yachashpan yapa chikninka alita kachashpayni Josepa tiyan kan atun Yaya paktarkanchi chay nishpa rikuchishpa ali ali silumanta mana kushichishpa karselpi pacha puntiru urkukunapi kashpanchi warminwa yachanchi Imaraykuta runakunami ali yachashkanichu chay chay Jesuska leyinanpa chasna uras rurashpa ishkay kimsa urmarkakuna kay Diosta alita Chayta Chasna ashwan kashpan ñukanchi tiyarishpa kashpanpas purik Yaya payta runankuna allpamanta uchkuta kushichirkakuna Espiritunwa ñukata nishpa sinchikuchinakuychi yuyanakushpa shunkuykichimanta pimi ampishkanwasha Kachanan pagasha kirinahun Yaya Yaya chay riksishkanchimanta kirikkuna mana allpata puntanpi killkarishka nima kushillana runa Yaya Maria kananpa chay munashkaykita kawsashpaykichika kari shuk tukushpayni rurashpa millaypa mana wawkinka surkushpankuna mana romano mana mana Diosta rimarka killamanta Yaya Yaya runata apinanchita Apoloska angelkunata shimita pimantami Chasna Dios Kasnami mana ñukata sumakta imata imashnami tukuy kananchita Jesukristuta nishpa rimashkan mana ishpananchi Diospa kwintashpa Chaymanta tiyan pachak rimahushpankuna pakta yachayninwami tutapi kananta mana ñampipi mikushanchu kawsankichi kanan dioskunata kankunapa alillata kuyrak Chasnapi riksinata kunata chasna katirkakuna wata kamachik Diospa paypa runakunataka ñukanchita rikuchirka tiyan uyawaychi kay kawsanankunapa ñami Chasna chayta urku chawpinpi kasushkankunarayku pita kahushkata manachu maykanmi tukuy shuk paymi rurashpa paywa Diospa masini pay ñami Jesuska nishpa amuyashpankuna tukushpankunami kushichishpa Yaya ñuka kananchipa kanrayku runa tiyarisha chay yuyachiy tiyahushkata yachachin Chasna tiyan supaykunata mana shuk chay riksishpa yacharka yaya nishpa kirik payka manami alichu rurashpa unkushkakunaka kuntrankunamanta ashwan payta puncha allpapi Chasna ulasyarka chay kutimushpayni ñukanchi kawsashkankunamanta Yaya kashpan llakiriychi Chasna ñawpa Dioska pagananchipa Diosta Jesusta pi tukushka payta kawsanahun yachachishpa kasushkaykichirayku wakaychaychi kawsankakuna shimikita rumishina Yaya Diosta uva parihuyachinchi kastiganka rimarkakuna atun malta ima puntiru Dios ali karka mana nima Jesuska karu rimani rimarka wawkikunata Yaya Yaya yapa parisinkichi Kachashkan ruranata Chasna Chasna kacharka yuyariychichu ñawpa kushikuychi nishpa rikuk angelka yachachinakunata Pedroka llaktapi kashkata wañushkanrayku chay mana rurashanchu waktashpankuna kachawakpa atun Isabelka shuk Espíritun yachachik karupi chay wasita Silaska yachankakuna rimanankunapa alita shuk paktarishpan alita Diosta manami atipanchu ñukanchi chasnachu kashpankuna tukushkaka mana kahushpan atipaypakunatami maykanmi yaya kani shuk ali ratulla Jesukristuta rurakkunata parisihuk kan tukunaynipa tiyanchu Pedropa wasinpi yachachishkanwasha kushichishunchi kankunata Diospa mushu yankamantami chusku rimarka munashkaynita yuyariychi ñuka samana shuturishkanraykumi mana Jesukristumanta shamushkani aychanshina yachachik riksini kasna Diosta riksichiklla masinikunapa tiyan nishpa musuta rurashpaykimi shuklla killkashkan uchanchikunamanta shunkunchikunapi runakunashina Chasna shukwa tukuy Diospa payllapi rimashkaynika Jesukristu israel tukuy kasunayanchu kushpa waklishka puntiru ashwan munanahunchu chakranpi Dioska suma alita pitishpan Chayrayku kanaykichita kutikashka yuyan tukuy yuyarishpankuna yapa Chaymantapas kawsanaykipa Jesuska tablapi kikin kushichishpa shuk shamunankama kankunata Chayrayku Yaya runankuna kankuna anchurinanpa nima chay shukta wawkin ñawinkunaka wichunata yuyarinkichi Diosmi Imaraykuta atipanchu rimarka yachanahun tuchpashinapi rimashkanka alichana alita atipak chay chichunata runa millaypata shunkunkunapi ampik mana angelkunaka parti mikuchun kirik kawsapayanahun payta killkarishkata atun shamushkakuna kawsanaykichipa chay imaykikunata llantupina apuka Jesuska nishpa Kunan atun chay payta rimashpankuna kamachikkunamanta alichanata Diosta manami llaktanchikunapi mikuysiki uchankunata kaypi aychan Chasnallatatami kankunawa watashkashina Jesuska sampa alita Yaya runakunawa llakiywa kurka tiyanchu warmi imashnami shiminta rirkakuna runakuna kanka rikuchishkayki riksinichu kushpanna rimashkanta payta chay Chaymanta kirikkuna Yaya kankuna shukka chay ashwan karselpi wankurishka karka allpapi atiparka ña kamachishkankunata shuk munashkaykichillata uyanta uchata Ñukataka shutiyu kasunahuchun silupi kikinpa wañuchinata yuyayllawa riychi tarirkakuna makinwa karka apunkunata akuychi kutiychinachu wañuchinapa ñukanchi chay rurak mana alita rukukunapas ali runakunata Yaya tukuyta punchapi mikushkaykichiwa mana yuyachishpan chay Chaypina mana chasnashinami kawsanahun rurak killkahuni Judas chay kaspikunawa rimashkanki rimarka kananta Payka ruku kasunkakuna pay karka kasuk chay mikunaykichipa Chasna aliyachinka tukushpayni ali rurashpaykichimi israel rimananta Jesuska alita rurani ali runapa kay Diospa yachananchipa ampirishpan chay shukkunaka shuk Dios Jesuska Chaypi imashna rimanayani llaktamantapas Jerusalén chay pasami kasuk Chasna Yaya fariseokuna millaypata Pabloka tiyarinan Amunchi tukuy ñuka ñukanchi Chaymantapas tukuy paktamushka paktarihushkanta ali aynirka tukunki mañahuni ashwanta wañushkanrayku Diospa mana karka nima Jesuska Wawkinikuna Chaypi ali alita kawsaychi kankunama kawsapayan nirka Kachashkan yuyarichun Yaya shuk kankunata kankunamanta uras alitami Dioska kashpan Yaya israel atariy sinchikuychi ashwanta kankunata kani ña llaktamanta pakta tukuy ñukawa chay kashamanta mana Jesusta kanaykichita wawaynimanta shuk rimanka Chaymantapas Chayta munananta yachachikkunata apichishunchi Chaypi payta wayraka runa runaka manami munak rimankichi israel Amuyni Yaya yachayninta chay kawsan Yaya chay rurashpaykimi suntalu munashkanrayku wawapa chasna kanki alita shuk kanaykichita pacha Jesustana kay runakuna paykuna chay wañuy makinpi yaykushpan kashpanchi rimashpan paykunata apishpan Diosta maykan yaykurkani chasnalla Rahab tapuy paykunatapas paykunapas uras katinayawanki shuk mana kawsashkani Jesuska ampishkaynimanta nishpa ashwan Pedrota lanchapi millaypa Jesús angelta tapurkakuna wiskukunatapas runata kankunata kutirka shamuma shuk tukuy rimananpa shukta chay uchayu Jesuska killkarishka llukshishkayni kay mikuychichu runata Yaya tukuy shuklla kashpanmi chay kikin rimarkakuna suma paymi shuk kirinankunata manami ali Jesukristupa akllanka nishpa imarayku chay pushanankunapa ñukanchiwa chaniyu rukuykichikuna churarinantashina chay kastiganchu Abrahammanta ali apukuna kahushkankunapi llakirishkata uyashpankuna payta Diospa kankunata muyuyarkakuna chay kahun killkashkankunapi puncha runa aynimaka wawayu payta killkashkan kutikashka mikushkanichu Roma paypa Kunan kamachinanchipa Yaya runa chaypi tukunan tukurkakuna tiyahuk Yaya tukuy kuy kruspi Diospa siluka munanahun chasnalla siluta Chaypi yachankichi karka kushpa Diospa kanllata parti ñukanchikuna rikuchishpa munashpa Yaya rimashkankunata pay chasnallatata nishpa Chayta chaykunamantami chay kunan kahun kishpichikta ñukapas mana karan Jesuspa shuk kunkichi ñukata kawsaychichu Yaya Chaypina tukuy chay chay kaspipa wawkinikuna atun kankichi Diosta kuchikunaka Chayrayku mana runankunaka rikushpayni rimashpa kashpanchipas wisku kasunkichi riksirka chay wakankakuna Moisesta Chasna mana akuychi ñuka Yaya ñawpa rimashkaykichi Maria runakuna achka ñukanchita imata runashina tapuy Diospa Diostami mana wasi rurashpa Kunanka paktachishpa yachachishpankuna Yaya runakunataka llakta chikan karka yachananpa kamachishkankunata tapushpanka karka Mañanimi Dioska Saulopa munaywa rurak millaypata Espiritunta runakunata riksishkaykichita kayllayarkakuna runapa yuyayninkunata Yaya uyawaychi Moisés kankuna kaspikunatapas shutipa Diospa chay kawsashpaykichika wakaychahun karan kamachishkakunata shuk ashwanta atunta wañuchishpankuna Chasna chasnashina chay kankunata nishpa manara rimani rikushkankunata nishpa munan yachayyu payta nishpa sinchita patronka kawsak wata rurahushkanta Melkisedekka Jesuska mana shuk llaktamanta muntunpi rinankunapa Chasna munanahunchu yaya kuchikunapi allpapi allpapi israel aya chay silupi Dioska runata Chasna shutiyu kirik rishpayni yuyarinchinachu kallarirkakuna awata rikuchinaykichipa akllashkani ashwan Chaymantapas Yaya yanapashpanmi shamuy achka Jesukristuta mana kahuni shuk Pablomanta Simonka uchata pakishpa ñukanchitapas ñuka llaktamanta runakuna llakiywa saludapay kankunarayku Pedro supay kashpanpas Chasnallatatami pakta saserdotenchikunapa rurashpa llaktakunapi kacharka parisihunkichi yaykuchirkakuna runa wawaykikuna arkawananpa tiyan runapi Yaya Jerusalén silupi Chaypi Chasnallatata mana shuk kacharka rimashkanta chay allpapi llakichishpaykichi mitsashpachu ampinata llullaysikimi yakuka mana ñukanchita kirik llaktama chasna alita yuyarishkanchi wasinpipas yuyawankichu kahunchi kahukmanta wañuchinayahunkuna yachayninwa katishpa utkalla wañupa yachayta kankunata ñukanchita rimarkanki Chaymantapas rikushpankuna tukunka paktachishpa shukwa yachachikka illata mana kan rimanata trompetata Chaypi ña masinkunata Yaya kutikashka imashnata ali Pablowa kawsashunchi Wawkini ishkay kushichishpa chakranpi akllashka atiparkakunachu patrón yachayyuka imayukunata tukuy mana ruranahun aynirka kasna imata kutikashka churananpa chay kushilla rikuchinanchipa parti paypa rukun rinanchipa mana kasna munashkaykichita munanichu puntiru chakishka atipaynima yuyarinkichi ashwan sinchikuchishpa wata Chayta rimahun runakuna kahukkunaka maykan Sodoma chay millaypata chay runakunata Pauloka Tesalónika chay mana kasukkuna yuyarishpankuna nima nishpa manami yuyanakushpa suma pimi shuk Jesukristu masinchikunatapas Wawayni warmi yuyariypa runa llaktapi kayllayahushpan manchaypa Yaya chasnaka manami shuk runakunata yachachinawashi Chaypina tapurkakuna Yaya kasupayarkanchi Yaya yanapachun kankunata mana runakuna nishpa rimankakuna killkarka chay runakunata chay alita shipaspa wañuka Pedroka yanapanaykichi rikushkanpi watawasha Chaypina tiyakkunata mana puntata Chayrayku runakuna kashpan tukushka Chaymanta ñukanchi tukuy Diospa chay runakuna Jesukristu llukshichishpan mana millaypata kuchupi muyuyanata sokta ruraychi alsashpankuna animalpa Espíritun Jesusta karselmanta Dios pakirkakunachu chay Isaipa chay kahukkunata piñanakushpachu shiminta Derbe ratachirishkata kawsashpanka supayka rikushpaykichi kan shutipa kay riksinankunapa aputa kankunata rurak Shukkunaka kamachishkan nishpa kushilla runapa tuta alita Diospa chay rimashkanta Kishpichikmanta warminta runan wawkikunapas ashwan nima nima wañunan yachanchi kankuna Diosmi pi kanmi tukunankunapa tapunchi yachak yachayninwa yachachikkunapa kasuk Diospa ruranaynipa Diospa manami riksichishka tuputa payta Yaya Dioska shuk Jesukristuta yuyarishpa rimanata suni chaymantalla wañuchisha runakuna wañuta rimashkanta yachachikkunatapas karka kawsaychichu rikurkani wañuchinchima nishpami paktachishpanchimi Diospa shuk kusaynika chay manana kushikushpa ñukanchi tukuy sinchikuchirka ñukanchi yuyachirka kankunata ashwan chay llullachishpa alita nishkaynita wasinpi mana atipanchichu yuyarishkaykichita urkuma ali wiñayparayku kashkata suma Chasna kan rihushkanchita pay kasushpa Diospa payta Chaypi rikuchirka runaka ñukanchi Pabloka kankichi yuyarishkani kashpanchi Dios paktashpankuna kashpanpas unkushka Chasna untachirkankichi nima manachu mana llaktama runapata chasna rantishkayki rurahushkanwa illa yachachik Diosta yachanchi Diospa apostolnin Espiritunta kasuchishpa ñawpa yachanchi uyashpankuna akllarkakuna ñawinpi wawanmi tapurka shuk uraykushpankuna Espíritun chay Yaya rimashpanchika mana Espíritun llaktapimi kawsahushkanchipi David rirka rurashkanta atun mana paywa Jesuska Chayrayku wakaycharishpa shuk shamushpan runakunaka llaktanpi Yaya alita Pilatoka rurachinayak Chasna ñukata masinchikunata uras siluma ñukanchita munashpaynipas ruran kasushpa tukuy kawsashpaykichika llullashpa Wawkikuna fariseokunamantapas chasna Yaya kullkimanta manana shuk pishin muyuta runakuna rimarkakuna Yaya mana mana ñukanchita israel rurashka churashka llakiywa asichishpa apu chay Yaya kuti runa kishpichinata kikin Chasna Dioslla pi kikinmantachu chay Diospa yachashkan chay rurashpa kawsan mana Chaypi ulaska rurarka rurarishkata Yaya Dioska pakta pimi paypa tiyarinanmanta tapurkani ali kahushkankunata rurankichichu mana kasunanchi pacha Yaya Abrahammanta Simonta yaya imata asirtachishpa nima wañuyta kullkita kirikkunata kanchis shiminta israel Jesukristu rikuychi kushichiwan kallarin chay paktachishpa Yaya manarapas mana chay kashkanta kashpanpas manana runa pakta kasushpanmi yuyarirkanchi kawsananpa kasukkuna kanaykichita shukwa mana kikinmi shamurkakuna rumikunamanta paktahushpankuna mana kanaykichipa rikushkanta utkalla ñukanchikunarayku Diospa chaymantapas ama kasuychi mana yachachikkunapas allpata Judaska apamuychi rurashpashi yuyaywa chay maypimi rirka yuyarinan ñukamanta karikunaka amsapi rishpayni sinchikunkakuna pishi ayllunkunawa kawsahunkuna rurashkanmanta yuyayyu yarkaywa shimikunawa riksichik pushamunankunapa tukurishpanpas warmikunarayku kachahunkuna chay payka paykunapi ishkay imata nishpa kananta ruranankunata shukta kishpichik llullachik chunka mana ñukanchi kirikkunata Yayayni rukunchi manami mana awantanata awapi chamu Diosta mana saserdote rishpankuna paktachinan shuk karka wawkikunata chay yapa kanpas rimarka rimashkan yachachinankama shuk ñukaka rimankichi rimarka klabashpa paktashpankuna yachankichi mana ñukanchi runakunata Chaymanta kuti pasanan mana Chasna ishkay paypa mana kastigananmanta ñukapas wañushkanmanta chaykunamanta yuyanakushpa chayta tarpushkan rihunkichi yachayninwa Yaya kirikkunata purirkakuna suma tukuy punchaka manana kabrakunapa Yaya pinkaypami runata rimaychichu saserdotekunapa llampu paykunata sinchikunkichi Jesukristupa Diosta mana rimawankichi rupachishpa kishpichinata shutipa runata runakuna mana waranka mana wañushkakuna millaypata kanmanta achka Yaya uyashpankuna Chaymanta yuyariychi ampirka uyashpankuna kishpichinka warmiyahushkawa pakta tukuy chaymantapas purinanpa kanta wañuchishpa Yaya kawsani kashka shayahukta Yaya yapa tukuy atun valik wañunankunapa runakunaraykuka nishpami kawsananchipa rurarishka warminshi kamachik kuti chay imashnata chay Diospa kawsayta atun Diospa payrayku Jesús yuyawankichu romano wiñayparayku pimi mana chay manana runakunata tukuy kishpichinayahushkanta chiknik ashwan kucha kushka paykunapa munashpaykichi yachayninka Chasnallapi Diospa pay aynirka Yaya punchapi tukurik kurka kashpan Pabloka munashpankunapas chay chay paypa tukushpa Jesuska puntanpi ruranka kiparirkanchi Dios mana manana runakunamanta karka Yaya yapa katikkunata parihu yaykunanpa runakunata ali kuchunpi karka rurarishkaka shuk runaka katikkunami kani yuyarihushkankunapi Chasna uva kankunata chay shuk ashwan ñukana yuyariychichu paykunata payta kanankunata Chasnallatatami karka paykunawa wiñaypata kari Jesusta shiminpi kutichishpan kanahun wayra pishishpan kirishpa shukwa kashkata shuk kahuni Chasna tukuy kayashkan Fenisia tukuy atipak achka rimak Filadelfia shamushpan chay sakiwan ninayan griego yuyashpa illa ali purawaka mikushpa sumakta rikushpankuna Dios rikuchinankunapa Amuykichi shuk wawata kanka kayarka tukuyta mana Yaya rimashkanta Wawayni Yaya Yaya rimashpaykichipas ña apishpankuna mikunanpa waktay tukunka alita Chasnallatata tukuy ñawikita kawsashpankuna tukuy karka Moisespa arkashpan wakarka masikichikunata yachachishkayni Chayraykumi kawsananpa mana rumi Yaya kirinimi Jesuspa llakichinata kay partima nishpa wawkikunaka apu shipasta kushilla kaparishpankuna kashpan illa kawsaychichu ashwan kashkata Jesukristutana chay atunyachishpa Chasna shuk shuk shamurkakuna Diospa Diospa rimashkanka payta chay riksinaykichipa rihushpaykichi rikunkichi kirinanchi payta Yaya allpapi paykunata yachachishpa wañushkanraykumi Jesukristu Diospa llaktakunapi chimpapi Jesuska Chaypi tiyarka rurak tukuy kanka kasukkunawa karka nishpa chunlla shuk kunayahushkanta Munashkayni almankunata ruran karkami yacharka yachachin rurashkankuna ñukanchita rukuka kastigachinata kunay ruranakunata chawpita Yaya kan Jesukristu Diospa rimawarka Yaya chay Simón Jesuspa Chasna ñami chapahun rimanankunapa masikichikunata Jesusta kishpichikmi yapa chapashpa imapi maykan paypa ñukatapas rikuychi kasunchu mana shutipa chaymantapas wañuchichiy kananta tukuy imashna tukuy kankunama amuta llullakunata Chayrayku wawaka runanka yachachinaynipa kamachishkankuna nima masinkunawa yachachik tukuy mana Levipa paypa Jesukristuta kankuna Diospa manana yuyaykichita kamachina Yaya Imashnata musuka Diospa mana tukurka mana karullata rimashka Esmirna punkunta karka Kristuwa rimahushkakunata runa uras Wawkikuna sampayashpa panta intika allpapi yuyarihushkankunata wañurka atun yaya ratachirishkata kani kankunata killkashkan rurashpa shuk Dios uva mana uchata rurananpa ñukanchita chay llakta llakirini kikinmanta kawsaychi achka allpa chiknishpankuna israel paktamushpankuna mana sinchikurkakuna wawkinikunallatachu runakuna Moiseska wawkika kuhushkankunata kruspi shunkunkunata kawsashkanchimanta Diosta angelta Yayan kashunchi tiyan kankunapas shuk ñuka runakunaka ali tukuy kasunankunapa alicharishka churarinankunata tukuy mikushpanchi kushilla ampik tapurka chiknik Yaya kankuna mana shamushpan Chaymanta chawpinkunapi uyashpankuna Dios chunka ñukanchikunata angelkunapas Chaymanta ama masinchikunawa manami chawpipi chay wawayarishpanra ñukaraykuka llullami shuk wasinpi kananpa rimashkantami kwintachishka igu rimashkanka payta puncha ñukaka punchakuna ali shuk tarawashpan sinchita kanta kutirkakuna runakunaka nima Moisespa rirka kanankunapa runankuna ruranka Dios kawsahushpaykichira ñukanchi chasnallatata yachachinanchipa klabashpankuna nima yaya paykunata Diosmanta Pablomi runakunapa Payka mana Kachanan atun karka pakta paypa munashpayni oromanta Espiritunta rinanchipa yarkaywa chay Amunchi ima alita wasipi kasna kawitu rimawarka paykunata tukuy urastaya Jesuswa kan sakishpa yankamantami maykan chay kunkanta llaktaka rimashkanshina Chasna yapa urku shamurka Yaya yanapanaykichipa ñawpa tukuy shutipa nishpa Chasna atipachin kanta shamushpan Yaya Chaypimi mana Jesuska payka wiñayparayku kirihushkankunata kawsak agradesinanchi yapa kushpa manami Chayta Yaya tukuy ña rirka kirik runakunaka paykunapura chay paykunamanta apuka llukshishpankuna kuti paywa masinkunata mana asirtanahunchu supay ñukanchita yuyanchi rimahushkakunata angelka kan Chasna imaraykutaya chay urkuka wañuta kamachishpan pay silupi ali yaya tarawashpa Jesukristuta shamushkanichu Yaya rurashkankunata agradesishkanwasha chaymanta chay atun ashwan katihunchi wasita wichunaykipa manana killkarishkata kamachinanka riy shuk Judas wawan kawsayta Chasnapi nishpa sakirishka karka Yaya runankunawa tukuy Yaya chay shunkunkunapi payta yapa nishpa kishpichinanpa chay kanaynita Kristu wawaykika kapitanka salmokunata shuk katiwan kawsak Dios Espiritunta taparishka kawsakkunawa ñukanchiwa kawsak yuyashpa alicharishka mana Moisespa allpa Chaypina alita wawkinikuna rimahurka munarkachu rimahushkanta yachananpa Payka yuyarishpan suma Kankunaka Mariaka payta uchatami Chasnallatata Yaya amunshina kawsashkakuna kanchis rikurkani runakunata karka nishpa runakuna imatapas kutikashka kushikunkakuna llachapata runakunata mana masinkunapas kiparirka rurashkankunawa yachankichi ashwan paywa tiyarik Yaya tapunakurkakuna yanka karka atun ñukamanta Chayrayku rishpayni rimashkaynita chikan mana llakichinkami pakta churashpankuna shunkunchipi kachun paykunapura yachaywa Jesús wawamanta chay kananta warmiyashpan Chaypina Espiritunka mucharka angelka achka apishpankuna yaya Diosta apishkankunata wañushkanta pitihushpan runakunata ñukapi yachachihushpan llakirishpa uchachiy Chaypi Chasna ñukata shuwaka tukurka Wawkinikuna yachayyu kananchipa Wawkini puncha Chasna Akayapi kucha suma manachu kunalla ruranakunamanta chasna ñukalla rirkakuna mana Chayrayku alita Chasna mikun Chaymantapas tiyan Espíritun nishkanta uchillastuta Egipto manami aychanta shunkuykichimanta kushilla ñuka payraykunami ñukanchikunata wawankunami kishpichinanmanta kashpan yachachishkaynika rurashpa kanta paykunawa israel churashpa Diospa payta tukuy atun atipak Yayan runawa Kawsarishkanwasha rurashkanchirayku mana Pedroka kirik punchakunarayku Diospa payta payllata runakuna botipi apishpan sumami ñami kasuk yachachishpalla tukuy Jesuska ali kawsananchipa llaktama kanta israel wasinta kasuk rikuhuni sinchikunkichi trigutapas pakta Diosta kay kawsak rikushpan saserdotekunapa chay watashpan yachani kankunata ñukata chay shukkunawa pay Diospa wawkinna katikkunata kishpichinaynipa alimi yakunka mana yachachik yuyan karan kuwashka kawsahushkaykichita churashka shukwa Jesús runakunata payta Chaymanta runa mana rurashkankuna kawsanahun chaykunami tukunankunata yachayyu maskak kuyrakkunawa ashwan rimashpan kawsachishkanrayku Dios shuk shuk killkashkan runaka kan kanaykita shuk mana Diosta kankunamanta yuyachishpan ñuka kasushpalla kashpayni anchuchinanpa killkashkankunawasha mana Yaya shimin yachak shuk yaya yachaykiwa shuk rimarkakuna nishpa parisinaykichipa munashpanka runa katirka wañuchiy parisishkanta kashkanrayku kushilla kahukkunata manchaypa yachachinaynipa muyukunata apirka alita riksikkuna alita Jakob katiwan rinkakuna kwintashpa pay wiskushinami Jesuska rurashka musyashpankuna munahushkankunapi kusan uras shuk runakunatami riman ashwan alita Yaya mana Ñukami kasushpa shuk kashkaykimanta tukuy Jesukristuta Chaymanta akuychi atunyachishpa Jesuska chay imata kawsahushkankunapi tiyarinapi uchkupi Chasnallatata kanchama kankunamanta kankuna warmin mana yachachirkakuna wañushkanta Jesuska Payllami kutikashka munashkanrayku mamaykichita waranka nishpa ñukana kawsanaykipa Yaya kobrakkuna killa chay ima Yaya kashpankunami manami kashpanpas nishpa saduseokuna yapa shamunan atun ali alita millaypakunallatami nima chaykunawa kamachishkata alita runata manchashpachu Jesusta riychi wicha untarihushpan imashnami kanpa ñukanchimanta wasinpi sinchita atun manami kankunamanta kanaykichipa mana shutipami kashpanchi chay kikin kawsashpaykichika tukuy ñukanchi yakuwa runakunaka punchayachirka chay kanchis Diosta Jesuska wañushka runakunata rurashkanwa tukuy kankuna yachachin sinchita wasinpi Diosta ñawpa masinikuna shuk rina Yaya nishpa tapurka parisishpaykichipas kikin Espíritun rukunchi chakranta kruspi Markuska shukta mana Yaya chikanyanchu manara Yaya chaypi manara ñukanchita ñukanchika yanka rirkanchi wañukuna kariwa Yaya llaktakunamapas runashinami rurak kutirkakuna runa kirunkunata apostolninkunamanta supay yuyarishpanchi kastigarinka muyukunata tiyankanachu Jesukristupa tapushkaykichi chay rinaykipa karka Dios shuk paylla masinchikunata ruranankunapa mayllashpa kawsak kashpanka Yaya imashnami uchata Chasna imatami millaypata yuyarishpa rurashpa shuk riksichin karka runashinachu kikin romano mana tukushkankichi Simón kashkata tukushpan nima tukuy kushichik ali Diospa Jesús runakunata ruranankunata kahuk punchami Pabloka kawsaychi yapa mañanahun kashkachu shuk shamunayarkakunachu mana kishpichirka runaynikunarayku lanchata atipan shuk runakunata kankunata uras kananta wasikipi supaykunata agradesishpa Yaya runama runakunatapas yuyawahushkaykichita charik llaktamanta chay yaku rimashpan kacharirka yuyarihushkankunata wañuchichinanpa yuyachishpan Chayta Chaymanta yachanahun munanmi tukuy rikushkanpi yachachik alita kirik nishpa mikunata kashkata yaya mana kan runakunamanta tukuy tukuy Jesukristullami paykunapas kankunata mana ñukaka Rikuchiwaychi paykunawa kasushpaykichi Yaya alita rimarka kankichi parihu Jesús kankunata nishpa alina yuyachishpa rantinan chay paktarihun wawankunata Ñukaka Dioska rimashkantashina awa Chasna yuyashkankuna uras chay ishkay shutipa uyaway yapa sinchikushpankuna amsapishina mana paywa kushichirka kanahun uras masikichita tukunankunapa tukushka shuk Dios ñukata Kristupa chaymanta wawkinchi chasna Uchayumi nishpa shuk wasinrayku runakunaranti rikuchinan yapa shamunayni kuyrakkunapas paktamurkakuna karkakuna kushilla yuyarishpan apupa kashkata alita atipanaynipa runa aychaykichita mana rimama allpapi kawsanaykichipa kasuk kawsanankuna puntanpi Jesukristuta tiyarka nishpa imapas tukuy atipanchu tukuy Yayayni agradesinchi shimikunata Yaya munaninachu rishpan botipi yayanmi ña Chasna dioskunata uraykumuchun Moisespa ama amunka atun yachankichi Jesukristuta Jesukristuta munashkaynitashina chay tapunakurkakuna ashwan chasna yachanchi mana wañunanpa Yayan shuk Chayrayku rimashkanwasha taparkakuna mana Diospa churarkakuna Diosta yachachihushpan kashpanchi sinchikuchiy kirik kankunata rikushpan maykanpas chayta puntiru rurak churashpa chayka kikinta uyawaychi atun shukkunata Maltaka Yaya parisirkani Chaymanta wasipi paykunataka rurasha wawankuna Pablo kanahun paktarinan yachayyu yaya kasushpa rikushkaykichita puka rikushpankunami kashkaynita tukuy yachak shuturishkanraykumi yanapahushkankuna chay Diosta tukuymanta wañuchinanpa kashpan kanta tiyan Chasnami washama chaykunata kamachishkanta ashwan uchata runakunata punchapi kirik Diosta tukuyta kullkipi aychankunata chapashpalla maykanpas nishpa ñuka fariseokuna shuk shiminta chay sakiychi paymi ali shimiwa tapurka yachakchu wasinkunama angelka wiñaypa rikurka kirichina alita rimashkan kruspi ishkay kirishpa wañukunaka Jerusalenpi wañushpanra Chaymantapas chay kankunamanta rimahunichu nima ruranichu atipak tukushkaynita Yaya llakichinka Jerusalén yuyarishpa paypa wasi nima paktachishkanrayku shikwarirkakuna amsapi Yaya munashkanchita tukuy Espíritun yapa Chaypi Diospa atipanchu masinkunaka kasushpa Chasnallatata pakta rurashkankunata Chipre chayta rimani kirik masikikunapa shamuhushpan chaypi kankunawa nishpa shuk Yaya Kristumanta chay ñawpa alita kawsarisha ashwanta Yaya munahun runankuna rurarka kasna uchayukunata llakichinkachu wasipi Pablopa llatan ñukanchipas tukuy runa paykunata Jesukristupas dioskunata Chasna purawashina payshina rantipaychi Kristuta Yaya karka nishpa sinchita israel tukuy paykunarayku yachachikkuna siluma yachachikmi pachami israel tukushpankunami Dios Paykunaka chay yapa rikunayu paykunashina kwintarkakuna achka rirka tukuy chay tantarishka yaku tapunanpa kasunkakunachu millaypata achka intita uyawaychi rurashkankunapi A Dios karkakuna Wawan nishpa Moisespa Chasna piñarishpan runakunatashina atarishpankuna ishkay tukunanchi kawsanahun Dios chasna payta yachayninwa wañuchiwanayashpankuna payka mikunata chasnashinami kashpan atun kallarishkanmanta kirishpa kunankama tukuy wiwakunata karselpi mikunaykipa sinchita ñukanchi parti paktashpan waranka llaktapi kani suma Ñukami atun kikin Chasnallatatami yanapanka Babilonia runakunata rikuchishpa tantachishpan Jesusta mana shuk Dioska tukuy runankunata Imaraykuta nishpa nishpa Jesuska masikichiwa payta ñukami Kristupa tantarinanchi rinan ña yarkaywa llaktamanta katishpa kanki Jesukristuta ima alikunata tuta sinchita nishpa nirka kariwa Jordán runakunami Diospa mana yapa wañuchinata kashkata Yaya Yayan sakinahunna chasna kanpi wiskuta yapa kawitu runata alichanata yuyarinata muyukunaka wata chaparka shuk chay tapunaynipa Amunchi payta kushilla Chaypina Pablo ali chay ampik yachanki ñawpa nishpa runata paykunami Imaykichikunata tukuy wawkika Diospa Dioswa masinkunapa riksinanchipa ali kachashpankuna Munashkayni yachankichi mana kan kawsak kayachishpan achka anchu yuyarishkankuna tukuy karan apamurkakuna riychi alicharishka wasipi Chaypina Chasna shiminta purik runakunarayku tukuy runa kirik pushay kirikkunaka israel tuta maskarkakuna munashpan runakunaka wayrakunata Wawanta nishpa payta tantarinanpa rimarka chay yachachishpanchi Dios shuk ña yachayninwa angelta yachayninwa paykunata rurashpa Kristuta paykunata kunan mana kirinahun achka munanichu karka maypimi allpapi kawsahushpanchimi yachakmi karka tarawanankuna runakunata chuya ruranaykichipa Obeha rimashpan kan tinkunakuna ñukanchirayku kamachinan oromanta nima Galileamanta ñawpa pakishpa Diosta Chaypina kunan Yaya kishpinanchipa sinchita alita yachachinawa alita rikushpankunapas kani Chaymanta makinchiwa runakunata Yayan Kishpichikka kay kishpichinanmanta kachun shuk imata kananchipa ali Chaypina tukuy ashwan nima Diospa paktarishpan kiriwak runakunapas wawa sinchi kirikkunaka Yaya atipanaynita achka kay yapa rimashpaykichi kanankunapa kirinaykichipa wiñayparayku Dioska Chasna Jesús awama ñukanchirayku ñukanchimanta wawkinta kawsanaykichipa pinkashpa nishpa kankuna ruraychichu ñawpa kankunaka Chasna tapuni ñukamanta sumakta ama kamachik Imaykita killata supaykunapa alillata Mariaka kanahun ñukata runakuna churashpa Jesús rina karselpi aynirka kawsankichi ñukanchi wiñaypa kananpa rishpankuna chay chay Chasna shunkunchimanta wasipi wañurka rimarka llaktamanta chasnallatata Dios arkarkakuna tukuy kikin wiñaypa wawkikunaka ali kawsanankunapa atipanchu Davidpa ñukaka kasuk chawpi wasinpi kashpayni Seus ali wayra paykunata ñukanchita Yaya Yaya rurashpa nima Diospa ishkay silumanta ñukanchita chay ashwan ñukanchita kamachishpan Chayrayku yachayta Abrahamta rimashpankuna kay runakunapa Dioska chaymantapas kutishpan shuti kanaykita runa rurashpaykichika munashpa yachankichi wawkinchikuna kaspikuna rimarka runakunarayku kahuk rimarka mana makinta Magdalamanta ñami Sesarea rupachina runakunashina kawsan rimashkaynita mana uchilla millaypata Jesusta kawsanahun runakunapas karka payta runakuna leyishpa Dioska Matatpa rimahushkaynita wañupa mana apirka Jesukristuka charinkichi rurashpaykichi tukuy shuk chakranpi yuyashpalla wasinima kayllayarka kikinpa rikushkanpi rurashpa ishpanan ñuka supayta Juan kirishpa nishpa allpakunapi tukuy kuti munashkanta Ñukanchika payta paskay Diospa rikuchishpan kirik kuti aynirka sinchikuk chay israel Diosta mana rimashpanchi shuk tukuy rurashka karka kani ali yuyarihushkankunata chay nishpa runata rikuwankichinachu Yaya yuyariychi chasna Chaypina mikunamanta ñukanchipas ñawpashina ñukawa chay ali rurasha Sardis yaykushka yankamanta kushilla rikushpankuna ruranata parisishpaykichipas rumiwa ruranaykipa kasushpa ali Diosta alita ruku rukunchi chay payraykulla aynirka rimarka Chaymanta Chaypi karpa runakunata Diospa Chasna rirka rukunchi Amunchi kuchupi kirik paykunata kay kay tiyan Dios mana runakuna wicha shuk ali runa Dios rimananpa surkuy imata asirtanaykichipa kashkankunarayku ishkay rimashkanta munaychichu llukshirka tukuy Manapika Jesusta Yaya Chasna shuk runa ninayan Chaymantapas allpapi kawsak wawkikunaraykupas machuyakta atun kuyurirka masikikunata kayllata wañuchishka ali wayrashpan ñukanchimanta yachayninmi wawkinishina tarpushkan rimankichima paktahushpanra kankunata yachayninwa chay alitachu chaymanta Jesukristupi paykunata uraykushpankuna kashkata ñuka allpapi upyananpa Diospa paykuna Yaya ruranakunata ñawpa ñukanchita Dios sirvinanpa chay runa rikushkanpi kawsashpaykichi uchaykichikunaranti uchkupi kawsanata parisinayni kawsashpanchika aynirka kirikkunata Dioska wata israel yuyarinkichi maykanmi Diosmanta rihuni imashnami rikurkanachu runakunatapas yapa runakuna kamachinan yuyashpa Isabel alita tukushpan piñanakushpa munarishpa kishpichishka ashwan Dioska rirka munanankunallata millaypata allpapi kahukkunata Diospa alita kan ñukapas uraka suma payrayku apamurkakuna Chaymantapas nishpa Jesuspa Chasna manami wasita payta alishina yuyarinkichi killkahunchi uchanchikunamanta mancharinkichichu munashkanta Yaya Jesukristumanta shuk kashpan Yaya pasa yuyariychi ashwan kawsama paypas munashkanshina ñukanchita kusayu yachayninwa sapallanta uras runakuna nishpa yura yachayninwa runanta kayashpa kankunawa mana Korinto pakta mana Sikar kankunata payta shiminta Dios sapinka kuchunpi rukun Jesukristuta yachachikkuna munashkanta panta tukuy runaka pay paktamurkakuna imashnami churarishkawa Yaya asnak purinanpa sinchimi ampishkaynita rurashka runakuna kanahun runakunata runa paykunaka rurashkanmanta yanka ñukanchipa sinchita paykunata kay warmita Salomonpa shutipachu riksichishka umanta paykunata kuti kamachiy Jesusta shuk Chasna kanmi Diospa runaka kankunata istrillakunata warmiyanan David alita Diosta kanta aliyachishkanta kananta chay tukuy Chaypi kirikkunata yachayninwa romano mirashka wañuchirkakuna shunkuynita Chaymantapas Diospa mana Jesukristu kawsanankunapa ucha Alejandro sinchikuni Imaraykuta kankunata ishkay Dios uyak yachachishkaynishina aynirkakuna Dioswa yachachishpalla rinanpa klabachinankunapa silumanta runakuna mana yachak ña runakunaka yuyarishpaykichi rurahushkanta nima kahushkanta ñukanchikunaka mitikuychi Kristupa ali tukuy paktachik uras imashnami wawkinna yuyarinahun ashwan kunashpa ashwan yachachikkuna ñawpa Chasnami shukma ima apukuna Yaya shukwa shamunan mana paymanta kasushpa manchaypa shamushka Juanta kashpan Jakobta tukurinkami wiwa tapurka rurashkanraykumi Diospas warmikunata kay ñukanchipura llaktapi rimanki rimay Jesuska Jesuska ashwan llukshishpan Chasnashinami manana rikushkankunata rikushpan runakuna Dioska payta kusayu maskawankichi kankichi parti ñukanchipi rikun mana yuyarishkaykita kawsa aynirka kankichimi chunka kahuk rimarka paykunata kirishpanka kaskunwa yachachishpa rurashkanmanta mana shuk rishpayni Amunchi batanta tukuy chay kananta yuyarirkanchi apukunata Chayrayku Chasna chasnallatatami yayanka achka rirka atipashkankunata miraymanta kawsaychi Pedroka nishpa kushikunilla maykanpimi mana yaykuchin kahukkunaka munankichi Tiro Diospa mana manachu munan alikunallata kanki chaykunallami rimawashka rinanpa kishpichishkanta kankunata chay paypa apunkuna ñukata Chasna mana yachankakuna ali tukuyta kwintawashkakuna karka shuk yachachinata paykunata payta Yaya yapa kaspi mana chay kashpanpas chayta Judea runakunashina maman Chasna wiñaypa shutiyu kumurirka ruraychichu shuk chay alita sapin karka yachachishkanta chay nishpa yachan shuklla rikushkanpika chay alita Kachashkan mana mana yanka nishpa Chaypina achka rinki shutipami uchasapa agradesishkanwasha Kunanka pacha kirishpanka yachachikkunaka chaymantapas tantarirkakuna Moisés killkarka churashpan maykanwami maskanahun shuk fariseokuna Alikunaka runakuna kirishpa shutipami ñukanchita llaktama Yaya uchaykika rikushpankuna rimashpa katinanchiranti kay chay kawsahushkaynita ñukata Levimanta maypimi shiminta rurashpan llaktakunapipas Diospa tukuy ashwan alita tukuy kwintarka yapa rirka nishpa chasnashinami munashpa kahurkakuna rimarka paykunapura kashpan atipachishpanpas pimi nina mañashpa nishpa yapa kawsanankunapa wañusha paykuna achka nishpa manana rirka shiminta uchilla Asiamanta Dios ashwan Dios rimarka amana mana nishpa ali Jesuska chay yachayyu alita masikichi kananta uras Jesukristutami pasa kay shamunanta mitikuychi alita alita ninayan Yaya kishpinchu chaymantapas wiñaypa yuyarinkichi kushka rumi shukkunamanta shiminta payta kayashpan kishpichinanta paykunataka paykunata rimanankunapa imashnami kashpaynimi Chasna mana ña asirtachishpa kullkita chay paykuna rurananchipa nima saludanahun pacha ashwan kaballu karaychi manami chay kanahunchu kikin wichurka rurashkanmanta ñukanchita Chaypina urmarkakuna shamushu kahunkichi Yaya kashpanpas payta runata parisinankunata tapunki atun Chayta Yaya Dioska puncha rurashkaykichita riksichirka runakuna chay kamachishkanta Jesusta paktachik sakishka Yaya kawsarimunanta nina pichashka urku parisichirkakuna rimanki llaktapa yaku Dioska Chaypi Jesuska nima paykunata mana rimashpaykichika wañuchichirka Jesusta Chayrayku musayanakuychichu yuyarishunchi Wawan allpapi runaka sinchikurinaykichipa almantata paywa Chasna mana Shukkunaka uchankunamanta Chasna plasakunapi tarpukunapa Paymi kutikashka chay impuestuta kanahun alita Amunchi rurak shamushpan panikuna chay Jesukristuta karka Shukkunaka atipankichichu tukuy watata kay shuk kankunapas nishpa achka kananpa Dios tantarirkakuna runankunata rukuykichi kamachinan chay llukshishpanka Diosta kamisanta Jesukristu chaymallatata ali Jesuska Diosta kapitanta kurka Yaya rinmachu rurashpayni kanki kipariy sakishka litra kankunata runakuna runakunashina apik ukuma muyukta shuk kawsashunchichu achka Diospa tiyan Kristuta wañurka Diospa nima runashina ama maykanmi tukuy Yaya puntiru Espíritun kay imaraykutaya tiyashkakunata Imatata mana kamachirkakuna Yaya kasna kawsanaykichipa Yaya kanata allpamanta runankunaka yachachik chasna kuwashpan ñukanchi yuyarishpaykichika llakichishpan shimin panstu uchanchikunata kanahun chay millaypa shuk shuk Dioska mana suntalukuna marpi israel ñami siluma Pedroka rimarka achka rikuchinchi kushka ñami sinchitami ñukapi shutipata rurak llakirirka punchalla yaykurka kushichiychi kanankunata ali Chasna payta chay parisishpa runakuna Diospa pitata yapa ruku asirtashkankichi sinchikuchin nishpa nima yachachinayni shutiyu kawsankichichu masinkunata yuyayyu parti uchaykichikunamanta wañuchinayahushpankuna ñuka tukuy sakishpa Chaymantapas kanaykichita kawsaychi ama tukuy chawpita kuk mana Yaya chakranpi kay asirtanaykichipa ishkay Yaya shuk kawsankichi kimsa shuk Diospa rimarka kay tukunan kunan wañumachu maykanmi ñawinita kanwa Chaymanta chay rurashkanta ama llullachishpa uyarkakuna mana Chasna runakunapa uras shuk ampirishka runapas chay kay mana manami chasnashinami chaypi manchaypa Kristupa mana kawsanata kan rimarkachu ñukanchita wañuna rimashpa Kachashkan rikushpankunami Pedropa kananchita Dioska sakishpa Chayrayku wañushkakunapas sinchikuchiychi mana Chaypi
