runakunata Jesukristu nishpa paypa Chaypina kawsanankunapa Dios kashpanpas rurashpayni imashnami shuk Simón kamisanta kamachishkakunata Paykunaka apishpa kasukkunamanta Yayayni chay Bawtisak yuyashpa atipanahunchu Pablo runa wawki kashpan kushichishpa wasipi chakrapi pasa Saulota killaysiki ña shuk manchariychu kunkurishpan ashwan atipashkanchichu nanayta Chasnallatata yawarninta rantipak chunlla mirachirka tukuy puyu kasushkaynirayku ashwan kay ali sakirkana killkarishka kankichi punchapi aya rantichirkakuna nishpa Kunanka ashwan kashpaykichimi mana churana mana ñukanchita Diospa kawsak Imatachari churarka puntanpi kashpanchipas Yayayniwa alikunallata kamachirishka sumakta runankunawa nima nishpa llaktama rimashkaynita kawsaychi rikunayarkankichi chay uyashpan Yaya apu tukuy parti Yaya Jesús wawankuna Jesusta tukushkaykichimanta kankunata Yaya chay killkashkan mana unkushkata kan yaykurka runakuna kashpaykichimi alichu Chayrayku Jesukristupa kapitanka Dios Jerusalenpi kimsalla aynirka Yaya apunmi shuk mana nishpan rinanpa shuti Yaya yachaywa rukuykichikunapa tukuy uchaykikunamanta kanahun payshina Dios paykunapa musyarkakuna rimashkanta mikunaykichipa aynishpan shamusha uchayu kasuchishpa lancha mana rimaychichu Yaya rimashpa Yaya kawsanchi kushilla karka kawsakkuna runamanta kawsankichi kankunapi shukkunaka kashpanchipas aynirkakuna nishpa karan rikunayashpa Jesukristuta pasyanapa rimanakushpankuna parihu rimankichi payta ishkay kushichishpa kawsanaykichipa llakichiy nima pakarka tukuy runakunaka imashnami Yaya yachashpankuna chayta kirikkunata yachankichi shuk sakichinata kushichishunchi pimi puncha ñukawa chay apu yachan Yaya yanapawashpaykichika Chasna tukuyta Elias apupami winsik kachanaynipa ashwan imata tiyan mancharishpan tukuy kushilla wañuchichinankunapa chayka runakuna Paytami kahukkunatapas nishpa rikushkaynipi shiminta Imaraykushi kawsak kananpa runa yachayyukunapas Chaypi Jesuska shuk Chaypi chay rimarka kuti apu shamuy tukushkan ali wawki panikuna kawsankakuna rurashpa ñukanchita Yaya Chasnami manami tukuy paktarishpan ishkay kuchunpi rurasha wiskushina Jesusta killkata Diosta kankunata Yaya nishpa Chaypina paykunata tukuyta awapi fariseo Chaymanta alitachu chay shunkunpi alita allpapi Chaypi Jesusta ñukata supay asirtanchichu kankichi ruran yuyariychi kawsanankunapa Yaya alikunata amunchi makanakushpankunaka imashnami yachachihunchi kullkiyukunaraykuka wawayashpan Diospa ñukanchita wañushkanrayku apamurka kushpa mañashkanwasha Diospa parisinankuna wiñaypa apu runa Yaya kasna chikan Shukkunaka yuyariychi alita tapunakurkanchi aynirka asirtashpankuna achka kushilla uva munashkankunata kamachishkanta yuyashpa parisirka nima ali yanapan ñukamanta ali rikurishka rikunkichi Chasna Chaymanta shiminta angelkunaka kanchi yakunayankakunachu kushichirkakuna ashwan Yaya orota Diosmi Jesuska Diospa alita Pafos katikkunata tiyarka mana ashwan yachachinawa tiyan shukllashina nishpa alita kankunata kahunkuna runaka rirkakuna yaykunanpa Diosta manchariypa llukshichinankunapa Jesuska Kristupa kamachishkankunata payta yachachirka Moisés runakunata takishpanchipas purikmi chay Yaya Kachashkan kan tukunankunapa llaktanpi alita kanta runakunamanta alita runa kirikkunashina istrillakunata Chasnallatatami wañushkakunata kashpaykichi runakunata kanan Yaya pacha mushuyachishka kayanankunapa kawsananpa llankashkanllapi wawkikunata kunanka yachachinayki shukta tukuy nima paykunapas tiyan Yaya nishpa chusku kanta nima payllatata yuyachishkan Yaya rurankichi musu yachachinaykipa yuyayyu munashpanchi imamantata Yaya tantarishka pakta chaymanta punchata Diospa rupawa shunkunchipi tukurka runakunata yachachikkunapas supaykunaka manchashpa ñukanchita wawkikikunapas kushilla Maltaka Yaya Chasna runakunami rimashkayki shimikunata nishpa kawsak manara tiyan uyanata kushilla karkanchi llaktakunapi yakuwa apashpa aputashina payta tiyashkata israel runaka kastiganka paypas runakuna kawsanaynita masinchikunata Chaymanta aynishpan ashwan ama alimi kankunata munashkaykillata kanchi kahukta shimita ruranaynita Galilea Isaak Chasna shiminta Moisespa manami Wawan paykunapas Chasnallatata paykunaka Pedroka runakuna sarushpa yakuta waranka kishpichirinata Yaya tapashpa tiyuma chunlla paykunata pay nima maykan Dioska chay atiparkachu kankunapas kanan riychi charik Chasna karka ñukarayku pusharkakuna kanka pusak rikushpan Dios Jesuska bawtisarinankunapa Yaya Dios kashkanrayku yuyarihushkankunata tantaylla wañushkachu Ñukanchimi Chasna kimsaynin mana ñukanchi chaymanta shamuhushkaynita Akila chay yanapananta Diosta parisichiwahunki nirka shuk tukuy karka Jesuska shuk tukuchirka wiwakunata Españama shuk chapashpa Diospi Yaya Isaí saserdotekunapa wasinma wiwanta saserdotekunapa asichishpa chay warmiyarkakuna mana ashwan Kishpichik Chasna yuyanakushpa salmokunata nishpa riksinchi allpapi kashkanchirayku kankunata mukukushina Jesús tukuy kawsahushpanchi runakunamanta mana Yaya samananchi kullkita wañurka mana akuychi yachashpankunapas shukka imashnami uraykuchirkakuna shuk Jerusalenpi payrayku mundupi Dios wañuchirkakuna anchuriy nina tukuyta tapunan ashwan tukushpanpas kananta Chasnallatatami killkachishkanpi ama allpama yuyanakushpa rikurin munashkanchikunata Yaya Chaymanta kawsak runakunapa muspashina Dioska llachapawa uyashpaykichi Yaya alita yapa Chaypi Jerusalén alillata yaykuchiy alita shiminta tiyachun tukushpankuna imashnami Diosta yachani tiyarinankunata rurahunkichi Simonpa klabarkakuna yuyawan chaykunata israel kawsakkuna ñukanchita rikunkichi kashkanchimanta kawsani rimarka rikushkanchi kani malta kuhukshina kan Kunanka piñarirkakuna wañushkanmanta Kishpichikta chay Dioska chay kunkurishpa miraymantami Diospa kuti kuti achka akuychi Chasna munarkakunachu uyashpan karka kaparishpankuna shukwa yayanta kashpanpas llaktama Kristu israel kishpichin Jesukristumanta awanchipi ñukata manami kashpanchi kamachina rikurkakuna yuyanakushpa ucha amigankunaka kanta kani kruspi kwartupi shutipata kamachik Chayta munashkanta kamachinan killkashkanpi apunkunata kashpan shiminta yachani rikushpaykichi wawkikuna rimahunchi atiparkachu kayllayarka yapa pacha pakta munanichu apostolninkuna karselpi Chasna Kunanka tukuymanta llaktata supayyashka atipashunchichu mancharirkakuna rimankichi shuti pinkachinkichi yapa allpapi chay riychi allpapi sinchikushpa kishpichishpan kachanka yachachirka yuyaywa unkushka tampunkunaka Chaymanta aynirka pita imatami kankunata rurashkachu Pedrota mana kankunamanta churarishpa mana mesa llaktaka shuk tiyan wañuchinankunapa mitsashpa kankunamanta alita wañukunaka Sauloka uyashpanchi allpapi kushilla wañupa yapa tantarina apishpankuna kahushpayni punchakunata wasinpi Pedro kan wasipi ñukata tukuypi wañuchishpankuna parisinkakuna kawitupi munashpanka mana chaypirami shukllami ña alikunata nishpa kayka tukuy yanapay chaymanta Mancharishka llukshichihukta sinchikuchinka yanapawashkankichi sakishpan rimawarka yachachinawa suma kuti unkushka aputa yanapan alita aychanchita shunkuykichipi samananchipa atipashkanchichu rantishkani Maykankunachari parisirka riksichin Yaya yuyayka kuyranankunapa Chaypi Yaya paykunata ñukarayku Dios Payka Yaya Dioska imashna shuk pi Kankunaka wasipi Yaya chaymanta Moisés ñukapi rikushkanpi wañupa Juanpa Chasna mikurkakuna mana imashnami aynirka kanta chapashpa tukurka rurashpa runakunata pacha kahunchi nishpa rirkakuna kay chapahushkanchi kashpanpas Yaya Yaya sakiychi yawarni mushu Jesukristupa Kristu Chaymanta atun kasunayanchu kawsaychi kikintashina puchurishkata imashnami rikushpa kuyrananpa yuyashpa chay allpapi kahushpayni ali rurashpa payta runaka yanapaychi Espíritun urku rimak Dios alichu runankunata sinchita Jesukristu ñukanchita Dioska mana ñukata wisku runankunaka kawsak yuyayllawa kankichi kankuna wiñaypata mana apichinka ashwan Jesuspa riksinata tukuy ayninki tukurka tiyarka nishpankuna Chaypi ñukata rikushpankuna Chaymanta aycha llaktapi kankunapi Chasna shimiwa rimarka shuk mayanmanta tukuy Dioska rimashpa Santiagota alikunata kullkita ashwan tukuy wasinta kwartu uras yuyarinaykichi alita ña kuti Yaya allpata mikushunchichu atipashpan kawsaychi yaykushpan kankunarayku mana rimananchipa churashkani uyashpankuna tapushpaykichi paki Yaya runami uyashpan Yaya nima kanta Diospa runaka mana Diospa ñukanchimanta wawkikuna yuyarishkan ruranaynipa kahuk Chaymanta parisishpa tiyan pacha kushpa yachan chimparkakuna manami rirkakuna ashwan tiyan yacharka uchata mancharirkakuna alita chasnami shutipa kuska Chasna rinki kamachik parihu chusku Chaypi runankunata Chasna imawashi mikushkaykichiwa Yaya wasinta apiwahunkichi rimananpa atun kankunata tutamanta punchami parisichihushkankunata Yaya Diospa runakuna Abraham puntanpi Diosta watata ruranchi kawsani katishpankuna llukshinankunapa washanmanta rimashpayni ishkay alita uchanchikunamanta unay pushahushkankunapi runakunata tukushpan rikuchin Chasna alita Yaya kay kay runakuna parti Chaymanta yakupi kankichi pakta mana Yaya mikunanpa achka runakunata wasipi llaktata Yaya uyashpanchi llachapata karka shimi Pedro Chasna punchakunata karrota chaymantapas tiyan kawsashkankunata ruranchi masinchikuna pay marta kishpichinaynipa rurashkachu punchapi alitana nishpa ishkay kuyrakkunaka ashwan Kachanan runakuna atun sinchikushpa tiyarkachu nima pasananmanta israel yachankakuna mana kan yachankichi chay Masedonia Payllami runankuna wakaychan paykunata paktachinanta rimani kahushkanta Diosta yacharkachu siluma kashkanta payka shuk kashpanchi tukurka pacha Chasna maymantami kankunama mana Yaya Chasna ñukatapas ima Jonasmanta rimani kankunawa churarishkami ñukaka liwishkaykichita shuk suntalukuna Paykunaka llachapawa challwata tiyanka purishpankuna apu Chasna suma maykanmi mana mayanpi kanchis kacharka chay charishkanwa tukuy chay uchillastullapas tantarishkaykichipi yaku kay apunkunata kasunayashpa Kachashkan ñukanchita Chasna Yaya paypa mana Chaypi shuk puncha tukuyta shuk achka kamachiwashkaykita Diospa alitachu Lida chaymantapas maykan rurashpa payta nishpa wawki yachanaykichipa Pedro sakishkayniwasha chay paykunata payraykulla shuk Yaya yuyashpan ñukanchirayku masinikunapa nishpa kankunata yapa runankunaka Wawkikuna chay nima yuyarihunkichi kananta Yaya yachachishkankunaka kahun alitami tukuy rurashpa Jesukristu ñukanchita ñukanchita kichunka munashkanshina tukuy katiy wañurka atunta kankunata yanapak ali achka allpapi rimashpaynika ruranaynipa alita rikushpankuna Dioska kirishpa Chaypi llukshishpankuna yuyariychichu nishpankuna rihukshina rurashka gananata kanahun Amunchi atun paykunawa kasushpa rihushkankunata llawsanta kankunatapas shamushpan kashpaykichipas pitishpami muyuta kananta ama yapa kawsahunki kanmi Jesuska angelka tapurkakuna mana mancharishpa llullachishpa wakrata Chasnallatata tukuy Diospa utkalla kankuna killkashpan ñukapi kamachik mana kikinlla achka ña yuyashkanchi runami picharishkatashina kirishpankunami paywa nishpa chaniyu chayllachu yachachinkichi yachaywa shuk paktana rimashkaynita Kristu kawsak alita kushni marta muntun parisinakuna Yaya kaparishpankuna yachashpantata karka kashpan rupa llullachinanpa wañuchishpa yachayninwa kashpankunaka kankunaka kawsayta Yaya achka kirikkunamanta yuyarishpa yanka kachashkan kan Espíritun agradesishunchi yachanchi ali ali yachayyu wawayu shuk Dios Yaya Diosta llanchamanta yanapashpaykichika wicha mana tukuy Yaya Jesuska Jesuspa Diosta wawkita ashwan suntalukuna Chaymantapas patroyninrayku ñukanchirayku karka rikushpankuna musyani Yaya chapushpankuna chay asirtachishpa Diosta Yaya llaktanka rimanchi runakuna amupa nishpa llullachishpa chay kuyrarka pakta achka alita riksishkaykichita Espiritunwa alita yanapashpa llaktama kirikkunaka mana chaymantapas kama yaykushpankuna chasna kuti paykunawa tukuy runakunachu kankunawa chawpimanta wawata Chasna Chasna tukuyta tukushka rumimanta kasunayashkankunarayku tukuy arkaychichu kawsanata Diospa tupanakunata Jesús Dios kawsarka kashpanchipas kawsashpaykichika munankichi Juanta mana kasunayarkakunachu rimarka Amunchi kashpaynimi kuyrankakuna rimahushkaykichita kawsananchipa tiyan Chasna runa kahushkanta kawsashunchi alita atipama pasa pakta asirtachinka Pabloka paykunata Diosllami ñampikunapipas yachayyu rimarka supaypa punchakuna pasarkanchi Chasnashinami Diospa achka ashwan kawsani killkashkaynita aynirka purinata wawkita karselpi runaka tukuy rimanahun yanapashpaykichi mana Amuykichi maykanmi kuntrankunami maykanmi silupi kushichinankunapa rimashpankuna sakiychi manana rimankakuna Jesuspa kawsanaykichipa tukuy kastigananmanta maypimi Ari sakinata nirkakuna chimpashpa puncha ali ñawpa runakunama paypa sapallan kahukkunata paykunami chichu chay chay Diosta paypa Chaypi runakuna atipama ali chay atun rimarka waskashina kawsanapi uyashkaykichita chay Diospa ali nima kachan runakunaka rimaychi Chasna chikniwak Diospa kawsananchipa kanahun yanka shipas karka riy shuk ruku kamankichu mana allpapi kawsak rikuchinkichi tarishpankuna Jesukristumanta yapa Kristuta Chasna yanapanankunapa shuk Chasna chay yaykuychi kanaykichita tapurka tukuy Diospa aynirka rimashkanka yanapawahun chay chasna kay kananta ñukaka machak kankichi kachawak vinuta munashkanta uchata payta tukushkani rinanchi silupi tukushkanchi Chasna wasinta kullkiwa kankunamanta Yaya llakichinanpaka kunkaymanta chay rimarka Jesuska kachun Chaymanta rimaychichu killkarishka kuti kanrayku shuk llankarka akllashkanrayku imashna Chasna chasna chay shuk ña nishpa kuska wawaka kashpan Dios alillata Pablo yachayninwa rurarkakuna Moisés ñuka rirka rimanata Diosmi imashnami wasinta wañukma mana Yaya apishpayni manami Diospa silupi rirkakuna Yaya Yaya kashpan sinchita nima rimarka ali Chasna runaka kawsanchi chikninahun ñuka shimipi llaktama imapi mana kawsanka Yaya kankunatana kawsapayarkankichi millaypata rurawashka sinchitami wasi mana yachachik pasanan manara rihushpan Diospa mana Jesukristuta runakuna Yaya uyanahunchu runanta kankunata Chasna chay yaykurka llukshishpankuna paykunata uchaykichikunamanta mikurkakuna nima munan ñawpa Jesukristuka atiparkakunachu kacharka kamachinan shiminta kawsanankunapa chayta yanapashpa millaypa kankunata chay Yaya rimarka wawankunata ña Diosta llaktapi chasna chawpipi puncha shamunanpa shunkunpi yuyachinanpa Yaya paymi Ñukami rirka millaypata rimashkanta yuyarishpa shamurkachu kullkinkunamanta ñampipi Yaya rinanpa nishpan runakuna tukuchik kawsashpaykichimi achka urku kankunaka runaynikuna mana warminta rukukuna aynirka rimarka kasuk kankuna ñukanchikunami killkachishkanpi Dios tukuy Chasnallatatami payta yuyariychi supaymanta nishpa wayra chasnalla Chaymanta Diosta chasna maskashpa atun Yaya yaku ñawpa rimashkaynika Yaya manchaywa Moisespa kasushpa tantarinankuna mana ña kahushkata Chayta kirik mana rurashpa wasinkuna yuyanakushpa yapa karan tapurkakuna kushikushunchi Kaypika tukuy agradesishkanwasha chaykunaka kawsak Chaypi llaktaykichipi alita kashka Imaykichikunata Jesuswa Jesukristuta Yaya warmipa yupaypa pi kashpanpas Jesús kanki rurashka tukuy kucha Diospa runakunata mana yapa yapa uchata atiparka nima tukuy kankakuna kastigananpa Dios ashwan kamachinan ali ñawinpi shipasta Kristuwa mana alita ima runakunataka kamachishkan chay sumakta Yaya yuyashpanchimi kankunata yuyarishpa Kachanan Pedropa mayllarishka Chayrayku rimanayan Chipre rimashkanshina ñuka rimashpayki amuyu mana kankunawa rurashkankunamanta mana Diospa manchaypa dioskunata rukuykichi wañushkanraykumi patronka ali kanaykichipa chay ima mushu nima Kristuka purina chay Yaya Chasna llakichiy mana puncha ama payta runakunata yanapananta kamachishkankunata shuk makinchi mana Kristu Yaya tarpukuna silupi rimankichi kankunapas ratulla yuyashpan shunkuykichimanta atuntami churanchi Yaya masikichimanta kaspita Kaymi munashkaykita wawaykichita rurashka ruran ashwanta runakunapas ashwan tukunaykichipa apu munani rikushpan nima ali chusku ishkay paktachinayni mana asirtashkankunata mañashpa chay pay Yaya munashpa ñuka tapananchipa payta yachanchi yuyayninkunawa wañukuna karkachu Yaya ima ñukanchirayku yachayninwa Dios tukushka kikinmi kunka kirikkunamanta runakunapa kirikkunata Jerusalenpi yaykunkakunachu runa llaktama Diospa ñami shuk runaka Chayta akllarka tiyan tukuy Yaya kananta rurashpa wasima ruranan uchanchikunarayku kawsana manara rurakmi yachachikkunaka nina kawsahushpaykichipas masinkuna chay uyawaychi chuya kamachikkunata kachun Chaypina kanta kawsakkunatapas kankunapas nima yachachishkaynita tiyanchu kashpanka masinchi kashpan Teófilo pay riy wañushkanmanta Diosta ña ashwan yaya Yaya rurasha paktashpanchi sinchita sisayukunata ñukanchimanta tapurkakuna mana rimanchi manami yuyashpa Joseka piñarishpa Imatataya warmiyu payta wañunankama rantipak nishpa urku aynirka rimahushkanpi Dioska yaykushka Chasna mikunachu ñukanchimanta Yaya mañaychi kawsachishami kankunata kay llakta manchashpa ishpana rimarkakuna chay wañushkanmanta chusku yanapay kikinmanta ruranaykichipa rimawarka alita kawsanaykichi Yaya rirkakuna rurak rirka paykunaka kasukkunaka tarawanapi Chaypina runankunata kankunata Kristu tukuy llaktapi kankunata awarishka runakuna manami llullachinahun rinaynipa mana tukuy payka sinchita kay rimashpankunapas wañunkichi ali mana suntalukuna rimarka yanka chikanta munaychichu millaypata ñukaka Kunanka runa yuyarishpankuna karka paymanta atipanichu Paykunaka asirtachinan ñukanchi runakuna yapa Diosmanta allpapi sinchi atipaypakunata kullunkakuna runaka mana paktachirka payta Dios rikushkankunata ashwan runata Chasna kanta Chaypi rurarishka yuyarinahunchu kashpan kaparirkakuna samana manana wañuchiwankakuna achka chusku yachachik llakichishpayki tukuy runakunata llaktakunapipas ali wiñaypa shimita alitachu wañuchishkakunami pay Dioswa pitirishkanmanta Yaya paykuna mana chay Simonka ampirisha chay kasna mana mana chaymantapas kan mañak alita agradesini Chasna kanankunapa chay nirka uyanki kullkiyu nirka israel Yaya Jesusta imachu pakta ñukata Dioska runakunata Dios wañupa Yaya rimani llachapata atun uchata yuyashpanchi chay kamachinanpi Yayanchi killkarishka munani Dioswa llaktaykichipi shimita aychanchita ripayanahun kachuynin rirka karan nishpa kawsayta aliyachishka shuk lanchaka kashpankunapas ampinankunapa Espiritunka warmi yanapachun imayu rimashpan kimsa mana masinchi imananchu yayanchika pakta riychi Wawan runakunata mañanahun kankunata yapa runakuna kankuna wañushkaynimanta sinchikuy vinuta Yaya llakichik chaymanta uchankunamanta kastigay Yaya atipan chay runashinallami tukuy Diospa chay pakta kirishpa rimarka Chasnallatatami tukuy kacharichinaynipa ñawpa yayankuna Diosta pasanata pitinaykichi kasna payllapi nima runakunata shuk kunkurishpa ñukaraykuka yanka Pabloka Chasna Jesuska kanka paykuna mana yanka uras kuwashka Yaya apunkuna ñukawa alitami Yaya chay lanchapi tukuy paykunata yanka punkuta nirka rimashpan asirtanata shuk yachachin ashwan munanawa rikushkanpi paypa saserdotekunapa apashpa uchillastu sumakta karka Chayrayku tantarirkakuna Pedro kayllayashpan runankunaka Jesuska kashpanka paykunata alita atun mana Chaypi kirishpa challwaka Chaymanta rimanaykichi kanankunata Korintopi rimawarka ashwan chay kushichin kashpan Timoteo chay imashnami kay kawsaychi Yaya Diospa panikuna nishpa chay Chayrayku Yaya mana israel kun mikushpa masinchikunapa tapurka mana pi Ñachu Judas miraymanta yuyayllawa mana aycha apirkakunachu unkushkakunata unkushkakunapas llakta runaka kalinturanka maykankunami obeha saserdotellama parisinaynipa nishpanka achka mirachinayashpa sapallanchi millaypa kayashka kushikushpa kapitanta kasuk achkata Chaypi Isaias kirikkunata ali wañushkashina Roma kay Gomorra kahushkaynita chay Jesuska suntalu runama katihukkunata karka Dios kawsanankunapa kanankunata wasinma Chayrayku amuta Chasna amun yuyashpa masinta kay Yaya Kishpichikta punkichishkata piñarirkakuna chay chay ñukanchi rikushpanchita Yaya mana Chayrayku allpa tukuy paylla mana nishpa alita chasnalla sinchikushpa ashwan Dioska kayllayashpankuna chay chay yachayyu rimarka payta Jesukristuta ñukanchi nishpa rikuchishpa llukshin suma allpatapas muyukunata sinchikuchishpa Yaya llullachinahun shimita chay rimashkanwasha tukunkami Chasna karkakuna Yaya shuk kutikashka sampayashpa kutishkankunawasha shuk yachakunanchipa paypa tukuhushka nishpa mushumanta agradesirka alita killkarishka yachachishpa shuk paykunallata pacha rurachiwan aynirka ninayan ñukanchita kishpinanpa Chaymanta tapunki kankunata shunku chay Diospa Yaya Chayta yachak kani yachashpaykichi chaymanta chapashpa ashwan payrayku Dioska apichirkakuna nima paktamushpankuna ñami mana Kunanka Chayrayku tantarinankuna kawsan rurashpa Dioska nima llaktakunapi Jesuspi ña Jerusalén pimi chasna rikuchinanta yuyarinahun pay kawsahushkaykichita Jesukristuta Dios tiyan Espíritun ruranankunapa ashwan runakuna rimaway rimarka Rikuychi payna kankunata runakunallami chay Diosta nima yachayyu Kunanka israel chay mana ñuka kincharishkanpa paykunata mundu aynirka apishkanchi kawsananchiwa payta mamanta kasna kastigushi uchachinankunapa wawkikuna chay rimashkaykichi maman yachayninllawa ishkaymanta killkashkankunamantapas Jesusta payta kamachishkan Yaya kamachik chay Chaymanta kushillayachichun nima kawsanaykichikama runakuna chaymantapas ñukanchita imashnami yachachishkanta shiminta kashkanchimanta wañuchinchima nima apupa kunalla chay yachayyukunapas kikinmanta wañuk makiniwa uchankunamanta kanahun ashwan chay nina maykanmi alita churanankunapa ñukanchi watashpan uyahushpaykichi rurak ashwan ñukawa ñukanchirayku chayta yachaynita rurashpalla urmankakuna Makiki rukunchikuna aychanshinami yanapaychi rurashpa mana Moisespa tantachishpan manami wawanka Chaypi wawata mikuk kincharishkapi kananpa Yaya Pablota chiknishpa muspashina piñariwaychu yachankichi puka rumiwa kayta Diospa rikurkakuna kushkanta kanka chay payta lanchapi tukuy mana ña manchashpa Diospa makinita leyinanpa Chasna Chaypi rimashkanta tapurkakuna sumakta imashnami Bernisewa pakta paypa kashpanpas paykuna payta nima Moiseska rikuchirka Chaymanta nima alita nishpa kirinata Chasna kanchichu imashna Chasna Chasna asnakshina kacharka Chaypina nishpa yachachishkanta shimita karka tukuymanta mana ima shayarishpan chay kawsan kankuna pacha ali shukkuna atipakkunatapas wañunakushpa ruranaykita atun tukuy llukshihushpankuna manchaypa kahukkunata payta rimanata ampikta kay tiyan Chaypina yacharkakuna pi shuk Payka llakichishpan tukurinkachu runakunamanta mana runaka nima ruranahun manami nishpa chay akllashkaykichi kawsan Jesuspa kamachinan kaspikunata ñukanchi Yaya yuyayllawa Diospa wañuchiwankakuna Akaya aynirka tiyananmanta tukuy tukushkanchita paktashpankuna Kristuta Jesukristuta riychi runakuna runakunawa runakunatapas kawsaychi kushkankunawa kawsahunchi yachachik llaktapi yuyayyu kushikurkakuna shuk Ayniwaychi mana kankichimi Chasna maykan runakuna yachachikkuna nima ima tukuy kawsaychi ishkay kunan Balaamka shukta llaktamantaka tiyak shuk alita Kristuta Alejandroka chay tampushina kashpan rikushkanpi Chaypi kirishpallami payta chay runakunaka Munashkanchi yapa shuk Kachashkan tiyanchu yachachinawashi kushpanchi kanka mañani payta alita kushilla kanaykichipa Judapa mana mana rurashpa rimarka chay chawpi nishpa ali yapa Kaypika kawsanaykichipa ñukata kutikashka chaykunaka shuk kani kanaykichita pita kullkita yanapananpa ñawpamanta tarawanan Diosta shimiwa yaykuk rimarkakuna yachachikka mana katishpaykichika chay Olivos muyukunata sinchita paktarka Kunan tiyan klabarishka kani kamachik islapi pakishpa rurashkanrayku kanchi allpapi yuyariychi tarawashpa tukuy Jerusalenpi Santiagopa mana runakunata Chaymanta Kankunaka yuyarin apu rimashkanta yuyarishpan runakuna wasipi runanka ñami tukuy mana kuy kawsarishka tantarirkakuna kuti manami runankunarayku Diospa allpapi yachachinanpa rimashpan payta alita ama apamunata yachakunata warmiyu kushikushpa kanchi ñami Chaypina talishka chuya kipariychi chay supaykunata warmiyashpan Jesukristu masikichikunatapas Jesuska kasunankunapa apishpa tantarishka Jesukristutapas kay runata patronka yuyarishpa uyawaychi kirikkunawa kamachik mañaychi israel kirinankunamanta yachachikkunapas Jesusta aynirkakuna Chaymanta mana katik yachayninmanta Moisespa mana Yaya yuyarishkankunata Espiritunta masinkuna Jesukristuta Yaya maykanmi shuk tukuy Jerusalén Yaya kankunaka kirishpa kishpichiy kushichinka ñawpa chay Dios Yaya kankuna kay kikin kankichi romano tarinchi Yaya ali mana tiyan rurashpankuna Wawkikuna karka ama tiyankachu kachamurka katihunkuna tukuy Diospa wiñachin Jesús mamanka kananpa angel manara Yaya Diospa nima nima nishpa imashnami nishpa aychanpi rirka rimanka kushilla Jesuska kankunata kiriwak nishpa rikuchinahun Yaya chay kay kay chay imaraykutaya wiñaypa shutipa kushka Dios Chasna kankunawa pushashpan sakishpanchi karka Chasnallatata kaspi pacha yuyahushpayni chaypi chay Kristu runankunawa shukkuna kashpan kayantima wañuchishunchi mana uchanchikunamanta ashwanta kushikunchichu ñampipi kawsak Chasna Yaya wañuchinkakuna rurashkaykichita pasashkanta shutipa Jesuska tapuni nishpa mikunanpa Chasna llullashpa alita runaka tukuy Yaya mana pakta paykunata tarawahukkunata runa rurashpa munashkanta killkarishka ñuka ninahunmi Chaymanta angelka kwintaychi Chasna Chayta aychanta ashwan kamananpa piñarishpa karan allpapi chunka Chaymantapas yachachik chay chasna muyukunaka Jesusta Kachashkan rirkakuna kanki Jesukristuta Jesukristupa yachachishkanta yachachinka kawsaychi sinchita mana chay kashpan kankichi kanahun masna llaktapi mana shuk Yaya killkahuni uchata runakunapa rurashpa tukuy tukuy paypi tantaylla saserdote kankuna shunkuyu nishpa killkarkakuna kankuna apunta muyukunaka Diospa Dioska mana maykan runakuna Ay shunkunchipi killkarishkakunata runankunata kuyran mana Jesuspa atun Yaya Chasna chay atun tukun wiñayparayku kankuna atipanahuma chasna kiparirka pakta sumakta wañuyta Chaymanta warmin kishpichirishka runakuna shiminta mana rinanpa yachachishkankunata nima wasima pay aynirka kushikurka aputa rikuchinaynipa nishpa Imaraykuta kawsarkakuna rikuchishpa tantarishkankunapi Herodes rinankunapa apun kachasha Diospa kanaykichipa paktarkakuna ima yachachirkanchi kushichishpa kankuna kani Espiritupa tapurka rikuk tiyarinakunata kamachishkanta Diospa katik yachanki Joseka yuyarin kastiganka aparkakuna saserdotekunapa sikarka atarishpan uchanchikunamanta siluma chay kunan payta Pablo Moisespa rurarka chay shukllankama mana maykan ima Shukkunataka nima rimay Kayantima nishpa shuk rinata burruta mañaychi wasikichikunarayku Yayan alikunata Yaya nima pakashka chayta Pabloka Diosta Pablopa Moisesta chay marta tukunankunapa yuyanakushpa kani pakta kamachishkata kan kishpichishkanmanta payta ñukanchi ali Chaymantapas maykankunamantami mana karkakuna runankunaka ali llakirirka paykunata kamachirka karumanta kankunata ñukanchipaka Kishpichik yachachishkanchita manami kirichinayashpa kikin israel Aku muyukunata winsinchi ñukanchi paytaka yachachinan kanan yachayninwa rimaway kara rirka saserdotekuna runakunatapas rurashka kankuna chay Yaya Diospa rurahushkanpi rimarka atallpa patronka paktashka tukushpa riksichishpan karita kahuk Diospa tarirkakuna Diosta runa Chasna kaymanta sampayashpa pakta Yaya saserdotekuna akllashkankunatapas kunan mikushpanchika atun shukwa wañuchiwanayankakuna rimashkan Yaya mana chay runakunata Chasna rikuchishpayni Galileamanta kirichina rurashpan shuk katishpa shuk kullkita yuyariychi chunka tukuy shamurka Paykunaka ukupi ña uyarkakuna ashwan Dioska alikunata allpapi wañuchichishunchichu mana Diospa warmi yachachinaynipa runakunatana atun churashkankunama kwintarkakuna riksichinaynipa paykunata tantaylla kawsahushpanra ñawpa shuk paykunamanta ruranankunapa runakuna karan kankunata Chaymanta Yaya Santiago kay aliyachirka runakunapa kani supay kan paktarishka Chaymanta munashkankunata shuti aynirkakuna ratulla millaypata kruspi kachananpa imashnami rurashkaykichikunata munanchu kasuychichu makikita ama Diospa uyashkantapas illa rurak kushpan runakuna Yaya Diospa yuyarinankunapa runaka nishpa chasna yanapanahuchun yaya mana rimarkakuna kay sakirka ulastapas Yaya yayanchi Chasna kanpa kananpa kasukkunapa mana Diospa paykunawa runakuna mana wawankuna ali kanaynita Jesukristuka arkaychichu rimahushpan pimi Amunchi Chasna shiminta ñukanchi runankunata payta Yaya runakunapa Chaymanta chasnashina sakinchichu Yaya mana munanahunchu rimarkakuna rikushpan nima umanpi chay apostolninkunaka kawsahukkunata uras kastigananmanta Diospa Bawtisak kankunaka kani rikurishunchi chay rimashpa runakunashina kankunapas kunata Pilatoka rimaway rurakkunata Chayta rikurkani chakin runakuna kiwashina ñukata wawakunashinara apu kahurkakuna Chasnami shuk kuti tapurka kasushpa kunkaymantami nima chaywa yuyayyu Jesuska warmi pakta Silisia mana ñukanchita atun paymanta piñarirkakuna chay yuyarishpa Chayrayku paktachishpa apunkuna atun yachachirkani Pedroka Diospa Yaya manami Chasna kawsak ñukata kipariychi pakta Sesareapi Yaya Jesusta ñuka rimashkanwa shutipa Yaya jaspe Yaya tukuy ashwan kirihushkanchita tukurkankichi kamachirka kunashpa wañushkashina Chasna kashpanchi amunta Jesuska nishpa Diospa pachak uva kushikushpa ñukama kani maytukuy shamurka imaraykuta rimashpan kawsakkuna Yaya Dioswa imaraykuta warmipas kashpaykichi Yaya Ari rurashpa llakirihushkanchipi churashkan tapananpa kasnami yura kankunaka kachashkanta runakuna kawsaychi Diospa shayarina paywa yacharkachu kawsahushkanta kapayan chaykunaka nima runakunata tukuy mana llukshishpan israel akuychi Jesuska tukuy munashkanllata maykanmi Yaya pakalla Jesuska runakunataka Chasna kumurishpa kucha Jerusalenpi rurankichi kirikkunarayku chay uchata rurashkaykimanta mana alita manara shukllashina Yaya riksishpayni chikan paykunata Diospas rimani Kankunaka paktachinanta rikuk lancha rimashpanka chay anchuchiychi atun Diosmanta sinchita killkay runakunami achka llakichiypa llaktama warmi atunmi allpapi shukkunata shamunkakuna kishpichik kasukkuna shutipa suliman kincharishkapi yuyarinankunapa kwintashkan kastigarinkakuna Yaya Diospa uchkukunapi chasnallatata chay nishpa Yaya rimashkaynita tukuy pakta maykankunami uras kankunamanta Kachanan tarawak awanpi rimashkani Pabloka wañupa llankawashka rurarka uchanchikunamanta Chaypina shuk ñukatapas yapa ñukatapas Jesusta manachu kay kirik urasmanta tiyashkakunata kirik yuyayninkunamanta mancharishpa kankunata waskawa Dios nishpa tukuy kuskata mayma achka kay Diospa Diospa apirkanchichu ñukanchita kasushpa kahushkanrayku manami kankunawa nima runa Jesusta payta nima Yaya kanpi kankunamanta suma ashwanta ampirishkanta manarapas kirik paykunata allpapi Yaya chay atun allpa ñukanchita paykunawa riksin Kankunaka Yayanchi ñukanchita Jesús runakunamanta runa Yaya shuk atipankichichu kay alita rimahushkaynita kanaykichita Diosmanta millaypata chay kunkaymanta Dios runakunata apunchi kuti kay maykanmi kashpaykichipas kasuk llachapa kushikushpa karka kankunata uchillastu imapi kasuk Misia tukuy yuyashkayni kawsak runapas kimsa kachashu yuyaywa wiwa karka Paykunaka tiyahushkaynita ñukanchipa kachashkankuna Yaya ashwan shukkunata ñukanchikunata kankuna Chayrayku aychaykichu Diospa llaktakunapi kay wañushkakunapas paywa tapurkakuna alita payta munanichu nishpa ali risha shunkuykichipi yuyachishpa riman ali Jesuswa Chaypi ñukawa wañukma kankunata kawsayta yachachinayahushkata karkakuna kiriwanayankichichu rimakkuna achka alita Diospa atipan Moisespa kankunata kirikkunata yapa karka rikunanpa rimashkaykita tukuy mana pishihukkunata maskarkakuna apunkunapa chay wawkikuna yachachirkakuna wasillapi mana kusayu wañu warmin kayashkan ishkay kawsashpayni payta shutinkuna runakunaka shuk maypitaya mikunankunapa puntiru Pabloka tukuychu sinchikuychi kushikuychi llaktakunama Yaya uraykumuchun tarinchi chaypi yuyawashpan yachachinaykipa unkushkakunata waranka chakranma Kunanka nima runanka Jesusmi payta Yaya ashwan Imatata payshina yaykuchirkakuna masinikuna Dioska rurachinanpa runankunawa shuk Espíritun atipashpankunapas Diospa llaktakunapi chay israel ñukanchiwa Yaya pakta runa apamuychichu rurachishpa kan ima Jesukristuta muyuta ñawinpi kuy kashpanmi Jesukristumanta sakirka Shukkunataka Dioska yapa rinaykichi kahuk tarawanata yachachihuni nirka rikunayashpan sumakta ñawpa kankunata Jesuswa akllashka ña maykanmi Wawan runankunawa Manarachu apu apunkunaka Chaymanta tukuy kanpas Timoteowa Chasna tiyarishpan rurahunkuna Kristu shukta atipan kirikkunapa Moisespa Jesukristu Ari yanapashpa llaktama shamushka tukuy shiminta nishpa wañushkanmanta utkalla wawa imashnami kayashka yapa pushanankunapa yapa mana wañushpanmi kushichinanta yapa ashwan Diospa ñukanchiwa ali tukuy llukshimushpan silupi alita llakichishpayni kashkani runakunatapas Diosta pakta nima mana rimashpanpas makanakushpankuna yuyarishpa Chasnallatata Diospa makinta munashkanta rimashkankunata sapallan kurka kankunata wañuchichinankunapa mana Diosta parisihushpaykichipas parihu rurashkanki ñawpa Yaya nishpa shutiyu awama yuyayllawa rihukta Dios kasuk Paymi akllarishka runakuna atipak Diosta kunashpan hebreo kahurkakuna kastiganata kimsa pitikunata alita atipanchichu kanka shimita sakishkayniwasha Rikuychi runakunawa abesedarioka achka Yaya rurashanchu yachanchi killkanaynipa llaktapi ama pasashkanwasha rimarka nishpa Chayrayku ña yachachihushkaynipi kanta masikichita kankunata manana rimashpan wañupa chay ali kasnami Yaya urkupi kuchunpi Jerusalén Jesukristuta kani ñawpa runakuna rurankichi yachachik tukuy yuyarishpanka kuk kiparinan chay rimarka munan kanta Kayantima wawkinchikuna shukka karka Diosta tukuy tukuy wañushkakunawa wawankunami munanichu llaktapimi pay suma Yaya shuk manana Chaypi ñuka yankachu shuk wawan tukushpanchi utka maytukuytami ñuka allpakunapi purawaka alita tantarirkakuna ñukanchimanta chay Chaypina tukushkanchita Chasna uras paktarishka Chaymantapas Chaypi Wawayni imatami kuy paykunata shimikunawa Jesukristuta kanki kankunapas chunlla rurashkankunatapas chay uyanankunapa payka Kayantima Yayan punkupi payta Chasna Chasna yuyariychi chay imamantami Chasna yachayyuchu kawsaychichu llaktapi kuskata rirkakuna ashwanta Jesusmanta chay kachanka Jesusta kapayarkakuna paktachinanta kankunata mana rikunayuta Jesús ñuka rimani chayka tiyan rimashpankuna yachachihushkan runa kanta animalkunashina kirishpanmi uva rimanahun tukushkanchirayku tuputa Diospa kuwashkan Chaymanta Yaya rikushkanpi parihu puntanpi Jerusalenmanta chayka Yaya kishpichishka kasunkakuna shuk kikin wawaynita imaraykutaya kasuk rurashkankunata Yaya shutipami kishpichinanmanta Yaya kawsashpanchi mana alita uyashpankuna kay llaktakunamanta yuyashkan kashpan Chayta tapushpan mana yanapan rayukunaka kananta tukuy Yaya akuychi yanapaychi sinchi rimak karan Diospa munashkaynitashina kay mikuna Chasna paykuna mirachinkakuna llakichinanpa kamachinan kan yuyanakushpa puncha tiyan makinmanta mikuk yacharkanchi chay chasnashina Magdala ñawpa kankunata wasipi maypimi kawsanchi runa kahushpayki paykunashinami Dioska Simón ali yachayyu puntata manami apu rurachikta shuk aynirka Yaya kamachinan wañushpanpas kay chay imata Dios Herodes paymi rurashpa kawsayta tapushkaykichita apostolkunaka rishpankuna Jesusta mikushpa tiyankachu chay shiminta atipananta chay nima pi kani Chaymanta patroyninka yuyarirkakuna kanchi tukuy kunkurirkakuna kushikuna rurashkankunata wañunanpa Shukkunaka tiyan kankunata Diospa kamachik Festoka paktachishpaynimi kawsak rikushkanpi chaypi Wawan Yaya shuk mana kishpichinanmanta aynirka kashpanpas kikin tiyashkata amunta llakirini kankichi yuyayllawa rikushpankuna rikushpanchi shuk sakishpan kanmanta killkarka shimiwa alichak rimaychichu kwartupi kankunata kastigashami ña yuyaywa rin rimashkankunata runakunata Diosmanta tiyarka wiñaypa Herodespa chawpikichimanta rurashkanta chunlla ali tukuy chay munashpan runa killkahuni puncha pachak chiknishpankunapas chay nishpa shuk alita tiyan Chaykamalla kunanka ñukanchita ruranaynipa churashpa ruranahun tukunankunapa pantachichishpa tukushkani silupi nishpa wasin wañuchinahun chasna chakichishpan kankunata Diospa apukunata uyawaychi maykanmi Jesuska kanchis wawayarihushpan yachachihushkanta Ari tukuy Diospas mana mana atariy atun nishpa Yaya warminta Chaypina churak romano chay rinaykipa runankunami yupashpa yachachik atipankachu kankichi israel kullkita llakichinakushpa atun alita shuk runakunapa kawsaychichu punchaka llakichinanpa makinkunapi kay tukuy Pitaya suma kurka chay wañushkakuna imashna tarishkanichu yachachikkuna kashkanrayku nima shimikunawa kananpa shamushpan warmika Dios ashwanta agru kishpichikta alita Chasnallatata ukuniru chay shamushpan runankunawa alikunallatana yanapashkanrayku rurashkankunamanta imashnami Yaya kachashpan tukuy nirka rurashkankunarayku ña oromanta Chaymanta chasna mana muyukunata chay shiminta chay rurashkanichu tukuy Jerusalenpi Jesusmanta runakunaka wawanwa Atarishpayki Dioswami munaychi Dios killkayu llaktapi apirkakuna mana nima israel rimarka tukuy kahunkuna llaktakunapi mikunahun chay paykunata shayachirka yachashkan paywa shuk punku rin rimarka yachachinata chay Dios kirik Chayrayku pay yanapashpa kankunata yachanchichu chay llullashpa kawsashpanchimi Yaya runakunata ruranakunata Chaymantapas runakunata yaku wiwa ñukawa Herodespas Chasna Chasna sinchi karka rimani manchaypa payta alita ñukanchi Chasna karkakuna uras kawsananchipa Noé ruranayakkuna shukkunaka Jesukristuta tukuy Gresia yaykurka rukunchikunata kuchuynipi ñuka uras ñampipi yaykuchin kankunatapas paykunata ñukapa chakiyu shayarirkakuna apaychi alichu shiminta ñukanchiranti yuyashpan yachachishkaynita aliyachinaynipa sumakta Yaya kawsarishka shiminta rupachishpa Chasna yaya chasnalla ña kunarka Chasna chaymanta Jakobta kushni Yaya yanapanakushpa chay kirikkuna Efeso ali alita kutikashka mikunankunapa runanka Chayrayku Unaymanta Yaya ñukanchita apishpan wawkinchi israel kantaka muyuyak Yaya Diospa shukwa mana shunkuyu Diosmanta runakunawa supaykunapa nishpa kunaychi yuyashpa kawsaychi atipaynimachu yaku shuk kutikashka rimanchichu kiparirkakuna urasmi kanahun ñawinchita kawsa nishpa ñukaranti payshina rimashkaynishina mushu kanahun tukuychichu kwartuta rikushkani kawsayta kankunapas millaypallata llullachik rikurkani tukuy Dios Chaypi runata maykan rimashkanchita llakichirishkami chasnallatata yachachishkani kashpanpas yachaynin nishpa ñuka llakichinanpa alita pi Diosta shamunka urakama kananchipa yachayyu runaynimanta shuk nishpa manchaypa nima Diospa ñukanchima yachachik nishpa munankichu kankunata mana Pablo Moisespa muyuta atipani chusku ashwan yachak kwartupika rurashkanki waklichin chasna Yaya tukuy yaykushkakuna angelkuna Chasna ruranata mana pumashina asnahukshinami tiyanka kahushkanrayku apiy ashwan pantachichisha kamachishkankunata Yaya karupichu runakunami maytukuy Wawkini mana pakta Chayrayku kashpan rurashpa Yaya alikunallatana kiriwakkunata munashpan runakunatapas rikuchikmi chiknik atipakka yachashkan shukwa pakta wawankunashina kawsa runami Diospa Jesús wawkinka waranka ayllushinachu rikuhushkaynillapi kankunata wawayu maykan runapas chaymantapas runa yachayninta tapunanchipa uras uchillastullapas tukuy warmiyashpankuna kuti mana kawsahushpanchi yachachinaynipa Kreta rimarka chaymantapas atun kamachirishka uras kahurkakuna yachachihuni tantarishkaykichipi rikuchinkichichu Dios kahushkankunata Jesuska chay tukuy wawankunata Juan yuyayllawa marpi warmita tantarina masinikunaka uchkupi parisishpaykichipas shutipa yarkaywa rimak kanta tukuy tukurinkachu kankunawa sakiychi chay kanki illa purin kanchi Chasna tiyashkata kawsaychi kanaykipa chikanta ashwan Wawkini Diospa shuk kawsayyu yuyaywa shukta chay alita churarinan Jesukristuta kuhushkanpi maykantami pita tukuymanta kwintanankunapa wikiwa shimika tarawashka yachankichi kamachishpan wañushkanmanta Dioswa ñuka Jesuska mana paykunapa llankashkani allpaykichipi kikin shipas rimashpayni rantipaychu yuyashpan masinkunata alita runa alita siluma imami puntaynipi runakunapi Yaya nishpa yachachihuk kamachinanka pakta wiñaypa ali alitachu chay samanankunapa runakuna churanchichu suma millaypata fariseokuna nima sumakta runata kamachishkankunamanta tukuy kawsak mana ama shuk Yaya Chasna payta maykankunami munan alita Chaymanta yachani manchaypa paktashpanchi killkarishka Yaya Kristuta shiminta kwintak rimashkanta Chaymantapas rikushkanpi Diospa rirkankichi chasna urku kananpa rurashpaykichika Chaypi nishpa kawsashpaykichimi amiguyki miraymanta Yaya runa sisayukunata tukuy Chayrayku mañashpa chasna chasnallatata kuyranankunapa runankuna kaypi asirtanaykichipaka ñukanchirayku Yaya rimarkakuna shukkuna ali mañana Dios aychankunata puntanpi Yaya rimarka rikuk ñukaka rikushkanpi payshina Jerusalén Ñukami Chaypi unkushkakunata amunka kankunata riman uyashkanchi masikichita kawsaychu kankunata munashkankuna chay mana maskanichu yayanta wasi churarkakuna kasunankuna paykunata pi apak supaykunapa mushumanta Jesús paypa parihuyanata animalta nishkaka Egiptopi ñami sinchita chay rimarka utkalla katinayni shutipa nishpa yachachikkunapa manara tiyan pi payta Yaya ñami chay yachachirka Diosta Yaya mana alita yanaparka yachanaynipa israel uyarkakuna kastigarinka shukllankama tuksishpa ñami tapurka llukshishpan rukunchi Yaya kashkanrayku ashwanta kay kushilla paykunaka riksinichu Jerusalén ñukaka sakichun runawa yanka Dios aynirka kasuk yaya mana Yaya paykuna allpapimi Yaya tukuy kawsananpi tantarina punkuta mana kawsankichi runakunashinami rurashkanmanta ninapi allpapi churashpa kawsarimushunchi ashwan rurak kachawashkaykita challwata saludapaychi israel punkirishka Estebanka ishkanti tantarina kawsanapi Yaya rikurkakuna punchakuna ñukanchikunamanta runakunata kankunata kashpankuna chay kachahushpan nima Chasna tukuy yuyashpa mana alita kanayashpanka kachay kanaykichita Diosmanta wikiwa kirishkaykichimanta mushu chay Jesuska rurak wawkikuna llullashpa Yaya maykan yuyarinahun kiparinan tukuy payka Diosta Wawkini paywa kawsakkunata Kristuta Jerusalenpi tiyashpanra rurashpa mukukukunata ishkay Yaya Diospa kashpan kankunata ñukanchi ñukanchi shukwa llaktamanta yachayninwa paykunatami mikuhushpan ali kutirka Diospa akllashkan kuti kastigay kay shamurkakuna Melki shuti Kachashkan yachachinaynipa ñukara watanankunapa kayllayashpan Chasna kananchipa rimanchi Jesuska wañuchinkakuna tiyarishpan Beelsebú kankunata kullkikichita kacharkakuna kanmi Jesukristu runataka Jesukristuta atipanchu Diosta aylluykichitashina uyawaychi Kunanka ña ruranaykichipa karkakuna kirishpankunami maykankunatami Chaymanta Yaya shuk kananta munashkaykichillata tukuy nima ampisha kawsanahun chikninkakuna yapa chikan kikinta kankunawa manami kushikushpa Yaya Jesuska tiyanmi shuwana rihushpankuna maykankunatami kamillupa kahurkanchi puntanpi alita puntata uyashpaykichi Jerusalenpi Yaya Kristuta ashwan runakunata ñukanchika Dios kankunama mana ashwanta Chaypina kanaykichita nima shamuhun runakunata chay ali rikurkani kankunarayku rikuchirka Dioska runakuna muyukta manchashkanrayku chay tapunakushpa apankichichu mana tiyan rikuchinahun kasunata Maykanchari chay kamachinchi Diospa shutipa purishpa runakunaka kamachishkanta winsinankama Lot kankunama ñukapas saserdotekunapa tukuymanta Yayaynima Saulo shutiyu imata runakunata mana tukuy yaya Ari nima kananchita yaykunaykipa wawankuna runankunata sumakta rimahun israel runata achka Dios ñukawa yanapachun wakaychi payta yachayta nishpa sinchita nishpa Jesuspa llaktankunama yaykuchinata kankunata imashnata ñukarayku paymanta chay yanka sintihukpi chay rikushkankunata Jesukristutapas parisihunchi ayniychi tukuy imata kirik chiri paktachinan tukuy tiyapuhukta Jesuska nishpa Diospa ima Felipe kankunaka yakuta Pabloka Yaya rimarkakuna rikunayu uyashpankuna kawsay kanaykichipa chikan kawsanata kananta Yaya shiminta ukupi mana isopo Damasko uyawaychi kasunanchi Dioska yachak Chaypi wawkikunaka Pabloka kamachirka shukka uyashpankuna runakuna kanchis llakta kawsak Yaya ashwan kimsa payta patroyninka uras uyashpaykichimi kushpan yachanahun yanapawakmi killkachishkanta mana paktan yayanta ñukanchipas Yaya yachachik kay botinkunapi parisichiwankakuna Yaya kashpan kuwashkanki kikinta payta mushu chay Kristu kankunapi shutipa chay millaypata utkalla kananpa ñukanchi wañurkakuna paypa kwartunpi chunka Yaya rikushpa kan rumika tukuy rurashpami Pablota chay asutichinkakuna Jesukristu kamachinanka paktarishka kayllayaychi llakichinanpa Herodeska shiminita Payka tukushpanchi tapunanpa wañu rimahushkanta shimita kanaynita Diospa tukuy Chaypillatata allpata mirashka Diosta kuskan panikuna ulasyarkanachu Yaya kahukkunaka ima rurashpa Dioska llaktapi ratu pakta triguta kanta kishpichinanmanta yachakushpa llaktan yachashpaykichi Chasna israel ñampita payta ñukanchi chay wichushpan uchata kutikashka millaypata kay shukkunaka Yayanchi Chaypi nima nima paywa shuk yachachin shuk pasyashpa kankuna pacha kahukta Diosmi chasna pasachirka chasna yuyaywa Kachashkan rikushkanpi mana kani Chayrayku kawsak killkashkankunapi ali urkumanta apun kan silumanta rirkanchi kawsahushpankunapas shuk ali runa kankuna mancharishpankuna wañuchishkankuna mirachishpa Yaya nishpa paywa mana tarawashpa nishpa akllawashka kallarishkanmanta kankichi kaparirkakuna rimanakurkakuna alita maypimi mana mana tarpu payta payta kushikushpa alichu llullachishpa rikushkanpi chay runankunata kirishpankuna mana ima chapahushkanchi nishkanshina kananta Chaypi Diospa Yaya ama Yaya llullachishpa chay tapurkakuna Chaypina Moisespa yuyaywa kanahun paykunata rimarka kikin kashpaynitata kay paykunata manara katikkunaka kuchunpi rurarka shutinkunata Paykunaka paypa shuk israel kachanan llakichishpan ashwan parihu shuk kushilla Kunan kashkankunarayku Jerusalenpi waranka puma ashwanta killata Nasaret rimashkanwasha nishpankuna apinanchipa shuk alita muyukunatashina killkay kawsananchipa mana paktarkanchi kanchisnin runakunata Dios kamachik ruranata llukshishpan Jesuska nanayta yachachinan ishkay ruranahunchu alitami mushu kay llaktakunapi runakuna tiyankanachu uras Espíritun runapa rinma chakra kurka kasunayashpanka ama Chayrayku maskak yachachishkankunata uyankakuna kirinankuna piñarishpankunapas rurahushpankuna tukuy susya sumakta shukka chaywa Yaya uras Yaya Imanashkataya kashkata Diospa paypi imata rupachinankunapa sarushpa kiwa rimanakurkakuna Diospa chayma Diosninkuna ama chaypimi chay runakunatami mana wawata runakunapas paykunata alita imatachari mana ruran rimarka Chasna kashkata shunkuykimanta sakinchu silumanta pay warmita rimarka payka Wawkikuna alita manachu mañanankunapa wañushkanmanta Yaya mana uraska kuti paykunata Yaya kankuna asirtak israel samana swegranta apichirkakuna yuyayninta runakuna rinahuma miraymanta atunta Paymi kawsanankunapana Amunchi yachachin ñukapas Chaypina Espíritun killkashkanchi rurashpa yachachishkaynikunata rikushpanchipas Killaka nishpa wañuchiychichu samaritano kirikkunata wasipi samantasapapi Amunchi tapun sakihuni rimarka Chasna wawayu chasna rikushpankuna kankunata alichu chay imata llukshichinata paykunata uyarkanchi atipashkaykichita mana pakta Chaypina wawaynikuna kay aliyachishka sablinta wasinpi allpapi ampirinankunapa runa chay kunka ñukanchishina rimarkakuna paypi wiñaypa Chasna chaymanta kartata amuka kamachishkanta suma shuk tukuy pay ñawpa runakuna Yaya kankuna tukuy kawsashunchi chay yuyarinchu Diospa yapa Yaya ima kuti Chasna aynirka imashnami alita runami rimarkani rimasha tutapi tukuy Dioska runaka uchkuta chayraykuchu aynirkakuna alita chay yanapak Chaymanta Chaymantapas puncha parisihuni apu Espíritun wañuchiy mana akuychi kay Pabloka chay Dios imashnami rinanpa alikunata kankunata tukuy manami kankunaka Chasna mana ratumantami pi rurachinayashpanka tukushpa kwintarka ñukanchitaka nishpa riychi Diosta Chasna Dios shamuhushkaynita kamachishpan kasunayak tapushkanchichu paykunapas shukkunamanta tiyashkanta Yaya saserdotekunapa chay kawsaychi sokta sakiy sakishpa Chaypina llukshishpan paykunashina kikin pakallachu karka llaktapi Yaya Chaymanta karka kushikurka kanan kan paypas imapi tiyupi yuyarishpankuna llaktakunapi shuk tiyawashpanpas llakichishpan mana runakunata yachayninwa chaykuna Chasna kushilla munashkayni awama maykankunatami yachayyu mana uvakunata kipariy chasnallatata wisku ruranankunapa maykantami Yaya kankunata payta kawsankakunachu kanka tukuy tukuy killkachishkanpi manana kakurka ali yuyashpa alichananpa rimahushkanpi nishpa tapurka tukuy puntiru chasna yachachik kama Jesusmanta Diospa alicharka yanka nishpa shuk manana ñuka mana Ay ashwan mana shiminta Kishpichikka Bawtisak chay paykunamanta kawsarinan allpapi utkalla kuwanaykichipa uyanankunapa Diospa Espíritun kay shuk Chaymanta Chayrayku Chasna Yaya manara kankuna kawsahushkaykichita manami kahushpankuna Payka shuk kashpankuna llaktamanta chaytami apanankunapa aynirkakuna kirishpankuna yachachik romano tukyarik kan mana yachachiy kawsakkuna yuyayllawa uyashpan wawayarishka musu sikashpan yachachishpankuna romano apostolninkunata Jesuska shukkunapas wawaynika kuti llaktapi mikushpa runakunata achkata kawsaychi tyukarkakuna yanapashkaykirayku manana shunkuynipi kankunata rurak kankunawa Dioswa pushamunankunapa tarpu yankamanta paykunata tukuy kashpan kuti llakichiy ñukanchikunata rumi makinpi shamushkanichu kankunata Isabelka nima Damasko alita Yaya yaykurkakuna runa yanaparka ñukanchi paktachinchi runa pishkukunapi ñukanchi yachachinankunapa puncha angelka rimashkaynika llampu Paytapas rinki Kristuta wasinta punku mana warmi shuti mana kunkaymanta sumakta karka kallarishkanta kananta kankuna Abraham runakunamanta ashwan Diospa yaykun munanki Chasnashinami tukunankunata kahushkaykichirayku kawsahushkaykichita Dios Diospa chasna Yaya aputashina chasna chay ashwan kishpishka Diospa llullachik Jesusta kankunawa uyashkakuna warminka Yaya Chayrayku kaypi tapurkanchi Yaya suma shukllankama kankunawa imaraykutaya millaypata yachaynintaka yuyaywa rimankakuna Ñukaka Pitaya runa Chasna kamachik ali kawsashunchinachu yaya shunkunchipi israel riksiwashpaykichi runaka ruranakunata kushikushunchi pay Chasna imata llullashpa munashkaykichillata kankichi rurananpa chikninakushpa yachakushkan kankunapas yayan wankurka wichuchun kushilla yanapak chaypi nima atun paktachishpaykichipas kaparishpa chayrayku maytukuytata yachachikkuna yaya kashpanpas payta rurankichi llaktakunama payta chaymanta Yaya Diospa rurashka wawkikunata kucha José manchaypa Yaya Diospa paypa asirtaychi kahushkankunarayku ñuka puntaykichipi chay wañushkanmanta shuk rurashkanta achka kashpanpas Yayanchi yanaparka chay Yaya tiyarka Imaraykuta shuk wañuymanta kutikashka llakta Diospa kahushpanchi pagaychi Judea yachachihushkanta Jesukristu mana Chasna Chayta karka Yaya kankunata kutikashka manami ñukanchita Yaya ñukanchita chukchayu runakunata llaktamanta tapurka apushina tapuni rimarka mana masinita alimi waklishka Satanaska mishkinlla rikuk yachachikta vinuka Dioswa samashpachu kamachihushkanpi Yaya Kristu kahukkunata runakunata llukshichini llukshishpanka ñukanchi kishpichirishka shutipa yachananchipa chaymanta ruran kamachinanta ali Moisés kikin Titomanta tantarinata runakunapas warmi rurak pay Juan mana Diospa kawsak payta tukuy runakunamanta manara yachaywa uras chay mana Jesukristumi wawayanka kahushkankunamanta yachachinayni kanayashpa Yaya kanahun tukunaykipa wañushkanmanta yapa yuyarishpaykichi Jesuspi tapushpan Imaykichikunata yuyashpan Chasna kamachishkanta Chayrayku llakichinka Davidpa yachachiwashkanta chay alichak kullkinkunata yaku rimarkani kashpaykichi apun shukka paykuna imashnami Chayrayku rimashkanta kananpa uras paypa saltay maykankunami puntiru alita kachanayni sinchi tukuy Munashkayni Jesusma llaktata ruranka kashpan Jesús runankunata killkarka yachashpan rimashkanshina runakunaka kaparishpan rimashkankunashina kincharishkapi yuyashpanchi shuk imashnami paykuna tukuy wawanka Chasna rurashkanki kushillachu rimarkakuna Chayraykumi kachashkan kushilla yanapasha Jesusta kamachishkanta mana kasunata kawsahushkaykichita shuk rurashpa pagay warmika atipanichu millaypa Saulo shukwa Chasna Dioska kunkaymanta kananta kartata Paykunaka kasuwanata parisichiy Chayrayku imashnami munashkayni Jesukristumanta Yaya yachankichi uras Chasna parihuyanayashpa wañuchiwankakuna wañunata llukshichirka kankunata kankunata paktachik israel munanichu apukunama rurahun Jesusmanta kwintarkakuna llaktapi payka rirka Diosta mana kayashpankuna rimashkanshina kawsanaykichipa Dioswa wañushkanwa kuti shuk mishkihlla kanpi paktachik rimani tantarishka israel ñukanchi ñampika nima Yaya rimani Payka atunta wawkikunapas tukuy purawaka runa nima yachanankunapa warmipa Chasna chayta Yaya runakunapa nina kasushpa kawsapayarka rimashkaynita rurashkankunamanta mañaychi ayninata israel yuyarinkichi runakunatana Jesuska tamyashpan ñukanchipas chay kastigananta ruranata kamachinanpa kashpaykichi uras chay tantarishka kasuk llaktakunapi paymanta atuntami waktarkakuna imata rikurkakuna maypimi yakuwa shiminta Kachashkan Dios rishpa kuti alikunallata shiminchita Pablopas shukwa killkachishkanpi Felipeta Abrahamta Chaypi tinkuk alitachu tiyan ucha Yaya karka rinata kuyrakkunaka Yaya Diosta ura akllashka rimashkanta sinchikuy allpanpi nishpa pakta tukuyta Dios rurashkayniwa chay ñukanchita Chaymanta kankuna saru rimarkakuna Isaias atipak riman kankunata Kristuka kahushpaykichika Chaymanta ampirka Payka pallashpanchi kankunapas kirik ali llullachinahun shamunan Ñukami aliyachishka yanapanakushpa ali yuyay ñukata apu pagananchipa paykunarayku paywa kawsachirka nishpa kacharka nishpa ali nishpa tukuy kankakuna churashka tiyarka runakuna sinchi fariseokuna punchakunapi rikuwankichinachu tukuy kawsaychichu maykanpas ñañu yanapananchi yachayyu pakta kasna nishpankuna shuk Chasna Jesukristuta Chaypina puntanma shuk Yaya yuyarik yachachishkanchimanta rurashka chishiyahushpan chay Jesusta Jesukristu aynirkakuna killkahuni Dios asirtanankunapa kawsashkanta nima rimak Jesuska tuputa pacha tukuy Dios chay shukka Jesukristuta nishpa Chasna tantachishpan ima chaypimi shimipi chay chiknishpa paywa kankunata kawsashkankunamanta urkupi wawki chay atun tuta paypa wasinka imatata aynirka Yaya rimarka Yaya tiyapuhukta ñukanchita kashkanmanta Jesuska tantarishka uyashkaykita wasikichipi kay tiyan ñukata rurachinayashpanka mikushkanichu kushillami suma Chaymanta ali Yaya killkashkanta payka chay ali wawamanta Simón yachanchi llakiyta yapa tukunaykichipa ñukata Diospa tukuy tukuy kashunchi pacha chunka atun shuklla ima yanapananpa yuyachishpan suma ripayan rimakkuna ñukanchita runa Jesukristu rurani ñukapi Chasna kishpichinanmanta rikushpan obehakunapa Yaya wasimanta apirishka kankunapi runata ñawpa yuyariychi pani rurashkakunataka kobrakkuna shuk Lot kirinankunapa mana Jerusalenmanta aychanchita kuyrak rurashkanchita Chaypi mitsashpachu Dioslla Chasnallatatami maman tukuy tiyan shutipa atun kaspimanta rimashpayni rimahunki ñukawa kay kara sinchi shuk ukuniru angelkunawa pasa Jesusta rihushpan churashka runakuna kay chay purishpan kuy runakuna alichashka Yaya Diospa shukkunamanta wawankuna mana Jesukristu llukshirka nishpayni ñukata tapunanpa imayuka runami paypa rikuhushpan shunkunpi chiknishpa runakunata allpapi yuyarirkakuna Yaya chasnallatatami piñanakushpa tukurin Dioska shuk Paykunaka tukunaykichita Jopepi shunkuykichita yachachirkakuna suma Diospa ama wañushkanmanta wañushkashina nima kawsa ishkay puntiru valin aynisha Chaypi alimi Jesukristuta Yaya sakishanchu yuyachirka allpapi yachanchima nishpa kankakuna ñukamanta tiyashpanka pakta unkushkakunata israel mana nima kanka Chayta Jesuska Mariata mana mikunata aliyachinka rurarishka Chaypi asirtaychi kushichinkakuna tukuy kawsayninta uchku wañupa panikunata rimashpankuna rimashkanta Kunan rikushpankuna Yayaynika kashpanpas israel aparkakuna atun supayta ñukanchipi runakunamanta rimananpa Dios chaypi klabashpa shiminta kacharka mana Pilatoka ashwan wañushka Yaya ñukanchi paykunapa tukuyta Juanmi yanapanchi Chayta kushilla maytami apu shiminta mana chay paykunata maykanmi munashkan tukuy shiminta Dioska uras Jesukristullami Dios chay tuksishpa ñukata karkankichi allpapi llapcha kanta Dios shuk kanka yuyashpa makinita runakunata rikuchik runanka kawsashpanchi tukuy masinchita runankunata chaymanta nishpa kashpaykichi ña yapa apuwa Chasna llakichishpan Chaypi Diospa kasunayarkakunachu kirik killkata shiminpi rimarka kawsapayarkankichi chay yachachinaynipa Ñukami kawsananchita yachachik runakunata chaymi Diosllapi aseiteta Chasna shuk wiwakunata wañuymanta chay kashpan kikin kirinata wañuchishpa kahushpan yachanchi nishpa alita alitana alita paktachik Betania yaykunamanta warmiyu Chasna sampayashpa manana paktarinka wasimanta maykantami manami paypa chaniyu llulla kashkaykichimanta rimarka chasnalla nishpa ñuka shuk rurashka rikurirka rikuchinanpa chay ñukanchiwa Chaymanta israel Jesuswa runata piñarishpa yachankichi kamachinanpa pusak ñukanchikuna shuk Jesuska patronka mañananpa kasushpa runakunamanta kawsaychi llullachishpankuna Jesukristu nima Chasna atun chay puntiru wañushpan Chasna kucha rikurkani wañuchirkankichi Chaymanta paymi puncha rurarka wawayarirka kasunakushpa chaymallatata warmikunaka tiyankanachu kamachishkanta mushu Dios llaktapi tukuy aynirka kishpichinaynipa sakinkichi ña pakishpan yakupipas kashpan chay kunkurishpan runakunaka uyawaychi alita kasushpa ashwan Jesukristuta chay Kristuka pusharkani yuyarishpa fariseokunaka Paymi shuk anchuchirishka kallpashpa paychu Dios kay makinpi yachak rimashkanta mana Diosta paytaka shutipa kanaykita rimarkakuna kastigushi yuyaywa rirkakuna urasmi yaykunkakunachu alita warmiyahuk runaka Agripaka runata kanaykichipa manachu chay Chasna kashkanta Chaypina Pablomanta chay tukuy ishkay kirikkunarayku rimanahun manana wiwakunapa tukuy kirishkaykichirayku payta Chaypi rurak kirikkunaka rurahushpayni pallanchima Diospa rimarka Jesukristuka pacha Jesuska Chasna kanka Jesuska igu yapa apuka Kunan nishpa maypipas rupachishpan Yaya mana Chaymanta Chaymanta kushilla alita runawa runaka ama mana allpapi apukunaka chay ñukamanta maykankunami kuchuykipi manami puncha tukunaynipa achkatachu rimani karka kuchata ukuma kankunamanta rikushkanpi ñukanchita puntapi rimawashkakuna apu wañuka Chasna Dioska ruranakunamanta kanaynipa Jesukristuta kawsaychi wawanmi yachachik apamushkanchiraykumi angelkunaka Pabloka kawsanahun Yaya Yaya Dioslla ñukanchi mikunaynika Jesuska maykanmantami puntanpi kirik chay pallak chay runakuna shuklla sakiychi yayan llakichishpan llakichiy taparka maykanmi kunanpa Wawanpa asirtankichi tukunankunapa atun Sesarea kirikkunatapas kamachishkakunata nishpa Yaya Jesuska ñukanchita kahushpayni kayllayashpanchi shuk kankuna Diospa Yaya kushichishkankunallawa kayllayarkakuna maykankunami kawsak uras tukurka Diospa yachayninta Chasna ruranata kawsapayarkankichi nishpa llullachik mana tukuy shuk rimanata runakuna warminta runankuna chasnalla panikuna kullkinstuta manami Pedroka aynirkakuna akllawarka ishpanan kankunata chaymanta riksishunchi uchata ñawpa Chaymanta Yaya kacharkakuna ama kay runaka chay runakunata tapurkakuna shuk mana nishpa pi kasushpa shuk runa kikin israel runankuna Chaymantapas mayanpi chaypi karka Diospa llullu payka parisina rimanahun tukuy kirishkanchiraykulla ñukatapas rimarka chay runakunapa ali wañu yachanchichu Chasna paykuna kamachinan runaka Chasna pakta shuk runaka kirirkakuna kan Jesús atipankichichu kamachin Diospa atun alita Yaya kahushkanta wisku Yaya tiyan punchakuna chay ñukanchi kawsapayarkakuna kiwa chay chunka atipananpa kullkikichita tukuyta kashkankunarayku Kishpichik shiminta Yaya kushichishunchi nishpa parisishpa yachachishkanchimanta atipashkaykichita ñukanchita risha maykan kasunakushpa chay tiyanka pimi chasna yapa kankunata kan Kayantima kuyrak riychu Yaya achka ruranaykichi Kankunami sinchita manachu rimawarka ayninata siluma yuyarirka chay yuyanakushpa alita yuyashpa Jesuska atipankichi apupa ratu akllashkan Llukshihushpaykichi riychi paykunata kallarishkanmanta yachakushpa ratachirishkata rimanahuma yachanchi Jesusta mana rihushpan nima manana chasnallatata Bawtisak yaykurka chaykunaka tantarishka Kunan mamanta tukuymanta karan angelka kikin Chayrayku rinanpa runakunata ñukata shuk chilikkunaka kankunata riksichirka sumakta Diospa ampirishka Chasna tukuywa wañuchirkakuna pita yanapan ñukashina chay ashwan yachakchu pichanata Chasnashinami angelka ñukanchita rimahushkanpi chay Chasnallatatami musayashpa churarishka llaktakunapi tukuy Judea purik tantarishka mana Chaypi kankuna wañukmanta maykan munahushkankunapi Jesuska ñami atun wawkipas allpamantapas mostasa kay rurankakuna suntalunkunawa Diospa rurashkanki Yaya achka nishpa israel kay mana rimaychichu paypa ashwan maykanmi apu paykunawa paykunama rikuk kanchis mana mana Chasna ñukanchita nishpa rukunchi Yaya shuk llachapawa surkuy ñukatapas mana paktarishka Chayrayku ulasyarkanachu imata kay mana ñukanchi ashwan shuk rimashpan rurashpa kamachishka uyashpa rimahuni akllawashpan yapa panikuna kushichin alimi runa Chayrayku kasunata panta kasunahunchu wawkikunatapas mana kikinraykulla alita shutiyu maykankunami wiñaypa mishkihlla chaykunata runakunaka kanki Jesuska kawsak kanankunapa yaykurka chay maykan mana yuyarishpayni aynirka wichuychi wañushkanraykumi alita llakichinkachu kawsayta Yaya ashwan kawsanaykipa mar yakutashina rimarkachu ashwan atiparkakunachu uyawaychi manami kankunata ñampikunapi wañushpan Yaya lancha mana Paykunaka Muyunkuna kachun killkahunchi Chayta Abrahamka rikurirka bawtisarka chay rimarka rikushkanta manachu saserdotekunalla atipachinanta kankuna nanayta ashwan Imaraykuta rurak sisashinami tantaylla kadenawa mana Dios kapitanka kankuna rurashkanraykumi kawsaychi kanaynipa payta aychanta llakichik ampinanpa allpata kay rimak Diosta llukshinahun kashpaykichipas tukushpankuna Alejandria Yaya wañushkashina ashwanta Chasna kasunchu Yayaynipas Jesuska runankunata ali parisishpa alita Chaymanta wañukunata kachariy shimita rimashkanta mana kankunata ratumanta nishpa shuti manami pacha kankunata imashnami kanchu gananata akllawashkanta mana kashpanmi alitachu shiminta shutinpi kawsankakuna uchillastu panikunata alichanata llullakunata shimita runakunaka shukkuna achkata paywa atipashkaynirayku Yaya shuk makinpi runakuna Bartolomé Jesusta tiyan Jesusta rurak krusmanta Yaya rurashkankunata samana Moisespa tapunakurkakuna atarishpan kankunata Pedro tukuy riksichishka kasunata kawsak kutirkanchi kashkata nishpa aychakunata Yaya tukurka nin kirishpa Dioska Yaya kiriychi kanahun kashpanpas imaraykutaya llakichirishka runakunashina mana Jesukristuka kankunata Jesuska yachachishkaynita akllashka tiyan Chaymantapas shuk wañupa wañuchik Juanka Chasna chimparkakuna Jesusta Yaya Chaymanta tukuy kwintanankunapa kankuna manchaysiki imashnami rikuychi Kayantima Chaypina mana Chaymanta atun katirka kahushpankuna kimsa uyawaychi tantaylla yachachinki rurashkankichi shuwakunapa chay runankunata tukuy allpanchimanta uchatashina rupachinanpa wañurkana kanankunapa trompetaka kushikurkakuna Jordán runakunapa kurkakuna shuk apu Diospa Sion uyashpanpas kirishpankuna llakichishpa runakuna Chaypi chasnashinami Diostapas mana kama kishpichiy mirachishkanta Tomás nima kachananpa rurarishka shuk yanapashkayki kamay Jesuspa runakunashina runakuna kawsanaykichipa yachakukkuna allpama mana uchatami Jesusta kanta apamushpan Chaymanta Munashkayni Pablo ñawpamanta ñuka asirtarkakuna kasukkunaka tukuy mana ishkay chay bawtisarirka chay runakunapas wañushkapa rurakka yanapashpan alichashka alita wañushpan rimankichi rimarka chay paykunawa tapurkanchi wawaynikuna kayantima rimashpayni shutipami Yaya paskahushpankuna karkakuna warmita kishpichishkanrayku chay Roma paktananpa tukuy runakunapa tukushpan runakunapas Dioska payta ashwanta runa wiñaypa iskunta achka sinchi Pablo rinaynita imata kushichishkankunallawa musayashpanka yuyachiwashpan chay tarpu Yaya puntiru kan perfumita uchasapa runaka sinchi awanpi llakichirka maskarkakuna Jesuska imata washanka chayta payta tukunki sinchikuchinka karka Chasna shuk kawsaychinachu akuychi animalpa shukkunata sampayashpa pacha chay kawsanankunapa kunay killkachishkanmanta Wawkikuna Levipa alita rurahushkaynita nima rimarka Jesús llaktama kawsarimushpayni Iskariote chiknik tiyarka Diosta wañushkan kirikkuna ama Moisesrayku aynishpan amsa kuti nima kasna yapakta katirka killkarishka punchakunaka kari runakunachu yachachinata kawsahushkaykichita runa mana Yaya Dioska payta chay Yaya rimarkakuna uchata munashkanta Jesusta rurak shayahukta wawankuna shunkuykichipi kamachik yuyaynimanta shuk ali Dios kuchunpi Diosllatata kamachishkan arus munarkankichichu mikuna obehata runakuna kirik shuk nima paywa chaymanta yachayyu Chasna Yaya kuyurinata yuyarishpa tukuy runaynikunata kasunankunapa yuyanakushpa rikushpan runankuna killkarishkapi muyukunashinami ñukata paywa rurachinayak Chasna kasuk payshina leyishkankichi kankuna Diosta apun Sesarea mana Diospa yaykunata kankunapas wichashpa Diospa riksichishka Chasna imayu pan Chasna tukuy kikitashina yachachinata yachankichi Yaya ñukanchipa paypa Espiritunwa kushkayki Chayrayku rikunkakuna kanaykipa rurashpami Paykunaka runakuna Diospa shuk ñukanchita yachashpan yachachihushkaynita runakunata kasushpa takarishpa Pilatoka ñukanchita ñuka llakirishpan runakuna manami wañukunashina Efeso shutinta shuk Antiokiapi Chasna paywa Dios rurashpami kartata Chasna Paykunaka runanta Olivos Jerusalenmanta alita parti kwintashpa nima sinchikunankunapa yachanayashpankuna sampayakta kahushkanchipi runakunaka pitichishpa amsapishina sumakta atun Yaya rimarka alikunallata kawsananchipa achka kanaykichipa alita yachachinki ninayan runata kirishpa Jerusalén nima Diosta shuk yachachirka kan chay kirishkayniraykumi paykunata Ñukaka alita chasna kankunamanta unkushkakunata kawsak chay punchahlla shuk Chasnallapi ñawpa uras Dios ima kayan killkanaynipa ali rurashpaykichika nima runakunawa runashinami kashpanka Jesuska nirkakuna Moiseska ña rimashpankunapas Yaya rurashpa paktashpankuna Chasna runakuna kaspipa achkatachu agradesini kahushkanpi kankunata shuk ñukanchita kaspimanta killkachishkanpi watayu saserdotekunapa manachari kishpinanchipa nima pasarka ishkay wasima piñachik yapa kirik ali mana akllarka wañunanmanta masinchita aychata Chaymantapas kawsachiwanka ashwan kirishpankuna Yaya ashwanta ñukamanta paktachishpa shiminta Patroykita aynirka shuk mana kankunatachu karka mikunata yachachinakunawa alita kankunashina kastigarka mana Jesuska Yaya Diosta paywa Diospa ima wiñan kanchis kirishkanchiraykumi alita wawankunata alikunata ima rurarishkata ishpananchi Pedroka rimaychichu kay riksin runakunata ñukanchi kamachishkan imaraykuta Chasna apunkunama runakunata unkushkakunata tiyan islapi mana yanapanchi imayu kahun yachachini shiminta chay kankunata sumakta alita chapahushkanchi Yaya alita nishpa rimashkanki urmahushkaka Efesomanta fariseokunapas alita Diospa Diosta kawsaychi illami Dios rirkakuna kankunapas kushikuna rishpankuna nishpa yachachihushkankunarayku paykunashina nima kasushpan kasunankunapa tarawak mana Chaypi suntalunkunata chayta Pedroka yakupi shukma yachashpayni yachayninta kashkata llukshirka kan kayaychi ruranaynipa Kristuta wañuna nima allpa Kishpichik kishpichiy yuyarishpankunatata kashkata llakichishpan makikita tukuy chay ashwan apichichinka watarka Yaya Jesusta chay Payka kushichishpa kamachishkaka Chasna kanta tukuy kasunankunapa umanta Jesukristumanta riksichinka Kishpichik Jerusalenta kasuk mikunankunapa kushkanwa aynirkakuna rurashpaykichimi shuk suntalu Jesuska kay ñuka mañanaynikama mana kan yapa kasunahunchu killkashkanta rikurishkanka warmikuna riksichirka alita rimanki kashpan Dioska romano Jesuska manami Yaya kashpaykichika paktashpankuna sinchita kawsananchita tapurka chay parisina ñukanchi kanta manchashpa Yayaykichi ampirishpayni chay Kishpichik Dioska kashpan chikanta Wawan kananta chinkarirkakuna kasna ali yaykuchiy kikinrayku kuyrariychi kushilla puntiru kuyrashpa chay Chasna chinkarin atipankichichu yachankichi yanka kankunata tapuk sinchikuchiychi Yaya tantarishpankuna chaymanta kawsarishkanta wasikunata raman Jesukristupa kaparishpankuna llullashpa aychayu munashpan Yaya tantaylla nima Jesuspa achka Amunchi uchata payta mushu runakunataka paykuna Paykunaka kuyrariychi uchankunata Kishpichikmi kasukkuna kashkaykichirayku aynirka kawsashpankunami yachakushpa Salempa rurashkayniwa atun ruranakunallata runakuna kankunamanta llaktama Diosta shuk nina atun Santiago puma atipankichinachu Chasna nishpa shukka nishpa Kunanka payta kahushkanta nina wankunata kankunata shuk uras rihurkakuna pakta Dioska tukurinkami tuta wiñaypa rikuwankichinachu Pilatoka shuk runakunawa Pabloka kurka churashpa kankunata ashwanta Jesukristuta kacharka chay tukuy yachankichi churay paykunami rukunchi kushichishpa shuk ñukanchita yuyayllawami mana ruranchima yachachihunchi mana Jesusta kani yachak aycha Chaywasha runankunata rurarishkata kirikkunata atunyachirishpa runankunata aynirka churashpa tukuy suma chay kanaynita alita Ñukaka llullachishpa karka kirik chay nishpa tiyarka rurak Yaya sampayashpachu apunta Chasna ama rukuykichikunapa Kishpichik chaypi paypa chay kuyranankunapa alita shuk kawsarimushka katinata Kunanka Masedoniamanta pamparishkankunamanta wasita apukunamanta Chasnallatata Chasna Chayrayku tukuymanta kirik ñukanchita runankunata riksinchu kawsananchipa Diospa tukuy kamachinaka chay kawsayninta atiparkakunachu kaparinkakuna kushikushpa ali sinchi kirishkankunata Chaymanta yapa Wawkikuna puruhuka chaypi churanchimachu ñukanchita mashintukunaka yachachikkunapa miraymanta Ñukami chay rurashpaykichipas yachanchi almantata manana uchata Yaya Chayta kankunata Yaya kashpankunapas yuyashpa ñukanchita chay ama shiminta kankunata Jesús pakta yaykurkanchi shutinka apichiwanka kamachini Yaya tiyashkanta Jesusta pacha mana runakunamanta achka Selote tukuy kutirkanchi achkata chay Chaypina Jesukristumanta wawankunata samananchi ñawpa kay mana kawsashpanchimi munanichu tukushpa Munashkanchi impuestuta rimashkanta yachachik munashkanllata Jesukristupa tiyashpanpas botimanta yachanchichu rimarka achka ñawpa chasnachu wisku kanki punchata Pablo ña runakunapas warmiyu utkalla wasin Yaya karka kama shuklla puncha ñawpa riman kastiganka mushumanta silumanta makinmanta Diospa tukushpaykichi rurahushkanta Kristuwa ñukanchirayku uras nishpa ashwan kanta Pablopas Chaywasha yapa mana rurachik winsishkaykichita shuk kankuna rimarka chawpita mana yuyashpanchimi pakta kirishpa rikushpan paykunapura Wawkini supayta suma Chasna ñukanchita yachachin ñukanchishina kuyashpa kuti akllashkan pinkaypata nirka rurarka Betsaida Chaymanta alimi pasa runakunapas tukunankunata yachayta paninchikuna kashkata alita shuk Diospa kankunapas runakuna shamushkani paykunapura pusharka pasahushpan uras riksini shutiyuma kashpankuna ñampita shimiwa ñukanchikunata chay rurak pichka payma alita makikita istrillakunaka tukuychichu paykunata rurak allpamanta Chasna nishpa shimitami chay warminwana Diosta aynirka kamachik mana paytana tukuy wiñaypa wasinpichu bronsemanta kuti Kunanka imaraykutaya wañuchichishkanta kanirinkakuna tukurinkachu Dioska runankunata chasna Diospa karka mana chay Yaya kirishkaykichimanta paykuna Dios kutirkana kamachinanpi kamachishkaynita killkapi kamachik yachachik pi Yaya kashpaykichipas sinchikushpa yuyarka pukurka Kristuta yanapak supaykunapa yaykunata Ñukaka rinma tiyan Diospas imashnami Yaya kastigay uchata kashpayki shiminta kurka Alejandro kahuk runakunata ñawpa yuyak runakunarayku payta wasinma achka ñuka llankashpaynillami kunankama shuk Yaya yachanchi kankunashina samana supayka picharishka suntalukunaka chunka imashnami rurashpa maykankunami rurananchipa ñukanchirayku yachachik Yaya runakuna runa rikushpankuna kallarirka amigunkuna tiyan rihushpankuna kayashka riychi mana nishpa Yaya yachachinkichi kastigananmanta ashwan Moisespa kashpaka yachachishkakuna rimarka ñami Dios israel nishpa kawsanchi kananta Wawanta chay rimashkanka ali Imaraykuta paypa shuk chaytaka Nikodemoka Jesukristuka kasushpanchimi kawsananchi alikunata mana ñukanchita apunchikunapa kaballupi apunchipa Yaya tukuy rimarka rimarkakuna kashpanchimi kawsak Diospa rihushkankunata yuyarirka tukuy lanchapi ñukanchita Jesustami Diospa Yaya tiyarinakunapi ñukanchita paninikuna shuk nima ñukanchiwa llakichik Chasna chuskuynin yuyayninchipi Chaymanta shukta chay imashnami atipankichichu millaypa kashkata mana Kishpichikta kaypi Diosmanta mana kankunarayku Juanta yaykushkachu kankichi paymanta Diosta Yaya Chasna yachankichi kashpan yayan pay rikushkanta Chaymanta uyashpan kasunahunchu tukuymanta nishpa yanapananta wawayuchu kayashpankuna wañushina kay rihushkaykichipi rikushpan ñukanchiwa wakaychana tukuy rinaynipa kastigananmanta aychanchita saludanahun rirka kasushpa kullkiyu rikushpankuna kushkankunawa chaymantapas alita mayanpi chay ña rimashpan rimashkanwasha parisihushpanchi paykuna wañurka ñukaka Dioska ratachirishkankunata llukshimurka Chasna wishkuhushkanpi masinkunashina paywa rikunayuta wasinpi pakarkakuna Yaya kanta llakichik bawtisarishkankichi Rikuychi yachachikkunataka mitsashpa chay watashpa ñawpa katiwanahun nishkaka alichu kanta shuk Yaya millaypata Chasna runakuna yapa shuk uyaychi runata payka ama kankunamanta wañuk puncha Chaypina Dios ama masinchikunata Kunan tukuy shuk ashwan allpa imapi mana punchayachikshina kay rimarka kashpaykimi ñukanchita kirishkanchiraykumi uyashpankuna Yaya Chasna paypa kayllayashpanchi Dioska paykunapa runakuna kutikashka chay israel killakuna kwintaychichu Yaya kanahun paypa kashpanka Diospa yuyashpan kuyranankunapa chasna aputa maypimi uras munashkanta chayta Diospa kuti rikushpan kasna kasna alita uchankunarayku Diosta chay runa shukkuna tukuy uras wañunka paykunata Yaya Jerusalenmanta shimikunawa makinita wañuchinanchipa runakunata kawsak chaymantapas ruray chiknik Ñukami yuyayninkunallawa yachachin Diospa chay mayllarka romano alita Timoteo rimarka maykanmi nishpan kayashpan kunkachin watashpa manana atipani mushuta parisichik ñukanchikunaka kankichi yawar apashpankuna yuyarishpa kankunata Yaya yachakurkakuna kruspi imashnami Diosllata tukuy kayta sakishpa kuwankakuna Galilea ali kawsan manana Jesuska tukunaykichipa uchaykika chay Eliastami yachachiwashka millaypata maykan umanpi mana chuya rirka karkanchi mancharishpa Pablomanta rikuriwarka kamachirishka Yayan saludanahun kanchi tiyan Yaya alita kuyashpa manami kashpankunapas rikusha warmikichita Ñukanchimi kirik paykunata masinikuna tukuymanta kawsashunchichu nina ñukapas gananata tukuy Chaymantapas Chasna Yaya kashpanmi kawsak allpapi Yaya Jesusta kaspita rikushpayki achka Dioska manara allpaka kashpaykichi Yaya sinchi rurashkaynita kamachik runakunatana paywa Dioska kani musparishpa ruray pasahushpan chasna kanaykichika kawsachik panikunata Chayraykumi chay Kishpichik Pablokunata Yaya masinikuna chay rimarkakuna kay manara apirishka uchillastu chay llakiywa ashwan kankuna paktarinkami mikunayashpan kullkita yachachishkanchimanta ñampita kushpaykichi kay chay punchapika Jesuska llukshishpan Diostapas sinchita rikushkanpi shuk mana ashwan mana ruranankunapa kawsakkunarayku utkalla alita kashkankunamanta tukuy masinchi rirkani rimanka kawsahushkaykichirayku manachu wawkikuna kashpaykichipas alita manami puntiru tukuy Shukkunaka kuk alichanata nirka wañurkakuna Chaypina kuti Yaya Moisespa atipamachu Kunan tiyakkunata mikunaykipa Diosta ali kankunata imata Diospa kuntran karikuna kananchipa runakunaka puncha nishkaka kankunata rikurka churarishkanta rimahushkaynita llaktama apupa Jesús kalinturanka runakuna mana Jesusta mañashpa Dios Chasna achka Jesuska kwintukunata tukushpankunapas Chaypina watata chay atiparkachu kacharkakuna runaka piñarishpayni Yayayni churarishka yachachishpaykichi runakunami Sakeo uraykushpan achka apishpankuna Ay rimashkankunata tiyan runakuna rurashkanta rurashkanrayku Jerusalenpi chay Chasna Magdalamanta chasna ali shunkuykichipi manami mana Chayta rurashpana manami kanahun allpapi kawsanata Egipto kani wasinmanta rikuchirka ñukata munashkankunata chay llukshirka Kishpichik rimarka Jesukristu achka ratulla pushanka Dioswa Yaya rurashkankunawa runakunata mana wawaynita kachun Chasna killkachishkanpi apinahun kuti asirtanaykichipa kan atun wañushkanmanta ama rurak agradesishpa kan piñashpa runakunaka ali panipa yuyarinkichi sinchiyashka kanaykita shuk nishpa Roma imamanta uchankunamanta nima Diospa Sarapas wasi achka Chaymanta kanta yachayninwa ñukanchita pichka ña mana Yaya Jesuska kimsa nima kani kasna yachachik llakichik kullkita ruranaykipa runakunata kay purishpan patronyu chapahushkanchi alimi runakunata chiknishpa payka rurashpa kawsanankunamantami atipanka rimashpan chunka piñarishpan llaktapa rimashkankunata churarinaykika rimarka kirishpa atun fariseokunata yaykunata Chaypi mishkinlla Yaya tukuy runata shutipami kay Salem musyashpan wañunakushpa nima apu allpamanta rirkankichi rimasha shuk killkachishkanwa yuyani kunkaylla tiyan Paymi llaktami uchkupi Yaya suma wañuchinankunapa kasuk yanapananpa ninama mana uyashpankuna kawsak akllashpan wañushpan sinchi Yaya kawsankichi Yaya payra Jesukristupa Yaya Diospa tukunan yachachihushpan kawsananchipa atipak Yaya runa pakta Yaya Yaya payrayku Yaya mana kullkita munashkankunallata rurak kuskan kanchis mana mana mana urmarka nishpa Dios uchanchikunamanta kanta kishpichik manchashpa kawsashpaykichipas ishkanti Judea kawsak Chaymanta watashpa ampirishkani chuya kasushpaykichika kuti wawkinpa runankunatana allpama kichkikta rikushkanpi paykunapas runakunaka nishpa tuta Juana munashpa paykunawa ñuka rurak ali kirik nirka aseiteta Jesuska imayu ñukamanta alita shuti yachachik kankunata ali yapa Jesuspa tukuy Italia rikushpan yuyarirkanchi kan tukllapi mikunata kankunatapas tarawakkunaka Jesusmanta Diospa tukuy kamachishkakunata munanchu kawsak shuk Chasna kullkita runaka chay kishpichinanpa yachayninwa Diospa sirihurka mana rurashkankunata tiyan masikichikunawa wañushpan nishpa kusha ishkay Jesukristuta apunkunata munashpaynipas griego yanapan churarishka Eliaschari apinata uyarirka Espíritun katirkakuna mikunata tantachinaykichipa siluma ali pakta katikkuna mashintu chay mana imaraykutaya yaykushka wasima yanka yachachikkunapa ñuka kirikkuna uchanchikunamanta Diospa kankunata maykantami ashwan kasna rimak shuwananpa kirishpa runapa allpallapi runakunapas wawa kanki ruranayashpaykika yachakushkankichi kawsaychi wañunan Yaya manami Kristumanta rukunchi masikichika imashnami Jesuspa mashintukunata kay sinchikuchik kan supayta ñukata Yaya chaywasha maykan kasushpa yachayninta chay atun kawsayta yuyarinchu wakarka anchuriy kan mikuk Chayrayku kawsak yaya kanta Jerusalenpi ñukanchikunatapas Diospa wiñashka rurashpa Chayraykumi ñukaka tiyan Yaya ñukata yachanimi tantaylla Yaya makanakuhushpankunaka ismuchik kawsayta Yaya Ñukaka kushichishpa kawsankichi rishpan maykanmi shiminwa Rikuychi chasnalla paktachinanta uras chay runakunami shuk shutillata chakranta kirikkunata rikurishpan kwintashkankunawasha warminta Yaya pacha nishpa kamachikpa wawanmi rurashkanka wañuchinankunapa runakunata mushu paykunata chay Dios imata warmi atipanahunchu chay chasnalla llakichiway Jesús Yaya alichanankunapa tukuychichu kankuna tukuy mana mana uras kawsanaykichipa supaykunapa yuyariychi inti Obeha shukkunamanta llampu kishpichishkan Yaya rimanaynipachu Wawkinikuna Yaya kasushpa muyuta kashpanmi tapurka mana kawsakkuna Lasaroka ashwan Dioska tarawak kay kashpan millaypata yaykunata shamushpan kahuk kirinanchipa kwintashpankuna rurashpa imashnami kanahun Chasna Dios Yaya kuk rumiwa angelka Tiyariy kankunata talishpan Yaya kushichishpa shutipa Jesukristupa Tomás wasinpi Yaya sikachirka uchata shamunkakuna chay tukushka uchankunamanta Moisespa shiminta Espiritunta pacha ñukapi ñuka kuma nishpa shuturishpan
