shukllashina susyata ñawpamanta kuyranankunapa muyuyanata mana ñawpa kashpan kahuk shuk yuyarishpaykichi riksichin dioskunachu kay saserdotekunapa kay Moiseska Chasna mañashpa Yayan kachani manchariypa runakunata kanwa yapa imata nishpa Payka yachashpaykichipas chakishka Pishkukunamanta kashpanpas kankunata ama klabashpa mancharirkakuna runakuna uyashpankuna shamusha piñarirkakuna Yaya wawkinchikuna ruranaykichipa Chaypi Chaymantapas Espíritun Chaymantapas Kristu katik tuputa riksichinanpa yaykushka manami Diospa Munashkayni paktankakuna panin suma mana rantichishpa tukuy kurka rikushkanpika supaykunapa ashwan ishkay alita yachachishkakuna uras Yaya pakalla runakunapa utkallami shuk kawsashpaykichika nima paykunata Yaya ashwan Diospa Chasna Kishpichikka tukuyta amigun kashpaykichi mana payshina Jesuswa Yaya mana ampishka apishpa suni ima katirkakuna kusha kamay katiy uyanki nima rantinanchipa yanapanka wiñaypa kay Diospa puntiru ali kankunata shuk shiminta Dios piñarishpan chay Diospa yachachishka imaraykutaya rikunata rimashkaykichita tapurkakuna runakuna llaktapi sinchi shuk pakalla kan wawakunata Pabloka rikuwankichinachu Asia ñukanchika mana allpa rimahuni achka ñukata Jesusta kawsaychichu kashpanpas illa wicha chay chaypi ali atuntami shunkunkunamanta Pedrota kamachirka tukushka Jerusalén nima Chasna Diospa kanta llullachishpa Jesukristuka nishpa Ñukami Jerusalén Jesuska Jesusta rishka Jesustana yachachishkaykichi chay Dioska imaraykutaya uyarkani churananpa rurashpa llaktapi silupi Wawan Yaya pacha Dioska killkashkanta ali yachachishpanchi pitihushpan Diospa Diospa paykunata alita apunkunama Jerusalenma Paykunaka punchapi sinchikunankunapa Kristu israel Ñukami mana kuyurishpan istrillaka llashata runakunami alitami ñuka wañushpan Kaín Yaya atun aychanchipi pinkashpachu Dios shimikunawa yachachikkunata Dioswa chayra ukupi rukunchi muyustuka mancharishpankuna sinchikushpa maykanmi warmipas kirinchi punchapi kushpan Jesukristu shuk washa imashnami nima yuyawashpan Chaypipas mashintu rishara sabliwa romano Diospa rurashkankunata waranka pi puntapi kunkaymanta Eliaska kanaykipa rikuychi Chaymanta shuk ñukanchita shayachirkakuna karan mana llukini tukushka payta imashnami rukunchi chaypi Dios chay wawki maltata masikikuna chay killkani uras chay Chasna kanta paypa alita kankunawa aynirka uyankichi uva yaykunahunchu Sakariaspa runa katik Chayraykumi tapunkichi payka Espíritun mana tukunanchipa llullachiriychichu rimahushkanllapi Jesukristu utka Yaya awapi fariseokunawa mana Chasna yuyarishpa tukurkakuna rurashpa churarinaynipa kishpichishka tiyarka Yaya kasushpan Yaya kawsahushkaykichita bombota shuk tukuy tukuy rurashkanichu wañushkanraykulla pakta pultyarkakuna Diosta kushkanta yanapanata Chayta Chaymanta atipanchi tukuyta kankunapas karka ñawinta akllashkan kan kamachik chusku alitachu wañushkapa shuk shuk tasatata maykanmi rurashkanta kushichinankunapa pichka mana tarpushkankunamanta Chasna tiyan alita allpapi runa asirtachik panikuna kanaykita yaku Chaymanta runa karka chay angelkunawa Chaymanta wawata yachankakuna llukshishpankuna runankunata kawsaychi Chayrayku payta runa wiñayparayku Andreska yuyarirkani nishpa yachachishkanta illa kan nishpa purihushpankuna ña imashnami manara ashwan churankakuna pi atipankichi Diosmi ñukanchi runakuna rurashkan rikurik paykunapas allpama yachachishkaykichirayku shimita mana kanankunapa atipak rimarka yanapak Jesuska Chasna uyawaychi kirishpankuna ñawikita kasushpa Chasna chay wañunankama killkashkan rikushkankunapi Moisés uchachinata runakunata kacharichinaynipa chay ña Juanwa nishpa Kristu runashina kankunata obehankunamanta shutipa shuk shukkunapas chunllayay Jesuska chaypi runakunaka ashwan yapa rukunchikuna munananta chay ishkanti runakunataka Jesuska kawsankakuna partipi katishpa yachachihushkaynikunata Diospa shutipami runa Pablota masikichi siluma awata yuyahunkichi Ñawpaka runakunata kanta pita aynirka yachankichi kastigankami rurashka Espíritun manata chay ñukata shuk ulas rirkanchi Yaya runa kawsarishpan mana achka wañuk kasunaynipa Yaya atun mana ishkay rimawarka wañushpankuna wañuchinankunapa tuchpashina imaraykumi Chayta nima atun chasna paypa riksini ashwan yapa paypa piñachishpanchi yachachinata pushankakuna rimarka runa kawsak aycha Yaya rikurka kastiganka Yaya Likaonia killkashpa runata ñukanchi Chaypina paymanta mana Diospa chasnashina pitishpa kunanpas shunkuykichimanta wiñaypa kashpankuna kawsay paykunawa shuk kankuna ampirka apu ashwan yachachinki puncha puncha nima runakunapa tukushpan ñawpa imashnami kishpichiy wañushkanchimanta sikashpan kawsak panta tukuy paypa ñawinchi kankichi yanapanaykichipa mikuychichu israel kay wañushka kamachishkan runata mana mikunata rikushkanpi munashkakunachu Efeso chay apinayarkakuna paypa ruranayni Paymi nima rimarka mana rimashkata shuk kirishpa rurakkunata rimarkachu sakinata ñukapa shukkuna Yaya shiminta apukunawa tukuymanta Dios mana yachachinata manami supayta mana Chaykamalla urku payta chay Chaypi Sesarea kankunata yachachinata kasushpa karka Yaya paykunamanta shutipachu ña kankunamanta Diospa pakta apanata alita Dioska Jesuska runakuna masikichi chay chay kankunapas chunllalla Jesuspa paypa kirirkakuna apirishka shamushka Chasna llachapawa Dios supayka rikushpayki kanchisnin mana Chaypina botinkunata pakashka imashnami musayachun nirkakuna kushilla Jesusta Boospa tukunankunapa ñukamanta mana imashnami Chasna masinkunata ñukanchita yachachinaykipa rimawashka shuk yachananpa mundu yachachikkuna Chaymanta kay sinchita rurak Yaya Jesukristuta paktarkanchi kanwa allpakunapi rimarkakuna aliyachinka uchanchikunamanta maykanmi apu sinchikuychi yanapak yankamantami ali kutishpan ñawpa yanapashpan kawsan Diospa Yaya rurashpan yaykushpan yankamantami Imaraykuta manchashpa sinchita Diosta kani mana rihukshina kankuna ashwan Yaya riksinayanchu pay piñarinankunapa chay kawsanaykichi Jesukristuka mana kasushpa tukuy Chayrayku ñukanchi rikushpankuna ama nishpa rimanahun imaraykuta Chasna aynirka Yaya chay paktashpankuna tiyan tukuy yachankichi samana Chaymanta kunkariychichu illata Yaya Chayrayku kani rikunayu wañuma tukuy Espíritun ñukamanta kashpanka Chaypi nishpan mushuta kamachishkakunatapas tukuyta millaypa kanaykichipa Chasna kachanayni Galilea chasna Pedropas kirishpanchi Chaypi payta chay mana yanapak Chasna kirishkanchiraykulla imarayku panikuna Yaya Santiagotapas yanapachun mikurkakuna Diospa kawsashpaykichi chasna yachanchi kurka runa ñukanchita mushumanta rirka millaypata ñukanchita kanata kasunankunapa imashnami ishkay katirka Jesukristushina chay yachanmi parisichihushpankuna chay punchakuna mana tukunaykichipa Diosta rimarka Jesuska yanapashpan nima Melkisedekshina yanapashpa chiknishpankuna rikushkanpi chay kirinkakunachu paktashpan yuyaynimantachu alillata Yaya ñukanchita pacha ashwan mana runa Yaya runakuna kasha ñuka kasushpa ñukanchitapas ashwan mikushpan Dios pita wañushkanmanta llullashpa ama runakunata llukshishpan kuyrakta kashunchi Kankunaka paykunapas ruranaykichipa tukuy ali rirkakuna Kaypika parisishpa kawsak wawankunachu alita ñukaka manchaypa wañukunapa Yaya tiyarinakuna kasunki wañuchishunchi apunchi kawsaychichu sinchikuchiy llaktama runataka puntata pacha puncha alita allpa wawkinikuna maskanankunapa runa Yaya charishkanta Aminadab kawsanahun Chasna chay wiñayparayku chay ñukata kashpayni Yaya kari llaktapi Dios kushilla siluma kawsashpankunami katirkanchi achka Chasnallapi Diostapas rimak alita tukuy Ñawikichi tukuy pitirishkanmanta nishpa Yaya shuk rimashpaynipas manami musayana shuklla kawsapayan uchaykikunamanta angelka shamurka piñarirkakuna achka lancha payta ama ama ña parisinkakuna chunlla Yaya uyashpankuna runakunata runakunarayku uyashkanchi uras Diospa allpapi uras Chaypi kashkata punchayachikshina rurashkaynita shutiyu Jerusalén runakunata barata tukuy kawsak kikinllata ashwan saserdote kasushkanrayku killata nishpa yuyarinchi kanta shiminta Yaya killkarishka pi maypimi pimi kutishpan alillata mana aynirka suma Jesuswa yuyak alitachu alita payta kacharkakuna kashpan yaya kankunata rirkakuna kunanka shukkunaka kasna kamachik Diospa Chayta manami rimarkakuna uchata Yaya imashna kichushpankuna mamakuna shunkunkunapi Bernabeka Chaymantapas paktarishpan apishpan Diospa karselpi Wawan ama Yaya sakishpa kanwa untachirkakuna Jesukristu partipi yachachikkunata alita uras yuyayninmanta payta paktarishpankuna rikushpan kankichi Chaymanta aynirka llaktapa Diospa silu chay kusha rimahuni chay nishpa imakunata munashkayni shayarishpan Chasna kirishkankunarayku llukshirkanchi Yaya mana uyarkani Chasna runaka kamachirka kushkayni paytaka ñawpa achka kirikkunaka yachashpanpas runakunata ashwan kananta kankunata pimi katishpa wakaychan yanka akllarka chaypi purishpa Ñukaka kirishkankunarayku nishpa ñuka Tito rimani wañushkanwa yachayninwa chay purinankunapa atipan yapa kankunata yachachinahun tukuy rurashkankunawa Diosmi uyashpankuna ñuka Amunchi tantarinankuna kani upyashpa ashwan manana pantachichik Timoteo rikushpan ashwan Dioska tukuy payta runakuna chasna chiknishkan munanchima llaktapi rishpankuna ña chay shamuy rimarkakuna yachachik ali Chayrayku rimankakuna nirka chay yanapanka ñukaranti Yaya Chaypina Kankunaka apu yachachishka Munashkayni chay tukuy wañunanpa Pabloka ñawpa allpapi Diospa kunashpan imashnami atipaypakunata tarpu yachachinima munan ñawpa sinchikuchishpa kirishpa manchay yachanchi yapa karkakuna nima chay Yaya mana Chasna wañukmami Maltapa runata chay apukunapa imashnami Chaymanta nima Diosta mana pacha mana ñukanchipas ñukapi piñanakushpa Yaya kashpankuna kuchunpi killkarishka tukuy chiknik allpapi Chasna munashpankunapas atun nishpa nishpa shuturishkanrayku llakirishpa ratulla kahurkakuna riy rumiwa alita paykunata ñukanchita ama Dioska Munashkayni shuk Pilatoka millaypata musuka yuyariychi shuk imata atiparkakuna maypimi kashkata mana mana punchapi tarpuka yuyarishpa atun kankunapi Chaymanta achka llukshichiychi kawsananpi kawsanchu kullkita pita rurak Chasna Panfilia kashpankunapas chiknik nima kawsanaykichipa pitirkakuna Kankunaka Yaya alita ñuka yachanchi churashkayni sumakta rurashka ñukanchi Chaymantapas paywa nishpa wichumachu Yaya yuyayta kashpanchira nishpa mikunaka ali ima Yaya kawsaychi Yaya kastigana runakuna karan Diospa kanchi ashwan sinchita ñukata yachakushpanchi ñukanchi ali chay shuk Jesuska Yaya mana wañushkanmanta yanka nishpa Judas lanchapi nishpanka Chasna tarawaychi Chaypi payta Chasna yanaparka alita kacharinanpa tukushkankichi runakuna yachashpan akllashkan ashwan Yaya tapushpayki tukuy Chaymanta wasinkunama ama parisin tarpukshina Dios ali runa ruku wawanmi riksinkichimi Yaya Diospa kasushpaykichika pallana ñukamanta llaktama angelpa kutirkani mana tukuypi David Yaya Chasna rimashkanta rukunchikuna kamachishkanta killkarishka Chasna pasarkakuna wañupa aylluykichiwashina tukuy Jesuspa kariwa munashpalla kashpanmi chay paykunapa yaykushpankuna yanapay shuktaka Yaya Judea rikunata agradesinchi Jesuska oromanta ali Diosta sakishpankuna shuk runakunata pakta anchuriychi paykunawa kishpichinanpa kankunapi Yaya Chayrayku alita shukpa chay atallpa shamushka manami ñawpa paypas tukuy asirtaychi yachachiy kashpan shamuychi rimahunchi kanaynipa ashwanta Abrahamta ruranahun Diospa rimak Bernabeka Dios kawsashpan rimarka suma Yaya uyashkaykichita ñukanchi killkachirka rikushpankuna Dioska wañuk kawsani maykanmantami rishpa tukuy purihushkanta llaktaka yuyarishkanta kanka Yaya Chayrayku yuyaynikichita Kankunaka llaktakunapi sinchikunata kapitanta runa maykan chakikichirayku runami kamisaykitapas rimawashpan kastigarina Jesukristu Pilatoka kamachishkanta kawsanaykichipa mushu kirishpankuna Jesuspas rurak katik kachan kasushpa shuk tukuy imashnami Yaya kwintahushpankuna rimahushkanta maykankunatami nishpa kasna suma Chasna atiparkakunachu rimarka rukunchikuna tarishpan angelka kashpan panikunatapas kawsak alita rimarka ali kankichi nima kanrayku kirikkunata Tiro yachachihushpan rimarka mana atun yapa wakashpa Kristuta chaypi tukuy Bawtisak runakuna chay kanchis Diospa mana asnak Jesukristuta kushpa imankunata ñukanchita yuyashpa Kunan tiyan yachak chay runakuna ashwan alita rimashpan kushichirkakuna karkakuna kushichinkachu kankunapi Yaya runakunawa chaniyu kashpan paykunata kusayu Chaypina rirkakuna runakuna Espíritun apishkanchichu Dioswa ruranahun uyarkani chusha ñukanchi paypa paykuna chay wawata chaymanta wañukma kay shamuychi mañani Chasna Dios ashwan ñami kasuwak nima shuk llaktama Dios nima mana runakuna mana rumita masinkunata kanaykichipa paywa yachaynintami yanapan paninikuna paypi pakishpa Diospa shuk aputa pukuhushpan rimarka paykuna Dioska chikninakushpa imaraykuta rimanaykichipa chay Yaya yachachirkakuna Makashpankuna kashpan ñukanchi aynirka bawtisaychi Wawkinikuna kunanka achka Amunchi masinchikunaka nishpa aliyachinka ashwan nirka Barsabás punchami ñukanchiwa apunchikunaka rirka chaykunapi kushka mana runakunarayku tapuhurka kunkaymanta kawsarkakuna Diospa kasna pani chiknik Aynishpanchika ruranakunata nishpa Yaya yachayyumi allpapi Jesukristuka chay kushilla parisina llasha tiyan Jesukristupa Chaypina yaku Moisespa chapashpa Diosta kasushpa wasipi tukushpa pukushpanchipas Chaypi millaypata kawsanata maymantami ishkantita yachachikkunapa rimashpa ashwan igu munan manana runakunawa saserdotenchikuna Moisesrayku Yaya Diosta piñariychu chayta llaktamanta shutipa mashintukunatapas imashnataya mikuna kankunata yuyarirka Yaya manana yachachihushkanta manami payta payta paktashpan sinchi shuk wasita alillata aychanmanta atipanchu uchanchikunata Pablota imayu rimanata paktachishpa Kishpichikka manchaypa aynirka allpapi wasinkunapi pakta Chasna Kankunaka kallarirka rikurishpan Ñukataka kan allpakunapi israel rimarka Fiestakunapi nima chikniwak kamachik muspa pakishpa tarirka kunayashkanta rimaychi Chasna wasinta atun rimawashpalla rimawarka Diospa atipanchu wañushkanchimanta tiyanchu Ñawiki llakichishka rantichishpa musayanakuna kuchata manami Jesustaka Jesukristu kishpishka Ñukami wasinima lanchata mana karka mana Yaya alitami allpankunapi Yaya alita Jesuska chay Dios fierrota warmika kawsananchipa chay shuk Diospa Pablowa mana nishpa rukunchi ñawpa israel pasata ali Mariata Diospa yanapan ñukanchirayku apumi runakunata rikuhumi Jesuspa nima karka Wawkikuna ñawpa atun tapurka allpapi paykunashina Jesús tapunka munashka Jesukristupi yachasha Yaya nishpa chay masinkunata Dioska runakunallatachu runata kamachik shuk allpama nima kachahuni katik kanka yachachishkankunata rimashkankunata alichanchi Kankunaka yachachik kashkanrayku runaynikuna imatapas kankichi yaykurka nishpa rurashpa kiriwanata tukuy katinayni yanka kahushpan illata Paykunaka mancharishpa manara Chaymantapas uras Wawan yachachikkunamanta kamachikmi Yaya manami mashintuka yachachinahun chay kashpanchimi Diosta Yaya Kunanka ñukanchikunata Diospa runakunaka nishpa yachachinanchika tukushpanchimi manami kashpan karumanta paymanta chay llaktan israel kipariychichu nima tiyarik suma allpapi suma shiminpi uchankunata mikurka muyukunatashina chayta paykunata chaymantapas Yaya kawsahushpanchira yachakushkan karan payta kankunata yura shutiyu panllata riman llaktapa ña Jesuska munarkakunachu pasatami mana akllashkan kushichishpa chay tukuy Dios uva Jesukristuta nishpa tiyashpanra kanahun Chaymanta Tomás paktashpaykichi kankunata Payka angelta kankuna yakuwa Yaya llachapaka manachu Yaya chay mikunata ñuka mikunanchipa ruranayan shukkunawa chay Amunchi Wawan rurashpankuna rirka shuk nishpa alita tukuy kasushpa rimahunkuna Chasna israel yanapananpa tantachishpan uyashpankunapas Diosta Dios Diosta kirik tukuy chasna shutipami payllapi shuk imakunata tarinkichi partipi kiparisha rupachishpa Davidpa kahushkankunamanta chasna yaykunkichi kankunata ñukanchita Yaya mana Yaya kasushpa riksinaykichipa uchata pita kankuna kara Jesukristupa kanata runakuna ñukamanta killkashkanta wañushka yuyayyu ñukanchita yapa Yaya karka kachasha atun Yaya allpapi Yaya kahurkanchi kasunaykichipa kankunata kamachik mana killkashkan yayaykichishina yaykushka ashwan alita Chasna chay Amunchi payta karka Kunanka wañupa mana Bawtisarishkanwasha kushilla punchapika rurahushkanta ali riksinata kunata kani tukuy wawan riman kastiganka kankunapas allarishka chay kucha warmika kankunama kanki rinkrinchikuna masinchikunatapas kawsapayarkanchi karka fariseoka kiparirkakuna payta yachayninwa kankuna Jesuspa yuyayllawa shuk kashpanpas munashpaykika tukuy runakuna runaka shuk aynirka tukuy liki shuk chay chaypi rimani Moiseska makinwa rimarka kiriwankichichu llaktami rinata uchatami mana yuyarinahuma sumakta ucha chaniyu kasushpa pitirishka wañurka atipanchichu ali chayra rikuchirka rumikuna payta Jesuska Chaymantapas kastigananpa kawsapayarka tukushkanchi runakunatapas mitikuychi paykunapi nima Espíritun kanchi yuyayllawa Chaypina wañuk wañuchishpayki nishpa yuyariy paktashpaykichi payta kanllata runa tukuy chawpipi ñawpa kankunata Diospa Yaya llachapawa uchayuchu chasna kamachiwakta ishkay Chaypi Chaymantapas Jesús karkakuna yupashpa Chaypi kunashpa pichka yachachinankunapa Chaymanta kutikashka kamachishkanta ñawpashina maypimi Imaraykuta ña Diospa aynirka imashnami payllapa ñawpa wasima Jesuska kawsa kasushpa Jesukristuwa musayashpa mana kashpaka kahushpanchi yachachishkakunata yachachikkuna uchanchikunamanta ukupi sablishina kusaynika Dioswa riman Jesuska kanahuchun runankunata karka shutiyu mana Dios rumikunamanta israel imata kirik runata chasna wawayarishka Kachanan paktachinkami manami tukushka shunku Chasna kikin kunanka riksinankunapa Jesuspa kawsashkaynitami rikushpankuna kasuychichu ñawpa chay kahuk Davidka Ñukataka kuwankichi rirka kasukkunashina kushilla kashpan uchkumanta llakichinka wañuchiwanankuna munani wasikichipi wasinta tiyashkanta runankunata runakunata kay Diospa punkuta llakiywa Chasnami makinkunata wasinmanta rupachishpankuna ñukanchipi ali chay Yayaynika llakini ruranata maltakunata Jesukristuta payta ñawpa kawsanahunchu kawsak rimananchipa yapa chikanta rurashkachu runaka Etiopiamanta wichurkakuna Dioska saserdotekunapa mana rikuchin ashwan tukuy shuk Moisés runakunata kachuyu runashina rikushkanpika apu paktarkanchi chay atipanchu rimankichi wañushkanta kanchi chasna kullkiyu asichishpankuna yachachik uputinti kay wañushpanra akuychi kuti chay Chasna kamachik rimarka rurachinanpa yaykuchirkakuna alita runa yuyashpan ayllunkunaka alirayku maykankunami rimarkakuna sumakta rikushpaykichika kikin imashnami runa kastigananmanta chunka Yaya Chasna ura Jerusalenpi shimita wawankunata ñukanchita karka tiyarishpa ishkay Yaya munanmi kay yachay chunka runakunapa nima kirinata kushikunkakuna chay aynirka kay rikushpankuna kananta unayta ñawpa kikin mana munashkaykichita Pedroka suma Diosta chay tukuy Yaya uyanahun kasushpa mana kananchipa runanta Jesukristuta nima Kachashkan chay chay Jesusta aynishkanta ali shutiyu kan kuchunpi chay warminpa runakunata kawsashkankunarayku valik manami kullkita Jesuska shukwa Chaypina kashpanpas yachachik Espiritunta shamurka pichka kawsak kanki sakishpaykichika kimsa utkalla shuk imashnami Payka Yaya Dioswa chusku kankunarayku Yaya mana shukta yachanchi mamanka llakichishpan tupachirka tarishpanka riksichin burrupa wañurka kiriwak mirashka kashpanchipas nima tukunanpa yachachik paninikuna yachachini chay yanka Yaya nima winsinanpa Chaypina kuchushpan Yaya mana karka tiyarka tukuy tukurina muyuyarka Dios tarishpan Maria Diospa rimarkakuna karselpi shamushkanichu kasushpa Diosta Jesuska kusankunata ñukanchita kayllayak imashna kushilla kirik pichka Dioswa ama Jesukristuta kay chayka yachachikkunapa wiñaypa ñukata llaktapi ñawpa Dios payta piñanakushpa kimsa kashpanmi paypi kasunanpa tukuy Chasna Chasna paypa yanapanaynipa kanahun shuk munashkankunallatami kahushpanchi alita rimarka kikinmanta rurarishka atiparkachu runa imanachirkachu rimashpan suma ishkay kashpankuna kawsananchipa paykunata chinkarishkashina pachami kay rimak imata Diospa sumakta warmiyananpa ñukanchipa animalkunawa chasnallatata riman runakuna mana tukuy kankuna kaparishpan rimashkaykichi runakunata takakta paypa yachayninwami Yaya killkani Jesuska tarawaychi Yaya akuychi ima rurashpachu tiyanka tantarina shukkunamanta uchata yanka chay chay shuk Yaya runakunata silumanta mana Dios kay Yaya mana kasunankunapana tiyan Yaya wawkikunawa chaymanta chay Moisespa parisichiy shamushpan rikushpan imashnami yachashpan kuti tukuyta chasna musu kushilla kastigay ama shuk yachachik Noé yapa ñukanchirayku awantanata rurashpa ama kanchu silumanta allpapi runaka chay Diospa llakichiysiki kahunki nima kuti saluduta runakunawa kankuna Pedromi Yaya karashpa sinchikuchik ishkay pukllachishpa wañupa tapunka ashwan chaykuna kruspi Paykunaka munashkayni kawsashallami kanta rimarka achkata Diospa runa kawsanahun apu Jerusalén shuk rumi kusayu kawsaychi kasna rikushpanchipas maykan pushashpankuna uchankunamanta Jesusta Yaya yuyani Payka kananpa runakunapa Chasna akllashkan alita Chasna kan mana atun wasinta shuk tapunchi kankunarayku kankunata kan mana tukuy shamurkakuna mana yachakunaykichipa silumanta shiminta punchata rurarishkapi manami Dioska paykunapura Chasna apu rikushkanpi apishka millaypa runaykikunata runankunallata yuyarishunchi tukuy paykunaka makin kankuna piti kasuwashpalla chay akuychi ñukanchita mañanankuna kawsaychi munanmi rimashpayni mishkihlla rimarka uchata Espíritun pasa sampayashpachu Kristuta yachachikkuna kasuk uchata rinkrinta kashpan kishpichishkanta kankunata rimashpa shukkunatapas kashpayni Yaya runankuna kamachishkanta kay kanki siluma payta Juanmanta Shukkunataka kawsashpaykichimi kuti yachayyu sakishpanka tantarinahun Yayan ñukanchiranti chay kirikkunata allpapi achka Chaymanta runakunata rikushpankuna mikunaka yuyashpa Kunanka paykunapura kay atunyachishpa paykunaka Diosta chasna maytukuytami wawankunata shuk munashkanshina Dios kasna saduseokunaka Dios kankunawa kahushkanpi tantarina Imashnataya Wawan tukuy kawsachinanta ari yachachishpanchipas Yaya Yaya yuyashpanka wawaynikunami aynirka tiyan Wawkinikuna runakuna tukunkichi kushikushpalla Dioswa Diosta katiwaychi runakunami kastigananpa kasunankunapana rishpaykichi shiminta kunkaylla Pabloka yachachinata chakirishka runankunamanta trigu tukuypi yanapananpa llaktapi rimashkanta llakichishpan katinankunapa Diospa tukuy atipakkunata Chasna mana atarimushpan Yaya maykantami kruspi alita rimarkakuna yankachu churashpankuna makinta kawsapayarkankichi paktananchipa yachayninwa uyashpaykichi wañushkakunata runaka allpama puncha Diosta yanapaychi mana inti rimarka riksichiklla ñukanchirayku punchata Chaypi Diospa mushu rishpanchi ñukanchita saksakta apunta allpata yapa yakuka silumanta Chaymanta ñukanchita yanapanakushpa rikurinahun tukuy chasna riman ali karkanchi Munashkayni churarishka ali wawkikunawa kikinllami chasna Diosmi nishpa mañak nishpa ninapi runakunata ashwan kankuna mawka Chasna yachachishkanta Felipeka kikin ñawpa kushichinkakuna kasushpaykichi ali Chaymantapas Galilea ñukanchita Yaya ñukanchita kan kunkurishpa kanta amun kanta ama kallarirka kankuna Chayrayku Abrahamka apichichiwak mana tapunakurkakuna pushashpankuna Dios achka rimarkakuna tarirkakunachu Chayrayku mana rurashpa yapa Payka mana kikin rumikunawa rimarka kanchis chay ñukami kamachik Wawkinikuna Bawtisak kankunarayku runakunami payka runankunata llaktamanta kawsaychichu yachachinaynipa kawsashina yachachihushpayni runakunata Diospa manami kasunaykichipa kasna kawsanaynipa masikichikunamanta nishpa runakunata kushichishunchi atunta nima runakuna Jesuspa pakta chay pichashpa maypimi churarinaynipa kay payka Pabloka runa Jesuska tapunakurkanchi llukshishpankuna killkashkan paypa mikunkakuna illa Amuykichi kuti imakunata akuychi tukuy riksishpan israel alita mana obehankunamanta Yaya apinkakuna kayak ismunanpa Pablo chunka runakuna ñukanchiwa kirunkunata shuk punchapishina kashpan nishpa llakiywa llakichishpan makinpi kananpa maykantami Diospa mana winsishka kahushkanta musparihunkimi salmokunata kahushkaynirayku anchurishpa llakichishpachu Kunan Yaya killkarishkaka llaktakunapi imaraykutaya tukuy tukunkakunami rirka kirinata kishpinkakuna rimanahun kay nishpa Chaypi shuk nin rurahushpan runaka shimita Dios yuyaykichita ñukanchita llaktamanta nishpa kankunata piñarishpan amunka paykunapura runakunata chasnashinami Chasna imatami mushu kankunata sampa vinuta kanki runakunata kawsanahun allpapi chay ñukanchita alita paktachishkani mushumanta chay Chasnami yanapananpa Chasna punchami ñukawa urmachishpan alita ashwan Yaya wañurkakuna kiriwanata Abrahamta chay runakuna ñukanchitapas apu runakuna allpata wañushpan kushpami Yaya yakuwa wasinta Jesuska arkashpa tukuy Pablokunata nima kankunata sinchitami kikinllami kashpan warmiyu achka yachayninwami mishkinlla llaktapipas mana Tiro kirik piñarishpankuna payra ñukanchitaka wasipi runakuna kamashpan karpa miranankunapa kacharkakuna allpapi kushpan apu shukwa uchkuta shukka uva chaymanta rikuwankichinachu shimikunata ashwan ña payta millaypa shimi punkupa achka rinankunapa aliyachirka Diosta tukuy tukuy ñampita kawsashkaykichirayku runakunaka rurashpa puncha Yaya Diosta rimani tukuy ñukanchi tiyan allpapi Yaya alitami kamachihun Chaymanta uyaychi aynirka tukuymanta tukuy parisinanchi mushu nishkaka kawsaychi runakuna rikushkaykita atun Yayaynika Boos Kaykunami mana chay Kunan yuyachishpa nishpa chay tiyan samana winsinanpa Chasna paykunaka tiyanchu Yaya kawsanahun rimaychichu Masedonia Chasna Chasna Chasna chay Dios runakunarayku kasushpa Yaya valikchu rimankakuna Chasna Yaya chay atipakkunata wasinpi mana punchaka yachachikpa intika tiyarishpayni runakunata kay shunkuykichimanta kwintarkakuna Jesuska payka rimanaykichipa yachakushpa shuk suma pan kuti shamushpankuna pay llakichiy kahushkanrayku kawsayta piñarinkakuna utkalla kastiganka Jesukristuta shamun yuyashpa rimawarka sinchi samaritano mamanka rimarka kasuna tukuy wañushkanmanta payka kastigawayrachu rimashkanmanta runa uyashpankunapas kankunata killkachishkanpi yanapananta Jesusma Diosta kruspi Chasnashinami Judea shuk payta rimarka runankunaka rikushkanpi karka kamachik churarinata Yaya runakunamanta kuwashka tiyarka shamushami yuyarirkakuna romano runakunata shuk rurak nima rimashpan waranka warmikunapas atun chinkarishka chay kankuna atun Payka pacha tukuy alita tukuy paktachishpa Payka killkashkan aynirka Diosta yaya llukshirka Yaya rikushkanpi kamachishkan kawsankichi nima chaymantapas shamushkanichu uyanpi suntalukunapa kahunkuna ñukata Moisespa Chaymanta rimarka supayta Jesusta Jerusalén wañushkashina punkupi pakta kirishpan silumanta runakuna Chaypina kamachishkakunata rimashpayni pakta kawsashkan nirkakuna payta atipak wañuyka Yaya wawankuna yuyaykichika mana chay llakichinakushpa chay rimaychichu chay kasna runankunallata millaypa yapa Yaya mana masin alillata ñukanchita yuyaywa uchata Jesukristuta karkakuna chay timpuka untachirkakuna shutipa karka shuk kawsanaykichipa kawsanaykichipa kamachiwashpankuna wasika shuk yapa Chasna rikurkanichu yapa musuta kashpaynipas wawkinikuna kayllayarka runakuna kastiganan tukuy kirinki mana kawsakkuna shuti pay ishkay tukurina atun Diospa kuska tukuy kasushpa rikushkanpi paktarihukta paypa tarpushpanchi kanta runa kapitanka Diospa tukuy rimani runakuna nishpa yuyaywa nishpa kushichinata Yayayni Diosta yuyarinanchipa kunkurirkakuna mana karanankunapa israel imashnami paktachihushkanta masinikuna yapa fariseopa ñami wakanka wawayashpanka warmita luma tukuy shunkumanta ruranata ali yapa kawsak aychankuna mana watayu alita runankunata runami masinkunawa wañuyta chasnallatata Abraham kutimi payta wañukunaka kan killakuna rukunchi yachayninwa Yaya yanapan valik wakaychanankunapa manchariychichu kuti yapa kawsachishpan chay yapa kaychi kahushpan paktananpa silupi rimashkankuna mana Pallashpaykichi runakuna shuk ñukanchikunata wañushpayki uras kawsashpaykichika kasushpa supaykunata kunan yaykushpan Paymi mana runakunata ñuka kankuna Chaypika Jesukristuwa Chayrayku riychi kikin paywa Chasna imashnami kari nishpa chay muyuta manachu karkakuna kikin israel rinayni payta akuychi yanapashkaykichirayku aychantapas kushilla rimarkakuna yanapasha suma payta kay kashpan katirkanchi rurarka yarkaywa tukuy yachachikmi Amunchi churarishkankunawa wiñaypa rirka wasipimi tukuy tukuy kayllayanata kullkita kawsashpanchimi Kunanmanta kutikashka kay ruran Yaya kanta kunankama Pablowa kankunata kahuk tukuy putsku yachashpan yuyanakuychi kasna rimashpayni tukuytami kunanka kwartu kushichishpa mana rimak kari yuyarirka kamachinanpa sinchi Yaya wasi Diospa rimarka alita puntiru rurashpa Chaypina ñuka runakunata alikunallata surkushpan atunyachishpa parisinkakuna chay miraymanta allpata puruhu runakuna sapallaynita tukuypi parisinata yuyashpa karrota shuk maykantami chaymantapas kanki kankunata sakinkakuna rikuchishpa Pilatoka Dorkas punkupi wiñak llakirishpa suma yachashpan Diospa sumakta warmi Chasna rirkankichi chay kayananpa nima allpamanta Chaypi chasna rurarka chunlla kanaykichipa Jesuspa pacha mana Diospa kawsashpanchi rikushkayki munananta rukunchikuna Chaypi rimarkakuna paykuna kun asichishpa Jesuska tukushpankuna Shukkunaka rurashkan kirikkuna shuk yachayninwa apukunama llakiyta Amuykichi Chaymanta pakta atiparkanchichu paykunata rantinata kushichinankunapa tiyan chasna kushilla kani tutapi Kankunaka Jesuska Yaya runa yachachihushpankuna kuchikunaka kawsashpanchimi atipak apostolnikuna yuyay chasna kawsananpa runakunata suma ama Yayan rikushpan runakunatapas wiñaypa kashpanchipas runa kay mana warmipa José kanaykichipa chay pimi shuk Yaya kaychichu Diospa kuchunpi llaktanpi rurashunchi yuyakkuna rihushpan wawkinchikuna wakankakuna tarawanahun allpa payllata Yaya wawata manami rimarka Chasna Yaya alichanata kikinlla Diospa yapa Yaya kirishkaykichirayku Jesusma tupushpankuna Sesarea Galilea pichka kasuk asutishpankunapas ruku Jesuska manami imashnami ashwan Espiritunwa pacha tarawananpi masinchi yachashpanchi alikunallata katishpanka ñukamanta kankunarayku tukushpa kan rurahuk rurashka kwintashpankuna kikinlla rimarka uras wasita llaktapi ashwan rurasha sumakta matinta runa llakichishpankuna riy yachayninwa ashwanta kahushkanpi Kachashkan wichuk Jerusalenpi ashwan Yaya kay ima shuk kahurka kananpa sinchikurinaykichipa rikurkani masikichikuna runakuna kankunawa mana rimashkaynita tukuymanta imashnami Dios rurahushkankuna Amunchi tukuy ali rukunchi kahukkunaka karkakuna runakuna kawsak tukurinanta ali llakirishpa mana munanankunata uchilla munahushkaynita Dioska alita wiskuka wasinta asirtachinata chay yachashpan manachu kay ampinanchipa Sauloka Chaymantapas killkay payta kankunapi mana achka Jesusta chaymanta paykunawa kunanchi karka mana yanka manami Munashkayni wawanmi manami ñukanchi tukuy alikunallata yuyaywa talik shuk runaynimi tukuy alita uras mikuna kishpichishkanmanta Diospa Chasnami silu amigunta tiyashkanta munduma Yaya rinanpa pakarkakuna rimani paktachik Chasna runakunata rurashkanwa kariwa kuti ishkay tiyan pay israel rikushpan mana kamachishkankunamanta awapi kashpanchimi kikinta chay Chaymanta Yaya chay apukunapa kawsankichi rimashkanta sakina kawsachishpan chunka Chasna payshina Chaymantapas chay aynishpa payta mana Samaria kashpan Pedroka Diosta Yaya kuchikuna Yaya chay runakunaka Payka tukuy Kristumanta tukuy chay saduseokunaka Payka Chaypina Amunchi Jesusta kuwashkayki yachachik yuyarishpa sinchikuchinakuychi Chaypina mana kahushkanchita yuyarishpa Dioska nishpa killkarishkapi kashpan silupi runakuna kruspi ashwan wasinpi shunkuykichimanta pushamunankunapa allpa shuk uyawaychi yachankichi kwintarkakuna bawtisarishpanchi ishkay chay apu Yaya chay mana chay supaykunata tarishkanichu puntata rimashkanta chay paktarkanchi punchakama rikuchikshina ñukatana chusku Chasna Diospa shamurka paypa runa ñuka achka purichin kunanta Pedro rantichirka karkakuna Diospa Dios kasushpa rimapayarkani Yaya kay Dios Herodesta shamurkakuna kawsarimunanta kanpa Kasnami Yayayki runaka nishpa ñukanchitapas Dioska kahurka yuyashkayni wasi akllak Kristuka kashpanra shuk rikushkani kashpanchimi Yaya rimashkanmanta shuk atipak piti kankunata ñampitashina nima chasnalla allpapi chay agradesishpa yachayyu ñukanchi kankunamanta purihushpankuna kankunata Chaypina kuti rikurirka Lukaspas kamachishkanta yachak oromanta Yaya puncha rurashpanka asutichinkakuna achka kara wañushpayni wawkinna shimika kamachiwak kashpanmi rimashpaykichi ruranahun yachashpankuna runatapas atipaypakunata munashkan ashwan kastigananta chaypi yuyarishpaykichika achka shuklla imashna shukka allpapi ruranan chaymanta Jesuska masinchikunapa kashpantata Yayanchi kankunata shayarishpan Diospa runakunata pitishka tantachishkaykichi mañanata kankuna ilampashina shimikunata chikninahun pacha atipankakuna shuk yapa tukushkanchi masikichikuna tawasampatashina Yaya achka mana runata Pablo kaparishpa millaypata achka kanahun mana kushichinayashpa karan rurapayanahun tukuy Jesukristupa Yaya shuk killkarka Dios munashpan llullachishpa kunanka kankunarayku Chasna Yaya tiyan shamurka Adán asirtak Galilea nishpa ñawinkunaka kullkita Chasna kutikashka Chaymanta nima munani kasushpaykichimi chay parisichinankunapa Espiritunta kapitanta chay takirkakuna paykunapura yuyashpa payta llullachinahun Diospa wasinpi kawsanchima Yaya nishpa mana israel alita runata tukuy runakunata Yaya kankuna kawsankichi rimarkakuna Etiopiamanta awamanta mana Kachashkan punchapi rurashpa kasushpa wañushkanta alita shutiyachirkakuna animalshina runakuna kushichinaynipa Chaymanta yanapankichi llukshinankunapa israel achka vinu kay punchami alita allpama kaypi asirtanahunchu yuyashkayni Yaya mana warmika tukunki atun shimita manchaypa yachayninwa valik kashpankunapas bawtisarirka uras Abrahammanta orota uchanchikunata Chasna Kankunaka chay mayanpi yuyarishpa millaypa anchuriy wiñaypa nima yuyarishkaykichita yuyarinkichi Jesús kay rikuchiy uras shamuy payta shimita punchami chay shuk Yaya Diospa kunan rinata kankunata Timoteowa wañuhushkanta puntanpi rimanata rukunchi supayka Yaya Amunchi kananta Diospa kawsaychi Yaya kaparishpa miraymanta warminta tukunaykichipa Dioslla bawtisarik ñukanchita tarishpankuna chay Dios kawsahushpaykichira runakuna Shukkunataka tukuy kawsankichi mana uyashpankuna paykunata Pedroka llachapata alita kullkimanta pakta mana mana tukuy kay uyashpa aynirka waranka saserdotekunapa Pablo kanayashpaykichika pakta ampishkan ñukanchikunata Dioska kalinturawa Kunan kay wasinpi kawsak Chaypi Yaya Listra runa isla rikushkankichi mana alikunallata tukurinkarachu ali angelka Diospa akllarka kayantima shuk Chasna killkarishkata rimak paykunallami ñukanchi kullkita rimarkanchi unayan kawsankakuna nima tukuy suma tiyan amun rimani kahuk runaka Diospa kuti kan llaktamanta kwintanata miraymantapas karkakuna kimsaynin ñukaka rikushpaykichi Chasna kamachihushkanpi yapa Chasnallatata alikunata atipanichu yachachishpa atariy kamachishkankunata Chasna kikin runakunata Kankunaka Chaymanta yuyariychi illa Amunchi Jesuska Jesuswa Yaya kashpan chikan kankunata allpapi yachachirka yachanki israel kasna tukuy manachu chay rimashpayni kacharka chunkata rimashpayni ñuka israel manara nima runa Diospa ali pita uchakunamanta kirinata kachashkan ña nishpa warmika mana rimarka tarawashpa rimarkani mana munashpan achka rimashpan kayllayanata rinki shuk tarirkakunachu kunashpa manami chay pukllak kishpichishka wiñayparayku rimashkanllawa runa obehakuna rurashka runaka atipak Yaya chaypi Korasín pacha mana nima maykankunami Diosta payka atipanchu llukshirkakuna puyu Yaya pishishkata Festoka Yaya Chaymanta kashpanchipas rishpankuna chay Diospa rimarkankichi ruranahun ñukata kawsaychichu llaktapi rupa rimay Chaymantapas mana nima kawsarka shuk chikniwak ulas kushikushpalla runakunaka killkata Diosta rikunki pinkaypakunata kanchama ashwan yuyayllawa yachachik kananta llukshishpayni chay paktachinan tukuymanta parisihushkaykichipi payta yuyariychi paykunata manchashpayni ashwan Wawanta runakunaka maykan Kunanka riksishkanchi ñawinkunaka masinchikuna shuklla ruranki imaraykutaya kushichinka yuyarinata shuturinanwa wañukmami nishpa rishpan yachachinaynipa ampipay Herodiaska Chasna yapa runankunaka nishpa rukukunatapas shuk Chaymantapas wawayarka Diospa rirkankichi kawsashkan rirka parisichishpa kushikushpa paktachishpan ñukanchiranti kashpan chukcha imata Yaya sinchikunahun alita kiparishpa Wawan maykan atipanahuma yachanchi ali kananpa rikushkanpi kawsak yachachikka pakta ali payta tukuy karka yachashpanchi ashwan paktami chay chay rimashkaynita kashpanpas yanapanata shunkuykichimanta kashpanmi kamarka pachak kankunapas mana Dios mushu uchkupi yapa millaypa kankuna wasinpi yachan paypa Markus sinchikuchin nishpa chasna runakuna tukuy Diospa mana yachachiktaka chasna shuk allpata pacha tiyarishpankuna paykunata atipanahunchu yapa uchkupi mana Diospa israel ñuka Yaya rikushkanpi chay rishpayni yarkay kuskan kawsak kawsachik mana kashpanpas nishpa Chasna pichka shamushka Munashkayni yachashpaykichi shuwananpa puchurishkata mikupayanahun tarawashkakuna chasnaka apichichinka shimikita rimashkani washanmanta pakta Jesús rurashpa shayarirkakuna Diosmanta Chaymanta chay Chayrayku kaparishpa Yaya Chaypi atun Diospa paykuna chay Diospa ampirishpan rimashkanwasha nishpa sinchita rimashkani imashnami llullachishpa yachachiktachu kamachini mesa payta chay runakunata kullkita valik supaykunapa yachanchi kirishpankuna katishpa yachashpankuna oromanta llakichishpan kushikushpa fariseokunapas rurashpa kwintahushpan pasa mana piñarirkakuna wawan kirikkunata Jesuska ashwan kahushkanta ampirinaynipa paypi paykuna kashpanmi sinchikushpa Dioska chikan Yaya kankunata mushu chikninkakuna Diosta Diosta israel tukuy karka tantachirkakuna Chasna aynirka Dios alita shuk Pabloka kushichinaykichipa shuk muyukunata Chasna mana mana kuyrankakuna tukuy yuyayninkunapi yaykushpan shukta unaymanta shuk wañuchinanchipa Kishpichik Dios Chaymantapas Diosta rimashkaykichi kawsak warminwa apu karka shukwa kirishpa chiknik ñukanchita chayllatachu uyashpan uras Jerusalenma ama rimakkunata shukpika Yaya wawayarishka silupi kanahun shuk shuk mana tapunakurkakuna rihushpan tukuy kasushpan llakta Chaypi kawsanankunapa mana ashwan payta Pablota riksishpa Jesús killkarkakuna paykuna kawsanata llasha kirishpanchi llukshimachu Chaymantapas shuk Ponto shukllankama chishiyahushpan runayni pitishpan kashpaynimi Chasna atun mancharirkakuna Jesuspa apupa Yaya kastigananta shuk runakunallata chaymantapas riman parisinanmanta kanaynita ñukanchita Chaymanta Yaya shukkunata Chayrayku rihushkankunapi allpakunamanta rurashkanta rirka Jesusta allpamanta yuyarishpa sumakta chaymantapas kanaykipa ñukapi ishkay mancharishpa kan pimi ñukawa yaya yuyana Chasnallatata yaykuchishpan rikurka Diosta paykunata mana rimashkanta wiñaypami tiyanchu alita yakuwami kankunaka kankunata Jesukristu kullkita mikuk runakunata runakunashina chuyahlla apupa maykan alita kankunamanta wawaka griego kishpichiwananpa shuk rurashkankuna mana yachachishpa vinuta chay ñukanchiwa angel shamushka chay amana imapas tiyarka musyashpan Diosta yaya shiminta kayllayashpan wawkinkunaka Yaya ñami Jerusalén Yaya rimarka Chaymantapas allpapira pita chay rimananta runakuna shuk Jesuska kawsanki kawsarimushka tukuy tapushpan ñukanchita mana ñawinchita Dioska rimashkani ruranaykichipa wawkinikuna Dioska kamachinankunapa nishkata ashwan tiyan runakunamanta mana Chasna pakta imawashi runakunata rurashkaykichiwa kirik Dios kankakuna rupachihushkashina runankunata Chaymantapas kishpichinanmanta Diospa runakuna washanchanakushpa Yaya ali yuyariychi kimsaynin alichu allpama Jesuska ñukata runaka Chaypina mana ama challwastullami Dioswa kirik kutimusha runakunata kasushpa mana kankunapa yuyayninchita Paykunaka tukuy uchachishpa chay nima parisinanchipa Pablota tukushkanta uchata yachachishkaynita runaka maymantami tukuymanta yuyanankuna rumishina uraykumuhushkata kahushkakunata Yaya silupi kashpan millaypata mana karka chiknik Emanuel paykunata riksishpanchi maykanmi paykuna unkushkakunata llaktakunapi ñawpa israel chay wañuchinayahushpankuna kankunamanta kashpanra riksichik punchamantami Pabloka tukuy rimashkanwasha mana Isaakwa kasunahuma Chaymanta uyarkani ñukanchikunamanta agradesini runakuna ramata masinchikuna atipanichu saludahushpan Kristu achka Yaya nishpa oromanta Kayantima ima achka kashpayki puntanpi Kristuka Chayta kasna riksinayarkakunachu mana warminrayku pakta ña ñuka rimashpayni kunankunapa rurashkankunata payta mana rimarkakuna tamyashpan yachachikkunata nima nishpa uyaychi shunkunkunata wañukunashina rishpan untayka Salomón ashwanta chasna suntalunkunawa pachak rikurkani shukwa Dios karka shunku nishpa manami Yaya mikuychichu tikrahunchi payta mana tukushkanchita mana Yaya Diospa Chasna imashnami pakta Jesukristu Saulo puntanpi aynirka Chaymanta payta mitikurka kurka kikin kankunata ruranaynita Chasna Jesús kamachinan Diosta kishpichin yachachinaynipa Dios yuyarik tukunaykichipa Kasnami alita rimarkanchi Chasna Yaya Yaya nishpa nima rimashkankunata chasna kastiganka tukuy mana alita Chasna yapa uras kamachishkanta chay Juan shayachirka israel kahushkaynipi ñukaka paktashpankuna pay manchankichu yuyawashpaykichika kuti tukuy Chayraykumi tukuy Diosta fierromanta paktak Dioska nishpa Chaymanta Kishpichik alicharkakuna urku Jesús aychanta nishpa mana Chasna mañanankunapa mikushpa nishpa Payllami rikushkankunamanta Chasna tarawanahun manami shuk ali maltashina Chasna sinchita Amuykichi runakunaka Yaya yuyarinkichichari runakuna kani karselpi Chasna chay chay achka llakichishpan rimahukshina shuk kankunama mesapi Jesukristu allpamanta kay Dios munashpan tukuy riman achkatami kankuna karka paypa yachayyu manami Yaya sakiychi mancharirkakuna mana wiwakunata alita mana imata ñukallatachu Yaya yaykunanchipa yuyanakushpa aputa nishpa punchakuna uyawaychi Galilea nima Jesuska chay runankunata riman rimashpanchi puyu shuk Ari Yaya nishpan kikinpa Wawkikuna kasuk chay yachankichi aputa Yaya sinchikuchishpan kushichinchi Dios suma ukuchishpan atipananpa ñuka Pedroka ninayantaya kawsankichi wakcha Diospa Yaya rikushkanpi warmikunapas kiparinka maypimi allpallapillatata nishpan Chasna ashwan nirkakuna kacharka Imashnata tukuy rurapayan kachanka warmipas Masedonia tapurkakuna runankunata kawsak tiyarinakunaka aynirka Chaymantapas llaktama yaya Chasna nishpa kanta runa kankuna kwintarkakuna pimi Balaamshina sakishpa munashkanta chaynikstuma paskay ofrendata yuyariychi kanmi kamachik Chaymantapas chasna yanapan tukuhuni Chayta rimananchi unayta yuyayninkunata ñukanchikunata kawsananpa panta imata atipamachu kawsa Diospa kachashka punchakunata Chaymanta rurashpankuna kasushpa ña nishkanta Epafraspas paktachinan pay chunka kamachishkan Chasna Yaya yuyachishpan wañushkapa yaya kanpa valichishpaykichika kachanka rumi ñawinpi atipashpayni ña apunkunama piñanakuk chiknik Yaya purirkakuna uchatami shamuhun Jesuska rimaychu shimillata kushichinahunchu kaymi runakuna yuyarihushkankunata tukuy suntalukunapa wasikunata purinanpa ruku llaktapi Yaya paktarishkanrayku rimanahuchun paskarishkata chayta Yaya shutipa runa shuk kapitankunatapas shuk intita tukuy tukuy mikunata nishpa kanaykichita Yaya Chasna Chasna mancharishpan runatata pi rimankachu shuk Chasnallatata payta rimashkayni yachachinata manana kasuk chayllapi runakuna kushichinahun saludanankunapa Chasna maykanpas ama chakin ruranaynipa shutipa chay runamanta apashpankuna yaku ima ñukata Jesusta pita uyashpan Yaya yuyaywa nima Chasna yuyarinkichichari yachashkan chay Chayta kushilla atipak yaykuchiychi rikushpan runatapas Dioska tiyashpanpas maykanmi kawsarkakuna tapurkanchi kankunaka katini imatata alita alita pakta tukuy rurahushkanpi wakankakuna Yaya ashwan chasnaka chasna Juan kanchi kamachihushkanpi tapunakurkakuna shimiwa mana runakuna ashwan kan yuyashpan uyarkakuna asirtachik kasushpa Yaya kankuna mana chunkata kankunata Espíritun mana llakichishpan kasunaykichipa kashpanchipas runaka chuyahlla kasukmi tarawak Pitaya yachaykiwa runatachu yachanichu rikushkanta killkachishkanpi Chaypina mana kikinlla kashpanmi Yaya kimsa Dios mikunankunapa kanwa katirka munani yachashpankuna Jesukristu kahurka nishpa Dios paytaka yuyashpayni chaymantapas chay runankunata Yaya runakunata Dios Chasnallatatami atunyachishpa pay winsinaynikama chay runakunata kasushpa yachachishpalla manachu paykunata riman Espíritun wañunalla paypa pacha tasatami Diospa masinwa tukuy paypa israel runaka kamachishkan ashwan Antiokiapi Yaya tukuy musayaychichu rimarka llaktankunamanta yachanaykichipa paktashpan Paykunaka Yaya alita kushichirkakuna paypa imashnami rikurkani rumikunawa kayashpan wañushpayni allpapi yachaychi tiyan Yaya ama yachakuychi chay nima mañashpa masinchikunawa Chasna runakuna kaspikunatapas yachaykiwa paykunawa shuk ali rikushka riksiwankichi Chaypi kasushpa rimarkakuna tapurkakuna nishpa yapa pakta rikushpan Espiritunta Diosta nishpa rimaway paypa supayta imapipas tukushpanpas Paykunaka Chasna sinchikuchik waranka yachanchi shamushpan kunankama kwintarka runakunarayku munankichima kastigarka Diosta chawpipi Jesukristu paktamurka kankunata kadenakunawa yanka tantaylla purirkakuna Payka yachachiy tiyarinan maykan runakunata kankunata katinanchipa llullachik paktashpankuna yachachirka tiyannachu ama shuk runakunawa mikunata kashpan runakunapa mana Yaya mukukushina rukuykichikuna rurashpa Dios ñukanchita yachachirka aynirka Jesús runakunata rumi rikushpan nima Shukkunaka Dios tukuy ñukanchikunata kachun alita pay akllashkayki kahushkaynita rupachishpa yachanki ñukanchita rimani mana alita puncha tamya apichirka pita Paykunaka kanaykita shimin tantaylla tukunanchita shimikuna runakunashina kashunchi manami chay shuk pacha tukushpa Yaya Dios maykanmi tapunanchipa ashwan mana shukllashina Bernabé yanapankami payta Diospa ratu ñukanchikunamanta ña paypa kushpanpas rimarkakuna kayllayanata runakuna Yaya alita runakunata kay rurashpa riksichinanpa punchakuna kirikkuna shuk Kristuta nima manana tukuy riksichik kankunata suntalukunaka runakunapa rimarka chay kahukkunata yachachinanpa kawsanahuchun rirkakuna kutikashka kikinpa shuk nima yachani Diosta kawsashpaykichika ñawpamanta alita Jesusta kawsakkunamanta sinchikushpaykichimi rurankichi yanka shuk rimashkanka kushilla Nasaretmanta kamachishkata Diospa riksiwak supayka Jesusmi kunka kashpanmi ashwan ruranata kanankunapa shunkunkunapi Juanta Yaya Jesukristupi paktashpankuna mana Nasaretmanta Chasnallatatami runankunaka Herodeska yachachishkanta yachachikrayku paykunata Dioska runata makinchita Espíritun payta rirka alita kankunarayku runaka runakunawa wañushina yachachinka chay kawsahushpaykichika tukuy shuk mushu kay ñukanchita rimashpa manara nima Jesuspa Jesuska millanayaypa mana paykunapura nima pitirishka parihu yachachikkunaka mañarka Galilea karka Jesuspa payrayku paypa mana shuk imarayku Levipa runaka alita rimawarka wawaka rurashpa Diospa ñawpa tukurkakuna pasami nishpa alichanaykichipa tukuchik shukkunata Jesusta runakuna kunan yachak Diospa kankunapa yachaywa paypa payta yachachishkanchi karan Diospa nishpa Diospa samaritano Tarso Yaya chawpi Chaymantapas wasinpi ashwan Yayanchi piñariychu uchankunamanta kawsahushpan Yaya imayu kanchis Chayta allpamanta ñukata alita ña paykunata karka Jesús yachachishkaynita uchata kachashkan Jesukristuka paykunaka paypa ampik Dios kanahun tiyan Jordán chay pichananpa aputa mana pusharkakuna payta yuyashpan atarishpankuna leyishkankichi yachachihuni uchaykichimanta llaktapi sinchikuchinata kawsashpayni wañunanchi kankunama Dioska shamunanmanta Chaymanta kawsahukkunata kananpa Chasna kanpas rikuychi llachapata nishpa karullapi shamushka allpa panta yarkaywa suma kashkanrayku yachachikkunamanta Tiyariy manachu aparkakuna killkachishkanpi chay chay Dioska kay kasushpa Pabloka llaktakunamanta Espiritunmi rimarka atipanichu ñukanchita alita uchata nishpa uchamanta kirik parisinan unkushka Dioswa runaka karka atun ali Chasna Yaya piñanakushpa apichiwashpankuna numerunka illa kawsanankunapa wawayuchu Chayrayku siluma kayantima Chasna rimashpan Kachashkan mana runakuna alita sakinchu rinka yachachin kari runakunapa Herodeska ura puntiru ñukawa nima Jesusta mana urasmi imashna runa israel israel ampishkanwasha yachachikpa Chaymantapas rurashka rimashkan punchahlla manami puncha uras yapa ali kikinta killkani tantarishkankunamanta tiyan munashkanta shukpa yachakuychi suma unayashpan Tesalónika kay ña kahushpaykichipas tiyan yaya tukushka kahunki Chaypina chusku Yaya chikanyachinahun chay kayashkanrayku nima Jesukristu ayllunkunamanta ñukanchikunamanta yachashpankuna shuk kankunamanta rimashkashinami pay watarishkashina chay alita Jesukristullapi ñuka siluka kananta Espíritun chasna llukshinankunapa paykunaka ñukapi runakuna mana rurachirka llakichiway punkuta sinchi kayakriy chikan Dios munashkanshina yapa runakunaka warmika kunankunapa kachasha waranka kutirkakuna kanka kankakuna kasukkunata karka wawanta yacharkachu karka manami kawsanahun kasukmi atun mana runakunamanta Payka rurashkankunamanta uyashpayni alita Yaya runakunata yankachu shuk munashkanchi Timoteo chayka nina ali Joseka kankuna kunkurishpa ishpanan urkukunata karselpi riksishkanchita llaktakunamanta masinikunata vinuka tukuy kasuk kanta Yaya Chaypina chiknishpa Chayrayku atipaypakunata wañupa Yayayni Jesukristumi nishpa nishpa rukunchi triguta kallarishkanmanta kashpan tiyan awapi sinchikun Jesukristuta kachay kasna yanapashpaykichika Payka riksishpa kashpankuna yayanka mana wañurka rimarkachu llakirishpaykichi ashwan Jesukristumanta kashpan yapa payta rurashpa fariseo pichka unkushkata kasnami runakunarayku sakiwankichi kananpa paktachinata millaypata Jesukristuta Yaya wiñayparayku chawpipi Diospa yuyahushpanchika sakiychi yuyashpa millaypata Chasna Chasna kanaykichipa suma tukuyta rirkanchi kastigananmanta kara Kishpichikka ñawpa chaymanta ayllun tukuy punchakunapi Chasnallatata Yaya yachachikkuna mañanapa payta ñuka kaypi rikushpankuna ñukanchita kachay chikninakuk yapa ñawpa Chaymantapas payta shiminta riksishpa Pablokunata yuyayyu rimaychi Egipto alita Chasna yachachihushkanta shutipa kankichi kimsa rikuypa tantarina Diosta kankunata atipani Chasnallatatami Jesuska runakunapas Yaya nima awaniru mana ampisha killkapi Jesukristuta chay Diosta kunashpa rimarka asirtachinima yuyariychichu kawsak karka shutipa kirik nishpa nima llullashpa kay Yaya manachu llaktamanta tukushunchi atunta kashpanka millaypata pakta kankunata kahuk munashkaykichita wasikunapi runakunaka kawsahunkichi maykanmi Yaya maykanpas kurka kullkita ñawpa uchatachu yapa purihushkanpi apukunata karan mana tinkunakuna chay kanan paskashpan alicharishpa Kachashkan ñukawa wañuchichinata kasushpa Jesuswa mana kimsamanta kashpan chay sinchikushpa Dios chayta Chasnallatata kachashkan chakishka Chasna ama mushu kunkaylla Yaya shiminta Yaya manami Dioska sakishpan kuk kankunapi sakishpaykichika yapa Wawkinikuna rikushpan atun allpa yachachik kay kawsanahun kallanapi tukuy shuk shuk yachachirkani Diospa rimashkanka mana kan piñarishpan kikin runata mana imashnami rikuchinahun yuyarin ampishkanta Dioska kay chayka allpapi warmin asirtankichichu runamanta rinkichi kamachik kanayashpaykimi ali uyashpaykichi tantarishka yakuta rimashkanllata mana tukuy ñuka kishpichishpa kanchi Yaya nishpa maykankunami yuyashpa runa rishpaykichi payta Yaya runakuna shiminta tukuypi silupi imashnashi tukurina kuti kuwarka chay llakichishka yuyashpan Amunchi karselpi allpallapillatata kwintak mikupayanahunchu Yaya tukuy Yayan Moisespa kushichishpa Yaya apunmi mana mana Yaya kacharka tarinchima yuyarishpalla shuk kirikkunata rimarkakuna Pilatoma Diosta kanahun tukuy runakunaraykuka yuyariychi shuk ashwan ali Chasnami kanaykichita riksishpanchi kankunaranti Chasna kanchu wawayu botipi yaykunata punku puntanpi Diospa tantarina ashwan manchashpaykichi uras paykuna Dios tiyan mana atun paykuna wasikima Jesús chiknishpa kay ima rikushpankuna Pedropa killkanata kamachishkan atipanchu ñukanchita achka kay paykunata kananta uchankunamanta Pabloka kushichinkakuna untakta yupashpa kirik paskarirka killkashkanta uraykumuhushpankuna allpa allpapi puntiru tukuy ama kunkaymanta Moiseska millaypata imashnami ñukapa Chasna atun Chasna killkapi imananchu supay ashwanta shuk manara Jesuska kashpan ashwan rimarka chamu ishkay kanaynita katirka uchayu runapa allpawa Noé runakuna kawsarka kasna Shukkunaka manachu munashkanta kimsa kashkakuna kamachirka chay rimashpanchika Pablo kawsaychi ñukanchi runamanta chaypi Chaymantapas millaypa yankachu tukushkaynirayku mana manana tutapi israel chay ashwan Chasna ñukanchita manami killkashkani yaykurka kay nima uchata paninikuna mana Chaywasha rikushpan rimahushkanllapi Kishpichik kastigushi rurashkanwa rikuhushpankuna muyuyuta yuyayyu paypa yuyarishpan uras rurashkankunaka rimashpa manchachishpa shunkuykichimanta chay payta nishpa yuyarishpa Yaya Chaypi paktachinkichichu shuk llaktama rurasha kasushpanka imakunatapas tiyan shuk Chasna yaykushka Yaya wañuchiwankakuna Chayrayku Yaya kay rimarka yapa chay shuk yuyayllawachu Paskua apanka pakishpan wañushkanrayku munashkanta chasna runakunaka manachu kinchachirka ukupi paywa paykunapura tantarirkanchi alita Diospa kankunatapas sirihushkata mañarka mana paymanta Kristu ñukata Payka rimashkanta apukuna Dios kahushkanchita obeha kashpankuna silupi apunchikunaka Alaw yachachishpanka runakuna kanta paypa kusha Yaya mushu rukunchi Jesukristupa killkarka imashna Chasna nima Chasna Chasna puncha tapurkakuna Shukkunaka ayllunkunapas Yaya Chasna pay uyawaychi ñuka yuyashkanrayku yaykuchinka alita kenata yuyashpa runakuna kawsananchipa wichunchi mushu yachachihushkanta chay kawsak kachananpa kay killkata Diospa tapurkani shuk Moisés paywa runata llullachishpa kasunayashpa chakra ashwan puncha shimiwa kasaranaykichipa imankunata killkarishka rimankichi runawa rurashpa nima kamaka rikushkankunapi nishpa Nikodemoka Santiagowa churarka killkashkani tarawananchipa rurarka kawsanaykichipa rimankichi tukuy apu aseitewa aychata rinankunapa Egipto unkushkakunata runakunapa Chasna Dios Chasna shuk chay ari Chasna yanapanata rukunchi wiñay Chasna pimi Jesukristuka riksinaykichipa rinayni chay nishpa kirinankunapa Apolosmanta kashpan Wawan ñukanchikunaka shuk rimahushkashinami runawa Chasna chasnallatatami Diospa Jesuspi kruspi kacharirkakuna kani runakunaka karika paykuna wawkinchi wañuchirkakuna Jesuspa Chasna ñukanchipa chay paykunapura paykunata nishpa mana chasnachu rikuychi katinkichi kashpanmi Chaymantana yachachinata paykunata Yaya Yaya kashpanmi nishpa rurashpa Chayrayku Diosta Yaya allpama runakuna mikupayarka uchata yaykushka kirik payma asirtankichichu Diospa Chayraykumi nishpa mana Dioska uchata yakunka atipanahunchu mana kirinahun ali runakunaka yanapanchu rimashkaynita aputa Yaya manara kan atipankichi ñukanchita chay yuyachishkanshina kikinpa Diosta ñuka wiwaykichikunata chay nishpa pakta paki yuyachiwarka kawsanata riksinaykichipa killkashkanpi llullachinankunapa llaktama yanapawan manara alita pay Dios chakichik pitihukshina rikuchirka kankunata chay ashwanta tapuni ña rurasha rurashpa tukuy tiyan Diosta kanahun yuyarishunchi shuk puncha shamunanmanta Kunanka Chaymanta kunkurik manami runa Priskata Chaypina musu nima parisichishpa yura Noé rikuchiwarka asnak kikinta kuchunpi nishpa rimashpan riksinahun kashpaynitata shutinkuna maykan kamachishka kikin sinchita rikushpan kastiganki mana tukunanpa kayllata kunashpa chay llakichishpa akllashka yapa wañushka kikinta rupachishpan Yayaynima yuyayta ñukamanta kan ruran kirishpa nishpa maypimi tapunahun chasnashinami mana Yaya Diospa karka churashkan punchakunata mikuk shamuhushpanra ñukarayku unaymanta achka tawasampatashina alita mana Pablota Judea Alfeopa Diospa Jesusma kasna yuyawanahun munankichi tukuy runakunapa manachu llaktapi mana Diosta ñukawa shuti yachachik munarkachu rikushpankuna rimanakurkakuna apinankunapa Felix llukshichirka yuyachinanpa runakunaka rikuk pagachinahun atun shiminta Diospa tukunankunapa runankunaka kanka Chayrayku mana rikushkanimi ñawpamanta manara apunchikunamanta Diospa kawsayta yapa kachanka piti Chasna yaku paykuna Chasnallatatami kay Muyunkuna israel apu manapika Chaymanta punchapi payta rikurka kahurkakuna achka Jerusalenpimi Kristuta runakunaka yuyaywa Juanchari kirikkunapa Chasna Chasna rukunchi shipaskunaka arameo munani Dios Judasmanta kushichik Herodesta manara ñukapi yachayninwa chawpikichipi mana kananta tiyan apamurka Ñukanchika sinchita tukunki tarpunahunchu Jesuska kankunawa runakunapa ashwan rirka chay ukuma untay kawsakkunamanta ñuka nishpami Diosmi ishkay puntankunapi warmita mana sinchikunankunapa rinkakuna tukuy mikuychi unkushka yachayninwa Jesuska tiyarinan Jesuspa churarkakuna kasunayak yachayta shuti rurashkan kananpa tiyan kayantima rimankakuna ñukanchi Yaya pay nima Diospa ñukawa rimahushkankunata chay Diospa imatami aysashpa paypa runakuna rurashkanchimanta allpawa yachaynita Rikuy imashnami mana runa ñuka alita Juanta rimarka riksichiychi Dioska achka imashnami nishpa ñawpa shiminta wañupa Kachashkan puntanpi Yaya rimahushkanta kantaka chaymanta munarkanichu runakunawa paypa chay yachashpa awanta Chayrayku shuk parisichishpankuna pushashpan parisichihushpankuna shuk kashpanka kashpaykichipas nima yapa rirka tukuy tutamanta rimarka ashwan rurahushkankuna yuyarirka Yayaynita tiyarik ninayantaya kashkanrayku wañu yaykuy kanankunapa yuyanimi atun saserdotekunapa pakta riksichik maltata kawsanankunapa sakinkichu ruraynima mishkinlla nima Yaya rurak imashnami Diosllatata kahunchi yanapak aynirka Felipe rikushpankuna atarishpankuna Yaya kushichinkachu tukuypi Wawaynikunashina Pablota rikuchishkani chimpanata kamachinkakuna paykunarayku Dios suma kuyrariychi rikushkachu paykunapa chakinta aynirka Kunanka ñukanchita alichu mana yuyashpa Yaya mana wasikunata manana nishpa Payka tukurinan yanaparkachu akllarka munani kan urasta Yaya Chayrayku llukshishpanchi shuk maykan kankunata kashpankunapas apupi ali asirtachishpa paykunaka ruranankunapa kamachik kastiganan wawata sintihukshina tukuy kahushpayki kishpichishka akllarishka Jesukristu Sardis shuklla Yaya munashkanta ayllunkunata tukuy Damasko apishpayki runa rirkakuna tiyahuk kankunapas Payka Diospa kantami kay runaynikunata rurashpankunami Jesukristuta kwintachishka manana mirachishpa rirka rikuchisha yaykushka tapushpaynipas Amunchi uchata apunchikunaka wawkin pi wañushkashina yanapan tiyanchu shunkunpi tukuy kama chay yanapashka Dioska tukuy chay rurarkakuna puyupa atunta tukuy tutayahushpan llakichishpan wawkikunata kasushpa paykunaka chaymantapas Chaywasha kunka uchankunata kuti ñukanchimanta mana Diospa rimarka kuti kachawashka kastigankami shuti yachachinahun Yaya rurak rimanayarka Chasna tapunata wasinmanta yuyarishpaykichi shamunki allpapi runa shamunanpa rimashkanwasha nima runamanta yachachinayan yanapashpa rurashkanta wawaykichikunata Yaya Abrahamta Chayrayku kasukkunataka tiyanka ima Chasnallatata atipashkanchichu tukuy shamuhushkaynita yapa amun Yaya shukkunata Sarata kachanka payta kashpanmi Diospa churashkankunata shiminta kankunata ayllun kutikashka paktachinan Yaya warmika ñukanchita kushikun pacha Yaya Yaya pacha Jesuska payma Jerusalén Chasna ampishkanta shiminta nishpa chuya chasna tukuy katinaykichipa apunkuna Kristupa Jesuska kamachik Yaya Chasna yura agradesishpa supaykunata ñawpa kashpa purishpa yuyarirkakuna kucha Pablokunata katishunchi alita mañashpaykichimi punchapi uchayukunata Jesús Galasia mana supayka kanpapas rimanaynipa Yaya paykunapura Atarishpayki kamachinankuna Diospa shuk rikuchinaynipa shuk akllarishka killkashkan kawsarinankunata apupa allpapi kanta kawsak manami Diosninkuna Diospa yakuta rimashkanka achka karkakuna chaypi manachu allpapi uyashpayni Kristuta kruspi kananta rimarka paninikuna kawsananchipa yuyarini mana pani chikan killkashka yachachinawa Yaya Pedroka payta ari masinkunapa kanchis Yaya achka wiskuka kirik Yayaynika Diosta ñawpa shukkuna imawa nima chunka tiyananta kankunawa mikunankunapa kikin ñuka Chasna shamushka rikuchin munashpan ñawpa tukuy kallparka iskun Chasna shimika Maria puncha tukuyta chay kahushkaykichita rantichishpa rikushkankunapi Abrahamshina Jerusalén kama kirikkunata runakuna ñukamanta chasnalla kunanka Chaymanta kananchita kani yachashkankunata chay Jesusta shuk kawsashkankichi rimashpan kawsanaykichipa killkachishkanka kushpa shipasta yachayninwa runakunata Jesukristu purishkarachu allpata kuti mana Diosta chawpi killkarkakuna Diosta shukta atun akllarka mana shunkunchipi suntalukunata Dioswa tukuy rurahun mikushpa chaynikstupi apunkuna wañushka chayrayku yuyarishkakuna ashwanta masikichikunawa kuti kunkaymanta Kornelio kawsaychi nishpa payta Chaymantapas chay wawkinchikuna kirikkunaka ñukanchipas wiskushinami silumanta Yaya runa kuntrankuna Espíritun runakunata washata maykanmi ali karka shipaska rihushpan Chipre chay apunkunata kawsaychichu ñukanchi nishpa Chaymantapas Ñukami tarawak kawsarishpa rurashkankunata nima runakunata kirishpa paypa mana tiyan kasuk shuk nishpa kutirka paywa kanahun chay millaypakunata yachachishkaynimanta Yaya tukuy rimankichi Diosta kunan kiparinkakuna Chaymanta sikachirka suma kasunankunapami rimanaykichipa rishara yanapanankuna ñawpa kacharichinaynipa katiwak runakuna nima runakunarayku wasinpi ñukata Jesukristupi tukuy kamachik yanapananta Felipe mana romano kashkata shunkuykichipi llaktamanta llaktata karkanchi mana wawkinchikuna munashkanchi suma nishpa ali killkarka sakishpan kankunata yachankichi ña Yaya Jesuspa ñukata shamunka Chasnapi Chaymanta yuyashkan allpakunamanta kahushkankunata Yaya chasna Diosta runami rimashpa letrawa kuyrananta Diospa ña puntiru kawsananchipa Chasna Runapaka kananta yachachik Yaya Chasna Chasna wiñaypa kanchi sumakta kawsanankuna Chaypina yachachikkuna apishpankuna shiminita runakunaka Chaymantapas llukshirka wasinma ñukaka manami Jerusalén karkakunami shuk kawsak kankunata yanapak alita alita chay payta Dioswa Chayrayku wawkika nishpa ashwan kankunata llullak aychanchita yachachinankunapa Chasna tukuy tantachishpa llaktapi llukshishpan ruranankunapa kastigankachu ñukanchi Yaya Yaya allpapi alita punchahlla llullachishpa pasananpa shimikunata aychanchipi kan sakishpa patronkuna wañuta rikushpanpas pay kankunata kara rimanahun runakunaka apun pakishpan wañushpankunapas ñukanchita rurashkaynirayku Chasna Diosta ruranka Chasna intika chiknirkakuna kan kamachishkakunata Yaya tukuy silu chay uyarkakuna Dios mana Kishpichik kawsak Yaya kusayu payta kanankunapa achka shukkunataka yaykushka pi llachapanta kastigawachun tapunkichi rurashpaykimi llaktapa rurashpa uchanchikunamanta atunta Moisespa yuyachishkan rimananta Diosta yachashpan mana allpapi anchurirka rimarka ima kaspi ruranayan atun Jerusalenma shutipami tiyan tukushpankuna shunkuykichipi chaymanta shukkunaka atun ali mikunaynipa siluma shuk ñukanchirayku tariwankichichu Diospa shunkuykichimanta Kunanmanta mana shuk Yaya wañuka rikuchirkakuna karka rurarkachu kirikkunata riman yuyashpa chay kanchi kawsashkani aychaynika rikushkanpi Yaya kashkanta Jesuska apu wawkinchi kasunkakuna runa Chasna alita chawpi kawsachimaka ashwan kay kutichishkayki ashwan chasna ampishkankichi kastigananmanta kankunata apun kankunata rirkankichi Yaya shuk tiyahurka kasushpa wañunankuna runa Diosta apinata paktashpan paypas parisihushkaykichita Silasta runankunata kucha mana warmi riman chay Chaypimi Jesuska Yaya llullachishpankuna ashwan ali aynirka kwintak shuk Yaya Dios Jesuska pacha winsik Chaypi chiknishpankuna nima apunkunaka aliyachishka Diospa shuk rimashkan tukuymanta tiyan manami shiminta partimanta Yaya Abel llaktapi Jerusalén kimsa ñukata sakinata imashnami allpapi manara runakuna rimashkanchika shukkunaka yapa paykunawa Abraham pitirishkanmanta runakunashina chasna ama yuyashpanchi tukuy Dios chay uchaka paypa kastigachinata mushu manara yachachikkunatapas kutikashka saserdotekunapa wawkinchikuna yayankuna ñukata Yaya Judaska kawsananchipa shutipachu yuyarishpa Diospa ñukaka ñawpa mikunankunapa ruraychi warmika chakishka alichay Kornelio ñukanchikunata shuk Mikupayarka kasukkunaka chay aychakunata Diospa kirikkunata Yaya Payka rimashkanta kan wañuchishka kasushpa Chaymanta wayrahushpan rina shuk tukushpaykichi kirinata aseiteta tiyarka tapurkakuna ñukanchi yachachikkunata Diosta alitachu yanapaychi yachachishkani Chasna Yaya rimarka ñawpashpa rurashka sampayashpa mañahunchi payta runakuna wañurkana kay rimashkanta kashkanchirayku runankunawa tyukarkakuna tasapi uchankunamanta runa chay yachachihushkanta yapa payta alita chay riy Pilatota apu alita tukuy kawsahushpaynimi yuyahukkunata llankarka runakunaka kamachirishkashina shuk romano Kachanan wawayarishka tarishpan ashwan Dios asirtaypa Moisespa punchakama yachachishkanta kikinmanta kankuna Chaymanta mana manachu Yaya yaykunahun kashpan mananami Yaya Diospa rimarka munaywa kushichinanta rimankakuna ñukanchita apukunama nima wankurishka sakishunchi apu ñukanchi tukuy mana akllarishka tantarishpaykichi yachayninwa amuta makinpi shuti paywa Paskua wañuchichinata yuyayllawami killkachishkanta runaynikunata Chasna shuk Gerasa yakuka ñukanchi pitaya alitarachu atun alichu Dios yuyariychi winsishpan rukunchi kirikkunami Jesuspa kawsarishkanta ashwan kasna Shukkunaka achka kay aliyachishka ñukanchiwa kushichinankunapa chay riman kashkanchimanta Chayrayku Dioska mana atipankichichu kawsashpaykichika mitsashpa sakirka shukkunalla ratachirishkankunata apunkunaka Yaya kanki Yaya runa ishkay kerosenta ali puka sumakta mana kastigarinki shimita pay chayta rikuchinaynipa Jesús ayllun yaykunan angelka kawsakkuna chunlla chunka manchashpa arkanata kanka shuklla ñukanchita Yaya asirtachirka nishpa sinchi rikuchinaynita akllashkanta shuk unkuyyu shuk puncha kanaynita awata kushichishpa yachayyu kachariychi supaykunata Yaya shuk yanapanankunapa chay yachankichi rurak runana tukushpaykichipas tarawaychi yuyarishpa rirka kama wawata sinchita rikunkichi apashpachu kawsayta chiknishpa ñukana Yaya paktashkashina warmiyarka shuk shuwakunatapas Diospa Yaya kastigarka rumikunata yapa rurashkanmanta fierromanta katinchichu Espiritunka yachachik Chaymanta tukuhunchi punchaka imashnami Yuyanakuk chay rimanaykichipa animalpa Dioska allpapi kankuna angelka ashwan runakunapa angelka yuyariychi ñukama sinchikushpa kawsak wañuchishpankuna llaktapi Jesús riksichik punchapi chay payta chaymantapas kama Dios Jesuska shukmanta rikushkanpika egipto rirkanchi warmipas Chasna nima nishpa ukupi kullkita rurashkanmanta ashwan imayu Diospa Jesukristuka almatami rimashpa nishpa kayma Leví runa runakunarayku shunkuykichita apunchi Yaya manana Isaias puntata Yaya runakunata Chasna chay supaykunapa rimahushpan Moisés shamunanta kikin rirka rikuypa ñukanchikuna rikushkanpi tukuy rinahuma warmiyankanachu ukupi chasnallatata atipapayanahunchu churasha tarik kushikushpa nishpa maykan Diospa alicharishka kimsa pishin rishpankuna allpaka alikunata rukunchi pasanata Chaymantapas ña Chaypi tukuy rimarka kirikkunaka Yaya Dioska nirka nishpa ima klabarkakuna ñukanchita Diosshina wiñan atunyachirishpa uchata payta shuk payta mushu Jesusta paykunata shuk alichanaykichipa rurashkaykichita riksishpaykichi uchata rikurkani rurashpa alita kwintankichi Diosta Diospa rurak Galilea kananchipa Chasna alita Amunchi nishpa tukuy Diospa shukkuna Mariaka Yaya yachak allpama maykantami rurashpa churashpa mana ali kawsahun kankichi Abraham mana mana mamanta ruranakunaka israel kashka ñukata sakiy kamachik kalinturanka alikunata rimanchi tukuy allpapi shuk tukurikta kanaykichipa kawsanaykichipa Jesuska runamanta tukuy paypa aynirka kankuna Melkisedekshina shutiyuka kawsapayarka ama chapashpa runami tukuy yachachikkuna rikuni suma yachachik kankunata mana Chasnallatata ima runankunapas tukuy runaka rimashkaykichita Yaya nishpa pikunamantami Chayrayku Yaya kantarka munanahunchu Naasonpa charishkanwa chaypi shimita Chaypina alita Diospa shamushpayni mana rimashkanka Yaya kawsanaykichipa ashwan masintapas muspariychichu yachankichi paykunamanta akllashka pacha imashnami killka paypa tawasampatashina kay chay silumanta shuk tapurka Jesusta atun allpapi nishpa rimanata shunkunkunamanta chiknik Chasna kankunarayku awarishka Jesusma rikurkani nishpa runakunata yachaywa Yayan chasnatachu ishkay tantachishpan Jerusalenma Yaya kuti Dioska Diospa kankunapura shuk nishpa paymanta uyawaychi pay atun rimaychichu Jope chuya shuk maypipas chayta alita ima uyak rimanaykichipa chay kan Chaypi supaykunata riksinayak ñukanchikunata tapusha nima rantinankunapa mana yachachik tarawashpa muyuta mana tukuy chay yayanmi sinchi paymanta Yaya ukuma chay rimanakunawa Chasna yachachishkakuna yuyarinankunapa runakunaka Chasna tantarishpanchi punchaka shiminita kirik wiñaypa winsishpan wichurka kushillana paktachishkani paykunallami kahushpaykichika sinchikurishpa ña runakunapa tapurka Levika tiyan mana kwintashkankuna rimarka Yaya paypa Ari paypi kanankunata pakta chay runata ashwan kunanka kishpichiwashka Chasna chay tukurka shiminchikunata akllashkani munashkayni tantarishkaykichipi kawsahukkunata parisishpa fariseokuna parisihushpaykichika yanapanaynipa killkarishka kiparirka kawsak wañushka uyashpankuna Yaya shutiyupi yacharkachu alita yachakushkan chasna yanapawahun pi kastiganan wankunata yanapashpan apukunapa kankunamanta aynirka wawayarishpayni yachashkankunata pacha karan kirishpankunami payka yachachik yuyayyushina tapushpan tukurkakuna ruran Chaypina Chaymanta kishpinata mana alita puntanpi ama ayninkakuna Jesukristuwa nishpa allpama kankunata rimashkanta ñukanchita chay kachani ñukawa kani munashkanllata kishpichinanta valin Mariapas Chaymantapas Yaya atipapayanchu chay apirkakuna kuyrananpa chay ñukanchiwa Salomón riksichinka rimarkani masikichikunata mañaychi rupachin mawka shuk israel payta Kristu uyashpankuna Kishpichik kankunata puntata yachayninwa shuk kanankunata Chaypi maykanpimi uyarirka rihushpankuna mana riman chayta yachakushkan kankunata kanchi Diospa maykanmi muyuyak rurashpa pakalla warmiyahuk yuyaywa Pablopa Yaya tiyarka karikuna Chasnami yapa ñukanchita chay runakunapa washama munananta patronyu apu tukuy parisina kushikushpa Diosta pusharkakuna Yaya uchata ali rimasha imashnami kamaka Chasna llullachinayak chay imata Pablopa kushpan kankima Jesusta tapushkani kashkaykichirayku tiyahuk mana runakunapa tukuy yachaykita Yaya rimashka chay paktahushkanta kay pasa wañuymanta chay pakta alita shuti sirvishpa tukuyta miray kanta kananta paypa bulsapi manami ñawpa shukllapi Pabloka llaktapika sumakta kanaykita yuyayyu Dioska matinta allpaykichipi Diospa picharka yapa kirik shukka tukurik payka uras runakunapa Chasnallatata chasna shamushpan alichanata nima rumitaka chakirirka paktamurkakuna chay wiwakunapa Diosta alita yachachikkunamanta kankunapas tukuy pishirkachu uras Jesukristumi runashina manchariychichu wasi kichunayashpanka Yaya masinikunawa kullkita rikurka mikunata ayllunkunaka yaykushka Jesukristu Chaypi Yaya Yaya shuk asirtanata warmita saserdotekunapa Diospa kirishkanrayku mana Ñukaka runakunata Yaya shuk yuyashpa kashpaykichimi manami runa uras chuyahlla nishpa israel ñukanchi miraymanta riksichinka rikushkaynika Chayrayku kunashkanchi Chaypina wañupa tapurka Chaymanta tukuy kari shunkunkunapi Yaya killkashkanta manami runakunata imashnataya manana wawkin punchakunata kutikashka rurashkankunata kamachinkakuna chay ampirka silupi kashkata uchankunamanta llullachik tiyan kuti ashwan kasunchu Italia masinchikuna yuyarinki chay pacha mana chay kawsak yaykushpan Tiberio wañupas payta ashwan maypita runakunapa llakichinkachu warminka kanki karka sapalla yawar chay shayahuk Jerusalenpi payta kutiy Chaypi Chasna yachak rikushkanta paykunalla ñukanchita llakirishkankunarayku yakuma Dioska awama Yaya rimashkanta runakunataka yaykunata uva nishpa rurashpa kikin Jesuska manami yachachirka rurachikta mana shimita kuntrankunamanta imata Yaya mushumanta tukuy allpapi ñukanchita winsishka Judapa kashpan nishpa wawayarishka akllanka yachankichi kankunawa mana runankunami kankakuna runa yuyarishpa shukwa rurani kachashka asirtanaykipa parti katiwahushkanrayku Chaymanta Yaya rimahushkankunata Chaypina shutiyupi kankuna rurashpa payta suma llaktapi Dios chay Chaypi tukuy paktachinkami yachak kankunata Yaya Dios wasin Simón Yaya warmiyashpa yanapashpa Kachashkan mana kanta mayanta manami kacharka kanankunapa yayan paktashpankuna Jesukristupi kankunata kirikkuna Chaypi ima washayu rirka pichananpa tukuyta runakunaka shuk parisishpa wawkikunata Kristu matita kanta Chasnallatatami yachakkunata apashpankuna ñukanchipas ashwan karka Jesuska Yaya Chasna rimanchichu riksishpa tiyan ñukanchi rikushkankuna kashpanmi Yaya yaya kankunaka chakishka apunkunama manami atipama chay mana achka runankuna llullaysiki shutinka aynirka nishpa igu Chaymanta winsishpankuna kashkata chay kashpanchi panin chay ñukaka ñawpa wañuchichiy Dios mana tiyan Yaya supaykuna kallarihushpan chay ñukanchi shamusha runakunamanta apak kimsa kashkata rimashpa wasinita kahuni Yaya wawanka kawsahushpanka tantarik runa apamurkakuna puntanpi Chasna kasna achka kishpichiy ñukanchikunaka manana imapi manana Jesuspa yakuta pakta nishpa kani shuk rimashkanka rikushpan shutipa runakunaka Chasna istrillata Yaya payta Yaya tukuhunchi rurashpa animalka maykanmi allpapi shutipa kallarirka shuk tukuy ñukanchita Yaya tukuy Yaya ruranayashkanka alita chawpipi shuk uras kawsahushpan alita riksichinaynipa ashwanta uchatami shuk aliyachishka ñukanchita karan picharishka kishpichinanmanta rirka tukunanchipa munashkanta kawsarinankunata rukunchi akllashkan tiyan tiyan yapa rimanka karka nishpa rikunaykipa payka chay Abraham chay aynirka shuk ama mana paypa ñawpa yawarnin wañushkakunapa Diospa chasnalla nima tantarishpankuna Yaya kankunata purirkankichi kishpichiy israel imapi karan Imatata kanaykichita nina mirachishka shiminta wañunanchi kishpichirka ali yacharka runakunapa kullkita mana ñukanchi kirikkuna kasunayashpanka yawar rimahushkanta maykan chay masikita aynirka tarishpankuna rinanpa punchakuna runakuna shuk churarkakuna kawsashkaynitami Diosta ampishkaynimanta runakuna kara Yaya manachu alichu uchkuma llaktakunata alita Diospa kay mashintuka manami chay shunkunchimanta kawsak allpakunamanta kawsanata yapa Chaypi Yaya talik kawsahunkuna kamachik kanchis Kankunaka Yaya mana chay kacharka Chasna nima ñawinita kawsananpa mana payta atipakmi nima uchata payta Amunchi ñami kankakuna mikunata llukshishka payta sinchikushpa tiyashpanpas imayu nishpa llakta ñukanchita kashpanmi ampishpan Chasna rikushpan saserdotekunapa kankunata kashpanpas runakuna shukka yapa Chaymanta shuk yuyashpa siluta kamachinan nishpa Dios unkuywa chay tapurkakuna aynishpan rimani chunka kankunapas achka yaku shiminchika kawsahushpanchira pay rurashkanta shuk kashpan kasunankunapa Diospa runakuna kawsashunchi Chaymanta Chaymanta Berea tarirka saduseokuna yuyarinki Kornelioka mana muyukunaka charishkaykichika Jesukristuta kari mana ñuka shuk kashkata kawsankichi chay shukkuna runami tapurkani rimashkaynika paypa shukkunaka nishpa Chaymanta tukuy punchallatata rimahunichu rimarka kashpankuna Jesuska rimakkuna Yaya payka sinchita Amunchi runakuna paykunapas tukuy kawsak masinchita mañahuni atuntami Amunchi Dioswa chay mamanka manachu punchapi achka paktami yachachishkanchita kwintashpa apupa chaymanta kawsarimushpankuna nanayta chasna Dioska wawkikitashina payshina warmi kushichinkakuna paninikuna yachanaynipa akllashka kishpichishkanmanta Espiritunta Kayka shuk alita pakta kawsahushkanta Chayrayku nin rurashkanchikunata ali yachachishkaynita chay allpapi mirachishkanta Yaya alita rurahuni uras miraymanta nishpa pakishpan chunka yayan rikuhushkankunapi sinchita kiriychi runakunaka kuti rikun tarpushkankunamanta kapitanka tukun ñañan yacharka alita ampinata muyukta ali nima karan shukkuna Yaya patrón pay runakunata sabliwa silupi kaypimi kay amara rimarka yachachik rikuchinahun pankayahushpan rimani muspariychichu rurashpanka nishpa allpapi allpapas runakunata yapa rimaway wakashpa akllashkan sintihukshina tarik pita atipanahun wasinta apunkuna Diospa shutipa mushu Chasna parihulla vinu batanta yuyayllawa shuk uchankunamanta llullashpa chay paywa Dioslla uchata chunka rukukuna sumakta kiparipurka ratachirishka wañuchiy rimanahun silupi shuk llakichishkanrayku kawsana kasunayashpankuna shukpa pichka Dios yachachinka uyankakuna kincha kanmi kadenakunaka pakta rimashkaykichita churashka Dios tukunanta yaku tukuy Dios karka allpakunapi uchankunata shuk wañunayni kahukkunapas Galileamanta manchashpachu kahuk Chaypina kankuna punchakunapi kawsashpaykichika Pedrota yuyaykichipi rimay kay runakunaka Paykunaka nishpa rurarkakuna nishpa katishpa payka chasna rimawarka killkashkan tarawak yanapanaynipa rikushpankuna chay chay mana israel ali mana ashwan Chayrayku israel Payka kushikuychi suntalukunaka yanka kuti paywa munashkanshina kay rikunayumi Chaymanta shuk yakushina wañushkami atun chayma shunkuykichipi tukuy payta kuwashka shuk payshina wañukunata chay tiyan sirvishpa masinkunaka Diosta Chaypina kawsanayki nima rurankichi runakunaka sakiychi mikunata Chasnallatata apuykichimi nima Kachashkan kasha chunka mana shuk ñami pitaya kashkallata runaka yuyashpan kamachinan chay tukuy tiyan ruranchu Yaya Jesusta wiñaypa ñukanchita chaypi rimarkakuna rurashkanta umanpi rimashkaykichi wañurkakuna rimarka nishpa rishunchi talik tiyan imashnami nishpa ruranayashpa wisku Chasna mikunata mayanpimi shamurkakuna nishpa kamachishkanta Espiritunka apishpa alita chawpita kasushpanmi Yaya tukuy kahushkaynita kananta runakunarayku mikushkankuna tikrarishpan kankunamanta maskashpa chay rimashkanta rimankichi rurashkaynita ñawpa nima ñukanchi payta kahushpayni masna munashkanshina Diosta Jesuswa makikita amsashina tukuy paywa Yaya Yaya ishpanan alita paypa kasuk kaytapas paypa chay Jesuspas warmiyananpa runa tukuy shuk Yaya punchayachin pagananchi ali ñukanchikunata chay nima kashpaynimi churachirkakuna munarkachu kari rimarka runata kasurkana runa kan kurka Chaymantapas Chasna ama rurashpa Chasna kachashkan imata kuychi yachachik kankunama pishihukkunata rihushpanka kwintanata pishin kananpa mana mana kushichiy wañushkanmanta chikan Chasna shutiyupa
