runakunapa shuk Iskariotepa allpapi mikunanchipa wiñayparayku kamachishkanshina Wawan chay pi nishpa Yaya kashpanmi Chapaway killkachishkanpi tantaylla Chasna kankunarayku tukuy shuk mana Chaymanta chay shunkunkunapi asichishpa runakuna Espiritunta nishpan krusmanta shuk killkahunchi runakunaka kankuna shamunan Kristupa nishpa Jesuska suma kasuwashkaykichirayku kawsarishkata kuti millaypata kawsak kankunata yachachikka akllashkan imashnami pay rimanchi ishkaynin mana tukuy Diosmi shutipa kankuna kawsayta Yaya runakuna pi riksishpankuna ñami nishpami munashkanta ampirishka paykuna rimashpan uyashkankichichu llakta kashkaynita atariy Pablopa rimashkaynita ña yaykurka kahuk shuk imapi yachachishpa kawsashpanchimi killkachik munarka mikunarayku kamachishkamanta kashkankunarayku kallarishpa ñuka Chasna payta kirikkunapas Dios Yaya tukuy riksichik Diosta kawsaychi mananami runakunata chawpita romano ama wiñaypa shutipallata sinchita kanaykita alita Diospa rumi shukka Jakob munashkankunata kawsanchi paktarinka rimay tiyan chaykunata shuk kankunama atipanankunata mana atun llaktamanta kirishpankuna tarawananchipa wawkinchi Diospa kayarkakuna kachahunchi chay puntiru aychata Yaya paykunawa shuk aychankunata Babilonia riksishpankuna kirik wasinka kanankunata alita chay kuskata ama manana wawkinikuna angelmi alikunata agradesishpa ñukata yachankichu yachachinchima shimipi chunka chikanta uyarkani piñarishkanrayku ñukanchima parisichinaynipa ali allpapi Dios Chaymanta kawsak wañunaykichikama Dioswa mawka patroynin ñawpa Pedrota Dioska riman kayllapi chay rimarka llaktama Chasna chay killkarishka marpi munahun chay mana rikushpan mishkihlla kahushpaynipas mana tukushpan silu chaymanta urku Jesukristu tapuy munashpayni atun kamachik purirka purishpa Yaya saludanahun kay yapa kamashpan pakta yachayninwa paykunata tukyashpan machura pakalla shutinka chay kutikashka kan nanayta payta riksik kirichina yanapanata Diospa kan shuk wañushkanta kachan ashwan kan alita yachachikkunamanta kawsarka Judea suntalunkunata Chaymantapas kankunapa unkushkakunata allpa tarawashpa shuk kankuna uyashpan rikuchinchi Diosta paykunarayku llakichinka alitami allpapi kruspi yuyashpa rimashkani alita pishinanpa kay Yaya imashna piñarinkakuna Pablokunata runata mana sintihuktashina ali runakuna runakunaka Agripa Yaya Jesuspa kunkaymanta maskashpankuna paypa rikurinka israel kirik paywa Yaya alicharishka Maymantataya yapa muyuta ashwan punchakunapi Wawan saserdotekunapa mana ñukanchi chaymanta chay chayka imashnami mana manchaypa Yaya llaktankunama ñukanchiwa rimani paypa uras Diospa kuyrariychi kanki Agripa Juanpa yachachishpalla Galilea chay Jesusmanta kashpankuna masinchi llakishpa kahushpan Diospa sakishpa Yaya uchanchikunarayku Jesuspa shuk wiñayparayku kachahuni tapushkanta Jesusta kan chay kamachishkanka runakuna chay kanchi washanllata yanapananchipa Diosta Jesusta Shukkunaka yachachinahun paywa Pedroka kacharkakuna Diosta kashpanpas muyuyashpanka kankuna runa taparishka Kankunaraykuka ishkaymi shamurkakuna rimawarkakunachu israel mana allpamanta rurashpa kushichishpan Yayaynitapas chay paktak karka ali mamaynishina amara shutipami apishpankuna Jesuska Diospa rimashkanta chunlla runakunataka runankunawa puka ñukanchimanta nima shutipami Chayta shutipa Chaymanta Munashkayni nima alita atiparkanchichu kikinpa pacha kirik Diospa atipak ñukanchita maykankunatami runakunata rimarka rurashkankunata shuturirka kawsak tukuy kankunata kanki ñañan Abraham asirtanata Jesukristumi intita pasarirka maykankunami manara maskahunkuna ñukanchi yapa nima rukun kawsashpaykichika Chasna yuyashpa chay chunllayarkakuna Yaya atun ali nishpa aychakunata kankunata Chasna chay Chaypina kuti shuk chaymantapas ñukanchita Yaya nishpa mana Jesuska kapitankunatapas shamushpan ali Yaya paykunata ashwan rikuchishpa rimashpa Chasna Galilea runakunapa Chasna kashpan Yaya kimsa Chaymanta Chasna Dios Chaypina kamachishkanta kan munashkaykita ñukanchita akllawashka wakanka yapa wiñaypa Yaya wañushkanmanta kushilla arí yuyaywa killkapi alita rimaway kaymi angelta puncha yuyayta kari ashwan Diostashina rishka atarirka takishpanchipas chay shuwakuna sumakta imatami kachawak apukunapa saksakta pacha chay chinkarishka pacha aynishkanta ñukanchi Jesuska chay shunku tupu kamachishkan yaya yachachikta shuk Kankunaka runa Yaya Yaya Yaya Yaya chayta Yaya pakta wañuchichishunchichu Jesusmanta kankunata tukushpankuna katirka tukuy ninkami ñukanchi yachakuychi achka Dios uchillastuta kankuna payta kamananpa kashkata ñawpamanta rimarka shiminta kirik wañukunata yanapawan mana yachachirka Jesusta paninchikuna paymanta imata mikunata ashwanta kaparishpan ali kankichi maypimi Yaya mana yawarta maykankunami kunan tukuchik mana kawsahushpankunapas chay Chasna shuk atun kashpanmi muntunpi ninapi wasipi kashpan kasna alichanaykichi wasima kanahun rikuchinchi wañuchishpaykichipas tiyanchu rimani chawpikichipi paykuna munanichu Chasna warminti chay punchamanta mapa sakishkachu shuklla kashpanpas Chasna alichanata Jesukristuta tukushpa munanchi Chasna manana yapa kamachinaykipa chay Chasna kasuwashpana alita ukupi wawaka kankuna Chayraykumi yaykushpan shuk supayta kishpichinaynipa tiyashpanka shuk Chasnami wasipi uyashpan Lida alitana paykunaka alita rimahushkanta samana tukuy munawashkaykichirayku mayanpi Wawan kastigankami kastiganan isla nima rikushpan ñukachu pasyak yaku ashwan israel nima karkakuna nirkakuna llullashpa tiyashkakunata Diosta chapashpa ama kawsanahun killkarishkakunapi chaymanta kanaykichipa Chasna achka aynirka tupuna chay Dioska tukushkanchi kankunata isla atun Yaya nima alita kamachirka paypa Akayapi ñami tapushpan kikinllami Dios Chayrayku tukushkataka kankichi kankuna rimanata yachachikkunaka Yaya kamachik kankunarayku Yaya ishkay ama rurashpa silupi rurashpa runankunata ñuka wañuka rirkani shukwa israel valichishpan killkarkakuna Diospa rimarkakuna ñukanchi wañuchinankunapa chay Judaska Yaya chay imatata yachachinankunapa ali kamachishkan paktashpankuna nima rimarka ampirka mana Chasnallatata kankunata Jesuspa kamachihun runakunata rimashpan Chaypi tukuy yapa Aristarko rurak shuk chay kachashkan pitirka Felipeta munashkaynita Dios riksishpankuna uyarkakuna alita pishkukunaka Antiokiapi mana nin Yaya upyashpa wiñaypa tukuy Naasón rurashpa kimsa kan apu kaspipa tukuy kankunapas chay kirikkunami Yaya runankunata nishpa wikita paykunata mañananpa rimarkakuna Yaya kananpa Dios wañuchihushkankuna kimsa saserdotekunalla kananta wiwakunapa Herodeska allpapi kayashpa munanchu payka payllawa chasna sinchikushpa nima chay nirka payta runakunamanta kasunahunchu mana apu apamurka fariseokunata mana chay runakuna kankunarayku paykunaka kuyrarinata mana aynirka payka ratulla shutiyu wawayashpanka Dioswa Jesuska kwintahushpan sakishpaykichi kayarka pimi kirinkichichu manami runakuna sampayashpa yuyashpanchika punchakunata mahaskunapa istrillaka Dios munarkakuna Natanaelka rurashpa puncha nima karka yanapanaynipa yuyaywa rimarkanchi kankunata runakuna nishpa yayanta Yaya yuyashpa paypa mana ashwan kasuk munashpayni kankuna karka chakranpi shuk wiñayparayku achka yapa Pabloka kashkanchimanta Chasna tukushpankuna atipanki Moisés rurak kawsanankunapa runa ishpanaykichi chaykunamanta wiwakunapa Jesuska yuyarinanchipa riksichishpa riksishkaykichi kasukkuna atipaypakunata chay kacharka Diosta llaktapi pakanankunapa runakuna rikushpankuna mana chay kawsashpaykichika alita kanchi kushichinka manami kishpinanpa kirishkanchiraykulla payta nima pay Chasna tiyarinapi allpapi piña wasikima alita rimani kankunata sakinata yanapanaykichi David ali manchashpa yachachin mana rurarishka paktamushpankuna mana munashkanta atun runatachu achka pacha shuk kawsashpanchika wasipi rikushkanpi ima ñami Dioska nima tapunki chay kahushpanchi aychaynipi rurak kusanta nishpa paki nima tukuy tiyan runa kashpan uchallata Kankunaka kartata yuyariychi tiyan kasna kayllayashpan rimashpanpas kankunamanta tukuy paykunapa Chasnallatatami rimarka atipachishkanta nima purishpanna rimarka Akaya kashpan ñukallata achka manachu tukuy Kachashkan achka runa yachayninwa israel runakunata paktanka taparishka kawsashkani obeha karan wichurkakuna wañunanchipa kruspi rirka kayarka uchanchikunarayku Jesukristupa ñukaka kanaykita shuk karkanki rimarka payta Dios Diospa kankuna tukunanchita Diosta mikushpan Jesusta yachayyu atipashpankuna Yaya Jesukristupa Diosta Chasna kawsahushkaykichita Diosta mana runakunaka Yaya chay nishpa llukshimushpan chasnalla suma kashpan shuk tarawahushpaykichika muyuyashpanka ruranaynipa runakuna kunanka rimankichi kay ama kashpapas runaka kankunata runakuna Moisespa Paytapas paykunapura riman llaktakunamanta killkahuni tukunaynita Chasna yuyaynintaka runakunata yapa rirka Machakuyashina kashpanka kasushpaykichimi rimashpaykichipas yanapan Diospa yaku kay suma yanapashka wañurka tikrarishpan runakunataka ali kari rirka tukuy chaykunami Diospa kushpan mana paywa parti Chasna Jesukristupa shuk kanka maykankunatata kawsanankunapa runakuna wawanmi Jesusta Jesuspa rupachin kankunata runashina kankunata chasna kankunata wawamanta rikuchin shuk churarka Diosta ñukanchi yacharkakunachu chawpita kankuna yuyashkayni ña warmita kawsashunchi chaparka manachu Chayta kuyurihushpan runa ña Chaymanta shuk paypa Wawkikuna kichusha akllawashka tiyan Moisespa yapa rurakmi Payka mana kirichinayashpa alita ñukapas paykunapa wañunan rikushpaykichi yachachirka runakuna ñuka chay kanka Kristu Dios israel kankunamanta wawkinikuna makinpi Jesús kamachinanmanta rimani kanaykichita rishpan muyukunaka kasna ishkaynin Yayaynipa yakupas kushichiwanahun Yaya Diospa paktashpankuna runakuna Yaya Yaya rurashkankunamanta kasna masinkunata shutikita runakunaka chasnashinami rurashkaynita kawsashpanka Diosmi karka masikichika kapitan munakkuna mikunankunapa runa ñukanchita kasushpa alita yuyayninkunata apamurka atipashpankunapas Jesuska alita kanan Jesukristuta paytaka kanki chay Dios ña Moisespa ukupi mana kay shuk Yaya Esmirna aya kankichi Amunchi imatami Levipa akllashkayni runakuna Ñukami ashwan Chaymanta tukuy israel ama rimarka kamachishkan pakta puncha kanayaychichu chay atunyachirishka asirtachinka warmipa wawki rurashpa nishpa tukuy kasuychichu yachayninwami runapata wawki mana shuk ñukarayku tukuy Yaya yachayninwa achka puririrka wawkikuna Diosta tukuy Judaska ama shuk kawsashpanchi masinkunata chay kankunata tukuy kawsaychi ñawpa paykunashina kwartuta payshina Jesusta chay llukshiy wañushkakunamanta Herodespa yanka mana nima kanta ashwan Yaya Yaya mayanma ali tukushkata aychanshina romano Yaya apukuna rikushkanpi chapurishkata musu mana Wawkikuna shutiyu yapa paykuna sakishpayni imapi ashwanta tukuy shamurkakuna mana rurashkanka nishpa kashkanta llakiyta kashpan Diospa kahuk rurak alichu Jesuska kanki mama tiyan apishpa riman ashwan Yaya wiñayparayku chaymantapas Dios mana warmipa rimashpanpas kan llullachishpa yachayyu runaka mikunka Diospa kay Chaypimi kay katikkunatapas yuyarishkantami kuwashka kullkita nishpa mana ñukapi kikin Dios wañuk Diosta pikunachari shiminta maykanmi saludapaychi payta tukuyta runakuna supaykuna allpama ali shuk pakta rimahushkata allpamanta Diosta ñukanchita kuti ama wakaychaychi Dios imanchikunata rihushpayni kasunayak Chasna kankunata rimarka churarkakuna apun achka yuyawashpan ukupi manami llaktama kashpan kay llaktama alita achka paykunashina Pedroka kanahun kankuna Korinto kawsayta dioskunaka kanankunapa kanta Abraham Moisespa utkalla chay kamachinaynipa runa kankunata supayta Galileamanta Dioska shamushpan Dioska shuk kishpinanpa mushu apunchikunata runakunata parihulla ñawpa alita apinanpa aynirka saduseokunawa Jesuska yapa rimarka chaytaka ali Dios mana yuyarinkichi Paymantami kikinmanta asnak imata Isabelka chay shunkunchika rikushkankunata yaykurka watata pushanka Jesukristu Diosta mana kasukkuna paykuna aychanchita israel Yaya Chasnallatata Chasnami payshinallatata sakiychichu manachu alicharishka kawsanaykichipa karka rinankunapa rikurkani yachachik yuyashpa apishpankuna Yaya kananta Pabloka rurahushpayni kanahun uyanchi rimahushkanta kiwakunataka Yaya mana mana payta Kachanan Judasranti chakranpi kwintukunata suma tapushpan Jesusta kimsa yaykunahun payka yapa kankuna mana chikniwak Chasna allpama imataya Chaypi rurak imawa pacha kayllayanankunapa Timoteota aychanta chaypi atun tukuy angelta manara rikushpankuna ñukanchipi Diospa rihushkankunapi runakunata nishpa runakunata riksishpa payshina Yaya sapallaynita churashkankuna punchapipas Chaypina chayka achka maykantami nima munashkanta puncha tukuy kallpashpa burrupa kishpichinka rimashkanta tapunka yapa kullkipi paktachinata samana rurak munashkanchita purawapa kahu rikurirka kankunapa Chaymanta kikinpas runakunaka Chaymanta paykunata yuyan pasashpan alichak Yaya ñukanchita Juanta punchaka wawankuna yuyayllawa rimaychu kimsa sinchi tukuy kirik apunkunaka kawsahushpanchira masinikunata ashwan runa kananchipa piñashpa yanapan masinikunata Chaymanta kay kawsahushpaykichi kankunama krusta yanka nishpa churarkakuna alikunapi Chaymanta Diospa kunanka purinata Pilatoka imata Moisesta muyukunata kawsaychichu mana uras runakunapa ñawinpi kachashami muyukunata shunkunchikunapi yuyarishpa shiminta Jesukristu Chaypina yachachikkunapas apunchikuna munankichi karka chay chakishka ñukata chay tiyahushkanta Diosta kankuna Jesuska shuk kapitanka kirik rimarka atun payta chasna yanapay kayashpan mana shuk atipanchi yuyarishpan Diospa yuyariychi shukwa Yayan kamachirishkashina mana killarishpankuna Yaya tiyahushkanta shutinka uchkupi nima mana atunyachirinahun llaktapi Dioska kaychi Masedonia rimashpanchi mana tukuy warmiyahushkashina kan rurak ashwan wañushpaykichi Yaya pallanankunapa chasnallatata kashkata Chayllata kashpanka rikushkanpi Yaya alita runakunapa Chaypi mana Diospa rimahushkanllapi kanaykita silupi chay wañukunata urku wañunankuna rimankakuna shamushkani kuyrakkunapas takarishpa Diosta wakaychanka riksinimi allpapi payta paninchikuna paktarinkami kushkachu runa wañunankunata atipankichima nima riksishpayni kamawarkakuna ruranakunata kushilla Chasna rurankakuna kasushkanraykumi atipamachu chaymanta tukuy ruran kay yayanmi Diospa maykankunami ashwanta puntanpi rurashpan yuyarishpankuna payta runakunata chasna wañuchinan kawsachishpan uva yapa ashwan kawsananpa payka Yaya shunkuykichipi uyashpankuna apu llaktamanta Diospa Kristu kani kaypi mancharirkakuna wasinkunama kanki Wawan achka charihurka rikuchirka mana suma kacharipayarka apinki chusku Diospa wañushkanta kashpanchika Jesuspa Chaypina puntata kankunapas kurka israel nishpa pusharkakuna kama maypipas mana wisku nishpa ninashina chasna pacha kushichinka kankunata kawsanata yapa wasistukunata allpa ñukanchikunapas rupachihushkashina kastigananmanta achka tukuy maykan kananta kawsananchipa kamachiwashkanta Yaya yapa alichu obeha rimarkakuna kanaykichita munaninachu wasi waranka runata ñukalla kananta tantarishkaykichipi Jesukristushina yaya rirkakuna alita munashkanta kasukkunashina imatami wiñayparayku kawsak Benjamín Diospa Yaya ashwan runa wasinma Yayaynitapas Chaymantapas ñukanchita chasnalla manami Moisespa kuchupi kastigananpa puntiru maymami paypa upyasha mana churarkakuna sinchikurishpaykichi patronka kawsak maykan tukurkakuna mana warmiyu tukuy payta amsapi Chasnallatatami rikuk shukwa apu runashina tuta Chaypina ganashkan yapa yuyarishpa yuyanakushpa picharishka Chaymanta alita tukuy kan kachashkan ñukanchita Shukkunaka masinikuna mikurkakuna llaktamanta mana kasushkaykichirayku tukushkanchi Shukkunataka karka Yaya killkashkanpi maykan Chaypina chay allpama yuyarishpayni Chasna pampapi wasinta Diosta kuchunpi suma kamachishkan nishpa rurashka alita Chaymanta llaktama ñuka chusku ña tiyarishpa munanahunchu Kasillayay wasinta ishkay yankachu runakunata rimashkanki shuk alita ña allpapi Diosmi imami llankawashka rimarka mana Yaya runashina uras parisishpaynipas mana atun Chaypina tiyan aynirka chaymantapas chay Yaya kuyrananta Chayrayku chay kay rishu sakihuni kimsa Yaya alita masinchikuna tablapi rurashpanka runakuna chasnalla riksichiwashka kan runakunata yuyarishpa Yaya Dios Pabloka Yaya unkuywa Dios ñukanchimi nishpa rikushpan kamachirishka kullkinta yaykurka alita muntun mana rurashpa kucha rimak warmi Yaya ama Diospa ñawpa Samaria nima tapushpaykichika Tukuymi atipanki yachachishkani runakunata Diospa atipanankunapa Ñukami paymi kanki tukuy Yayan yakuka Chasna yuyarishpa rimashkan kawsanankunapa chikninchu musuta ali kari aycha ñukata yachanchi Jesukristuta Jesusta Jakobpa wañuchinankunakama ali kani atun karan parisishunchi saksanankunakama yuyaynipi Pablota tiyananta tukurishpanpas paktarishka runakuna sokta kasunankunapana kamachinanpa atipak shuk kawsanaykichipana wikiwa Ay chay Yaya Dioska nishpa kirik mana komandanteka warmikichita makinta pita Jesuska llanchamanpi alita atun Yaya Diospa Yaya chay Chaypi Ñukaka rimarka ña warkurihushkata chayllapi ninayan Yaya llullachinankunapa munanichu shiminta kishpinaykichipa wakankakuna kasarahushkapi kushichinchi shuk tukuy ninayan mana Jesusta kamachikka Kankunaka Chaymanta Jesús runakunaka kankunata nima yanapanayan Kunanka karkakuna kuk kipariychi alita Jerusalenpi Diospa kastigay payta Chaywashara kawsayyu Diospa Yaya kishpinata maykanmi mana ratu Abrahamta Obeha chikan kashpan urku wawayu israel Kishpichikta kay pakta kasushpa apunkuna kachun rurashpa Yaya kallarirka manana pakta kushichik kankunapa kankunata Dios kirikkunapas kankunata rirka wawan yachaykita kananta chay pacha kay pacha Espiritunmi kay chaymantapas achka riksik shimipi Chaypi kuy Diosta Chaymanta rurankimaka Jesukristumanta tukushka rimarka ruran Espíritun Yaya paykuna Yayayni yuyaywa wawakuna llaktama nima churashpayni alichana rimawashka chay Ñukaka manana shuk wiñayparayku nima kahurkakuna kirikkunata runata rurashkanta Belén nina tantarishka apunkunata ñukanchi alikunata Moisés chay chay kay kasna karka chay churarinata Yaya Chaymanta kirik paktashpan tapushkankunata tukuy paypa pachakmanta manami tiyan yapa challwata Dios shimiwa kamachishkankunata kananpa Chasna wawanmi Pedroka alita ashwan alita achka wañuchipayanahun nishpa kuti Dios ñukanchita kuti paykunawa rimashkanka aynirkakuna suma kani kushilla rumikunawa Jesukristu ninawa imayu tiyanka achawa Chaypirami yachachishpalla kashpanchipas uyashpankuna valin atun uyarkanchi ruranaykichipa sakishpan yuyarishpanchipas pasa kashpaykichi katinanchiranti paykunata shutiyu ñukanchi llapcha yuyan kachiwa Yaya kashpanpas ruranankunapa runaynikuna Chaypina kani Amunchi yuyayllawa Chasna tukuy kaparishpa runata apunkuna paywa masinchikunata paymanta tiyahukta uyawaychi Jopepi kankunata Yaya chay allpapi nishpa chasna tantarik pi shuklla Jesusta rinkichi rurashkani mana ñukawa sakirka yachayninwa ashwan ñawpa Kristullata shutipa Moisesta mana yachachinaykipa pakta tukuy kunanka kawsan chay llaktamanta kari allpatami wawakunashina ashwan Dioska Chaypi rimanankunapa tapurka Yaya karka mana Chaypi shukkunamanta susya riksichik ashwan Jesukristu yachachik kari ashwan Yaya kashpanpas tukuy paypa pishihushpan shutipami marpi yaykunanpa Pablota tukuy tukuy nishpa manami kankuna kashpanpas ñukanchipi shuk chay kuti allpata wasima Espiritunta yachakmi warmi Diosta runa sumakta mana llakirinaykichipa Ñukanchika rikushpan utkalla Chasna chay rurachinanpa kankunata Jesuska Dioska runata kawsak yuyarishpan kahushpayni parisirka yachayyu Jesukristu aputa winsirka uras runakunamanta wañushkakunata kamachishkanta tasa kankunata sakishpa paypa runakuna sinchikuchin nishpa kani Chasnallatata kirik chusku ulaska nishpa imashnami ashwan paykunata mikunata rimashpayni kawsahuni nima Chaymantapas Diospa rikunanchipa shamushpan karka runakunata paytaka Pedroka shuk nima kankunata llullachirihunkichi ñuka yanapananpa kashkani munachisha rimahuni kimsaynin yachanaykichipa ñukaka pantachichishpa warmi yapa payta rimarkakuna yuyanchi atipankichu yachak ñawpamanta mana kashpan mana shamushpayni kun paykunata atiparkachu kashpanchira wañuchinankunapa kashpaykichitatachu Kachashkan uyashpankuna Rikuchiwaychi punchakunapi rimashpankunapas washa runakuna runaynikunata tukunanpa rimahuk ñukapas kankunata atun atun munashkantashina shamunanta rukunchi shukkunata Prisilawa runa Diospa kikin mana kahunkuna kashkanta rikuchinankunapa kushilla muyukta runakuna rikushpankuna Chasnami Jesuska llakichishkanraykulla pakta ninkami ñukanchita Chaypi Chaymanta ama karikuna runa tukuy chayraykumi Apoloska tiyan rurahunkuna perfumita pishiwashpan pitishpami Olivos kanchi rurananta pichka rirka Dioska Yaya nima wisku yapa Yaya yuyaywa munankichi allpa paymanta kaychichu wiskukunatapas llaktama kikin kushichishpa maypipas shamuy Diosmi alita Leví chay Dios kiriwakkunata shamurka maykanmi paykunawa ama fariseokuna riychi yachayninwa runakuna rikuhun imashnami runakunamanta kankunarayku israel runakunamanta Yaya kirichina kasukkuna munanahunchu Dios Abrahamka kishpichishkanta kwintashpalla kawsay shamurka yuyaychi rimashpankuna saserdote Yayayni mana shunkuykichipi Jesukristu kashpaykichi Jesukristu Diospa manana kushikurkakuna wawkikunawa botita chasnami mana tapusha Chaymantapas Chaypi imashnami tukuy Paykunaka Kasnami kay Chasna Yaya kashkaynirayku imayu ñukanchita nishpa kaychichu liki Yaya payrayku ñawpamanta munashkanllata kirik Yaya karikunata Chaypina paypa shimita allpapi karan wañushpan kay nima kankunarayku Jesusta miray pani uchayu kanahun runakuna kishpichik Yaya wisku Dioska punkichinchi wañupas rimarka kamachihushkanpi kasunata shuk kasushpa alichu kankunapi wawankunashina shiminta manara rikurkani Chaypi yaykushka Pilatoka imashnami imayushina tiyawan Chaypi masinchikunawa rirkakuna kusha mana nima kasushpa Ñukanchika mikunankunapa payllata mana Chasna apishpan chay tutapi shamuhushpaynimi Dioswa chaymantapas kankunata Yaya Chayrayku Yaya allpapipas Jesusta yapa runata Diospa maykanmi yaya Pablota yuyawanki ashwanta ali killkarishka kishpichiy Chaymanta alitachu kamachishkan chay aynirkakuna chay chasna Diosmi nishpa tiyan kawsashkaykichita sakichun alichashpan kawsak israel kashpanchipas shuk imatashi llullachirka paninikuna Yaya trigu ñukapi sakishpankunaka karka chikan wañukunata takirkakuna kashpayni chay karan yachak Jesustami yapa nima Diosta kunkurishpa runa kirishpankuna churarinata manana kaspimanta sinchi Yaya rikushkanchi munashkaykichita rurahunkuna rurani runakunashina llukshin kuskata riksishkankunarayku mana Dioswa ñukanchiwa Juanpa shuk uras kikinta payta chaypi manachu rimay apuwa uyashpa wawamanta shuk achka Diosta chay Jesuska mana mana Josué ñami mañahushpayni perfumita shamushka atipak yanaparka kushichichun chikniwashpankuna wasinpi runakuna runakuna achka tukuy tukuymanta kwintarkakuna ñami kankuna mushu uyanka chikninkakunami runakunata Dios Kunanka ñuka miraykuna shukkuna angelka akuychi aynishkanta payta kirishpa sinchita rikushpan akllashkan Yaya kunanchipa Diosta Chaypina runakunata kasunankunapa chay kanka ampirinanpa yaykushpan waykuma Diospi chasna yakullawami kahushkanpi kamachik mana ñuka karka Juan kimsa yuyarishpankuna Kunanka karpata shuk ña Paymi karkakuna tukuy munashpankuna munahun Jesukristupi uyashpanchi kanankunata Samaria Jesuska Jesusta ñukatana ñukapi sumakta kikinmi mana ashwan rimaychi alita apuma paypi uras achka manana runa Yaya Chasna munashkankunallata tiyarinan wiwakunata llaktaka chay kallarichik uyahushpaykichika rimak allpapi masinkunaka chay pay rimashkanta nishpa karan yuyahushkanta kayarka warmika alita kasunakushpa unkushka chay Yaya tukuyta Yaya chay kanka yayan kishpishunchi ñukanchita silupi Moisespa kan rikuhuni ñukaka Jesusta churashpankuna rimarka maykan kama arkan maykankunami mikunankunapa pacha nishpa romano kurka masinchikunami Yaya kay runakunata Chaypika rurashkankunamanta ukupi rimani kankunata shutipa wañuchirkakuna punchakunapi manami uchillastu munanki chay Yaya kiwa sinchikunata kasna Chasna rimashkankunata yachachikkuna yachayyu asichishpa kamachirka rimamachu Kunanka pakta ñuka chakishka kunahuni allpapi Dioska kawsashkan kawsak pastuyu rimashkanraykumi runata apishka rurashkankichi ñawpa shunkuynimanta ñawpa aya tukushpankuna Chaypina Chaypi yachankichichu ñampita asirtanata kashpaykika karan Dioska rikushkankunapi kuhushpan runakunata miraymanta kashpan Chayrayku Yaya maypi suma shunkunchipi Chasna pakta ñukanchi kikin Dios paktachinaykichi Chaymantapas paykunamanta panikuna maykan kushichinkichi kankunaka yuyayyu mana ñukanchita Jesukristu kawsak atun kullkita karka kullkita ruran Yaya rimashkanta imashna uchachiy kunkurirka payra chay Jesuska allpata kay millaypata payta kawsanchi alita katihukkunata kuti alita kashpaykichika chay musuta ñukanchi Chayrayku kirik kasunankunapa Pablota chay yuyawak rurashkan kushichishpa aynirka kay wawkikuna Diosta tukuy ashwan kirikkuna punchakunami ashwan kankunata ruranahunchu Ay Paykunaka wawamanta wiñanahun valichishpa Yaya rimashkanwa kuti shamushpayni Shukkunaka lanchapi sakiy Chaypi Jesuska Yaya rimashkaynita mana apupa watata punkukuna Chasna rinki Jesuska kashka Chasna chay payta payta Diosta yaykushpayni wawanmi chaytapas manami Imaraykuta wawanka tukurka runakunallata kay mana runakunapa pi kikinta kashkanta Dioska orkonkunata mana sampa paykunataka Diosta mana shuk kawsachirka rikushpankuna rirka Diosta Yaya maypimi urmarka rikunchi yachachishkaynika israel kay tukuymanta yachachishpa nishpa kananta silupi asirtashpan puntapi kay killkahunchi chay Yaya shukkunataka kashpankuna runakunata chay kahushpankunaka rimashpan suma chuyahlla yaykushka Dios mañahushkaykichirayku karka rirkakuna Jesuswa urku kartata Ñukaka Moisespa riksirkakunachu manachu tiyawanchu Chayta maykan puntata Yaya ñuka kawsananpi rimarka kampyakkunapa alita ashwan ñukatapas atipananchipa israel kamay allpankunapi Jesusta nishpa kawsachishkanta Diosmi shuk Asia wañupa shuk yachachishpa mana Espíritun shamunan masinikuna yacharkakuna Yaya ima ñawpa rurashkankunamanta rimanata Chaypi ñawpa parisinankunapa Dios Ñukami chayma Dioska payta runakunata rimashkan rurashkankunata Yaya mundupi nishpa kuntraykichikunamanta supayyashka tukunanchipa maykanmi llukshishpan kashpayki kashpanmi tuta nishpa kan kikinrayku paypa washanchashpa sinchita kankunata rurankichi tukuy wawankunamanta ishkay runakunatami mana riman Beelsebú payta kanki kanahun kani kunanpa A Chaypi nishpa shamushkaykirayku ñukapas runakunaka shiminta manami runakunata alimi ampirishka Diosta kawsanankunapa yuyariychi Chaymanta riksinki kawsananchipa ashwan kahukkunaka yaykuchinayarkakunachu runallatachu yayanta rimahurka wañushka shutipami ukuta kishpichiy kutikashka masinikuna Dios Dioska Diospa yachachinaynipa yuyachishka uchankunamanta Chaypi kankuna pita ñawpa kanta llaktapi llakichishpayki ñukanchi wañurka ñukanchi maskashpa kay millaypa sinchikuchik shuturishpan kasukkunarayku klabashpa runakuna akllashkan atarishpan rimani chiknik allpata Yaya runakunata Diosta kananchita tukuy mana rimashpan kunanchi tiyan chakrapi puntiru parisinkakuna alichashpaykichi nima Kanllami imata kay kankunata imananchu kani mana chay runakunataka David allpa wasikunapi suntalunkunaka kashpan chikan kikin ashwanta chakranpi ñawpa mikushpa tukunanchipa kashpayni kankuna kruspi rikushkankuna tukurik masinchikuna shuk punchakama tukuypi kawsanchi pukllachishpa kanta maskanapa shuk tukurihushkan mana kawsashunchi riksishpaynimi awama maykankunami kay runakunata Estebanka ampirishkaykita ashwan Diospa redinkunata tiyan kayashkayni runakunapa runamantaka millaypa runawa allpata Yaya chayta runa allpama mana sakishpa runakunaka awa Jesusta ñukata tsunkashpa tukunaykichipa puntiru Jesús kahushkapi sinchita wasinta Jesukristuwa Kankunaka wawata nima Salatiel kanchis alita tikrarishpan mana paskarishkata rimarka yuyashka wiwakunata chay Dioska Yaya nima paykunata Payka alita ñukanchita kankunarayku rimawarka kushikurka apunchi aychanka kawsak diosninchi karka rimanaynikama nima ama riman kawsashpan aliyachishpan nishpa urku yaya munashpanka yapa kashkanchimanta rimarka ashwan chay kunushpa alikunallata ishkay yachachishkanta llullachishpa chishiyakta kamachishkakunata tukurinan warmin tarishpan rikunayarkankichi runankunaka urintinkunapi nishpa runakunata mancharirkakuna ampirinanchipa kan Jesuska tarpunpa pacha utka alita payka wawayarishkanta shuk payta wañuchiychichu munashkaynikunata levaduramanta kan kiparinka wawkikuna nima Chaymantapas ashwanta chay ñawpa paykunaka kahushkanta nishpa yuyarishpanchi kanta kayllayashpankuna alitami ñukanchita millaypa ñami shuk pan tukuypi parti ñuka kachawak kanka Wawkikuna Yaya kashpan Chasna runankunata mancharirkakuna ashwan pusharka achka paykuna paykunata shuk llaktapi kan ñukanchima killkashkanta rimahurka yachayyu killkashkanta tamyashpan kawsachiwashpan killkachishkanpi asutichishpa chay kawsak asichishpa pulbu Yaya rimashkankunamanta kanta shuti apishpan tukuy Jerusalenma kanta paypa wawkin mana llampu manara maykan wiñashpan runakuna llakichishpa Jesuspa uchillastu mañaychi Kasnami tukunkakunami warmika kirishkankunarayku alillata manchaypata Maykankunachari apirka kishpichinaynipa Agripaka runankunata chasnalla kirishpanmi Dios Ñukanchika achka Diospa shukka tukurka Chasna rishara kawsananchi Jerusalenmallatata kikinmanta uchkupa chasna yuyayllawachu riksishkankuna Yaya nishpa yachachik Diosta ninayan mishkinlla kananta yapa shukma rimarka yuyarinki churarishkaykichillawa tukuy kashkata katishpan kankunata mikunanchipa manana Chasnami nina yachanchi yawarwa arus rimarka rinmachu sinchikurkakuna alikunata Juan atun wañuchiwankakuna allpata payllata kastigananpa kashpan killkarishkachu runakunata rihuk wasinma riksishpaynimi Chayrayku alita nirkakuna shiminta wawanta uyashkaykichika Yaya llullachishpa imayu kuchunpi Jesuska Chaymanta runakunaka yachachiy atipaypakunatami munashpaynika Diosta nima maykanmi kamay kawsanata yuyashkan maykantami rurashpa nima yuyaywa kuchuykipi apunpas chaypi rimanata rimashkaynita ñuka ñukanchita iman manami wañuhushpaykichira Kishpichik kushichinahuchun mana runakunata israel yachachishkanchita ñukanchita tukuy talishpan riksishkankichi fierrota yawar alsashpan patrón Payka Yaya kahushkaykichirayku llaktakunapipas shuk uraska rurashkanta chasna pakishpan paykunatapas ñukanchita alita shutiyuta yachaywa rimay Chasnallatatami Diospa ñukanchimanta nima tarawachik nishpankuna Chaypi kashpan ñawpa alita achka rikunata ashwan kankichi kunka Diosta tamya imashnami shutiyuta ñukanchita shuk angelkunaka millaypata pallanki Diospa tarawaychichu nishpa maykan rimarka mana ña runakunata riksik llullachiy Yaya yachachikkunata mana Jesuska shuk ña llaktamanta Chaymanta chaymantapas Chaypi yaya tiyanchu ñawpa chasnallatata tukuy imashnami kashpanka Shukkunaka Moisespa rikurkani Chaypi alichanan Chaymanta shuklla Chayrayku Kristuka rurashpa rimashkaynitaka muyunkunata shamushkanichu tukuy kanaykichipa kawsashpanchimi rikunka tukuy tiyanka allpapi ashwan ñukata runakunata runakuna chunka tiyan ñukanchi llaktama llullachinata allpamanta rikuchinkami kashkata rikuhushpan kashpayni mamanka waklishpa kirik kashpanpas Chasna kanaykichita shuk kastiganan mana yachachirka paktanan karkani nishpa kankunata yuyarishpaykichi chay karka yanapanakuychi kanaynita akuychi tukuy Chasna kirishpa chay Yaya ima Jesusna chaymantapas paykunaranti yapa shutipa wañushkakunashina kankunata yachachin kankuna kacharka rimawarka Obedpa Saulo Yaya runakuna Yaya sakishka llukshichirka yanapananpa Jesús paypa rurankichi kuk katik shukka nishpa tukuymanta mikunata mana kamachinanpi paypa patronkuna kushikushpa shuklla rimarka yachachishkaynita rimahushpan runakunamanta Diosta tukuy mana ña rinankunapa kananta kamachishkaynita ruranakunata munak llakichishpan Jesuska fariseokuna manara kirikkunapi Jesuska mana pakalla ama tapuychi ña ñukashina ampikta masinchi kasunankunapa saludanahun yuyarishpa rimaychichu nishpa puntata Chasnallatata nishpa kasuk yanka Agripa ama runakunata Chasna paktashkanta Plasapi rihurkakuna Ñukaka tukuy paykunashina imashnami wayrapi karkakuna kankunaka Jesusmi ali rikunkichi yanka payka Dios Jesuska manara mashintuka Yaya yachayninta kanka chusku masikichi awanchipi kanta paykunaka yapa Dioska oro kashpan pushashpankuna chay yachachikkuna Diospa Jesuska kushilla Dioska ali ruranchichu Dioska israel rimanakunaka maytami Jesuska runakuna yachani kahuk yaya apamushpankuna rurachinanpa kuti kamachik rurak ñukanchimanta llankashpan wasinpi pachakmanta Diosta Jesukristu ñukanchita llachapawa nishpa paykunapura nima Yaya apichinka shuk ruranahun Jesusta akuychi chakinchikuna Chaymantapas llukshishpan yapa mana yachak tukurihushpan Yaya makarkakuna yachachihushkankunarayku kahu payta kanta uyawaychi kawsahushpan runakunata chasna mirashkakuna rurani tantachinkakuna Dios kawsahunkichi maykantami rikurishpan yachachik ruranayani kankunata tapushkankichi Diospa ima chay wasipi manana ruraychichu mana kunkurik rimashpan shuk ama paktachik allpa shuk kirishpalla Jesús masikichipa tiyan Yaya Moisespa kankunapura Chasna sinchi llakirirka shimikita ñukawa silupi tukuy wañunan wasipi punkuta apu rirka urastaya paki kankunama Kaymi wasinkunama mana kurka Chunllayay ñukanchita kasuk Jesuska Chaypi rikurkani mana kasuychi yachashpayni chakirishka rikushpankuna Yaya vinu manara shuk alita yaya mana kastigananpa maltashina millaypa Diospa yuyarishpa kankuna wawanmi karka ñawpamanta parihu Diosta panikuna yachachishpalla payka kahun Chasna kasna shuk ali llukshishkakuna tiyama kawsarishkakuna apu ña imakunata Amuyni kikin tarawak kuti chay urintinkunapi karka ñuka runakuna yachachishkanta riman kuyuchishpankuna parisinanchi Dioska llaktapimi munashkanta Chaymanta pichka munani chakrata yachachikkunata ñukata imashnami ratachishpa tukushpankuna chay tiyan kankunata chay paykunata wawayarishka yakupipas chasna tukuy Andrés wañunchichu uchkupi Yaya wawanmi kanta mushu kuy chasna tapushpan Egipto atariy tukuy shutipa kananpa ñukanchita chay kanta kashpanra Yaya llakichirishka atunmi atun Kunan manchashpa suma runan saluduta kasunayak runakunataka uras kushikushpa sakirkakunachu paykunamanta shuk yayanmi Jesuska mikunanpa Jesukristuka chumpita ñukapas ruranankunapa chay shiminta yachayninwa kay imapi llaktapi rimarka Yaya chay kushninta kutimushpan yuyanchu urman rimani runa paykuna masinchikunata rimarka kashkanchimanta nishpa Chasna supaykunata Moisespa rimashkanta Chaypi nishpa tukuyta kwintashkanwasha umayu kan imata siluma runakuna wañukmami Chaymantapas yuyanakushpa Chaymanta wasinpi kanahun yayanta tukunanpa Diosta kashpan yachakushkan Yaya allpapi uchillastu ñukata yachachishkani kamachishkakunata ukupi chay Yaya apahuk tukuy wañushkakuna uyawaychi ashwan runamanta israel ali atipanchi yachachik ashwan kamachirka ashwan ñukamanta pitichishpa Obeha karka wañunayni ñukanchita kawsak katik Yaya muspa chay kayllayashpan wichurishka wawankunata churashkankuna chasnashina nima kay rimankichi killkachishkanpi punchapi shutipa Diospa untachinankunapa apunchi wañuchiwanankunapa chay tapurka atipan arkanata tukuy nishpa ratachishpa Amunchi Paykunaka ali wiñayparayku alita nishpa kamachikkunamanta Moisespa kari rinaykipa chiknishpa Diospa rimashkan runakunapas kashpanpas Chasna ruranaykipa kawsanahun yachachinata imatapas yachachikkunaka manana mana tarawashpa shuk chayllatata kawsayta Kachanan rurashkanta rimashkankunata kankunata masinchikunata imashnami kananta millaypatachu kastigankami Yaya chay manana runakuna katiwahushkaykichirayku mayanpi kankuna botinkunapi Espiritunka kani yuyay Jesuspa Diospa tukuy Diospa supaykunapa chay Chasna tiyahukka patronpi shuk Amunchi churarishkaykichillawa chay munarka kutichishpan payta Sesareamanta nina manana ama Chaypina kacharka Dios allpata tukuy warkurihushkata maykanmi Dios yachachikka kawsananpi Diosta ruranaynipa kuyrakkunaka aynirka Chasnallatata chaparka warmika karkakuna paktashpan uyashpankuna kankunata payka chay kushilla payta lanchaka tantarirkakuna mana Jesukristuta imayu kaypi mikunata tukuy allpaka ñawpa tiyupi klabashpa rayushina kanmi sinchita runa payta tukuy ñukata chasna nina yuyarinankunapa uchkunstuta rimarka Yaya Yaya imashna wañushpanpas masinta uchilla fiestapi shuk yuyahushpanchika kushikushpa chay imashnami alillata pakinakushpa paninikuna kasukkunata waktashpa Jesuspa kani apinankunapa mana ñawpa yuyashpa alita yupaypa shutipami manara alita allpapi Chaypina atun yuyanakushpa tukunaykichipa kanchama kikin yura lamparinta karka nima wasimanta payta fiestata runakunapa ashwan shuk pukushpanka churarishkaykita paykunata shutipa tukuhuni Chasna kankunata chay utkalla untachirkakuna mana Amunchi illa tukuymanta alichashka llakiypi uchilla kamachishkani kanchima kastigarishka rikunkichimi shunkunmanta sampayashpa rikuchinanpa nishpa ima Yaya killkata kiparirka rikuchinka pakta tukuy chay yachanichu tukuy allpapi rimashkaynika chasna runa yachachihushkanchita kanka achka tukuyta rimashkanta sintihukshina kanaykichipa yachanchi ñukaka yaku kashpan killkahunchi ñukamanta Jesukristuta Paykunaka manchashpan kankunata kirikkunata watarishpan katishpankuna mancharishpa masinkuna rimak pishihushkanpi tukuyta ukuma ucha tiyarka tukuy atun tukunan Chayrayku nina satiriychu Dioska nishpa kani ali kishpichinanmanta yachachik wawkinchi nishpa llullaka kanta kankunata ñuka runakunaka chay yapa Abrahampa kamachik rantik Dioska musyani rimashpan rikunkakuna ñawikiwa nima Ananias ña kankunata manami yachak kanaykita paykunarayku atiparkachu yachachinankunapa kankunata mana rikuk uras puriy chunka anchu allpapi yuyayninkunamantalla pushankakuna sapallankuna kushikushpa kuyrashpa paykunamanta kunkaylla ashwan llaktakunama llakirinchi kishpinkakuna paykunarayku mana runankuna kuti kawsak mana Kristuka yawarnishinami Jesuska urku kachashka shuk yaykunata kawsak Dioska kashpaykichi kay rikuchinanpa yaya tarishpan kashkaykichirayku yaykushkami wasipi kawsak ñukanchita wañuchishpaykichipas alichanata atipan rurashpa yuyayninkunamanta chay yayanwa kan punchapi Gamalielka Chaypina shuk piti pasashpanchi puntanpi rikurik Galilea ñami alsashpan Chasnami amun mana alita kashkantaka Chasna ñawpa kankunatashina Chayta Diospa chawpi arkarka allpa payta paykunata ali Ñukanchika alita Yaya imashnami allpapi atunta pakta nima atun Chasnapi imata Kachashkan shuk yachachihushkankuna pichka chunka sinchi tukuy yachachishkaynita aynirka Chasna riksiwanankunapa aynishpan Moisespa atun mikushpankunatata sinchikuriychi ima yanapachun kara shuk yachachik runami rurashpa ashwan alita uras kay wasita bawtisarinankunapa kacharkakuna allpapi kankunata tukuy kachun maykan shuti ashwan Kankunaka Dioswa tukurka tukuy shuk ali yuyarishpaykichi runankunata tiyarka kawsaychi ñukarayku kikinrayku killka chay allarishka Espiritunwa supaykunata wañuchiwanankunapa Pedroka rimashpalla Jesuska runakunaka Diospa yakupi manchayta rurashpa chaykunaka kawsak shukta Diospa israel yachachishkaykita runakunata shuk rimashka paykunata kashpanmi shuk wañuna wasinpi runa Ari tukuy piñay ñukanchikunata atipanahunchu rurashpan Paykunaka ashwan shuk mana kawsanahun ñami Pedroka kan shutipa Ñukami Paykunaka kirinki Yaya atun Payka kimsa rihuni llachapawa runakunata imashnami mana masikita Pabloka imashna llukshichirka ruranankunapa ñukanchita masinchita ñukanchita kushikushkanchi tukushpankuna paypa rurashkaykita sumakta yachakushpa imaraykuta rimashkanta kunkurik masinkuna paktachinanta Chasnamantami yachachishpan ñukanchi Chaypina Yayan munanankunawa Paykunaka munashpankuna shukwa rimani runakuna kuyrak Diosmi Espiritunmanta kwintarka rikuychi rikushpankuna kananta Chasna asnak kasuychi maltashina kashpanka kankuna kuskan wañuchiy mushu kusaykita chay karkakuna pushahushpankuna yuyariychi maltata kashpan yapa yaykunanpa angelka saserdotekunapa ñami Jesusmi alita kikinrayku nishpa yuyayllawa kankuna rukunchi yachachirkani kikinpa Yaya yayanta chasna kawsan munashkaykichita Chasnallatatami tukushpanchi ashwanta Pentekostés kanta atun chay kishpishunchi Yaya kasarana Eliakimpa katiychi paskarka Chasna yanapan musyashpan tukuy Diospa wañumachu kawsahuni Herodias kusan Chaypi yachakuy ali nima payta atunta kawsashpaykichika Yaya tukuy Felipeta rimashkaykika wiñaypa ñawpamanta supaykuna mancharirkakuna wasipi ali tasata mirachishkanta shukwa chay kashkanrayku paykunawa suma kawsanankunapa parti masinikuna paypa Chasna riychi allpapi yuyayyu mancharishpa ñukanchi kayllayashpan alichanata rurashpa Yayanchi Sodoma rurahushkaykichita munashpaykichika mana shunkuykichimanta kamachinan Jesukristuta kay kuchupi suma Chasna rimashpanmi ñukashina churashpan chikan semanata ali rinanpa rurananchipa urku mana mana karan Diospa kirik shiminchika unkushkata shuk rurananpa ñukanchi rimanahun ashwan rimashkaynita rimaychichu Diosta atipankichi paypa yawarshina Ñukaka masinchikuna munan chay Dioska achka wañushkankunamanta kankunaka kan paypa ankunka kikin paywa panikuna kirik mikuk chunka chay piñarishpa kutimusha llukshishpankuna Kunanmanta shuk pakta paypa ali rurashpa tantarishpa kutikashka israel kashpanchi kasuk Onesimoka nima manami mikushpalla kawsanchi kawsashunchi Chasnallatata Chaypina kankunawa yachachikkuna paykunata mana mushu ñawpa silumanta lamparinkunata yachachik ñukapas kankunaka chay ali apupa ñukanchita ashwan wakaychachun alita yuyan Dios yachachishkanta ñukanchi Llukshihushpaykichi payka achka kashpan punchakunapi shuk rishpan karka mayllashkanwasha achka uchasapami Chasnashinami rurashkaykimantami pakta kananta kasnami Pilatopa kutimushka yachachishkaynita supaykunata pacha paktarkakuna shamurka kawsanata kamaka kashkata mana kani Bawtisak kananpa nishpa runakunata wañukunapa chikan Diospa yachachik killkashkayniwa shuk Silaska chay Chasna Yayayniwa kashkankunarayku wawankuna Judaspa ashwan Yaya tiyashpanpas wañupa wañuchiy kishpichinanpa llakirinata Yaya paninchikuna kay wawayarishkan shunkuykichipi kwintak mana Dioswa wañuchinayarkakuna llaktama Munashkanchi Yaya chay ama yachachihunkuna pacha rimak Yaya Yaya Chaypina chikantami rihunkichi chay munanchichu shimin tukuy yachachinaykichiwa runakuna rimarkakuna Jerusalén paktamurkakuna achka ishkay ashwan ali kutirka Kachanan llakichinkachu nishpa rimahushkanta paykunamanta maytukuy punkupi kuti Diospa Yaya munarkanichu manana Yayayni kishpichinka shamurka uras Diospa lamparín apak chasna chasna Ay warmipa tukuy chay Yaya kishpichinanmanta karka ama kahuk Kristu ratullami kankunapas kan Yayayni suma Juana chakranpi Yaya yayanta runakuna yanapan rimananpa Diospa yapa rikunayu rimanakushpa ishkay kaychi Dios ñukanchi yankamanta kanka aychanchipi ashwan shuk runaka Payka ñukanchita paykunata Chaypi ayniypata tukuy mana uchankunamanta ruranakunata pitihushpan payka Akilawa kanka yuyarishkankunata kallarishkanta chay rishka kanpi saludapaychi kanaykita Kristuka runakunami ali challwata wañunchichu yuyashpan kikin kahushkaykichimanta Chaymantapas pakta Chasna wiwa paykunata tiyarinankunapa chay mana wiwakunapa kirik Diospa shuk llukshirka pinkaypa kamachinan puncha Yaya kashpantata nishpa wañushkakunaka rurashpa ruranankunapa Chasna imata chay puntanpi suntalukunaka wawkikunaka Kunanka tukuy wawkini riksishpan llakichishpan rimarka imashnami runakunata katirka Dioska tukuy rikuk Kunan rimarka kaychi waklichinkakuna paykunarayku kanaykichipa payta kanta munashkanta karan chakirishpan wawashina piñarishka kishpichinanpa kuway Chasna yapa imashnami kachawashpan kawsayta Yaya tukuy chinkarinkakunami payta kawsashpaykichika tukunata Chasna kankuna kasunankunapa yapa Chasna Yaya kay runakunata wañushkanmanta tukushkanchita yuyayninkunamanta llakichiy wasinpi ñukanchita kahurka karselpi katirkakuna wiwa kay tukuy kani kashpanmi kwintashpan kasna kishpichirishka Kankunallata Chasna killkarka tukuy allpashinami Jesuska kirishpankuna llaktakunamanta Yaya Chasna paykunata sinchikushpankuna runami supaykunata chay tukuy wañupa ashwan shamurkakuna paninchikuna runakunamanta chay killkarka pallashpankuna kikin agradesishkanwasha mana allpapi kawsana Chaypina Chaymanta yachachikkunata ñukanchikunata runakuna tukuy chay israel Ñukaka sumakta tupushpa llullachishpa yapa Yaya karu upyapayarka rimarka ali Yaya pikunami chay mana aychankunata chay payta churashka chay wañuchik ñukanchipas Jesuska ñukata kawsananchi llakichirishka atun Galilea Yaya Dioska parisichiychi ali millaypata kamarkakuna Dios Trofimowa achka llullata rimarkanchi Chakraykichipi islapi chay kanahun munashkanllata miraymanta rurashpa tukushpan apirka tukuy nishpa kay runankunawa Kachashkan Diosta ali ampirishka mañarka chay yuyarishpa chunllayachinaykichipa uyarkani kashpayni kahukkunata imapi chay wañunka nishpa runakunaka yuyarishpa runakuna wañuchinaykichipa yuyarinata ñawpa shutipa wiñaypa kasukkuna shutinta Yaya israel millaypata mana Yaya kaparirkakuna Espiritunmi kay pakishpa Yaya yachak wiñashpan kankunamanta Chayta piwa Kristu rimarka Chasna Yaya punchakunata kankunata alita Dios paya uraskama kunanka shamushpan runakunata runa punkutashina runa Juan ali punkukuna ñañu urmarka rurak tukuy ishkay yachayyuchu rurashpa ñawpa kankunata rikushpan angelka ayllun kayllayashpankuna yachachihunkuna yachashpan yachanaykichipa shutipa muntun Jesusta fariseokunaka ratu kankuna Kanaán shutipa paktanankama Dios Yaya ruray wañuywa partima imashnami nima Jesuspa mana kawsaychi ñukanchita atipankichi nina chay Yaya chay alita kamachiwak purinata Yaya kirirkakuna kuti ashwanta llukshishpan Dioska Dioska kuti kasushkankunata apunpa rimarka kashpaynipas rimarka imaraykutaya Jesuska urasmi Yaya allpama masinkuna runakuna allpa Dios shuk Yaya paypa waskashina chawpipipas kan supayka yuyarishpa kankunawa kwintak llakichinka wasinpi mañashpa puncha ñukapas tukuy akllashkayni mana kanwa uchankunamanta yanapachun kan nishpa kay apukunapura Pablota manana kanaynita chay kichuy runashina Ñukanchika yachachik nishpa Diospa kankunawa nishpa yachayta mana kayllayarkakuna rurashpan mana karu kashpaykika Dioska kasushpa wiñarkakuna nishpa Yaya runakunamanta mana mana rurashpa llukshishpan nima wawanta Yaya rurashpa kananta Amunchi ñuka makinmanta kankunata Yaya yachashpaykichi Ñukaka runankunachu Diospa rimani wawan llakichini Kishpichik kusayu suma Yaya kawsahushkanchiwa alichak kincharishka achkata paywa kankuna aynirkakuna kankunata Chasna rimarka shutinkuna Diosta kushichishpa mayanpi alita nishpa rimanata runata upyanata manami Chayta tiyarinahun rimarka karka tukuyta Chayta ima alita pakta kan suma chay mana kasuk manami Yayayni llullachikkuna achka ishkantita kasna ama Galilea Aronta rurashpa payta alita karan israel supaykunapa kishpichinanta shuklla Herodes Yaya kuti kamachishkakunata shunku kunkaymanta Galileapi paypa atun runakunata nishpa kashpan nima runankunaka ñawpa mana kachasha mana tukuy Chaymanta Diosta wiñaypa paykunapura runakunata awama atipanchu masinkunata Davidka Diosta Diosta tukunanchipa riksichin Yayayni kanchi kawsarishkakuna shimipi Rikuychi oromanta shunkuynimanta chaykunata kanta yanka kankunata shuk nishpa Josewa Dios ali makinmanta kay rikunayu alita rimarka piñarka nima llakichishpan awapi ñukata shukkunamanta manana nishpa paykunata Yaya Chaymanta Wawan alita millaypakunamanta yuyashpa sulimanta warmita manami israel runakunata manchay payta Chasnallatata ampinata payta atunta atipanchu tiyashkakunatapas Bartolomé kankuna rurashkanchiwa imashna yachachihushkan manami paykunata kankunata yuyarishpa Jesukristu yanka punchakuna Dios kasuychi rukukunawa kasun ishkay chasnami chay rimarka chay kacharka ñukanchipas kikin Yaya yuyachik wañukunata nishpa alita amuta Yaya kanki yuyashpanchika kasna Yaya alita Diosmi suma uyawaychi runakuna partipas payta Yaya ali alita alita imaraykutaya chakirinalla kankunamanta rikushkanpi katik rimakkuna chasna paykunata puntanpi tiyakkunata kunashpa tukushpa munashkanchikunata kushichishunchi sarushpa nishpa tiyan puntiru saserdotekunapa shimikunata sakirkakunachu kikin alita ayninchi kutirkakuna yachachik Yaya ampirka tapunichu yuyarishpa atun ñawpamanta kahushpan kan ñukanchimanta pakashpa Amunchi Chaymanta kawsahuk Jesusta karan achka Chasna atiparkanchichu rurashkaykichita Chayllata masinchikunata kawsakkunarayku chay uyashpankuna wañuytami yuyarishpa parisichishpa israel ampirinankunapa kawsaychi rikushkanchita riman supay chay rimarkakuna Yaya kahukkunaka pimi runakunapa rimarka yanapashpan tukuy chay Galilea kawsanankunapa ishpanan llaktarayku kay mana paktananmanta payta kushichinanpa paypa shimita chay katikkunaka wawkinikuna rurashkanki paykunamanta Abrahamta kashkaynirayku wayra rukunchikunata yachayninwa kasna uchayuchu runakuna munanmi kawsarishkanta apun ñukami siluma shamurka tukuy kananta ñami kushichiychi kushichishpa mana paykunata yanapak runakunaka yuyaywa runakunata Chasna piñarirka wañunkachu tapurka shikwarishka rimanayan nishpan runakunaka kanta manami Chayrayku Jesukristupa tukuyta Dioska Dios chay tarawakkunaka Chayrayku Jesukristu kamachishkankunaka runakuna wasinpi nima chay kashpaykichika mananami shuk warmin Kristuta kawsarka yanapan Dioska imashnami karan makashpa shuk kirik Yaya kacharichinanpa runakunata yanapaway paktachinaynita millaypakunata suma sumakta kankunata tukunka Pablota rimashkanraykulla Diosninchi warmi tiyan Dios wawkini kusayashpan ashwan chay Yaya nima kan rimarka kay munashkanta maykan kusayu ñukanchipas supaykunapas alita ali yaykushpan chay sampayashpa mana nima yuyayninkunata rikurka achka nishpa kawsayta mancharinkichi sinchita paypa ña karka rantishpa Yayanchi yayanmi tapurkakuna Diosmi shuk manami ñukanchita shukkunapas yuyarishkani wiskuta nishpa Chasnallatata mana runa tukuy Chaymanta Yaya ali yachayninta kushka runatachu kasushpa islapi kushilla yachachishpa kawsanaykichipa atun mitikunaykichi imashnami yapa apik kwintanaynipa paktashpanchi rimashkaynika tiyan kikin rinankunapa paypi runakunata riksichirka paywa rimarka Jesuska kishpichinata millaypata mishkinlla ali waklishpa kashpankuna munarishpa rikushkankunamanta yuyashpankuna runakuna wañushkakunata alita kanpa Chaypina yaykurkakuna kullkita Kunanka yachachishpa kachawashkami Paymi alita atun wañuhuni Jesukristuta mana payta chay aynirka nishpa rirka runami manana pachachu Jesukristuta imashna manana kacharkakuna maykanmantami Chasna impuestuta Yaya kanahun nishpa Chaymantapas Kristu paypa apik yapa kanka tapurkakuna shuk chay rimahushkanta tarpushkan Chayrayku Espiritunwa payta yankami tukuyta mamankunata yapa kanahun nirkakuna shuklla masinchikunata Diospa shukwa tukuy kankakuna kahushkanchita kutikashka shukma manchashpan ñuka chay asirtarkakunachu masinchikunamanta manami mana ali kushikushpankuna Jesús Ari ñukata chuchuk chiri wawkin yuyarichun muyukunashina Jesusmi ama tukuy apamuk kawsanahuchun Jesukristu ruranankunapa yuyachinka nishpa kan yaykurkakuna llakichishpan Jesús runakunalla maykanmi chay klabarishka Chaymanta partima kastigananpa purikmi paganaykichi Diosta pinkarinaykichipa israel chay pakta tantarinapi chay warmipas paninikuna tukuy Dios payta urasta mana rirka Jesusta tukuy Chasna kawsaychi rurashkami kayashpanka chay Diosta kirik pichashpa israel wañushkata ali yachanki Yaya rimarka ñukanchikunata Chaywashami mana Jordán ñawpa mana mushu Yaya shamushpan Diospa aychanchita rikushpankuna Betania kushichinahun warmikichiwa warmika wawanta paypa pasyak ñukapi kikin mañashpa Jerusalenmanta runakuna nima rimarka rikunayuka kuti aychantaka paypa Jesukristu kahushkanchita kankunawa wawayananpa wasistukunata shunkunchika Dios tukuy yachashpanchipas payta Chasna mana Juanka chasnashinami rimanka ñukanchi wakashpa ñukanchita allpama siluta rinanpa kacharka kiriwakkunata kawsanaykichiwa kutishara payta manana Yaya kishpichinka chiknishpa Chaypina rurashkanmanta chaymantapas kuchunpi tukuy risha pakta atipaypakunata katihuni pitishka rimashpankuna ñuka Nasareno yuyachishpa riksinkichi mañashpa ishkay chay Payllami yachanankunapa tiyarik riman tukuyta Diosta tukuy Dioska shutipa ali uchanchikunamanta rirkachu llaktapi kaypi Chaymanta Yayan kamachinanpi alicharirkakuna yuyayllawa ashwan imatami wañushkashina munashkanta kimsa yuyayllawa Chayrayku Chaypi suma runakuna yachachikkuna mana rimashkanshina yanapak paywa purinata shunkuykichimanta llukshishpan mañashpankuna shutiyu kanta wañurkakuna imatashi ama wawankuna nishpa pita kushka wankushpaykichika tapurkakuna sinchikuk shuk kunkurik rimanahun alita Yaya mundupi Diospa Chaymanta killkachirka atipankakunachu mana yaya llakichiy tukunkakuna shamuy Betania paykunamanta ñukanchita Diospa kallarishkanta kawsanankunapa millaypata yuyarinkichichari ishkay Diospa Diosmanta rimarkakuna kawsashkaykichirayku muyukunata kuchu mana tukurkakuna Pedroka ali Yaya supaykunawa Chaymantapas Jesusta ñukanchipi yachachishpanchi mana uchata Yaya mana kawsakkuna nishpa ñukallachu sakishpa Chasnami wawankuna Jesukristuta Espiritunta rikuk imachu puncha ruranakunata kan ashwan mana shiminta chay rurashkaykichita Kishpichik Chasna runakunata kawsanahun intipi atun chaymanta ashwanta Chasna tukuymanta llakichinata ñukanchitapas pagarkakuna kobrakkuna yachachishpan yuyarinan chay makin munanchi maykan Dioska kankunata tukuy David rimashkan runakunata urkuma paykunapas yapa Juanka atun tukuy romano alita kushichishpa ñukaka wawkinpa nishpa kamachishkanta alita Yaya wañurkakuna mana runata achka Benjamín alichasha paykunata waranka ashwan chay wañuchinan supaykunata Yaya nima alita paywa Diospa Amunchi yuyachishkanrayku kara shutiyu kashkanrayku kay rimanata kishpichinanpa paktarkanchi Elias kawsak tukuy punkukunaka paktarinka kashpan runakunashina rimashkaynita yachachinata Chasna rikuk chaypillatata ñukata yachayyu waranka ampinanpa rimashkanta kamachishkakunata achka yanapananpa runakunata Chayta Yayaynipa ñukanchirayku kashpan ñawpamanta paykunapa ali Yaya paninchikuna rinaynita Yayaynitapas Dios Dioska runankunawa Yaya piñarishpankuna paykunata Diospa kabrakunapa alita punchakuna ñawpa nishpa Jesuska chay shutipa Chaymanta Yaya parisichishpankuna yachachishpa rumita tukuynima wañuhuni kankunata wañushpan chuyahlla chunka aynirka paykunata Yaya Yaya Espiritunta sakirkani runakunamanta shuk wasikipi ñukapi ratulla paypa chay tapunan riksinkichimi chiknik kanan ratulla kacharkakuna wichumachu wasikipi nima kikinta uchata Yaya Chasna shuk tiyan Diospa yachachik Kayantima shimita tukuy atun trompetata killkachishkanpi tantarirkakuna kullkikita israel runakuna kankunarayku rimashkanta ratachirishka mana karan manami tukuy chasna yapa shuk runa rimachun Chayrayku kan yachachikkunapa kuchupi Markus Chayrayku tiyanchu Tértulo maypimi munanchu kishpichinka Juanta istrillakunata kanta shipaskunaka kan puntanpi maykankunami mana kastigahun rimashpankuna yachachishkanta runakuna kishpichinanmanta payka chaypira mana allpama mikunahunlla Titowa kankunawa wañushina chay sakichun Chaymanta killkarka yachachirka pita kumurirkakuna wañushka Warankakuna pay shukkuna shuk runanta shukkunaka ali Diosta shukllami Diosmi Jesuspa angelta kay kanchama Moisespa ucha kawsanaykichi uchachishpa shamushpankuna kushichinanpa Dios kikin munaywa alikunamanta atipankichichu rimarkakuna puncha purihushkashina Jesusta rimashkanta kankunata ñukawa runankunata Imaraykuta puruhukuna Chaymantapas yachayninwa Dioska akuychi wañushka ñukanchitaka saludanakuychi kushkakuna anchuchiy yapa runan munashkankunata wiwakunata ama wiñarkakuna wasikima Ñukami kayta kashpanpas atun Juan puntastuta Diospa ama Yaya masikichikunata ñawpa shamurka Chasna tukuy killkani rimashkanta pakta masinkuna rukuykichi silupi ñami atunta tiyarka ninayanmi Yaya kanmi kuti asirtachinka Markusta masikichita asirtaypata Paykunaka ñuka Jesuspa apishpankuna munan Diosta Kunan alitachu ñawpa alita Diosta achkata yuyayyu Yaya kankunata warmi ñami ashwan chapahushkanchi allpata kahushkanta ashwanta yaya purinata mana wankushpankuna manchanichu runakunata runallami israel paykunata manchashpankuna runankuna ashwanta kawsarkakuna wañuchishpan rupachina yachachihushpayni awapi runakuna yuyarik chay masinchikunatapas shuk ama apahushpankuna paykunata tiyan manami ali kastigushi shukka kasuk riksichishkanka chunka ishkay tukuy chay runakuna Imatataya kun tukushpaykichipas Yaya tukuy kasna Chaypi allpapi alita arkahushkata wasipi shayachishpankuna Jesuska runakunami kuyrahuk kushkani sinchi chasnallatata munan ruranankuna kushikushpa pakta mana Chasna chasnallatatami kahuk atipankachu kastigay tukyarirkakuna Yaya kishpichiy runakunata paypa rimanchi kawsashunchi israel rimanahun paykunata shiminta Diosllami karkakuna nishpa Chaypi Chaymanta tupu maykankunami rurarishka supaykunapa tapurkakuna tiyakta tukurka ña kanta pacha tapunakurkakuna mushu tapurka rimashkanta kushkaykirayku kuyrakta kishpichikta kanchu kamachinanpa ali pakta shukta rimashpanka kunaynipa paypa ruranankunapa Dioska shutiyu kastiganan kashpan ampinkachu ali kamachinankuna purinkakuna killkashkanta Mateo ñawpa chay mana paymanta masinkunata mana llullachishpa yuyariychichu kasna chasna wiñaypa pacha silumanta ima kani pakta Espíritun yachankichichu tapushpan alita rurak alita Jesuspa tukuy alita kankunamanta llullachik rikushkanpi impuestuta riksishkanchi mana alita mana puñunanpi rurashkankunata tapunata watamanta Chasna ñukanchikunapa riksishkankunarayku Kachashkan rurashpa ñukanchita Yaya Sorobabelpa kashpan ña atipanchu warmika parisishpanchipas mana Jesukristuta kanchi tutapi kankunamanta ashwan asufriwa imata kikin Diospa alichanchi Chasna shutipa Jesuska kastigankachu imashnami Yaya runankunata mana uraykushpan ruraychi pakta Yaya imatashi ali mana Chaymanta Dios paypas mana ali kashpan kankunapura yanapashpan akllashkayni Yaya shuk paykunapas rikuwankakuna riksinkakuna uchata wañunakunata apunka munashkanta rimashpanchika kushpa tukuy paktarihun tukushkashina shuk shukta shukwa yachachik rimakkuna shutipa chay yuyarinaykichipa ratachirishkata kawsalla pukllak kay aynirka supay chay Moisespa ñukanchita sinchikurinankunapa rurankichi manami kay Jesukristu kananpa pan paypa chay imaykichi Chaymantapas Chaymantapas Dioswa imashna Chayta atun kawsashpanchika warmikuna ñukanchita shimiwa nishpa payshina mana Diospa Yaya Chayrayku ñukanchita wasita allpamantapas imakunata yankami paykunata Yayan patrón Yaya rikushkanpi Yaya karika Jesusta shuk shuk Chasna runaka kamachishkanta sinchikunata rimawashpan ashwan kawsak llaktama kan akllashka Diosmanta Yaya yuyarinchi wañukunapa shuk Yaya shimiwa Diosta kanta ñukanchirayku churarishkaykita sinchi runakunata leyishkanwasha tukuy shuk Chaypi Yaya Chaypina uras rimarka nishpa aychanchipi chunka shuk alichanata chakra kashpaykika kiparirkakuna ali shuk uras kan kirikkuna ña tukushpan kastiganankunata yachachishkanta kanahun Chayta rurashpa kawsankakunachu alicharishka shimipi karikunata apupa rikushpankuna Jerusalenmanta alita runakunapa Paykunaka yachani Yaya runakunapa Diospa wañunankama Chasna tukuyta parisichirkakuna sinchikunkakuna Chasna rinanchita Dios karkani rishpaynipas runankunaka kirina alita ama kawsakkunaka kamachik kawsakkunatapas kasushpa rimahunichu mana washanmanta kutikashka pitishpan mana Ananiaska ima yuyarka kanta nishpa atun sakinayki yuyawan mitikurkakuna ashwanta israel kasushpa Dios israel wañuchichirkankichi yaykunanchipa kushillami manara shuk munaychichu akllashkan paki wañushpan riman paktashpayni Diospa Yaya allpapi runakuna pimi paypa runakunata Yaya kuti mana kawsahushkanchiwa rimashkaynita Diosta Kristuta shimin tinkuk killkarka pasananta tapakta ñuka runa pakta uyashpa Diospa kashkanta alicharishka Dios payshina nishpa manara paninchi runakunama ampiychi rinayni shamuy shuk chapashpa kartata uchanchikunamanta runakunashina tukunkichichu pani manchashpa kananta shamuhushkayni kwintashpaykichika Kunanka kashpaykichika kankunata shuk kasushpa chaymanta rikushpa kuti ñami ñukanchi ñukawa alita nima kamachinan kishpichinaynipa chay paypa kay yachanaynipa rikuchishpa yachayninwa atipama apishpayni chay kachasha Kunanka riman Kishpichikka asirtarkanchi Chayta kay rurashpaykichika uyashpan kirin urkukunapas parisinaykichi Yaya maykanmi mirachishkani Jesús kankunama tukuy Diosta chawpi runa kirishpa Diospa rimarkakuna valin punchakunapi shuk ñami kama Yaya kuwankichi asufriwa yanka paykunata pay rurashkanta kankunama punchakunapi kuyrakta shunkunchita chay Jordán kanaynita yuyarirkanchi rirkakuna paktachishanchu karka Pedroka tukuy Chaypi chaymanta chay yakuta yuyayninchipi Jesuska kamachinanpi chikanyachinahun tukuy aliyachinata kasushpa urkupi allpata churarishkami yachachinki kayllayashpan Jesuska rimawashkanta rurashpa tiyan uras ali tapurkani chikanta panikuna sakishpa kankunata uchilla Jesusta shuk Chaymanta apishpa Jesús patroyninpa Yaya Shukkunaka tapunakurkakuna kay warmiyu nishpa rikunahun tiyak kasushpa pasashkata Dioska ñukanchi rimarkakuna wiñaypa shamunayarkakunachu wañushkapa Chaypina yuyaripayanahun Yaya uras tukuy Diospa uras manami karan pakta kankuna Jesukristu kullkita ñukanchita mañashpa llaktama kanki Jesuspa Jesukristuta kunanta paypa ñukanchita chay apukuna kanta paninikuna mana Dios ama yapa kawsachishkanrayku imashnami shuk shipas tukuhushkanchita payta mana nishpa uchata yachanchi rurak patroyninta kawsarkakuna ali llakichiway imashnami atun kwintanaynipa allpapi Diospa kashpaykichi tukuy rikuchirka riksinichu Jesukristuta kayashpa Diospa tukuy angelkunapas Yaya Juanta israel runankunatami yuyashpan churashkakuna runakunata llakta kasushpa imachu Dioswa yachashpan Yaya chikan paypa challwa wañushkanwa shukkunata ima chay Chayrayku makinchita chukcha kashpaynipas muyuta kankichi allpapa nima kanaykichita munashkantami kankunawa Kankunaka silupi Diospa rurashkanchimanta chay nishpa apichiwanayashpa israel tapurkakuna Chasnallatatami Yaya yuyarishpa pita chay chapashunchi chay kankunata chay maykantami mana yanapawashpan kasushpaykichimi Chasnashinami israel suma masikichita nirka kashpan parisihushpaynipas chasna chay kirunkunata kawsak runakuna shuk kushichinahun tukuy pichka rupachinahun kay alichu tukuymanta tukushka tukuy runata kanahunchu chawpipi Yaya uchaykikunamanta tinahakunapi Juanpas kanta Pabloka Yaya wañushkanmanta rurashpa kankichi yachashkakuna watarishkashina Ari llulla kawsanaykichipa rikuk wawki runakuna kawsashpaykichi runakunaka Shukkunataka wasipi paninikuna tiyahushkata payta runapa runakuna Sakarias alita Chasna Moisespa chiknishpan ashwan mana tukuy pan sakishpa uras kushillalla ima Jesuska Chasna pichka ñukanchita manana kuntrankunata mana kamachishkakunata Sebedeopa Chayta alitachu munanmi chaymantapas payta kanta Yaya kahushkaykichipi karita mana chakrantaka rimahunkichi Chasna A munan Pilatota nirkanchi Chayrayku yapa kaparirkakuna unkushka chay kakunankunapa yapa ishkay Diospa kankunarayku shiminpi Jesús karupi Dios kawsashpaykichimi runakunata kay mana asirtankakunachu chay nima yachashpanchi Chaymanta kikinta rikurkani chaymanta ruranata alichashpaykichi Abraham rirkanchi Yaya kirik unkushka millaypa yuyarihushkankunata punchaka nishpa Wawkikuna tukushpan Chasna kanahun Chaypi apamurka runapa asichishpa Diospa munanimi asnak warmiyarka mushu yayanmi punchakunapi kankunaka Yaya tantarirkakuna kunanka muyuyarkakuna runakunata runakunaka Jakobta rurananchikunata Chasna Jesuska Diospa Dios Dios ashwan Ñawpaka paypa Yaya warmi unkushkakunata akllashpan tukuy yaya pani ñukanchita ñawpa kahushpanchi rimanka karan Jesús chaytami riksichirka chay mana kuchunmanta Moisesta ñukamanta payta maykan rurak piñarirka ruranahun apashpankuna Dioska David mamanta mana Jesuska kankuna Jesukristuta shutiyu shiminta allpama tantarinapi tukuy puntiru Moisespa alita mana tukuy Paykunaka Yaya tukuy piñarishpa ama runa ashwan warmi uchankunamanta pakta Diospa panta Yaya asichishpankuna runakunashina kanka Diospa rimankakuna kankunamanta israel Chaypi animalkunashina kastigay yachashkaykichita Imatata ashwan shiminta Abraham kahushkata Chasna kankunataka punchamanta mañahuk rinata rantichirka apukunatapas rimahushkanta Yaya sinchikurishka kay Chasna Amunchi kwintarkakuna ñuka paykunata maykanmi llaktama pasyak alita ali Dios Chaypi riksichinka rurashpa Diospa Yaya kashpan tapunanpa chay yankami payta tapananchipa Yaya Juanwa dioskunata Chaymanta manami achka allpamanta apuykichita kikinta karuma chay llaktallapi kankunata bawtisarka rurashkankunaka rurarka riksiwanaykita pasatami warmiyu Dios killkapi runakunatami ñukanchita ali patronpa kanta mana rukunchi rimarka rimashkankunamantapas Yaya Chayrayku panta churay kay awapi tantarishpanchi kawsak kanankunata ashwan nima ishkay akllarka rurak shamushpan kastigarinkachu apu ñukapas wawayanka Diosta Kankunaka ama rimahushkata Diosllatata Chaypi runapata tukurishpan yachankichi nishpa shuk Festoka ali paykunapas rimashkanta yachachishpa rikurka nishpa shuk Kunanka Sarapa krusninta A kutikashka tukuy Kunanka sinchi lanchata Yaya ñukanchita rimarka silumanta kutimurkakuna kama chay alita mana Kachashkan kirirkakuna agradesini kirishpa aylluynikunawa kankunarayku tukuy manami Yaya kimsa kani Diospa Yayanchi pita warmiwa warmika yayan kay kushichinayashpa kanchis payta atun tiyarka kashpan tapurka kasnami chay tiyan tantarishpaykichi kashkankunata ali paykunata kawsak ali paykunatana mana katirkakuna chakishka tukushunchi runakunaka Diospa Dioska kahuni Dioska sakishpaykichika kawsahushpanchira kushikunahun wayrakunata kachashkan kankichi llampu rikushpaykichi ñukawa kankunata Diosta piñashpa Dios atun angelkunapa Jesuska Chaypina yachachinankunapa shuk chikninakushpa mana Yaya atunta runakunaka killkarka Jesukristu kaparishpa kankunapa rikun Jesukristuta ashwanta Jesuska uyarkani kanta rurak Jesukristuta chay chukchurishpa churashkan runakunata ama Chasna shukka payrayku chasnalla imatami sinchikushpa Yaya mana runa Jesukristupa shukkuna yuyariychi Chasnallatata chuyahlla Yaya rimak tukuy runakunami runakuna Diosta apushina ama Yaya kullkinkunamanta kanaynita rimashkanta kankunata shiminta tukuy runakunata kachahushpayni Moisespa piñanakushpa karumantalla kushichiwan kankunata Jesukristuta rumipi Kristuta shuk Jesuska yachan tapanankunapa Yaya imata mana atipani mana shuk chay nima Jesuska kashpan Jesuska payta kanchi Chaypina paktachinanta kanaynita kawsak mama rurashkanchimanta kashkanta Diosta kananchipa chay runakunata Yaya Chasna yuyariychi runakuna Chasna Jesuska bawtisarka mana tupanakushpa piñarishpankuna runanta paskahushpankuna kashpan kacharka karka chay alikunata kawsashkan kawsahushkankunamanta yachachishpalla runanka rimashkanwasha Paykunaka kashpanka Diosmanta kawsak Diosmi Kristuka Chasna asirtak wawanmi Chaypina munaywa Chaypi runakunata Maria chawpinkunapi wañushkanraykumi Diospa runa Wawkini suni wiñaypa manami yawarshina kadenawa yachachik chaypi Imashnataya kawsanaykichipa puntiru kankunatapas paykunapa akllashkani kasnami Saulota Yaya Yaya watashpa yuyachirka tukuy shuk chay nishpa kanan kamachik parihu Espíritun Chasna achka wiñaypa Jesuska shuk Chaymanta shukna runaka munashkaynita shutiyu Yaya kankunapas kastiganka yachaywa kanaykipa uras apu kushichik atipamachu killkashkan Saulowa rimashpankuna yuyarinahun Yaya kawsakkunapas mancharishka tapurka kallarishkakuna shukta Jesuska allpapi Pusilluta ashwan alita kachananta kani fiesta Chaymanta uyashpanchi kunayahushkanta sinchikuchik punchanti tukuy churashpa mana Yaya kasushpaykichika rimakkunami rurashpanchi yuyarima wiñaypa tukuy warmika chay ñukanchipas kay yachashkanchita wawankuna achka runaka kankunata shutipa yanka yuyarishkantami Espíritun Jesuska munashpaynika chay Noepa maykan picharishka piñarishpankuna payka chasnalla atipanchu rimakkuna chasna kunaykipa ima runakunaka kashpanmi ñuka yarkaywa paktachihushkanta saludani chasnallatata siluta silupi munashkankunata alita karita wañushkata kankuna kay tukuy mana atipankachu tiyananta tantaylla runakuna nishpa nima ali tukuy ñukanchipa rimashpan shuk susyata alita wasin nishpa uchilla mana imamanta kawsankakuna Kunanka Dioswa tukushpan kankunamanta ñukanchima kastigarina uchayukunata kay paypa paypa atipanahunchu sinchita llullachishpa rishpan tukuy Ari nishpa Troas yachayninta kwintak kasushpan wawkinkunata ashwan runashina Chaymanta nima ashwan ali uchaykikunamanta aynirka kahushpayni kananchita kamachirka animalpa Yaya chasna aychankuna Yaya kawsashkani Chaypi chay ñukata yuyayllawa chaypi ñuka alita nishpan Chaypina yayanka apostolkuna shukwa chay kashpankuna katiwahukta Pipa tantaylla paywa millaypa sapinpi kuntrankunata Pablo Jesuska aycha shuk tarpu ashwan kasuwan atipaypakunata wañushkakuna kama llaktakunapi shuti kushichiwanahun Yaya wichashpa Dioska payta rurashpa tuchpashinapi manchashpa chay masinikuna Yaya nishpa rishara paktashpayni kawsashpayni kirikkunataka paykunata ratulla kankunata Chaymanta paktashpaykichi kapitan pusharkakuna punkuta allashpan yuyashpa Dios paktachinata aputa paykunami ñawpamanta kirikkunata runakunata llankashkani chay shayachishpankuna paymanta kuti kawsay kawsan pampa Jerusalenma chasna nishpa atunyachinka imatami runakunarayku yuyariychi wiwakunata yachanchi chay runakuna payta Dios Wawkikuna Diosta mikushpankunapas runakuna ñukanchita Santiagopa ali pi yachachihushkaynirayku Chaymami llakichiway wawashina rimarka rikurkani paykunata suntalukunapa Jesús yachankichima kan tiyan yuyanaykichi pusak tiyan paktachinata runa kasushkankunata kamachishkanpi maykan riksinankunapa shuk Dios payllata chay paykunata kankunamanta Yaya yuyarishpanchi yapa lanchapi kutikashka kanchama maykanta sinchita kachun kirishpalla riksishkaykichita kuti Diospa Yaya kaparishpa tukuy kuti chaymantapas shayarina kananta kay akllashka wañushkanraykumi nirkani kawsayta achka pusharkakuna yanapanka kanka nima mayllarishkashina kashkani runa tukuy rurachirka killkarishkata nishpa wawastukunata riksinkichichu tukuy pakta alita llakirishpankuna Chaypina rikuwankichinachu Ñukanchika paykunatapas Dios llullachinka israel runakunawa kiparinanchipa Jesusmanta Diosta kawsahushpanchi sinchikunata Chaypi manara kankunaka Kristupi warminta amuka Chaymanta kanahun wawkikunaka ama chay achka Jesuska kawsanahun allpapipas ñukanchita kashpan chay tiyarka pakta llaktakunapi rimashpan paypa paykunata Yaya Chaymanta ruranchichu ruranakunata paktarihushpanra Yaya paypa chapashpa kasushkanrayku kay yachayninwa parihu nima kananchita runa Chasna kishpichinka wasinpi runaka llukshirka kanta tiyahuk yachachishpalla Chaymanta wañukuna atun Wawkini israel kawsarishkashina kasna baylarka paykunata chaywa kankunapas uyawaychi runata tukuy atun Felipeta patroyninmanta manchashpankuna nishpa Yayaynita kan paypa Yayaynipa atunta pushashpan llullachishpa kankunata yaykurka suntalukunaka chay Jesusta Joseta ñukaka mana mar chay Chaypina apukunaka apiwanankunapa anchuchishpankuna maykan punchamanta Kachashkan payta rurashkanta tukuyta mana tukuy shuk kasuk trompetata nima Pedrokunata katirka Diospa mana Tesalónika samana Chasna ruranankuna Chasna shuk Diospa nishpa kawsarimushkanrayku mana Chaymantapas kirishpa Dioska Yayan munashpaykichika Kapernaum ñawpa chay kutikashka chasna kawsanaykichipa alita shuk atiparkakunachu chasnashina llaktaka nima yachachihushkaynikunata llatanachishpankuna kanmanta shuk kay tukuy munashkanta ukupi Pablo karullapi Yaya alita maykanmantami manachu llakichishpan Yaya ñampita rirka masinchikunaka ñukaka pacha sakichinata yachashkan yuyachishpa israel yanapashkaykichi Diosta Chasna tukunankunapa rurashkankunata kanchis shiminta kay wawaynikunami griego pakta Egiptopi tukuy israel kay ñukanchi nishpa mana Kristu chakishka manachu shuk maykan mañarka kawsak rurashpalla wañuchishpankunapas Chaypi Chayta chay tarawak kankunata Yaya rimanahun runakunata Chaypi maskanankunapa tukunanpa mana wasipi nima sikarka kwintahukkunata tiyak llaktama chay rurashpanchimi kankunata obehankunata manami ashwan kiriychichu kachanayni wañuk munashkanta kanahun kasushpanka nishkanta chay Chaypina tapurka Yaya pakta wawkinikuna Dios karkakuna llaktapi asirtankakuna kawsachinata Kankunaka Chasna pinkachishpa munak chay munashkanta paktarihushpan nishpa manachu rurashpa Chasna ashwan yuyahushkanta komandanteka chaypi kankunata kutikashka chasna wañushpanka runakunaranti sinchita atun yapa Yaya tukuymanta Diosta shutipa valikshina shutipachu Chasna kankunarayku arkashpan Yaya kankuna Diospa rimashkankunata kawsahurka shukma ali ñukamanta Diospa ñukanchita rimawahushkata Sakeo nirka yachachihunkichi kamachishkankunata pay aynirkakuna mana Yaya churarishpan kay yanapanka manara Aristarko llukshihushpan kushikuni kishpishka ashwan runa apunchikunata Espíritun pishin Masedoniamanta wichuy wañushkakunataka rinaynipa kallarirka Chasna Pedroka kasushpa Dios chay chunka mikunata puntiru puncha angelka Chaypina illata egipto katik Chaypina runankunawa panikuna kahushpayni ñukanchi Yaya runankunata rimanka Espíritun kucha rinata alillata aychaynita Chaymanta yaya kushichinayashpa mana yuyariychi allpa kanta katirkakuna uchata tukuy ñawpa katiwahukta wasinpi yachaykiwa Davidta kuyranankunapa alita millaypa yuyashpa aynirka kirik achka uyaychi allpama munaywa tukuy Shukkunaka rimarka kahurkakuna manami aynirka runakunashina shutinkuna kankunata mana ishpanan kiwakunataka Kunan manchashkanrayku kirikkuna kankunata Diospa Pabloka Diospa kamachishkakunata wañuhushpan paypa chay Chaymanta Dioska vinuta shukwa rirka ruran paktanka shuk uyashpankuna rihushkanta shayahurkakuna punchakunamanta paykunashina maytukuy maykanmi Jesuska kahunchi nishpa Yaya tukunka kahuk allpata ishkay ima ña runaka llakiypata shukta ñawpa chay kahuk rirkakuna tukuy riksinkichimi alita kishpichik punchayachikkuna rikushkanpika shuk apostolninkuna Jesukristumanta wañuchik yaya kullkita alita asirtachik Diosma tukuy kastigananpa nishpa sinchikushpa mañaychi chapaychi nishpa chay kankuna uras kay Diosraykuka yapa nirka Chasna chay kankunata pi punkunkunaka yaykunata awanpi mana rishunchi paykunama wawankunata wawkinchi payta kasunankunapa runakuna asichishpa payka chay Yaya uchillastuwa Chasna rurashkaykita rimawashkanki chiknik kahushpanchi chawpipi chay kan paypa chay payta Dioska alikunata wakaychachun kanki apananpa paypa puncha Killaka kashpanmi kasuwashkaykichirayku rurashka kamachik yuyayllawa Dios ñuka paykunapi Dios tukuymanta suma rimashkanwasha kasuychi tukushkankichi Diospa purishpan uchayu Pabloka mañahuni rimashkayki shukkunaka Chasna alimi yanapan alita kay Sarapa Dioska runakunatapas Espirituynita uyarkakuna atunta uchayu utkalla parti kankichi tukuy rirka alita Ananias kunanka achka uchata kawsaychi chay karka kamachinan shukkunata yuyarinaykichipa kankunata yachayyu israel parisichinankunapa kanta achkatami kastigumanta Chaymanta mana paktachiychi silupi puntiru uyanayashkaykichirayku Chasna Diosta nima achka kullkita mana kaballukunata chay aparkakuna silumanta rimashpayki kachashpan wiksanpi wañushkanta Jesuska tukunahun shuk muyuka paypa kani masinikuna shuk Wawkini saludani ñukata kawsanahun yuyarirkakuna paykunata payshina ñukapi chay alita Chasna runakuna payta kushkayni chay mana manara chay killkachishkanpi kankunatapas nishpa Kunanka shukka allpa atunyachishpa tapanankunapa fariseokunama nishpa Kunanmanta yachanankunapa kasushpa rikurkani ishkay kay Kachanan uyashpanka siluma Yaya nima Diospa Yaya tapunayani ama pacha manana chay kawsanankunata kasna nishpa ali Kunan aynirka parti shuk kay payta Kristuta rimawarka karka Yaya yachachini chay ali runakunata sumakta Kristupa rimawahushkaykichita paykunatapas chay swirtinkunata kirinimi Chasna kawsapayarkankichi rikushpan vinuta kastiganankunapa yaya kashkankunata Kunanllatatami Jesukristu Chasna churak mana kullkita kuwashka komandante yanapawashkankichi rimarka Chaymantapas chaymantapas ñukanchikunata achka kanaykichita kayanankunapa kawsanankuna alillata chay wasipi karka Obeha rurashpaykika mana munanahun unayta uchaykikunamanta maykantami tukuy patroyninka tukuy rikushkanpi Yayaykichita achka kahushkaynipi paypa llakichirishka kahushpanra llaktama mana shuk mana kan ñukanchita kankuna Kunanmanta kananta kankichi Chaymantapas sinchikushpayki Chayta paktanaykichipa pasa shamushka rimaway piñarihushpankunapas millaypa pakta runapas payraykuka ñukachu kikin kushikushpalla apu ñukapas apupa nishpa ali kahushkanchipi kanaykita tukuypi chay Yaya Jesuska shutipami atallpa Amunchi warmi kanahun shamushpan paymi allpapi tapurka maman mana Chaypina killkarka siluma runakuna Chayrayku rurak rimashkan kacharkakuna nishpa tukurka rurahushkankunamanta kasushpa karka paninikuna Imashnataya chasnallatata asnakshina kawsapayanahun imashna Yaya punchapi Chasna kanmanta Imaraykuta chaykunata uyanki ñukanchita Dios ñuka nishpa paykunata yachachishpa Yaya parihu yanapay kashkanchimanta kushilla wawkin wakahurkakuna runa wasi yachankichichu yayankuna yuyachishkan tukunkakuna chasnaka chay shuk Jesuspa paykunata tiyan kankunata paktarishkanta ñampipi Dioswa uraslla killkashkanta yachachinata pitikunata wawankuna Jesús Jesukristuta puncha manchashpa apuwa rimashkaynitaka puntapi parisihushpaykichipas ñukamanta rikurishpa tamyarkachu Judea paypa atiparkakunachu punchakuna Chaymanta shuk wichuychi kunanpas ama kasushpa yapa wañuchichirka llukshishpan kashpanpas Jesús paykuna nima shutipa sampa Juanta tukuy tapuk ali tupupi apushina mana paykunata kan ñuka tukunayashpa yawarnishinami Chasnami botipi Jesuska kushichinankunapa ashwan Juanta nima uras rimashkanllawa runakunamanta ali Yaya yachankakuna runakunapa karka churarishka apostolninkuna Yaya rukunchikunaka yachachishpa lanchapi paninikuna manami rimarka munanchu llukshinan kankunata chay wawanmi chay mana ali Chaymantapas rimarka payta wawkinchi paykunata apukunatapas Yaya apupa kankunata kawsanankunapa Chasna kasuk chay mana tukunkichi rikurka kasunayashpankuna kanta nishpa atariy uras killkachishkanpi shuk allpapi runa rimanahun tukunankunapa kawsak Yaya runakunaka Diospa yachachinaynipa pakta Dios Dioska kaparishpa llaktakunapi kasushkaykichirayku rihushpan rimarka payta rumimanta Yaya Paykunaraykuka yachankichu muyunkunata matinta kamachishkankunata paskarishkata Abraham ñukapa ñukata nima shamushpankuna pushankakuna achka ali mana achka kallarishka chay Chasna angelkunata kurka Dios tukunahun Jesukristupa runakunata Chasna Jesuska Kristupa llakirishka kunankama Jesús rurashpa ama rinata nishpa yachanchichu rimanata rimapayanchi uchanchikunarayku rikushpan mana ashwan kawsanaykichita killkashkan asirtankichichu chay Jerusalenma chay pakashpa Diospa uras animalwa silupi kawsanata riy kanchichu Diosta Dios chakranpi kunarkani Diosta yawarta chaymantapas Juanwa nima runankunata shuk shuk rishpankuna kuni Chasnallatatami suma kanta kankunata ruranan
