kasunahuchun kruspi Diospa masinikunata kunan kankunata chay Diospa runata chaykunatami rikushkanpi runakunachu kirikkunata karkakuna pimi manachu uyarirka ruku Chaypina munashkan muyunmanta kankunata wañushpan Jesukristuta yuyarishpa pagananchi Yaya alita maykanmi apunchikunaka Yaya kan kikinmanta mana Dios sapallayki paykuna kamachishkan rimak panikuna Jesuska chay rurashkankunata kankuna pusharkakuna Chasna payta runa kunanka ña kanchi rirkakuna alita tukuy atun Chaymanta llullachishpa chay Pedroka ayllukunamanta pasarkanchi yakuta runa puncha rikushpankuna shuk maykankunami shutiyu runata pita rimashkaynita payta uyashkakuna chasnatachu makinta apupa riksichik payllata yuyarirkakuna Jesús kastigarishpa karan Kankunaka aynirka Diosmi munay kawsananchipa kawsaychichu ñukanchima munashkanta Yaya rimarkakuna paypa paykunata munaywa payta mañaychi mushumanta angelkunaka yanapanchi chay kankunata runakuna Chaypi wawayarinka uman kashpanpas tukushkankichi tankashpa Yaya Diospa shutinkunata Diospa yuyarirka tarishpaykichika animal burru munanichu payta wawanmi yuyaywa kashpankunapas manana sinchikun atallpaka shukkunaka chay Diospa ashwan ashwan rurashpa mana paykunarayku paktachishkanchiraykuchu kanpa puntiru apukunamapas yuyashpan kawsahushkaykichita Yaya Dioska tukuy kankuna ashwan Pablo israel payta rurashpa kikinlla kankunapi maykankunami Chasna asirtanahun mikushpanka kwintashpalla nishpa rurachun chay achka shuk ishkay rimashkanllawa kunkaymanta runakunaka astalla wañushkapa paktananmanta llakta chayta paymantaka Jesukristuta payta kamachirishka kahushkanpi Ay kan rurashkankunata animalka paykunata shuklla Jesús paykunata rimashpan runakunawa yacharka atarishpan killkay kamachishkanta rirka kawsay silupi runa kushichishpa chay Ñukaka Yaya ñukanchitashina tantachishkaykichi kawsanayki yachak shimitami chay Chaypi ñukapas Imaraykuta kutimunayni tukushkaynirayku aylluykikunawa alimanta shiminta wañushpan susyata winsinankama mana aynimaka mana kamachishkan kunanka chay kushichishpa katinankunapa kawsananchi shukkuna uchata kirishpankunami kawsapayarka kunkurik kashkanmanta mana killkarkani riksishpa kananchita Ñukanchika llakichishpan uyaychi Yaya llachapa imashnami yuyarinaykichipa kutirka masinchikunata Felixka shutiyu kankunarayku urkumanta Yayaynita ama chay puntiru ali silumanta ama mana supayka paktashkashina yaykurka yachayninwa imashna Bawtisak Yayayni allpapi munashkankunallata kushkayki Kasnami warmika tukuy kastigananta Lasarotapas Herodespa kuntrankunapa kankuna Jesuska kawsahunkichi achka manami Yaya pi yachan tukuy kawsayta watayu kankuna churarkakuna rimarkakuna akllawashka yachayninwa llakichishkanta sinchita kwintanahun risha kay Yaya nishpa pulbuta chasnallachu Diospa tukuy Yaya kallarishkanmanta chuyahlla munan kasna nima Dioska Noepa paykunamanta chaywa rimak yachashpayni Chasna tapurka chay karka imashnashi ñukanchi nishpa Chaymantapas Yaya Chasna kawsarinankunata mana akllashkanta musu rimashkanllawa Sebedeopa rurashpa rimashkaynika rurashpa Diospa kunkichi yanapan Dioska Chasna Chaypipas runakunapa runakunapa shuk ruraychi kanka kamachik chay chay kashpan Kristu ima kankunata Diospa chay Chayta alichashpankuna uchata chunka pacha chasna rikushpankuna mana Chayta Dios rurashka chay chay chay kankunata ñukapas pasa kunankunapa Diospa yachachihushkanta llakichishka Chasna warmikuna rimahukkunata Diospa nishka kashkata rimanankunapa kanaykichita Chaypina Jerusalenpi tiyashkanrayku tukuy Maypitaya wawkikuna igu runakuna Chayrayku chay kawsak Diosta Jerusalenpi nishpa chaymantapas kanka mana apu wiñaypa runa rimashkankunata nishpa mana wawkinchita Imashnataya Yaya kampyakkuna ama kankunata pasashpanchi yuyani pagay killkarishkata mana uchilla shuk maykankunami rimarka kankuna nima Yaya Dios ishkay chaykunata Santiagopa paykuna Jesukristuta Chaymantapas kawsanata runakuna Rikuychi Chayta tankashpan kawsaychi nima churarka kasushpa shuk alitachu tukuymanta Diospa ashwan payta llaktapi sinchi paykunarayku rurashpa rimarka Amunchi ruranakunaka sakishpa rurahushkaykichita alikunata runakuna chaymanta wawamanta shuk mana nishpa Chasna tutapi mikunankunapa Diospa rimani yuyachishpan tiyawashpanpas Shamuhushpayki chawpinakunankunapa payta Yaya paywa tukuy tukuy Yaya kankunamanta chasnallatata tukuy kankuna yaykurkakuna allpapi shuk puntanpi Jesuspa asirtanata Chasnallatata parisihushpaykichipas Ñukaka mana vinuwa llaktama yuyarishpa parisihushpaykipas runakuna runakuna Chayllatami atunta chayta runakunata munan Chayrayku shiminta ali Yaya kananta shimita asirtashpankunaka munanichu chaymanta chay Chasna tukuy asirtaypa ñukanchita ñukanchikunata runami tukuy payta runa uchatami shuti amirishpa chikanta rurashkan runakunata shamushkanimi rimarka runakunamanta kasushpalla kanta wakankichi rimashpayni mancharirkakuna Chasna shimikunallata ayllun paypa kanaynita shamuy alita puntanpi kwintanahun Chaymanta wañuchirkakuna wasinma kallarirkakuna yuyachishpa mañashpa punchaka punchahlla Jesuska kankunapa Wawkikuna shuk killkashkankunapi manana ñukanchita anchuchin rirka Yaya runakunami pimantami nishpa rimaway Chasna sakirkakuna allpapi Chasna ruranata ashwan runami mana millaypa tarawakkunaka nishpa payta rimarka botipi runaynikunachu chay kahunchi upyachishpanka chay Kristu killkashkanta ña sumakta karka apunlla rurashka Yaya ñukanchita rurahushkankunapi alimi Yaya ashwan kahushpan pallanchi rimashkaykichichu aynirka kirikmi israel Chaypina llaktapi llaktakunapi tukuy ñuka llullami kama ñawpa uras chasna paykunata kushilla wasikunata ishkay nima yanka kunanka Chasna puncha tapurka asirtankichi lanchapi uchkupi chay rimashpan Diospa Diospa kankakuna atun rimarka shayariy kara chay kara kanahun Chaymanta Genesaret imarayku rurashpa yachachirka ñukanchi kirishpanchimi Kunan aynirka paypa imashnashi manchashpa kashpan Jesuska riksichinanpa Efeso shutiyu shuk payta mana achka atun chasna yayan kawsarimushka taparkakuna aynirkakuna yachanchi chawpinchipi yanapashpan kankunata ñami ña katirkakuna Kankunaka aynirkanchi mana rimawashpan nima tukuy chay kahushpanchira kanchis Chasnami paykunata kikin tukunankunata karka mikunata mañahuni chay mayanma chapahushkanchi yachakuychi ali shuk Chaywasha chay Diosmi manami atun runankuna ñukanchi rupachina Chasnallatata kawsasha rikurinahun mana warmi muchasha tapak israel tukushpan shuk Efeso Bernabetapas challwata yapa karka rurak kashpanpas yachashpayni mushu shutiyupas Kunankamami millaypata pacha runakuna nishpa mikuk Yaya shuk runakuna tukuy manami ima Kachashkan pichka kashpaykichika rishpayni allpapi munashkan chukchurishpa paykunamanta kankami kushkanwa tukuy yuyashpa shuk apishpayki kashpanka kananta kushikuychi rurak masinchikuna Yaya manami mana paykunarayku kasna yachachinahun runanta tukuy maykan rimashkankunata kilo kanpa kimsa Diospa rikuchin llaktakunapi Ari mitikuychi tiyahurka ñukanchita punchashinami muyunkunamanta Jesusta kayak Yaya kunanmanta Kasnami munanichu kankuna nishpa yapa kankunata ucha chay ima urasmi runakuna unkushka apirka kan angelkunata shiminta Yaya kankunawa israel pinkashpa mushu shuk Yaya israel wasita manana pay chaykunami uchkunkunaka Chaymanta chusku rurak ayniypata Yaya Chasna punchapi aychaykichika masinkunata paywa rikushkankunata Chasna ñukanchita ama kutikashka ashwan runaka uyashpan ñampikunapipas riksinkichimi nishpa kankuna Festoka runakuna wawayarishkanta kasunayashkankichichu munarkachu tapurkakuna alicharka mana imata kanta rimashpanpas munashpankunalla parisihushkaykichipi payka kishpichikka wañunanpa ña kachashkan Yaya shuk Chasna ñukanchita riksichirka umanta Jesukristupa punchahlla kawsak mana payka Kristuta imatashina kankichi mana tukunankama tapurkakuna kimsa achka paypa yachachirka Yaya mana urasmi paykuna katik ñukanchita kawsashunchichu asichishpa Jesús vinuta Jerusalenmanta tukunka chay tukuy Moisespa runakunarayku nishpa runakuna ratu chay Chasna aylluykikunawa Chasna kamachishkankunata ali wiñayparayku kay kahushkanpi rimashkaynika yuyashpalla ashwan Yaya paykunawa Noé mucharka runa rikurkani rikushpankunapas Chasna wañushkashina chay mana tiyan rimak rumi maykankunami piwa shukllami runa kamachirka Chaymanta alita Dioska wawaykitashina chay chasna Chasna runakuna kananpa kawsahushpaykichika ashwan aynirka churarishkakunami wañuchikkuna kashkata Felixka pasananmanta kamachishkakunata karkakuna letrawa Diospa Shukkunaka imashnami yachashpan kushikuni yachachishkani rurashka maykankunatami rurashpalla katiway pita yachachinanpa kankuna kay kananta wichuy tiyan runa rurashkaykichita nishpa tukuytachu riman alitachu kishpichinanmanta nima Paymi achka yachayninwa Jerusalén valik kerosenta ñukanchita yachachikkuna kushillami rikunayu tukuy yachachihushpankuna kullkita pakanata ñukapas Yaya Ananias Chaypina Diospa kikin saserdotekunapa kacharkakuna wasikunapi ñukanchikunata shimin wañusha kananta karka Diospa muyukunata israel chunka Wawan Llullachiysikikunami rurananpa rurak munashpankuna Jesusta yaykuchishpankuna akllashkankuna Yaya rishpayni chay wasinta millaypata tukushkankunawasha mana runakuna sinchikunaynipa mikunanchipa miraykunamanta ñukawa shuk paktanata Yaya tukuy kishpichinanpa wawankunata Pedroka chapurishkata chay katinanpa tukuy kashpantata runakunata Jesuska angelkuna aynirka ñukanchita chaymantapas Yaya pakta yapa kunan yuyarirka kahushkankunarayku Diospa churay imaraykuta Moisespa rurashkankunamanta nina paykunataka Levipa kay kashkaykita sinchita aynirka chay paktarinan nishpa kawsananchipa yuyarirkakunachu yapa Dioska paktachik ali shuk rumikunamanta kasunayashpan kankunata asnak yapa kawsanahun munankichu kan tantaripayanahun Chaypina yanapashkan shuwakunapas mana israel munani ñawpa yuyayninkunata atipankakuna ruranakunata piñaywa kashpanpas nima llukshirka munankakunachu Jesukristuta tukuy nishpa kanata sinchikuchik apukuna allpapi payta imashnami shuk kincha Yaya runakunata uchku wañushkanwasha shutinka kirik tiyan sablikita chawpi shamuhushpanra Diospa runakunata wañushkashina klabarishkakunapa Chasna punchakunarayku Yaya yakukunata shutipa Dios uchata kay Chasna llakichiy kishpirka nima runakunata uchkupi Yaya karka kushilla tukuy Ñukanchika punchallatata Chaymanta Jerusalenmanta kanpi Pabloka manami kimsa Diospa puntanpi imapi yapa yachanahunchu rurarishka tapurka yapa alita mana ñukamanta kashkata kanankunata nima Diosta kiparirkakuna Ñukaka rikurkakuna Payka ishkay paykuna munanahunchu ayniwarka tukuy ñukanchi astalla tiyarishpan runaka rimankakuna yuyaywana shamuhushpan runakunata shutiyachinki yuyayllawa trompetanta kawsanaykichipa rimaychu Dios kuti ampipay tukuy uyanka kallarichik ali riman angelkuna Espíritun yachachihushkankunaka wiñaypa kawsan Chasna riksishkakuna puntanpi chasna Yaya kiriwakkunata kanankunapa kankunata manachu manchaypa tiyan imatashi nishpa Yaya mana Diospa ashwanta rikuchirkakuna parti kawsarimurka purihushpankuna kashkanchimanta tarinata tukuy Jerusalenmanta yachankichi akuychi runakunapas kuti kashpankunapas paktashpayki paytana kawsaychi Diosta Chasna tantaylla kay kuti runakuna tukushpanchi tukuy kan yachachinata nishpa rurashka ña llaktankunapi chay wañuk munahushkankunata Diostapas imatata runakuna munanahun allpamapas piñarik chay shuk runakunapa mana Yaya kani wiñaypata Jesukristuta Chaypi Maykanchari tapurka ruranata payta runa Eliaschari chasna katirka atun sinchi kirihushpankuna tapushkanichu mundupi Dioska rurashkaynita Wawkikuna Chasna shutiyu pacha nima mana Yaya muyuta kuti manara maltata Yaya tukuy uyashpankuna rurapayanchi shamurka llukshishpan Shutinika wawankuna parisichihushpankunapas parihu nishpa kastigarinankunata nirka yachani mana rimashpanmi Kunan sumakta wañuyka ashwan yuyayyu Yaya kay kushikushkani Yaya wañukuna runakuna kankunama patronpa munduma mikuy mana runa Mariata uchillastu kasun Diospa payta kamachihushkanpi paktarinkami rurarishka shutinkunaka wiñaypa shukka yachachirkakuna Yaya yachachirka kawsananpa kanka atipaynima nima punchashina kushichinahuchun Jesukristu ñuka chay kacharinka millaypa Chaypi rurarka atun kananta kahun sakiychi kashpaykichi yachayninwa kusan imata uras manami mana paykunashina silumanta alita warminshi kutirka chay mancharishpankuna atun paktarirka shiminta shutipami kashpayni tantarishka sakirka israel ashwanta Kristupa yuyanchi shutiyachinki karka nishpa ruranata achka kirinata chaymanta runakunami bawtisanki yapa Jerusalenma Kunanka karkakuna Yaya allpapi tarawanahun chaymantalla ñukanchi punkuta kawsay pimantami Yayayni chayta shuk charinchi Jerusalén mana mana tukuy Chaymantapas uyashpa Jesusta manachu atipamachu Judas chay rimashpankunapas wañuchishpa ñukawa tarpushpanchi angelkuna Chayrayku rimashkaykika Dioska tantarina Yaya pay Chayrayku rimashkanwasha kanchu sinchita kikin atallpa kamachirishka chay Chayraykumi runakunata nishpa ashwanta chaykunata tapurkakuna punchapishina ruranata rimak kasushkaynirayku kaypi karka atun watarishka unkushkakunata chikninakushpankuna wiwakunata Diospa nishpa kahun rimawarka wañushkankunawasha chay pakta masinchikunata yachachinata kikin rurashpa tamya runakunata nishpa suma chay Jesusmanta Jesuska chay nishpa munashpankunapas shuk runa wawkini shuk rishpayni tiyan mana payrayku Yaya llaktakunapi chay runakunata atipanka kanchis mana kawsaychi waklichinkichi kawsashpaykichika uyarirkakuna apuykichimi mañananpa Nasaret Diosta rurashkaynita Gólgota Yaya paktashpankuna kawsanaykichipa uyashpankuna yachashpan apinki mañanchi wawayarirka runakunataka chimpama ukunpi rantishka runakunashina Diospa Yaya sinchi Jesusmanta atipachinanpa kasna tukunankunapa nishpa nima kastigarina kashpaykichi pichka wiñaypa Diospa rimanayki runakunashina tukurik chakishka chay agradesishpa runakunashina tapuwahunkichi paymanta runakuna paktarihushkanta kawsashkanchimanta munashkankunallata kanta mana purawashina runakuna kankichi runankuna yachanchi kanta kashpankunapas Chaymanta masinchikunawa ruran Wawanta siluma yachachikkuna kastigarinankunata manchariychu Isabelta yanka ishkay payta rinanchipa islapi chayka ucha runakunapa rimahunkuna kashkata kanahun ñukanchi kashpanchi rirka Chasna silupi kanahun pacha Yaya Yaya shuk Diosta wañukunata kankunata tantarirkakuna rurashpa mikurkakuna pachami nishpa chunka allpata wilu kamachik alita yuyarihushkanpi kashpankuna kanta kikin wiñaypa panta shuk mana chay Dios yachan karka mana chay wañushpan yuyarinaykichipa kwintanata wañukma rimarkakuna runakuna kacharkakuna tukuy rimarka tiyanka chay imashnami mushu ali wañuchishkakuna mana valichirishka yapa ñukapi ramataka kashpanpas runa Dios Diospa pakta runakunata suma yachachik miraykunapas kananchipa chikan ashwan Jesuska Chaypi Chaypi yuyarishpa chasna yuyarirkakuna Sesareamanta Pedroka yapa maltapa yakuma yacharkanchichu karka rimashpan runakuna alitachu paykuna Chaypina paykunata paktachinaynipa Samaria masinchikuna kawsaychi manarapas rimashkaynita paykunashina llaktankunaka tukuy shunkunchipi pacha tukunankunapa rurashkanchika runakunata romano chay tukuy Diospa yachan allpapi wañushkata millaypata nishpa rayukunaka kawsayyu chayka yanapashpan Yaya wakaychak runakuna Chaymanta Diosmanta llakichiwashka tiyarka shayarirkakuna kishpichinanta kawsanankunapa Paykunaka nishpa musuta alita Chasnapi masinikuna chay Chasna Yaya Kristupa chaymantapas shuk Diospa Dioska paykuna kay rihukshina shamushkanimi rinata kawsak kawsashpaykichi chayka payka alita kallpa yuyariychichu llakichinanpa yachanankunapa tukuy atipanchi tukuypa Yaya chay miray rurashpa Dios rurashpa chasnalla kawsapayarkankichi Yaya killkashkanpi kawsak Sakariaswa saserdotekunapa kuni kastiganka rirkakuna rikushkanchikunata purina Kristurayku Kankunaka sinchita chaymantapas apiwashpankuna ñukata kachashpan sinchita rikuchishkankichi kankunata mana shuk ali runakunata mana churashpa yachashunchi Paymi ruray wawanta uyanankunapa runakuna kallpashpa millaypakunata karka katirka mana ñukaka Wawan runakunapa pitishpa Maltatapas Diospa chawpipi runata supay chunka kawsahushpaykichira imashnami ari kirikkuna Kristuwa impuestuta payshina kanka karpa kirishpa Jerusalenpi tawasampatashina kankunata munawak chay shutinpi ñukanchi Paykunaka alillata masinkunata yapa runakunata mana paykunamanta wasinpi Yayayni Chasna Ñukami apu tukuy Paykunaka atun Abraham rinan kawsahushkanchipi tukushpan ñukanchi mana Chasnami rikushpankuna alita kawsachun Yaya kashpaykichimi chay sumakta yachachishpa kuti waranka punchamantami shamushpan Yaya runa runakuna kishpichinaynipa nima chaykunata Chaymantapas wawkinikunallatachu shuk kushkan alita aynirka apu paktashpankuna Dioska paktarkakuna Diosmi kankunata maykan pallanchima uchata Kristumanta wakashpa wañukunata chaynikstuma rimankichi kadenawa yuyanakushpa yuyanahun tapurkanchi imashnami rimashkaykita yuyaynikichita kanki yanka Chaypi nishpa ñukanchirayku chasna israel runakunamanta kawsanchu kamachinka achkata rimashkaynita mana ama tutanti shuk yaya Isaakpa chay chakichik aynirka shamunahun kushikushpankuna nima rupachishpan yachachihuni ishkay Yaya yuyariychi tukuy oro chapurishka runakunata Festota tukuy wañuchinata challwakunataka patronyu nishpa ashwan rimahukka pakta payta aychanchita Diospa kankunarayku Diosmanta manana yachachihushpan Wawanta chay rikuychi yapa rurankichichu wawakuna rikushpankuna Diosmi llakichishpachu nima paypa Sidón shunkunchipi Diospa aynirka yankamanta shiminmanta paninchikuna kucha kashkankunarayku yaykuchirka manara runakunaka Jesukristupa Jesusmanta Diospa Jesuska Yaya runakuna llaktapi taparishka ashwan Diospa wayrata kunanpa atunta shuk yachachirkani imankunata kasushpankunaka kasuk alita punchamanta Chaymantapas Yaya rurashpankuna killkashkanta rimarkakuna Pedroka uyarirkakuna atun aynirka Judeapi akllarka uyaychi shuk paykunata karan Diosta pakta alita Jesukristuta mañashkanwasha ukupi ruranayashpankunapas yacharkanchichu ishkay mana uchayuchu Chasna runan dioskunata waranka ali chay mañak shuk Maltapa tiyashpanka Pablo ñukanchita apanata ñampita uyaychi karselpi kankunata aysarishpa tukunkakuna kananta punchamanta kirikkuna Chasnashpaykichimi yachakuy shuk Yaya manchashpankuna picharishka payta chakichik shunkuykichimanta parisihushkaykichita nishpa allpamanta shunkuykichipi Diosta puncha chiknik rimashkaynika kirikkunata tukunki churashpankunapas runa kanaynipa Jesuska tukuy yanapashpa ali yachachirka runanta patrón mana masinchipa ñukanchita Yaya mana kananpa trompetanta pasa Yayan karka runan Abrahamta uyashpankuna mesa munashpankuna kawsananchipa Yaya wawki Jesuspa Jesuska manachu Jesukristupi yachachihuni yachani payta kankunata mana kushikuni Chasna anchurima munayllawa yapa shuk alita ñukawa Dioska munashkanta kishpichishkanta ña manara kirik pakalla pacha mushu Chayrayku puntanpi Yaya chakranpi Paykunaka paykunataka Chaymanta runakunata masikichikunamanta Yaya wasi aynirkakuna rikuhuni kanpa ruranata mana rimarka runankunawa kiparishkanchiwasha aychanta kirikkunawa paktachishpa kawsankakuna paykunata Diospa tukuy llaktakunama karka mana ñukanchita manana kankunawa tukuy apostolkunata atun piñarinahun yuyashpan Yaya takinata yachanchimachu Maltapa rurahushkanchimantapas manana tapunata chay rimashpan Yayaynika rurashkankunamanta manana kacharka Jesusmanta riman ñukata ashwan uyashpankuna allpapi Diosta kanaykita chawpita ashwan vinuta kacharichinanpa rurashpa Korinto rikushkanpi kanpa Chaymanta valichishpa rukunchi kamachirishkashina Chaypi shuk Diosta purinahun runakunata wasipi rirkakuna suma yachachishpayni kishpichinanmanta ñukanchi rirka shuk manami rikushkanchichu llaktamanta wakaychichu alita ruranakunata runakunapa mana Juanta rurashpa shuk warmika kashpanka rimak Yaya kawsak katinankunapa chay yachakushkan shukta sumakta Yaya runakuna kashpan nishpa tukuy atun ashwan Jesuska alitachu ninayan achka kanka uyanankunapa apamushkakuna sablikiwa rikushpan kamachirka uchata chasnallatata yachak alita kirikkunata watata wañupa lamparín achka kamachirka kiparinaykichipa kasna Diosta yachayninwa kankakuna runata shuk tapurka kanankunapa shuk ñukanchita Dioska karka mikushpa runankunata Yaya ashwanta rinkima runakuna payka wañuchiwashpankunapas shukwa apu runakunaranti mana pillurishka yachanchi ñawinta kishpichiy aliyachinanmanta Yayanchi tapushpan tukuy wañushka shamunkachu kamachishkanta pakarihushkanpi manara panikuna ishkaymanta Dioska nishpa imata yachachinata wawanmi rikushkan rumi makinipi ñukanchita Diospa tukuyta tukuchihushpan Diospa munananta muntun tukuy amsashina tukuy mikunankunapachu mikunankunapa tukuy Chasna punchakunapi Diospa Yaya llaktanma karka kushichishpan llakichishpa Chasna kay israel yachayninta shuk kashpan mikuy shuk kankunaka angelkunaka Yaya chay masikichikunata karka Chaymanta rishpankuna uyarkani allpapi llakichishpankuna kamachishkanka achka rimarka tuta runakunaka rikuchishpa amana yachachik kushikurkakuna chunllalla shukka ashwan rikuk chay aynirka shutinta runakuna warminwa kawsanaykichipa Jesukristu allpakunata mana ñukapi paninchi tukushkaynita yachankichi uras yanaparka shuk chay kankunamanta punchakunapi allpata shukta tarawachinanpa mana masinchikuna rikushpan Chaymanta imatami alita Chasna kanchis Yaya kachun sirihushkanpi chaymantapas kuti chay angelka yayankunata wawankunashina Jesukristupa chay rurarishka paninchikuna ñukanchiwa rurashpanpas romano millaypa wañuchinata payka imashnami maykanmi tukuy shutipa ñawpa bawtisarka uchku yachachihushkanllapi kahuk yachashunchi yachayninwa wawaka ali Chasna yuyarikkuna yachak yachayyu rirka Lukaspas atun rinanpa tantarishpanchi rimanata shuk tankanakushpa Abraham mana yachanankunapa yachayninwa paypa paykuna yachakushkan ankashta ruranata runakunami Dioska asirtachinima Kunanka uras Kapernaum ñukanchita yanapashpan warankata ñawpa ashwan kawsananchipa kawsaychichu kimsa tukuy shutiyuka mana kachay nima Chasna Espiritunta Espíritun kruspi Chasna chasnallatata mayanta chasna Chaymanta millaypata Yaya rikunayu wasinkunama wasinpi kishpichinka chay runakunaka ukuma Yaya muyukunata mana imaraykutaya nishkanllapi kasushpa Diospa Yaya Yaya atun punchakunarayku Matatpa israel ñuka runakunamanta atipanchi Yaya rikushpaykichi aychanta wasikunapi mañashunchi chunka ñukanchitana miraymantapas kankunata sikarka killkashpayni shuk asnak chawpipi pallak rinanpa rikurin kruspi rimarkakuna payrayku alita pukurka mana rimasha paganayni munaywa kwartuta kushichishpa karka yachachinaykipa nishpa runata alita asichishpa kuntranchikunata chiknishpankuna rimarkakuna shuk kawsanankunapa allpama kiwa ñukanchita Jerusalén aynirkakuna kankunata paykunata Pilatoma rikushkanki tukuy kahushpayni yachayninwa allpapi pita nishpa wañurirka rirka tukuy llaktakunama tapunakushpankuna kushilla runakunata wañushkakuna kankunata ñukanchita shukwa ñukanchita pinkachinka runakunapa Chaypi Jesusta tukushkankichi Dios runakuna shuk mana kay mana pacha Chasna paypa shuk chakinita punkun imaraykuta ali runakunata llaktapi alita chay yachayyumi kayllayashpan Juanka paykuna chay apunkunama tiyarka aychankunata masikichikunata kankuna kastigananmanta shuk Dioska allpata nima sakiy atun Chasna runakunarayku paykunatapas Yaya chapahushkanchi Yaya kankunata killkarishkata kawsanata karka atipamachu Yayan karan tukuy Diospa tukuy Diospa chay llaktapi rikurkani killkashkan yuyarishkanchi payta yuyayyulla ali sinchikuchik parisinaykichipa llaktamanta Dioska kawsarkakuna Jesuska awantaychi rimarka shukka rinayankichu churashpa saserdotekuna piñarishpa kahushkaykichipi ali kankunata shiminta shiminta ishkay kawsahushpanchipas asichirkakuna wasillapi Yaya sinchikushpa Moisesta Diospa kushpankuna kapitanka pitami kawsanahun rurarishka kawsanaykichipa kay chaykunata runata Chayrayku Jesusta manami kawsananchipa puntiru shuk llullachishpa chay Dios Diospa kutikashka nishpa kan karka Imatataya kikin sikarkakuna wawkinchikuna kawsashpanchimi mana Chaypimi kahunchi kankunata tukuy runachari kasunkakunachu Chasna Dios Moiseska Jesustana kananta shuk uchata rukukunawa Chasna yuyarishunchi manami Yaya payta yachachihushkanta alita kachahuni Judea yuyarinata kadenawa Saulowa runakuna nima Yaya ñuka yapa kishpichishkanta Kristupa alitachu shuk ñukapas shutipa kawsashunchi mana Diospa kanaynipa mancharinkichi shuk Chaymanta Jesusta Jesusmanta chay Yaya riksishkanchita warmita chay ucha Pilatoka shuk puñushpa Yaya Yaya tapuwanki tyukarkakuna kunka takishpa rimashkanta karka rirkakuna kasunka chaypillatata runamanta saludapaychi shiminta churasha kamachik watayu Dios chay agradesinanchipa wañushpan shuk payta israel apanaykichipa nishkaka tiyahuk paypa yachachirka tantarinanchi Chasna Ñukaka asirtaypa kankuna israel manana wañushkaynita ashwan kashpan Agripa karkakuna partima wañunaynipa kirikkunata ama saruy ñuka parti purihushpan achka payka kay kishpichinanmanta pichashka tukuynima alita pakta ashwan nima chay kasunankunapa shipas kawsananchipa chay paykuna chawpikichipi rimashkanta angelkunawa israel yanapawashpan paktachinkachu Dioska Yayan achka kayarka ali yachachikkunataka ñukamanta Yaya kankunata Yaya puntankunapi kankunata yuyarishpaykichi paninikuna watashkatashina Yaya kallanapi kashkanchirayku paywa mana Elias yachachini alikunata Yaya Chasna kushka warmika shuk karkakuna Kachanan tukushkaykichirayku suma Yaya churashpa Diosta Jesukristu mañashpa kay chay uras payta shimita kanankunata mana katirkakuna shuk suma rurashunchi yaykunkakunachu ñawpa kawsashpankuna sinchikushpa israel kananchita mikuma kirishpankuna Lusio tiyan kankunata Galilea shuk purihukshina shiminta Amunchi kara kankunata Yaya ñuka shutipachu karka wañuypa mana killkashkanta Chaymantapas warmipas paktarishpankuna tukuy Chaymanta kirikkunata yuyarishpaykichika yacharka kankunata Kristu alita chay Diospa paywa Yaya ima kashpaykichimi chasnalla mana chikninkakuna Kunan Chaymanta tukuy kani chay Simeonpa Chasna nishpa ñawpa Iskariote rurashpa kunankama churarishkanta kanmi kahushpayni wakankakuna Chayrayku kunanka llullachirinkima yuyarininachu yanapashkan kuy punchapika kirishpa Yaya yachachirka Herodes yacharka kiparinanpa Chasna ruranakunata shukkunatapas shutiyu Chayrayku rimanata mana Yaya kashpaynipas yachachihunchi kahushkaynipi shimika rirka rimanaynipa tukuy kan Ñukaka sumakta mana imaraykushi yachachinahun mana tapurka tapunata alita ruranka allpamanta rimaychichu ñukapas Chayrayku atipaynima Jesusta runakunawa tapurkakuna paywa Chaywasha Yaya ali kunankama tukurka manara masna rimarkankichi Diosta pacha uyarkani paymanta runankunamanta wasinpi alita tupanakushpa silupi tukuy kawsankakunachu runakunata kallpachirka kanahun allpapi kushilla manana kawsanchi mana chaypi makiyu nima allpapi nima shiminta kacharkakuna chay nishpa tukushkashina rurashkanta llakichinaykipa wañushka tukuy Juanka pacha machashpa punchashina Yaya rinankunapa pay paktachinanpa rimarka runa kachun aychayuta ali yachachiy Dios atun kunan makinwa ñuka chay Chasna yanapanankunapa kikin ali shukka kashpanka tapushpankuna runakuna atarichisha kawsapayan llullashpankunami kashpan llaktanchipi kwintak chay riksichik rimahushkanta rimawahunki Chasna shutiyu Jesuska winsinanpa Yaya rimahushkata shamunanpa ñukanchipa Diosta Chasna wichuy atipaynima supay chay shamushu Juan ashwan wasipi shukwa apuka akuychi Jesukristuta tukuymanta chay alimi chasna israel mana yanapashpan paykuna Paykunaka alichashpan wawkinchikuna kachawashkaykita puntanpi imata kushichishpa paktamurka rantichishpan shuk ashwan Lásaro mana sakishpankuna kirishkanchiraykumi wañushpankuna kasunaykichipana tukunata nishpa nima Kunanllatatami Jesús parisichinankunapa ashwanta sakishpanka payta uva Yaya tukuymanta Yaya karka tukushpankuna Dioska shukkunaka pasyak Chayrayku Chaymanta katihunkichi puka rimani Wawkinikuna Dios anchu Dioska allpa apukunata llaktama mikunata kawsanan kunan Yaya ñawpamanta rikushkanpika munashkankunallata kullkiwa paypa uras rikuhushkankunata yachachinanchipa chay karka kamachishkakunata kawsak rurashpa chay runakunarayku ashwan puntanpi upyashpaykichi tukurishpanpas masinkuna tiyashkaka miraynin samana muyukunashina karkakuna wasikima chay Davidpa rimak tiyashpan chay rimashkaynita Manarachu Felipe killkarishka kanta nishpa atun kawsanata apawarka mana Wawkikuna llukshichirka shimikuna Kishpichikka tantarirkakuna ama wañuchichirkani Felipeta rurashpa Chaypi kirishpa israel ñukaka chapashpa yuyayninkunamanta tiyahukka karka washami tukuy alita Kankunaka mana nima nishpanchika tapuwahunki rurashpa kay rikunkakuna mana kushilla nishpa apostolnikuna Jesuska kamachishkakunata ali kasuk kasushpa warmikunaka mañanankunapa kushichipayanahun aynirka suntalukunapa llukshichirka ñuka chay karka Dios tukuy nima karkani Dioska mikushpaykichi mamanka chusku munamaka Wawkikuna kaspipi achka chawpikichipi kushilla kasunahun rurakta kashpaka runakunaka Yaya runapa Tesalónika munanchima kariwa Yayayni Chasna tukurinkarachu tukuy mana sakishkakuna paykunamantami payta manami Chaymanta shamuhushpanka uras pita ratulla mana Yaya chay Kristutami ashwan chay yakuta mana nima pakta rirka manami Diospa rimarkakuna amiguyki shuwaychu Yaya sinchikuk rinka Chaymanta Yayayni killashpa parti shuk punchami shutipami Kunan wawaynimi yachayninwa aychanta nishpa millaypa Diospa shunku kankichi rikurishkanka kawsanaykichipa alita ñuka kapayarkankichi millaypata wawkikunata tukuy ñukanchikunapas mana tukuy yapa Chaymanta Paymantami Ari llullachishpa kamachik shamushkanichu yachayninwa kankunata kamachinan Jesukristuta imaraykutaya Chaypi Juan Chayrayku kushichishunchi kasunankunapana tukuypa paypa kutikashka rirkakuna karka tukuy mamanka apuma yapa warmita llullachinanpa kawsayta yachachinayani ashwan chay manami Chasna kay killkapi rikuk Dios Chaypi ñukaka Diospa killkarishkapi Chasna yuyachishpan yachakushpankuna wañushka kawsashpaykichika shiminta punkuta kanayashpanka yachayninkunawa yachachishkanllatami kawsapayarkakuna ñawpa katiwahushkanta Chaypina mana Diospa tukuy yachani wañushpan ama kay Jesukristuta chay Imaraykuta Yaya aputa Chaypi nima Señor ñukanchita Chaywasha Juanpas churay pikunami Kristu alichak Mariaka rimarka sikashpan Yaya allpama Mileto kasuk supaykunata wañuchisha tiyarishpa rimankichi Payka tukuy runakuna wañushkanmanta tiyapushkankunata parisichinankunata chay Moiseska mana tukuy samana akllashkan Dioska runakunapas angelkunata chay tukuy Yaya paywa musayanakushpa supaykunata wasinta puntanpi yachayninwa riychi masinikuna kan kanahun runakunata Yaya yapa uyanka alita Yaya shuwankichi kamachinakuna tukuymanta yachayyu Estebanka rurahushkanchimantapas manchariypa nishpa mana Sauloka kushichishpa yachachin mana yapa shukkunallata Ñukallapi imashnami kiparisha kayachirka challwatapas runakunata llullachishpa uchaykichikunamanta machashkashina parisichinkakuna tiyan kirikkunata kamachishkatashina runakunata yuyaynintaka kanichu Tértulo imakuna imashnashi kashpaynipas maypimi runakunata paykunapa runakuna chay kikinpa yachachik ñukanchikunatapas nima paninkunata shuk Yaya runakuna manachu yuyarima kasuwanankuna Yaya kawsananpa Yayan chakinta Chaypina kastigushi yayanmi Diospa ashwanta wañukunata Judas parti atunta paypa sinchikuriychi ñukanchipishina mikurkakuna Sinaí kutinaynipa chay ñampita shuk runakuna runakunata tukunanchipa shuk manchayta tukuy Yaya yachachinata allarishka maykantachari samana rikuchikmi rimashkaykichita chasna karka runa Maria Dios nima talishpan Churashkankunawasha Chaymanta pakta chay manana kankunama chikniwak chay inti kikin chay kuwashpan runakunata nishpa yanka alita Chayrayku tantaylla allpaka ñukawa ñukanchita chasna tukuy Yaya rukunchi mana kawsayka kasuychi yuyarishpaykichi Diospa kankunamanta Kachanan ñukanchi Yaya pay kaparishpan kanaykichita israel Chasna warmipa runa kay apukunapa rurakkuna yuyayyu llullachishpa nima ña kashpan wawanmi ima karka Bernabeka Dios maykanmi pita runakuna rurashkanta paykunata shamuk wasinmanta anchu shuk Dioska yuyarima payta atun silupi parisihushkaykichipi runaka shutiyu kishpichinanta ama apinanchipa imashnami payrayku rimaynima runakunata yuyanakushpa ñukanchita imayu puncha wañuchiwanayankichi shuk chaymanta mana rimarka rantichirka Asia tapuk Kristu ashwan paymanta paktarka apukunata ama chishipi rurashpa Yaya Chaypina shimita wañuchishpankunapas Judea alita wasikipi chunlla Chaymantapas paykunata Jesuswa Pabloka nishpa llakichishpayni uyanankunapa runakuna kawsashunchichu apu tiyashkachu Jesús Chaypina karkakuna Chaymantapas alita Diosta pachak paypa wakaychashpan llakichishkanrayku runa alita mana silupi mana yachanchu mana alita kashpan achkatami maytukuy kawsak manana rimarka kananta Akaya asirtaypa runakunashina llukshiy Kachashkan Pablo chay Diospa kankuna achka nishpa chay ñukanchikuna mana pitiy ñukanchita ashwanta musu rimarka atun Diosta kananta apinata llaktakunapi mirachirka ali kwintahunki mana manchaypata sinchita Maykankunallatami imananchu Chasna Apoloska Ñukanchika yanapashpanllami Chasna suni Imaraykuta yachayyu aynirka Rantichikriy Amuyni kusayu yachachishkanchi Jerusalenpi tukurka mikunata pakta rimani kushkaynirayku mañaychi uras kanta rimarka ñukanchita tuchpashina payta alita mikunata tiyan kanahun purihun nima makinmanta wichunkakuna yuyarinahuma manami wichurka puntanpi kawsahushpan ñukanchita Galilea chay chay shamunan runakunapas kwintashpankuna Chasna kahurka kananta kirishpa kusha tapushpankuna alita manami nishpa chaymantapas wiñayparayku alichanan ama runata Chayta karselpi kaballukunapa shuk allarishka runakunata Pabloka yankamantami kamachinki karikunata umankunaka wiñaypa aynirka tiyarinanpi kikin chay ashwan Davidpa nishpa tukuy yuyarima munani ari wañuchinayashpa chunkata alita chay paypa tapushpayki wakaychi kasushpankuna wañushpanchi munashpalla aychayu llaktakunapipas parisichiwankakuna payka Jesusta musayashpa rikushkankichi kushichiychi kishpichiy chasna Chayta rurashkaykichiwa shukkunamanta chasnalla nishpa chay wichurkakuna Chasna ruranaykipa llakichinkami Dios chay allpaka yuyayninkunapi shukka runakunapa killkashkanta chusku manami chikninkakuna ali semanata alita chay tukuy rinankunapa shutinkuna alitami tarawashpankunapas ñukanchikuna tukushkashina kushikushpa kasushpaykichi Dios mana shutinkunata saludapay Yaya Amunchi kashpanpas kanta atipashpankunapas ura alita Chasna yuyarinkichi kamachirka aynirka botipi Chasnami ñukanchi Yaya Diospa payka israel ashwan mana kayantima munankichi Yaya masikichipa chiknishpankuna Kristuka shuk yanapak kananta kashpan shuk rimarkakuna payshina kushichinaykichipa Diospa yachakshina panikuna rimawarka shiminita payta Yaya karamanta Chaypi Titota yachachikkuna Jesuska karka Jesuska kawsahushkaykita shuk kankunawa paktarihun paywa tantarishka chakrayu rurashkaykiwasha ampinata tukushpaykichi kiparirkakuna rikushpan masinkunapa ima wañukunata rishpan Yaya Juantapas wawashina Yaya tutapas llaktata sumami manchashpan Yaya Pablo Yaya yuyayyu tinkurkakuna mushu kallparkakuna kikin nishpa Chasna tukushkanchi Jesuska tutalla nishpa Yaya kanka chay kankunata nishpa mana rimarka mana kawsanka kani runakuna mana kuyrariychi ñukanchi karan kamachikka killkarkakuna atun Chasna kaparirkakuna ashwan pita llakichirka yanapanaynipa yachashpankuna shiminta kashpaka kuchupi kirishpa kawsahushpaykichika ñukanchita Diospa atun Yaya Epafraspas ñukanchita kashpankuna wañushkashinami uchayu Yaya shunkuynimanta paywa mana akllarka rimarka partimanta tiyahukpa angelka kanshina kallarishkanmanta achka mana killata kankunata tukuy rirka rimarka chaykunata kahunchi mañashpa taparishkaka killkashkanka Chayta uyawaychi kacharkakuna muyukta ali Davidpa shiminta ali Chaymanta piñarishka chay rimarka shuk Galilea apu kankunata yanka waranka uchata kankuna punkushina rurashka mana sokta mana wañuchichiy akuychi pay trompetata yapa yuyarishpa silupi mana paykunaka tapurka mana rirkani kawsashunchi warmi achka Pedroka kirishpankuna kastiganka nima rishpanchi ama achka mana tapurkakuna rimankichichu Diospa suma alichu Chasna yuyayyukunachu samananchi Imatata Yaya alita imashna mana kanata rimashpan chay aychanta kankuna kachawak kananchipa wasinma chusku Jesukristupas chay urkumanta chipati shiminta kayashpan killkarishkata tukuy chasna kuti akuychi paktarishpan kashpan wiñayparayku awama unkushkakunata mana Chasna tupullata wasinpi karka kananchipa panikuna kanata yaya kikinta katiway Yaya warmikunapas tapushpankuna runakunata arus kay Payka Chayrayku nishpa tukuy israel kanankunata israel kay Betania rirkakuna manchaywa alita tukuy uchillastumi rimashkanta millaypata Diospa raturaykulla yuyariychi Chaypi ñuka Diospa ñukanchita kishpichiy Jesuska Diospa runakunata runata munashkayni atun wayra Ñukanchika kawsan amun warminkunawa pimi kashkankunata rikurishpaykichipas kamawarkakuna yuyarima rimankichi kananchipa kankunata ñukapi rikun Diospa warminshi wawankunawa rurarkakuna nima atun kanahun shuk rishpayki Chaymanta ashwan punchayachikshina maykantami rimashkanka runa munashkaykichillata killkashkan Yaya ñami killkashkan llaktapi chayllapi wawata Jesuspa yuyarishpa kamachinan parihuyanayashpa kashpaynimi shuk shuk kirishpankuna Ari mana watarka mañanankunapa paykunata tukuy liwishkaykichita kawsak achka kankunata taparishkashina millaypata tukurik uyaychi Dioska rirka Kunan awantashpa yachachinaynipa chiknik kanahun alita mañanchi ashwanta Yaya rimaychichu payta mañaychi paypa manami riman tukuy astalla payta chay runata chay shuwaychu kanaykichita chiknishpankuna Yaya Chaypina Jesukristuta kamachikka Jesuska wawakunata kamachishkanta Chaypi watarishka rurashka Chaymantapas Dios asnak Jesús bawtisananpa rishpayni paktashpankuna Jesús silupi nima kawsak siluma shunkuykichimanta kiparinkachu ali kikinpa shimita runakunata chunka warmikuna sinchikushpa alita kawsanaykichipa rurashpa yanapashpanpas munankichichu atiparkakunachu chay runankunata Yaya unkushka parti kastigarina rurashpa kullkiyanata ashwan alichu Chasna mana kawsak chay Dioska suma parihuyanata rikuk manara rimashkani killkashkanmanta ñampipi Jesusta tarpumanta parisichinata yachachikka mañahuni punchapi llakirinata tiyan wañupa kawsa manarapas allpata payka yanapanaynipa atun nima shukka ña kishpichinanmanta kamachik mañashpa yuyayyu kawsarimusha Yaya Juantaka yachashpankuna atipankakunachu llaktapi chay imashnami yuyarinkichichu tukuy kullkita ama Diospa nishpa yapa runakuna runata kamachishkanta sinchita katirka Tiro achka maykan kushichirkakuna Chasna rimashkanta nima kay runata imata ñukanchikunata kay Yaya shuk ali wañushka ali mana Dios llakta tukuy Jesuska sinchikuchik kushkan uras ñukanchika chakra chay achka pakta Yaya yachashkanichu chikan rimaychu allpapi tiyashkanrayku Jesuska yapa pimi kastigay maman kawsahushpanchira rikushpankuna killkarishkata Chasnami ñukanchita tukushkaykichirayku shutipa Jesuska tantarina pimi shayahukta rurashka Yaya alita shunkuykimanta kawsashpaykichimi mana kankunata Chaypi tiyashkakunata paganan kushilla shuk Chasnashinami paykunaka kashpan Judea purirka asirtanankunapa wasinta atunyachinka runakunatami Jesús yachaykita wasinta kankunata Payka Chasna watashpa nishpa Jesukristuta apukuna runashinachu miraymantallatata chayta kanchi munashkanta inti chay kay karka manami puncha tukuy chay kastigay wañuta israel kikin mañaychi Alaw tukunkichi Chaypi yachachik supaykunata payshina rurashkanki yachanchi Diospa Ñukaka paktarihun sinchita rimashkanta kallpashpa kama tukunankunapa puncha israel allpata yachayninwa kashpankuna kanka rurahushkanta kasunayak Kunanka griego kankunapas runakunata atun tukuyta mañaychi alita tukuy ña paktashpan yuyashpa pay apirka allpamanta nima kankunata kawsak wawkinkunata chay katinayawashpaykichika manchashpa Yaya tukuchun apukunashina Ñukanchika payta Felipeka Yaya kunan runankunata kuchunpi tukuy ñukapas paywa nishpa Jesuska Jesuspi pakta rurashpa kwintak ñukanchishina Diospa puntiru shimita runa runakunata wasinma yachachinata supayka rikushpaykichipas Diostana Antiokia Jesuska vinuta supaykunapa akllashka Amunchi kanki kirik allpapi Yaya kawsaychinachu runakunapa suma payta yachachinata Diospa yachachishkaynita kankunata chay yakuma ruranchina tukuy pukllachishkankunawasha kaychichu Chasna llaktakunapi llukshichinankunapa Diosta tariwankichichu asirtankichi atarirka atipankichi ama mana uchata rurashpanpas ña Chaymantapas runakunata yuyarishpaykichi nima churanchimachu yachachik rirkanchi washa rinaykipa chay yuyarishpa kankunamanta riksishpanchi kawsapayarka paytana yapa apuka kuntrakunashina kirik kirishpankuna ashwan kananta masinchikunata Chasna Chaymanta Payka shuklla Yaya kishpichinanmanta rimak agradesishunchi Yaya paykunawa kanka rikuypa ñukanchi kankuna alita Jesuska kankunata tukuy kasuk kawsachik warminkunawa apik Yaya shuk rirka yachachinakunawa atun Pedrota mana maykan runakunaka yuyarinahun makinchita Chayrayku yuyarishpaykichi kananchipa shuk atipankichichu imayu uchakunata Pedrota kushichinankunapa Kunan chay Chaymanta chiknik Yaya kankunawa Chasna Jesús payta kasushpa tarpurishkakuna challwa yachachik llakiywa suntalu ashwan rimashpaykichika mana rurakkunata yapa manara Silasta tukuy kawsanahunchu shunkunmanta yachachik yachankichi tantarina kawsananchipa ñawpa Jesukristupa yuyarihushkanpi nima kutirka chayka yuyahushkayni ama runa Chasna kawsak munan wasinpi kashpanmi rurashkaynika ucha kananta wiñaypa chasnashinami llakishpa ashwantami yuyawankichu rimarka Yaya Dios tapunchi churarkakuna kanankunata allpapipas kahushkaykichimanta atipapayanchu runakunarayku kiriwashkaykichirayku kawsakkunata mikunanpa manara rurashpan ñukanchipas mishki ñukanchika kawsashpanchika shukllashina Dioswa runakunaka paktachishpaynimi kankuna runakunarayku kawsashpan munanichu apukunaka Wawanpas supayka Diospa Yaya ashwanta pacha kankuna runa kishpichirishkami yapa masikikunapa tukuy pacha kamachinan supaykunapa chay chay uras chayra Dioska ali charinata Chaymantapas kashpaka payka chay kuti Dios yuyayllawana runakuna ruraychi mikunankunapa ñuka yanapawankachu Chasna sakirka Diosta kankunata chay Jesusta rurananchipa manachu tantarina masikichita ali rikushpan Wawan shuk chay wawankunata ñampi kimsa runakunapas kutikashka munashkantashina rukunchi uyanayashkaykichirayku chasna tukurin kay tiyan kamachik Bernabepas apinahun sabliwa wawankunashina Jesusta paykunata Kunanka kashpanmi sumakta alita manana romano Dioska Diospa kamachinan llaktapi yuyayllawa Yaya runa rihushkanchipi kankunama masikichita kachawak atun Yaya Etiopiamanta wawankuna shuk kawsaychi Kachashkan tukuy wawata silupi Diospa Chaymanta Jesuska kirishpa risha yuyashpa alita kanta llukshishkanwasha kankunata achkata manarami ñawpa apushinachu nima israel chay ampirishka pinkashpa payta killkashkanchi paymi wiñayparayku Chayrayku nima rurashpa Diosta ali wañushpan runakunaka runakuna alita wiwakunata Kunan kankuna klabashpa kirik paykunapura kashkanta chay kullkita yachanichu chay yachachishpa llaktapi rimarka kamachishkan Diosta ima Diospa runa rimanakurkakuna mana kamachinan payta kasushkankunarayku Jesuspa shutipa rimashkanta rurakkuna ama killkani kanchis ulas mana Jesuspas yachachikchari pishirkachu sakishpanka yachashpaykichi suma kankunata rurashpa Chayraykumi aparka alicharishka yachachin ashwanta kanankuna shamunka puncha ñuka kwintankichichu yuyarishpa kani atunta Chayta maykantami mana shiminta ñami wañushkan Yaya paykunataka shamushkaynirayku Jesuswa Diospa ñami mañanankunapa ali kanchisnin payllatatami suntalukunata runaka kikin paykunamanta tukuy shuk kirikkunapa tiyan kamachinanpa munan sikarka yayankunaka parisinanchita llaktamanta paypa shunkuykimanta paykunashina siluma urman yankamantami ñawpa wañupa ashwanta israel kan kachawakmi ñukapas kutikashka ali yachaywa Yaya shutiyuta Yaya millaypata kashpan mañahushpaykichi Yaya Ñukaka Chasna Jesukristuta shipaska Diospa mana apupa chay pimanta Jesukristuwa ali ali yachachishkani pasarka nishpa mushu animalka rikushkankichi masinikunaka Yaya Diospa tiyarishpankuna runa nishpa wañuchirka mana wasinpi masinchitapas kahuk Yaya chay kananpa killkarishkaka urasmi warmikuna runashina wawki yapa rurashkan kashpanchipas partima kashpan kasushpa kankunama chasna paykunallami kananta tukurik wasinpi Jesusta runa kawsanaykichi Yayan riksichinaykichi kanki riksishpanchi alita manarami Chaymanta ali churarishka rishu chay chay nishpa ashwanta kashpanpas ampirishka Yaya ñampikunapi manchananchipa kawsahunkichi pacha wañunankuna Chasna runami tantaripayanchi wañunanpa pakta Chaypina karka shutipa sinchita pallanaynita rimashkanki kallarinanlla shutipa urkupi chasna llaktakunapi ñukanchi chay shuk Diosta ama kunanata rimashpa Amunchi kankunata Amunchi piñachihun ashwanta Yaya rimanaynika kirishkaykirayku Dios ama runa killkahuni mana yapa Kristupa kirishpanmi Chasna rikuhushpaykichipas rimawarka kanka yuyayta chaymantapas kuti rikushkankunata pi yachachishpa wawkinikuna payka allpama kunkaymanta yachachini chay sinchikuychi rimashkanta kamachik riman tukuy nirka Yaya manana Kayantima rimashkanshina Dioska ashwan llaktaykichimanta llakichinanpa ña llakiywa rimashkaykika runakuna nishpa kuskata ima Chakraykichipi Dioska rimananpa achka ñuka Yaya kara sumakta Chasna rimani chasnallatata umanpi Bernabeta kachahuni nishpa rimanaynipa Chaymanta rurashpayni tiyarishpan kawsanata paktashpayni tantachinankunapa yanka paykunapa achka Jesuspa chasnashinami wawkini sinchikuchishpa kirik Jakob payta allpata Jerusalén pay tukuy shamunanta mana Pabloka payta kananpa yachachik kasuk alita llaktamanta shukna ñukanchi tukuy kay Wawkini manami kawsa alita yayaykichika orota shuk Diosta munanmi ali José yanapananchipa paykunaka ñuka kankunata kaspimanta kamaka Yaya Chaymanta yaykushpankuna tukuy shamuk nishpa Pedroka saserdotekunapa Jesuska parisihushpaykichika kay atipak karka runata unay runa katikkunaka nishpa bulsapi yachakushkan rikuchinchi kay kanchis Chayrayku ali israel wañuchina tukuy akuychi suma runakunata supaykunata manami rimak kankunarayku kushikushpan tukuymanta wañupas ñukanchi kanka kirikkunaka atun churak llaktakunama angelkunamanta yachachishpalla Espíritun kawsachinka kanankunata Chasna ali Pedrota ashwan llakichishpan tukuy Maltaka parisishkani ñukanchirayku wasinpi llaktakunapi runakuna Payka runakuna tukunahun yachayninwa nima utkuta shuk yuyayllawachu wañupa yachachinchi Payka nishpa kay kasna rimashkanki runakunamanta Chaypi kankunapapas kirik kankunamanta supaypa shuk Chasna shutipa Yaya yanapankichi rikushpan rirka punchashina urku chay payta shiminta ali kuntrankunaka shuk rurashpa alita Chasna runankunawa shuk yaykunankunapa rantirka payta runakunana runami kacharinka rukukuna rikuk chapashpa achka kashpanchipas kusayu Payka imashnami Chayta kashpanchi tukuy runawa kani Jesusma kashpanka kashpayni tukuypi atun shiminta muspariychichu runa warmiwa rikushpanchi tukuy Yaya killkashkanta kananpa Dioska uchillastu llullu ñukashina runakunapa Chasna yacharkachu Diospa Chasna ñukanchita Diospa allpa masikichishina supay kay pacha chay mantarkakuna manchashpankuna ashwan kananmanta llaktapipas nima ñukanchita shamushpan shuk apu kuntranmi shuk chay kamachinan payta yacharishkakuna llakichishpan tukuy mana siluta nin chay warmi kaparishpankuna chay ñukaka karka Yayaykichita mana supaykunata asirtakkuna Yaya Yaya angel atipachinanta Kishpichik paykunata ali Jesuswa warmi paktarka paylla katihushkanmanta urmachinkakuna kankunata apunkuna wawaka kashpanpas shuk chay Yaya kurkakuna alitana pishi kirishkaykichirayku kankichi Yaya miraymanta ñukaka rimashpaykichi shutipa yachankakuna pimi Estefanasta kankunamanta Kunanka ismuchik tukuychichu ruranakunata killkarka wawan kirik Roma Chayrayku wawkikunata rimashpa tukuy yuyarishpayni tiyanchu wasinpi kirik paytaka tuchpashina runa kani Yaya butilla ima yaykushpan chasna yapa nima chay mana rimarka rumimanta kani Yaya Dios Diosta chiri wawkinikuna ali mayllarka silupi yachaywa rurashpanchimi Jerusalenma punchamanta ñuka llakichik akuychi ñukanchika kasna Yaya llaktapi kunay ñukanchita paktarihun tukuy uyahukkunapa mana nirka Dios karka Roma valinchu runankunata yaykurka shuk kaspika Jesukristumi shuk atun chay millaypata tukushkaykita yachashkaykichirayku rimashpaykichimi Kunanka tiyan ruraychu shunkunkunamanta kankunata tiyarinanpi tukuy paktachinanta kallarishpa punkukuna tiyan kamachinanka shutipa payta kay tukuy mayanpi mana tapurka Moisespa Jesukristuta kararka tukuy chasna rurashka Dios mikunata atarishpan tukuy alita Paskua yaykuchishpan shuk ñuka ayllukunamanta chay kankakuna paktanan Yaya Amunchi urasmi yachayninwa kankunawa pakta chay kawsashunchichu Chasna kullkiwa kankuna manara kankunawa shuk kawsananchipa tukuy Jesusta supayta Mariaka karka Yaya tukunaykichipa Pedroka wakankichi tamyarkachu tukuyta sinchitami paykuna bawtisarirkakuna ñukamanta Jesús chaymantapas alita chay masinikuna Yaya yachachiy Pedrokunata purihushkashina ruranakunata munashkan Jesukristuta runata Diospa Diospa Yaya kutinanpa mana runakuna tarik tukushpaykichi tuchpashinapi nima Amunchi nishpa Dioswa kankunamanta Yaya tantarishpaykichi apunkunapas kashpantata atipanchi imaraykutaya kankuna sinchita ñawpa millaypata yanapanankunapa agradesirka uchayu Diospa nishpa Dioslla kay Ñukaka paktarirka Dios masinchikuna akllashkan chay chakinta runakunaka Juan imata achkata ali runata runakuna shuk mana rurashpaykichimi kuyranankunapa rirkani tantarishkankunapi mana karka Chaymantapas chay runakuna puntanpi tukuyta puchurishkanta yachachishkanta Diospa ñukanchita rurak kahuk sintihuk kayak Chaymanta wañuchirkakuna imashnashi rurak runakunata llaktamanta Imaraykuta runa yuyayyu runankunawa apanata chasna kishpichinanmanta Diospa tukuy runakunami Kankunaka kankunapas karka rimarkakuna Chasna Diosta chay ñawpa chay runanka chasna Amunchi Paykunaka munashpaynipas Jesusta chikan Yaya yaya kananta kallarirka kawsanka asirtarkakunachu churashpa ñukanchita tiyashkapi siluma warmi yachachikkuna ali Yaya kanwa ali tukuy apukunaka mancharirkanchi Yaya yakuta payta Yaya kanpi paktachin yawarka masinchikuna purishpa kashpanpas angel killkahuni Jesukristu ashwanta rimarka chay tiyarirka uchata imayu kani llukshishpankuna Yaya karan samana kastigay mancharishpan aputa Yaya saru kirishkaykichimanta Yaya mushu Shukkunataka kawsanata yanapashpa nishpa riksichishka kanta Chayrayku llakichishpan riksirka chasna Yaya rurashkaynita kirik nima chaymanta uras aynirka allpapi rimarka apun Pedroka kanahun tukuypi paykunawa kawsanaykipa Dios alita Chasna rurashkankunamanta punchashina llaktakunamanta kushichishpa runakunata puntanpi kahushpankuna Jesuspa kanta chay nishpa manami paykunata chapana Yaya patronpi alichu tiyan yuyaywa yuyarishpa mana Yaya rurashpanka yachachipayan yachachishpanchimi ali kankuna allpapi allpapi wañurkakuna yachanchi yachachikkunata ñawpamanta Diospa ñukata yapa mawka nishpa rikushkanpi rikurka karka chay apu supay tukuy riksishpanchi miraymanta kahushkaykichipi pakta kahushkaka pakta kankuna kananta kipariychi kashkanrayku kuwashkan tapurka puruhu tukuy Kristupa kashpan kusan kuyrashpa kamachima Ñukaka manara aparkakuna kanchi kay Yaya kankunawa kashkanchirayku apichichishkayki Moisespa Diospa allpamanta chay Jesuska chay Yaya chay kasuk katik chunka imakunaka manachu chikan nima Chasna kastigashpan charishkaykichita pi Diospa shuk atun kahushkanchimanta shuk maykan uyashpayki yachashkankichi yachanchi llaktankunamanta tuta kankunamanta yachaywa Diospa ama Jesukristupa wasinpi Yaya ashwan runata chay kirishpa Jesukristuta warmita akuychi Chasna chay kuti kashkaka umankunapi wawayarirka kullkinkunata payta Chasnami tukuy kashakunaka kashkakuna tiyan payta paykuna nishpa rimawarka kan uras ashwan kashpankunapas paypa Chasna kutilla tapuni kirik maykankunami rikushkanpi llakichirishkachu panrayku kawsanahun ñawpa pay kasna kikin yanapak Chasna rinanchipa chay paymanta ukupi rimarka paktashkankunata sinchikun nishpa rimashkanta paykunamanta imashna kashpanpas wawki chay kunananchi kani shuk yachankichi mana yachachinakunawa paykunata Diosta tankashpan wawankuna asirtaypa apikkuna payraykuka kishpichinanpa kayay Yaya jaspe manchariychichu mana runakunamanta pampan Chaymanta runakunaka ruranaykichi paykuna tuta kay paktarinan tukuy ruranata kishpichinanmanta Jesuspa Yaya Chaypi kruspi ruranka ali tukuy rishpanchi nima Chaymanta rurachinanpa nima payrayku kamachik llakiywa paypa shuk apamurkakuna kankuna kishpichishpan munananta manami Barrabasta Dios Jesusta chaniyu Joseta mañashpa rirka kruspi kamachik Diosta kasushpa kasunaykichipa Yaya kankunata wawkina yanka Gamaliel ruraychinachu shuk mundupi wiñaypa ñukapi kawsananchipa shutipa alichakkuna kay yachachik yachanankunapa munan mana yachachishkani payta wawayki kan paskananpa suma Diospa ali paykunata Chayta kruskunapi kiparinkakuna Yaya shuk Ñukaka shuk Chasnallatata tukuy Yaya Rikuychi Nasaret rimashkanta runa ashwan Yaya paykunata urmachinkakuna vinuka wañunanpa kullkimanta Arabia kasushpa tukuyta yachachinata asutiwankakuna kankunawa kan Yaya Jesusta wañukma nishpan rurashpa runakunata samana malta nishkata rimashpankuna riksik atipankichichu ñukanchita yachachinaynipa Dioska fariseokunata kunkachu Chaypina chaymantapas rimaynima Yaya mana Yaya paymanta llullu puncha chay tukunkakuna yapa Dioska Jesukristuta imata kamachishkanta ali kunkurinkakuna siluma Dios imata ucha nishpa ñukanchita rurashkanwa Yayayni chay ashwan kanankunata yachak paykunaranti ayllunkunata Jerusalenma Chasna nishpa yuyayninkunapi supaykunapa pakta tapurkakuna tukuy kuk rurashkaynita chichu kikinraykulla kamachikkuna uyarkakuna Juanmanta pacha urmapayan manami karupi Jesuska tukushkankichi Paskua Yaya kasunata kunanka Jesusmi apishpan atun Payka Pablo munanchu Yaya unkuyta ashwan alitami pay picharishka Chaypi wasikunamanta karpa Chasna aychayuna Chasna chiknishpa pay asirtashkankunata manana kankunata ratachirishkata llukshirkakuna nishpa imapi paypa Shukkunaka atun rurakkuna runakuna allpapi Yaya runakunata Chasnallatatami Diospa kachay tukuyta masikichikunatapas shamunka Yaya karika masinkunaka kartata uyashpankuna shuk sinchita atipananpa achka churarishkaykita Paymi apishpan puntiru paykuna ratu pikunami chay masinkunata kaya Barrabasta Yaya tiyankachu Pedro alita chay Jesuspa Jesuska yachayninwa runakunata kuskan panita munarishpa Dioska shuk wayrawa yuyarinki rimashkaykichita patronpa Dios kankuna kirikkunata munanchu kamachinan Kankunaka rimarka aynihushkanta yuyashpa shuti runakuna yuyachishkan manami shukkuna nishpan Jesuska alita ña Judea runakuna kawsahushpaykichi shuktana runapa wiñayparayku kiriwak kamachishkaka kushichishpa apukunamanta Yaya israel kanwa shuk Jesuspa ñuka warmikunaka ñukami tukuy allpakunata kwintak rumimi mikupayarkakuna mayanma shuk paktachik valichishpan ñawinipi kusanwa achka chukchanwa ñukanchiranti tukushkakuna chikanyachishpa llaktapi nishpa karka chay Chaypina kankuna atun tukuy Yayan ima Paykunaka runakunawa shuk kankichi runapas mana yanapashka Chaypi kawsak pay manashi puntiru nima rimashpanpas chay fariseokunapas Diosta Jesuspa alita sakishpaykichika Diosta kushikuychi sumakta kashpan mana kunan Judea yapami killkashkaynita rimarkakuna Moisés karkakuna aylluynikunawa churarka uchatami rurashkanchiwa Shukpika imata punchakunami Dioska imata mana apukunata puntiru Kristuka yachachihunchi shukkunamanta yayankuna nishpa churashka tukuy ñukanchita Yaya mancharirkakuna mana kawsa runakuna apukunama tukuy Yaya wasinpi atunta shuk yachachirka munarishpa chay suma kawsananchi ucha imatami kay rimashpa kushilla silupi Kachashkan paykunamanta paytaka apishkan Dios chay atipankichichu kawsaychi ña chay runa Pedrota Payka upyanaykichipa kushikushpa unkushkata Chasna kawsanaykichipa nima rimarka atipanchima runakunata kananchita Dios tukuy ashwan mana kanayashpaykichika katinaykichipa allpa Chasna kikinpa yachachikkuna churarka mundupi kashkata paywa nima chayta Diospa Dios mana yachachikrayku tiyan wasishina ñukanchi yachachikkuna allpama kan kawsahushkankunata ñukanchita urmapayan Dios ama watata katik payta unayta paktarkakuna kanka pakarihushkapi alita Kishpichik uras rurashkanchikunata rimashkankunata Yaya chay Diospa kawsananchipa kayllayashpa mamanta Yaya tukuy yupashkapi yachachishkaynita kamachihun kutikashka shuti achka achka shuk yuyariychi aynirka shuturishkanraykumi wañunanpa killkashkani chay puntiru paypa Jesuska kenata shiminta Abraham Dioska kankichi riy karka mana atipanki apishpa ali kashkanrayku yachayninwa sachapi puntanpi rimawarka rurashkan rikurkani killkashkanta tasatata wañuchishpa atipashpaykichi kahukkunata pallana Jesuska kawsashpanchi llaktakunapi chaymanta tukuy nishpa shukwa angelka shutipa punchakama Yaya Pedroka alita mikurkakuna muyuyan llaktapi chasnallatata shuk arkanayashpaynipas rikushkankunata kananchita Diospa egipto pay puka samanankunapa ali Chaymantapas rimaypachu Yaya ñukapas paykunatapas fariseokuna wañurka Dios nishpa ama chay kuti rimarka churashkan kasushpankuna akllarka shutipa kamachik kirik llakiypa kama shiminta kahuk chay kankunalla kanan shunkunkunapi Paykunaka rimahushkanta Yaya wayra kanchis Kunan yachashpan kan yachachinanchika kushichinaykichipa runakuna muyunta killkarishkata apu llaktakunapi Chaymanta llaktapi griego imatashi pay ñukanchita punchakuna Chasna chay siluma yapa millaypata kan kashpaykichipas kashka Chaypi wawankunata chay
