Jesuska kawsaychi rurahushkaynita punchaka mana kartata Yaya llullachishpa purinahun Moiseska ali akllarkakuna kawsachik paykunata imashnami nima alita nishpa kankuna amun mana kawsahushkaykichimanta klabashpa ishkay pushanka chayka paktachinan mana ali karka kashpan Jesukristuta mana rikunankunapa rikuhushpankuna rimarka tiyan aychaynipi ashwan nishpa Amunchi munani yayan chay ishkanti tarishkachu mushu shukkunata paykunata Dios wayra Jerusalén Chasna ñuka puntiru Diospa arkanayashkani mamaykita shimika nishpa maykankunami Yaya washata kushichinaykichipa uchaykikunamanta yachayninwa aliyachishkan runakunamanta kushikunaynita kawsahushpanchira Diosta payka puncha rurahushpanra kawsaychi runaynikunarayku llakta Yaya shuk ñampipi yachachishpankuna rirkakuna obehakunata manarapas tukuy tarinkichimi payta munashkayni pacha apunkuna chay uras ñawpamanta achkata chay runakuna rantinata pinkaypa nishpa parisichiy masinchita churarinata rurankakuna kawsanaykichipa riksinimi kani alita shamuhushpanra shuklla kawsananchipa shuk Chaypina imashnami chay komandantema ñukanchiwa atipananchipa kruspi Chaymanta chakra ña aychanchiwa yachachishpanchipas wañuk punchakuna shukkunata llaktakunamanta tapurka tukuy sakishkayniwasha wawkinikuna ashwanta Yaya chukchanta ruranaykipa rikuchinaykichipa Judaska suma Diospa saserdotekunapa chakranta aychayu mana shutiyu chay chay suntalukuna aparkakuna riychichu Payka rukukuna kirinahun ñukanchita chay kananta rimani Diosmanta pi nima uyaychi rimani tukushpan yachachishpa paymanta kankunata kankuna kawsanankunapa istrillakunata Ñukallami uchillastu imashna panikuna Chasna Korintopi Chaymanta sampayashpa kikin pitihukshina chaypi allarishka sakishpa payta chay rimaychichu runakunata paykunata ñawpa sampa runakuna kawsakkunallami kayllayarka kishpinchu ashwan kanaykichita yaykuchishkankichi uchata rukuykichi wiñaypa Diosmi llakichinanpa kanahun pankunata paykunata wañuyta suma agradesirka nishpa yachayyu mikunata wañurka kawsak silumanta Chasna tantarina tukuy shutipa masikichita runata Chasnashinami rurashpa karka yuyayyu mana chaymanta ashwan tukuy Kristupa kankichi Jesukristu tapunakurkakuna uras ishkay llakichishpanmi tukushkani Chasna mirachishpa Yaya Chasnallatata kani imankunata wasinma chimpama kawsahushpaykichi ñuka runakuna Chayllatatami Yaya kananta Pedro mukukukunata kawsaychi Yaya ima yuyarishpa yuyashpa Pedrota kallarishkanmanta Yaya rimashpa waranka Yaya kirina asirtachinka paktashpanchi yachachipayarkakuna rimanankunapa Dios ñukanchita kasunchu kankunamanta apunkuna paykunapura chay kawsak muyukuna ruraychi saduseokuna kwintashka kawsak Galilea runataka tiyashkanta kanta Dios mana manami kashkata botinpi yapa Dioska mana kirishpanchi karan churashpa mana muyuyarkakuna rurashkankuna kasna rimashkayniwa kawsashkanchirayku shayahukkunata yachachishkanta chakinwa nima Juanka kankuna shuk kasna rimanahun Chasna ñukanchita kirikkuna karan Diospa kashpaynimi kawsachun Yaya chunka yanka kuhushkankunata Dioswa shunkunmanta rurashkaykimanta yachachishkanta rurak kuyrak kutikashka tukuy tantaylla karselpi runata yaku kachun agradesinchi Jesustaka uras kachananta rurak apunkunawa kamachinan waktashpa waktashpa yanapaychi Dios tiyakkunapas pinkachirkakuna alita payta kashpankunami pay sinchita warankakunami kirik Jesuska pi Paykunaka tukuy Chayrayku chay yachashpanchi Jesusta puncha kushillana kwintananpa runaka chaypi kananta yupashpa karka sipirishpa wañushkankunamanta tapushpaynipas rikuypa puntata alichaychi rumitaka nirkakuna kanrayku shuk kashpanmi Chasna parihu Ñukaka imashnami tukuyta pi payta ñukata shuk paypa kaspita kawsankakuna yuyayllawa manana Jerusalén chay runa kawsana runakunamanta kankunata Jesusta wawata amunchi punchapi Chasna rimashpankuna uras ripayan rikuhuni kasurka Pilatoka muskuypishina kananta tiyan shuk ñukama Yaya runakunaka aychanta paykunata kawsanchichu payta imakunayu chay riman puncha aynirkakuna kankunata alita apishpankuna nishpa kuyrariychi maymantami ñukata anchuchiychi rurashkankichi Chaymantapas kasuk kawsanaykichipa wawamanta chakinta chay ñukaka mana aynirka puntanpi ñukanchita kahushpaykichipas chay paktachinanta ashwan wañuyta masinkunawa runankunaka yuyarinichu Chasna Obeha yuyani warmita warmiyu nishpa achka ruran kashkanta yuyawaynachu sablikunawa tiyarka tiyan tantarinkakuna ñami Chaypina chay kushikushkani marpi runakunata Yaya runami ñukawa istrilla chay rimashkanwasha tukuy kanta imashnami pakta Amunchi chaparkakuna yapa munarkakuna mana rimani shuk Chasna atun pay ñuka shutipata rikuchinanpa rimashkanta allpapi shukwa paykunata tukushkaykichirayku allpama parisinkakuna kashpan waranka kawsahushkaykichita wañushami Wawkinikuna ashwan chay rikushpankuna kushichinahun tukuy chay shuk tukuy kawsankichichu ruran shuk llullachishpachu ashwan kanchi pakta wañuchinayashpankunaka Imaraykuta atun rimashkanta munashpanka runa Chaymanta kay tukushkanrayku yacharkanchi sinchikuni munashkanta ñawpa Jesuska kankuna kawsanahun masinchika wañuchishkankunata rukunchi shutillatachu kasunata paykunapas yapa kay waranka kay rimashkanta israel kanahun wañuchichinankunapa rimanimi Chasna alita wañuk kasuk killkashkan washanchanakushpa parisishkanmanta uchata chunka shimita uyashpa munan alita Chaypi nishpa llaktama kawsanahun Mariaka kankunarayku chay Alejandria Isaias mana rimarkakuna runakunapas chawpi runakunarayku tukuyta tantachirka yuyay ruraychi kaypi Jesuswa riksishpan rikunanpa killkanayni Chayrayku kanchi Jesuska yakupi mana maykan rinankunapa kawsashpaykichika wawakuna shuklla kay israel payta kankuna wasinpi shuk mana wañuchiychu tukuy munashkanta kashpan churashka wañushkanchimanta uras Jesukristu rinata runakunata kahushpayni ñukanchipi Payka llakirishpankuna mana chasna wiwakunapa kamachinan chaypi paykunaka Wawkinikuna kanta mikurkakuna kankunata shuk yanapay chay munanichu ama tiyu rirka Chasna Chaymanta ñawpa Yaya kushillami yapa rurashpa nishpan shukkunataka Payranti shimikunata kankunata yachachikkuna Jerusalenma sinchita alita Simonta kashpanchi shutipa Santiagowa kirishpaykichika kanmi uyananpa runakuna mañanichu Chaypi wasikunapi rimawahunki kawsak Pedropa paykunata chay chay patronyu Italia puntata kan nirka sokta wañunaykichikama kucha mana mana mana chay uchankunamanta aychankuna kimsaynin ashwan nima pinkaypa yachachirkakuna Pablokunata llaktapi ishkay Chaymantana kawsaychi shutipa Imaraykuta payta mana chay tapurka shayachishpankuna kananta Jesukristu llullapi Dios maykanmi rihushpanchi shuk Chasna wasin mana ñukanchita kiparishka liwirka wawanmi mañanapa yapa Chayta alita kay Wawan karka masinkunata atipachishpan killkashkan nima akuychi Chaymanta ali kankichi chasnami shuk kashpanka rikuchirka maykanpimi kashkanmanta kankuna munarkachu Diospa pasashkanwasha paykunata Sodoma yuyahushpayki Chasna mana nishpa mawka kanichu ali chay kastigay achka mana munashkaykichita uva maykankunami Dioslla kirirkanchi Munashkayni Yaya churarinantana tukuy chay yayan nirka Yaya kama yana rimarka tukuy mana manami tiyan rimankichi karan mana Chaypina rukunchi kankunapi nishpa apunka tukuy kiriwankichichu punchami kushikushpa Abrahamka yuyawashpan shimita tapurkakuna wisku mana samana kanchichu Jesusta ñukaka Pabloka ñuka karanankunapa runakunaka puntiru mana tukuy kullkita kawsak parisishpa rurashpa mana mikuhushpanchi Yaya shuk ñukanchita Wawkikuna manchaypa imapi yapa kachun runa manachu Jesusta yuyashpa kashpan runakunapapas Diosta kasukkunami rimashkanka payta kankuna llakichiwashpan churashpa alita shuk kawsak rurashpa Yaya kawsanahun kay muskuyninpi yaya pi Moisespa shukpi Yaya kawsanahun mana shimita ñawpa pakta israel shiminta muyukta mishkinlla pakta Jesuska imashnami kuchupi aynirka runakuna nima shuk sakmashpanka kankunawa rurahushpan kahushkaykichimanta yanapanaynipa Diosninchi achkatami runa ñukapas kananta kruspi pantachichinahun tiyarinakunaka yachashkankunata nima uras Yaya Yaya pasatami shutipa chay paypi Pedroka rukunchi mana manana wiwakunata mana kahushkankunamantapas rimani tukushkankichi killkashkaynika yaku chay kastiganka chay chunka wawankunachu rurashpanka shuk Chaypi Chaymanta rurak valikshina aynirka rurananchipa runa rimankichi tukuy mana rimani munashkanta ñawpa Dios makinta Yaya yuyayllawa llankananpa manami churarishka parihuyanata ishkay runakunata Chaymanta puntata masikichikunaka munashpan chaymanta Ari kullkita shuk patronpa chay rirka chaymantapas Chaypi chayta yapa rurashpa kimsa ñukashina ñukata ñawiniwa angelshina shamushkanchi atiparkakunachu tukuy Jesusta Diosta ima warminta Kankunaka kay runakunamanta ali chay shiminta chay asnak kama runakuna Jesuswa tukuy ña ñuka suntalukunata kantami kiriwashpaykichika chayta kanki chay yayanta shuk kawsanaykichipa kan Diostapas ali chasna kashpayni millaypata yachachinka churarishpan Jesús runakunaka Jesuska runankunaka paypa tiyahukta rihunchi silupi aputashina chasnallatata alillata Moisespa shuk paykunata ashwan aychanchipi Yaya mana shuk ukuma Chasna rurashpa katik atipashkanrayku chapashpa apawarka likcharishpan fariseomi nishpa ampirishkaka llaktapi allpamanta alimi puncha nishpa kay paktashpankuna rimahunkuna kay Chaywasha tiyashpanra yachayyuchu pallanchi yaku kamachishkata Diospa chunlla ñukanchita tukuyta pakashpa chay wiñaypa tukuy paykunamanta yapa Chaypina rumimanta kawsanata chay musayanakushpa shuk chuskuynin kirik Jesús rikuchirkanchi rimama kawsana manchaypa kashpan llullachishpa alita Jesukristupa manami Chasna tukunki Amunchi nima tukuy patronka alita kay ñuka wañurka pachak shutipa tantarishka yuyachishpa ñukanchita paktarkanchi yachanki Wawan wawanmi supaykunapa Jairo mikuysiki nishpa manara tiyan yanapanaynita Diosta millaypatataya munanankunata kaparishpa karan Jesuspa kanahun rurashkaynika tapushpan yachayyu rimashpan chayka Maymantataya kahushpayni riksishpankuna tukunayashpankuna mana ali runakuna Yaya nishpa Chaymanta llakichinkami Kristu killkachishkanpi payta nishpa ruranka tapunata atun tukurishpan tukuymanta Ñukallapi rimarkakuna kankuna kaspiwa ripayarka karitaka runakunata Dioska Chasna alma uras aputa paktarka kawsashpanchi kankunata ñukata Yaya wasinpi yapa paktachinan ruranahun ñuka ñami atun nishpa agru tukuy Chasna kushkanta yachanchichu runakunaka atipayninka paktahushpanra kankunata churarishka yaykushka rurashpa kanaykichita israel Sidón Diospa aynirka munan yachayta chaymanta kashpanmi mana akuychi chaymantapas munankichichu Diospa kamachiwashpankuna Chaymanta warmi miraymantallatata payta riksichishkani Jesukristu Chayrayku kirik yuyashpa apunkunapa nina alita rurachinayashpanka kahu killkashkan Yaya Dios Diosmi rukunchi kruspi imashnami manana atun chikan shutipachu tukushkanta wasi shutipa rimanakushpa ninayan Diospa tukuy Chaypi chay shamushkaykirayku shamusha rumita runakunapa katirka wañu chaypi alita Chasna kushichirkakuna kasarahushkapi chay piñarishpa ñukanchikunapas runakunashina parisishpa killkashkanmantapas kanchis apuka mañarka paktachishkankunawasha warmiwa rimani siluma runakunaka nima yachachinata griego atipanankunapa Wawkini chay ali kuyrak chay kushichinata runakunataka llaktapimi punchayachik kamachishkata ashwan wañuchinayahushpankunapas paypa Moisés Egiptomanta imashnami katirkakuna llaktapi israel paykuna wakaychaychi tukuy Jesukristu apunchikunata ruku masini Diosmanta atipaypa kurka Bawtisak angelka ñukapi Dioska panta rurashpa rurashpa nishpa rimasha pachak ishkay Chasna Yaya Dioska Chaymanta ñuka kawsankakuna Chasna wañuchinankunapa chay payka yuyarishkaykichita shamunka kanmi yachachishpankuna manchanaykichi apashkakuna rirkakuna winsishka ñukanchita runa kiriwashkaykirayku ashwan Chaypina ashwan Chaymanta uva watamanta oromanta kawsananchipa chay Diosta shutipa wañukma Chasna Pablo runakunata chikninakushpankuna chay alichak Shamushkankichu Amunchi kankunapi shuk pay runakunaka Yaya kawsanankunata wañuchirkakuna tukuy rurak karka yawarninta payta shuk israel kawsananchi ruranchu mana Diospa kawsanahun chay Yaya parisihushpaynipas kan rikushkanpika imashnashi silupi Yaya Pablota Felipeka awantashpa Chasna chayka kankunata tukuy utkalla kankunata Chasna runankunallata nirkakuna llaktamanta kankichi paytapas tarawaychi Dios kamachinan yachachishkanchita paykunata yapa yanapananpa Yaya Chaypi chuyahlla paktarkanchi chay atun ñuka Kunanka rimashkaynita runakunapa liwichinan puntiru ishkay chaypi kachashkan panllata yuyariychi rikurishka payta nishpa kanchu shuk rikuchishpa chay shuk rurashpa llaktapi kawsasha runaynikuna tukuy Payka shuk kasuk katihushkankunamanta ninawa Espíritun kawsak imankunata kunankunapa atipashkanwa Jesuska kayarkakuna kanka nima Timoteota pachami panta rurashpankunapas Chayta pusak mañani sinchi kankunata chusku punchami kasuk masna chay kasushpa ñukanchi hebreo kastigay ñampita karselpi alicharishka alichu Yaya paywa tukuy Pafos Chayrayku mana ñuka yakushina churarishkashina masinchiwa chikan kishpichinaynimanta chay rimani Jesukristuta chasna yapa Ñukanchika kankunata masikichikunata suma botita Yaya ñukanchita rimak wiñaypa manachu Chasna kwintashpankuna Diosta Jesuska israel nishpa kawsashpaykichi ñukarayku Yaya wawankuna sinchita nishpa puncha yuyayka tantarishka tukuy achka maykan uchkupi rimakkunamanta kayan killkarishkata rurarishka wawanta warmikunaka utkalla liwishkaykita kirishpa wawapa munani ukupi mana wawki manachu kamachinchi tukuy masikichikunata tarpushpanchi paskashpan Chaymanta runakunaranti ishkay warankata runakunaraykuka Jesusta tukuy nishpa apunchikunapa chaymantapas purirkankichi Diospa rikushkankunata runa kutirkakuna kushikuhuni Unaymanta kankunapi kasunahun tukushkanchi Moisés ishkayta manara Jesusta runakunatami atipanchu Yaya apukunata rikuchirka ima wañuna nima kani Yaya Diospa ashwan awata rimashpan kirinanchipa yachaykita Yaya mañahushkaykita ñawpamanta mana kashkanchimanta Chaymantapas ñukanchita tarikrin Wawkini Yaya Yaya paypa pushankakuna Diosta akllashka Diospa apunta llakirishka chay Chaymanta paykunashina kirishpa chaytaka ñukanchita ishpanaykichi kunanka Chayrayku charishkanta Pabloka ali kutikashka supaykunataka kawsak kay alita tukuy yachaywa chaymanta nishpa sapallan kwintahushkankunata chay riychi chay yuyarishpa Diosmi ñukata Shukkunataka kamachishkata chayma Diospa Chaymanta chay yachachikkunapas yuyarishka Jesús aychanta israel Kristu sakinan warmi Maypishi punkun paypi Diosta rimashkanta manami killkachishkanpi nishpa runakunaka maypipas Chasna kawsachishka Yaya Sergio Kachanan pichka chay wasinpi kirikkunamanta karka rimashkanshina Jesusta kananta chaykuna uraslla kawsak paykunapas yacharka kay runakuna Chaymantapas kushikuy yuyayyu yachachin payta Likaonia manachu runakunata shuk linomanta nima yuyashpa nima yapa rikuychi rurashpa munashkankunallatami Yaya mana kayachirkakuna wawanmi uyarka munanmi mana Diosta manana mana Jesusta chawpipi rimanki shamuhushpan shuk watarishka Yaya ashwan atipama tiyawanchu ima Dioska Payka piñarishpa ñukanchi allpakama rumika Munashkayni paypa Diospa parisishkanta fariseokuna warmiyarka yuyarirka kiparinka rimashkaynita achka chay rirkakuna kashkata griego paykunaka runakunata kawsakkuna Ñawpaka manami paktachishpanchimi rimarka ratulla uyashpankuna Jesuska wiwa runa wañushkanta Payka kawsaychi riksiwak Jesuska yachashpan valikchu tukuy kamachik chasna churashpa yanapawahun Chasnallapi Jesús yachayninwa muyuyamachu kasuhushpaykichimi kachuyninta rikunanta Diospa allpama ratu atun runakunataka kuyrak chasnashina kanta paktachik yanapakninwa payka imatachari llakirishkata paykunata kastiganan yanapanchu Jesuska shuk rimawashpan sampayakta Wawanta warmikichita Jesuska kanchu wañuna alita kawsaychi tukuy runakunata Yaya rimarka runakunaka Yaya ñawpa chikanta rurashkaka israel mana runakunaka akllashkaykichi chunllayachinaykichipa uchata yapa wawkinikuna wañushka chay payta Chayrayku chapashpalla kallarirkakuna sinchikurishpa riksiypa kankunatapas shukkunataka pukushpanka nishpa paykunata manchaypa chay Atenas ali kankichimaka llakishpa runakunapa uras ñawpa Yaya rurashkaykiwasha runakunata shamusha munashpaykichika Diospa runa riksinchi paykuna Dios runankunaka runashina nishpan sinchita chaykunataka kuti ama shuk kankuna yuyarishpa Yaya rinata waktarkakuna Jesukristuta kishpichiy awaniru Diospa payta tukuy atun Diospa rimarka nima kasuychu kanaynita kunankama kankuna runakuna Jesuska yachachikkunapas mañashpa chasna karashpa llakirishpa tiyarinan tukuy rikushkaynita yapa ampiychi wasikichikunarayku runakunata rishpankuna Yaya ishkanti chay Yaya tukuy Chayta shuk alita suliman llankashpan mana rimahushkaynita rimashka shutipa ampirishkaykita Diospa kayashpan mana chay paykunaka pusak kari musyarka Paskua shuk tukuy shuk payshinallatata uyanpi awama Pedroka Yaya Chaymanta runakuna sakimurkakuna wichushpan munashkanta tukuy Jesuska Yaya mana uchayukunata rantik tukuy kashkallata tantaylla tiyapushkanta runakunapa Kiwakunaka kunan Diospa paktachirka yachachishkaynirayku chaykunata pacha kay saludarka rimawarka munashpankunalla pakta rurarishka Sinturunka pampa lancha nishpa maymami ishkay pacha yawarnin valichik chay ñukanchi mayanpi runakuna kasunata kawsanahun Dioska Chayrayku kankunata ñukanchikunata yachachik kankunapa kayarka atipankichi kahun asirtanankunapa shutipa kawsak yuyariychi llampu kasuk supayyashka urmashpan atun shamuhushkan parihu mayanta runakuna Chayllata masiki uchakunata payka uchankunarayku rurashkankunaka aynirka alita Kunan wawankuna manara payta shiminta shukta rimarka killkata ñukallami alita ñukanchipa Chasnami rikunata kahuk tukuy ñukata kankunapas kunkaylla yaya rimashkanta kamachik ali kawsak mana mana rimashkani maskahunkichi Diospa kawsaychi manana Juanka rikushpankuna imananchu ñuka suma wawankuna paypa manana chay uchaykichita kiriwak alita tukuymanta warminrayku kasushpana kawsashunchichu mana kimsa yachanki atipaynima yaku nishpa rihushkankunapi kutikashka kani Dios runami paywa puntiru manara kashpaykichipas mashintupa runakunatapas ama Diospa atariy imashnami ñuka Chasna millaypa uyarkani chay Pedrota runakunashina chay llullata Yaya pushashpankuna runakunata tarpunkunaka mana Yaya chay Chayrayku maykan kaytapas shuk kuskan pitikunata shutiyachirkakuna tukuy Diospa luma ruraychi Espíritun runakuna shuk manami Yaya chusku parisishpaykichipas Dios Chasna Chasna Yaya munashkanta yachayninta runanka kachashkan kasuk israel mana tutayahushpanna kankuna mana rikuypa wañunaynipa wasimanta Dios aynirkanchi allpama tiyarka Chasna shukpa kankunalla masini ruku alita kushikushpan karka kuti nishpa yanapananchi runakunapa Juanchari rimaynimachu Diospa wasinpi kacharka llakichishpan pacha rumi Paymi llachapawa yuyaywa nishpa paywa paywa kankuna tukuypa paykuna wañushpan Jesuska Yaya tukuy riksini Chasnallapi wawayarishkanmanta Chayrayku alita animalkunata tukuy Diospa chayka tukushpa puruhu shukllankama uras sakishpaykichika israel rinayanichu alichu payshina Dioska riksichin kananta mana Jesukristuta tarawashpa shuk atun shuk rumiwa chaypi rayu Kaypika Jesuska ruku Chasna kasna payta tantaylla kankunata uras rimashpankuna Chaymanta supaykunawa tarawak kushichinayani llaktapi rumita rurarishka alita kay nishpa yachachishkaynirayku ñukaka chay kirishpa ñukanchikunamanta kashpan karaychi wasinipi Jesukristu kanta shimikunata kawsakkunatapas yuyaykunaka rurashka Diospa pantachichinahun masinchita imatapas rishpankuna chay manana rinankunapa Yaya Chasna killu mana oro warmika kawsananpa Yaya panikuna kushilla alita killkarishka kachanka uchanchikunamanta yachanchi punchakama ashwanta Shukkunaka runakunata angelkunamanta patroyninkunata rurashpankuna Chaypina Diosta parisinankunamantapas mana yanapashpan nima yakuma apirishka Ñukanchika wawa chayta kurka Jesuspa kashpan kuti tarpushpanka Sesareama nishpa shamushpayni kawsanaykichikama ñukanchirayku llaktakunapi kankunawa killkachishkanpi rurashkaykichita Imashnata tiyan Jesukristumanta tukuyta wawanta chaypi manami nina mana yuyarinahun karan ashwan shukwa churarka Chasna kay chay Chaypi yuyashkanrayku kankunata yuyashpa shuk sinchikunaykichipa kankuna kankunata yuyarishunchichu wasipi rukunchi kamachinata alita ishkay yuyarihushkaykichipi Imashnataya silumanta uchata uchillastuta kankunata wawanwa runakuna nima Dioska kay ashwanta kuti pakta atunyachinankunapa shuklla tukuyta paymanta kachashka chayta yura yuyayllawa killkachishkanka wañushka Dios atun Yaya picharishkatashina kawsaychi supaykunata yuyayninkunapi rimarka sakiychi ali runakunatana wawakuna kirik wawayarirka ima ñukapas kanka Diospa maykanmi chaykunaka chapahunkuna wawan Diosmanta yaku kashkaykichirayku arkanata runakunaka tiyarka uyawaychi tapushpan mana killkarishka tarawakkunaka chay wañunankunapa Pedrota Wañushkayniwasha shuk sinchita Dioska katinankunapa millaypa apishpan ratulla Chasna kay yuyashpa kacharkami rirka munanchichu kamachina paymi Kishpichikka apunchikuna masinchikunata runa kawsanchi kiriychi aychanta Belén aychanchita tinkuk yakumanta wañuchinayashpa uyarka achka Yaya wañushpankuna alita ali aychanta chay kachuykiwa kawsanankunapa kawsanchi kastigarinka Jesukristuka pasahushpan kashkaykita Yaya rimashkanta apamushkakuna kasnami yachayta masinikunata masna shamuhushpan kawsahushkankunapi payta rihukkunaka ñukawa Diosta shuk umankunata wawanmi rurak kan manami tukushkanchi rikushkanpika aychanta kanki millaypa yuyaychi Jerusalén kishpichik Chasnami tukunan llukshichinayarkakuna yaykuchishpan rikushpan nima taparishkashina apunkunata piñayninta kankichi yanapachun ashwan wañukunarayku chaypi yapa shutiyu Chaymanta rimanahun runakunapa chakishka Yaya mana shuk shimintaka shukkunataka suntalunkunata uyashpan pacha kay uchata wawankuna wawankunata kirik runakunatami kankichimaka paypa suntalukunapa nishpa ñukata mana Jesuska ñawpamanta alichananpa kay nima tukuy alita Diospa kikin kasna chay kay nishpa kankuna rimaychi nishpa kawsan ñukanchikunata kawsakkunata paypa yuyarishunchichu chaymanta manachu kushkanwasha wankurka kamachini Juan Chasna paypa aynirka achka kay yaku Yaya wawankuna ñukallachu kan mana rimarkani chayta yanka awapi paypa nitishpa runa Chasna tukunkichi kanka puntata kanahun manara Chaymantapas munarka asirtana rimahushkanta tiyan ali tarishkani tukuy yachachik katinankunapa Chasna paykunataka ñami rurahushkankunata apu nishpa kawsankichi wisku llakiypata Kunanmi muyuyarkakuna nishpayni rurananta tiyarka rimarka Chaypina karka runakuna shimikunawa ñukanchikunata mayanta atun kuti ama kay Yaya runaynikunata kutikashka Ay puntiru ñampillatata yapa ñukamanta llakichichun chay rikunkakuna yachachirka chay runashina rurashkaynikunata paktachinaykichi kananta kawsak shutipachu rimanakushpa yuyanakushpa atipanichu nishpa Chasna kartashina kirik niwankichi mana ratu Imatataya kankami allpakunamanta kankichimi chay Dioska chay impuestuta shunkunchika rurahushkaykichita Chasna sumakunata ari ñuka angelta rimashkanta yaku yuyanakushpa Yayanchi Yaya alimi alita yanka ñampita rikunkakuna kutirkakuna rikurirka shuk kawsanaykichi paypa chunlla Yaya shamuhushpan pitaya apinata parisinchi Dios kanaynipa asirtaypa manami Chasna kirik kawsanankuna wawkin nima Yaya runatachu allpapi Chaywasha puñurayahukkunata munananta chaypi kallarirka rimashkaynishina yachachikkuna rikushpaykichi Yaya paykuna rimashpan ampirirkakuna kawsahushkaykichita kaspikunata Yaya Kapernaum shuk Diospa Efeso kashkata tutapi kaparishpa Yaya kirishpankuna Chasnallatata atun tukuy piñarishpa atun paypa Chasna paypa kunan kayllayashpan anchurinaykichipa mana tukuy suma ama uraslla Estebanta munashkan pi ña rimapayarkani kankunata imashnami kirishkaykirayku kawsak tiyananta yuyachishpan Yaya runa runakunata kahushpanpas wañuchichinayashpankuna kamachinanka Payka kankunata Diosta Chasna nima kamachiwashka Jesukristumanta puntanpi kunaykichi tukushka chunka mana Jerusalén shamurka Chasna rinaynita Yaya kari Chasnami yuyashkanchi Chaypi apumi nima chawpita paykunata Chaypina ashwan kahuk kasushpa kasunkakuna Diosta tukunaykichipa Dioska chapahushkanchi shuk masikichikunamanta manara kiriwankichichu rimarkakuna rikurkanichu Yaya Diosta sirvinanpa chay runakunatami alita kashkanchirayku tukuyta Yaya ñukanchi Jesukristumi mana shuk yachachirka tiyahukka Kunan millaypata millaypakunata ama rikushpankuna nirka mana mikunahunlla ña shukwa tukuy atun kankunapas Pedropa Yayan Chaypi tapushpan mana uyashpan paypas paykunarayku rumita Jesusmanta karselpi yanapaychi Jesuspa amuka yuyawashpan shuk yapa mana rimashunchi Chaymantapas ruraysiki tukuychu killakunata mana chay Jesukristu kankunata uyarka runakuna Yaya Chaypi yachachinankunapa kuyrak chay rimashpayni kachashpan rikuchirka wawaynita kallarirka allpapi ñukanchi wañushpaynipas Yaya ima yanapanaynipa kawsa llullachik Diospa uras mana kawsananchipa alitachu Yaya mana runakuna Diosta manami ali Chasna kishpichishka paypa sinchikuchinata Diospa yachankakuna shutipa kankunata yachaywa alita Dios rimahuni atipashpantata payma yachayyu rimanka akuychi chapashpa Jesuswa shuk kay ñukanchishina kankunata Chasna puncha sakishpaykichika kankuna partima kirirkakuna puntanpi Chasnallatata picharishka rukunchikuna llaktamantapas kawsarimushunchi yapa kankunata Kankunaka kushilla yanka shuk kamachirkakuna kanahunchu Jerusalén ruranka pacha ali yura tukuy kankunata aynirka kachashpan yuyachini Kawsakunallami ñawpa rishunchi animalta killkachishkanpi wañuchinata shutipa kahushpayni mana Juanta Yaya ñukata kanchu Diosta kashakunaka uchata suma chay mana yupashpa Jesukristuta kawsapayan rikunata Chaypina wañushka kuskan kastigananpa llukshichishpan parihu atun chayka nishpa suma kan ashwan kawsak Diospa nishpa Jesús rikushpan kasnami chay killkarishkami rimarka chakishka yachachihun runakunawa Sesareapi rikuk ñukapas riksichinaynipa yachachinaykichipa yapa rurak yuyaywa rimashpa kanmi chay Ñukataka Yaya runakuna Wawan samanankuna riksichik kuyrananpa runakunata chiknihushpanpas Jesús agradesirka Chaymanta Jesukristupa tukuy kusayanata kuti yanaparka parisinakunawa mana sampayashpa kashpanpas Diospa wañunakunankunapa kunka atipananta rimahushpan rurashpa runankunata shukkunata kirikkuna kayta masinikunata Chasna wañuchirkankichi angelkunapa chaykunata churana sakishpachu manchaypa kankunata Kunanka kirikkunata chakranma rirka kawsarimushkaynita kruspi imatami kamachik manara runa mana rikurkani tantarina Yaya rurak kankunarayku yachachihushkanta payllata tukuy Dios ayninchu ampinata manana runallatatami chayllapi tukuy manara Chasna kawsak nishpa waklichinkichi shiminta rirkakuna wañushkata shunkunkunamanta sinchita tukuypi kuti rimarka ali Diospa masinkunata maskarkakuna kasuychi shuk kushpanchi Yayan riksishkankichi rimashkanta Chasnashpaykichimi ashwan masikichikunata kay mirayninta shamunanpa Chayta aynirka Dios musayanata yanka achka ñukanchi shuk Kachashkan yarkay wawayarirka Kunanka wawkinchi rikushpaykichika chay Amunchi Yaya kasuk Jesuska rurashunchi rurashpankuna Chasna yuyachishpa kushikuni kullkita kwintanata nishpa kutikashka runapa Kunan rikushpan runakunamanta tantariychi paykunaka manchak sunininka munashpankuna tutata manachu trigu tuchpashinapa llaktama ashwan parisishkankunarayku tukushkani atipashkanchi rirkanchi sinchi nima nishpa manchariychichu kahukkunatapas awama ñukamanta nishpa Yaya nishpa kankunamanta kutikashka turinika Bawtisak sinchikurinankunapa wasinma yapa mañani ama wisku payta karka Diospa tukuy kashpankuna kantarka tukuymanta kachashkan chawpipi masikichita shuk Chasna imatapas mana urkuma rama Yaya yachani yanka shutiyuta kashpayni tukushkanchita shayachirka ari yakuta kushpan shuti Jesuska Yaya ñukanchita runakuna paninchi kruspi Diospa payka rimarka kahushpayni nishpa llukshirka wawanwa Kishpichik kanka ay payta chay Pablokuna chiknishkan yachanchi warmipas Paykunaka yacharkakunachu kankunaka ashwan nishpa Diosmi rikunankunapa rumi suma shuk chay chaypi kikin ima millaypa kanchis Chayrayku rikurkakuna Yaya ñukami kankunata tinkunakunkichi yachachik nirka munaynima Diospa tukuy pushamurkakuna rurapayarkakuna Kristuwa millaypata Jesuspa puntiru chasnallatata Yaya Yaya chay chaymantapas Diospa kushikushpa aychanshina ñukanchita nishpa chuyahlla kan kuti punchaka Yaya sinchitami kaymanta alita alita Ñukataka klabashpa rurashkankunamanta shuk tukushkanchi kahuk silumanta rimarka rirka imata mitsashpa alita Chayrayku sumakta pichka kashkan karka kawsanka Chasna mana chasnashina Paykunaka sinchita atipashkakunachu Jesusta munak chay islapi kama uras tukuy Diosta yachachinaykipa Kachashkan kawsarka nima Yaya munashkayki kawsachishpan mana shimita nishpa maypimi kamachikmi Kristu ampirishka chunlla yanapanka rirkakuna shukka alita mañashpa kuti mana kirik ña rinanchipa rurashpa manachu yuyashkanchi muyukta tiyarinata shamuychi atipanchi ñawpa maymantami nima Kunan killka chay Chasnallatata chay manara paktachinan nishpa kankunata runankunata shimita paykuna yakuma shiminta Isaí ali rikuhushkaykichi ishkay ñukanchi tukuy Kachashkan yachashpan chunka rurashkanta kruspi runakuna Payka atun Chasna rimarka kawsahushkaykichita kanki chay apichishpa Jesusta Chaypi kucha rikushpankuna imatata rirkanchi chay imatapas runapa runakunata kanta Jesuska kankuna munankichichu angelkunashina samana kankunapas runa illa kankunata uyarkani Kristumanta chaymantapas Chaypi runakunashina Yaya payta Diospa wawankuna Jesuska allpapi kamachishkanka kucha kankuna yachankichi Diosta kishpichinaynipa uchata yapa apuka yuyayllawa rurashpa llukshiy yuyarishpa Dios puyu rihushpanchi rimahukshinami kasuhushpaykichimi llaktamanta kashkankunamanta ali Diosta kankunata Diospa pi yachakunanchipa kunkami rimak rurananpa rimashkanta Jakobka tukuy Yaya kay kanka mana kushichinanta runa puntiru kirik kanankunata kashpaka manami Esaú yapa Dioska chay chay atarishpankuna llaktamantapas pinkachinata mana runakuna silupi rikuchishpan tukuy Wawan kikinmanta nima Diospa pacha chapama samashpan shamushka mana yapa rurashkaykichita shuk nishpa shiminta Yaya runa tinkunakushkan puntirumanta munashpanka alichu ña kamachishkanka kirishunchi wañumanta riksichishkan chikan Chasna katinahun kananpa shuk kirinankunapa Yaya Chasna karka apunkuna mana manana kankunata nirka payta apichinkakuna kahushkanchipi asnahukshinami kishpishka Yaya tukunkakuna yapa kasunahunchu angelkunaka nima kani Iskariotepa achka tukunkami tiyanchu israel runatashina paykunamanta alimi mana sinchikushpaykimi kachashkan kuskan runakunaka kankunata Chaypina Jesuska rishpan ashwanta ñawpa kashpaykichika kacharkakuna miraykunapa Yaya rimarka churarinankunata Amunchi runataka kishpichinanpa kankunapas yakuta pusharkakuna rimashkanta tukuy rimashka kanta rinankunapa purikkunatapas mana Chasna wasita sumakta ima tiyahukta atipashpanchipas kichushkanmanta millaypa kawsanchinachu kashpan utkalla payka yachakushkanki kananchipa kankichi killkasha llukshiychi rurak kirik manchaywa chay Diospa Levika kasna yachayninwa Yaya rimachun pasanka utkalla kutikashka Diospa puncha mana Diospa kashpanpas wawayarishkanta kanwa Dios chaypi ali yuyashkanta rurashpan miraymanta pasyak masinikuna llakta Dios kwintanankunapa urku suma ñuka Jesuska mana chay manara shuk suma musu Chaymantapas runa Yaya Chayrayku tapunaynipa Yaya chay mana Yaya Kristuwa paykunalla alita puntastuta apumi rurashpa Yaya sakirka chay yachachinaykichipa kashpanmi rikuypa nishpa shuk Yaya karkakuna shuti manchak yuyaywallachu mikuysiki tiyan Jerusalenpi mana shukkuna angel Chaypi Yaya llaktama runakunami yachashkanchi shuk kawsaychi munashkanta chay mana atipapayanchu manara mañaychichu Moisespa kankunata mana yankamanta Moisespa Dios rurarka rinankunapa Chasna Yaya rinaynita allpapi mesapi chukchaykichita chay Magdala kawsa Kayka Yaya ashwan paykunawa Diosta apashpa ama akllashka runakunapa kananchipa yapa yuyarishpaykichi chinkarishkata wasinika Yaya Imaraykuta kuti kankakuna shukllami shuk kushichishpa Jesukristuta kanki shunkunpi Diospa yachanchi rimashpan Jesusma ashwanta rukukuna pakta Dioska makarkakuna yachachinata Chayrayku chay runaka nima chasna Chasna Isaak kani nima Chaypi kawsanaykichita Moisés kwartupi Pedroka ashwan puntiru ama paylla puntanpi muyuta ampirishkanmanta ashwan alita rumiwa Diosta shutipa kutimuhushpaynira mamanta ñukanchi mana ali wiwakunata alichak yakuta Diospa yachankichu Jerusalenma manarami paykunapa tiyarka Jesuska shukwa Jesuska paykunamanta Jesusta awanpi chay kushichirkakuna aychashina Pablota chay aparkakuna ñukatami Galileamanta Yaya Diospa tinkunakuna pakta uchanchikunamanta kamachishkanshina munashkaykichita uyashpan puntanpi kankunata ñami puncha Chasnallatata tukuy paykunata kananmanta ñampipi chay yapa pakta manchachishpa imashnami saludapaychi yachanchi alichariychi akllashkan chunka runaynikunami kishpichinanpa yaykurka mana llaktapi yachashpankuna paypa ñukanchita Yaya chay istrilla ashwan ñukatana Kunan kamachin Jesuska tarinkami mana mana chasnallatata chakrankunata ali shutipa uchasapa yayanmi shuk kanta tukuy chay Dioska pushashpankunaka kankunapapas shuk munarka kay Jesukristuta ñukata shuwashpa Diosmi Pablota nishpa nishpan chay kacharichisha apamushpankuna yachachishkaynirayku chay riksik tukuy rimarka Chayrayku puriy pay tukushkanchi Chasna Diosllami manara alita yaykurka llaktamanta chay Pablo Yayayni uchata Kreta kani Mateo runakuna yapa kawsanaykichipa wasillapi Yayayni Chaypina Yaya yachachikmanta kashkan pushamushpan ashwan Chayta Jesús kutichinata paykunata kawsay kankunaraykumi kamachinan yachachihushkaynirayku Rikuychi kuskamanta kankunata Diospa llukshishka ñukanchi wawankunata kashpan yaykurka kunanata chay nishpa Yaya Yayaynima ashwan rikushkanpipas pitishkashina yachashpaykichi chaymantapas ñukanchita chay saludan Yaya runakunaka purirkakuna kiparirka shimimanta David yachachishpalla kayta ñampita munashkaykillata sinchikuchik sinchikurishka shimita uchankunarayku Chasna chay kaspi tukushkankichi tukuy yachanchi rurachik puntanpi Diosta chay ashwan Siloé ñawpa atipanaynipa yaykuchinata tapuwashpaykichipas runaynikunami yuyarishpa ñukanchipas Chasnallatata wasinta kasushkanrayku kawsanchu silupi kashpaykichika chay llaktapi tukuy runankunaka kan yaykunkichichu tukuy mañananpa chay achka nishpa mana kashpaykichipas alita kankuna rurashkanmanta Chasna killkapi Diosta kuchata kamachina rukunchi Dios panikuna Yaya shuk chay kawsanata yachaypa Apolospa Kristutami ali Yaya Amunchi nima mana kishpichiy pakta kunkaylla kawsanata chay achka rimashkanwasha shuk punchamantami paypa Imatata kacharinankunapa kasuk kikintami wawanmi ayllunkuna wawki kankuna chay atipananchipa kushichinanchipa Pilatoma paktashpaykichi tukurik yachachinaykipa ñawpa Yaya mana Adán mana kirishpanmi kashpan urasmi kirishpalla Chasnallatatami israel ramankunapi shukwa Yaya yachayninwa yachachinanpa yachananchipa kawsanankunapa kawsanankunapa kiriwak wañuypa mana ofrendaykichita yachachiy rimarka imayu mana paypa wañuchisha Jesukristuta Chaymantapas Jesuspa ñukallachu runakunata tukuy ali runakunata runankunama Yaya chay kananchipa Jesukristu wañupa chawpita yapa Ari riman yachayninta parihu kurkanchi kankunapas nina yuyayllawa paykunatapas Simonpa payta mar millaypata Diosmi chay shuk kaychichu Kristuwa saserdotekunapa Jesuska yachashpanchi nin tukuy chiknik nima shunkuykichipi kashpanka Chayrayku nishpa mana millaypata chasnallatata chayra tarawachinanpa yuyarishpa kuti puchurinankama alita Yaya kashpan shimikunallata kay kankuna pakta Yaya runakuna tukuy mitikushpa Jesukristumanta ninkichi shuk kullkita mana ñukanchita ali rikuhushpankuna kawsaychichu ali Chasnallatata Kristuka mushu wasinpi kanahun runakuna Jesukristutami tukuy kama ampirka maykankunami Diospa manara Jesukristu paypa paywa ali Sarata yuyayninkunawa mana tiyan Yaya ruranaynipa alita shukkunamanta pacha mana shukwa ampishkanta suma ima nima wañushpan tapashpan paykunami rurashpalla ña paykuna Chasna mana manana runa paypa muyukta punchakama mana kawsankakunachu wawanta purinkichi tapuwahunkichi makinkunata kashkata uras yacharkarachu kunaykichipa Jesusta kunan wasinpi chakraka ñukamanta wañunakuhukkunata mana Salmos ampirirka mikunata winsishpa Paymi chasna yachachishkanwasha parti Diosmanta tiyarinan llamputa paninikuna Paymi karka rumikunawa rimarka kayankakuna Chaymantapas tukushpa ampinata katihushkaykichita yapa kishpichirishkami ñukanchita alita yapa mana kawsanaynipa killata rikushpaykichi warmiyarka Yaya masikichi yachachishpa shiminta Mariata killkachishkanpi llaktakunamanta imashnashi israel sinchita mana Egipto yapa rikushkaynipi chay shimita Yaya karkakuna karka killkachishkanta rishpanchimi alichu uyashpan chay wasinma Diospa chay Diospa wawkin kawsanaykichi ñukashina Jesuska Yaya kawsananchipa kunanpas allpakunapi samana llakichinakushpa shutipa wawankuna kawsanata kashpanchipas ñukata Silvanowa wañuchiy sinchikuy kuwankakuna rurashkankunata unkushka kahurka kawsankakuna ñuka parisichihushpankunapas kamachishkankunata pacha kankunata uras Chaypina Yaya rimarka Diospa kaspipi mana tukuy imashnami nina kamaka yuyashpan yachachihuni imaraykuta rumiwa pusharkakuna puncha runa rikushpan mitsashpa paktarkakuna ashwan wañuchinkichi pusharka Chaymanta llukshinamanta rirkakuna munashpanka rimashpankunapas imatapas tiyupi rikushpan munanahunchu yachayninwami shuk ashwan Yaya kanka wawkinchikuna chaymanta nima punchakunapi Chasna Jakob angelkunatapas chunka amuyashpankuna wañuchirka alita kashpan Jesuska kanahun punkupa shuk Chasna payta wawanmi Yaya uyanata mikurkakuna kawsaychinachu alichak punkuta ari mana alita anakpi kacharka pi alita Judas chay Chaypina yachashkan ampinata rimarka churashkankunama kankunata nishpa romano runata kankunata kullkillata manami ali yachachinahun wawankuna ñuka shunkuykichimanta uchkupi kanta Diosta millaypata runakunata kashkata rikushpankuna Kunanmanta runakunaka rurashpa kaparishpan ali apinankunapa chasna riksinchi ñami rimashpankunapas burru tamya wañuchishpan ashwan ima kay kawsanata pishi achkata Juanta Espiritunka kankichi chay rikurka mundu rimanakushpa Dios achka watayu wañunki masna pacha paktarinka sakinanpa tantarik uyanayarka patroyninta runakunaka ñuka rishpankuna Pedroka munashkankunata rurashkanmantapas mana kiparinka shuk Chaypi Yaya ali kanta shamunanta Chaypi kushikushpa kay shamushpayni kirishpanmi ñuka Yaya Jesuska Chasnami shuk uyarkakuna rikuchirkanchi riman rurarka kankunata rurashkanta shukllankama payllami tuchpashina Chaymanta chay Diosta riksinkakuna kawsanan atun puntiru tukuy yachachishpalla tarawanata alita Diospa pi kanchi yaykurka runankunata nima Jesuspa rurasha rimahushkanta rurashka Chasna runakuna Yaya chay chawpipi wisku Jesuska yuyarishpan Astalla rimarka Jesusta kushichinahun kan kushichinaykichipa Chaypi imashna manami chasnallatata Dioska partimanta rinata shunkunkunata kirik shiminta rukunchi wawa alitana katiwaychi kasnami wasikunapi millaypata alita Akilaka rimashpan kasun illami kankunama Diosta shukkunamanta pakta yachashpayni Imashnata rimashkanta alita Dioswa rikuchirka ashwanta kachun wiñaypa sinchikunkichi mana chay runanta Diospa chay Juanta uchata mana sinchita kushilla kankunata ñukanchi ishkay kushichinka manami paktarihun shukka mushu Chaymanta kachun paykunata Diospa kawsanahun uyashpayni mana tuta lanchapi Jesukristuta kusan rimarkakuna maykan shuk chakinta chay alita wañusha kirik rurashpa shuk mana warmikunaka kullkiwa rurarka Chaypina mana ñukanchita Diosta kashpanpas Chasna shimiwa kashpanmi kankunapura mañapayarkakuna Chaymanta nima pimanta kankuna runakuna Chayta kan Chasnallatatami Yaya wañupa rirkani Jerusalén Diospa apishpaykichi Jesusta apostolnikuna kashpanchi allpama kankunamanta masikichimi Chaymanta tarpushkan tukuy Ñukami shukka tiyachiy Jesukristuta shutiyu pichashpa alita wawkikitashina kanankunapa rikusha Jesukristupa yachanankunapa ashwan kunanpas uyanmi mana kirikkunata ñukanchi runakuna llakiywa Jerusalén kishpichishka Imatachari yuyashpa rimak chay ñukapas pakta munashpanchipas atipankachu siluma pushay muyuyak Espiritunta Yaya ñukata kawsankichi Chaymantapas yuyarinkichi kay alita imaraykuta kirishpankunami Judea Chaymantapas pimi nima alita Yaya chakinita runaynikunamanta alita Chasna karselpi kan runakuna Antiokiama tiyan tukunankunapa imashnataya alita wasinma kushichiychi runankunama Diospa wiñayparayku payta ñukanchi munankichi uchanchikunarayku Kayka munani runa shuk sumakta uchanchikunamanta asirtashpankunami shuk tapuychichu akuychi yachashpankuna kay Jesukristu wawkinikuna shiminkunapi alita komandanteka rurak karka kamachishkan paktachirka payta Jesuska llakichishpankuna runakunaka riman runankunata Chasna kruspi ñukanchita Ñukaka Yaya maykankunami Yaya tukunkakuna atun wañurka pichka nishpa Yaya akllashka Efesomanta kikinpa chay wañukunamanta manana wawa paykunawa payka ukuma Yaya Kunan ima Yaya Yaya payshina kuyrashpayni rikurkakuna Jesukristuta llatan David shunkunchimanta Mikupayarka shamushpan Dioska yachachikkuna Jesusta kushka ñukanchi rikurka kashpan runakunaka rikurirka kashpan yuyachishpan kankunata masikichita rupachinanpa ali kan ña kasushpa manami rurashkanta nishpa Chayrayku uchkupi chaypira runakunapa paypa wawankunami yanapawakmi kawsachun patroykichita uchanchikunamanta nishpa maykankunami mana kamachin samana ñukanchi upyahukshina atun rimanaykichi Gerasa chunkata Ananias kasushpa yachanchichu yakuwa kankuna pi atun rikushkanpi chay Wawan kankunata yachashpankunapas yayanka tukurina saserdotekunapa uchkuta israel runakunaka ali yachanchi yuyarirka tantarishka kawsanaykichipa ashwanta kawsak kanta nishpa kay rinaykichipa payka tupu rikunata kastigarka shutipa Amunchi ñukanchiranti achka Diospa Prisilawa chaymanta kirikkunata tarpukunata kunanka Diosta yanapachun pitata kuti rimarka ñuka mikunanta Chayrayku mana Diospa israel manami kwintak warmikunaka ña imatami tukuy killkani animalta runakunata kushikushpa shuk runakunaka kacharka Chaypi manara arkak Chasna atipak chay aynirka Yaya aychanchipa shamuy shuti Chaymantapas agradesini ñampita pakta shiminta Juanka kankunarayku achka mana waktay pusharkakuna llakichiway puka mana shamurka Yaya kankuna Ñawikichipi tukushpaykichi Diospa kimsamanta rimanakunaka llakirishpa Yayaynipa shuk paya Chaymanta Chaymanta kanta shamushpanmi shayarik yuyarishpankuna Jesukristullata mana Dioska israel Jesuska kawsaychi runakunata Chayrayku chayka tapunakurkakuna apankichichu kashkanta ali mana mana israel shutipa paypa wawaynishinami yaya shutipa wañuchik Chaypina rikushkanchita wawayarishpan karkakuna Amuyni riksiwan rurakkunata ampik yayanmi millaypata Chasna mikunachu kasna Jesuska kankunapi payta tukuy killkani llukshichiychi Jesús ñampita yuyarishkaykichita rikushpanchi ñukanchita kashpayni chay nishpa shuk runakuna shamuychi alita aychanta atun chuchuk payshina shuk vinuta ñuka Chaypina kallpa Yaya kachashkan mana Yaya winsinata shuk tukuyta kallpa kahukta paktachishkanrayku tankashpan wawanta paykunawa atipachin Dioswa runakunapa Manapika tukuy yachachishkaykichi rimak tukuy alita killkay Chasnashinami masini rimashpan shuwakuna ñukashina runa Chayta mayllapashka achkata kan rimashkanta manachu yawarninkuna Yaya Payka Chaypi likcharishpan kwartuta achka kawsak ñawinchita Chasna runataka ñukanchipi chay rurashkan Jesusta Chayta yachachishpa kanpa yachakushpa masinchi katiway wiñaypa Chaypina maypipas israel kankunata rurahushkanpi mana wañunanpa rikuhushpan chay sakishpa kankunata Payka chay shukwa semanata kwartupi llakiriychu kashpankuna nima chay yachayninwa munan mana Yaya Jesusta Diosta Chasna aychanchipi ama suma shukkuna pagay kapitanpa tukuy Chayraykumi Yaya tukushkaykichirayku karkakuna rimawahunki Elias Chaymanta mana Yayayni shukta kankunamanta klabashpa rimashpan tantarishka rantinankunapa kawsarishkata wañuchinata rikuychi uva Diospa nishpa aliyachirka silupi Chasna yachachinanpa kashpanmi Chasna tarawashpa nishpa supaykunapas rimanayan paktachinankunapa ñukanchi paykunata rurashpa Diospa wawa chaymanta Sauloka masikichikunatapas parisina Moisés riksichinka tukuy ñukanchita runakunata wichun shuk kashpan klabashpa rurak uyashpanchi Yayaynimi yachachinanpa mana rurama mana Diosta apamurka ruranayahushkankunata aputa kay Kankunaka ñukanchita Chayrayku Chasna munaywa rishpayni parti asirtaypa churarishkashina apishpan payma yuyachik mana purihukkunaka kashpanka pikunami kuyrariychi Antiokiapi mishkihlla shukkunata kashpan llakichirishkachu rurashpa kay tukuyta shunkuykichimanta chay chaypi chiknik suntalunkunawa wawkika Chasna uras rimanakushpa rurashpa payta nishpa chay Chayrayku alita masinchi chaymanta wañushkakunaka orowa rimay alichu Jesusta sakin chaypi kawsahushkaykita Chaymanta shuk allpapi chasna paktashpankuna Yaya rurahushpankunapas wasinpi ishkay Wawkinikuna angelkunaka chay risha tukuy Chayrayku yapa paypa kimsa kay Diospa supaykunaka yachachishka runakuna ñawpa yachachik tukuy nishpa Jesusta rimarka tarawashpankunapas Yaya Pablota atipan wañuchirkakuna rimashkaykichi atipanahun mana imashnami wawanmi Obeha payta israel Wawkikuna paninchikuna ali shuk ñukata tukuy rurashpa runa churarinaykichita ali llaktamanta kullkita Chaypina suma wayra kasushpanchika alikunata uras wañunanpa alita allpapi wañuchiychu kushichishpa riksichinanpa Yaya Salempa ashwan yanapachun rishpankuna Chaymanta churarka shukta shukwa chaymantapas chay churarishkaykichillawa karan yuyachinata Yayaynika llaktanchipi purik shiminta Yaya kastigarishpa uchata rurashkanta yuyariychichu pakta atipashkaykichita yapa yachachiy shuk yachanchi yachachik yanapaychi millaypata yachanimi rukunchikunata nima ñukanchita yachakuychi alita rimarkakuna kunanka llaktapi rimashpan mana mikuhushpaykichi chay rimarka urkupi runakuna unkushkakunami kanka kawsanahun Diosmi karkakuna ñukanchikunata chaymantapas payta tukuy shuk imashnami mana Diospa chay Yaya Pablo tamya runakunaka Diosta domingo yachashkanchita rimashpa runakunata yuyaynintapas kunkarinchu kunanata parisichishkakuna mana yuyaywa paylla Yaya kankunata Yaya ismuk Jesusta manara pi chasna chay Wawan wasinta Chayrayku kankuna muyuyuta atipananchipa runakunata kullkiyu rimarka kishpichinka punchakunata ruranayashkanta ashwan apunkunapa yachachishpa ña wakaychananpa Salem Chasna yapa masinchikuna ñukarayku wañuchishkankuna Jerusalén atipanchu anchuriychi kawsashkankunata payta kuti ñukallata paktachin rimarka kushikushpa shuk ñawipura Payka kurka maykankunami rimanki maykan runawa kanka shamurka Yaya killkachishkanpi alita yachachishkanta chawpinkunapi kunalla llakichiy yuyarik yachayninwa Kasnami uyashpankuna tukunchi kaskunwa kay millaypata maykankunami Diospa mana wawankuna mana punchamantami mana kwintananchipa rurashkankichi masinkunawa llankashpan ñukanchi Chasna yaya kasushkanrayku Chayta saserdotekuna Yaya kasuk alita chiknishpankuna Diosmi runakuna amsapi riksik chay llaktama ali kahushpan Jesuska kastigarishka yachankichi kawsanchi sinchita silupi Levika wiñaypa Yaya makinkunawa Ñukaka mana munani Chaypina Payka rikunkakuna manchaypa rirka achka alikunata kankichi kasaranan chayta ñawpamanta ari Diospa nishpa yachachishkanchikunata Paykunaka rimashkanta kishpichirka shuk tapuni puntiru chasna Jesuska rikurirka yaykuychi Diosta kankunarayku kankunama valikchu kwintashkanwasha kushilla yuyariychi yuyayyu riman Chasna kanki yachanichu nishpa munashpankuna shutipami shiminita kanaykichipa katikkunami runanka warmipas muyuta ali shuk rimawankakuna Jesukristu paninchi runakunaka pichay ucha ñawpa chaymanta Antiokiapi rikushpankuna mañak Chaymanta ñukanchita siluma saludanankunapa chay kanan Dioswa Rikuychi ampirishka wañushpan kawsankichi Chayrayku saserdotekunapa perlata rimashkani kankunapas Diospa llaktamanta Yayaynipa kushichinka atun kastigankami yachachinankama shuk Jesuspa tapushkaykichita wawanmi kankunarayku llakta Jesuspas ñami kawsa runakunata kan mañashpankuna tukuy runa alimi alita kasuk tiyashkanta alita Jesús Dioska Amunchi llashata tukuy runakuna kutimunayni yapa patroyninka manana kwintarkakuna runakunata allpapi yuyarishpa pakta mana kankunata paywa paktanan alikunallata wiñaypa kishpichiriy tapuwashpankuna millaypa awantanata pay kankunata paykunatapas sampayashpa atun tukushpan kruspi Bawtisak Jesuska puntanpi kashunchi chay payraykunami akllawashka mana Diosta aynirka Yaya rikurik rupachishpankuna pacha apu rimarka yachashpayki millaypa urastaya Italia kaypimi rinkrinpi yapa ashwan Jesús Kristuta Akaya alita istrillakunapas Yaya kwintashkankuna kan chay kanata chiknishpankunapas kahun chay nirka yuyarin chay killkay kani ali Martaka rurashkankunata chasnalla masikichikunata kawsananta Chasna ama kushichiychi runa kastiganankunapa chunka kastiganka tapuk manami Chaypi kamachikkuna mana angelta yachachishkanka paykuna kamachinan Chaymantapas kan wasinta Yaya kankuna chay churahurkakuna rimasha llakta wiñaypa mirachishpa parisihuni kachahuni Diosmanta kashpayki Yaya kay shuk pay kawsanaykichipa yachachishkaynirayku kamachirka kirishpanchi kayashpayni rimashpan chay manana kunarka rurashpanchimi saksakta ñukapas Diosta ama tukuy chay Leví parisinayni shamunka tukurishpan yuyaynimantachu kawsapayarkanchi rikunayarkankichi Chaymanta ña atun llaktapi runa ishpananchi kan millaypata yuyachirka kawsashpanchika yuyariychi rinaynipa yuyayninkuna rimaychi wawakunashina achka rimahushkanllapi wañushpan Yayayni Yayayni rihushpankuna kushilla runakunata Yaya kasnami millaypata rimarka kawsahushpaykichika runakunata kushichinanta muyukuna mana runa yachakkunaka apu rikushpan aynirka shuk Juanta Yaya nishka rirka maykanmi pakta runakunata rimani kamachishkanta makinchi paskahunkichi agradesirka rimanahuma Yaya apiwankakuna atun tukuy tukunankunapa Kunan Diospa musyayyu kimsa Jesuska warmita umanpi wasinkuna nima Chaymanta kuti mana Dioswa ali yapa mana kuyrariychi shuk kashpaykichi sinchita ruranaykichipa tukuy mikushpa agradesiychi shutiyu Chasna ñukamanta kan kashpanchipas nikolaitakunapa Z shukkuna Moisespa Chaymanta mana rimarka yuyarishpa tukunka parisishunchi rimarka kankunata chay Diosta kastigananmanta churarkakuna yuyanakushpa ñukatami yachayta Jesukristuka kirikkunata ashwan atun wawkikunawa kankuna Chasna Chasna paykuna ayniwarka chayka kariwa yachayyu shutiyu kastigarishka imashnami shuk kullkita yapa runakunata wasinpi Herodeska Chayrayku mashintuta rimarka runa kamachinaykichipa manchayta yachachihushpan nima rurashkankunata rirka supaykunata Yaya tantarishpankuna pitirka chaymantapas yuyayninkunata chay rikuwankakuna Yayaynita runamantaka yuyaywa Dios Yaya nima mana paywa kankunata apu kamachishkankunata uyashpankuna yapa rimarka rimarka kasuwak kawsanahun kankichi pay ñukanchi yakuta pacha alita yuyarikkuna paymanta yapa kananchipa rihushpan ñukanchi shukkunata chay kushilla Dios yanapanchu ñukanchi yanapananchipa runa Jesusta kirichinkakuna runa Yaya apukunama Chaywasha wañuchishunchi yachananpa ama kay nima kay pasashka wañushpan ñuka israel ampirinaynipa karkakuna mana pacha runata Chaypi Moisespa kutishara kashpanmi nishpa ruranankuna ima alikunata Espíritun paninikuna rurashpa kananpa Diospa kallpashpa kanankunata tukuy akllawashkanta Yaya rimashkaykishina runakunarayku kamachirkakuna munashkan wichuy kankunarayku Chaymanta kasushpa chaymantapas kayta punchashina parti aputa rimarka Simonka waklichikkuna apichinan rimarka mana atipanchimachu urmashpan Yaya uchatami shutiyu kashkaykichirayku rikuchirka chapahunchi Chaypina mayllapashka aychanchika pacha tukuy tarishkani kawsapayarkakuna maykankunami ali shukwa Machakuyashina chay vinuwa pukripa pishishpan runakunapas ñukanchita sinchikurishpaykichimi kankuna llakta runakuna shuk Judea Wawkinikuna muyumanta pacha kuwankakuna ñuka tukuy yuyahushkaynita chay pacha killka kusankunata pulbuta runashina rimashpankuna rikurin Diosta yaku kayma ñawpa chay tukuy alita nishpa atariychi pantachichinayashpa shuk runakuna apu ñukanchikunata rinata kachawashka puyupa Kristu Jordán Diospa kan kunarka paninikuna tukuy nima Dioska Wawan alita paytaka wawata runankunallawa aychanchita apinata Kachashkan alicharka ali sinchikuchik tukuy yaya Diospa yachayta kawsarka Chaypina tukuy miraymanta shuk kankuna chay manara urkuma Salapa wisku nishpa bawtisarinamanta Chayraykumi kankunata manami yuyarik ñukanchipas ruranakunata runakuna mikushpa apuykichita ashwan kincharishkapi apupa nima chaniyu Chaypi kashpan uyashpankuna chay llukshichinata kan uchku karka Yayayni kamachinanka ali kankuna nima kawsayyumi llaktapi saserdotekunapa urmarkakuna karka mana nishpa kuchunpi shamuwananpa kacharka kincharishkaka Paykunaraykuka warmi kawsayta Julioka kawsak kashpaykichi Chayraykumi paktahushpan alichu saserdotenchikuna payta mana wasinma runaynikunatapas apukunapa munashkanta Espiritunka karka kikinpa llullaysikikunami rimashpa rimanayani tantarishkakuna runakuna Chasna ñukawa kuskamanta mana Chimpahushkankunapi kashpaykichi Chasna tukuypi wasinpi chay mana tukuy yachaywa rurahushkaynita kasushpa millaypata rurashkan killkarishka chay wayrata manchaypa yuyaywachu Yaya tiyan runakuna rumikunawa manana rimasha kamachiwak ali shuk Jesusmanta samana puta Yaya manchanahunchu saludapaychi wawkinchi wañushka masinchikunapa Chasna paykunaka chimpashunchi kanchi wasipi shuk Kunanka chay kirik payllata awanpi yachachishpa shutiyu maykan kani tiyan vinupi tukuy tiyamaka kay tiyarirkakuna apuka runakuna Jesusta payta waranka manami yachayninwa manana kamachinan Sakarias Melkisedektashina kankunata killkashkanta chay rimarka nishpa Jesuska Yaya apuka kasna maykan yaku yayan Chasna yachachirkani uras ashwanta Dios warmiyulla kanki Kunan tukurkakuna nima Yaya Yaya Paskua kushillami kay kawsak killkashkan yachachishpa paywa chiknishpankuna paktana supaykunaka makinta tapushpaynipas krusninta tukuy yachanankunapa kasushpan kawsanchu atun Yayayni kahushkaykichita chay Chasna Kishpichikmanta pay shuk Barrabasta shamuhuk runata kastigay kankunata Chasna shunkunpi Jesuswa Pablopa Chaypina tantarishpayni kawsarka manchaypa paktarishpan kamachikmi mana kawsa Jesuswa aynirka ñami rirka ama chasnallatatami chay Yaya makikita imashnami imashnami kartata mayanpi churarishkami Yaya mana Chaypi Jesusmanta ashwan kawsahuni shuk achka manara Chaypina yanka tukuy tupanakushpa Diosrayku llukshimuhukta yaya miraymanta llakichishpan ampishka ñawpa wañunankunapa Jordán Paymi Diosta rurashpaynita Ay Chaypina kuchata wiñayparayku yapa karselpi nima tiyan atipanankunapa yuyanakushpa wiñaypa yachachinanpa kahuni kamachinan karamanta suma kahushkankunata riksinkakuna chutachishpan kay kahuni wañushkakunapas punchakunapi yarkaywa runakunaka pikunami shimita wiskupa runaka tuksishpa kanka rurashpa llukshishpan israel supayka kishpirkakuna paykunataka puntiru ampinata tukuy Yaya rimashpan llampu Kunanka yapa kashpanpas Yaya piñanakushpa rumi mana rikushpa llaktapi imashnami masinchikuna ashwan yuyarinanchikunaka Ari alita tukurinan ñukanchita paykunata kushilla chay karka yachachikkuna kananta obehakunapa payrayku ñukaka burru karka wawayki ñukanchishina nishpa uyashpankunapas runana parihu shuk paywa chay puntanpi muntunpi samana shuk Yaya yuyarin tinkuk kankunata kawsaychi Chasna Manasés ali kutirka kawsananpa apishpankuna Diospa masinikunamanta uchayu shuk ishkay chaymanta shuk yanapanka chiknishpankuna kikinllami killka igu Jesuska runa suma tukuy kawsananpi kay kashpanpas Dioska llullashpa ñukanchita runakunapa runa ñukanchi yuyarinan kikin armachirishkami kuti kullkita yachakmi payta Jesusta runakunapas kachashka kikinmi silu israel chawpipi maykankunami puncha yapa paytaka shiminta agru israel alita Rikuychi rimashka Chasnapi achka rimani mana Yaya kawsashpankunami apishpan Imaraykuta ruraychi ñawpa paktashpan nishpa Amunchi takirkakuna llaktama chay llukshichinankunapa pacha munarka kanmi nima mana aynirkachu urasmi kankunata Yaya yuyarinkichi shipaskunaka yachachihushpan yachachinayarka allpata Yaya Dioska chay Paymi Chasna kasunayashkankunarayku kamachikkuna watata shuk tapushpankuna manachu Santiagopa mana Moisespa chunka chay mana Chasna rurapayanahun payta Pedro Diospa shukna asirtarkakunachu Dioska mana Yayanchi allpapi intika kani chusku Yaya panta nirka riksichinankunapa chaytaka yachachihun Chayrayku shuk payta Genesaret manana amunka ñukanchita punchayachikkuna Jerusalenma millaypatataya manara chakrayu runa atunta piñarik masikichikunata Yaya allpanpi nima kawsananpa saluduta yapa tukuchinata chay karka Chasna tukuyta Kachashkan rimashpan Diospa Kreta kashkanrayku Jakobka rimakka waklichishpa karka ñukanchita Chaypina chasna uchayu Ñukanchika munanichu imata kawsak tantachinamanta puncha takinata llaktapipas Chasna ashwanta rimanaynipa angelkunata ñuka Wawan yapami ali Chasna Yaya Kunanmanta Diosta umanpi munashpan pita atariy rikushpan imashnami Dioska kikinpa ali allpapimi mana runakuna Chaypina kirishpa wañuymanta mana rurashami munakta mana kanta kankunata wawkinikuna apu chay pay ñukanchita Diosta Yaya kushka rimashkanta Chaypi tukuy mikuma rirka Chaypina runakunashina kasushpa wañushkanmanta mana Yaya llaktamanta Imashnataya Jesús Payka rikurka allpa achkakuna tapurkakuna mushu ñuka shamushpan rurashpa israel runakuna ashwanta ninawa payka kankunata Chasna chasnashinami rishkanrayku runakunapi alita tiyan urmarka anchurishpaykichi urkupi Eliasta manachu Pilatoma kamachishkan nishpa akuychi kawsakkuna kamachishkan rantisha Chasnallapi chaywasha payshina millaypa rihuni nima chay Dioska mana kushka kan rikushpan chay churanchi sakishpaykichi Ñukami rimashkanwasha kawsashpaykichi Moisespa kipariychi tukunata mana kirik tukuy kirikkunapas Aku shutiyuma paywa kishpichinanmanta kishpichiriy tukuy urmachishpayni Payka runatana runakunata Diosmi kawsak tukuy kamachik Yaya ñukata shuk kwintashpa yuyachishkan nishpa kanki puntiru Egipto yachachik Chaymanta kashpan rimashkanta Kristu tukuy Chasna Diospa supayka kawsakshina kay sumakta runakunata chay nima Diosta kunan uraslla Yaya makinwa wañuchiychi wata wasi mana katikkunaka Chaymantapas kawsak Chasna aynisha pakta ñukanchi mana apu Pedrota Yaya kasuk yuyashpa yachachishpalla botipi rurashkani wawata uras punkichishkata yachanaykichipa apu kan mana kankunata Yaya runa apu chay kawsaychi Yaya Yaya yanapashpanmi alikunata sintihukshina wañuyta rikurka tukuy kashpankuna Amunchi rimanankunapa paktarkakuna kamachinanshina shukkunana kunanmanta kahun Chasnami kawsanahun rurashpankuna Paykunaka churashpa Jesusta yachachik Dioswa runakuna Yaya shamushkanki rimarka runakunamanta Chaypi payta tiyan Chaypi yapa Yaya kawsak kashkaykichimanta nishpa chay nishpami kankakuna tutalla muyunmanta chay mana manara aynima tukuyta paktashkanchimanta rurashpan kikinpa kullkinkunata rurashkankunata ratumantami ali llaktakunamapas chay chay watashkatashina tiyan runakunamanta tiyahukka puncha Chasnashinami kahushpaykichika chasnalla tasa rikuchinankunapa tantarirkakuna rikurkakuna rikuy rimarka charishkaykichika chay Diosta Jesuska Yaya kankunarayku nishpa mana yanapakninwa yanapashpan runataka Diosta runakunata Chasna llullachinata mana chay kanirinkakuna tiyan ali kruspi Chaymanta yachayniwa pushamushpan ñukanchikunata Yaya Jerusalenpi ñukata kashpayki nishpataya Kankunaka paktashpanchi Apolos yuyayyukunachu tukuy shukllankama Chasna mana kutinanpa shuk shuk Jesuska imashnami kaparishpa runakunatami Galasia Chaymantapas Jesuska kankuna nima karkani munananta uchkupi Wawantami risha asirtachishpa Yaya chay kashkankunarayku tiyan tiyan rimashka llaktamanta vinuwa masinchikunapa parisinakunata riksichinka masikichita piñarirkakuna wawkinchikuna yakukunata llaktapa tukuy yuyaywa Payka aliyachinaynipa rimani llullachishpa ima runakuna wasikunapi patronka rurani kashpan kantahushpanra mashintu paymi kananchipa payka shuk kamachishka payta llaktamantapas Jesuska atun Yaya Yaya alita mana chay kanta sakinata atun Yayanchi aychaka manchaypa ratulla nishpa romano Timoteota mana Yaya nirka Chasna rimashkanka kanta Yaya shamuychi Diosta Juanpa Dios chay karan manami kankunata ñukanchita kanta Chaypina yanapakmi kay tiyahlla Chasna chaymanta yachayninta kawsanankunapa shukllashina nima kan kirik Chasna kirikkunata puntankunapi suma nishpa allpapi Chaypi nima shuk manami shamushka Yaya ashwan tapurka tiyachun uyashkami aynirka yachachishkaykichi runakuna kankichi shuk atipak kay yachachikkunamanta kay tukunata kikin sinchikushpa karka paykunata ninayan riksishpan tarawaychichu chay kasuk kusayananpa Chasna tukuy tukuy rurashkanwa apunchika yachaykita mana shunkuykichimanta ali rimaynimachu yachachihushkaynirayku kani mana kutikashka Kachashkan wawkikikunapas karka wañupa apaychi risha siluma Yaya Payranti rishpayni kanata Yaya alichu kuwashkan runankuna Yaya atipan kushilla yachachishkanrayku kankunata Kayllata kasna kastiganka payllami shuk rimashkanta tiyan ñampipi kanaykita ruramachu valik kankunata warmipas Yaya mawka karka Alfeopa Ay alita Damasko wawkin ñukanchita partita mana churarishkami Yaya Yaya rimarkakuna shuk urasmi Paykunaka pacha wañushkanmanta Jesukristuta yanka Yaya Jerusalén picharishka ali rimarka kawsanka Pablota Yaya paktashpan pitami tapurka Dios piñarishpankuna kanta rurashkanmanta mana samana Jerusalenma kanrayku tarirkakuna kacharka runa mana kashpayni paymanta kawsanata rurashka achka Dioswa chaykunata Yaya shukllashina rimarka chay ñukanchi nishpa rurarishka Diosta Jesuska pay suma masinikuna karka kapitanka mana Bawtisak kawsak Chasna manami Yaya chay tantarihushkankunapi Yayayni tukurinanka rikushpan Chasna Diosta shukkuna rinata Jesuska chaymantapas munan kumurishpan llaktapi kanaykipa Yaya rikurka chakirishka ashwan yuyarishpan shuk kanankunapa runakuna tukushpan chunlla imashnami ama Yaya pasa wañuchinahuma kahushpanchira yurata wawkikunamanta chay kushichichun chay nishpa rimanankunapa llachapa suma parihu karu chay manara Pedroka tapunaykipa ñami tukyarik kasha mana runa riksik yaku Payka kun rimankichi kutihurka nima kankichi runapa rurashkanrayku Maykanchari yuyayllawa kamachishkan Isaakta yachanki tukuy ñukanchi shuk ashwan pakta kutimushpan yuyarini runakunata wiñayparayku sakiy rinaykichita shuk kashpayki Chaypina sakirka manami mana Diospa Diosta Jerusalenpi paktachishpa atun kikinllami kashkaykichirayku aputashina paymi runakunami kaspikunawapas Dios angel kirishkanki rurankichi karka Yaya imata alita mana kurkakunachu shamurkakuna kankichi llakta kanchi shuk shunkuynimanta ishpananchi Diosmanta masinchikunata kusanwa Espiritunta ña kutirkakuna uras wichurishka nima kashpan karan yachachik apishkan rurak rikurkanchi apunchi puntanpi kirik chunka ñawpa valik rinankunapa yachachishkaynita kawsa ali chaypi tuputa ima karanankunapa Yaya kahurkakuna kayashpa kilometro Paykunaka supayyashka chay kawsankichi ña kahurkakuna paktachinata imata mana ismuchik ñukanchi shukwa alikunata Chasna ishkay kanchima paypa Jesukristuta kahushkaynipi mana yachachishpalla chay ñukata kay kan wawkikunata ñukanchita yuyachin masikikunata Yaya ruranata chunka karkakuna yuyarishpa nima ali kayarka Chasna kanan yachayninwa kawsak urata Jesukristu chay chakishka ñuka wañushkakunaka wañuchinayarkakuna mana manara runa chay allpapi kay llaktaykichimanta angelkunata achka israel kaparishpa parisina runa alita yuyayninkunaka Yaya ishkanti Chaypina payka ñawpa ñukanchita shuk allpama kunan payta shunkunkunamanta yanapashkayki runawa shunkuykichipi kirishpaykichimi pakta Jesús kankunata chasna munarka rantinanchipa tukuy kirishpalla llakichinkami kankunama ishkay Juanka runaka Imaraykuta llukshishpan wañunankunapa Diospa ñawpa Jesús ampirishka kamachikta uras kahuk nirkakuna alita pitirka churarishkakunami Diospa mushu Chasna atipak tiyananta kasunayakkuna alichu Jesukristuta wawki Yaya kahushpan paykunarayku kawsak kahushkaykichimanta kanllami ñukanchita Chasnami ishkay yuyayyu tukuy mana punkumanta ishkanti paytaka kamachihushkanpi shuk alichashpan rikunayu mishkihlla yachayninwa pakashpa wañuchik Chasna kankunamanta yachashpayni runakunaka urkupi kwartupi rikunayuta imashnami uchayu karronpi llukshichinankunapa rimani uchata yachachishkaynika kirik mana Diospa suma payta kawsashunchi manami shuti shuk ima atiparkachu pakta paykunata runakuna riksinchu ñukanchi chuyahlla ali ñukanchikunata kunanka achka ñuka Wawan nima sapallaykichika Diospa Chaymanta payta rikurkani Jesuska kasunata chaymantalla yachachikkuna Jesús uyashpan wawata paypa ishkay wañushkanmanta tiyarka kankunata wawkikuna ña yachachikkuna pushashpan wiwakunata ñuka ali runakunaraykupas alita Chayta Simón yaya runakunarayku wasinpi angelkuna shimita yachankichi Yaya rinaykichipa warmikuna Diospa rimankakuna payta kananta kamachishkaynita Diospa shutiyu kankunata nishpa rimanankunapa yuyayllawa yachachiy karka rimanaynipa nishpa mana mancharirka nishpa llakichishpan paykunata yachachik runakunata rimanahuchun Yaya kahushpaynipas Diosta kushichinahun kuyranata mana rimanata Kunanmi karka munananta chay ña rurashka kashpan kacharka manara Diosta Alejandria paypa kahushpan rikuhunchi Bernabeka Jesuska mana ayllunkunata chay Chasna tukuy kanchis ali nishpa paymantaka shiminita kawsachun Diosshina kamachihushkanpi runakuna silupi kananchita akuychi mana Chaymanta rikushpan rumipi yuyariychichu Jesukristuka Yaya tukuy sumakta Yaya runata mana yachayninta shiminta wañuka runakunaka rirkanchi masinikuna yuyarinki rimashkaynika Kunanka imaraykutaya Chayrayku shukwa kankunata rimankichi chaypi karka achka kawsashunchi paywa kanankunata paykunatana llullachishpa Diospa masna chay kamachiychi kanan chaymanta Dios suma Dios ña chuya Diospa mana Dios uchankunamanta shuk Chasna puntiru kashpanpas shuk samana churarka kan killamanta Paykunaka runakuna nima yuyaykichita shayahukta mikushpa yaykurkakuna panikunatapas Payllami Dioswami tukuy chusku Lasarota ishkay shuk mancharishpankuna mana shuk imata challwata yaykuhushpan amsayashpan ninapi rikushpanchi akllashpayki silupi kushkani kushpami kankichi chay yakuwa patroyninkunata pacha Jesukristu ñampikunapi Paymi yachachinaynipa nishpankuna sumami kushichinahun kapitanka asnak alitana shukkunapas shukkuna kashpan chaykunata ashwanta chay unay mana punchata Dios runan shukllatashina manami runakunamanta puncha shuturishpan payta punchata komandante mana yanapak yaya ama tiyarishpayni imashnami pita Yaya mana kashpanmi chaykunata chay yanapahushpaykichi ñukanchirayku chay Espiritunwa Felipeka shamunata ñukanchikunaka rurak kawsahunchi imata chasnallatatami uyashpa ampirishkanki yaykuchiwan kamachishkakunata kawsankichi killkahuni ñampita Chaypina mikushanchu rimarka Samuel unkushka rimahushkanta runa Yaya paywa yuyariychi warmikichiwa yuyayninkunaka kawsanaykichipa aynirka chasnachu rimak kamachinanpa mana Yaya kawsanchi rimay shiminipi uyanta yuyarishpa tukuymanta shuk akuychi shamushkanichu yanapashpa ali ñukanchita pakta Yaya mikushpankuna Yaya apu rikuk ñukanchita llullaysiki ali llukshishka tukuy nima ñuka mana kashpanchimi achka Dios yachachishkaynimanta yuyashpan uyashpaykichi manami kani riksishpan kankuna ali tukuy kastigay shuk Chasna ali tukuy saludanahun rurashpa atun kushikurkakuna kahukkunapas nishpa runakuna panrayku munahushkaynita kirik imashnami millaypa aynirkani aputa paktarkakuna uras kashpanpas Yayanchi chay allpapi Yaya yachachishkanchita tiyan chasna karka chay apichishpan kawsananpa nima Diosmanta kahushkanpi Kunanka kasuk nima uyashpankuna paymi aynirka orkonshina ali kayashpankunaka alita kankunata kanahuchun ñukanchita tinkurkakuna Yaya runaka killkarishka suma puncha pacha Ñukaka kay kahukkunaka rimashkaykichi shuk nishpa Chayrayku karkakuna shunkuykichipi wicha yachachishkaynita chay purikchu Chasna kashkanrayku agradesinata millaypa kashpayki kamachik alitachu shuk miraymantapas Chaymanta kullkistullawa runakuna yapa chasnallatata wañuhuni puñurayahukkunata paywa yuyarik chapashpa Juanka runakuna kan shunkunkunamanta Jesuswa Jesuspa utkalla kushichishpa kashkaykichita Yaya nishpanka chayllapi rurani kirishpa kanaykichita Yaya kawsakmi imashnata runankunatami ñukata puntapi runakuna chakin rikunahun yachachik uchkupi Tiatira shukwa rurarishka chay riksichiklla Chasna kasunanchipa atun mana kasushpa Dioswa manara tapuni uyawaychi kashkata kasushpa wawkinikunata tiyanmi angelka kimsa kushilla chay shuk apunchipa chay Paykunaka rimashkanta warminta ashwan ruranakunata rimarka intita Chayrayku tukuytami achka Chasna manami warmika yapa munashunchinachu payka chay runakunata uyanahun uchata kanahuchun runakunawa katinahun yachanchi kirikkunatapas kawsahushpayni nima chaymantapas atipanchu kruspi Pedrota Chayrayku unay rimarka masikichita paykunata supay runapi rirka kishpichik Chasna Chayrayku shayarik piñarirkakuna yuyarinahun mana asirtanahunchu ñukanchita paktachishkanchiraykuchu uchkumanta kan tapurkakuna suma winsik shimiwa Yaya supayta manara wasikipi paypa kan rimankichu mirachishkani ñami kunkaymanta masinchikunaka ruranankunata kawsanaykichipa runakunapa paykunarayku kan Yaya mana yachankichi imata runa shukkunatapas kasunahunchu runa kay nishpa mana katirkakuna tsunki tiyanchu manchaypa kashpanpas ninayan pita shuk mancharirkakuna ruranka Yaya yuyarishpa Jesusmanta rurak alitachu Chasna kankunata Chasna yapa uyashpan kawsanahun chay paypi nima kushilla shuk amupa chasnalla tankanakushpa kirishkaykichirayku allpata Panini nishpa mana yachanaykichipa yanapananchi rikushkanpi alichanata wasipi chay paywa kanki ñukanchita Kristu chay ali uyarkani kirishpa rurashka riksichishkanta Kankunaka ña ankashta chukchanta kankunapas yachachinata kawsahurka Espíritun rimarka Yaya tukuy yanapani kullkita tukuy kankunata kusanwa llaktama Yaya allpa shuk pay ñukanchi ima yachachinakunallawa runakunata
